Dialogue: (I guess that means I've got to gather ingredients again.)
trans: （我想这意味着我必须再次收集原料。）

Original: Zidane:(I'll pitch in next time.)
Dialogue: (I'll pitch in next time.)

Original: Terra:Everyone looks so happy. I suppose I should give cooking a try...
Dialogue: Everyone looks so happy. I suppose I should give cooking a try...
trans: 每个人看起来都很开心。

Original: Mog:We did it! Everything is going according to plan, kupo! The Torsions will all be sealed in no time.
Dialogue: We did it! Everything is going according to plan, kupo! The Torsions will all be sealed in no time.

Original: Eiko:Wow, you're amazing!
Dialogue: Wow, you're amazing!

Original: Eiko:Hey, you have friends and family too, right? Can I meet them?
Dialogue: Hey, you have friends and family too, right? Can I meet them?
trans: 嘿，你也有朋友和家人，对吧？

Original: Mog:F-friends, kupo? Family, kupo?
Dialogue: F-friends, kupo? Family, kupo?

Original: Mog:I don't have either of those things... I'm just a messenger for the goddess Materia.
Dialogue: I don't have either of those things... I'm just a messenger for the goddess Materia.
trans: 这些东西我都没有……我只是女神魔石的使者。

Original: Eiko:Really? That's strange.
Dialogue: Really? That's strange.

Original: Terra:A village full of moogles?
Dialogue: A village full of moogles?

Original: Vivi:Yeah, they're her family.
Dialogue: Yeah, they're her family.

Original: Terra:I'm so jealous.
Dialogue: I'm so jealous.

Original: Zidane:Postal workers,merchants,travelers, you name it.
Dialogue: Postal workers, merchants, travelers, you name it.
trans: 邮政工作人员、商人、旅行者，应有尽有。

Original: Bartz:Huh, I had no idea moogles were so different in each world.
Dialogue: Huh, I had no idea moogles were so different in each world.
trans: 哈，我不知道每个世界的莫古利都如此不同。

Original: Eiko:It doesn't matter where they're from! They're all the same to me, and I'll always be their friend!
Dialogue: It doesn't matter where they're from! They're all the same to me, and I'll always be their friend!
trans: 他们来自哪里并不重要！

Original: Eiko:Oh yeah! I have something I wanna give you!
Dialogue: Oh yeah! I have something I wanna give you!

Original: Mog:A kupo nut...kupo?
Dialogue: A kupo nut...kupo?

Original: Mog:Kupo! This is delicious! I love it, kupo!
Dialogue: Kupo! This is delicious! I love it, kupo!

Original: Eiko:Amazing, right? I'll give you another one after we seal the next Torsion!
Dialogue: Amazing, right? I'll give you another one after we seal the next Torsion!

Original: Mog:I feel like a new moogle! Come on, follow me, kupo!
Dialogue: I feel like a new moogle! Come on, follow me, kupo!
trans: 我觉得自己像个新莫古力！

Original: Zidane:That's Eiko for ya. She's really good with moogles.
Dialogue: That's Eiko for ya. She's really good with moogles.

Original: Terra:...I wish I could have a kupo nut.
Dialogue: ...I wish I could have a kupo nut.
trans: ...我希望我能有一个 kupo 坚果。

Original: ???:Seriously though, where am I?
Dialogue: Seriously though, where am I?

Original: ???:And what was with that puppet back there?
Dialogue: And what was with that puppet back there?
trans: 那里的那个木偶是怎么回事？

Original: ???:I mean, it was like talking to a brick wall. There was something familiar about it though.
Dialogue: I mean, it was like talking to a brick wall. There was something familiar about it though.
trans: 我的意思是，这就像对着一堵砖墙说话。

Original: ???:Anyway, I have to find Yuna. If only there were some way to
Dialogue: Anyway, I have to find Yuna. If only there were some way to—
trans: 无论如何，我必须找到尤娜。

Original: ???:Wait, I got it!
Dialogue: Wait, I got it!

Original: ???:Well, that didn't work.
Dialogue: Well, that didn't work.

Original: ???:Don't tell me I'm on my own.
Dialogue: Don't tell me I'm on my own.

Original: ???:Argh! Where is everybody!?
Dialogue: Argh! Where is everybody!?

Original: Zidane:Yuna? What are you doing all by yourself?
Dialogue: Yuna? What are you doing all by yourself?

Original: Yuna:I'm trying to find him. He might have been summoned to this world, too.
Dialogue: I'm trying to find him. He might have been summoned to this world, too.

Original: Zidane:Oh... Well, good luck with that.
Dialogue: Oh... Well, good luck with that.

Original: Edge:G-get away from me! I said I don't want to fight you!
Dialogue: G-get away from me! I said I don't want to fight you!

Original: ???:Nice try, puppet! You can't fool me!
Dialogue: Nice try, puppet! You can't fool me!

Original: Yuna:That voice! Is that!?
Dialogue: That voice! Is that—!?

Original: Zidane:C'mon, let's go!
Dialogue: C'mon, let's go!

Original: Zidane:Edge, are you all right!?
Dialogue: Edge, are you all right!?

Original: Tidus:Yuna!?
Dialogue: Yuna!?

Original: Edge:You know this guy? Then can you tell him to back off? He came out of nowhere and started attacking me!
Dialogue: You know this guy? Then can you tell him to back off? He came out of nowhere and started attacking me!

Original: Yuna:I just knew we would find each other.
Dialogue: I just knew we would find each other.
trans: 我只知道我们会找到彼此。

Original: Tidus:Is that really you, Yuna?
Dialogue: Is that really you, Yuna?

Original: Yuna:Of course, it's me! I'm so happy to see you, Tidus.
Dialogue: Of course, it's me! I'm so happy to see you, Tidus.

Original: Mog:Hooray for reunions! I think I'm going to cry, kupo!
Dialogue: Hooray for reunions! I think I'm going to cry, kupo!

Original: Zidane:Oh, so this is who you were looking for. Glad you found each other.
Dialogue: Oh, so this is who you were looking for. Glad you found each other.

Original: Tidus:So those humanoid monsters are called manikins, huh?
Dialogue: So those humanoid monsters are called manikins, huh?
trans: 所以那些人形怪物被称为人体模型，是吧？

Original: Edge:Yeah, and you better not confuse me for one again!
Dialogue: Yeah, and you better not confuse me for one again!
trans: 是的，你最好不要再把我搞糊涂了！

Original: Tidus:I'm really sorry about that.
Dialogue: I'm really sorry about that.

Original: Tidus:So, Yuna...
Dialogue: So, Yuna...

Original: Tidus:Is that Seymour behind you real or not?
Dialogue: Is that Seymour behind you real or not?
trans: 你身后那个Seymour是真的还是假的？

Original: Mog:Th-that's a manikin, kupo!
Dialogue: Th-that's a manikin, kupo!

Original: Zidane:Well, still beats the real thing.
Dialogue: Well, still beats the real thing.
trans: 好吧，仍然打败了真实的东西。

Original: Tidus:You guys met Seymour? Guess you know what kind of a man he is too, then!
Dialogue: You guys met Seymour? Guess you know what kind of a man he is too, then!

Original: Tidus:Real or fake, we've gotta stop him.
Dialogue: Real or fake, we've gotta stop him.
trans: 不管是真的还是假的，我们必须阻止他。

Original: Tidus:So make room for me! I'll show you just how quick I really am!
Dialogue: So make room for me! I'll show you just how quick I really am!

Original: King:Wakka, I've been wondering... What's your ball for? It doesn't look like it was made for battle...
Dialogue: Wakka, I've been wondering... What's your ball for? It doesn't look like it was made for battle...
trans: Wakka，我一直在想...你的球是干什么用的？

Original: Tidus:Me and Wakka are both blitzball athletes!
Dialogue: Me and Wakka are both blitzball athletes!
trans: 我和 Wakka 都是闪电队运动员！

Original: Firion:Athletes...? I took you for warriors...
Dialogue: Athletes...? I took you for warriors...

Original: Yuna:Blitzball is a sport played with that ball.
Dialogue: Blitzball is a sport played with that ball.
trans: Blitzball 是一项用这种球进行的运动。

Original: Yuna:The field is underwater, and you compete to steal the ball and bring it to a goal to score points.
Dialogue: The field is underwater, and you compete to steal the ball and bring it to a goal to score points.
trans: 场地在水下，你争先恐后地偷球并将其带到球门得分。

Original: Yuna:It's quite popular in our world, and the best athletes will compete in tournaments in front of spectators.
Dialogue: It's quite popular in our world, and the best athletes will compete in tournaments in front of spectators.
trans: 它在我们的世界非常流行，最好的运动员将在观众面前参加比赛。

Original: Firion:You don't say... So that's where you get your agility.
Dialogue: You don't say... So that's where you get your agility.
trans: 你不说......所以这就是你获得敏捷性的地方。

Original: King:Underwater competition, huh...? Is it for some kind of training?
Dialogue: Underwater competition, huh...? Is it for some kind of training?

Original: Wakka:Entertainment...I guess. Like a festival.
Dialogue: Entertainment...I guess. Like a festival.

Original: Wakka:It's our job as players to give the fans a good game.
Dialogue: It's our job as players to give the fans a good game.
trans: 作为球员，我们的工作就是给球迷一场精彩的比赛。

Original: Tidus:Wanna give it a try? I bet you two'd be good at it.
Dialogue: Wanna give it a try? I bet you two'd be good at it.

Original: King:...Should the opportunity arise.
Dialogue: ...Should the opportunity arise.

Original: King:Your home world was peaceful enough to hold sports tournaments?
Dialogue: Your home world was peaceful enough to hold sports tournaments?
trans: 你的家乡世界和平到可以举办体育比赛？

Original: Yuna:I think it's something to rely on...
Dialogue: I think it's something to rely on...
trans: 我认为这是可以依赖的东西......

Original: Yuna:When you live in fear every day, watching blitzball can cheer you up.
Dialogue: When you live in fear every day, watching blitzball can cheer you up.
trans: 当你每天都活在恐惧中时，看闪电战能让你振作起来。

Original: Firion:A job that cheers people up? That sounds right up Tidus's alley.
Dialogue: A job that cheers people up? That sounds right up Tidus's alley.

Original: Tidus:Ha ha... I don't really think that much about it during a match.
Dialogue: Ha ha... I don't really think that much about it during a match.
trans: 呵呵……比赛的时候还真没想那么多。

Original: Tidus:But if I can cheer people up, I won't complain.
Dialogue: But if I can cheer people up, I won't complain.
trans: 但如果我能让人们振作起来，我就不会抱怨。

Original: Firion:I can tell you're skilled by the way you move, and I know nothing about the game. It must be fun to watch.
Dialogue: I can tell you're skilled by the way you move, and I know nothing about the game. It must be fun to watch.
trans: 我可以从你移动的方式看出你很熟练，而且我对游戏一无所知。

Original: Tidus:You bet it is. I can't wait to get in front of the crowds again!
Dialogue: You bet it is. I can't wait to get in front of the crowds again!

Original: Onion Knight:Tidus, you're from the same world as Seymour, right?
Dialogue: Tidus, you're from the same world as Seymour, right?
trans: Tidus，你和 Seymour 来自同一个世界，对吧？

Original: Onion Knight:It sounds like you were on opposite sides, but what did he do back then?
Dialogue: It sounds like you were on opposite sides, but what did he do back then?
trans: 听起来你们是对立的，但他当时做了什么？

Original: Tidus:I think he was somebody important. Yuna seemed to respect him originally...
Dialogue: I think he was somebody important. Yuna seemed to respect him originally...

Original: Tidus:Maybe... Everyone trusted him, I guess.
Dialogue: Maybe... Everyone trusted him, I guess.
trans: 也许……每个人都信任他，我猜。

Original: Penelo:Even though we're talking about your home world, you don't sound so sure.
Dialogue: Even though we're talking about your home world, you don't sound so sure.
trans: 即使我们在谈论你的家乡世界，你听起来也不太确定。

Original: Tidus:I don't know all there is about Spira.
Dialogue: I don't know all there is about Spira.
trans: 我不知道有关 Spira 的所有信息。

Original: Tidus:That's my story, but not actually.
Dialogue: That's my story, but not actually.
trans: 那是我的故事，但实际上并非如此。

Original: Galuf:Hmm... So you have disparate backgrounds.
Dialogue: Hmm... So you have disparate backgrounds.
trans: 嗯……所以你们背景不一样。

Original: Shantotto:And you as an alien would pick up on points to them less salient?
Dialogue: And you as an alien would pick up on points to them less salient?
trans: 而你作为外星人会发现他们不那么突出的点吗？

Original: Tidus:I couldn't buy what Seymour was selling.
Dialogue: I couldn't buy what Seymour was selling.
trans: 我买不到西摩卖的东西。

Original: Onion Knight:Release in death, right? It's a hard sell for us, too.
Dialogue: Release in death, right? It's a hard sell for us, too.

Original: Onion Knight:Don't tell me Yuna and Wakka bought into that.
Dialogue: Don't tell me Yuna and Wakka bought into that.
trans: 别告诉我 Yuna 和 Wakka 买账了。

Original: Tidus:I wouldn't say they bought it, but in Spira...death is always close at hand.
Dialogue: I wouldn't say they bought it, but in Spira...death is always close at hand.
trans: 我不会说他们买了它，但在 Spira 中……死亡总是近在咫尺。

Original: Tidus:Yuna was ready to sacrifice herself to save everybody else.
Dialogue: Yuna was ready to sacrifice herself to save everybody else.
trans: 尤娜准备牺牲自己来拯救其他人。

Original: Penelo:That's awful... What's the point of protecting someone if you can't be there with them?
Dialogue: That's awful... What's the point of protecting someone if you can't be there with them?
trans: 太可怕了……如果你不能和他们在一起，保护一个人有什么意义？

Original: Tidus:Everyone thought there's no other way.
Dialogue: Everyone thought there's no other way.
trans: 每个人都认为没有别的办法。

Original: Shantotto:With death always close at hand, we all would be better off dead...
Dialogue: With death always close at hand, we all would be better off dead...
trans: 死亡总是近在咫尺，我们都还不如死了...

Original: Shantotto:...is the train of thought I suspect runs through Seymour's head.
Dialogue: ...is the train of thought I suspect runs through Seymour's head.
trans: ......我怀疑是 Seymour 头脑中的思路。

Original: Galuf:And he'd still push that thought in this world... He's not one to be trusted.
Dialogue: And he'd still push that thought in this world... He's not one to be trusted.
trans: 而且他仍然会在这个世界上推动这种想法......他不是一个值得信任的人。

Original: Onion Knight:Though I agree with not wanting to be a slave to the gods.
Dialogue: Though I agree with not wanting to be a slave to the gods.
trans: 虽然我同意不想成为众神的奴隶。

Original: Penelo:...He scares me.
Dialogue: ...He scares me.

Original: Penelo:The heart stops moving in the dead. There's no way for us to tell if they're happy or not...
Dialogue: The heart stops moving in the dead. There's no way for us to tell if they're happy or not...

Original: Shantotto:If Mog can find a use for him, then use him he would.
Dialogue: If Mog can find a use for him, then use him he would.
trans: 如果 Mog 能为他找到用处，那么他会使用他。

Original: Shantotto:But that doesn't mean trusting him would do us any good.
Dialogue: But that doesn't mean trusting him would do us any good.
trans: 但这并不意味着相信他对我们有任何好处。

Original: Onion Knight:If he's up to something, you guys would notice it first. When that time comes, we're counting on you.
Dialogue: If he's up to something, you guys would notice it first. When that time comes, we're counting on you.
trans: 如果他有什么企图，你们会首先注意到的。

Original: Tidus:You got it.
Dialogue: You got it.

Original: Tidus:I'm not gonna let him "ease" any of our "suffering."
Dialogue: I'm not gonna let him "ease" any of our "suffering."
trans: 我不会让他“减轻”我们的任何“痛苦”。

Original: Tidus:What is Seymour doing here, anyway? What's he want from us?
Dialogue: What is Seymour doing here, anyway? What's he want from us?
trans: 无论如何，Seymour 在这里做什么？

Original: Yuna:Our lives.
Dialogue: Our lives.

Original: Zidane:He said that we were servants to the gods and that we were better off dead.
Dialogue: He said that we were servants to the gods and that we were better off dead.
trans: 他说我们是神的仆人，死了还好。

Original: Tidus:I sure hope we don't run into him anytime soon.
Dialogue: I sure hope we don't run into him anytime soon.
trans: 我当然希望我们不会很快遇到他。

Original: Mog:Yeah, he's a very dangerous person, kupo. And rude at that!
Dialogue: Yeah, he's a very dangerous person, kupo. And rude at that!
trans: 是的，他是一个非常危险的人，kupo。

Original: Seymour:Death is the ultimate liberation from suffering. Why can't you see that?
Dialogue: Death is the ultimate liberation from suffering. Why can't you see that?
trans: 死亡是从苦难中最终的解脱。

Original: Seymour:Ah, so you were summoned as well?
Dialogue: Ah, so you were summoned as well?

Original: Seymour:How amusing. The gods of this world must need all the help they can get.
Dialogue: How amusing. The gods of this world must need all the help they can get.

Original: Cecil:Take that back! Tidus is a warrior of remarkable skill.
Dialogue: Take that back! Tidus is a warrior of remarkable skill.

Original: Tidus:I knew there was a reason I never liked you!
Dialogue: I knew there was a reason I never liked you!
trans: 我知道我从来不喜欢你是有原因的！

Original: Seymour:Say what you willfor even those thoughts are but a passing dream.
Dialogue: Say what you will—for even those thoughts are but a passing dream.
trans: 说出你的意愿——因为即使是那些想法也只是一个短暂的梦想。

Original: Seymour:Now, Lady Yuna, let us put an end to this futile struggle.
Dialogue: Now, Lady Yuna, let us put an end to this futile struggle.
trans: 现在，尤娜女士，让我们结束这场徒劳的斗争吧。

Original: Seymour:Embrace the eternal slumber that awaits you.
Dialogue: Embrace the eternal slumber that awaits you.
trans: 拥抱等待您的永恒沉睡。

Original: Tidus:Lay one finger on her, and you're dead!
Dialogue: Lay one finger on her, and you're dead!
trans: 把一根手指放在她身上，你就死定了！

Original: Yuna:Maester Seymour, I can't let you do that.
Dialogue: Maester Seymour, I can't let you do that.
trans: 西摩学士，我不能让你那样做。

Original: Cecil:Our lives are not ours to throw away anymore.
Dialogue: Our lives are not ours to throw away anymore.
trans: 我们的生命不再是我们可以丢弃的了。

Original: Seymour:Servants of the godsit seems I must release you from your pain.
Dialogue: Servants of the gods—it seems I must release you from your pain.
trans: 众神的仆人——看来我必须要让你摆脱痛苦了。

Original: Zidane:Well, you heard him, Tidus. What're you gonna do?
Dialogue: Well, you heard him, Tidus. What're you gonna do?
trans: 好吧，你听到他的声音了，Tidus。

Original: Tidus:I'm Yuna's guardian. I'll protect her no matter what happens.
Dialogue: I'm Yuna's guardian. I'll protect her no matter what happens.

Original: Tidus:Seymour! It's over for you!
Dialogue: Seymour! It's over for you!

Original: Seymour:There is no use in fighting it.
Dialogue: There is no use in fighting it.

Original: Seymour:Come, death shall carry you off into a sweet slumber!
Dialogue: Come, death shall carry you off into a sweet slumber!
trans: 来吧，死亡会让你进入甜蜜的睡眠！

Original: Seymour:How could I lose to you mindless pawns?
Dialogue: How could I lose to you mindless pawns?
trans: 我怎么会输给你们这些没脑子的棋子呢？

Original: King:Who are you calling a mindless pawn? It's my choice to be here!
Dialogue: Who are you calling a mindless pawn? It's my choice to be here!
trans: 你说谁是没脑子的棋子？

Original: Seymour:Poor creatures, bound by the shackles of life...
Dialogue: Poor creatures, bound by the shackles of life...
trans: 可怜的生灵，被生活的枷锁所束缚……

Original: Seymour:The time for liberation is near.
Dialogue: The time for liberation is near.

Original: Tidus:Wait! Seymour, come back!
Dialogue: Wait! Seymour, come back!

Original: Sazh:*Sigh* He sure comes and goes as he pleases.
Dialogue: *Sigh* He sure comes and goes as he pleases.

Original: Mog:Monsters aren't our only problem, kupo. Who knows when he'll show up again.
Dialogue: Monsters aren't our only problem, kupo. Who knows when he'll show up again.
trans: 怪物不是我们唯一的问题，库波。

Original: Sazh:It's gonna be a tough journey, kid. You up for it?
Dialogue: It's gonna be a tough journey, kid. You up for it?
trans: 这将是一段艰难的旅程，孩子。

Original: Tidus:Bring it on.
Dialogue: Bring it on.

Original: Tidus:I told you guys already. I'm gonna protect Yuna no matter what.
Dialogue: I told you guys already. I'm gonna protect Yuna no matter what.

Original: King:Looks like it's settled then.
Dialogue: Looks like it's settled then.
trans: 到时候好像就这么定了。

Original: Tidus:From now on, we're a team.
Dialogue: From now on, we're a team.
trans: 从现在开始，我们就是一个团队。

Original: Tidus:And what kind of star player would I be if I didn't look out for you guys? Let's do this!
Dialogue: And what kind of star player would I be if I didn't look out for you guys? Let's do this!
trans: 如果我不照顾你们，我会成为什么样的明星球员？

Original: Mog:Yay! Welcome to our team, kupo!
Dialogue: Yay! Welcome to our team, kupo!

Original: Mog:There's a Torsion in here, kupo! I can feel it!
Dialogue: There's a Torsion in here, kupo! I can feel it!

Original: Penelo:No one let your guard down. Who knows what might be lurking in the shadows.
Dialogue: No one let your guard down. Who knows what might be lurking in the shadows.

Original: King:The heck are you?
Dialogue: The heck are you?

Original: Prishe:I'm Prishe! My fists and I are cleaning up the monsters around here. Nice to meet ya!
Dialogue: I'm Prishe! My fists and I are cleaning up the monsters around here. Nice to meet ya!

Original: Onion Knight:Well, aren't you the cheerful one.
Dialogue: Well, aren't you the cheerful one.
trans: 好吧，你不是那个开朗的人吗？

Original: Warrior of Light:I sense an exceptional power within hersomething grand.
Dialogue: I sense an exceptional power within her—something grand.
trans: 我感觉到她身上有一种非凡的力量——某种伟大的力量。

Original: Prishe:Hm? What's up? Something on my face?
Dialogue: Hm? What's up? Something on my face?

Original: Warrior of Light:No, it's nothing.
Dialogue: No, it's nothing.

Original: King:At the very least, it doesn't look like you're the enemy. ...Care to join us?
Dialogue: At the very least, it doesn't look like you're the enemy. ...Care to join us?
trans: 至少，看起来不像是敌人。

Original: Mog:I can sense the light within her! She's one of us, kupo!
Dialogue: I can sense the light within her! She's one of us, kupo!
trans: 我能感觉到她体内的光！

Original: Warrior of Light:Prishe, we are also on a journey to defeat the monsters that terrorize this world.
Dialogue: Prishe, we are also on a journey to defeat the monsters that terrorize this world.
trans: Prishe，我们也在踏上击败威胁这个世界的怪物的旅程。

Original: Prishe:Really? What a coincidence!
Dialogue: Really? What a coincidence!

Original: Prishe:Looks like there's only one way to settle this: first one to defeat all the monsters wins!
Dialogue: Looks like there's only one way to settle this first one to defeat all the monsters wins!
trans: 看来只有一种方法可以解决这个第一个打败所有怪物的胜利！

Original: Penelo:W-wait... You're turning this into a game?
Dialogue: W-wait... You're turning this into a game?
trans: 等等……你要把它变成游戏？

Original: Prishe:Yep! What better motivation than a little competition?
Dialogue: Yep! What better motivation than a little competition?

Original: Prishe:Well, catch ya later! Don't get yourselves killed!
Dialogue: Well, catch ya later! Don't get yourselves killed!

Original: Prishe:You monsters are gonna be sorry when I find you!
Dialogue: You monsters are gonna be sorry when I find you!
trans: 当我找到你时，你们这些怪物会后悔的！

Original: Mog:She could have at least listened to what I had to say, kupo.
Dialogue: She could have at least listened to what I had to say, kupo.
trans: 库波，她至少可以听听我说的话。

Original: Onion Knight:We'll just have to explain things next time we run into her.
Dialogue: We'll just have to explain things next time we run into her.
trans: 下次我们遇到她时，我们只需要解释一下。

Original: Prishe:Ughhh... It's not...over yet.
Dialogue: Ughhh... It's not...over yet.

Original: Shantotto:Oh, what is this I see? Already giving up on your killing spree?
Dialogue: Oh, what is this I see? Already giving up on your killing spree?

Original: Prishe:If only...I had something to eat...I wouldn't have lost.
Dialogue: If only...I had something to eat...I wouldn't have lost.
trans: 要是……我有吃的……我就不会输了。

Original: Zidane:Something to eat? What, you trying to feed the monsters or something?
Dialogue: Something to eat? What, you trying to feed the monsters or something?

Original: Prishe:No, you dummy! Something for me to eat!
Dialogue: No, you dummy! Something for me to eat!

Original: Prishe:I'm so hungry I can barely move. You guys got anything?
Dialogue: I'm so hungry I can barely move. You guys got anything?
trans: 我太饿了，几乎无法动弹。

Original: Warrior of Light:Very well. You may eat with us.
Dialogue: Very well. You may eat with us.

Original: Yang:Mog, let us feast and appease her hunger.
Dialogue: Mog, let us feast and appease her hunger.
trans: 莫格，让我们大快朵颐，充饥。

Original: Mog:Right on it, kupo!
Dialogue: Right on it, kupo!

Original: Prishe:Wow, that was delicious! Thanks a bunch.
Dialogue: Wow, that was delicious! Thanks a bunch.

Original: Mog:Kupo! You almost cleaned us out.
Dialogue: Kupo! You almost cleaned us out.

Original: Prishe:My bad! I haven't had anything in days! Not a single eatery in sight around here.
Dialogue: My bad! I haven't had anything in days! Not a single eatery in sight around here.

Original: Zidane:So I'm guessing you came here from another world, too?
Dialogue: So I'm guessing you came here from another world, too?
trans: 所以我猜你也是从另一个世界来到这里的？

Original: Prishe:Another world? The heck you talking about?
Dialogue: Another world? The heck you talking about?

Original: Yang:I know this may surprise you, but you have been summoned to another world.
Dialogue: I know this may surprise you, but you have been summoned to another world.
trans: 我知道这可能会让你吃惊，但你已经被召唤到另一个世界了。

Original: Mog:We're searching for people like you to help us close the Torsions, kupo.
Dialogue: We're searching for people like you to help us close the Torsions, kupo.
trans: 我们正在寻找像你这样的人来帮助我们关闭 Torsions，kupo。

Original: Prishe:Oh, okay! I don't get it, but gotcha!
Dialogue: Oh, okay! I don't get it, but gotcha!

Original: Prishe:I mean I don't really understand what's going on, but I totally get that you need my help.
Dialogue: I mean I don't really understand what's going on, but I totally get that you need my help.
trans: 我的意思是我真的不明白发生了什么，但我完全明白你需要我的帮助。

Original: Warrior of Light:That should do for now.
Dialogue: That should do for now.

Original: Prishe:Have no fear, Prishe is here! One good Howling Fist and those monsters are toast!
Dialogue: Have no fear, Prishe is here! One good Howling Fist and those monsters are toast!

Original: Shantotto:That's a rather optimistic mood when just moments ago you were crying for food.
Dialogue: That's a rather optimistic mood when just moments ago you were crying for food.
trans: 就在刚才你还在哭着要食物的时候，那是一种相当乐观的情绪。

Original: Prishe:Heh! I'm countin' on you guys to keep me full!
Dialogue: Heh! I'm countin' on you guys to keep me full!

Original: Zidane:I hope there's enough for the rest of us...
Dialogue: I hope there's enough for the rest of us...
trans: 我希望对我们其他人来说足够了......

Original: Prishe:Ughhh... So hungry...
Dialogue: Ughhh... So hungry...

Original: Penelo:But we just ate. You sure are a bundle of energy.
Dialogue: But we just ate. You sure are a bundle of energy.

Original: Prishe:That doesn't change the fact that ...Hm?
Dialogue: That doesn't change the fact that— ...Hm?
trans: 这不会改变一个事实—— ...嗯？

Original: Prishe:Sniff... Sniff sniff sniff...
Dialogue: Sniff... Sniff sniff sniff...

Original: Prishe:Ahhh! Y-you!
Dialogue: Ahhh! Y-you!

Original: Prishe:You smell like food! Let me have some, too!
Dialogue: You smell like food! Let me have some, too!

Original: Steiner:I beg your pardon? I don't see how I could possibly smell of... Ah!
Dialogue: I beg your pardon? I don't see how I could possibly smell of... Ah!

Original: Steiner:I-I cannot! These pickles are my treasure!
Dialogue: I-I cannot! These pickles are my treasure!

Original: Layle:A faint stench just wafted this way. You sure those are edible?
Dialogue: A faint stench just wafted this way. You sure those are edible?
trans: 一股淡淡的臭味就这样飘了过来。

Original: Tifa:They don't look that tasty...
Dialogue: They don't look that tasty...
trans: 它们看起来不那么好吃...

Original: Steiner:These are the specialty of a certaincityin ourworld! A divisive delicacy, to be sure, but they are my favorite!
Dialogue: These are the specialty of a certain city in our world! A divisive delicacy, to be sure, but they are my favorite!
trans: 这些是我们世界某个城市的特产！

Original: Prishe:Ahhh! That aroma is riling up my appetite! Leeet meee have some!
Dialogue: Ahhh! That aroma is riling up my appetite! Leeet meee have some!

Original: Steiner:Lady Prishe, I do believe we will get along well together.
Dialogue: Lady Prishe, I do believe we will get along well together.
trans: Prishe 女士，我相信我们会相处得很好。

Original: Steiner:Be that as it may...since coming to this world, I fear these pickles are an unobtainable commodity...
Dialogue: Be that as it may...since coming to this world, I fear these pickles are an unobtainable commodity...
trans: 话虽如此……自从来到这个世界后，恐怕这些泡菜都是得不到的商品……

Original: Steiner:Therefore I, too, have chosen to refrain from eating any! Lady Prishe, I beg your understanding!
Dialogue: Therefore I, too, have chosen to refrain from eating any! Lady Prishe, I beg your understanding!
trans: 因此，我也选择了不吃任何东西！

Original: Prishe:Hrmmm... Alright. If that's the way it is, I guess them's the breaks.
Dialogue: Hrmmm... Alright. If that's the way it is, I guess them's the breaks.

Original: Prishe:But I'm hungry I'm hungry I'm hungry!
Dialogue: But I'm hungry I'm hungry I'm hungry!
trans: 但是我饿了我饿了我饿了！

Original: Layle:Here we go again.
Dialogue: Here we go again.

Original: Prishe:I wanna eat behemoth steak! A prime cut with all that marbling!
Dialogue: I wanna eat behemoth steak! A prime cut with all that marbling!

Original: Vaan:Behemoth is good, isn't it? Tasty, and fetches a nice price at the bazaar.
Dialogue: Behemoth is good, isn't it? Tasty, and fetches a nice price at the bazaar.

Original: Tifa:Huh!? You can eat behemoth!?
Dialogue: Huh!? You can eat behemoth!?

Original: Layle:You can't be serious...
Dialogue: You can't be serious...

Original: Prishe:We need a behemoth... I need to show you all what you're missing.
Dialogue: We need a behemoth... I need to show you all what you're missing.
trans: 我们需要一个庞然大物……我需要向你展示你所缺少的一切。

Original: Tifa:I think I'll pass.
Dialogue: I think I'll pass.

Original: Steiner:Hmm, I see, I see. This sounds like another delicacy.
Dialogue: Hmm, I see, I see. This sounds like another delicacy.

Original: Firion:Hunting down a Torsion in a palace this big is no easy task.
Dialogue: Hunting down a Torsion in a palace this big is no easy task.
trans: 在这么大的宫殿里追捕一个扭曲可不是一件容易的事。

Original: Firion:How is everyone holding up? If you need to take a break, just
Dialogue: How is everyone holding up? If you need to take a break, just—

Original: Firion:...Wait, where's Prishe?
Dialogue: ...Wait, where's Prishe?

Original: Mog:Kupo! She was just here!
Dialogue: Kupo! She was just here!

Original: Galuf:Hrm. I didn't even notice she was gone. How unobservant of me.
Dialogue: Hrm. I didn't even notice she was gone. How unobservant of me.

Original: King:Unilateral action during an operation poses a very real hazard. What could she be thinking...?
Dialogue: Unilateral action during an operation poses a very real hazard. What could she be thinking...?
trans: 手术过程中的单方面行动会带来非常真实的危险。

Original: Zell:I wouldn't worry. She'll turn up before you know it.
Dialogue: I wouldn't worry. She'll turn up before you know it.

Original: Prishe:Heyyy, guys!
Dialogue: Heyyy, guys!

Original: Zell:See? Back already.
Dialogue: See? Back already.

Original: Mog:Kupooo! Acting on your own is a problem, kupo! Don't run off like that!
Dialogue: Kupooo! Acting on your own is a problem, kupo! Don't run off like that!

Original: Prishe:Yeah, whatever you say! I just did a quick lap around the place! Found the Torsion, too!
Dialogue: Yeah, whatever you say! I just did a quick lap around the place! Found the Torsion, too!

Original: Mog:One hundred percent unapologetic, kupo...
Dialogue: One hundred percent unapologetic, kupo...

Original: Galuf:You covered the entire palace? Astonishing. And you were fine all by yourself?
Dialogue: You covered the entire palace? Astonishing. And you were fine all by yourself?

Original: Prishe:Huh? Sure, why not?
Dialogue: Huh? Sure, why not?

Original: Prishe:Being alone's never been something for me to worry about.
Dialogue: Being alone's never been something for me to worry about.
trans: 独自一人从来都不是让我担心的事情。

Original: Firion:Don't tell me you closed the Torsion all by yourself, too. That would be far too reckless...
Dialogue: Don't tell me you closed the Torsion all by yourself, too. That would be far too reckless...
trans: 别告诉我你也是一个人关闭了 Torsion。

Original: Prishe:Heck, no! It's more fun when everyone else is there, too!
Dialogue: Heck, no! It's more fun when everyone else is there, too!

Original: Zell:Heheh, mighty kind of ya! Let me in on that action, too!
Dialogue: Heheh, mighty kind of ya! Let me in on that action, too!

Original: Prishe:You got it! The Torsion's this way! Follow me!
Dialogue: You got it! The Torsion's this way! Follow me!

Original: Galuf:Goodness gracious. Pep in spades, that one. I'm impressed...
Dialogue: Goodness gracious. Pep in spades, that one. I'm impressed...

Original: King:Let's keep up.
Dialogue: Let's keep up.

Original: Firion:...I guess that means everyone's holding up well.
Dialogue: ...I guess that means everyone's holding up well.
trans: ......我想这意味着每个人都坚持得很好。

Original: Mog:Kupo! That doesn't fix my mood, kupo!
Dialogue: Kupo! That doesn't fix my mood, kupo!

Original: Firion:Hey, all's well that ends well. We found the Torsion thanks to her, too.
Dialogue: Hey, all's well that ends well. We found the Torsion thanks to her, too.

Original: Mog:That's true, kupo, but...
Dialogue: That's true, kupo, but...

Original: Firion:Cheer up. Let's go.
Dialogue: Cheer up. Let's go.

Original: Mog:We sealed the Torsion, kupo!
Dialogue: We sealed the Torsion, kupo!

Original: Prishe:Heh, I even amaze myself sometimes!
Dialogue: Heh, I even amaze myself sometimes!
trans: 呵呵，有时候连我自己都惊叹！

Original: Prishe:All right, then. Time to eat!
Dialogue: All right, then. Time to eat!

Original: Hope:She sure doesn't hold back how she feels.
Dialogue: She sure doesn't hold back how she feels.
trans: 她肯定不会隐瞒自己的感受。

Original: Rem:Yeah, I was thinking the same thing.
Dialogue: Yeah, I was thinking the same thing.
trans: 是的，我也在想同样的事情。

Original: Prishe:Rem, are you jealous?
Dialogue: Rem, are you jealous?

Original: Rem:Huh!? H-how did you know!?
Dialogue: Huh!? H-how did you know!?

Original: Prishe:I know what people are thinking. Not like I want to though. It just happens.
Dialogue: I know what people are thinking. Not like I want to though. It just happens.

Original: Warrior of Light:Are you implying that you can read minds?
Dialogue: Are you implying that you can read minds?
trans: 你是在暗示你可以读心术吗？

Original: Prishe:Nothin' so fancy as that. Let's just say I went through a lot when I was young.
Dialogue: Nothin' so fancy as that. Let's just say I went through a lot when I was young.
trans: 没有什么比这更花哨的了。

Original: Bartz:When you were young? You still look plenty young to me.
Dialogue: When you were young? You still look plenty young to me.

Original: Rem:It sounds like there's a lot more to you than meets the eye.
Dialogue: It sounds like there's a lot more to you than meets the eye.
trans: 听起来，您所拥有的远比表面上看到的要多得多。

Original: Prishe:Yeah, but don't worry about it. Just 'cause I can read your mind doesn't mean I'm gonna do something funny.
Dialogue: Yeah, but don't worry about it. Just 'cause I can read your mind doesn't mean I'm gonna do something funny.

Original: Prishe:I don't like snooping into other people's business, and besides...I honestly don't care what other people think.
Dialogue: I don't like snooping into other people's business, and besides...I honestly don't care what other people think.
trans: 我不喜欢窥探别人的私事，而且……老实说，我不在乎别人怎么想。

Original: Prishe:Anyway, let's get something to eat! I'm starving!
Dialogue: Anyway, let's get something to eat! I'm starving!
trans: 不管怎样，先去吃点东西吧！

Original: Hope:I'm not sure I can keep up with her...
Dialogue: I'm not sure I can keep up with her...
trans: 我不确定我能跟得上她...

Original: Prishe:Oh, come on! Don't be like that! Let's be friends!
Dialogue: Oh, come on! Don't be like that! Let's be friends!

Original: Prishe:Things are about to get exciting! I can feel it.
Dialogue: Things are about to get exciting! I can feel it.
trans: 事情即将变得令人兴奋！

Original: Mog:I hope she didn't read my mind, kupo...
Dialogue: I hope she didn't read my mind, kupo...
trans: 我希望她没有读懂我的想法，库波...

Original: Zidane:Guys, I think I see someone! Come on, they might be hurt!
Dialogue: Guys, I think I see someone! Come on, they might be hurt!
trans: 伙计们，我想我看到一个人！

Original: Mog:We have to help them, kupo!
Dialogue: We have to help them, kupo!

Original: Zidane:Are you all right? Hey!
Dialogue: Are you all right? Hey!

Original: Bartz:Whoa! Hold up. That looks likeFaris!?
Dialogue: Whoa! Hold up. That looks like—Faris!?

Original: Tifa:Somebody you know?
Dialogue: Somebody you know?

Original: Bartz:Yeah, we traveled the world together back home.
Dialogue: Yeah, we traveled the world together back home.
trans: 是的，我们一起环游世界回家。

Original: Bartz:Faris, you okay!? It's me, Bartz!
Dialogue: Faris, you okay!? It's me, Bartz!

Original: Bartz:This isn't good. Breathing, but barely. We've gotta do something.
Dialogue: This isn't good. Breathing, but barely. We've gotta do something.

Original: Tifa:He must have nearly drowned...which leaves us with only one choice.
Dialogue: He must have nearly drowned...which leaves us with only one choice.
trans: 他一定是快淹死了……这让我们只有一个选择。

Original: Cloud:What are you looking at me for?
Dialogue: What are you looking at me for?

Original: Tifa:You know mouth-to-mouth.
Dialogue: You know mouth-to-mouth.

Original: Zidane:Did somebody say "mouth-to-mouth"? Like mouth-to-mouth resuscitation?
Dialogue: Did somebody say "mouth-to-mouth"? Like mouth-to-mouth resuscitation?

Original: Zidane:Don't you worry! One hot resuscitation coming right up!
Dialogue: Don't you worry! One hot resuscitation coming right up!

Original: Faris:Ungh... Where am I?
Dialogue: Ungh... Where am I?

Original: Cloud:Looks like you're off the hook.
Dialogue: Looks like you're off the hook.
trans: 看来你已经摆脱困境了。

Original: Zidane:Guess I am...
Dialogue: Guess I am...

Original: Mog:I can sense the light in this one as well. First aid on the double, kupo!
Dialogue: I can sense the light in this one as well. First aid on the double, kupo!
trans: 我也能感觉到这个里面的光。

Original: Zidane:I've got this! A little potion here, and...
Dialogue: I've got this! A little potion here, and...

Original: Zidane:...But gosh, what a looker.
Dialogue: ...But gosh, what a looker.

Original: Bartz:You're gonna get it if you keep gawking.
Dialogue: You're gonna get it if you keep gawking.
trans: 如果你一直盯着看，你就会得到它。

Original: Zidane:Uh-oh, I've gotta watch out for the bodyguard, too.
Dialogue: Uh-oh, I've gotta watch out for the bodyguard, too.

Original: Rem:Bodyguard? What's he talking about?
Dialogue: Bodyguard? What's he talking about?

Original: Cloud:Beats me.
Dialogue: Beats me.

Original: Rem:Zidane doesn't usually get this excited around other guys...
Dialogue: Zidane doesn't usually get this excited around other guys...
trans: 齐达内通常不会对其他人如此兴奋......

Original: Cloud:Maybe he switched sides.
Dialogue: Maybe he switched sides.

Original: Steiner:Hmmm...
Dialogue: Hmmm...

Original: Y'shtola:Is there something on your mind?
Dialogue: Is there something on your mind?

Original: Bartz:Hey, everybody!
Dialogue: Hey, everybody!

Original: Bartz:Faris finally woke up.
Dialogue: Faris finally woke up.

Original: Zidane:Hey, there! I'm glad you're okay.
Dialogue: Hey, there! I'm glad you're okay.

Original: Faris:I was told you all helped me. Please allow me to express my gratitude.
Dialogue: I was told you all helped me. Please allow me to express my gratitude.
trans: 有人告诉我你们都帮助了我。

Original: Faris:I'm the pirate captain Faris. Nice to meet you.
Dialogue: I'm the pirate captain Faris. Nice to meet you.

Original: Steiner:A pirate!?
Dialogue: A pirate!?

Original: Faris:My ship was sucked into a strange whirlpool, and I was separated from my men.
Dialogue: My ship was sucked into a strange whirlpool, and I was separated from my men.
trans: 我的船被卷入了一个奇怪的漩涡，我和我的人分开了。

Original: Faris:I found myself in unknown waters where my ship was attacked by monsters. I barely escaped with my life.
Dialogue: I found myself in unknown waters where my ship was attacked by monsters. I barely escaped with my life.
trans: 我发现自己身处未知水域，我的船遭到怪物袭击。

Original: Faris:...Is something the matter?
Dialogue: ...Is something the matter?

Original: Steiner:Indeed, there is! I have no interest in consorting with the likes of a criminal! Begone!
Dialogue: Indeed, there is! I have no interest in consorting with the likes of a criminal! Begone!

Original: Zidane:Oh brother, there he goes again.
Dialogue: Oh brother, there he goes again.

Original: Steiner:Ack! N-now that you mention it...!
Dialogue: Ack! N-now that you mention it...!

Original: Y'shtola:You were unaware till this moment?
Dialogue: You were unaware till this moment?
trans: 直到这一刻你才意识到？

Original: Steiner:Sea pirates, sky pirates, bandits... Why do I attract so many ne'er-do-wells?
Dialogue: Sea pirates, sky pirates, bandits... Why do I attract so many ne'er-do-wells?
trans: 海贼、空贼、强盗……为什么我会招来那么多无赖？

Original: Bartz:Don't sweat the small stuff. Faris, you're coming with us, right?
Dialogue: Don't sweat the small stuff. Faris, you're coming with us, right?

Original: Faris:The monsters are coming out of those Torsions you spoke of, aye? Payback is in order for what they did to my ship.
Dialogue: The monsters are coming out of those Torsions you spoke of, aye? Payback is in order for what they did to my ship.
trans: 怪物正从你所说的那些 Torsions 中出来，是吗？

Original: Faris:I'm happy to see you, but I'm worried about my men...
Dialogue: I'm happy to see you, but I'm worried about my men...
trans: 我很高兴见到你，但我担心我的手下...

Original: Steiner:You say...you're worried about your men?
Dialogue: You say...you're worried about your men?

Original: Faris:Aye, the whirlpool that got my ship might have gotten the lads as well.
Dialogue: Aye, the whirlpool that got my ship might have gotten the lads as well.
trans: 是的，弄到我的船的漩涡可能也弄到小伙子们了。

Original: Steiner:...The compassion you have for your subordinates is most admirable...
Dialogue: ...The compassion you have for your subordinates is most admirable...
trans: ……您对部下的怜悯之情，最令人钦佩……

Original: Steiner:Master Faris, please forgive my insolence! I must extend my most sincere
Dialogue: Master Faris, please forgive my insolence! I must extend my most sincere—
trans: 法里斯大人，请原谅我的无礼！

Original: Faris:Oh, shove off. You don't need to apologize.
Dialogue: Oh, shove off. You don't need to apologize.

Original: Faris:Anyway, I know my way around water. If you need a fella to help clean up the monsters around here, look no further!
Dialogue: Anyway, I know my way around water. If you need a fella to help clean up the monsters around here, look no further!
trans: 无论如何，我知道如何绕过水。

Original: Zidane:Great! Can't wait to see you at work!
Dialogue: Great! Can't wait to see you at work!

Original: Y'shtola:..."Fella," is it? I see.
Dialogue: ..."Fella," is it? I see.

Original: Laguna:Hey, Eiko, you hanging in there?
Dialogue: Hey, Eiko, you hanging in there?

Original: Eiko:Y-yeah! I'm fine!
Dialogue: Y-yeah! I'm fine!

Original: Squall:You aren't having trouble keeping up with our grown-up steps?
Dialogue: You aren't having trouble keeping up with our grown-up steps?
trans: 你跟不上我们大人的步伐吗？

Original: Eiko:Of course not! I'm already grown-up anyway!
Dialogue: Of course not! I'm already grown-up anyway!

Original: Yuffie:That's what a kid would say...
Dialogue: That's what a kid would say...

Original: Faris:We'll be walking a while longer. Don't push yourself.
Dialogue: We'll be walking a while longer. Don't push yourself.

Original: Firion:You know, Faris, you're awfully nice for a pirate.
Dialogue: You know, Faris, you're awfully nice for a pirate.
trans: 你知道，法里斯，你对海盗来说太好了。

Original: Faris:What's that supposed to mean, "For a pirate"?
Dialogue: What's that supposed to mean, "For a pirate"?

Original: Firion:I have a lot...rougher impression of pirates. A band of them nearly robbed me blind once...
Dialogue: I have a lot...rougher impression of pirates. A band of them nearly robbed me blind once...
trans: 我对海盗有很多……粗略的印象。

Original: Faris:Ahh, now I see.
Dialogue: Ahh, now I see.

Original: Faris:Aye, I'm a pirate. But that doesn't mean I assault anyone and everyone.
Dialogue: Aye, I'm a pirate. But that doesn't mean I assault anyone and everyone.

Original: Faris:Naturally I'd be concerned for my comrades, hear?
Dialogue: Naturally I'd be concerned for my comrades, hear?
trans: 我自然会关心我的同志，听到了吗？

Original: Faris:Pirates raised me from a wee brat... The crew's like my family.
Dialogue: Pirates raised me from a wee brat... The crew's like my family.
trans: 海盗把我从一个小孩子养大……船员就像我的家人。

Original: Yuffie:I get it. You're like a pirate among pirates.
Dialogue: I get it. You're like a pirate among pirates.

Original: Yuffie:Oh, yeah! I've got a pirate question! What's the trick for guaranteed treasure stealing!?
Dialogue: Oh, yeah! I've got a pirate question! What's the trick for guaranteed treasure stealing!?

Original: Faris:Trick to stealing? I wish I knew.
Dialogue: Trick to stealing? I wish I knew.

Original: Faris:Once your prey is in your sights, it's yours! Something in that spirit is probably important.
Dialogue: Once your prey is in your sights, it's yours! Something in that spirit is probably important.
trans: 一旦你的猎物出现在你的视线中，它就是你的了！

Original: Yuffie:Gee, I didn't expect a motivational slogan...
Dialogue: Gee, I didn't expect a motivational slogan...
trans: 哎呀，没想到是个励志标语……

Original: Faris:...But anyway, Yuffie, let me say this much.
Dialogue: ...But anyway, Yuffie, let me say this much.

Original: Faris:You must never steal from the weak or the poor. Never forget your honor under any circumstances.
Dialogue: You must never steal from the weak or the poor. Never forget your honor under any circumstances.
trans: 你绝不能偷弱者或穷人的东西。

Original: Yuffie:O-okay...I'll keep that in mind...
Dialogue: O-okay...I'll keep that in mind...

Original: Eiko:Hmm, what a tour de force. There's nothing like the real thing.
Dialogue: Hmm, what a tour de force. There's nothing like the real thing.

Original: Squall:...Do you know what she's talking about?
Dialogue: ...Do you know what she's talking about?

Original: Laguna:Ooh! Straight from the pulpit, too! It's not every day you get to meet a really real pirate!
Dialogue: Ooh! Straight from the pulpit, too! It's not every day you get to meet a really real pirate!

Original: Laguna:That settles it! When I get back home, I'm gonna write up a full piece on you!
Dialogue: That settles it! When I get back home, I'm gonna write up a full piece on you!

Original: Laguna:I'll call it: "The Pirate Way - A True Story"! Oh man, it'll fly off the racks!
Dialogue: I'll call it "The Pirate Way - A True Story"! Oh man, it'll fly off the racks!
trans: 我会称之为“海盗之路 - 一个真实的故事”！

Original: Squall:(...Who would read that...?)
Dialogue: (...Who would read that...?)

Original: Faris:Do as you like...
Dialogue: Do as you like...

Original: Galuf:How are you doing, Faris? Getting along well with your new party?
Dialogue: How are you doing, Faris? Getting along well with your new party?

Original: Faris:Aye, swimmingly. More'n a few odd ones...but it's a good-natured lot.
Dialogue: Aye, swimmingly. More'n a few odd ones...but it's a good-natured lot.

Original: Bartz:Really? That's good to hear!
Dialogue: Really? That's good to hear!

Original: Bartz:Huh? What's that?
Dialogue: Huh? What's that?

Original: Tidus:Whew! Haven't had a refreshing swim like that in forever! Nothing beats the ocean!
Dialogue: Whew! Haven't had a refreshing swim like that in forever! Nothing beats the ocean!

Original: Galuf:A leisurely dip must be nice...
Dialogue: A leisurely dip must be nice...
trans: 悠闲地泡一泡一定很不错。。。

Original: Tidus:I don't know about "leisurely." I gotta keep up with my training, too.
Dialogue: I don't know about "leisurely." I gotta keep up with my training, too.

Original: Tidus:Oh, hey! Faris, how about a lap or two? I'll bet pirates are ace swimmers!
Dialogue: Oh, hey! Faris, how about a lap or two? I'll bet pirates are ace swimmers!

Original: Faris:I'll...take a rain check. I'd drown in these clothes, after all.
Dialogue: I'll...take a rain check. I'd drown in these clothes, after all.

Original: Tidus:Those clothes? Just go in your skivvies then.
Dialogue: Those clothes? Just go in your skivvies then.

Original: Faris:Er, well... I, uh...
Dialogue: Er, well... I, uh...

Original: Tidus:...? Well, it was just a suggestion.
Dialogue: ...? Well, it was just a suggestion.

Original: Tidus:Anyway, I'm going back in!
Dialogue: Anyway, I'm going back in!

Original: Galuf:...Not everyone's picked up on it yet, eh?
Dialogue: ...Not everyone's picked up on it yet, eh?
trans: ...不是每个人都注意到它，是吗？

Original: Bartz:It's up to Faris to say something whenever the time is right, right?
Dialogue: It's up to Faris to say something whenever the time is right, right?
trans: 该由法里斯在适当的时候说些什么，对吗？

Original: Faris:...If only I knew whenever that time might be. I can tell no one here would give me grief about it, but even so...
Dialogue: ...If only I knew whenever that time might be. I can tell no one here would give me grief about it, but even so...
trans: ......要是我知道那个时间是什么时候就好了。

Original: Vivi:Hey, guys!
Dialogue: Hey, guys!

Original: Vivi:Let's build a sand castle! A real big one!
Dialogue: Let's build a sand castle! A real big one!
trans: 让我们建造一座沙堡吧！

Original: Eiko:Sand castles are so childish...
Dialogue: Sand castles are so childish...

Original: Eiko:But if we're gonna build one, we're gonna do it right!
Dialogue: But if we're gonna build one, we're gonna do it right!
trans: 但如果我们要建造一个，我们会做对的！

Original: Vivi:It was your idea in the first place...
Dialogue: It was your idea in the first place...

Original: Bartz:A sand castle? Count me in!
Dialogue: A sand castle? Count me in!

Original: Vivi:Mr. Galuf, Miss Faris, you guys come, too! We'll be waiting for you!
Dialogue: Mr. Galuf, Miss Faris, you guys come, too! We'll be waiting for you!
trans: 加鲁夫先生，法瑞丝小姐，你们也来吧！

Original: Faris:Did he just call me..."Miss"?
Dialogue: Did he just call me..."Miss"?
trans: 他刚刚是不是叫我……“小姐”？

Original: Galuf:Ho ho ho! There's no fooling the eyes of a child!
Dialogue: Ho ho ho! There's no fooling the eyes of a child!

Original: Faris:We're coming for you, Lamia Queen! Don't let up, you landlubbers!
Dialogue: We're coming for you, Lamia Queen! Don't let up, you landlubbers!
trans: 我们来找你了，拉米亚女王！

Original: Zidane:Heh heh.
Dialogue: Heh heh.

Original: Faris:...What're you smirking about?
Dialogue: ...What're you smirking about?

Original: Zidane:Oh, nothing. Just thinking how nice it is to be around a swashbuckling sweetie for a change.
Dialogue: Oh, nothing. Just thinking how nice it is to be around a swashbuckling sweetie for a change.

Original: Faris:A what...!?
Dialogue: A what...!?

Original: Sazh:Zidane, you feelin' alright? I get Faris is good looking...but a "sweetie"?
Dialogue: Zidane, you feelin' alright? I get Faris is good looking...but a "sweetie"?

Original: Tifa:Hold on... Faris, are you a woman?
Dialogue: Hold on... Faris, are you a woman?

Original: Faris:...Well, looks like the cat's outta the bag.
Dialogue: ...Well, looks like the cat's outta the bag.

Original: Faris:You got a problem with it?
Dialogue: You got a problem with it?

Original: Tifa:Bartz, why didn't you say anything!?
Dialogue: Bartz, why didn't you say anything!?

Original: Bartz:I didn't know I was supposed to?
Dialogue: I didn't know I was supposed to?
trans: 我不知道我应该这样做？

Original: Cloud:How did you know?
Dialogue: How did you know?

Original: Zidane:Cloud, Cloud, Cloud... Who do you think I am? I know a lady when I see one.
Dialogue: Cloud, Cloud, Cloud... Who do you think I am? I know a lady when I see one.

Original: Tifa:But Faris, why'd you let us think you're a man?
Dialogue: But Faris, why'd you let us think you're a man?
trans: 但是 Faris，你为什么让我们认为你是个男人？

Original: Faris:It's how I grew up. Would you want to be the only girl on a ship full of pirates?
Dialogue: It's how I grew up. Would you want to be the only girl on a ship full of pirates?

Original: Cloud:You didn't have a choice. But you don't need to pretend you're someone else around us.
Dialogue: You didn't have a choice. But you don't need to pretend you're someone else around us.

Original: Tifa:Well aren't you the sweetest? Or are you saying that because you've been in her shoes?
Dialogue: Well aren't you the sweetest? Or are you saying that because you've been in her shoes?
trans: 那么你不是最可爱的吗？

Original: Bartz:Her shoes? Cloud, don't tell me...
Dialogue: Her shoes? Cloud, don't tell me...

Original: Sazh:I don't know what to believe anymore.
Dialogue: I don't know what to believe anymore.
trans: 我不知道该相信什么了。

Original: Cloud:...Sometimes you don't have a choice.
Dialogue: ...Sometimes you don't have a choice.

Original: Bartz:Anyway, no more secrets! We're all in this together!
Dialogue: Anyway, no more secrets! We're all in this together!
trans: 无论如何，没有更多的秘密！

Original: Sazh:I don't think I can handle any more secrets from this group...
Dialogue: I don't think I can handle any more secrets from this group...
trans: 我不认为我可以处理这个小组的任何更多秘密......

Original: Vivi:What an eerie castle.
Dialogue: What an eerie castle.

Original: Zidane:Careful, Vivi. It's probably haunted.
Dialogue: Careful, Vivi. It's probably haunted.

Original: Cloud:Who cares? We fight monsters every day.
Dialogue: Who cares? We fight monsters every day.

Original: Warrior of Light:A departed spirit could still prove to be a threat.
Dialogue: A departed spirit could still prove to be a threat.
trans: 死去的灵魂仍然可能被证明是一种威胁。

Original: Zidane:Right? So as I was saying, we need to
Dialogue: Right? So as I was saying, we need to—

Original: ???:Stop right there, bandits, or die in obscurity!
Dialogue: Stop right there, bandits, or die in obscurity!
trans: 站在那里，土匪，否则就默默无闻地死去！

Original: Cloud:Bandits? Zidane, you do something to this guy?
Dialogue: Bandits? Zidane, you do something to this guy?

Original: Zidane:No way! ...I think. I mean, I'm pretty sure I didn't...
Dialogue: No way! ...I think. I mean, I'm pretty sure I didn't...

Original: Vivi:Are you...a ghost?
Dialogue: Are you...a ghost?

Original: Warrior of Light:No, he's human.
Dialogue: No, he's human.

Original: ???:A swordsman, a knight, and a black mage... They must have banded together and turned this abandoned castle into their headquarters.
Dialogue: A swordsman, a knight, and a black mage... They must have banded together and turned this abandoned castle into their headquarters.
trans: 一个剑士，一个骑士，一个黑魔法师……一定是他们联合起来，把这座废弃的城堡变成了他们的大本营。

Original: Ramza:I am Ramza Beoulve. I cannot allow those who bring chaos to threaten the lives of the people!
Dialogue: I am Ramza Beoulve. I cannot allow those who bring chaos to threaten the lives of the people!

Original: Cloud:He thinks we're bandits. What do you want to do?
Dialogue: He thinks we're bandits. What do you want to do?

Original: Zidane:Guess we'll just have to knock some sense into him.
Dialogue: Guess we'll just have to knock some sense into him.
trans: 猜猜我们只需要让他有点理智。

Original: Warrior of Light:Prepare for battle!
Dialogue: Prepare for battle!

Original: Ramza:It's not...over yet!
Dialogue: It's not...over yet!

Original: Hope:Excuse me, but are you okay? You know, we don't want to fight
Dialogue: Excuse me, but are you okay? You know, we don't want to fight—

Original: Ramza:Vile banditsusing children to do their dirty work.
Dialogue: Vile bandits—using children to do their dirty work.
trans: 卑鄙的土匪——利用孩子来干他们的脏活。

Original: Penelo:Ramza, can we talk?
Dialogue: Ramza, can we talk?
trans: 拉姆萨，我们可以谈谈吗？

Original: Mog:Is everybody okay, kupo!?
Dialogue: Is everybody okay, kupo!?

Original: Ramza:A moogle!? It can't be! The last of their race should have expired long ago!
Dialogue: A moogle!? It can't be! The last of their race should have expired long ago!

Original: Mog:Maybe in your world, kupo.
Dialogue: Maybe in your world, kupo.

Original: Ramza:In my world? What do you mean by that?
Dialogue: In my world? What do you mean by that?

Original: Ramza:I remember now. I was sucked into some sort of giant portal.
Dialogue: I remember now. I was sucked into some sort of giant portal.

Original: Ramza:At the time, I thought it an illusion cast by a hostile mage.
Dialogue: At the time, I thought it an illusion cast by a hostile mage.
trans: 当时我还以为是敌方法师施展的幻术。

Original: Zidane:We're actually on a journey to close those Torsions in order to protect this world and our own.
Dialogue: We're actually on a journey to close those Torsions in order to protect this world and our own.
trans: 为了保护这个世界和我们自己的世界，我们实际上正在关闭这些扭曲。

Original: Ramza:I apologize for accusing you of being bandits.
Dialogue: I apologize for accusing you of being bandits.

Original: Ramza:Ivalice is the name of a kingdom. ...I don't understand your meaning.
Dialogue: Ivalice is the name of a kingdom. ...I don't understand your meaning.
trans: Ivalice 是一个王国的名字。

Original: Mog:It looks like your worlds have some things in common, but are in different dimensions and eras, kupo.
Dialogue: It looks like your worlds have some things in common, but are in different dimensions and eras, kupo.
trans: 看起来你们的世界有一些共同点，但在不同的维度和时代，kupo。

Original: Vaan:Huh, didn't know that was a thing.
Dialogue: Huh, didn't know that was a thing.
trans: 呵呵，不知道那是一回事。

Original: Ramza:So you're trying to save this world to protect your own, correct?
Dialogue: So you're trying to save this world to protect your own, correct?
trans: 所以你试图拯救这个世界来保护你自己的世界，对吗？

Original: Ramza:May I join you? I'm certain I could be of service.
Dialogue: May I join you? I'm certain I could be of service.

Original: Mog:You also harbor the light, kupo! So of course, we'd love to have you!
Dialogue: You also harbor the light, kupo! So of course, we'd love to have you!

Original: Ramza:Thank you. I really appreciate it.
Dialogue: Thank you. I really appreciate it.

Original: Ramza:I swear by my sword to fight only for what is just.
Dialogue: I swear by my sword to fight only for what is just.
trans: 我以我的剑发誓，只为正义而战。

Original: Cloud:The Torsion is close.
Dialogue: The Torsion is close.

Original: Squall:...Yeah. Time to check our gear...right?
Dialogue: ...Yeah. Time to check our gear...right?

Original: Ramza:A level-headed assessment of the situation. It is heartening to have you two at our sides.
Dialogue: A level-headed assessment of the situation. It is heartening to have you two at our sides.

Original: Ramza:Your fine sword arms attest to the wealth of experience under your belts.
Dialogue: Your fine sword arms attest to the wealth of experience under your belts.
trans: 你精巧的剑臂证明了你腰带下的丰富经验。

Original: Squall:...That's what I trained for. I'm a mercenary.
Dialogue: ...That's what I trained for. I'm a mercenary.

Original: Ramza:Of course. That makes sense.
Dialogue: Of course. That makes sense.

Original: Ramza:I trained at military akademy and now make my way as a mercenary also.
Dialogue: I trained at military akademy and now make my way as a mercenary also.
trans: 我在军事学院受训，现在也成为一名雇佣兵。

Original: Ramza:I sense our lots are not so different.
Dialogue: I sense our lots are not so different.
trans: 我感觉我们的地段并没有太大的不同。

Original: Ramza:Which reminds me. Lightning, I have been meaning to ask:
Dialogue: Which reminds me. Lightning, I have been meaning to ask

Original: Ramza:It is quite a curious blade you swing; can I assume you also undertook some special study?
Dialogue: It is quite a curious blade you swing; can I assume you also undertook some special study?
trans: 你挥动的是一把非常奇怪的刀片；

Original: Lightning:I'm a soldier, deployed wherever I was needed. Mainly patrolling the frontier and controlling wildlife...
Dialogue: I'm a soldier, deployed wherever I was needed. Mainly patrolling the frontier and controlling wildlife...
trans: 我是一名士兵，部署在需要我的地方。

Original: Ramza:I see... It must have been hard on you.
Dialogue: I see... It must have been hard on you.
trans: 原来如此……你一定很辛苦吧。

Original: Lightning:There's something I want to protect. I never thought it hard.
Dialogue: There's something I want to protect. I never thought it hard.

Original: Tidus:Mercenaries and soldiers... Heck if I get where you all're coming from.
Dialogue: Mercenaries and soldiers... Heck if I get where you all're coming from.
trans: 雇佣兵和士兵……见鬼，如果我知道你们是从哪里来的。

Original: Ramza:You haven't martial backgrounds? Then where learnt you your swordsmanship?
Dialogue: You haven't martial backgrounds? Then where learnt you your swordsmanship?

Original: Ramza:An amateur!? And yet you're able to hold your own against these beasts!?
Dialogue: An amateur!? And yet you're able to hold your own against these beasts!?

Original: Tidus:Guess it just comes down to guts!
Dialogue: Guess it just comes down to guts!
trans: 猜猜它只是归结为胆量！

Original: Ramza:And what about you, Vaan? Had you a teacher?
Dialogue: And what about you, Vaan? Had you a teacher?

Original: Vaan:I watched Penelo learning basic self-defense... Oh, and maybe picked up a thing or two hunting.
Dialogue: I watched Penelo learning basic self-defense... Oh, and maybe picked up a thing or two hunting.
trans: 我看着 Penelo 学习基本的自卫……哦，也许还学会了一两次狩猎。

Original: Ramza:To grow so capable on self-instruction... One truly can draw on all sorts of experiences in battle.
Dialogue: To grow so capable on self-instruction... One truly can draw on all sorts of experiences in battle.
trans: 自学成才……果然是可以在战斗中汲取各种经验的。

Original: Ramza:It would seem there is yet much for me to learn here. Tidus, might you teach me this blitzball when you have the time?
Dialogue: It would seem there is yet much for me to learn here. Tidus, might you teach me this blitzball when you have the time?
trans: 看来我在这里要学的东西还很多。

Original: Tidus:Huh? You wanna play blitzball?
Dialogue: Huh? You wanna play blitzball?

Original: Ramza:And Vaan, tooI would be ever so pleased if you would impart unto me the secrets of hunting.
Dialogue: And Vaan, too—I would be ever so pleased if you would impart unto me the secrets of hunting.
trans: 还有 Vaan——如果你能把狩猎的秘密传授给我，我会非常高兴。

Original: Vaan:I don't know if there's any secrets to it... You just hunt.
Dialogue: I don't know if there's any secrets to it... You just hunt.
trans: 不知道有没有什么秘诀……你随便打猎。

Original: Lightning:...Don't push yourself, kid. Being a perfect mimic doesn't necessarily make you any mightier.
Dialogue: ...Don't push yourself, kid. Being a perfect mimic doesn't necessarily make you any mightier.

Original: Edgar:Ah, Vanille, won't you set my heart alight with sweet nothings?
Dialogue: Ah, Vanille, won't you set my heart alight with sweet nothings?
trans: 啊，Vanille，你不会用甜言蜜语点燃我的心吗？

Original: Vanille:Huh? I'm, uh, not sure I follow you.
Dialogue: Huh? I'm, uh, not sure I follow you.

Original: Edge:With you around, even this run-down castle looks like a sparkling palace!
Dialogue: With you around, even this run-down castle looks like a sparkling palace!
trans: 有你在，这座破败的城堡也像一座闪闪发光的宫殿！

Original: Vanille:Wow, this old dump? You've sure got a rosy view of the world.
Dialogue: Wow, this old dump? You've sure got a rosy view of the world.

Original: Edge:...A tough nut, this one.
Dialogue: ...A tough nut, this one.

Original: Edgar:You can say that again...
Dialogue: You can say that again...

Original: Ramza:How are they able to engage in such frivolity in the height of our conflict...?
Dialogue: How are they able to engage in such frivolity in the height of our conflict...?
trans: 他们怎么能在我们冲突最激烈的时候做出如此轻率的事……？

Original: Balthier:Not to your taste, Mr. Mercenary? Or envious, rather?
Dialogue: Not to your taste, Mr. Mercenary? Or envious, rather?
trans: 不合你的口味，佣兵先生？

Original: Irvine:You know, Edgar and Edge bothone's a king and the other's a prince. World's a funny place, ain't it?
Dialogue: You know, Edgar and Edge both—one's a king and the other's a prince. World's a funny place, ain't it?
trans: 你知道，Edgar 和 Edge 都是——一个是国王，另一个是王子。

Original: Ramza:A king and a prince!? Those two!?
Dialogue: A king and a prince!? Those two!?

Original: Balthier:That surprising, is it?
Dialogue: That surprising, is it?

Original: Ramza:Where I come from, to see royalty making merriment with commoners would be unthinkable.
Dialogue: Where I come from, to see royalty making merriment with commoners would be unthinkable.
trans: 在我的家乡，看到皇室与平民取乐是不可想象的。

Original: Edge:The heck? What a dull world that must be.
Dialogue: The heck? What a dull world that must be.

Original: Edgar:Titles are trivial. Feed them to the monsters for all I care.
Dialogue: Titles are trivial. Feed them to the monsters for all I care.

Original: Vanille:You won't see me paying them any mind.
Dialogue: You won't see me paying them any mind.
trans: 你不会看到我在意他们。

Original: Ramza:But if one does not carry one's self in a manner appropriate his station...
Dialogue: But if one does not carry one's self in a manner appropriate his station...
trans: 但是，如果一个人不以适合他的身份的方式表现自己……

Original: Balthier:Stubborn one, aren't we? Try looking at the man rather than the title.
Dialogue: Stubborn one, aren't we? Try looking at the man rather than the title.

Original: Balthier:We have here a skirt-chasing king and profligate prince. ...They're whom you would hold in esteem?
Dialogue: We have here a skirt-chasing king and profligate prince. ...They're whom you would hold in esteem?
trans: 我们这里有一个追裙子的国王和一个挥霍无度的王子。

Original: Edge:Hey! Don't you lump me in with those bozos, whoever they are!
Dialogue: Hey! Don't you lump me in with those bozos, whoever they are!

Original: Irvine:Anyway, a king or a prince or whatever is still just a human after all.
Dialogue: Anyway, a king or a prince or whatever is still just a human after all.
trans: 无论如何，国王或王子或其他任何东西终究只是一个人。

Original: Ramza:Just a human...blue-blooded though they may be...
Dialogue: Just a human...blue-blooded though they may be...
trans: 只是一个人……虽然他们可能是蓝血……

Original: Ramza:Have I been too caught up in notions of station...?
Dialogue: Have I been too caught up in notions of station...?
trans: 我是不是太沉迷于车站的概念了……？

Original: Vanille:Uh-oh, I think he's brooding...
Dialogue: Uh-oh, I think he's brooding...

Original: Balthier:Perhaps rightly so...
Dialogue: Perhaps rightly so...

Original: Balthier:Old habits die hard. Simply try taking things a mite easier for now, eh?
Dialogue: Old habits die hard. Simply try taking things a mite easier for now, eh?

Original: Ramza:The concepts of borders and social status don't exist in this world? ...So that's why there's no war.
Dialogue: The concepts of borders and social status don't exist in this world? ...So that's why there's no war.
trans: 这个世界上不存在边界和身份地位的概念？

Original: Rem:Your world is at war, as well?
Dialogue: Your world is at war, as well?

Original: Ramza:Yesa fruitless battle where countless innocent people suffer and die because of the warped views of a few.
Dialogue: Yes—a fruitless battle where countless innocent people suffer and die because of the warped views of a few.
trans: 是的——一场没有结果的战争，无数无辜的人因为少数人的歪曲观点而遭受痛苦和死亡。

Original: Ramza:Rem am I right to assume that your world too is...?
Dialogue: Rem am I right to assume that your world too is...?
trans: 雷姆，我认为你的世界也是……是对的吗？

Original: Rem:So somewhere along the line, I stopped thinking about it. It looks like you're really working on making a difference though.
Dialogue: So somewhere along the line, I stopped thinking about it. It looks like you're really working on making a difference though.
trans: 所以沿线的某个地方，我不再考虑它。

Original: Ramza:I'm trying.
Dialogue: I'm trying.

Original: Laguna:Whoa, pretty heavy stuff to talk about for a bunch of kidlets.
Dialogue: Whoa, pretty heavy stuff to talk about for a bunch of kidlets.
trans: 哇，对于一群孩子来说，谈论这些话题真是太沉重了。

Original: Ramza:Laguna, you handle firearms. Am I correct to assume you spent time on the field of battle?
Dialogue: Laguna, you handle firearms. Am I correct to assume you spent time on the field of battle?

Original: Laguna:That was a looong time ago. I quit the army and now I'm a journalistahema soon-to-be journalist!
Dialogue: That was a looong time ago. I quit the army and now I'm a journalist—ahem—a soon-to-be journalist!

Original: Laguna:Maybe I'll write about my time here when I get home. Doubt anyone'd believe me though.
Dialogue: Maybe I'll write about my time here when I get home. Doubt anyone'd believe me though.
trans: 也许我回家后会写下我在这里的时光。

Original: Ramza:Interesting... The way you have chosen to live your life has given me hope.
Dialogue: Interesting... The way you have chosen to live your life has given me hope.
trans: 有趣……你选择的生活方式给了我希望。

Original: Ramza:Everyone in my world is prisoner to their birth or status, but I've always felt that was ridiculous.
Dialogue: Everyone in my world is prisoner to their birth or status, but I've always felt that was ridiculous.
trans: 在我的世界里，每个人都被他们的出生或地位所困，但我一直觉得这很荒谬。

Original: Terra:It's never too late to start over in life. A certain someone once showed me that.
Dialogue: It's never too late to start over in life. A certain someone once showed me that.
trans: 重新开始生活永远不会太晚。

Original: Terra:What's important is not your past, but your future.
Dialogue: What's important is not your past, but your future.
trans: 重要的不是你的过去，而是你的未来。

Original: Vivi:Yeah... I feel the same way.
Dialogue: Yeah... I feel the same way.

Original: Vivi:I used to worry over and over about why I was born and what was going to happen to me when I expire.
Dialogue: I used to worry over and over about why I was born and what was going to happen to me when I expire.
trans: 我曾经一遍又一遍地担心我为什么出生以及我死后会发生什么。

Original: Vivi:But as time went by, talking to my friends, I realized that worrying about it was pointless.
Dialogue: But as time went by, talking to my friends, I realized that worrying about it was pointless.
trans: 但随着时间的推移，和朋友们交谈，我意识到担心它是没有意义的。

Original: Rem:We can't choose why we were born, but we can choose what to live for.
Dialogue: We can't choose why we were born, but we can choose what to live for.
trans: 我们无法选择自己为何而生，但可以选择为何而活。

Original: Ramza:Thank you, my new friends. You have given me the inspiration I needed.
Dialogue: Thank you, my new friends. You have given me the inspiration I needed.

Original: Ramza:It is neither one's birth nor status that matters. What's important is how you live your life.
Dialogue: It is neither one's birth nor status that matters. What's important is how you live your life.
trans: 一个人的出身和地位都不重要。

Original: Mog:The light within Ramza is growing brighter by the second, kupo!
Dialogue: The light within Ramza is growing brighter by the second, kupo!
trans: 拉姆萨体内的光芒一秒变亮，库波！

Original: Rem:That's your chocobo, right?
Dialogue: That's your chocobo, right?

Original: Bartz:Yeah, he's basically my best friend. We'd go everywhere together.
Dialogue: Yeah, he's basically my best friend. We'd go everywhere together.
trans: 是的，他基本上是我最好的朋友。

Original: Bartz:I wonder what he's up to right now? I sure hope he's not lonely without me.
Dialogue: I wonder what he's up to right now? I sure hope he's not lonely without me.
trans: 我想知道他现在在忙什么？

Original: Mog:It came from over there, kupo!
Dialogue: It came from over there, kupo!

Original: Rem:It sounds like it's in trouble.
Dialogue: It sounds like it's in trouble.

Original: Bartz:Just you wait! I'm coming to save you!
Dialogue: Just you wait! I'm coming to save you!

Original: Red Giant:......
???:Not another step!
Dialogue: Not another step!

Original: Bartz:We're here to help!
Dialogue: We're here to help!
trans: 我们随时为您提供帮助！

Original: Ace:Rem? Is that you!?
Dialogue: Rem? Is that you!?

Original: Ace:I need some backup!
Dialogue: I need some backup!

Original: Mog:It's hurt bad! We've gotta do something, kupo!
Dialogue: It's hurt bad! We've gotta do something, kupo!

Original: Bartz:We'll take care of the monster! You take care of the chocobo!
Dialogue: We'll take care of the monster! You take care of the chocobo!

Original: Ace:Thanks. I owe you one.
Dialogue: Thanks. I owe you one.

Original: Bartz:All right, you giant hunk of scrap metal, let's do this!
Dialogue: All right, you giant hunk of scrap metal, let's do this!
trans: 好吧，你这个大块的废金属，让我们开始吧！

Original: Chocobo:Kweh...
Dialogue: Kweh...

Original: Ace:Is there nothing we can do?
Dialogue: Is there nothing we can do?

Original: Bartz:...What's that?
Dialogue: ...What's that?

Original: Bartz:All right, I'll make sure to let him know.
Dialogue: All right, I'll make sure to let him know.
trans: 好吧，我一定会通知他的。

Original: Bartz:The chocobo wanted to thank you.
Dialogue: The chocobo wanted to thank you.

Original: Ace:I'm sorry I couldn't save you.
Dialogue: I'm sorry I couldn't save you.

Original: Ace:If only I had gotten here a little faster...
Dialogue: If only I had gotten here a little faster...
trans: 要是我来得快一点就好了……

Original: Yuna:You did everything you could.
Dialogue: You did everything you could.

Original: Ace:I was so relieved to see something I recognized in these unfamiliar lands...
Dialogue: I was so relieved to see something I recognized in these unfamiliar lands...
trans: 在这些陌生的土地上看到我认得的东西，我感到很欣慰……

Original: Ace:When I saw it being attacked, I rushed over, but...
Dialogue: When I saw it being attacked, I rushed over, but...
trans: 看到它被攻击，我赶紧冲了过去，可是……

Original: Cecil:You blame yourself for what happened?
Dialogue: You blame yourself for what happened?
trans: 你为发生的事情责备自己？

Original: Ace:I feel so powerless...
Dialogue: I feel so powerless...

Original: Cecil:You do not have to carry that burden alone.
Dialogue: You do not have to carry that burden alone.
trans: 你不必独自承担这个负担。

Original: Bartz:Yeah, we're all in this together. So what do you say? Wanna come with us?
Dialogue: Yeah, we're all in this together. So what do you say? Wanna come with us?

Original: Bartz:You don't mind, right, Mog?
Dialogue: You don't mind, right, Mog?

Original: Mog:The more the merrier, kupo. I can feel a gentle, warm light radiating from him as well.
Dialogue: The more the merrier, kupo. I can feel a gentle, warm light radiating from him as well.

Original: Bartz:Further proof that you can't love chocobos and be a bad person, huh?
Dialogue: Further proof that you can't love chocobos and be a bad person, huh?
trans: 进一步证明你不能既爱陆行鸟又做坏人，对吧？

Original: Yuna:Your kindness is a powerful toolone that I'm sure will save many.
Dialogue: Your kindness is a powerful tool—one that I'm sure will save many.
trans: 你的善意是一种强大的工具——我相信它会拯救很多人。

Original: Ace:All right, I'll come with you. I'd like to hear more about this world as well.
Dialogue: All right, I'll come with you. I'd like to hear more about this world as well.

Original: Ace:Oh yeah, I almost forgot. I'm Ace. I'm anAgito CadetatAkademeiajust like Rem.
Dialogue: Oh yeah, I almost forgot. I'm Ace. I'm an Agito Cadet at Akademeia just like Rem.

Original: Bartz:Then it's settled. From now on, when you've got something to protect, we've got your back.
Dialogue: Then it's settled. From now on, when you've got something to protect, we've got your back.

Original: Ace:Thanks. I appreciate it.
Dialogue: Thanks. I appreciate it.

Original: Ace:I've been wondering. Who's your commander?
Dialogue: I've been wondering. Who's your commander?

Original: Vanille:Commander? No one in particular.
Dialogue: Commander? No one in particular.

Original: Ace:I thought so... A unit without a commander is pretty unusual.
Dialogue: I thought so... A unit without a commander is pretty unusual.
trans: 我是这么想的……没有指挥官的部队很不寻常。

Original: Edge:Oh-ho! I get it! In that case, let ol' Edge here take command!
Dialogue: Oh-ho! I get it! In that case, let ol' Edge here take command!

Original: Vanille:I can fight without your help. How's that sound?
Dialogue: I can fight without your help. How's that sound?
trans: 没有你的帮助我也能战斗。

Original: Shantotto:No one orders me around.
Dialogue: No one orders me around.

Original: Shadow:...I'll pass.
Dialogue: ...I'll pass.

Original: Edge:Ha! I knew you'd say that! You guys aren't the type to take orders.
Dialogue: Ha! I knew you'd say that! You guys aren't the type to take orders.

Original: Ace:Everyone here is more like...an autonomous collective than troops.
Dialogue: Everyone here is more like...an autonomous collective than troops.
trans: 这里的每个人更像是……一个自治的集体，而不是军队。

Original: Vanille:Although, hey, Shadow, don't you have a leader?
Dialogue: Although, hey, Shadow, don't you have a leader?
trans: 虽然，嘿，Shadow，你没有领导者吗？

Original: Shadow:A "client."
Dialogue: A "client."

Original: Shadow:He leaves it up to us how to carry out our operations.
Dialogue: He leaves it up to us how to carry out our operations.
trans: 他将如何开展业务留给我们。

Original: Ace:You don't take orders, but act on your own judgment...
Dialogue: You don't take orders, but act on your own judgment...
trans: 你不接受命令，而是根据自己的判断行事……

Original: Ace:I wonder if I'm capable of that...
Dialogue: I wonder if I'm capable of that...
trans: 我想知道我是否有能力做到这一点...

Original: Shantotto:You know what I think of doing someone else's work? I could count on one hand how many stink bats I give.
Dialogue: You know what I think of doing someone else's work? I could count on one hand how many stink bats I give.
trans: 你知道我对做别人的工作的看法吗？

Original: Shantotto:You're in an entirely different world from that army now. You can at least decide on your own how to live.
Dialogue: You're in an entirely different world from that army now. You can at least decide on your own how to live.
trans: 你现在和那支军队处在一个完全不同的世界里。

Original: Ace:I've never thought about it. I've always spent everything looking out for those around me...
Dialogue: I've never thought about it. I've always spent everything looking out for those around me...

Original: Vanille:Looking out for others sounds fine to me.
Dialogue: Looking out for others sounds fine to me.
trans: 照顾别人对我来说听起来不错。

Original: Edge:Ain't that enough? Just keep living that way.
Dialogue: Ain't that enough? Just keep living that way.

Original: Ace:Do you really think so...?
Dialogue: Do you really think so...?

Original: Vivi:Yeah! It sounds just like you, too!
Dialogue: Yeah! It sounds just like you, too!

Original: Ace:...Thank you. I wouldn't have expected to find an answer so close at hand.
Dialogue: ...Thank you. I wouldn't have expected to find an answer so close at hand.

Original: Ace:I'll fight to protect my friends. That's how I'll live.
Dialogue: I'll fight to protect my friends. That's how I'll live.
trans: 我会为保护我的朋友而战。

Original: Chocobo:Kweh kweeh! Kweeh!
Dialogue: Kweh kweeh! Kweeh!

Original: Mog:Kupo, kupo... Okay, got it, kupo!
Dialogue: Kupo, kupo... Okay, got it, kupo!
trans: 大衣，大衣……好的，知道了，大衣！

Original: Ace:Mog, what are you discussing?
Dialogue: Mog, what are you discussing?

Original: Mog:Kupo! We just got some good intel, kupo!
Dialogue: Kupo! We just got some good intel, kupo!

Original: Mog:They said, "There are really strong monsters pas here, so be careful," kupo!
Dialogue: They said, "There are really strong monsters pas here, so be careful," kupo!
trans: 他们说：“这里有很强的怪物，所以要小心，” kupo！

Original: Tidus:Really? Glad we found out sooner than later.
Dialogue: Really? Glad we found out sooner than later.

Original: Bartz:Thanks! You two make for fine chocobo!
Dialogue: Thanks! You two make for fine chocobo!

Original: Chocobo:Kweh! Kweeeh!
Dialogue: Kweh! Kweeeh!

Original: Ace:Wh-what's this all of a sudden?
Dialogue: Wh-what's this all of a sudden?

Original: Mog:Kupo! They've sure taken a liking to you, kupo.
Dialogue: Kupo! They've sure taken a liking to you, kupo.

Original: Ace:I can see that... But I didn't do anything.
Dialogue: I can see that... But I didn't do anything.
trans: 我可以看到...但是我什么也没做。

Original: Bartz:Maybe they can smell that other chocobo on you.
Dialogue: Maybe they can smell that other chocobo on you.
trans: 也许他们能闻到你身上的其他陆行鸟。

Original: Tidus:They think you're one of them!
Dialogue: They think you're one of them!
trans: 他们认为你是他们中的一员！

Original: Ace:...I wonder about that.
Dialogue: ...I wonder about that.

Original: Ace:I'm sorry I couldn't save your friend... Watch out for monsters, okay?
Dialogue: I'm sorry I couldn't save your friend... Watch out for monsters, okay?
trans: 对不起，我没能救你的朋友……当心怪物，好吗？

Original: Chocobo:Kweh kweeh!
Dialogue: Kweh kweeh!

Original: Ace:Come on, time to get going.
Dialogue: Come on, time to get going.
