Dialogue: Someone's heading toward the Torsion up ahead.
trans: 有人正朝着前方的扭曲方向前进。

Original: Warrior of Light:A foe, perchance?
Dialogue: A foe, perchance?

Original: Mog:Quite the opposite, kupo! They're one of us!
Dialogue: Quite the opposite, kupo! They're one of us!

Original: Tifa:You think they're trying to close the Torsion then?
Dialogue: You think they're trying to close the Torsion then?
trans: 你认为他们当时正试图关闭 Torsion？

Original: Rem:They probably have no idea what they're getting themselves into.
Dialogue: They probably have no idea what they're getting themselves into.
trans: 他们可能不知道自己在做什么。

Original: Vaan:Which is why we oughta save them. The monsters here are too tough to fight alone.
Dialogue: Which is why we oughta save them. The monsters here are too tough to fight alone.
trans: 这就是为什么我们应该拯救他们。

Original: Mog:We have to hurry then, kupo!
Dialogue: We have to hurry then, kupo!
trans: 那我们得抓紧时间了，库波！

Original: Sazh:Seriously though, you gotta be pretty reckless to be out here wrestling monsters all alone.
Dialogue: Seriously though, you gotta be pretty reckless to be out here wrestling monsters all alone.
trans: 不过说真的，你一个人在这里和怪物搏斗一定很鲁莽。

Original: Sazh:...Especially while trudging through all this snow.
Dialogue: ...Especially while trudging through all this snow.
trans: ...尤其是在大雪中跋涉的时候。

Original: Warrior of Light:That is simply a testament to his courage. I am certain he shall prove to be a great help to our cause.
Dialogue: That is simply a testament to his courage. I am certain he shall prove to be a great help to our cause.
trans: 这简直就是对他勇气的证明。

Original: Mog:There's only one way to find out. Come on, kupo!
Dialogue: There's only one way to find out. Come on, kupo!
trans: 只有一种方法可以找出答案。

Original: Warrior of Light:Well, we were able to close the Torsion.
Dialogue: Well, we were able to close the Torsion.
trans: 好吧，我们能够关闭 Torsion。

Original: Warrior of Light:But where is the lone warrior who came this way?
Dialogue: But where is the lone warrior who came this way?
trans: 但是，来这里的孤独的战士在哪里？

Original: Hope:He's probably still around here somewhere.
Dialogue: He's probably still around here somewhere.
trans: 他可能还在这附近的某个地方。

Original: Hope:There are still some monsters left
Dialogue: There are still some monsters left—

Original: ???:Take this!
Dialogue: Take this!

Original: Hope:Snow!?
Dialogue: Snow!?

Original: Snow:Is that really you!?
Dialogue: Is that really you!?

Original: Zidane:You two know each other?
Dialogue: You two know each other?

Original: Sazh:He's a friend of ours from back home. Never expected to run into him here though.
Dialogue: He's a friend of ours from back home. Never expected to run into him here though.

Original: Snow:Sazh, it's good to see you. By the way, who are your new friends?
Dialogue: Sazh, it's good to see you. By the way, who are your new friends?

Original: Mog:They're warriors gathered here from different worlds, kupo!
Dialogue: They're warriors gathered here from different worlds, kupo!
trans: 他们是从不同世界聚集到这里的战士啊库珀！

Original: Zidane:And any friend of Hope and Sazh is a friend of ours.
Dialogue: And any friend of Hope and Sazh is a friend of ours.
trans: Hope 和 Sazh 的任何朋友都是我们的朋友。

Original: Zidane:I mean, you risked your life to save someone who you thought was a stranger.
Dialogue: I mean, you risked your life to save someone who you thought was a stranger.
trans: 我的意思是，你冒着生命危险去救一个你认为是陌生人的人。

Original: Zidane:Now that's a real hero!
Dialogue: Now that's a real hero!

Original: Snow:A talking moogle and a guy with a tailand I thought I'd seen it all.
Dialogue: A talking moogle and a guy with a tail—and I thought I'd seen it all.
trans: 一个会说话的莫古利和一个有尾巴的家伙——我想我已经看到了这一切。

Original: Snow:Consider my mind blown.
Dialogue: Consider my mind blown.

Original: Hope:Doesn't take much to do that.
Dialogue: Doesn't take much to do that.

Original: Zidane:Whoa, harsh. What's gotten into him?
Dialogue: Whoa, harsh. What's gotten into him?

Original: Sazh:Let's just say things weren't always sunshine and rainbows between them.
Dialogue: Let's just say things weren't always sunshine and rainbows between them.
trans: 我们只是说他们之间并不总是阳光和彩虹。

Original: Warrior of Light:For what purpose did you approach the Torsion?
Dialogue: For what purpose did you approach the Torsion?
trans: 你接近 Torsion 的目的是什么？

Original: Snow:You talking about that portal-thing? I don't know where it came from.
Dialogue: You talking about that portal-thing? I don't know where it came from.
trans: 你在说那个门户之类的东西？

Original: Snow:But I can't just ignore something that's spitting out monsters.
Dialogue: But I can't just ignore something that's spitting out monsters.
trans: 但我不能就这样无视那些吐出怪物的东西。

Original: Snow:So I figured I should do something about it before anyone got hurt.
Dialogue: So I figured I should do something about it before anyone got hurt.
trans: 所以我想我应该在任何人受伤之前做点什么。

Original: Mog:Then you should come with us to save the world, kupo!
Dialogue: Then you should come with us to save the world, kupo!
trans: 那你应该和我们一起去拯救世界，库波！

Original: Snow:Save the world, huh? I like the sound of that.
Dialogue: Save the world, huh? I like the sound of that.

Original: Snow:All right! You need a hero, you got one!
Dialogue: All right! You need a hero, you got one!

Original: Mog:Great! We're counting on you, kupo!
Dialogue: Great! We're counting on you, kupo!

Original: Snow:I know how to take a hit, so if you need me to lure the enemies, just let me know.
Dialogue: I know how to take a hit, so if you need me to lure the enemies, just let me know.
trans: 我知道如何承受打击，所以如果您需要我引诱敌人，请告诉我。

Original: Hope:You never change, do you?
Dialogue: You never change, do you?

Original: Snow:But man am I glad to see you safe and sound, Serah.
Dialogue: But man am I glad to see you safe and sound, Serah.
trans: 但是我很高兴看到你安然无恙，塞拉。

Original: Serah:Not just thatI can hold my own in a fight now, too! I might even be more useful than you.
Dialogue: Not just that—I can hold my own in a fight now, too! I might even be more useful than you.
trans: 不仅如此——我现在也可以在战斗中坚持自己的立场了！

Original: Snow:That's great. Having you along for the ride's a real pick-me-up.
Dialogue: That's great. Having you along for the ride's a real pick-me-up.

Original: Vincent:...Go figure.
Dialogue: ...Go figure.

Original: Vincent:I would have expected him to want to keep Serah away from battle, like someone else here...
Dialogue: I would have expected him to want to keep Serah away from battle, like someone else here...
trans: 我本以为他想让塞拉远离战场，就像这里的其他人一样……

Original: Lightning:Are you fine with putting Serah in danger? Aren't you worried about her?
Dialogue: Are you fine with putting Serah in danger? Aren't you worried about her?
trans: 你愿意让 Serah 处于危险之中吗？

Original: Serah:Not this again...
Dialogue: Not this again...

Original: Snow:Course I'm worried. But it's her choice to fight, and I'm gonna respect that.
Dialogue: Course I'm worried. But it's her choice to fight, and I'm gonna respect that.

Original: Snow:Plus, she's got us if anything ever happens.
Dialogue: Plus, she's got us if anything ever happens.
trans: 另外，如果发生任何事情，她都会找到我们。

Original: Snow:If I can't save her, you will. Right, Sis?
Dialogue: If I can't save her, you will. Right, Sis?
trans: 如果我不能救她，你会的。

Original: Lightning:Of course! When did I ever say I wouldn't?
Dialogue: Of course! When did I ever say I wouldn't?

Original: Snow:Right? She'll never have better backup than you.
Dialogue: Right? She'll never have better backup than you.

Original: Sabin:Hey, don't forget about us. We're watching out for all three of you, too...
Dialogue: Hey, don't forget about us. We're watching out for all three of you, too...

Original: Sabin:We're all in this together, so nobody needs to ask for help. It's a given.
Dialogue: We're all in this together, so nobody needs to ask for help. It's a given.
trans: 我们都在一起，所以没有人需要寻求帮助。

Original: Snow:Thanks, Sabin. I just want to make sure Serah's able to do what she wants.
Dialogue: Thanks, Sabin. I just want to make sure Serah's able to do what she wants.

Original: Snow:So listen, Sis...
Dialogue: So listen, Sis...

Original: Shadow:Keeping a distance is also a method of defense...
Dialogue: Keeping a distance is also a method of defense...
trans: 保持距离也是一种防御方式……

Original: Vincent:I can appreciate the dread of not recovering what you've let go, though...
Dialogue: I can appreciate the dread of not recovering what you've let go, though...
trans: 我能理解无法恢复你所放手的恐惧，虽然......

Original: Vincent:Regrets don't vanish so easily...
Dialogue: Regrets don't vanish so easily...
trans: 遗憾不会那么容易消失...

Original: Lightning:I... I can't bear it...
Dialogue: I... I can't bear it...

Original: Shadow:...For as brave as you are as a warrior, you're just as cautious when it comes to Serah.
Dialogue: ...For as brave as you are as a warrior, you're just as cautious when it comes to Serah.
trans: ......作为一名战士，尽管你很勇敢，但在谈到 Serah 时，你也同样谨慎。

Original: Lightning:Of course I am. She's my family.
Dialogue: Of course I am. She's my family.

Original: Serah:I feel the same way, you know. I'm worried you don't look out for yourself.
Dialogue: I feel the same way, you know. I'm worried you don't look out for yourself.

Original: Snow:Ditto. She's not the only one.
Dialogue: Ditto. She's not the only one.

Original: Lightning:Argh...you two...
Dialogue: Argh...you two...

Original: Lightning:Fine. Listen. Now that this bruiser's here, too...
Dialogue: Fine. Listen. Now that this bruiser's here, too...

Original: Lightning:If we're fighting together, I expect you to drive us like dogs, got it?
Dialogue: If we're fighting together, I expect you to drive us like dogs, got it?
trans: 如果我们一起战斗，我希望你像狗一样驱赶我们，明白吗？

Original: Serah:Lightning...! Got it!
Dialogue: Lightning...! Got it!

Original: Snow:Alright! Just tell me what you need! I'll keep all y'all safe and sound!
Dialogue: Alright! Just tell me what you need! I'll keep all y'all safe and sound!

Original: Firion:We need to stay on our toes here. No telling what enemies lie ahead.
Dialogue: We need to stay on our toes here. No telling what enemies lie ahead.
trans: 我们需要在这里保持警惕。

Original: Snow:If things start to get hot, just holler. I'll keep everyone out of harm's way!
Dialogue: If things start to get hot, just holler. I'll keep everyone out of harm's way!
trans: 如果事情开始变热，就大喊大叫。

Original: Wakka:Not that I don't 'preciate it, but "everyone" is a bit much, ya?
Dialogue: Not that I don't 'preciate it, but "everyone" is a bit much, ya?
trans: 并不是说我不喜欢它，而是说“每个人”有点过分，是吗？

Original: Snow:"A bit much" is my middle name.
Dialogue: "A bit much" is my middle name.

Original: Snow:Back home, too, I fought like crazy so I wouldn't lose Serah or anyone else.
Dialogue: Back home, too, I fought like crazy so I wouldn't lose Serah or anyone else.
trans: 回到家里，我也疯狂地战斗，这样我就不会失去 Serah 或其他任何人。

Original: Ace:You derive your strength to protect from a desire not to lose anyone.
Dialogue: You derive your strength to protect from a desire not to lose anyone.
trans: 你从不想失去任何人的愿望中汲取力量来保护自己。

Original: Snow:Everything that was my normal suddenly came crashing down one day.
Dialogue: Everything that was my normal suddenly came crashing down one day.
trans: 有一天，我正常的一切突然崩溃了。

Original: Snow:Everything I thought was real, people I thought were my allies, it was all turned upside down.
Dialogue: Everything I thought was real, people I thought were my allies, it was all turned upside down.
trans: 我认为的一切都是真实的，我认为是我的盟友的人，这一切都被颠倒了。

Original: Ramza:...All I once surveyed was but a fraction of the real world, and the more I learned the truth, the less sure I became.
Dialogue: ...All I once surveyed was but a fraction of the real world, and the more I learned the truth, the less sure I became.
trans: ......我曾经调查过的只是现实世界的一小部分，我越了解真相，我就越不确定。

Original: Steiner:You cannot see the whole picture unless it also extends beyond the frame...
Dialogue: You cannot see the whole picture unless it also extends beyond the frame...
trans: 你无法看到整个画面，除非它也延伸到框架之外......

Original: Wakka:You didn't lose it when everything you believed in came tumbling down? I know I did...
Dialogue: You didn't lose it when everything you believed in came tumbling down? I know I did...
trans: 当你所相信的一切都轰然倒塌时，你没有失去它吗？

Original: Snow:I'm too dumb for that.
Dialogue: I'm too dumb for that.

Original: Snow:I could be cut off from the entire world, but as long as I stick to my principles, I figure it's all alright.
Dialogue: I could be cut off from the entire world, but as long as I stick to my principles, I figure it's all alright.
trans: 我可能会与整个世界隔绝，但只要我坚持自己的原则，我觉得一切都很好。

Original: Ramza:You're also a man driven by faith.
Dialogue: You're also a man driven by faith.
trans: 你也是一个被信仰驱使的人。

Original: Snow:Finding out what's true only brings what needs protecting into clearer focus.
Dialogue: Finding out what's true only brings what needs protecting into clearer focus.
trans: 找出真相只会让需要保护的东西更加清晰。

Original: Snow:I'll fight, survive, and make Serah my wife.
Dialogue: I'll fight, survive, and make Serah my wife.
trans: 我会战斗，生存，让塞拉成为我的妻子。

Original: Wakka:Heh, she might whip you good, ya know?
Dialogue: Heh, she might whip you good, ya know?
trans: 嘿，她可能会鞭打你，你知道吗？

Original: Snow:I'm just happy to have her by my side.
Dialogue: I'm just happy to have her by my side.
trans: 我很高兴有她在我身边。

Original: Steiner:A joyous sentiment if there ever was one!
Dialogue: A joyous sentiment if there ever was one!
trans: 如果有的话，这是一种快乐的情绪！

Original: Firion:...We're all warriors, but we're all fighting to bring an end to fighting.
Dialogue: ...We're all warriors, but we're all fighting to bring an end to fighting.
trans: ...我们都是战士，但我们都在为结束战斗而战。

Original: Snow:You got that right. That's why I'm gonna make sure you all get home in one piece.
Dialogue: You got that right. That's why I'm gonna make sure you all get home in one piece.

Original: Firion:Okay, just don't overdo it.
Dialogue: Okay, just don't overdo it.

Original: Snow:Let's get a move on!
Dialogue: Let's get a move on!

Original: Snow:So all of you are fighting for something, huh?
Dialogue: So all of you are fighting for something, huh?
trans: 所以你们所有人都在为某事而战，是吗？

Original: Zidane:You too, right? You must've got some sort of plan.
Dialogue: You too, right? You must've got some sort of plan.

Original: Zidane:I mean, you wouldn't be risking your life to protect others if you didn't.
Dialogue: I mean, you wouldn't be risking your life to protect others if you didn't.
trans: 我的意思是，如果你不这样做，你就不会冒着生命危险去保护他人。

Original: Snow:I'll do anything to protect those I care about. Doesn't matter where I am.
Dialogue: I'll do anything to protect those I care about. Doesn't matter where I am.
trans: 我会做任何事来保护我在乎的人。

Original: Hope:It's someplace back in our world. Snow, come on, nobody knows what you're talking about.
Dialogue: It's someplace back in our world. Snow, come on, nobody knows what you're talking about.
trans: 它在我们世界的某个地方。

Original: Snow:Yeah, my bad. Anyway, I can't allow my home to be destroyed.
Dialogue: Yeah, my bad. Anyway, I can't allow my home to be destroyed.

Original: Cloud:Pretty sure of yourself, huh?
Dialogue: Pretty sure of yourself, huh?

Original: Cecil:Do you really think you can do it all on your own?
Dialogue: Do you really think you can do it all on your own?
trans: 你真的认为你可以自己完成所有事情吗？

Original: Snow:It's not gonna be easy, but I'm sure it'll all work out. It always does.
Dialogue: It's not gonna be easy, but I'm sure it'll all work out. It always does.
trans: 这并不容易，但我相信一切都会成功的。

Original: Snow:Besides, I'm not alone. I've got you guys, right?
Dialogue: Besides, I'm not alone. I've got you guys, right?

Original: Zidane:That's the spirit! I think we're gonna get along just fine.
Dialogue: That's the spirit! I think we're gonna get along just fine.

Original: Zidane:...So is this someone you're trying to protect really that cute?
Dialogue: ...So is this someone you're trying to protect really that cute?
trans: ……所以你要保护的人真的有那么可爱吗？

Original: Snow:You bet she is. I could go on about her all day. ...So I better not see you try to make a move on her.
Dialogue: You bet she is. I could go on about her all day. ...So I better not see you try to make a move on her.

Original: Zidane:Y-you don't say. Sounds like Snow has it rough back home.
Dialogue: Y-you don't say. Sounds like Snow has it rough back home.

Original: Warrior of Light:Someone to protect...
Dialogue: Someone to protect...

Original: Snow:Come on, I know there's someone you're fighting for, too.
Dialogue: Come on, I know there's someone you're fighting for, too.
trans: 来吧，我知道你也在为某个人而战。

Original: Warrior of Light:I have walked the path of light.
Dialogue: I have walked the path of light.

Original: Warrior of Light:But I question if I have ever risked my life to protect someone as you do.
Dialogue: But I question if I have ever risked my life to protect someone as you do.
trans: 但我怀疑我是否曾像你一样冒着生命危险保护某人。

Original: Mog:Don't beat yourself up over not being able to remember, kupo.
Dialogue: Don't beat yourself up over not being able to remember, kupo.
trans: 不要因为记不住而自责，库波。

Original: Cloud:I'm sure you'll find yourself if you just keep moving forward.
Dialogue: I'm sure you'll find yourself if you just keep moving forward.
trans: 我相信只要继续前进，您就会找到自己。

Original: Cloud:Talking about it can only get you so far.
Dialogue: Talking about it can only get you so far.
trans: 谈论它只能让你到目前为止。

Original: Warrior of Light:You're right.
Dialogue: You're right.

Original: Warrior of Light:Perhaps one day, I will become more like you, able to
Dialogue: Perhaps one day, I will become more like you, able to—
trans: 也许有一天，我会变得更像你，能够——

Original: Snow:You're thinking too much again! Just go with the flow and it'll all work out. I promise.
Dialogue: You're thinking too much again! Just go with the flow and it'll all work out. I promise.

Original: Hope:*Sigh* While I'm glad he's okay, I'm starting to miss when things were a little...quieter.
Dialogue: *Sigh* While I'm glad he's okay, I'm starting to miss when things were a little...quieter.
trans: *叹息*虽然我很高兴他没事，但我开始怀念以前的事情……安静一点。

Original: Zidane:Come on, what's the fun in that? Besides, I kind of like the guy.
Dialogue: Come on, what's the fun in that? Besides, I kind of like the guy.

Original: ???:Take this you little...!
Dialogue: Take this you little...!

Original: Mog:Kupo!? Did you hear that!?
Dialogue: Kupo!? Did you hear that!?

Original: Rem:Hey, doesn't that sound like...?
Dialogue: Hey, doesn't that sound like...?

Original: King:Yeah, let's go check it out.
Dialogue: Yeah, let's go check it out.

Original: Rem:Cater! Is that you?
Dialogue: Cater! Is that you?

Original: Cater:Rem!? And is that King!?
Dialogue: Rem!? And is that King!?

Original: Steiner:Did you vanquish the monsters here all by yourself!?
Dialogue: Did you vanquish the monsters here all by yourself!?
trans: 难道你一个人就把这里的魔物都打倒了！？

Original: Yang:Your courage is commendable.
Dialogue: Your courage is commendable.

Original: Cater:Huh? Oh, thanks. ...So, uh, what's up with the get-up? You guys circus performers or something?
Dialogue: Huh? Oh, thanks. ...So, uh, what's up with the get-up? You guys circus performers or something?

Original: Steiner:...! Hmph. Well, the others seem to know her, so I'll let it pass.
Dialogue: ...! Hmph. Well, the others seem to know her, so I'll let it pass.

Original: Steiner:I am Adelbert Steiner.
Dialogue: I am Adelbert Steiner.
trans: 我是阿德尔伯特·施泰纳。

Original: Yang:And I am Yang, monk and leader of Fabul.
Dialogue: And I am Yang, monk and leader of Fabul.
trans: 我是杨，法布的和尚和领袖。

Original: Cater:Hold up. A man wearing armor and a warrior monk? What in the world is going on here?
Dialogue: Hold up. A man wearing armor and a warrior monk? What in the world is going on here?

Original: King:We need to talk.
Dialogue: We need to talk.

Original: Rem:So, Cater, this world we're in...
Dialogue: So, Cater, this world we're in...
trans: 所以，Cater，我们所处的这个世界......

Original: Cater:Ohhh! No wonder they're dressed so funny.
Dialogue: Ohhh! No wonder they're dressed so funny.

Original: Yang:Well, we are from different worlds, after all.
Dialogue: Well, we are from different worlds, after all.
trans: 好吧，毕竟我们来自不同的世界。

Original: Steiner:Exactly. Our attire is simply a characteristic of our home.
Dialogue: Exactly. Our attire is simply a characteristic of our home.

Original: Rem:She's just never seen anybody dressed like you two before. That's all.
Dialogue: She's just never seen anybody dressed like you two before. That's all.
trans: 她以前从未见过有人穿得像你们两个。

Original: Cater:But seriously, I have the worst luck. I was just taking a nap on the terrace, and the next thing you know, I'm in a different world.
Dialogue: But seriously, I have the worst luck. I was just taking a nap on the terrace, and the next thing you know, I'm in a different world.

Original: Cater:Anyway, we need to close those Torsions or whatever if we ever wanna go home, right?
Dialogue: Anyway, we need to close those Torsions or whatever if we ever wanna go home, right?
trans: 无论如何，如果我们想回家，我们需要关闭那些 Torsions 或其他任何东西，对吧？

Original: Mog:Right, kupo! So you should come
Dialogue: Right, kupo! So you should come—

Original: Cater:All right, I'm gonna go see what's up ahead! You guys check that way! We'll meet up later!
Dialogue: All right, I'm gonna go see what's up ahead! You guys check that way! We'll meet up later!
trans: 好吧，我要去看看前面的情况！

Original: Mog:Waaait! I wasn't finished talking yet, kupo!
Dialogue: Waaait! I wasn't finished talking yet, kupo!

Original: Yang:Are you sure she'll be okay?
Dialogue: Are you sure she'll be okay?

Original: King:No, this place is crawling with monsters.
Dialogue: No, this place is crawling with monsters.
trans: 不，这个地方到处都是怪物。

Original: Rem:Leave it to Cater to go running off without thinking first.
Dialogue: Leave it to Cater to go running off without thinking first.
trans: 交给凯特想也不想就跑吧。

Original: Steiner:Come, let us hurry after your comrade!
Dialogue: Come, let us hurry after your comrade!
trans: 来吧，让我们赶快追上你的伙伴！

Original: Mog:Finally! I didn't think we'd ever catch up, kupo!
Dialogue: Finally! I didn't think we'd ever catch up, kupo!

Original: Cater:Sorry about that. I still haven't found the Torsion yet.
Dialogue: Sorry about that. I still haven't found the Torsion yet.

Original: Firion:No, I'm just glad we found you before anything happened. It's dangerous here.
Dialogue: No, I'm just glad we found you before anything happened. It's dangerous here.
trans: 不，我只是很高兴我们在任何事情发生之前找到了你。

Original: Cater:Oh, you were worried about me? Rem sure is lucky to have nice friends like you.
Dialogue: Oh, you were worried about me? Rem sure is lucky to have nice friends like you.

Original: Cater:But I'm fine. I know how to take care of myself.
Dialogue: But I'm fine. I know how to take care of myself.

Original: Layle:Pretty confident, aren't we? But it's people like you who end up getting themselves into trouble.
Dialogue: Pretty confident, aren't we? But it's people like you who end up getting themselves into trouble.

Original: Wakka:Yeah, and I believe it coming from you.
Dialogue: Yeah, and I believe it coming from you.

Original: Penelo:The monsters up ahead are even stronger. You could get really hurt if you go alone.
Dialogue: The monsters up ahead are even stronger. You could get really hurt if you go alone.

Original: Cater:Hm... You really think so? I mean, we could cover more ground if we split up.
Dialogue: Hm... You really think so? I mean, we could cover more ground if we split up.

Original: Cater:Plus, the monsters here don't seem to like being shot in the face, so I think I can handle things myself.
Dialogue: Plus, the monsters here don't seem to like being shot in the face, so I think I can handle things myself.
trans: 再加上这里的怪物好像不太喜欢被人打脸，所以我觉得我自己能搞定。

Original: Wakka:Man, I love this confidence of hers!
Dialogue: Man, I love this confidence of hers!
trans: 伙计，我喜欢她的这种自信！

Original: Firion:You possess abilities we are in need of. Would you consider fighting along our side?
Dialogue: You possess abilities we are in need of. Would you consider fighting along our side?
trans: 你拥有我们需要的能力。

Original: Penelo:Please, come with us. Think of it as you're doing us a favor.
Dialogue: Please, come with us. Think of it as you're doing us a favor.

Original: Cater:Come on, you're embarrassing me. I mean, it's tough being popular sometimes.
Dialogue: Come on, you're embarrassing me. I mean, it's tough being popular sometimes.

Original: Cater:But sure, you've got it! I'll come with you.
Dialogue: But sure, you've got it! I'll come with you.
trans: 但可以肯定的是，你已经明白了！

Original: Mog:Yay! Welcome to the family, kupo! Now we'll be able to seal the Torsion here in no time.
Dialogue: Yay! Welcome to the family, kupo! Now we'll be able to seal the Torsion here in no time.

Original: Mog:Speaking of which, my senses tell me it's this way. Come on, everybody!
Dialogue: Speaking of which, my senses tell me it's this way. Come on, everybody!
trans: 说到这里，我的直觉告诉我是这样的。

Original: Cater:Aye aye, captain! I won't let you down!
Dialogue: Aye aye, captain! I won't let you down!

Original: Layle:Well, that was easy. I think they've got a knack for this.
Dialogue: Well, that was easy. I think they've got a knack for this.

Original: Cater:Argh, I missed!
Dialogue: Argh, I missed!

Original: Cyan:It escaped.
Dialogue: It escaped.

Original: Cater:Oh well. We explored this far. Maybe it's time to hook back up with the others.
Dialogue: Oh well. We explored this far. Maybe it's time to hook back up with the others.

Original: Yuna:Look out! It brought friends!
Dialogue: Look out! It brought friends!

Original: Cyan:Against these numbers, it may be our turn to escape.
Dialogue: Against these numbers, it may be our turn to escape.
trans: 面对这些数字，可能轮到我们逃跑了。

Original: Cyan:Lady Cater!?
Dialogue: Lady Cater!?

Original: Cater:I'll thin 'em out! You two call for backup!
Dialogue: I'll thin 'em out! You two call for backup!

Original: Yuna:We can't leave you on your own!
Dialogue: We can't leave you on your own!
trans: 我们不能丢下你一个人！

Original: Cater:I'll be fine!
Dialogue: I'll be fine!

Original: Yuna:...I'll stay here, too! Please bring help!
Dialogue: ...I'll stay here, too! Please bring help!

Original: Cyan:Very well!
Dialogue: Very well!

Original: Zell:Woof, that was sure a party.
Dialogue: Woof, that was sure a party.

Original: Cyan:Verily. It is well and good we prevailed, but wherefore didst thou not flee?
Dialogue: Verily. It is well and good we prevailed, but wherefore didst thou not flee?

Original: Cater:If we all pulled out and let them get to the rendezvous point, it'd be the same as losing.
Dialogue: If we all pulled out and let them get to the rendezvous point, it'd be the same as losing.
trans: 如果我们都撤出去，让他们到达集合点，那就等于输了。

Original: Zell:I can't fault that logic.
Dialogue: I can't fault that logic.

Original: Cyan:...But wert thou to fall here, then what? There art others who worry for thou.
Dialogue: ...But wert thou to fall here, then what? There art others who worry for thou.
trans: ......但如果你掉在这里，那又怎样？

Original: Cater:...Maybe. No, you're right.
Dialogue: ...Maybe. No, you're right.

Original: Yuna:Don't push yourself too hard, for others' sake.
Dialogue: Don't push yourself too hard, for others' sake.
trans: 不要太勉强自己，为了别人好。

Original: Terra:But you weren't wrong. Everyone might have been in real danger if that flock suddenly attacked.
Dialogue: But you weren't wrong. Everyone might have been in real danger if that flock suddenly attacked.

Original: Terra:You bought us enough time to put up an organized fight.
Dialogue: You bought us enough time to put up an organized fight.
trans: 你为我们赢得了足够的时间来进行有组织的战斗。

Original: Cater:Right? Right!
Dialogue: Right? Right!

Original: Zell:You were trying to protect everyone. You got guts, kid.
Dialogue: You were trying to protect everyone. You got guts, kid.

Original: Cater:Well, feel free to follow my example!
Dialogue: Well, feel free to follow my example!
trans: 好吧，请随时以我为榜样！

Original: Yuffie:All these waves are wearing me out!
Dialogue: All these waves are wearing me out!
trans: 所有这些波浪都让我筋疲力尽！

Original: Cater:Seriously. Don't send me back there.
Dialogue: Seriously. Don't send me back there.

Original: Cloud:It's only a little further. Come on, let's mosey.
Dialogue: It's only a little further. Come on, let's mosey.

Original: Yuffie:...Huh? H-huh? You gotta be kidding me.
Dialogue: ...Huh? H-huh? You gotta be kidding me.

Original: Cloud:Do you know where you dropped it? Are you sure it's gone?
Dialogue: Do you know where you dropped it? Are you sure it's gone?
trans: 你知道你把它丢在哪里了吗？

Original: Rem:You probably lost it back there...
Dialogue: You probably lost it back there...

Original: Yuffie:If we go back, we're gonna have to go through all those fights again... Aw, man, what do I do?
Dialogue: If we go back, we're gonna have to go through all those fights again... Aw, man, what do I do?
trans: 如果我们回去，我们将不得不再次经历所有那些战斗……噢，伙计，我该怎么办？

Original: Cater:It's something important, isn't it?
Dialogue: It's something important, isn't it?
trans: 这是很重要的事情，不是吗？

Original: Yuffie:But it'd suck if I drag everyone back while we're tired and some strong monster shows up.
Dialogue: But it'd suck if I drag everyone back while we're tired and some strong monster shows up.
trans: 但是如果我在我们累了的时候把所有人都拖回去并且出现了一些强大的怪物，那就太糟糕了。

Original: Cloud:...You sure?
Dialogue: ...You sure?

Original: Yuffie:Yeah, let's blow this joint.
Dialogue: Yeah, let's blow this joint.
trans: 是的，让我们吹这个关节。

Original: Cater:...Hey, why don't we sneak back and get out of there before they notice us?
Dialogue: ...Hey, why don't we sneak back and get out of there before they notice us?
trans: ......嘿，我们为什么不在他们注意到我们之前偷偷溜回去离开那里？

Original: Yuffie:I don't know how quick we'd find it, though.
Dialogue: I don't know how quick we'd find it, though.
trans: 不过，我不知道我们能多快找到它。

Original: Cater:We can find it! Come on!
Dialogue: We can find it! Come on!

Original: Cater:You guys sit tight!
Dialogue: You guys sit tight!

Original: Yuffie:No dice... We might as well call it quits...
Dialogue: No dice... We might as well call it quits...
trans: 没有骰子......我们不妨称之为退出......

Original: Cater:This is where we were fighting, though!
Dialogue: This is where we were fighting, though!
trans: 不过，这就是我们战斗的地方！

Original: Onion Knight:You two are asking for trouble if you don't head back soon.
Dialogue: You two are asking for trouble if you don't head back soon.
trans: 你们两个不早点回去是自找麻烦。

Original: Yuffie:What? You came, too?
Dialogue: What? You came, too?

Original: Onion Knight:Cater, Yuffie already gave up. Why are you so intent on finding it?
Dialogue: Cater, Yuffie already gave up. Why are you so intent on finding it?

Original: Cater:Huh? 'Cause, she's a friend in need.
Dialogue: Huh? 'Cause, she's a friend in need.

Original: Onion Knight:I figured you were being stubborn, but you're just being nice.
Dialogue: I figured you were being stubborn, but you're just being nice.
trans: 我以为你很固执，但你只是很好。

Original: Onion Knight:Either way, you're horrible at searching for things. ...Is this what you're looking for?
Dialogue: Either way, you're horrible at searching for things. ...Is this what you're looking for?
trans: 无论哪种方式，你在寻找东西时都很糟糕。

Original: Yuffie:Where were they!?
Dialogue: Where were they!?

Original: Onion Knight:Where you were. ...Don't tell me you were looking without rhyme or reason!
Dialogue: Where you were. ...Don't tell me you were looking without rhyme or reason!

Original: Cater:You got a problem with that!?
Dialogue: You got a problem with that!?

Original: Yuffie:Alrighty, our work here is done! Let's get back to the group!
Dialogue: Alrighty, our work here is done! Let's get back to the group!
trans: 好了，我们的工作完成了！

Original: Cater:Yes! I closed the Torsion! Pretty impressive, huh?
Dialogue: Yes! I closed the Torsion! Pretty impressive, huh?

Original: Galuf:Impressive, indeed. Looks like you've got the skills to back up that mouth of yours.
Dialogue: Impressive, indeed. Looks like you've got the skills to back up that mouth of yours.

Original: Cater:Hey, you gotta practice what you preach, you know? That's my motto.
Dialogue: Hey, you gotta practice what you preach, you know? That's my motto.
trans: 嘿，你必须言出必行，知道吗？

Original: Vincent:You're strong, talented.
Dialogue: You're strong, talented.

Original: Vincent:But you lack the composure necessary for battle. ...One day, that hubris could be your downfall.
Dialogue: But you lack the composure necessary for battle. ...One day, that hubris could be your downfall.
trans: 但是你缺乏战斗所需的镇定。

Original: Cater:Ugh. Give it a rest. I'm tired of everyone trying to lecture me on what to do.
Dialogue: Ugh. Give it a rest. I'm tired of everyone trying to lecture me on what to do.

Original: Rem:Hey's saying this because he's worried about you. Right, Vincent?
Dialogue: Hey's saying this because he's worried about you. Right, Vincent?
trans: 嘿，他这么说是因为他担心你。

Original: Vincent:Forget I said anything.
Dialogue: Forget I said anything.

Original: Cater:Yeah... Good point. The world may be different, but people are still people, huh?
Dialogue: Yeah... Good point. The world may be different, but people are still people, huh?

Original: Yuffie:Wow, gettin' all philosophical on us now.
Dialogue: Wow, gettin' all philosophical on us now.
trans: 哇，现在开始对我们充满哲理了。

Original: Galuf:You two are a lot alike, you know that?
Dialogue: You two are a lot alike, you know that?
trans: 你们两个很像，你知道吗？

Original: Yuffie:What!? I'm nothing like this cocky tomboy!
Dialogue: What!? I'm nothing like this cocky tomboy!

Original: Cater:Excuse me!? What did you just say, you conniving thief!
Dialogue: Excuse me!? What did you just say, you conniving thief!

Original: Galuf:See, what did I tell you?
Dialogue: See, what did I tell you?

Original: Rem:The more the merrier, r-right?
Dialogue: The more the merrier, r-right?

Original: Galuf:Vincent, why don't you keep an eye on them? Give them some guidance.
Dialogue: Vincent, why don't you keep an eye on them? Give them some guidance.
trans: 文森特，你为什么不留意他们呢？

Original: Vincent:I'll pass.
Dialogue: I'll pass.

Original: Cater:Not in a million years!
Dialogue: Not in a million years!

Original: Galuf:Yep, they're perfect for each other.
Dialogue: Yep, they're perfect for each other.
trans: 是的，他们非常适合彼此。

Original: Yuffie:How could you say we're alike? I mean, have I ever been this annoying?
Dialogue: How could you say we're alike? I mean, have I ever been this annoying?
trans: 你怎么能说我们很像呢？

Original: Galuf:Well, ready to go?
Dialogue: Well, ready to go?

Original: Yuffie:H-hold up! Hey!
Dialogue: H-hold up! Hey!

Original: Cater:Yuffie, it hurts to admit it...but I know how you feel right now.
Dialogue: Yuffie, it hurts to admit it...but I know how you feel right now.
trans: Yuffie，承认这一点很痛苦……但我知道你现在的感受。

Original: Yuffie:Thanks, Cater... You're a lot nicer than I thought.
Dialogue: Thanks, Cater... You're a lot nicer than I thought.
trans: 谢谢，Cater...你比我想象的要好得多。

Original: Cater:Maybe we're not so different after all, huh? Let's find a way home...together.
Dialogue: Maybe we're not so different after all, huh? Let's find a way home...together.
trans: 也许我们并没有那么不同，是吧？

Original: Cater:And let's show the others who's boss! Make them pay for ever doubting us!
Dialogue: And let's show the others who's boss! Make them pay for ever doubting us!
trans: 让我们告诉其他人谁是老大！

Original: Yuffie:Oh, I like where you're going with this! I'm in!
Dialogue: Oh, I like where you're going with this! I'm in!
trans: 哦，我喜欢你要去的地方！

Original: Galuf:Heeey! Get a move on, you two!
Dialogue: Heeey! Get a move on, you two!

Original: Laguna:Right? So then I say, "You're gettin' the Cuchi-cuchi treatment!"
Dialogue: Right? So then I say, "You're gettin' the Cuchi-cuchi treatment!"

Original: Yuffie:Ah ha ha! You can't be serious!
Dialogue: Ah ha ha! You can't be serious!

Original: Vaan:Not the Cuchi-cuchi treatment! We'd better watch out! Hahaha!
Dialogue: Not the Cuchi-cuchi treatment! We'd better watch out! Hahaha!

Original: Mog:...They're having an awfully good time, kupo...
Dialogue: ...They're having an awfully good time, kupo...

Original: Penelo:Laguna's good at storytelling. ...Hm?
Dialogue: Laguna's good at storytelling. ...Hm?

Original: Penelo:Is that...!?
Dialogue: Is that...!?

Original: Penelo:Vaan! Come here!
Dialogue: Vaan! Come here!

Original: Vaan:Oh, Ashe, you were summoned to this world, too?
Dialogue: Oh, Ashe, you were summoned to this world, too?
trans: 哦，艾希，你也是被召唤到这个世界的吗？

Original: Ashe:..."This world"?
Dialogue: ..."This world"?

Original: Mog:That's my cue, kupo!
Dialogue: That's my cue, kupo!

Original: Ashe:...I cannot believe it. Such a reality begs credulity.
Dialogue: ...I cannot believe it. Such a reality begs credulity.

Original: Mog:Won't you join us, kupo?
Dialogue: Won't you join us, kupo?

Original: Ashe:Well, I...
Dialogue: Well, I...

Original: Laguna:Yuffie, have you heard this one? This guy orders soup, and there's a fly in it...
Dialogue: Yuffie, have you heard this one? This guy orders soup, and there's a fly in it...

Original: Yuffie:Ah ha ha! What the heck? Stop making me laugh!
Dialogue: Ah ha ha! What the heck? Stop making me laugh!

Original: Ashe:...I respectfully decline.
Dialogue: ...I respectfully decline.

Original: Vaan:Why? You planning to go it alone?
Dialogue: Why? You planning to go it alone?

Original: Ashe:So, if you'll forgive me...I do not think it is in my interest to interrupt your frivolity...
Dialogue: So, if you'll forgive me...I do not think it is in my interest to interrupt your frivolity...
trans: 所以，如果你能原谅我……我认为打断你的轻浮对我没有好处……

Original: Penelo:Don't say that! No one is being frivolous...
Dialogue: Don't say that! No one is being frivolous...

Original: Yuffie:What? Did you say something?
Dialogue: What? Did you say something?

Original: Mog:Of all the times to be oblivious, kupo...
Dialogue: Of all the times to be oblivious, kupo...
trans: 在所有被遗忘的时代中，kupo...

Original: Ashe:I am prepared to fight on my own. Please excuse me; I must hurry on...
Dialogue: I am prepared to fight on my own. Please excuse me; I must hurry on...

Original: Laguna:...Huh? What just happened? The lady won't be joining us?
Dialogue: ...Huh? What just happened? The lady won't be joining us?

Original: Penelo:And whose fault do you think that is, Laguna!
Dialogue: And whose fault do you think that is, Laguna!
trans: 你认为那是谁的错，拉古纳！

Original: Laguna:Beats me! Not mine at least!
Dialogue: Beats me! Not mine at least!

Original: Laguna:...But this area is crawling with monsters. We can't just let her wander on her own.
Dialogue: ...But this area is crawling with monsters. We can't just let her wander on her own.

Original: Mog:He's right! Let's go after her, kupo!
Dialogue: He's right! Let's go after her, kupo!

Original: Ashe:Unh... If only I were stronger...
Dialogue: Unh... If only I were stronger...
trans: 嗯……要是我再坚强点就好了……

Original: Vaan:Ah! There she is! Over there!
Dialogue: Ah! There she is! Over there!

Original: Penelo:Are you okay!?
Dialogue: Are you okay!?

Original: Laguna:See? What did I say? This is what happens if you go off on your own.
Dialogue: See? What did I say? This is what happens if you go off on your own.

Original: Ashe:...What are you here for?
Dialogue: ...What are you here for?

Original: Vaan:To help you, of course.
Dialogue: To help you, of course.

Original: Ashe:I am...fine on my own.
Dialogue: I am...fine on my own.

Original: Laguna:Awful darn stubborn for the shape you're in.
Dialogue: Awful darn stubborn for the shape you're in.
trans: 对你现在的样子太固执了。

Original: Penelo:Can't you trust us to help?
Dialogue: Can't you trust us to help?
trans: 你不能相信我们会帮忙吗？

Original: Ashe:I am fighting in earnest, not for fun like you.
Dialogue: I am fighting in earnest, not for fun like you.
trans: 我是认真战斗的，不是像你一样为了好玩。

Original: Yuffie:Hey, I resent that. I put my neck on the line in battle.
Dialogue: Hey, I resent that. I put my neck on the line in battle.

Original: Laguna:You think we'd go out of our way to chase off monsters and help you for kicks?
Dialogue: You think we'd go out of our way to chase off monsters and help you for kicks?
trans: 你认为我们会竭尽全力赶走怪物并帮助你踢球吗？

Original: Ashe:I, well...
Dialogue: I, well...

Original: Vaan:Even if we look like a bunch of goof-offs...
Dialogue: Even if we look like a bunch of goof-offs...
trans: 即使我们看起来像一群傻瓜...

Original: Vaan:Everyone was worried about you. Even the guys who'd only just met you.
Dialogue: Everyone was worried about you. Even the guys who'd only just met you.

Original: Penelo:It's a boisterous group, but they're all concerned about others' wellbeing.
Dialogue: It's a boisterous group, but they're all concerned about others' wellbeing.
trans: 这是一个喧闹的团体，但他们都关心他人的福祉。

Original: Ashe:I see... I suppose I lost my temper.
Dialogue: I see... I suppose I lost my temper.
trans: 我明白了……我想我发脾气了。

Original: Mog:Kupo! You're finally being honest with us, kupo! Hooray!
Dialogue: Kupo! You're finally being honest with us, kupo! Hooray!

Original: Yuffie:Get out! A real princess! Talk about fantasy worlds!
Dialogue: Get out! A real princess! Talk about fantasy worlds!

Original: Laguna:But man if that isn't a long name. What do you guys usually call her?
Dialogue: But man if that isn't a long name. What do you guys usually call her?
trans: 但是，伙计，如果这不是一个长名字。

Original: Penelo:Well, she is royalty... We usually call her Princess Ashe.
Dialogue: Well, she is royalty... We usually call her Princess Ashe.
trans: 好吧，她是皇室……我们通常称她为艾什公主。

Original: Ashe:Circumstances require I return to my world as soon as possible...
Dialogue: Circumstances require I return to my world as soon as possible...
trans: 情况需要我尽快回到我的世界……

Original: Ashe:So please! I beg you lend me your strength!
Dialogue: So please! I beg you lend me your strength!

Original: Laguna:You got it!
Dialogue: You got it!

Original: Laguna:And in exchange, you'll listen to my stupid stories now and then, eh?
Dialogue: And in exchange, you'll listen to my stupid stories now and then, eh?
trans: 作为交换，你会时不时地听听我的愚蠢故事，嗯？

Original: Ashe:...I will do my best.
Dialogue: ...I will do my best.

Original: Sabin:That it does. Reminds me of when I was still in the castle.
Dialogue: That it does. Reminds me of when I was still in the castle.

Original: Ashe:I can relate. My homeland, too, is predominantly desert.
Dialogue: I can relate. My homeland, too, is predominantly desert.

Original: Edgar:Royalty of desert kingdoms, thrown together to journey across an alien world... Why, could this be fate?
Dialogue: Royalty of desert kingdoms, thrown together to journey across an alien world... Why, could this be fate?
trans: 沙漠王国的皇室成员聚集在一起穿越异界……为什么，这会是命运吗？

Original: Ashe:I hope it is a fate that contributes to our war effort.
Dialogue: I hope it is a fate that contributes to our war effort.
trans: 我希望这是一种命运，有助于我们的战争努力。

Original: Sabin:What does that mean?
Dialogue: What does that mean?

Original: Edgar:Sabin... It means I was rejected and it is time to back down.
Dialogue: Sabin... It means I was rejected and it is time to back down.
trans: 萨宾……意思是我被拒绝了，该退缩了。

Original: Edgar:Not a single woman has responded to my advances since I came here. Never have I felt lonelier.
Dialogue: Not a single woman has responded to my advances since I came here. Never have I felt lonelier.
trans: 自从我来到这里以来，没有一个女人回应过我的求爱。

Original: Lilisette:Wow, a desert princess. It has such a mysterious sound to it!
Dialogue: Wow, a desert princess. It has such a mysterious sound to it!

Original: Onion Knight:What's your country like, Ashe?
Dialogue: What's your country like, Ashe?
trans: 阿什，你的国家是什么样的？

Original: Ashe:Several different kingdoms have ruled Rabanastre, uniquely blending together various histories and cultures.
Dialogue: Several different kingdoms have ruled Rabanastre, uniquely blending together various histories and cultures.
trans: 几个不同的王国统治着 Rabanastre，独特地将各种历史和文化融合在一起。

Original: Lilisette:Hmm, in other words...it has a habit of being invaded?
Dialogue: Hmm, in other words...it has a habit of being invaded?
trans: 嗯，也就是说……它有被入侵的习惯？

Original: Ashe:...You are no wrong. Two years prior, the Archadian Empire did just that...
Dialogue: ...You are no wrong. Two years prior, the Archadian Empire did just that...

Original: Onion Knight:It must be difficult to defend when you're surrounded by desert.
Dialogue: It must be difficult to defend when you're surrounded by desert.
trans: 被沙漠包围，想必很难防守。

Original: Sabin:Sounds like you could use a castle that hides under the sands, too.
Dialogue: Sounds like you could use a castle that hides under the sands, too.
trans: 听起来你也可以使用隐藏在沙滩下的城堡。

Original: Edgar:Indeed. It's the special privilege of a desert kingdom in our world.
Dialogue: Indeed. It's the special privilege of a desert kingdom in our world.

Original: Ashe:Privilege of...a desert kingdom? Whatever do you mean?
Dialogue: Privilege of...a desert kingdom? Whatever do you mean?

Original: Sabin:Just what I said. Castle Figaro can dive under the desert!
Dialogue: Just what I said. Castle Figaro can dive under the desert!

Original: Lilisette:Whaaat!? A castle...under the desert!?
Dialogue: Whaaat!? A castle...under the desert!?

Original: Edgar:In an emergency, we gather all the castle's inhabitants, and thenpoof!she's gone without a trace.
Dialogue: In an emergency, we gather all the castle's inhabitants, and then—poof!—she's gone without a trace.
trans: 在紧急情况下，我们召集了城堡的所有居民，然后——噗！——她消失得无影无踪。

Original: Edgar:An invading army is left standing alone, surrounded by nothing but golden sands... It's quite a thrill.
Dialogue: An invading army is left standing alone, surrounded by nothing but golden sands... It's quite a thrill.
trans: 一支入侵的军队孤军奋战，周围只有金色的沙滩……真是太刺激了。

Original: Firion:It's hard to believe possible...
Dialogue: It's hard to believe possible...

Original: Ashe:If Ivalice...nay, if Dalmasca only had such technology, perhaps I could have protected my people...
Dialogue: If Ivalice...nay, if Dalmasca only had such technology, perhaps I could have protected my people...
trans: 如果伊瓦利斯……不，如果达尔马斯卡只有这样的技术，也许我就能保护我的人民……

Original: Onion Knight:Different worlds have different rules. No point in wishing for something that doesn't exist.
Dialogue: Different worlds have different rules. No point in wishing for something that doesn't exist.
trans: 不同的世界有不同的规则。

Original: Edgar:That swings both ways, Your Highness. There are things I cannot protect that only you can.
Dialogue: That swings both ways, Your Highness. There are things I cannot protect that only you can.

Original: Edgar:Your countrymen are a resilient lot. Vaan and Penelo make that clear enough.
Dialogue: Your countrymen are a resilient lot. Vaan and Penelo make that clear enough.

Original: Ashe:...It is true. I have many who support me, and the power left by my ancestors...
Dialogue: ...It is true. I have many who support me, and the power left by my ancestors...

Original: Sabin:Hang in there, Ashe! Nothing's impossible!
Dialogue: Hang in there, Ashe! Nothing's impossible!

Original: Ashe:Thank you, everyone. I will search for a way to protect my people that suits me.
Dialogue: Thank you, everyone. I will search for a way to protect my people that suits me.

Original: Edgar:Please, don't think you're in it all alone. As long as we are in this world, let's exchange all the information we can.
Dialogue: Please, don't think you're in it all alone. As long as we are in this world, let's exchange all the information we can.
trans: 请不要认为你是一个人在里面。

Original: Balthier:You're running too far ahead.
Dialogue: You're running too far ahead.

Original: Cyan:If thou push thyself too hard, thy body will pay the price for it.
Dialogue: If thou push thyself too hard, thy body will pay the price for it.
trans: 如果你把自己逼得太紧，你的身体就会为此付出代价。

Original: Vanille:Yeah, relax for a bit and let us take things over.
Dialogue: Yeah, relax for a bit and let us take things over.
trans: 是的，放松一下，让我们接管一切。

Original: Ashe:I appreciate your concern, but I must grow stronger.
Dialogue: I appreciate your concern, but I must grow stronger.
trans: 感谢您的关心，但我必须变得更强大。

Original: Ashe:I do it also so that my people and family claimed by war might find peace...
Dialogue: I do it also so that my people and family claimed by war might find peace...
trans: 我这样做也是为了让我的人民和家人在战争中获得和平......

Original: Hope:You lost your family...?
Dialogue: You lost your family...?

Original: Cyan:Thou hast my sympathies. I, too, lost many to an empire's artifice...
Dialogue: Thou hast my sympathies. I, too, lost many to an empire's artifice...

Original: Vanille:Cyan, I didn't know...
Dialogue: Cyan, I didn't know...

Original: Cyan:Forsaking thy memories and overcoming hatred are not the same thing. If thou seekest power, of this thou must beware.
Dialogue: Forsaking thy memories and overcoming hatred are not the same thing. If thou seekest power, of this thou must beware.
trans: 放弃你的记忆和克服仇恨不是一回事。

Original: Ashe:But...the dead... I could do nothing...!
Dialogue: But...the dead... I could do nothing...!

Original: Cyan:......Lady Ashe. The family, the comrades thou lost liveth on in thy heart, in thou.
Dialogue: ......Lady Ashe. The family, the comrades thou lost liveth on in thy heart, in thou.

Original: Cyan:I know thy grief, looking to the past and lamenting thy powerlessness... But looking only to the past produceth naught.
Dialogue: I know thy grief, looking to the past and lamenting thy powerlessness... But looking only to the past produceth naught.
trans: 我知道你的悲伤，回顾过去，哀叹你的无能为力……但只回顾过去是徒劳的。

Original: Cyan:Thou must advance on the path in which thou believest. Failing to do so would betray the departed.
Dialogue: Thou must advance on the path in which thou believest. Failing to do so would betray the departed.
trans: 你必须在你相信的道路上前进。

Original: Ashe:You've conquered your grief... Would that I had your strength...
Dialogue: You've conquered your grief... Would that I had your strength...
trans: 你已经克服了你的悲伤...如果我有你的力量...

Original: Balthier:Why does that sound like, "I can't conquer mine"?
Dialogue: Why does that sound like, "I can't conquer mine"?
trans: 为什么这听起来像是“我无法征服我的”？

Original: Ashe:I! ...That was not my intention!
Dialogue: I—! ...That was not my intention!

Original: Vanille:You're plenty strong. You'll find your peace in time.
Dialogue: You're plenty strong. You'll find your peace in time.

Original: Cyan:And at that time, thou will have grown all the stronger. I guarantee it.
Dialogue: And at that time, thou will have grown all the stronger. I guarantee it.
trans: 那时，你会变得更加强大。

Original: Hope:Yes, I hope you'll let us help you get there.
Dialogue: Yes, I hope you'll let us help you get there.
trans: 是的，我希望您能让我们帮助您实现目标。

Original: Hope:Don't take everything on by yourself, and lean on your friends. I needed to before, too...
Dialogue: Don't take everything on by yourself, and lean on your friends. I needed to before, too...
trans: 不要什么事都自己一个人扛，要靠朋友。

Original: Cyan:I did not see my grief through on mine own either. It was with the help of my comrades.
Dialogue: I did not see my grief through on mine own either. It was with the help of my comrades.
trans: 我也没有看到我自己的悲伤。

Original: Ashe:Then please allow me...to lean on you.
Dialogue: Then please allow me...to lean on you.
trans: 那么请允许我……依靠在你身上。

Original: Vanille:Of course! No matter how big or small, don't hold it back from us!
Dialogue: Of course! No matter how big or small, don't hold it back from us!

Original: Balthier:Different countries, different backgrounds... Obstinancy will only get you so far with this diverse lot.
Dialogue: Different countries, different backgrounds... Obstinancy will only get you so far with this diverse lot.
trans: 不同的国家，不同的背景……固执只会让你在这个多元化的群体中走得更远。

Original: Mog:Just a little more to the Torsion, kupo! Let's go, go, go, kupo!
Dialogue: Just a little more to the Torsion, kupo! Let's go, go, go, kupo!

Original: Ashe:Once every Torsion is closed, we can return home...
Dialogue: Once every Torsion is closed, we can return home...
trans: 一旦每个 Torsion 都关闭，我们就可以回家了……

Original: Ashe:Let us continue on!
Dialogue: Let us continue on!

Original: Galuf:...Ashe, why is it you are in such a hurry to get home?
Dialogue: ...Ashe, why is it you are in such a hurry to get home?

Original: Ashe:...As I mentioned before, I am the Princess of Dalmasca.
Dialogue: ...As I mentioned before, I am the Princess of Dalmasca.
trans: ……如前所述，我是达尔马斯卡的公主。

Original: Ashe:I lead the resistance forces to counter that threat.
Dialogue: I lead the resistance forces to counter that threat.
trans: 我带领抵抗力量对抗这种威胁。

Original: Vaan:I was surprised when I first saw the princess fighting, sword in hand.
Dialogue: I was surprised when I first saw the princess fighting, sword in hand.
trans: 当我第一次看到公主手持剑战斗时，我感到很惊讶。

Original: Firion:A princess fighting against imperial tyranny... I can respect that.
Dialogue: A princess fighting against imperial tyranny... I can respect that.
trans: 反抗帝国暴政的公主……我可以尊重。

Original: Ashe:I simply desire our liberty... For that, I need power.
Dialogue: I simply desire our liberty... For that, I need power.
trans: 我只是渴望我们的自由……为此，我需要力量。

Original: Firion:I understand completely. We'll do everything we can for you!
Dialogue: I understand completely. We'll do everything we can for you!

Original: Galuf:Just...take care not to lose yourself in your quest for power.
Dialogue: Just...take care not to lose yourself in your quest for power.
trans: 只是……注意不要在追求权力的过程中迷失自我。

Original: Galuf:No matter how powerful you become, you cannot change the past.
Dialogue: No matter how powerful you become, you cannot change the past.
trans: 无论你变得多么强大，你都无法改变过去。

Original: Galuf:...We're fighting for the happiness of those dear to us who are with us now. You musn't forget that.
Dialogue: ...We're fighting for the happiness of those dear to us who are with us now. You musn't forget that.
trans: ......我们正在为现在和我们在一起的那些亲爱的人的幸福而战。

Original: Ashe:...I understand that. Even still, I!
Dialogue: ...I understand that. Even still, I—!

Original: Galuf:Ha ha ha! Forgive me! As you get on in years, the more everything you say starts to sound like a lecture.
Dialogue: Ha ha ha! Forgive me! As you get on in years, the more everything you say starts to sound like a lecture.

Original: Firion:In any event, Ashe needs to return to her world.
Dialogue: In any event, Ashe needs to return to her world.
trans: 无论如何，艾希需要回到她的世界。

Original: Firion:If there's anything we can do, just say the word!
Dialogue: If there's anything we can do, just say the word!
trans: 如果有什么我们可以做的，就说吧！

Original: Ashe:...Thank you.
Dialogue: ...Thank you.

Original: Vaan:Fighting for those dear to us who are with us now, huh...?
Dialogue: Fighting for those dear to us who are with us now, huh...?
trans: 为现在和我们在一起的我们亲爱的人而战，嗯……？

Original: Penelo:We have to give it our all and face forward.
Dialogue: We have to give it our all and face forward.
trans: 我们必须全力以赴，面向未来。

Original: Kefka:Ho ho ho... You're not getting away.
Dialogue: Ho ho ho... You're not getting away.

Original: Kefka:Not with me and my magitek army on your tail!
Dialogue: Not with me and my magitek army on your tail!
trans: 不是我和我的 magitek 军队尾随你！

Original: Kefka:Go go go!
Dialogue: Go go go!

Original: Kefka:A girlie with the power of an ancient race'd be a nice piece to control...
Dialogue: A girlie with the power of an ancient race'd be a nice piece to control...
trans: 一个拥有远古种族力量的少女将是一个很好的控制......

Original: Cloud:...Is that!?
Dialogue: ...Is that!?

Original: ???:Ah! Cloud! Tifa!
Dialogue: Ah! Cloud! Tifa!

Original: Tifa:Aerith! You're here!
Dialogue: Aerith! You're here!

Original: Aerith:Are you really the real Tifa?
Dialogue: Are you really the real Tifa?
trans: 你真的是真正的蒂法吗？

Original: Cloud:...So you ran into our manikins.
Dialogue: ...So you ran into our manikins.
trans: ...所以你遇到了我们的人体模型。

Original: Aerith:You call those dolls manikins, huh? They looked just like you...
Dialogue: You call those dolls manikins, huh? They looked just like you...
trans: 你把那些娃娃称为人体模型，是吧？

Original: Aerith:But not this time. It's the real you!
Dialogue: But not this time. It's the real you!

Original: Mog:A friend, kupo?
Dialogue: A friend, kupo?

Original: Cloud:A friend...from home.
Dialogue: A friend...from home.

Original: Aerith:I see. That's why I can't hear its voice.
Dialogue: I see. That's why I can't hear its voice.

Original: Tifa:It's a different planet, but this one has its own crisis right now.
Dialogue: It's a different planet, but this one has its own crisis right now.
trans: 这是一个不同的星球，但这个星球现在有自己的危机。

Original: Mog:We're fighting to stop this world from being devoured, kupo!
Dialogue: We're fighting to stop this world from being devoured, kupo!
trans: 我们正在为阻止这个世界被吞噬而战斗，库波！

Original: Tifa:You'll come with us, won't you?
Dialogue: You'll come with us, won't you?
trans: 你会和我们一起去，是吗？

Original: Aerith:Well, I'd love to say, "Of course!" but...
Dialogue: Well, I'd love to say, "Of course!" but...

Original: Cloud:...Is there something you're unsure of? If you want to know more, Mog can
Dialogue: ...Is there something you're unsure of? If you want to know more, Mog can—

Original: Aerith:It's not that...
Dialogue: It's not that...

Original: Kefka:I found yoo-hoo!
Dialogue: I found yoo-hoo!

Original: Aerith:Ack, he's here!
Dialogue: Ack, he's here!

Original: Kefka:Ack, I'm here! And I have no plans to share your powers with no stinkin' moogles.
Dialogue: Ack, I'm here! And I have no plans to share your powers with no stinkin' moogles.

Original: Aerith:I don't know what you're talking about! I don't have special powers!
Dialogue: I don't know what you're talking about! I don't have special powers!

Original: Kuja:The poor canary doesn't realize her own potential...
Dialogue: The poor canary doesn't realize her own potential...
trans: 可怜的金丝雀没有意识到自己的潜力……

Original: Cloud:These guys were after you!
Dialogue: These guys were after you!

Original: Mog:They're bad guys who want to destroy the world, kupo!
Dialogue: They're bad guys who want to destroy the world, kupo!
trans: 他们是想要毁灭世界的坏蛋，库波！

Original: Kuja:Who're the heroes and who're the villains is for the audience to decide.
Dialogue: Who're the heroes and who're the villains is for the audience to decide.
trans: 谁是英雄谁是恶棍，观众自己判断。

Original: Tifa:Last time I checked, heroes don't force women to come along with them.
Dialogue: Last time I checked, heroes don't force women to come along with them.
trans: 上次我检查过，英雄不会强迫女性与他们同行。

Original: Cloud:Stay away from Aerith.
Dialogue: Stay away from Aerith.

Original: Aerith:Thanks, you two! I'm not alone now!
Dialogue: Thanks, you two! I'm not alone now!

Original: Kuja:...And scene. How about calling it a day?
Dialogue: ...And scene. How about calling it a day?

Original: Kefka:Ho ho ho... ...Don't tell me what to do.
Dialogue: Ho ho ho... ...Don't tell me what to do.
trans: 呵呵呵……别告诉我该怎么做。

Original: Kuja:...Have it your way.
Dialogue: ...Have it your way.

Original: Kefka:I intend to! Hasta la pasta!
Dialogue: I intend to! Hasta la pasta!

Original: Cloud:Why were they after you?
Dialogue: Why were they after you?

Original: Aerith:And yet, I have this unpleasant feeling. A murmuring...
Dialogue: And yet, I have this unpleasant feeling. A murmuring...
trans: 然而，我有这种不愉快的感觉。

Original: Mog:...Can you tell where it's coming from, kupo?
Dialogue: ...Can you tell where it's coming from, kupo?

Original: Aerith:That forest... No, beyond it perhaps.
Dialogue: That forest... No, beyond it perhaps.
trans: 那片森林……不，也许在它之外。

Original: Mog:Where the Torsion is! You can sense Torsions, kupo!
Dialogue: Where the Torsion is! You can sense Torsions, kupo!

Original: Tifa:Great, come with us.
Dialogue: Great, come with us.

Original: Tifa:We're traveling around to close Torsions.
Dialogue: We're traveling around to close Torsions.
trans: 我们正在四处旅行以关闭 Torsions。

Original: Aerith:Is this why they were after me...?
Dialogue: Is this why they were after me...?
trans: 这就是他们追杀我的原因吗……？

Original: Terra:Kefka, that man who was after you, uses the Torsions to satisfy his...lust for destruction.
Dialogue: Kefka, that man who was after you, uses the Torsions to satisfy his...lust for destruction.
trans: Kefka，那个追杀你的人，使用 Torsions 来满足他……对毁灭的渴望。

Original: Terra:Even if the Torsions weren't eating away at the world, we cannot let him do what he wants.
Dialogue: Even if the Torsions weren't eating away at the world, we cannot let him do what he wants.
trans: 即使扭曲没有吞噬世界，我们也不能让他为所欲为。

Original: Aerith:...I understand. Count me in.
Dialogue: ...I understand. Count me in.

Original: Aerith:I want...to know more about this world.
Dialogue: I want...to know more about this world.
trans: 我想……更多地了解这个世界。

Original: Cloud:Good. It's safer with us.
Dialogue: Good. It's safer with us.

Original: Mog:Great to have you, kupo!
Dialogue: Great to have you, kupo!

Original: Aerith:What's this? Have I gone too far ahead on my poor, lonesome own?
Dialogue: What's this? Have I gone too far ahead on my poor, lonesome own?

Original: Aerith:...Haha. This should keep them out of trouble...I hope.
Dialogue: ...Haha. This should keep them out of trouble...I hope.

Original: Kuja:Decided to perform solo after all, have we?
Dialogue: Decided to perform solo after all, have we?
trans: 毕竟决定单独表演，是吗？

Original: Aerith:You again... I could say the same to you.
Dialogue: You again... I could say the same to you.
trans: 又是你……我可以对你说同样的话。

Original: Kuja:I've hated that clown from the beginning. I was only there because, yes...
Dialogue: I've hated that clown from the beginning. I was only there because, yes...
trans: 我从一开始就讨厌那个小丑。

Original: Kuja:It's your motives that intrigue me. An Ancient...was it?
Dialogue: It's your motives that intrigue me. An Ancient...was it?

Original: Kuja:Why do you accept your fate? You didn't choose to be born an Ancient.
Dialogue: Why do you accept your fate? You didn't choose to be born an Ancient.

Original: Aerith:Perhaps, but...
Dialogue: Perhaps, but...

Original: Aerith:There are some things only I can do... Maybe it's...if I can protect what's important to me, then I'll do them.
Dialogue: There are some things only I can do... Maybe it's...if I can protect what's important to me, then I'll do them.
trans: 有些事情只有我能做……也许是……如果我能保护对我来说重要的东西，那么我就会去做。

Original: Kuja:This is a miniature garden of the gods... Your fate also could be altered.
Dialogue: This is a miniature garden of the gods... Your fate also could be altered.
trans: 这是众神的微型花园……你的命运也可以改变。

Original: Aerith:I appreciate the offer. But I'd like to decide something as important as that by myself.
Dialogue: I appreciate the offer. But I'd like to decide something as important as that by myself.

Original: Kefka:I do declare, did you stay the little lady for me?
Dialogue: I do declare, did you stay the little lady for me?
trans: 我声明，你给我留小娘子了吗？

Original: Kuja:Spare me the indignity of sharing the stage with a buffoon the likes of you.
Dialogue: Spare me the indignity of sharing the stage with a buffoon the likes of you.
trans: 饶了我和像你这样的小丑同台的侮辱吧。

Original: Kuja:...Run. The path behind you is good enough for you to get away.
Dialogue: ...Run. The path behind you is good enough for you to get away.

Original: Aerith:You're helping me?
Dialogue: You're helping me?

Original: Kuja:I want to know the truth of this world... For what reason we have been put here.
Dialogue: I want to know the truth of this world... For what reason we have been put here.
trans: 我想知道这个世界的真相……我们是因为什么被放在这里的。

Original: Kuja:If you can sense the distortions, then perhaps...
Dialogue: If you can sense the distortions, then perhaps...
trans: 如果你能感觉到扭曲，那么也许……

Original: Kefka:Blargh! Ptoey! Boooring!
Dialogue: Blargh! Ptoey! Boooring!

Original: Kefka:If it's there for the using, use it and break it all. That's enough for me!
Dialogue: If it's there for the using, use it and break it all. That's enough for me!
trans: 如果它在那里供使用，请使用它并打破它。

Original: Hope:Aerith, there you are!
Dialogue: Aerith, there you are!

Original: Mog:Kupo! She's being attacked!
Dialogue: Kupo! She's being attacked!

Original: Warrior of Light:After her power...?
Dialogue: After her power...?

Original: Kuja:Ay me... This is my exit. If it's a sword dance you want, do it with the clown.
Dialogue: Ay me... This is my exit. If it's a sword dance you want, do it with the clown.
trans: Ay me... 这是我的出口。

Original: Kefka:You're quite the pests, you know that? Let's put you out of my misery!
Dialogue: You're quite the pests, you know that? Let's put you out of my misery!

Original: Kefka:Harrumph! I don't need your power anyway!
Dialogue: Harrumph! I don't need your power anyway!

Original: Zidane:Hold it, Kuja! Why didn't you help Kefka?
Dialogue: Hold it, Kuja! Why didn't you help Kefka?

Original: Aerith:He tried to help me escape.
Dialogue: He tried to help me escape.

Original: Kuja:...I had my own reasons to speak with the girl, and nothing more.
Dialogue: ...I had my own reasons to speak with the girl, and nothing more.
trans: ......我有自己的理由和那个女孩说话，仅此而已。

Original: Zidane:You... What is it you're after...?
Dialogue: You... What is it you're after...?

Original: Kuja:I hate cozy theatrics. I am done here.
Dialogue: I hate cozy theatrics. I am done here.

Original: Mog:Kupo... And there he goes.
Dialogue: Kupo... And there he goes.

Original: Mog:Aerith, are you alright, kupo? It's dangerous to go off on your own.
Dialogue: Aerith, are you alright, kupo? It's dangerous to go off on your own.

Original: Aerith:I'm okay. I just...got a little lost.
Dialogue: I'm okay. I just...got a little lost.

Original: Zidane:"A little lost" wouldn't have ended you up all the way out here.
Dialogue: "A little lost" wouldn't have ended you up all the way out here.
trans: “有点迷路”不会让你一路走到这里。

Original: Zidane:Are you sure you weren't trying to keep us from getting mixed up in your problems?
Dialogue: Are you sure you weren't trying to keep us from getting mixed up in your problems?
trans: 你确定你不是想阻止我们卷入你的问题吗？

Original: Zidane:Have a little more faith in us. Or are we that useless?
Dialogue: Have a little more faith in us. Or are we that useless?

Original: Tifa:Yeah, whatever it is, we can get through it together.
Dialogue: Yeah, whatever it is, we can get through it together.
trans: 是的，不管是什么，我们都能一起度过难关。

Original: Aerith:You're right. I'm sorry. ...Thank you.
Dialogue: You're right. I'm sorry. ...Thank you.

Original: Mog:Alright, let's regroup and head for the Torsion, kupo!
Dialogue: Alright, let's regroup and head for the Torsion, kupo!
trans: 好吧，让我们重整旗鼓，前往扭曲之地，库波！

Original: Laguna:H-hey, Aerith... You have a minute...?
Dialogue: H-hey, Aerith... You have a minute...?

Original: Aerith:Laguna? What is it? You look troubled.
Dialogue: Laguna? What is it? You look troubled.

Original: Laguna:So you can hear what the planet is saying because you're an..."Ancient," was it?
Dialogue: So you can hear what the planet is saying because you're an..."Ancient," was it?
trans: 所以你可以听到这个星球在说什么，因为你是一个……“古代人”，是吗？

Original: Aerith:That's right.
Dialogue: That's right.

Original: Laguna:Well, you see, actually, back in my world, I could also hear voices.
Dialogue: Well, you see, actually, back in my world, I could also hear voices.
trans: 好吧，你看，实际上，在我的世界里，我也能听到声音。

Original: Laguna:I always thought they were faeries, but then it hit me, "You know, what if I'm an Ancient, too?"
Dialogue: I always thought they were faeries, but then it hit me, "You know, what if I'm an Ancient, too?"
trans: 我一直以为他们是仙女，但后来我突然想到，“你知道吗，如果我也是古代人呢？”

Original: Cater:Hmmm. Is that possible, even though you're from different worlds?
Dialogue: Hmmm. Is that possible, even though you're from different worlds?

Original: Hope:A special race in his own world...? Laguna doesn't look very special, though...
Dialogue: A special race in his own world...? Laguna doesn't look very special, though...

Original: Yuri:What did you hear, anyway?
Dialogue: What did you hear, anyway?
trans: 无论如何，你听到了什么？

Original: Laguna:Stuff like, "What the...!" and, "Whatever." Came through loud and clear!
Dialogue: Stuff like, "What the...!" and, "Whatever." Came through loud and clear!

Original: Aerith:...Laguna, that's probably not the planet.
Dialogue: ...Laguna, that's probably not the planet.

Original: Aerith:The planet sounds like so many people talking all at one, so I can't clearly understand it.
Dialogue: The planet sounds like so many people talking all at one, so I can't clearly understand it.
trans: 这个星球听起来像是很多人一起在说话，所以我听不太清楚。

Original: Laguna:Huh. Really?
Dialogue: Huh. Really?

Original: Hope:I don't know how it works, but it's probably different from what Aerith experiences.
Dialogue: I don't know how it works, but it's probably different from what Aerith experiences.
trans: 我不知道它是如何工作的，但它可能与 Aerith 的经历不同。

Original: Cater:Sure you weren't just hearing things? You're probably tired.
Dialogue: Sure you weren't just hearing things? You're probably tired.

Original: Laguna:H-hold on! Don't jump to conclusions! There weren't just voices!
Dialogue: H-hold on! Don't jump to conclusions! There weren't just voices!

Original: Yuri:What else?
Dialogue: What else?

Original: Laguna:The faeries'd power me up a bit whenever they're around! Like I'm better than my usual self!
Dialogue: The faeries'd power me up a bit whenever they're around! Like I'm better than my usual self!
trans: 只要有精灵在身边，它们就会让我精力充沛！

Original: Cater:Aerith? That ever happen to you?
Dialogue: Aerith? That ever happen to you?

Original: Laguna:I see... Hrmmm, the mysteries just keep getting deeper...
Dialogue: I see... Hrmmm, the mysteries just keep getting deeper...
trans: 我明白了……嗯嗯，谜团越来越深了……

Original: Aerith:I don't know how your world works, Laguna.
Dialogue: I don't know how your world works, Laguna.
trans: 我不知道你的世界是怎么运作的，拉古纳。

Original: Aerith:But maybe someone was doing something with you in mind to power you up.
Dialogue: But maybe someone was doing something with you in mind to power you up.
trans: 但也许有人在做某事时想着你，让你振作起来。

Original: Laguna:...I haven't heard the faeries since coming to this world, so if that's the case...
Dialogue: ...I haven't heard the faeries since coming to this world, so if that's the case...
trans: ……自从来到这个世界之后就没听过妖精的声音，那样的话……

Original: Laguna:I must be too far for their feelings to reach me. Aw, man, how sad is that?
Dialogue: I must be too far for their feelings to reach me. Aw, man, how sad is that?
trans: 我一定是太远了，他们的感情无法触及我。

Original: Aerith:Don't worry. Even if they're not here, I'm sure they're waiting for you to come home.
Dialogue: Don't worry. Even if they're not here, I'm sure they're waiting for you to come home.

Original: Aerith:I hope you can report back soon. Let's make sure you have lots of good stories to tell the faeries.
Dialogue: I hope you can report back soon. Let's make sure you have lots of good stories to tell the faeries.
trans: 我希望你能尽快回来报告。

Original: Laguna:Aerith...! How sweet can you get!
Dialogue: Aerith...! How sweet can you get!

Original: Yuri:I wonder if interference from someone's consciousness might be the cause.
Dialogue: I wonder if interference from someone's consciousness might be the cause.
trans: 我想知道是否有人的意识干扰可能是原因。

Original: Hope:We're from different worlds, so there's no way really for us to know.
Dialogue: We're from different worlds, so there's no way really for us to know.
trans: 我们来自不同的世界，所以我们无法真正了解。

Original: Cater:Yeah, but it's Laguna. He was probably just dreaming on his feet.
Dialogue: Yeah, but it's Laguna. He was probably just dreaming on his feet.

Original: Laguna:H-hey! Whaddaya take me for? You could learn a thing or two from Aerith!
Dialogue: H-hey! Whaddaya take me for? You could learn a thing or two from Aerith!

Original: Warrior of Light:This Torsion... Something is different from usual.
Dialogue: This Torsion... Something is different from usual.
trans: 这个扭力……和往常有些不一样。

Original: Cloud:Could that be because of what you sensed?
Dialogue: Could that be because of what you sensed?
trans: 会不会是因为你的感应？

Original: Aerith:I don't know. But the voice sounds so sad.
Dialogue: I don't know. But the voice sounds so sad.

Original: Vaan:We'd better hurry and close it, ya think?
Dialogue: We'd better hurry and close it, ya think?
trans: 我们最好快点关闭它，你觉得呢？

Original: Warrior of Light:...It would appear that way.
Dialogue: ...It would appear that way.

Original: Rem:Will we be able to close it the same way as the others?
Dialogue: Will we be able to close it the same way as the others?
trans: 我们能像其他人一样关闭它吗？

Original: Mog:The same as always! Get ready for a fight, kupo!
Dialogue: The same as always! Get ready for a fight, kupo!

Original: Aerith:Ah! ...It's gone.
Dialogue: Ah! ...It's gone.

Original: Aerith:You've been doing this the whole time?
Dialogue: You've been doing this the whole time?

Original: Cloud:...This time was especially rough.
Dialogue: ...This time was especially rough.

Original: Vincent:Are even greater Torsions appearing...without us even realizing it?
Dialogue: Are even greater Torsions appearing...without us even realizing it?
trans: 是否出现了更大的扭曲……而我们甚至没有意识到？

Original: Mog:If so, we're gonna need more and more friends, kupo!
Dialogue: If so, we're gonna need more and more friends, kupo!
trans: 如果是这样，我们将需要越来越多的朋友，kupo！

Original: Terra:Aerith, you'll stay with us, right?
Dialogue: Aerith, you'll stay with us, right?
trans: Aerith，你会和我们在一起，对吧？

Original: Aerith:I will. I want to learn more about everyone else, too.
Dialogue: I will. I want to learn more about everyone else, too.

Original: Vincent:Furthermore...why Aerith is here, and repercussions that will havewhat are the gods playing at...?
Dialogue: Furthermore...why Aerith is here, and repercussions that will have—what are the gods playing at...?
trans: 此外……为什么 Aerith 在这里，以及将会产生的影响——众神在玩什么……？

Original: Cloud:What's the matter?
Dialogue: What's the matter?

Original: Vincent:Nothing...but... In this world...I might even be able to atone for my sins...
Dialogue: Nothing...but... In this world...I might even be able to atone for my sins...
trans: 没什么……但是……在这个世界上……我什至可以赎罪……

Original: Yuffie:Mr. Broody-Face is at it again.
Dialogue: Mr. Broody-Face is at it again.

Original: Yuffie:C'mon, our work here is done; let's blow this pop stand!
Dialogue: C'mon, our work here is done; let's blow this pop stand!
trans: 来吧，我们这里的工作完成了；

Original: Mog:Everyone back to the airship and we'll resume our journey, kupo!
Dialogue: Everyone back to the airship and we'll resume our journey, kupo!
trans: 大家回到飞艇，我们继续我们的旅程，库波！

Original: Aerith:Huh? This feeling...
Dialogue: Huh? This feeling...

Original: Sephiroth:Heh heh heh... Look who's here...
Dialogue: Heh heh heh... Look who's here...

Original: Sephiroth:I have no more interest in you... But...
Dialogue: I have no more interest in you... But...

Original: Sephiroth:Rousing Cloud's memories make a worthwhile diversion.
Dialogue: Rousing Cloud's memories make a worthwhile diversion.
trans: 振云的记忆是一种值得消遣的消遣。

Original: Aerith:...You never change.
Dialogue: ...You never change.

Original: Aerith:I still don't know why I'm here...
Dialogue: I still don't know why I'm here...
trans: 我仍然不知道我为什么在这里...

Original: Aerith:But... I will protect the people important to me!
Dialogue: But... I will protect the people important to me!
trans: 但是……我会保护对我重要的人！

Original: Sephiroth:Hmph... You really don't know...? Or are you just playing dumb?
Dialogue: Hmph... You really don't know...? Or are you just playing dumb?

Original: Sephiroth:It won't be long before you know the reason you're here...and what will come from it...
Dialogue: It won't be long before you know the reason you're here...and what will come from it...
trans: 用不了多久你就会知道你在这里的原因……以及它会带来什么……

Original: Aerith:But...what is it I need to do, what is it I can do on this planet...?
Dialogue: But...what is it I need to do, what is it I can do on this planet...?
trans: 但是……我需要做什么，我能在这个星球上做什么……？

Original: Aerith:I have so many questions, I guess I can't help but get lost in thought like you-know-who.
Dialogue: I have so many questions, I guess I can't help but get lost in thought like you-know-who.
trans: 我有很多问题，我想我不禁像你认识的人一样陷入沉思。

Original: Aerith:I was lucky enough to find the others, so for now, I should talk it out with them.
Dialogue: I was lucky enough to find the others, so for now, I should talk it out with them.
trans: 我很幸运找到了其他人，所以现在，我应该和他们谈谈。

Original: Sazh:Huh? Is someone waving at us over there?
Dialogue: Huh? Is someone waving at us over there?

Original: Firion:Maybe she knows one of us? She doesn't look hostile; let's go see.
Dialogue: Maybe she knows one of us? She doesn't look hostile; let's go see.
trans: 也许她认识我们中的一个？

Original: Cloud:And you are?
Dialogue: And you are?

Original: Lion:I'm Lion. An adventurer, just like yourselves.
Dialogue: I'm Lion. An adventurer, just like yourselves.

Original: Squall:Lion? That's your name?
Dialogue: Lion? That's your name?

Original: Lion:It sure is. And a pretty good one, if I do say so myself.
Dialogue: It sure is. And a pretty good one, if I do say so myself.

Original: Squall:...Fair enough. What were you doing out here?
Dialogue: ...Fair enough. What were you doing out here?

Original: Lion:I got completely lost while looking for the rest of my party...
Dialogue: I got completely lost while looking for the rest of my party...
trans: 我在寻找我的其他人时完全迷路了......

Original: Lion:I've been in a real bind, what with all the groups of monsters wandering around here.
Dialogue: I've been in a real bind, what with all the groups of monsters wandering around here.
trans: 我真的陷入了困境，这里到处都是成群结队的怪物。

Original: Galuf:First lost and then surrounded by monsters... That is unfortunate.
Dialogue: First lost and then surrounded by monsters... That is unfortunate.
trans: 先是迷路，然后又被怪物包围……真是不幸。

Original: Lion:Hey, would you mind helping me thin them out some?
Dialogue: Hey, would you mind helping me thin them out some?
trans: 嘿，你介意帮我把它们稀释一些吗？

Original: Lion:Running into you here had to be fate.
Dialogue: Running into you here had to be fate.
trans: 在这里遇到你，一定是命中注定。

Original: Firion:Sure thing. We can't ignore someone who needs a hand.
Dialogue: Sure thing. We can't ignore someone who needs a hand.

Original: Cloud:Our agendas match: we were here to fight monsters, anyway.
Dialogue: Our agendas match we were here to fight monsters, anyway.
trans: 无论如何，我们的议程与我们来这里与怪物战斗相符。

Original: Lion:Thanks. You'll be a big help.
Dialogue: Thanks. You'll be a big help.

Original: Lion:I'll check things out over there. We'll meet up later.
Dialogue: I'll check things out over there. We'll meet up later.

Original: Sazh:You got it! Be careful!
Dialogue: You got it! Be careful!

Original: Lion:Ha ha, you too!
Dialogue: Ha ha, you too!

Original: Layle:Howdy, Lion. What's the word?
Dialogue: Howdy, Lion. What's the word?

Original: Lion:Terrific. A lot fewer monsters around, thanks to you guys.
Dialogue: Terrific. A lot fewer monsters around, thanks to you guys.

Original: Steiner:Hear, hear! A horde of beasts is nothing in the face of our combined might!
Dialogue: Hear, hear! A horde of beasts is nothing in the face of our combined might!

Original: Lion:Haha, it must be nice to have such a strong party.
Dialogue: Haha, it must be nice to have such a strong party.
trans: 哈哈，有这么强大的派对一定很不错。

Original: Lion:That being said, your equipment and armor are all quite different. How did you group up?
Dialogue: That being said, your equipment and armor are all quite different. How did you group up?
trans: 话虽这么说，你的装备和盔甲都大不相同。

Original: Mog:Kupo! I can answer that for you, kupo!
Dialogue: Kupo! I can answer that for you, kupo!

Original: King:You said you're looking for your party. Can you describe them?
Dialogue: You said you're looking for your party. Can you describe them?

Original: King:None for me. Anyone else?
Dialogue: None for me. Anyone else?

Original: Shantotto:If in Vana'diel you need a pirate, the caves of Norg is where you'll find it.
