Original: Warrior of Light:Does he intend to close it by himself?
Dialogue: Does he intend to close it by himself?

Original: Edge:He'll be in a bind if he is! Let's go give him a hand!
Dialogue: He'll be in a bind if he is! Let's go give him a hand!
trans: 如果他是，他会陷入困境！

Original: Cecil:I know we ought to. But Kain...
Dialogue: I know we ought to. But Kain...
trans: 我知道我们应该这样做。

Original: Yang:He broke off relations with Lord Cecil to serve under avillain. Myhomeland, too, was...by his forces...
Dialogue: He broke off relations with Lord Cecil to serve under a villain. My homeland, too, was...by his forces...
trans: 他断绝了与塞西尔勋爵的关系，为一个恶棍服务。

Original: Warrior of Light:He appeared to be concerned for your wellbeing, though.
Dialogue: He appeared to be concerned for your wellbeing, though.
trans: 不过，他似乎很关心你的健康。

Original: Warrior of Light:That you had lost something...
Dialogue: That you had lost something...

Original: Cecil:You lost some of your memories when you came here. It is to that he must have been referring.
Dialogue: You lost some of your memories when you came here. It is to that he must have been referring.
trans: 当你来到这里时，你失去了一些记忆。

Original: Edge:Come to think of it, he knew my name.
Dialogue: Come to think of it, he knew my name.
trans: 想想看，他知道我的名字。

Original: Edge:I don't know any dragoons... Huh? Or...do I...?
Dialogue: I don't know any dragoons... Huh? Or...do I...?
trans: 我不认识任何龙骑兵……嗯？

Original: Yang:Is there something we may have forgotten about Lord Kain and ourselves...?
Dialogue: Is there something we may have forgotten about Lord Kain and ourselves...?
trans: 关于凯恩勋爵和我们自己，有没有什么我们可能忘记的……？

Original: Cecil:Let us enter this Torsion as well. If Kain knows anything...it would be in our interest to know as well.
Dialogue: Let us enter this Torsion as well. If Kain knows anything...it would be in our interest to know as well.
trans: 让我们也输入这个 Torsion。

Original: Edge:Amen! This is gonna bug me if we don't clear things up!
Dialogue: Amen! This is gonna bug me if we don't clear things up!

Original: Cecil:Mog...there is something I would ask you.
Dialogue: Mog...there is something I would ask you.

Original: Cecil:The light... Did you sense it in him?
Dialogue: The light... Did you sense it in him?
trans: 光……你在他身上感觉到了吗？

Original: Mog:If he's planning to use his powers properly, then it's the light, kupo!
Dialogue: If he's planning to use his powers properly, then it's the light, kupo!
trans: 如果他打算正确使用他的力量，那就是光，kupo！

Original: Cecil:...I see.
Dialogue: ...I see.

Original: Cecil:Kain!? Why!?
Dialogue: Kain!? Why!?

Original: Kain:...That should be obvious. Draw your blade, Cecil!
Dialogue: ...That should be obvious. Draw your blade, Cecil!

Original: Bartz:The Torsion closed! Wait, that means...!
Dialogue: The Torsion closed! Wait, that means...!

Original: Kain:I created it. And by defeating me, you closed it.
Dialogue: I created it. And by defeating me, you closed it.

Original: Cecil:Why, Kain! Why would you threaten the world this way!
Dialogue: Why, Kain! Why would you threaten the world this way!

Original: Cecil:Unless... Is someone manipulating you!?
Dialogue: Unless... Is someone manipulating you!?

Original: Squall:...This isn't like you.
Dialogue: ...This isn't like you.

Original: Squall:Would you mind speaking so we can follow along, too?
Dialogue: Would you mind speaking so we can follow along, too?
trans: 你介意说话，这样我们也可以跟进吗？

Original: Onion Knight:Tell us what's going on. Wasn't there something you wanted to know?
Dialogue: Tell us what's going on. Wasn't there something you wanted to know?

Original: Kain:...That moogle is not here.
Dialogue: ...That moogle is not here.

Original: Kain:Have you noticed while battling in this world a feeling that your strength is being drawn out of you?
Dialogue: Have you noticed while battling in this world a feeling that your strength is being drawn out of you?
trans: 在这个世界上战斗的时候，你有没有注意到一种感觉，你的力量正在从你身上抽走？

Original: King:Yeah, we have wondered about that.
Dialogue: Yeah, we have wondered about that.
trans: 是的，我们对此感到疑惑。

Original: King:It seems most obvious when fighting inside a Torsion.
Dialogue: It seems most obvious when fighting inside a Torsion.
trans: 在 Torsion 内战斗时，这似乎最为明显。

Original: Kain:How about when fighting against me, a warrior from another world like yourselves?
Dialogue: How about when fighting against me, a warrior from another world like yourselves?
trans: 和你们这些来自异世界的战士对战时如何？

Original: Squall:It was more pronounced than going up against manikins or monsters...maybe.
Dialogue: It was more pronounced than going up against manikins or monsters...maybe.
trans: 这比对抗人体模型或怪物更明显……也许吧。

Original: Bartz:Ah! Come to think of it, it might've felt that way whenever we fight those other guys, too!
Dialogue: Ah! Come to think of it, it might've felt that way whenever we fight those other guys, too!

Original: Onion Knight:So you picked a fight with us to figure that out.
Dialogue: So you picked a fight with us to figure that out.
trans: 所以你选择和我们打架来解决这个问题。

Original: Kain:I don't have all the answers.
Dialogue: I don't have all the answers.

Original: Kain:Only...I've been told what's draining your strength is that moogle.
Dialogue: Only...I've been told what's draining your strength is that moogle.
trans: 只是……有人告诉我，消耗你体力的是那只莫古利。

Original: Cecil:Who told you that?
Dialogue: Who told you that?

Original: Kain:You aren't ready to know.
Dialogue: You aren't ready to know.

Original: Cecil:Because I've...forgotten something important?
Dialogue: Because I've...forgotten something important?
trans: 因为我……忘记了什么重要的事情？

Original: Cecil:Kain... Please tell me. I... What have I lost?
Dialogue: Kain... Please tell me. I... What have I lost?

Original: Kain:Something meaningless if you can't remember on your own.
Dialogue: Something meaningless if you can't remember on your own.
trans: 如果您不能自己记住，那将毫无意义。

Original: Squall:So what now? Going back to whoever is feeding you info?
Dialogue: So what now? Going back to whoever is feeding you info?

Original: Kain:That was my plan...
Dialogue: That was my plan...

Original: Bartz:And you're just gonna leave your friend worried and confused?
Dialogue: And you're just gonna leave your friend worried and confused?
trans: 你会让你的朋友担心和困惑吗？

Original: Kain:He's the one who does not trust me... But you are right, warrior from another world.
Dialogue: He's the one who does not trust me... But you are right, warrior from another world.
trans: 他是不信任我的人……但是你是对的，来自另一个世界的战士。

Original: Kain:I cannot leave Cecil in this state. I will join you on your journey.
Dialogue: I cannot leave Cecil in this state. I will join you on your journey.
trans: 我不能让塞西尔处于这种状态。

Original: Onion Knight:That would be a big help. Let's share what we know.
Dialogue: That would be a big help. Let's share what we know.
trans: 那将是一个很大的帮助。

Original: Cecil:Kain... Can I trust you...?
Dialogue: Kain... Can I trust you...?

Original: Kain:Call me a traitor if you like. ...I will bring the light back to my friend.
Dialogue: Call me a traitor if you like. ...I will bring the light back to my friend.
trans: 如果你愿意，可以叫我叛徒。

Original: Zell:Yo, Kain! How do you train to jump like that?
Dialogue: Yo, Kain! How do you train to jump like that?

Original: Zell:You can jump really high, right? I wanna jump like you, too!
Dialogue: You can jump really high, right? I wanna jump like you, too!
trans: 你真的可以跳得很高，对吧？

Original: Kain:Many years of dragoon training. It's not something you'll learn in a day.
Dialogue: Many years of dragoon training. It's not something you'll learn in a day.

Original: Bartz:Huh, you don't say.
Dialogue: Huh, you don't say.

Original: Bartz:Inour world, the crystals can give us all sorts ofjobser...powers.
Dialogue: In our world, the crystals can give us all sorts of jobs—er...powers.
trans: 在我们的世界中，水晶可以为我们提供各种工作——呃……力量。

Original: Vaan:Hmmm... I know we had all sorts in our world, but did we have dragoons?
Dialogue: Hmmm... I know we had all sorts in our world, but did we have dragoons?
trans: 嗯……我知道我们世界上有各种各样的人，但我们有龙骑兵吗？

Original: Rem:Even if we use the same word for it, a dragoon can be completely different from world to world, it seems.
Dialogue: Even if we use the same word for it, a dragoon can be completely different from world to world, it seems.
trans: 即使我们用同一个词来形容它，似乎每个世界的龙骑兵都可能完全不同。

Original: Rem:InOrience, there was akingdomwhose soldiers fought while mounted on dragons.
Dialogue: In Orience, there was a kingdom whose soldiers fought while mounted on dragons.
trans: 在东方，有一个王国，其士兵骑龙作战。

Original: Zell:Get out! Oh, man, that's so rad!
Dialogue: Get out! Oh, man, that's so rad!

Original: Rem:Our countries were at war, though, so they were our enemy...
Dialogue: Our countries were at war, though, so they were our enemy...
trans: 不过，我们的国家处于战争状态，所以他们是我们的敌人……

Original: Vaan:That sucks.
Dialogue: That sucks.

Original: Kain:A lively party... ...Cecil?
Dialogue: A lively party... ...Cecil?
trans: 热闹的派对…… 塞西尔？

Original: Cecil:...Our friends from other worlds have been able to accept Kain without prejudice.
Dialogue: ...Our friends from other worlds have been able to accept Kain without prejudice.
trans: ...我们来自其他世界的朋友能够毫无偏见地接受凯恩。

Original: Cecil:And yet I...cannot even trust my dear friend...
Dialogue: And yet I...cannot even trust my dear friend...
trans: 然而我……甚至不能相信我亲爱的朋友……

Original: Kain:...That's not your fault.
Dialogue: ...That's not your fault.

Original: Cecil:Kain...I... I am sorry...
Dialogue: Kain...I... I am sorry...

Original: Kain:It's fine. In the memories you have now, I am still a traitor.
Dialogue: It's fine. In the memories you have now, I am still a traitor.

Original: Cecil:Is there no way you will tell me what I've forgotten?
Dialogue: Is there no way you will tell me what I've forgotten?
trans: 你就没有办法告诉我我忘记了什么吗？

Original: Kain:No. If you cannot reclaim it yourself, your hallowed light will have no brilliance to it.
Dialogue: No. If you cannot reclaim it yourself, your hallowed light will have no brilliance to it.
trans: 不行，如果你不能自己收回，你的圣光就没有光彩。

Original: Kain:And it does nothing to change the fact that I did betray you.
Dialogue: And it does nothing to change the fact that I did betray you.
trans: 也改变不了我背叛你的事实。

Original: Vaan:Are you talking about something serious?
Dialogue: Are you talking about something serious?
trans: 你在谈论严肃的事情吗？

Original: Zell:Hey, we know we can count on him! Don't sweat the small stuff!
Dialogue: Hey, we know we can count on him! Don't sweat the small stuff!
trans: 嘿，我们知道我们可以指望他！

Original: Bartz:You alright, Cecil?
Dialogue: You alright, Cecil?

Original: Cecil:Yes... Sorry to worry you. Let us be on our way.
Dialogue: Yes... Sorry to worry you. Let us be on our way.
trans: 是的……对不起，让你担心了。

Original: Kain:...What do you mean?
Dialogue: ...What do you mean?

Original: Kain:TheDragoons of Baronstood shoulder to shoulder with theRed Wings, our air force.
Dialogue: The Dragoons of Baron stood shoulder to shoulder with the Red Wings, our air force.
trans: 男爵的龙骑兵与我们的空军红翼并肩作战。

Original: Kain:Though in recent years perhaps, the king's favor fell more so upon the Red Wings.
Dialogue: Though in recent years perhaps, the king's favor fell more so upon the Red Wings.
trans: 尽管近年来，国王的宠爱更多地落在了红翼军团身上。

Original: Firion:What made you decide to become a dragoon?
Dialogue: What made you decide to become a dragoon?
trans: 是什么让你决定成为一名龙骑兵？

Original: Kain:Heh... You are a curious lot. What is the point in asking such a thing?
Dialogue: Heh... You are a curious lot. What is the point in asking such a thing?
trans: 呵呵……你真是个好奇的人。

Original: Vanille:Is it so weird to want to hear about a friend?
Dialogue: Is it so weird to want to hear about a friend?
trans: 想听听朋友的事有那么奇怪吗？

Original: Cloud:...It's just small talk.
Dialogue: ...It's just small talk.

Original: Firion:Forgive us if it's something you'd rather not share. I just wanted to know more about your world.
Dialogue: Forgive us if it's something you'd rather not share. I just wanted to know more about your world.
trans: 如果您不想分享，请原谅我们。

Original: Yuna:Everyone is interested since there's so much we don't know about each other.
Dialogue: Everyone is interested since there's so much we don't know about each other.
trans: 每个人都很感兴趣，因为我们对彼此不了解的东西太多了。

Original: Kain:...Is that so?
Dialogue: ...Is that so?

Original: Kain:I...chose the life of a dragoon out of pride.
Dialogue: I...chose the life of a dragoon out of pride.
trans: 我……出于骄傲选择了龙骑兵的生活。

Original: Vivi:Were you always with Mr. Cecil? You're best friends, right?
Dialogue: Were you always with Mr. Cecil? You're best friends, right?
trans: 你一直和塞西尔先生在一起吗？

Original: Kain:Yes... We grew up together.
Dialogue: Yes... We grew up together.

Original: Vanille:...Where could she be now? She just popped into my mind.
Dialogue: ...Where could she be now? She just popped into my mind.

Original: Vivi:I'm sure you'll see her again.
Dialogue: I'm sure you'll see her again.
trans: 我相信你会再次见到她。

Original: Firion:Though best friends, you and Cecil are having a hard time of it...
Dialogue: Though best friends, you and Cecil are having a hard time of it...
trans: 虽然是最好的朋友，但你和塞西尔过得很艰难……

Original: Cloud:It's the Torsions... They've taken something from all of us.
Dialogue: It's the Torsions... They've taken something from all of us.
trans: 是扭曲……他们从我们所有人身上夺走了一些东西。

Original: Yuna:...It's a little scary. I wonder what it is I don't remember.
Dialogue: ...It's a little scary. I wonder what it is I don't remember.

Original: Kain:You'll remember eventually as we journey on.
Dialogue: You'll remember eventually as we journey on.
trans: 当我们继续前进时，你最终会记得。

Original: Kain:The question is, what will you do when what was lost is reclaimed?
Dialogue: The question is, what will you do when what was lost is reclaimed?
trans: 问题是，当失去的东西被收回时，你会做什么？

Original: Cloud:Everyone from your world seems to have lost something pretty important.
Dialogue: Everyone from your world seems to have lost something pretty important.
trans: 你们世界的每个人似乎都失去了一些非常重要的东西。

Original: Kain:Indeed, but...
Dialogue: Indeed, but...

Original: Kain:With comrades such as all of you, I'm certain they'll regain it.
Dialogue: With comrades such as all of you, I'm certain they'll regain it.
trans: 有你们这样的同志，我相信他们会重新获得它。

Original: Firion:That's right... We're all in this together.
Dialogue: That's right... We're all in this together.

Original: Warrior of Light:You've grown more pensive since Kain joined us.
Dialogue: You've grown more pensive since Kain joined us.
trans: 自从 Kain 加入我们后，你变得更加沉思了。

Original: Zidane:Is it whatever you can't remember from back home that's eating you?
Dialogue: Is it whatever you can't remember from back home that's eating you?
trans: 是不是任何你不记得的东西正在吞噬你的家乡？

Original: Cecil:...Indeed. I've lost something important that for the life of me...I just can't figure out.
Dialogue: ...Indeed. I've lost something important that for the life of me...I just can't figure out.

Original: Cecil:But more painful than that is this cold-hearted distrust of my friend.
Dialogue: But more painful than that is this cold-hearted distrust of my friend.
trans: 但比这更痛苦的是对我朋友的这种冷酷的不信任。

Original: Cecil:Have I...let my heart become as black as this armor...?
Dialogue: Have I...let my heart become as black as this armor...?
trans: 我……让我的心变得像这件盔甲一样黑……？

Original: Zidane:For such a softie, you're way too hard on yourself.
Dialogue: For such a softie, you're way too hard on yourself.
trans: 对于这样一个软弱的人，你对自己太苛刻了。

Original: Warrior of Light:As am I. Everyone has missing memories to some extent or another... I know this thanks to him.
Dialogue: As am I. Everyone has missing memories to some extent or another... I know this thanks to him.
trans: 我也是。每个人都或多或少地失去了记忆……多亏了他，我才知道这一点。

Original: Zidane:I trust Kain. After all, he's sticking his neck out there for everyone, right?
Dialogue: I trust Kain. After all, he's sticking his neck out there for everyone, right?

Original: Warrior of Light:Agreed. His spear shows us the way.
Dialogue: Agreed. His spear shows us the way.

Original: Warrior of Light:The mystery to be solved is the Torsions...
Dialogue: The mystery to be solved is the Torsions...

Original: Cecil:If we can know them, we can know what it is we have lost, is it?
Dialogue: If we can know them, we can know what it is we have lost, is it?
trans: 如果我们能了解他们，我们就能知道我们失去了什么，不是吗？

Original: Cecil:You two are right. There is nothing to gain in fretting...
Dialogue: You two are right. There is nothing to gain in fretting...

Original: Zidane:The way I see it, Kain's defending you along with the rest of us.
Dialogue: The way I see it, Kain's defending you along with the rest of us.
trans: 在我看来，凯恩和我们其他人一起为你辩护。

Original: Zidane:Any doubts you have'll clear up eventually, hear?
Dialogue: Any doubts you have'll clear up eventually, hear?
trans: 你的任何疑虑最终都会得到澄清，听到了吗？

Original: Cecil:Thank you, Zidane. As I am, I will do what I can to believe that.
Dialogue: Thank you, Zidane. As I am, I will do what I can to believe that.

Original: Kain:Cecil and his companions were summoned by this Materia...
Dialogue: Cecil and his companions were summoned by this Materia...
trans: 塞西尔和他的伙伴们被这个魔晶石召唤了出来……

Original: Kain:Could the difference in our memories have to do with who summoned us?
Dialogue: Could the difference in our memories have to do with who summoned us?
trans: 我们记忆中的差异是否与召唤我们的人有关？

Original: Spiritus:Warrior burdened with the mark of treachery... Go, and protect my world!
Dialogue: Warrior burdened with the mark of treachery... Go, and protect my world!
trans: 背负背叛印记的战士……去吧，保护我的世界！

Original: Kain:As though I would fight for your sake.
Dialogue: As though I would fight for your sake.
trans: 就好像我会为了你而战一样。

Original: Kain:I fight...to protect my friend.
Dialogue: I fight...to protect my friend.
trans: 我战斗……是为了保护我的朋友。

Original: ???:Now, to Cecil's side with you...
Dialogue: Now, to Cecil's side with you...

Original: Kain:Heh... My thoughts exactly.
Dialogue: Heh... My thoughts exactly.

Original: ???:Ah! A hiding spot!
Dialogue: Ah! A hiding spot!

Original: ???:...Whew. Finally they're gone.
Dialogue: ...Whew. Finally they're gone.

Original: ???:How did I get myself into this...? I can't even tell where I am.
Dialogue: How did I get myself into this...? I can't even tell where I am.
trans: 我怎么让自己陷入这个......？

Original: ???:Nor can I take another step. I'm exhausted...
Dialogue: Nor can I take another step. I'm exhausted...

Original: ???:...I wish the others were here. Firion... Sniff...
Dialogue: ...I wish the others were here. Firion... Sniff...

Original: ???:Oh? What's this?
Dialogue: Oh? What's this?

Original: ???:Wild rose... Therebel army'spassword. A flower of hope that connects us.
Dialogue: Wild rose... The rebel army's password. A flower of hope that connects us.

Original: ???:Blooming even here, deep in these woods, unwithered and full of vigor.
Dialogue: Blooming even here, deep in these woods, unwithered and full of vigor.
trans: 甚至在这里，在这些树林深处，也盛开着，不凋谢，充满活力。

Original: ???:...No, I mustn't give up now.
Dialogue: ...No, I mustn't give up now.

Original: ???:If I continue running, I should find the others! This is no time to stop!
Dialogue: If I continue running, I should find the others! This is no time to stop!
trans: 如果我继续跑，我应该找到其他人！

Original: ???:...You have my thanks.
Dialogue: ...You have my thanks.

Original: Firion:This forest is crawling with monsters. Let's watch our step...
Dialogue: This forest is crawling with monsters. Let's watch our step...
trans: 这片森林里爬满了怪物。

Original: Yang:Hrm! Speak of the devil...!
Dialogue: Hrm! Speak of the devil...!

Original: Firion:Maria!? Is that you!?
Dialogue: Maria!? Is that you!?

Original: Maria:Ah! Firion, I finally found you!
Dialogue: Ah! Firion, I finally found you!

Original: Firion:I'm glad to see you safe and sound. Did you come through this forest on your own?
Dialogue: I'm glad to see you safe and sound. Did you come through this forest on your own?
trans: 很高兴看到你安然无恙。

Original: Maria:I thought I was a goner with all the fiends at my heels...
Dialogue: I thought I was a goner with all the fiends at my heels...
trans: 我以为我完蛋了，所有的恶魔都在我身后……

Original: Maria:But...at the moment I had nearly given up hope, I came across a patch of wild rose that reminded me of you and the others...
Dialogue: But...at the moment I had nearly given up hope, I came across a patch of wild rose that reminded me of you and the others...
trans: 但是……就在我快要绝望的时候，我看到了一片野玫瑰，让我想起了你和其他人……

Original: Maria:That gave me just what I needed to carry on.
Dialogue: That gave me just what I needed to carry on.
trans: 这给了我继续前进所需要的东西。

Original: Firion:I see. We owe it to the wild rose...our password in the rebellion.
Dialogue: I see. We owe it to the wild rose...our password in the rebellion.

Original: Galuf:Rebellion? Is she also one of your Returners?
Dialogue: Rebellion? Is she also one of your Returners?

Original: Shadow:...Her face is unknown to me. A new recruit?
Dialogue: ...Her face is unknown to me. A new recruit?

Original: Firion:There's a resistance back in our world, too. Maria and I both fought together for the rebel army.
Dialogue: There's a resistance back in our world, too. Maria and I both fought together for the rebel army.

Original: Maria:Returners? Back in our world?
Dialogue: Returners? Back in our world?

Original: Layle:How about you fill her in, Firion?
Dialogue: How about you fill her in, Firion?
trans: 菲里奥，你帮她填个坑怎么样？

Original: Firion:Maria, try not to panic, but the world we're in now...
Dialogue: Maria, try not to panic, but the world we're in now...
trans: 玛丽亚，别惊慌，但我们现在所处的世界……

Original: Maria:...So it's the fault of these Torsions that we've all been torn from our homes.
Dialogue: ...So it's the fault of these Torsions that we've all been torn from our homes.
trans: ......因此，正是这些扭曲的错，我们都被从我们的家园中撕裂了。

Original: Layle:We're all in the same boat here. Summoned by a "god" of some sort to fight for the "sake of the world."
Dialogue: We're all in the same boat here. Summoned by a "god" of some sort to fight for the "sake of the world."

Original: Yang:If we do not defend this world, our home worlds are also at risk of being consumed... In other words, we also fight to protect our own worlds...
Dialogue: If we do not defend this world, our home worlds are also at risk of being consumed... In other words, we also fight to protect our own worlds...
trans: 如果我们不保卫这个世界，我们的家园世界也有被吞噬的危险……换句话说，我们也在为保护我们自己的世界而战……

Original: Yang:Or that is what Lord Mog has professed...
Dialogue: Or that is what Lord Mog has professed...
trans: 或者这就是莫格勋爵所宣称的……

Original: Shadow:With no evidence to back up the claim.
Dialogue: With no evidence to back up the claim.

Original: Galuf:Moreover, it's not only the villains who can create Torsions... We're up to our necks in mysteries.
Dialogue: Moreover, it's not only the villains who can create Torsions... We're up to our necks in mysteries.
trans: 此外，不仅是恶棍可以制造扭曲……我们都在神秘中挣扎。

Original: Firion:Did you happen to feel as though your strength was being drawn out of you when you passed through the Torsion or while battling monsters?
Dialogue: Did you happen to feel as though your strength was being drawn out of you when you passed through the Torsion or while battling monsters?
trans: 当你穿过扭转或与怪物战斗时，你是否碰巧感觉到你的力量正在从你身上抽走？

Original: Maria:Come to think of it, my legs were trembling...but I had assumed it was from fear and exhaustion...
Dialogue: Come to think of it, my legs were trembling...but I had assumed it was from fear and exhaustion...
trans: 想想看，我的腿在颤抖……但我以为是因为恐惧和疲惫……

Original: Shadow:If only it were just that.
Dialogue: If only it were just that.

Original: Layle:My employer, the Returners, is the group trying to get to the bottom of why we're here and what these gods are up to.
Dialogue: My employer, the Returners, is the group trying to get to the bottom of why we're here and what these gods are up to.
trans: 我的雇主，回归者，是一群试图弄清我们为什么在这里以及这些神在做什么的团体。

Original: Maria:Leave it to Firion to join the rebellion in a completely different world.
Dialogue: Leave it to Firion to join the rebellion in a completely different world.
trans: 让 Firion 加入一个完全不同的世界的叛乱。

Original: Firion:Our other friends from the rebel army must be here, too.
Dialogue: Our other friends from the rebel army must be here, too.
trans: 我们其他的叛军朋友也一定在这里。

Original: Firion:Let's find them together. And uncover the mysteries of this world! You will join us, won't you?
Dialogue: Let's find them together. And uncover the mysteries of this world! You will join us, won't you?

Original: Maria:But of course! I wouldn't want to disappoint any of you!
Dialogue: But of course! I wouldn't want to disappoint any of you!

Original: Galuf:Ho ho ho! Admirable confidence.
Dialogue: Ho ho ho! Admirable confidence.

Original: Yang:We will put our faith in you, Lady Maria!
Dialogue: We will put our faith in you, Lady Maria!
trans: 我们会相信你，玛丽亚女士！

Original: Wakka:Alrighty then. That's enough of a break. Let's hit the road again, yeah?
Dialogue: Alrighty then. That's enough of a break. Let's hit the road again, yeah?

Original: Penelo:...Huh? I don't see Yuna.
Dialogue: ...Huh? I don't see Yuna.

Original: Yuna:Sorry to keep you!
Dialogue: Sorry to keep you!

Original: Yuna:Forgive me, I must have started to doze off...
Dialogue: Forgive me, I must have started to doze off...
trans: 原谅我，我一定是开始打瞌睡了……

Original: Vaan:Ha ha, no kidding! Nice bed head!
Dialogue: Ha ha, no kidding! Nice bed head!

Original: Yuna:Eh!? B-bed head!?
Dialogue: Eh!? B-bed head!?

Original: Yuna:Ohhh, not again...
Dialogue: Ohhh, not again...

Original: Vaan:You know, for as much as you look like you've got it together, you can be pretty scatterbrained sometimes.
Dialogue: You know, for as much as you look like you've got it together, you can be pretty scatterbrained sometimes.
trans: 你知道，尽管你看起来很有条理，但有时你会非常漫不经心。

Original: Wakka:Right? She's been like that since way back when.
Dialogue: Right? She's been like that since way back when.

Original: Maria:Since way back? Are you two childhood friends?
Dialogue: Since way back? Are you two childhood friends?

Original: Maria:Like siblings... Just like me and Firion.
Dialogue: Like siblings... Just like me and Firion.
trans: 像兄弟姐妹一样……就像我和菲里奥一样。

Original: Wakka:Oh yeah? You two also have a long history together?
Dialogue: Oh yeah? You two also have a long history together?

Original: Firion:I was without mother or father, so Maria's took me in.
Dialogue: I was without mother or father, so Maria's took me in.
trans: 我没有父母，所以玛丽亚收留了我。

Original: Vaan:Oh, so you're family.
Dialogue: Oh, so you're family.

Original: Yuna:...How dreadful. I'm so sorry...
Dialogue: ...How dreadful. I'm so sorry...

Original: Penelo:Imperial invasions happen in any world...huh...
Dialogue: Imperial invasions happen in any world...huh...
trans: 任何世界都会发生帝国入侵……嗯……

Original: Penelo:War takes everyone... Family... Homeland...
Dialogue: War takes everyone... Family... Homeland...
trans: 战争带走了每个人……家庭……祖国……

Original: Wakka:Shoot! Can't start dwelling on the past!
Dialogue: Shoot! Can't start dwelling on the past!

Original: Vaan:Separated from yourbrother...'cause of theempire...
Dialogue: Separated from your brother...'cause of the empire...
trans: 与你兄弟分开……是为了帝国……

Original: Vaan:Me and Penelo are both orphans, too. It's a pretty common story. But that doesn't mean we're alone.
Dialogue: Me and Penelo are both orphans, too. It's a pretty common story. But that doesn't mean we're alone.

Original: Firion:That's right. We're not alone. Even if the world changes, that's still the same.
Dialogue: That's right. We're not alone. Even if the world changes, that's still the same.

Original: Firion:So let's keep our eyes on the future. Surely Leon, too, will...
Dialogue: So let's keep our eyes on the future. Surely Leon, too, will...

Original: Maria:Yes, you're right. Let's go!
Dialogue: Yes, you're right. Let's go!

Original: Wakka:Fore that, though, let's give Lady Yuna a chance to fix her hair.
Dialogue: Fore that, though, let's give Lady Yuna a chance to fix her hair.
trans: 不过，在此之前，让我们给尤娜女士一个整理头发的机会。

Original: Yuna:Oooh, Wakka!
Dialogue: Oooh, Wakka!

Original: Celes:Ah...a dead end. There's not much we can do about a rampart such as this.
Dialogue: Ah...a dead end. There's not much we can do about a rampart such as this.

Original: Auron:We'll have to turn back and look for another way around.
Dialogue: We'll have to turn back and look for another way around.
trans: 我们将不得不返回并寻找另一条路。

Original: Cater:Whaaat!? We already came this far! What a waste!
Dialogue: Whaaat!? We already came this far! What a waste!

Original: Vanille:Yeah, isn't there something we can do? Maybe try climbing it?
Dialogue: Yeah, isn't there something we can do? Maybe try climbing it?
trans: 是啊，难道我们不能做点什么吗？

Original: Celes:Please... What if someone falls?
Dialogue: Please... What if someone falls?
trans: 请问...万一有人摔倒怎么办？

Original: Auron:I doubt anyone plans on falling...
Dialogue: I doubt anyone plans on falling...

Original: Mog:Let's give up here, kupo. I'll start looking for another route.
Dialogue: Let's give up here, kupo. I'll start looking for another route.

Original: Vanille:Hey, can't you float us over the wall?
Dialogue: Hey, can't you float us over the wall?
trans: 嘿，你不能让我们漂浮在墙上吗？

Original: Mog:Not likely, kupo... It's not even an emergency, and if I dropped someone midway...kupo...
Dialogue: Not likely, kupo... It's not even an emergency, and if I dropped someone midway...kupo...
trans: 不太可能，库波...这甚至不是紧急情况，如果我在中途丢下某人...库波...

Original: Cater:Well, there is NO way I'm going back the way we came.
Dialogue: Well, there is NO way I'm going back the way we came.
trans: 好吧，我绝不会原路返回。

Original: Celes:This isn't going anywhere... Maria, what do you think?
Dialogue: This isn't going anywhere... Maria, what do you think?
trans: 这不会有任何进展......玛丽亚，你怎么看？

Original: Maria:I understand how Cater feels, but we shouldn't consider scaling it.
Dialogue: I understand how Cater feels, but we shouldn't consider scaling it.
trans: 我理解 Cater 的感受，但我们不应该考虑扩展它。

Original: Maria:We have children like Vivi and Eiko with us, too, after all. Do try to bear it.
Dialogue: We have children like Vivi and Eiko with us, too, after all. Do try to bear it.
trans: 毕竟，我们也有像 Vivi 和 Eiko 这样的孩子。

Original: Cater:Yeah... I guess that would be hard on them.
Dialogue: Yeah... I guess that would be hard on them.
trans: 是的......我想这对他们来说很难。

Original: Vanille:If we can't climb it...what if we knocked it down?
Dialogue: If we can't climb it...what if we knocked it down?
trans: 如果我们爬不上去……如果我们把它撞倒怎么办？

Original: Auron:What are you thinking...?
Dialogue: What are you thinking...?

Original: Vanille:Haha, I was only joking.
Dialogue: Haha, I was only joking.

Original: Maria:...Why didn't I think of that...?
Dialogue: ...Why didn't I think of that...?

Original: Maria:Mog, are there any cannons on the airship?
Dialogue: Mog, are there any cannons on the airship?

Original: Mog:Kupo? C-cannons, kupo?
Dialogue: Kupo? C-cannons, kupo?

Original: Maria:Or maybe Cater's guns have enough magic power...
Dialogue: Or maybe Cater's guns have enough magic power...
trans: 又或者卡特的枪有足够的魔力……

Original: Auron:Maria? Don't tell me...
Dialogue: Maria? Don't tell me...

Original: Maria:It's settled! Let's blow this thing up!
Dialogue: It's settled! Let's blow this thing up!

Original: Celes:You can't be serious! The whole wall!?
Dialogue: You can't be serious! The whole wall!?

Original: Vanille:Yeah, I don't know about that...
Dialogue: Yeah, I don't know about that...

Original: Cater:I'm in! The best answer is the simplest one!
Dialogue: I'm in! The best answer is the simplest one!

Original: Celes:H-hold on! If you blow it up, what about all the debris!?
Dialogue: H-hold on! If you blow it up, what about all the debris!?

Original: Auron:Crushed under a collapsing wall is just as much a dead end.
Dialogue: Crushed under a collapsing wall is just as much a dead end.
trans: 被倒塌的墙压垮同样是一条死胡同。

Original: Cater:Uh, didn't think about that. We could hide behind something...but I don't see anyplace...
Dialogue: Uh, didn't think about that. We could hide behind something...but I don't see anyplace...

Original: Mog:Another route is the only answer, kupo. Give it up, you two.
Dialogue: Another route is the only answer, kupo. Give it up, you two.
trans: 另一条路线是唯一的答案，kupo。

Original: Maria:I thought it was a good idea...
Dialogue: I thought it was a good idea...

Original: Auron:"Let's blow this thing up!" She's more of a firecracker than I would have expected.
Dialogue: "Let's blow this thing up!" She's more of a firecracker than I would have expected.

Original: Celes:Indeed... Doubtless she's seen her fair share of mayhem in the rebel army.
Dialogue: Indeed... Doubtless she's seen her fair share of mayhem in the rebel army.
trans: 确实……毫无疑问，她在反抗军中目睹了相当多的混乱。

Original: Maria:It is not only back home, but in this world, too, the battles are unceasing...
Dialogue: It is not only back home, but in this world, too, the battles are unceasing...
trans: 不仅是在自己的家乡，在这个世界上，战斗也是不断的……

Original: Maria:The peaceful days spent with my family have become a distant memory...
Dialogue: The peaceful days spent with my family have become a distant memory...
trans: 和家人一起度过的平静日子已经成为遥远的记忆……

Original: Cait Sith:Oh, Maria?
Dialogue: Oh, Maria?

Original: Cait Sith:What's got you so down?
Dialogue: What's got you so down?

Original: Maria:...I'm sorry. I was thinking of home...
Dialogue: ...I'm sorry. I was thinking of home...

Original: Seven:Yours and Firion's...?
Dialogue: Yours and Firion's...?

Original: Ramza:You had mentioned your hometown was caught up in war, and you were separated from your family...
Dialogue: You had mentioned your hometown was caught up in war, and you were separated from your family...
trans: 你说你的家乡战火纷飞，你和家人失散了……

Original: Ramza:There is no end to conflict in my world as well. ...I share your pain.
Dialogue: There is no end to conflict in my world as well. ...I share your pain.
trans: 在我的世界里，冲突也永无止境。

Original: Chelinka:It's sad and scary to lose family... For your family to lose you, too...
Dialogue: It's sad and scary to lose family... For your family to lose you, too...
trans: 失去家人是悲伤和可怕的……因为你的家人也将失去你……

Original: Chelinka:But...you can't lose hope... Once you do, you can never change your fate...
Dialogue: But...you can't lose hope... Once you do, you can never change your fate...
trans: 但是……你不能失去希望……一旦失去，就永远无法改变命运……

Original: Chelinka:I know there's still hope for your world, so please...don't give up...
Dialogue: I know there's still hope for your world, so please...don't give up...
trans: 我知道你的世界还有希望，所以请...不要放弃...

Original: Kain:...Agreed. Everyoneeven those in similar circumstancesthat's what we're fighting to protect.
Dialogue: ...Agreed. Everyone—even those in similar circumstances—that's what we're fighting to protect.

Original: Maria:You're all too kind...
Dialogue: You're all too kind...

Original: Seven:Oh, yeah. Cait Sith, how about a fortune telling?
Dialogue: Oh, yeah. Cait Sith, how about a fortune telling?

Original: Cait Sith:Fortune telling? Of what?
Dialogue: Fortune telling? Of what?

Original: Seven:Maria's fortune, of course. Isn't that your deal?
Dialogue: Maria's fortune, of course. Isn't that your deal?

Original: Cait Sith:Oh, you better believe it! Let's give it a whirl!
Dialogue: Oh, you better believe it! Let's give it a whirl!

Original: Cait Sith:Beyond ordeals lies an unexpected reunion. Your lucky color is a daaark one...
Dialogue: Beyond ordeals lies an unexpected reunion. Your lucky color is a daaark one...
trans: 磨难之后是意想不到的重逢。

Original: Seven:Look at that. A reunion awaits you.
Dialogue: Look at that. A reunion awaits you.

Original: Kain:Ordeals, eh... Will those be obstacles before you...or within?
Dialogue: Ordeals, eh... Will those be obstacles before you...or within?
trans: 磨难，呃……那些会是你面前的障碍吗……还是内心？

Original: Ramza:But whatever could, "Your lucky color is a dark one," mean?
Dialogue: But whatever could, "Your lucky color is a dark one," mean?
trans: 但是无论如何，“你的幸运色是深色”是什么意思？

Original: Cait Sith:Hmm... It's just a regular fortune, so maybe a connection to something black?
Dialogue: Hmm... It's just a regular fortune, so maybe a connection to something black?
trans: 嗯……这只是一笔普通的财富，所以也许与某种黑色的东西有关？

Original: Chelinka:But doesn't that give you something to look forward to now?
Dialogue: But doesn't that give you something to look forward to now?
trans: 但这不是给了你一些值得期待的东西吗？

Original: Maria:...Haha, thank you.
Dialogue: ...Haha, thank you.

Original: Maria:Yes, I do think that fortune gave me a little bit of hope.
Dialogue: Yes, I do think that fortune gave me a little bit of hope.
trans: 是的，我确实认为命运给了我一点希望。

Original: Cait Sith:Oho! I couldn't be happier to hear it! Fortune must be smiling on this fortune-telling machine!
Dialogue: Oho! I couldn't be happier to hear it! Fortune must be smiling on this fortune-telling machine!

Original: Maria:If I can live with my family again...
Dialogue: If I can live with my family again...
trans: 如果我能再次和我的家人一起生活...

Original: Maria:I will overcome any ordeal I must!
Dialogue: I will overcome any ordeal I must!
trans: 我会克服我必须克服的任何考验！

Original: Seven:That's the spirit.
Dialogue: That's the spirit.

Original: Ramza:Aye, and we will aid you in any way we can.
Dialogue: Aye, and we will aid you in any way we can.
trans: 是的，我们会尽我们所能帮助你。

Original: Mog:There's a Torsion hidden deep inside this forest, kupo! Let's go!
Dialogue: There's a Torsion hidden deep inside this forest, kupo! Let's go!
trans: 库珀，这片森林深处隐藏着一个扭曲！

Original: Vivi:...Huh? What're we waiting for?
Dialogue: ...Huh? What're we waiting for?

Original: Cecil:...It would seem we are being stalked.
Dialogue: ...It would seem we are being stalked.

Original: Edge:Yeah it would...
Dialogue: Yeah it would...

Original: Mog:Kupo? What do you mean, kupo?
Dialogue: Kupo? What do you mean, kupo?

Original: Edge:You can't tell? There's a pack of monsters breathing down our necks.
Dialogue: You can't tell? There's a pack of monsters breathing down our necks.

Original: Vivi:Ack! Wh-why're there so many!?
Dialogue: Ack! Wh-why're there so many!?

Original: Cecil:And they look particularly bloodthirsty.
Dialogue: And they look particularly bloodthirsty.
trans: 而且他们看起来特别嗜血。

Original: Mog:I don't get it, kupo! We didn't do anything to upset them, kupo!
Dialogue: I don't get it, kupo! We didn't do anything to upset them, kupo!

Original: Vivi:Wahhh!!
Dialogue: Wahhh!!

Original: Cecil:Vivi! Are you alright!?
Dialogue: Vivi! Are you alright!?

Original: Vivi:Y-yeah, somehow...
Dialogue: Y-yeah, somehow...

Original: Vivi:But look at these monsters... Was someone scribbling on them?
Dialogue: But look at these monsters... Was someone scribbling on them?
trans: 不过看看这些怪物……是不是有人在上面乱涂乱画？

Original: Bomb:Grrrowl!
Dialogue: Grrrowl!

Original: Edge:Whoa, you're right! Take a look! They're all covered in doodles!
Dialogue: Whoa, you're right! Take a look! They're all covered in doodles!

Original: Cecil:That explains their ire.
Dialogue: That explains their ire.

Original: Mog:Kupo! We've been framed, kupo! Who's responsible for this, kupo!?
Dialogue: Kupo! We've been framed, kupo! Who's responsible for this, kupo!?

Original: Edge:Save your interrogation! Here they come!
Dialogue: Save your interrogation! Here they come!

Original: Mog:Kupo... That was a close one...
Dialogue: Kupo... That was a close one...

Original: Bartz:Been a while since I've seen monsters that angry.
Dialogue: Been a while since I've seen monsters that angry.
trans: 好久没看到这么生气的怪物了。

Original: Yuffie:Even if they're monsters, drawing all over them's a nasty trick.
Dialogue: Even if they're monsters, drawing all over them's a nasty trick.
trans: 就算是魔物，在他们身上画画也是下流的把戏。

Original: Wakka:...Ya know, Yuffie, you should prolly come clean sooner of later, yeah?
Dialogue: ...Ya know, Yuffie, you should prolly come clean sooner of later, yeah?
trans: ......你知道，Yuffie，你应该早点坦白，是吗？

Original: Yuffie:Hm...? M-me!?
Dialogue: Hm...? M-me!?

Original: Mog:Good point... That's exactly the sort of prank Yuffie would pull, kupo.
Dialogue: Good point... That's exactly the sort of prank Yuffie would pull, kupo.
trans: 好点……这正是 Yuffie 会搞的那种恶作剧，kupo。

Original: Yuffie:H-hang on a minute there! It wasn't me!
Dialogue: H-hang on a minute there! It wasn't me!

Original: Yuffie:Ahhh! Don't you start suspecting me, too! Ya'll keep doubting me like that, I'm gonna turn to a life of crime!
Dialogue: Ahhh! Don't you start suspecting me, too! Ya'll keep doubting me like that, I'm gonna turn to a life of crime!

Original: ???:Waughhh! Lemme alone!
Dialogue: Waughhh! Lemme alone!

Original: Cecil:Is that...Palom!?
Dialogue: Is that...Palom!?

Original: Palom:Alright! This is in the bag! Come and get it, you stupid monsters!
Dialogue: Alright! This is in the bag! Come and get it, you stupid monsters!

Original: Mog:That face... They're really angry, kupo...
Dialogue: That face... They're really angry, kupo...
trans: 那张脸……他们真的很生气，库波……

Original: Cecil:...Palom, is this your doing?
Dialogue: ...Palom, is this your doing?

Original: Palom:Perfect timing! These dummies have got the shortest tempers!
Dialogue: Perfect timing! These dummies have got the shortest tempers!

Original: Wakka:So would anyone if you draw all over them!
Dialogue: So would anyone if you draw all over them!
trans: 如果你在他们身上画画，任何人都会如此！

Original: Yuffie:Whew! This clears my name!
Dialogue: Whew! This clears my name!

Original: Bartz:Don't feel relieved yet!
Dialogue: Don't feel relieved yet!

Original: Palom:Heh heh! That takes care of that!
Dialogue: Heh heh! That takes care of that!

Original: Steiner:I will have no heh-heh-ing from you! You nearly got us killed!
Dialogue: I will have no heh-heh-ing from you! You nearly got us killed!

Original: Cecil:Explain yourself, Palom.
Dialogue: Explain yourself, Palom.

Original: Palom:Ulp... You're not angry...are you?
Dialogue: Ulp... You're not angry...are you?
trans: 乌尔普……你没有生气……是吗？

Original: Steiner:Of course we are, you little prankster!
Dialogue: Of course we are, you little prankster!
trans: 我们当然是，你这个小恶作剧！

Original: Yuffie:And how! You made everyone turn on me!
Dialogue: And how! You made everyone turn on me!

Original: Palom:Aww, but there're so many monsters around here, you know? So I thought I'd practice my magic a little and clean their clocks.
Dialogue: Aww, but there're so many monsters around here, you know? So I thought I'd practice my magic a little and clean their clocks.
trans: 哇，但是这里有很多怪物，你知道吗？

Original: Vivi:You mean...all by yourself?
Dialogue: You mean...all by yourself?

Original: Vivi:Wow, really? That's pretty cool!
Dialogue: Wow, really? That's pretty cool!

Original: Cecil:...And? What does magic practice have to do with doodling on monsters?
Dialogue: ...And? What does magic practice have to do with doodling on monsters?

Original: Palom:Er, well...
Dialogue: Er, well...

Original: Palom:They were all sleeping so peacefully, I couldn't resist, and one thing led to another...
Dialogue: They were all sleeping so peacefully, I couldn't resist, and one thing led to another...
trans: 他们都睡得那么安详，我无法抗拒，一件事导致另一件事......

Original: Cecil:And they woke up and pursued you in their anger...
Dialogue: And they woke up and pursued you in their anger...
trans: 然后他们醒来并在他们的愤怒中追捕你......

Original: Zidane:Good grief, who would prank a pack of monsters?
Dialogue: Good grief, who would prank a pack of monsters?
trans: 天哪，谁会恶作剧一群怪物？

Original: Mog:Kupo! But, but! That's exactly the type of adventurous spirit we'll need in the heat of battle, kupo!
Dialogue: Kupo! But, but! That's exactly the type of adventurous spirit we'll need in the heat of battle, kupo!

Original: Yuffie:Gee, that's a nice way to excuse it.
Dialogue: Gee, that's a nice way to excuse it.
trans: 哎呀，这是一个很好的借口。

Original: Cecil:Mog, is it safe to assume Palom's will is also of the light?
Dialogue: Mog, is it safe to assume Palom's will is also of the light?
trans: Mog，假设 Palom 的意志也属于光能安全吗？

Original: Mog:It is, kupo! I want this mischievous black mage on our team, kupo!
Dialogue: It is, kupo! I want this mischievous black mage on our team, kupo!

Original: Palom:Great! 'Cause I was coming with ya anyway!
Dialogue: Great! 'Cause I was coming with ya anyway!

Original: Steiner:This does not sit well with me.
Dialogue: This does not sit well with me.

Original: Palom:Don't look so gloomy, Pops! Be glad I'm here to help you out!
Dialogue: Don't look so gloomy, Pops! Be glad I'm here to help you out!
trans: 爸爸，别看起来那么阴沉！

Original: Yuffie:What an attitude.
Dialogue: What an attitude.

Original: Steiner:I cannot claim to see much difference from you.
Dialogue: I cannot claim to see much difference from you.
trans: 我不能说我和你有什么不同。

Original: Yuffie:Don't you compare me with that kid!
Dialogue: Don't you compare me with that kid!

Original: Palom:My magic's the best under the sun! Just wait and see!
Dialogue: My magic's the best under the sun! Just wait and see!

Original: Vivi:I'm Vivi! I'm a black mage, too!
Dialogue: I'm Vivi! I'm a black mage, too!

Original: Palom:No kidding? Not bad for a squirt!
Dialogue: No kidding? Not bad for a squirt!

Original: Palom:Alright then! I'll teach ya some real great magic over there! C'mon!
Dialogue: Alright then! I'll teach ya some real great magic over there! C'mon!

Original: Zidane:If Vivi has a new friend, it can't be a bad thing...right?
Dialogue: If Vivi has a new friend, it can't be a bad thing...right?
trans: 如果薇薇有了新朋友，那也不是坏事……对吧？

Original: Chelinka:Yuri! Where are you? Yuuuri!
Dialogue: Yuri! Where are you? Yuuuri!

Original: Tifa:Palom! If you can hear us, come on out!
Dialogue: Palom! If you can hear us, come on out!

Original: Mog:No luck, kupo... They're nowhere to be found.
Dialogue: No luck, kupo... They're nowhere to be found.
trans: 不走运，库波……他们无处可寻。

Original: Kain:The monsters in the vicinity are fierce. We mustn't let our guard down.
Dialogue: The monsters in the vicinity are fierce. We mustn't let our guard down.

Original: Chelinka:Oh dear... Yuri!
Dialogue: Oh dear... Yuri!

Original: Tifa:Let's split up one more time. They can't have gone that far.
Dialogue: Let's split up one more time. They can't have gone that far.

Original: Palom:Hey, how's it goin'?
Dialogue: Hey, how's it goin'?

Original: Chelinka:Yuri! Palom!
Dialogue: Yuri! Palom!

Original: Palom:Huh? Why's everyone so shocked to see us?
Dialogue: Huh? Why's everyone so shocked to see us?

Original: Tifa:You should know why! You're the ones who ran off without telling anyone!
Dialogue: You should know why! You're the ones who ran off without telling anyone!

Original: Mog:Where were you two, kupo?
Dialogue: Where were you two, kupo?

Original: Yuri:There was this real interesting looking spot, so we went to go investigate.
Dialogue: There was this real interesting looking spot, so we went to go investigate.
trans: 有一个看起来很有趣的地方，所以我们去调查了。

Original: Palom:It was dark and damp and spooky. We had a blast!
Dialogue: It was dark and damp and spooky. We had a blast!
trans: 那里又黑又湿又阴森森的。

Original: Chelinka:And all by yourselves... What if some monsters found you!
Dialogue: And all by yourselves... What if some monsters found you!
trans: 而且全靠你自己……要是有怪物发现你怎么办！

Original: Palom:Me and Yuri'd take care of 'em!
Dialogue: Me and Yuri'd take care of 'em!

Original: Chelinka:That's not what I'm talking about.
Dialogue: That's not what I'm talking about.

Original: Chelinka:I was so worried... Can't you be even a little sorry!
Dialogue: I was so worried... Can't you be even a little sorry!
trans: 我好担心……你就不能连一点对不起都没有！

Original: Yuri:Sorry, sorry! We'll be more careful next time...
Dialogue: Sorry, sorry! We'll be more careful next time...

Original: Tifa:Palom, do you understand, too?
Dialogue: Palom, do you understand, too?

Original: Tifa:...? Palom?
Dialogue: ...? Palom?

Original: Palom:We were wrong... Sorry to make you worry about us...
Dialogue: We were wrong... Sorry to make you worry about us...
trans: 我们错了...对不起让你担心我们...

Original: Tifa:No way! He actually...!
Dialogue: No way! He actually...!

Original: Mog:Apologized, kupo! And didn't make any excuses!
Dialogue: Apologized, kupo! And didn't make any excuses!

Original: Kain:What curious turn of events might this be?
Dialogue: What curious turn of events might this be?
trans: 这可能是什么奇怪的事件？

Original: Palom:Getting chewed out by Chelinka just reminded me of my sister...
Dialogue: Getting chewed out by Chelinka just reminded me of my sister...
trans: 被切林卡责骂让我想起了我的妹妹……

Original: Yuri:You have a sister?
Dialogue: You have a sister?

Original: Tifa:Huh... Are you at all similar?
Dialogue: Huh... Are you at all similar?

Original: Kain:Other than appearance, not in the least.
Dialogue: Other than appearance, not in the least.

Original: Palom:I'm so jealous that Yuri gets to have his sister here with him.
Dialogue: I'm so jealous that Yuri gets to have his sister here with him.
trans: 我很嫉妒 Yuri 能有他的妹妹和他在一起。

Original: Palom:We were always together, but now...
Dialogue: We were always together, but now...
trans: 我们一直在一起，但现在……

Original: Tifa:Cheer up. I'm sure we'll run into her soon.
Dialogue: Cheer up. I'm sure we'll run into her soon.

Original: Mog:She might already be here, kupo! We should hurry up and find her!
Dialogue: She might already be here, kupo! We should hurry up and find her!

Original: Chelinka:Yes, we can't leave her all alone in a dangerous place like this.
Dialogue: Yes, we can't leave her all alone in a dangerous place like this.
trans: 是的，我们不能把她一个人丢在这种危险的地方。

Original: Palom:Hey, she isn't the wimp you seem to think she is! Monsters won't get her that easily!
Dialogue: Hey, she isn't the wimp you seem to think she is! Monsters won't get her that easily!
trans: 嘿，她不是你认为的那个懦夫！

Original: Palom:We're the magical prodigies of Mysidia, after all!
Dialogue: We're the magical prodigies of Mysidia, after all!
trans: 毕竟，我们是 Mysidia 的神奇神童！

Original: Palom:You'll all help me look for her, right?
Dialogue: You'll all help me look for her, right?

Original: Chelinka:Of course.
Dialogue: Of course.

Original: Vivi:Here I go! Pow!
Dialogue: Here I go! Pow!

Original: Palom:Ohhh! You did it, Vivi! All that training paid off!
Dialogue: Ohhh! You did it, Vivi! All that training paid off!

Original: Vivi:Hehe... Thanks, Palom. You think I got a little stronger?
Dialogue: Hehe... Thanks, Palom. You think I got a little stronger?

Original: Palom:Yeah, you did! Now you can use real great magic, too!
Dialogue: Yeah, you did! Now you can use real great magic, too!

Original: Palom:Let's go show everyone! This calls for a real great exhibition ceremony!
Dialogue: Let's go show everyone! This calls for a real great exhibition ceremony!

Original: Cait Sith:Hey, now, what's all the buzz about?
Dialogue: Hey, now, what's all the buzz about?
trans: 嘿，现在，所有的嗡嗡声是什么？

Original: Ashe:I do not know. I was simply asked to come here.
Dialogue: I do not know. I was simply asked to come here.

Original: Palom:Heya! Sorry to keep all y'all waiting!
Dialogue: Heya! Sorry to keep all y'all waiting!

Original: Palom:Vivi's gonna show you all the real great magic I taught him! Aren't ya, Vivi!
Dialogue: Vivi's gonna show you all the real great magic I taught him! Aren't ya, Vivi!
trans: Vivi 会向你展示我教给他的所有真正伟大的魔法！

Original: Vivi:Uh, hi there...
Dialogue: Uh, hi there...

Original: Palom:Oh? And here's a monster!
Dialogue: Oh? And here's a monster!

Original: Palom:Alright, Vivi! Do your stuff!
Dialogue: Alright, Vivi! Do your stuff!

Original: Vivi:Ahhh! I can't handle this by myself!
Dialogue: Ahhh! I can't handle this by myself!

Original: Ramza:Vivi! Look out!
Dialogue: Vivi! Look out!

Original: Ashe:To his aid!
Dialogue: To his aid!

Original: Cait Sith:On my way!
Dialogue: On my way!

Original: Vivi:Whew... That was scary...
Dialogue: Whew... That was scary...

Original: Palom:Aw, Vivi! Quit yer whining! That thing woulda been toast with your real great magic!
Dialogue: Aw, Vivi! Quit yer whining! That thing woulda been toast with your real great magic!

Original: Vivi:Wh-what do you think I am...?
Dialogue: Wh-what do you think I am...?

Original: Palom:sometimes ya gotta bluff it! Puff yer chest out and face it like a man!
Dialogue: sometimes ya gotta bluff it! Puff yer chest out and face it like a man!

Original: Cait Sith:You're sure a feisty lad.
Dialogue: You're sure a feisty lad.
trans: 你肯定是个活泼的小伙子。

Original: Ramza:Verily, I am fain to believe he would not back down before any foe.
Dialogue: Verily, I am fain to believe he would not back down before any foe.
trans: 真的，我很愿意相信他不会在任何敌人面前退缩。

Original: Palom:You got that right! Watch this! I'll show you how strong I really am!
Dialogue: You got that right! Watch this! I'll show you how strong I really am!

Original: Palom:Waaaugh! Even I can't handle this many all at once!
Dialogue: Waaaugh! Even I can't handle this many all at once!

Original: Cait Sith:Now what?
Dialogue: Now what?

Original: Ashe:I suppose some things you cannot bluff.
Dialogue: I suppose some things you cannot bluff.
trans: 我想有些事情你不能虚张声势。

Original: Ramza:That is what for we have our brothers- and sisters-in-arms.
Dialogue: That is what for we have our brothers- and sisters-in-arms.
trans: 这就是我们有我们的兄弟姐妹的原因。

Original: Vivi:Right! Let's help him! Palom, we're coming!
Dialogue: Right! Let's help him! Palom, we're coming!

Original: Golbez:...So you will go.
Dialogue: ...So you will go.

Original: Kuja:You've felt it, I'm sure. That sensation of someone draining away our power...
Dialogue: You've felt it, I'm sure. That sensation of someone draining away our power...
trans: 你已经感觉到了，我敢肯定。

Original: Golbez:Furthermore, that moogle... It is no mere spirit...
Dialogue: Furthermore, that moogle... It is no mere spirit...
trans: 而且，那个莫古利……不仅仅是精灵……

Original: Golbez:If you are at their side, you may learn its true identity.
Dialogue: If you are at their side, you may learn its true identity.
trans: 如果你在他们身边，你可能会知道它的真实身份。

Original: Kuja:My plans aren't so grandiose as that.
Dialogue: My plans aren't so grandiose as that.
trans: 我的计划没有那么宏伟。

Original: Kuja:...The audience has simply tired of waiting for me to take the stage.
Dialogue: ...The audience has simply tired of waiting for me to take the stage.
trans: ......观众只是厌倦了等待我上台。

Original: Mog:Kupo! A Torsion is forming, kupo!
Dialogue: Kupo! A Torsion is forming, kupo!

Original: Zidane:Kuja... So this is one of your Torsions, is it?
Dialogue: Kuja... So this is one of your Torsions, is it?
trans: Kuja... 所以这是你的 Torsions 之一，是吗？

Original: Kuja:Why, so it is. You need something to fight, don't you? How can we call this a show without an action sequence?
Dialogue: Why, so it is. You need something to fight, don't you? How can we call this a show without an action sequence?

Original: Mog:Your underhanded theatrics end here, kupo!
Dialogue: Your underhanded theatrics end here, kupo!
trans: 你的阴险表演到此为止，kupo！

Original: Steiner:Why you! This time you will get the drubbing you deserve!
Dialogue: Why you! This time you will get the drubbing you deserve!

Original: Kuja:Heh... Yes, do give it all you've got.
Dialogue: Heh... Yes, do give it all you've got.

Original: Setzer:...I suspect he's bluffing; dare we play along?
Dialogue: ...I suspect he's bluffing; dare we play along?

Original: Zidane:He's not getting away this time. I'll drag the truth out of him if I have to!
Dialogue: He's not getting away this time. I'll drag the truth out of him if I have to!

Original: Kuja:You should save that line for after you've won the battle.
Dialogue: You should save that line for after you've won the battle.
trans: 你应该在你赢得战斗之后保存那条线。

Original: Kuja:Now then... The villain, yours truly, is thus trounced...
Dialogue: Now then... The villain, yours truly, is thus trounced...
trans: 既然如此……你的小人，就这样被打败了……

Original: Kuja:And the Torsion vanishes. All according to the moogle's script, I do believe.
Dialogue: And the Torsion vanishes. All according to the moogle's script, I do believe.

Original: Balthier:If there's something you want to say, try spitting it out.
Dialogue: If there's something you want to say, try spitting it out.
trans: 如果你有什么想说的，试着说出来。

Original: Zidane:What is it you know? About Mog? About the Torsions?
Dialogue: What is it you know? About Mog? About the Torsions?

Original: Kuja:Heh heh... Well, for example...how about this?
Dialogue: Heh heh... Well, for example...how about this?
trans: 呵呵……嗯，比如说……这个怎么样？

Original: Mog:Kupo!? These are...dimensional coordinates!?
Dialogue: Kupo!? These are...dimensional coordinates!?

Original: Vivi:Huh!? Does that mean...Kuja's gonna fight for us!?
Dialogue: Huh!? Does that mean...Kuja's gonna fight for us!?

Original: Edgar:Then do tell, what's your motive? I assume that know-it-all smirk isn't an act.
Dialogue: Then do tell, what's your motive? I assume that know-it-all smirk isn't an act.
trans: 那请告诉我，你的动机是什么？

Original: Kuja:This is just a cameo for now...
Dialogue: This is just a cameo for now...

Original: Kuja:It will be a while yet before I take center stage.
Dialogue: It will be a while yet before I take center stage.
trans: 我还需要一段时间才能登上舞台的中心。

Original: Balthier:Please... start pretending you're the leading man and you'll be sorry to find someone else already in the spotlight.
Dialogue: Please... start pretending you're the leading man and you'll be sorry to find someone else already in the spotlight.
trans: 请...开始假装你是男主角，你会很遗憾地发现其他人已经成为众人瞩目的焦点。

Original: Zidane:Hold on! I'm not done with you!
Dialogue: Hold on! I'm not done with you!

Original: Mog:...Should I try summoning him, kupo?
Dialogue: ...Should I try summoning him, kupo?

Original: Edgar:No, he's not the type to engage in decent conversation anyway. More importantly...
Dialogue: No, he's not the type to engage in decent conversation anyway. More importantly...
trans: 不，他无论如何都不是那种进行体面谈话的人。

Original: Zidane:Vivi... Calling him an "ally" all of a sudden has to be hard to swallow.
Dialogue: Vivi... Calling him an "ally" all of a sudden has to be hard to swallow.
trans: 薇薇……突然叫他“盟友”，真是让人难以下咽。

Original: Vivi:I don't know...
Dialogue: I don't know...

Original: Vivi:I feel scared...but I also feel like I need to be brave enough to accept that his powers can help us...
Dialogue: I feel scared...but I also feel like I need to be brave enough to accept that his powers can help us...
trans: 我感到害怕……但我也觉得我需要足够勇敢地接受他的力量可以帮助我们……

Original: Balthier:I'm not surprised it's confusing for you. The man was your enemy back in your world.
Dialogue: I'm not surprised it's confusing for you. The man was your enemy back in your world.
trans: 这让你感到困惑，我并不感到惊讶。

Original: Edgar:The rest of us don't know anything about him, but we can appreciate how complicated your feelings must be.
Dialogue: The rest of us don't know anything about him, but we can appreciate how complicated your feelings must be.
trans: 我们其他人对他一无所知，但我们能理解你的心情是多么复杂。

Original: Edgar:But thinking about our next steps, if you'll forgive me saying so, we stand to profit from his abilities and knowledge.
Dialogue: But thinking about our next steps, if you'll forgive me saying so, we stand to profit from his abilities and knowledge.
trans: 但考虑到我们的下一步，如果你能原谅我这么说的话，我们将从他的能力和知识中获益。

Original: Zidane:What he's done back in our world is completely unforgivable. Especially what he's done to your friends...
Dialogue: What he's done back in our world is completely unforgivable. Especially what he's done to your friends...
trans: 他在我们的世界所做的一切是完全不可原谅的。

Original: Zidane:Even so...I think we might need him here.
Dialogue: Even so...I think we might need him here.
trans: 即便如此……我想我们可能需要他在这里。

Original: Vivi:Yeah... I know...
Dialogue: Yeah... I know...

Original: Zidane:If it looks like Kuja's going back to his old tricks for even a second, I'll be there to rein him in. 'Kay?
Dialogue: If it looks like Kuja's going back to his old tricks for even a second, I'll be there to rein him in. 'Kay?
trans: 如果 Kuja 看起来像一秒钟又故技重施，我会在那里制止他。'好吗？

Original: Balthier:Why do I feel left out?
Dialogue: Why do I feel left out?
trans: 为什么我觉得被冷落了？

Original: Edgar:If such a thing happens, we'll all be here to make things right.
Dialogue: If such a thing happens, we'll all be here to make things right.
trans: 如果发生这样的事情，我们都会在这里纠正错误。

Original: Zidane:Ah...yeah. That's right. We're in this together.
Dialogue: Ah...yeah. That's right. We're in this together.

Original: Vivi:Thanks... Everyone. I'll do my best, too, and think things over.
Dialogue: Thanks... Everyone. I'll do my best, too, and think things over.

Original: Zidane:Kuja's...gotta be planning to alter his fate back home.
Dialogue: Kuja's...gotta be planning to alter his fate back home.
trans: Kuja 的……一定是在计划改变他在家乡的命运。

Original: Zidane:Vincent, weren't you trying to do something similar?
Dialogue: Vincent, weren't you trying to do something similar?
trans: 文森特，你不是想做类似的事情吗？

Original: Vincent:...Yes, though it ended in failure.
Dialogue: ...Yes, though it ended in failure.

Original: Tidus:How can someone even alter fate to begin with?
Dialogue: How can someone even alter fate to begin with?
trans: 一个人怎么可能改变命运呢？

Original: Shantotto:Well, creating Torsions is a power we all possess.
Dialogue: Well, creating Torsions is a power we all possess.
trans: 好吧，创造扭转是我们所有人都拥有的力量。

Original: Shantotto:So manipulating the jumble of time and space within them would be my guess.
Dialogue: So manipulating the jumble of time and space within them would be my guess.
trans: 因此，我的猜测是操纵其中时间和空间的混乱。

Original: Vincent:That's the idea.
Dialogue: That's the idea.

Original: Garnet:The Torsions also affected our memories when they brought us here, did they not?
Dialogue: The Torsions also affected our memories when they brought us here, did they not?
trans: 当他们把我们带到这里时，扭曲也影响了我们的记忆，不是吗？

Original: Vincent:They distort time itself. For instance, some who should have already passed are living and breathing among us...
Dialogue: They distort time itself. For instance, some who should have already passed are living and breathing among us...

Original: Vincent:Yet this fact hardly strikes us as strange... Whether that's also the work of the Torsions, I don't know...
Dialogue: Yet this fact hardly strikes us as strange... Whether that's also the work of the Torsions, I don't know...
trans: 然而，这个事实并没有让我们感到奇怪……我不知道这是否也是扭转的结果……

Original: Vincent:I don't know, but...it was enough to make me think the sins I'd committed were redeemable.
Dialogue: I don't know, but...it was enough to make me think the sins I'd committed were redeemable.
trans: 我不知道，但是……这足以让我觉得我犯下的罪孽是可以赎回的。

Original: Shantotto:Short of even a hypothesis.
Dialogue: Short of even a hypothesis.
trans: 甚至连一个假设都没有。

Original: Shantotto:To be of use to my research, such details are worthless.
Dialogue: To be of use to my research, such details are worthless.
trans: 为了对我的研究有用，这些细节毫无价值。

Original: Vivi:People who've already died...are living among us...
Dialogue: People who've already died...are living among us...
trans: 已经死去的人……还活在我们中间……

Original: Tidus:That means Kuja has someone he wants to bring back to life?
Dialogue: That means Kuja has someone he wants to bring back to life?
trans: 也就是说库亚有想要复活的人？

Original: Zidane:If there's any mortal fate he wants to change...it's his own.
Dialogue: If there's any mortal fate he wants to change...it's his own.
trans: 如果他想改变任何凡人的命运……那是他自己的。

Original: Zidane:Kuja can't accept that his days are numbered.
Dialogue: Kuja can't accept that his days are numbered.
trans: Kuja 无法接受他的日子已经屈指可数了。

Original: Vincent:I searched for some means under that mage Kefka, and did little more than err for it.
Dialogue: I searched for some means under that mage Kefka, and did little more than err for it.
trans: 我在那个法师 Kefka 的指导下寻找了一些方法，但几乎没有犯错。

Original: Vincent:It's unlikely Kuja will have any better success.
Dialogue: It's unlikely Kuja will have any better success.
trans: Kuja 不太可能取得更好的成功。

Original: Tidus:...Everyone dies eventually.
Dialogue: ...Everyone dies eventually.

Original: Vivi:Yeah... That's what we leave memories for.
Dialogue: Yeah... That's what we leave memories for.
trans: 是的……这就是我们留下记忆的原因。

Original: Tidus:If I'm gonna disappear at some point, if someone remembers me...even just once in a while...that's enough for me.
Dialogue: If I'm gonna disappear at some point, if someone remembers me...even just once in a while...that's enough for me.
trans: 如果我在某个时候消失，如果有人记得我……哪怕只是偶尔……对我来说就足够了。

Original: Vivi:...Me, too. That's why I'm traveling with everyone...
Dialogue: ...Me, too. That's why I'm traveling with everyone...

Original: Garnet:To leave memories... No doubt our adventure here will become valuable memories, too.
Dialogue: To leave memories... No doubt our adventure here will become valuable memories, too.
trans: 留下回忆…… 毫无疑问，我们在这里的冒险也将成为宝贵的回忆。

Original: Zidane:Yeah. ...Be nice if Kuja could come around to see things that way.
Dialogue: Yeah. ...Be nice if Kuja could come around to see things that way.

Original: Lightning:It seems that Kuja is only interested in being evasive, and isn't going to give us a whit of information.
Dialogue: It seems that Kuja is only interested in being evasive, and isn't going to give us a whit of information.
trans: Kuja 似乎只对躲避感兴趣，并不会提供任何信息。

Original: Cyan:What sort of man is he?
Dialogue: What sort of man is he?

Original: Zidane:"What sort..."? Man, where to start?
Dialogue: "What sort..."? Man, where to start?

Original: Eiko:It is all his fault the kingdom fell to shambles!
Dialogue: It is all his fault the kingdom fell to shambles!

Original: Cyan:So it is fair to say he is not a man of virtue.
Dialogue: So it is fair to say he is not a man of virtue.
trans: 所以可以说他不是一个有德行的人。

Original: Lightning:The situation sounds more complicated for Zidane and Vivi, though.
Dialogue: The situation sounds more complicated for Zidane and Vivi, though.
trans: 不过，齐达内和薇薇的情况听起来更复杂。

Original: Vivi:A lot of my friends were used like tools and got really hurt.
Dialogue: A lot of my friends were used like tools and got really hurt.
trans: 我的很多朋友都被当作工具使用，并受到了真正的伤害。

Original: Zidane:Learning that drove him to despair. He probably...wants to change that.
Dialogue: Learning that drove him to despair. He probably...wants to change that.

Original: Lightning:Do you think changing his fate would be beneficial for all of you as well?
Dialogue: Do you think changing his fate would be beneficial for all of you as well?
trans: 你认为改变他的命运对你们所有人都有好处吗？

Original: Steiner:Such as turning everything back to the way things were...?
Dialogue: Such as turning everything back to the way things were...?
trans: 比如说让一切恢复原状……？

Original: Eiko:No! That wouldn't solve anything!
Dialogue: No! That wouldn't solve anything!

Original: Vivi:...Yeah. A lot of bad things happened...but we shouldn't act like they didn't happen.
Dialogue: ...Yeah. A lot of bad things happened...but we shouldn't act like they didn't happen.

Original: Cyan:To fear death...and regret one's failings are feelings present in anyone.
Dialogue: To fear death...and regret one's failings are feelings present in anyone.
trans: 害怕死亡……和后悔自己的失败是任何人都会有的感觉。

Original: Cyan:...The number of times I have lamentedmy country'sruin, the loss ofmy family, are uncountable...
Dialogue: ...The number of times I have lamented my country's ruin, the loss of my family, are uncountable...
trans: ...我无数次为祖国灭亡、失去亲人而悲叹...

Original: Steiner:However...it is because of our journey that the princess and I are who we are today.
Dialogue: However...it is because of our journey that the princess and I are who we are today.
trans: 然而……正是因为我们的旅程，才有了今天的我和公主。

Original: Cyan:Verily. It is what lies beyond after seeing it through those terrible memories.
Dialogue: Verily. It is what lies beyond after seeing it through those terrible memories.

Original: Lightning:Anyway, still nothing proves we or the gods here have any power to meddle with time back in our own worlds.
Dialogue: Anyway, still nothing proves we or the gods here have any power to meddle with time back in our own worlds.
trans: 无论如何，仍然没有任何证据表明我们或这里的神灵有任何力量可以干预我们自己世界中的时间。

Original: Lightning:You have to keep your eyes front and move on. ...Regret is a waste of time.
Dialogue: You have to keep your eyes front and move on. ...Regret is a waste of time.
trans: 你必须保持你的眼睛向前并继续前进。

Original: Zidane:Yeah, I know.
Dialogue: Yeah, I know.

Original: Eiko:I'm with you, Lightning! When the going gets tough, I'm going with my eyes front!
Dialogue: I'm with you, Lightning! When the going gets tough, I'm going with my eyes front!

Original: Steiner:Indeed... Let us carry on.
Dialogue: Indeed... Let us carry on.

Original: Zidane:I'm fine, Vivi. You go on ahead.
Dialogue: I'm fine, Vivi. You go on ahead.

Original: Zidane:Kuja...please... At least in this world...don't go down the wrong path...
Dialogue: Kuja...please... At least in this world...don't go down the wrong path...
trans: 九子……求求你……至少在这个世界上……不要走上歧途……

Original: Zidane:Maybe if it's someplace within my reach...I can help you.
Dialogue: Maybe if it's someplace within my reach...I can help you.
trans: 也许如果它在我够得着的某个地方……我可以帮助你。

Original: Kuja:My, my... What a strong cast.
Dialogue: My, my... What a strong cast.
trans: 我的，我的...多么强大的演员阵容。

Original: Irvine:Oh, it's the show-off pretty boy. What's the occasion?
Dialogue: Oh, it's the show-off pretty boy. What's the occasion?

Original: Terra:If you've come here without Mog summoning you, that means...
Dialogue: If you've come here without Mog summoning you, that means...
trans: 如果你在没有莫格召唤你的情况下来到这里，那就意味着......

Original: Edgar:You have something to tell us that's not for moogle ears.
Dialogue: You have something to tell us that's not for moogle ears.
trans: 你有话要告诉我们，那不是给莫古利耳朵听的。

Original: Kuja:Heh... No pivotal revelations quite yet. We wouldn't want to spoil the story.
Dialogue: Heh... No pivotal revelations quite yet. We wouldn't want to spoil the story.

Original: Serah:Then tell us what you can. I don't care who it's from; I just want answers.
Dialogue: Then tell us what you can. I don't care who it's from; I just want answers.
trans: 然后告诉我们你能做什么。

Original: Kuja:...Such a strong heroine.
Dialogue: ...Such a strong heroine.

Original: Kuja:Let us talk about gods, today. Two gods who created a world.
Dialogue: Let us talk about gods, today. Two gods who created a world.

Original: Warrior of Light:The goddess who summoned us, Materia... And the other being Spiritus...
Dialogue: The goddess who summoned us, Materia... And the other being Spiritus...
trans: 召唤我们的女神，玛泰利亚……还有一个就是斯皮鲁图斯……

Original: Kuja:Yes, Materia and Spiritusa perpetually bickering pair.
Dialogue: Yes, Materia and Spiritus—a perpetually bickering pair.
trans: 是的，Materia 和 Spiritus——永远争吵不休的一对。

Original: Kuja:I was summoned by Spiritus. His sole concern is power, and he pays little heed to one's...people skills in their worlds.
Dialogue: I was summoned by Spiritus. His sole concern is power, and he pays little heed to one's...people skills in their worlds.
trans: 我是被 Spiritus 召唤的。

Original: Irvine:Well, that's funny. Didn't the two of them make the world?
Dialogue: Well, that's funny. Didn't the two of them make the world?

Original: Kuja:Yes, they created it, but therein arose some abnormalities...
Dialogue: Yes, they created it, but therein arose some abnormalities...
trans: 是的，他们创造了它，但其中出现了一些异常……

Original: Edgar:And though they should be working together to fix things, they can't agree on the means and quarrel to no end...?
Dialogue: And though they should be working together to fix things, they can't agree on the means and quarrel to no end...?
trans: 明明应该一起努力解决问题，却无法就手段达成一致，争吵不休……？

Original: Kuja:That quarrel is merely the superficial layer of this tale... What's eating away at the world is something more complex.
Dialogue: That quarrel is merely the superficial layer of this tale... What's eating away at the world is something more complex.
trans: 那场争吵只是这个故事的表面层……吞噬世界的是更复杂的东西。

Original: Serah:You're not saying that's Mog, are you?
Dialogue: You're not saying that's Mog, are you?

Original: Terra:But Mog! Mog's been guiding us...
Dialogue: But Mog! Mog's been guiding us...

Original: Irvine:Can anyone here come up with some proof either way?
Dialogue: Can anyone here come up with some proof either way?
trans: 这里的任何人都可以提出一些证据吗？

Original: Edgar:...We'll keep your words in mind. I'm sure they'll come in handy.
Dialogue: ...We'll keep your words in mind. I'm sure they'll come in handy.

Original: Kuja:Heh heh... Please carry on dancing until the climax.
Dialogue: Heh heh... Please carry on dancing until the climax.

Original: Terra:I can't believe Mog would be plotting something behind our backs...
Dialogue: I can't believe Mog would be plotting something behind our backs...
trans: 我不敢相信 Mog 会在我们背后策划什么...

Original: Edgar:Don't confuse "keeping in mind" with "believing."
Dialogue: Don't confuse "keeping in mind" with "believing."
trans: 不要将“牢记”与“相信”混淆。

Original: Warrior of Light:Regardless of the veracity of his tale...it is fact that Mog puts us in a difficult position by recruiting Kuja and his kind.
Dialogue: Regardless of the veracity of his tale...it is fact that Mog puts us in a difficult position by recruiting Kuja and his kind.
trans: 不管他的故事是否真实……事实上，Mog 招募了 Kuja 和他的同类，让我们陷入了困境。

Original: Serah:I don't think I could so easily trust someone who was a bitter enemy back home...
Dialogue: I don't think I could so easily trust someone who was a bitter enemy back home...
trans: 我不认为我可以如此轻易地相信一个在国内是死敌的人......

Original: Irvine:Our enemies could be next, don't you think?
Dialogue: Our enemies could be next, don't you think?
trans: 我们的敌人可能是下一个，你不觉得吗？

Original: Warrior of Light:If we notice the slightest harm or unease befall any of our comrades, we must not keep it to ourselves.
Dialogue: If we notice the slightest harm or unease befall any of our comrades, we must not keep it to ourselves.
trans: 如果我们注意到我们的任何同志受到丝毫伤害或不安，我们绝不能独自一人。

Original: Edgar:Naturally. We're brothers and sisters in destiny, after all.
Dialogue: Naturally. We're brothers and sisters in destiny, after all.

Original: ???:The last time Ivisited thereas an instructor was...with Squall, huh?
Dialogue: The last time I visited there as an instructor was...with Squall, huh?
trans: 我上次作为教练访问那里是……和 Squall 一起，是吧？

Original: ???:I think I remember teasing him then, too.
Dialogue: I think I remember teasing him then, too.
trans: 我想我记得当时也曾取笑过他。

Original: ???:Zell... Seifer... That was a rough exam...
Dialogue: Zell... Seifer... That was a rough exam...

Original: ???:Heavens, this isn't the time to get lost in thought.
Dialogue: Heavens, this isn't the time to get lost in thought.
trans: 天哪，现在可不是胡思乱想的时候。

Original: ???:Where could everyone be? I'd best try to meet back up.
Dialogue: Where could everyone be? I'd best try to meet back up.

Original: Laguna:Hey! Who's that over there!?
Dialogue: Hey! Who's that over there!?

Original: ???:You're kidding me... Laguna?
Dialogue: You're kidding me... Laguna?

Original: Y'shtola:Your acquaintance?
Dialogue: Your acquaintance?

Original: Laguna:Eh? Uh, I, um... I don't think we've met...maybe?
Dialogue: Eh? Uh, I, um... I don't think we've met...maybe?

Original: ???:...But that can't be right, because I shouldn't be me in that case. This is strange...
Dialogue: ...But that can't be right, because I shouldn't be me in that case. This is strange...
trans: ......但那是不对的，因为在那种情况下我不应该是我。

Original: ???:And who are these others? I've never seen a knight in full armor outside of movies...
Dialogue: And who are these others? I've never seen a knight in full armor outside of movies...

Original: ???:Ears and tails... An unknown race...?
Dialogue: Ears and tails... An unknown race...?
trans: 耳朵和尾巴……未知的种族……？

Original: ???:...No good. I need to calm down. Like I tell my students, there's a difference between a test and the real thing...
Dialogue: ...No good. I need to calm down. Like I tell my students, there's a difference between a test and the real thing...

Original: Zidane:Hello? You keep mumbling to yourself...
Dialogue: Hello? You keep mumbling to yourself...

Original: Laguna:Another one who knows me, but I don't know them... Why does this keep happening to me? Ugh, my head hurts...
Dialogue: Another one who knows me, but I don't know them... Why does this keep happening to me? Ugh, my head hurts...
trans: 另一个认识我，但我不认识他们的人……为什么这种事总是发生在我身上？

Original: Cecil:This may be more complicated than it first appeared, but she doesn't seem to be hostile.
Dialogue: This may be more complicated than it first appeared, but she doesn't seem to be hostile.
trans: 这可能比最初出现的要复杂，但她似乎并没有敌意。

Original: Y'shtola:It would be nice to determine as much at our leisure, so perhaps we should rid the area of any other threats first.
Dialogue: It would be nice to determine as much at our leisure, so perhaps we should rid the area of any other threats first.
trans: 如果我们能在闲暇时确定尽可能多的东西就好了，所以也许我们应该先清除该地区的任何其他威胁。

Original: Zell:Quistis!
Dialogue: Quistis!

Original: Quistis:Zell! And Squall! I finally found you!
Dialogue: Zell! And Squall! I finally found you!

Original: Y'shtola:So you are an acquaintance.
Dialogue: So you are an acquaintance.

Original: Zell:But she was the youngest to pass the SeeD exams. Her creds are solid!
Dialogue: But she was the youngest to pass the SeeD exams. Her creds are solid!
trans: 但她是通过 SeeD 考试的最年轻的人。

Original: Squall:...Glad you're safe.
Dialogue: ...Glad you're safe.

Original: Quistis:Uh-oh... Did something happen? It's not like you to worry about others.
Dialogue: Uh-oh... Did something happen? It's not like you to worry about others.

Original: Steiner:Master Squall has been most concerned about his friends back in his world.
Dialogue: Master Squall has been most concerned about his friends back in his world.
trans: Squall 大师最关心的是他在世界上的朋友们。

Original: Galuf:He puts on a standoffish face, but he's a compassionate lad deep down!
Dialogue: He puts on a standoffish face, but he's a compassionate lad deep down!
trans: 他表面冷漠，但内心深处是一个富有同情心的小伙子！

Original: Squall:(...I shouldn't have opened my mouth.)
Dialogue: (...I shouldn't have opened my mouth.)

Original: Quistis:An alternate world? It's hard to believe...but I think I've got the situation.
Dialogue: An alternate world? It's hard to believe...but I think I've got the situation.

Original: Y'shtola:We have been gathering allies along our journey.
Dialogue: We have been gathering allies along our journey.
trans: 在我们的旅程中，我们一直在召集盟友。

Original: Galuf:Everyone starts off on their own, but as you can see, we're now one big, happy family.
Dialogue: Everyone starts off on their own, but as you can see, we're now one big, happy family.
trans: 每个人都是自己开始的，但正如你所看到的，我们现在是一个幸福的大家庭。

Original: Quistis:So then the rest of our party is with you?
Dialogue: So then the rest of our party is with you?
trans: 那么我们党的其他人都和你在一起吗？

Original: Squall:We haven't found everyone. But that doesn't mean they're here.
Dialogue: We haven't found everyone. But that doesn't mean they're here.
trans: 我们还没有找到每个人。

Original: Quistis:I see... Here or not, though, you can't help but worry...
Dialogue: I see... Here or not, though, you can't help but worry...
trans: 我明白了……不管是不是在这里，你不禁担心……

Original: Quistis:"Ever."
Dialogue: "Ever."

Original: Y'shtola:Haha, you've read him like a book.
Dialogue: Haha, you've read him like a book.

Original: Steiner:Just like a teacher to know her student.
Dialogue: Just like a teacher to know her student.
trans: 就像老师了解她的学生一样。

Original: Quistis:Not as a teacher, but a friend. You've been fighting alongside him, too, haven't you?
Dialogue: Not as a teacher, but a friend. You've been fighting alongside him, too, haven't you?

Original: Squall:...It's good that you're alright and caught up on things. But as for me, just
Dialogue: ...It's good that you're alright and caught up on things. But as for me, just—
trans: ...很好，你没事并且赶上了事情。

Original: Y'shtola:"Leave me alone."
Dialogue: "Leave me alone."

Original: Y'shtola:...Did I do it right?
