Dialogue: ...Did I do it right?

Original: Squall:...Let's go.
Dialogue: ...Let's go.

Original: Zell:Aww, c'mon Squall! Don't pout!
Dialogue: Aww, c'mon Squall! Don't pout!

Original: Quistis:At last, someone with my sense of humor. We should have a chat.
Dialogue: At last, someone with my sense of humor. We should have a chat.
trans: 终于有人跟我一样幽默了。

Original: Y'shtola:It would be my pleasure. As a friend.
Dialogue: It would be my pleasure. As a friend.

Original: Galuf:Hmm, wise beyond her years and possessed of a deep understanding of her companions, it seems.
Dialogue: Hmm, wise beyond her years and possessed of a deep understanding of her companions, it seems.
trans: 嗯，看来是超越同龄人的智慧，对同伴有着深刻的理解。

Original: Steiner:Another valuable ally we have gained!
Dialogue: Another valuable ally we have gained!
trans: 我们又获得了一位宝贵的盟友！

Original: Quistis:I see you've been honing your skills during your time here, Zell.
Dialogue: I see you've been honing your skills during your time here, Zell.
trans: Zell，我看到你在这里的时间里一直在磨练你的技能。

Original: Zell:The competition's fierce in a big party like this! Gotta kick it up a notch!
Dialogue: The competition's fierce in a big party like this! Gotta kick it up a notch!
trans: 这么大的派对，竞争可真激烈啊！

Original: Quistis:And it's reassuring to see you've got a handle on your nerves, Irvine. Everyone is looking good, all things considered.
Dialogue: And it's reassuring to see you've got a handle on your nerves, Irvine. Everyone is looking good, all things considered.
trans: 欧文，看到你已经控制住了自己的神经，这让人感到安心。

Original: Irvine:Never been better.
Dialogue: Never been better.

Original: Zell:Oh yeah, Seifer and his crew are here, too...
Dialogue: Oh yeah, Seifer and his crew are here, too...
trans: 哦对了，Seifer 和他的团队也在这里……

Original: Zell:Be nice if he'd grow up a little...
Dialogue: Be nice if he'd grow up a little...
trans: 如果他能长大一点就好了...

Original: Vaan:That's right. You'd know Seifer, too, huh?
Dialogue: That's right. You'd know Seifer, too, huh?

Original: Quistis:You've met him?
Dialogue: You've met him?

Original: Hope:...Yeah, we've fought a number of times.
Dialogue: ...Yeah, we've fought a number of times.

Original: Vaan:He picks a fight with us every time we run into him.
Dialogue: He picks a fight with us every time we run into him.
trans: 每次我们遇到他，他都会找我们打架。

Original: Quistis:I'm not surprised... As his instructor, please accept my apologies.
Dialogue: I'm not surprised... As his instructor, please accept my apologies.
trans: 我并不惊讶……作为他的导师，请接受我的歉意。

Original: Yuna:We can tell he's not a bad person.
Dialogue: We can tell he's not a bad person.
trans: 我们可以看出他不是坏人。

Original: Yuna:He told me that I shouldn't have to shoulder everything myself, and that he'd protect me as a knight...
Dialogue: He told me that I shouldn't have to shoulder everything myself, and that he'd protect me as a knight...
trans: 他告诉我，我不应该独自承担一切，他会像骑士一样保护我……

Original: Irvine:Always a heavy-handed approach, that guy.
Dialogue: Always a heavy-handed approach, that guy.
trans: 总是一个严厉的方法，那个家伙。

Original: Quistis:...Indeed. A shortcoming that keeps holding him back...
Dialogue: ...Indeed. A shortcoming that keeps holding him back...

Original: Quistis:He gets good marks in combat...but his habit of ignoring others to do his own thing is inexcusable for a mercenary.
Dialogue: He gets good marks in combat...but his habit of ignoring others to do his own thing is inexcusable for a mercenary.
trans: 他在战斗中取得了不错的成绩......但是他的习惯无视他人做自己的事情对于佣兵来说是不可原谅的。

Original: Hope:So he was like that back in his own world, too...
Dialogue: So he was like that back in his own world, too...
trans: 所以他在自己的世界里也是这样……

Original: Zell:Those other two from thedisciplinary committee, too.
Dialogue: Those other two from the disciplinary committee, too.
trans: 纪律委员会的另外两个人也是。

Original: Quistis:Fujin and Raijin?
Dialogue: Fujin and Raijin?

Original: Irvine:The three of them carrying on without a clue about what's going on here sure is something.
Dialogue: The three of them carrying on without a clue about what's going on here sure is something.
trans: 他们三个在不知道这里发生了什么的情况下继续前进肯定是什么。

Original: Quistis:I see... They deserve an A for effort.
Dialogue: I see... They deserve an A for effort.
trans: 我明白了……他们的努力应该得到 A。

Original: Quistis:I suppose in this sort of situation, a bad habit of doing his own thing becomes an ability to act independently.
Dialogue: I suppose in this sort of situation, a bad habit of doing his own thing becomes an ability to act independently.
trans: 我想在这种情况下，自己做事的坏习惯变成了独立行动的能力。

Original: Zell:That's one way to put it. You're trying to defend his actions?
Dialogue: That's one way to put it. You're trying to defend his actions?

Original: Quistis:He hasn't committed any serious wrongdoing yet, right?
Dialogue: He hasn't committed any serious wrongdoing yet, right?
trans: 他还没有犯下什么大错吧？

Original: Irvine:Yet. No telling when he'll try to pull something funny, though.
Dialogue: Yet. No telling when he'll try to pull something funny, though.

Original: Quistis:I may not be his instructor anymore, but we grew up in the same environment. I'd like to see him succeed if possible.
Dialogue: I may not be his instructor anymore, but we grew up in the same environment. I'd like to see him succeed if possible.
trans: 我可能不再是他的导师了，但我们是在同一个环境中长大的。

Original: Hope:You sure are supportive. I'll bet you were a nice teacher.
Dialogue: You sure are supportive. I'll bet you were a nice teacher.

Original: Irvine:The kids love ya, "Instructor" Trepe.
Dialogue: The kids love ya, "Instructor" Trepe.

Original: Quistis:I told you, I'm no longer an instructor! ...Though I don't mind the compliment.
Dialogue: I told you, I'm no longer an instructor! ...Though I don't mind the compliment.
trans: 我告诉过你，我不再是教官了！

Original: Eiko:Say, Quistis!
Dialogue: Say, Quistis!

Original: Quistis:Oh? Hello, you two. How can I help you?
Dialogue: Oh? Hello, you two. How can I help you?

Original: Eiko:I've got a real interest in this school thing I've been hearing about!
Dialogue: I've got a real interest in this school thing I've been hearing about!
trans: 我对我一直听说的这所学校的事情很感兴趣！

Original: Vivi:You're a teacher, right, Miss? It'd be nice if you could teach us some stuff, too...
Dialogue: You're a teacher, right, Miss? It'd be nice if you could teach us some stuff, too...

Original: Quistis:What cute students. You'd be underclassmen back in the garden.
Dialogue: What cute students. You'd be underclassmen back in the garden.

Original: Quistis:I'll teach you what I can...but what about these three in the back there?
Dialogue: I'll teach you what I can...but what about these three in the back there?
trans: 我会尽我所能教给你……但是后面的这三个人呢？

Original: Prishe:Heya! Sign us up, too!
Dialogue: Heya! Sign us up, too!

Original: Sabin:With all my training, I forgot my studies. Figure I better learn a thing or two so I can help out Edgar!
Dialogue: With all my training, I forgot my studies. Figure I better learn a thing or two so I can help out Edgar!
trans: 在我所有的训练中，我忘记了我的学业。

Original: Bartz:It'd be useful to learn fighting techniques from another world! And it sounds like fun!
Dialogue: It'd be useful to learn fighting techniques from another world! And it sounds like fun!
trans: 学习异世界的格斗技术，还是很有用的！

Original: Quistis:I see... Well, you're free to join...but this will be elementary instruction, okay?
Dialogue: I see... Well, you're free to join...but this will be elementary instruction, okay?
trans: 我明白了……好吧，你可以自由加入……但这将是初级指导，好吗？

Original: Quistis:Alright, let's review the monsters we just discussed. Ready?
Dialogue: Alright, let's review the monsters we just discussed. Ready?
trans: 好吧，让我们回顾一下刚才讨论的怪物。

Original: Eiko:Yes, Miss Trepe!
Dialogue: Yes, Miss Trepe!

Original: Prishe:You bet! They're friggin' hot to the touch! I'm right, right?
Dialogue: You bet! They're friggin' hot to the touch! I'm right, right?

Original: Prishe:Huh? Was that it?
Dialogue: Huh? Was that it?

Original: Quistis:...Let's try again.
Dialogue: ...Let's try again.

Original: Quistis:What effect does amalboro'sbad breathhave on a person? Anyone?
Dialogue: What effect does a malboro's bad breath have on a person? Anyone?
trans: malboro 的口臭对人有什么影响？

Original: Sabin:You get real light-headed and pass out!
Dialogue: You get real light-headed and pass out!
trans: 你真的会头晕目眩然后昏倒！

Original: Bartz:You lose your appetite, too.
Dialogue: You lose your appetite, too.

Original: Quistis:I-I guess that's not wrong...
Dialogue: I-I guess that's not wrong...

Original: Sabin:Oh yeah! Wreckin' the curve!
Dialogue: Oh yeah! Wreckin' the curve!

Original: Bartz:We can do anything if we put our minds to it!
Dialogue: We can do anything if we put our minds to it!
trans: 只要我们下定决心，我们就可以做任何事情！

Original: Eiko:Aw, c'mon! What gives?
Dialogue: Aw, c'mon! What gives?

Original: Eiko:You guys are holding up the whole class! We can't move on like this!
Dialogue: You guys are holding up the whole class! We can't move on like this!

Original: Eiko:Vivi, speak up! Give 'em your piece of mind, too!
Dialogue: Vivi, speak up! Give 'em your piece of mind, too!

Original: Eiko:...You're asleep.
Dialogue: ...You're asleep.

Original: Prishe:Aren't we all a little tired?
Dialogue: Aren't we all a little tired?
trans: 我们是不是都有点累了？

Original: Sabin:I'll bet it's from having to use my melon for the first time in so long. How 'bout we all take a quick nap?
Dialogue: I'll bet it's from having to use my melon for the first time in so long. How 'bout we all take a quick nap?
trans: 我敢打赌这是这么长时间以来第一次不得不使用我的甜瓜。

Original: Bartz:Thanks, Quistis! I look forward to learning from you again!
Dialogue: Thanks, Quistis! I look forward to learning from you again!

Original: Quistis:...I'm a failure.
Dialogue: ...I'm a failure.

Original: Eiko:Arrrgh! How frustrating! It can't end like this!
Dialogue: Arrrgh! How frustrating! It can't end like this!

Original: Irvine:What's the matter, Quistis? Ah! Did you just remember something important?
Dialogue: What's the matter, Quistis? Ah! Did you just remember something important?

Original: Quistis:No, quite the opposite.
Dialogue: No, quite the opposite.

Original: Quistis:I feel as though, bit by bit, I'm losing details of events from our world.
Dialogue: I feel as though, bit by bit, I'm losing details of events from our world.
trans: 我感觉好像一点一点地，我正在失去我们世界事件的细节。

Original: Quistis:I haven't forgotten everything, of course, but it's like there are these holes...
Dialogue: I haven't forgotten everything, of course, but it's like there are these holes...
trans: 当然，我没有忘记一切，但好像有这些洞……

Original: Faris:You, too? Same here, to be honest.
Dialogue: You, too? Same here, to be honest.

Original: Galuf:I don't see what's so unusual about a little memory loss.
Dialogue: I don't see what's so unusual about a little memory loss.
trans: 我看不出一点失忆有什么不寻常。

Original: Onion Knight:You're a special case...
Dialogue: You're a special case...

Original: Balthier:More than a few are in the same situation. ...Enough to make me question myself.
Dialogue: More than a few are in the same situation. ...Enough to make me question myself.
trans: 不止几个处于相同的情况。

Original: Irvine:Out of curiosity, what's the situation with your GFs?
Dialogue: Out of curiosity, what's the situation with your GFs?
trans: 出于好奇，你的GF们的情况如何？

Original: Quistis:I haven't any... Or perhaps more accurately, I couldn't use them in this world even if I wanted to.
Dialogue: I haven't any... Or perhaps more accurately, I couldn't use them in this world even if I wanted to.
trans: 我什么都没有……或者更准确地说，在这个世界上我想用也用不上。

Original: Irvine:Sounds about right.
Dialogue: Sounds about right.

Original: Quistis:"Guardian Forces." Something like what we callsummonshere.
Dialogue: "Guardian Forces." Something like what we call summons here.

Original: Irvine:Where we're from, you get a nice power boost from equipping them.
Dialogue: Where we're from, you get a nice power boost from equipping them.
trans: 在我们来自的地方，装备它们可以获得不错的动力提升。

Original: Quistis:The trade-off being you lose some of your memory...or by chance remember things.
Dialogue: The trade-off being you lose some of your memory...or by chance remember things.
trans: 代价是你失去了一些记忆……或者偶然记住了一些事情。

Original: Galuf:Hm, what you might call a double-edged sword, eh?
Dialogue: Hm, what you might call a double-edged sword, eh?
trans: 嗯，你可以称之为一把双刃剑，嗯？

Original: Onion Knight:But you can't use them here, right?
Dialogue: But you can't use them here, right?
trans: 但是你不能在这里使用它们，对吧？

Original: Faris:Meaning they aren't to blame for your memory loss.
Dialogue: Meaning they aren't to blame for your memory loss.
trans: 这意味着他们不应该为你的失忆负责。

Original: Quistis:Yes, so it would seem...
Dialogue: Yes, so it would seem...

Original: Balthier:So is it the Torsions, or is it the gods?
Dialogue: So is it the Torsions, or is it the gods?

Original: Onion Knight:Torsions are one thing, but memory-stealing gods?
Dialogue: Torsions are one thing, but memory-stealing gods?
trans: 扭转是一回事，但记忆窃取神？

Original: Balthier:Who's to say? There could also be another player in the mix we've yet to imagine.
Dialogue: Who's to say? There could also be another player in the mix we've yet to imagine.

Original: Faris:Gods or whoever, what's there to gain from taking away our memories?
Dialogue: Gods or whoever, what's there to gain from taking away our memories?
trans: 神明或任何人，带走我们的记忆有什么好处？

Original: Irvine:"Keep your mind focused on this world"? Memories from back home'll get in the way, after all...
Dialogue: "Keep your mind focused on this world"? Memories from back home'll get in the way, after all...
trans: “让你的思想专注于这个世界”？

Original: Quistis:...At any rate, at least we can tell friend from foe.
Dialogue: ...At any rate, at least we can tell friend from foe.

Original: Quistis:I'd hate to imagine we're fighting our allies because we don't remember them.
Dialogue: I'd hate to imagine we're fighting our allies because we don't remember them.
trans: 我不愿想象我们正在与我们的盟友作战，因为我们不记得他们了。

Original: Balthier:Perish the thought. Now let's focus on the task at hand.
Dialogue: Perish the thought. Now let's focus on the task at hand.

Original: Mog:Lord Spiritus's warriors are really getting things done, kupo!
Dialogue: Lord Spiritus's warriors are really getting things done, kupo!
trans: 斯皮里图斯大人的战士们真的很努力，库波！

Original: Mog:Care to see what they've been up to, kupo?
Dialogue: Care to see what they've been up to, kupo?
trans: 想看看他们在做什么吗，kupo？

Original: Spiritus:Hmph... If you think you can manage such a feat, show me.
Dialogue: Hmph... If you think you can manage such a feat, show me.
trans: 哼……如果你认为你能做到这样的壮举，就告诉我吧。

Original: Cloud of Darkness:Hahaha... That you would even try to use us is appalling...
Dialogue: Hahaha... That you would even try to use us is appalling...
trans: 哈哈哈。。。。连你都想利用我们，太可怕了。。。

Original: Cloud of Darkness:We are the law itself. That is the reason which the world follows...
Dialogue: We are the law itself. That is the reason which the world follows...

Original: Mog:Kupo! They didn't tell us anything!
Dialogue: Kupo! They didn't tell us anything!

Original: Mog:How about this one, kupo?
Dialogue: How about this one, kupo?

Original: The Emperor:What's this...? A wretched god and its wretched spirit?
Dialogue: What's this...? A wretched god and its wretched spirit?

Original: The Emperor:I alone am all that's needed to rule this world. Shall I destroy it here and now?
Dialogue: I alone am all that's needed to rule this world. Shall I destroy it here and now?
trans: 我一个人就是统治这个世界所需要的一切。

Original: Mog:Hold that thought, kupo! If you destroy the world, the Torsions go with it, kupo!
Dialogue: Hold that thought, kupo! If you destroy the world, the Torsions go with it, kupo!

Original: Mog:That would put you in a bind, too, right, kupo?
Dialogue: That would put you in a bind, too, right, kupo?
trans: 那也会让你陷入困境，对吧，kupo？

Original: The Emperor:Then bother me no more. The next time you have an audience with me, it will be in a battle over the conqueror's throne.
Dialogue: Then bother me no more. The next time you have an audience with me, it will be in a battle over the conqueror's throne.

Original: Mog:Kupo... Let's try the sorceress, kupo...
Dialogue: Kupo... Let's try the sorceress, kupo...

Original: Ultimecia:Ha... Deceitful spirit. Still you persist with this act.
Dialogue: Ha... Deceitful spirit. Still you persist with this act.

Original: Ultimecia:Unaware of that within you, eating away at your very self...
Dialogue: Unaware of that within you, eating away at your very self...
trans: 没有意识到你内心的那个，正在吞噬你自己......

Original: Mog:Kupo! No one is cooperating, kupo...
Dialogue: Kupo! No one is cooperating, kupo...

Original: Kefka:This does not sit well with me. Pretending to let us do what we want, while it's really for your own hobbies.
Dialogue: This does not sit well with me. Pretending to let us do what we want, while it's really for your own hobbies.

Original: Kefka:Well, pthbbth! I'm through with you!
Dialogue: Well, pthbbth! I'm through with you!

Original: Kefka:Hee hee hee! Time to get on with my bad self, just the way I like it.
Dialogue: Hee hee hee! Time to get on with my bad self, just the way I like it.

Original: Mog:Are you going to cut ties with Lord Spiritus, kupo! Is that really a wise idea?
Dialogue: Are you going to cut ties with Lord Spiritus, kupo! Is that really a wise idea?
trans: 库波，你要和灵王断绝关系吗！

Original: Spiritus:I care not. At least I can grasp his motivation, unlike you.
Dialogue: I care not. At least I can grasp his motivation, unlike you.

Original: Mog:Kupo! I'm working hard for the sake of the world and its gods, kupo!
Dialogue: Kupo! I'm working hard for the sake of the world and its gods, kupo!

Original: Kefka:Hee hee hee! It has been a puh-leasure doing business with you.
Dialogue: Hee hee hee! It has been a puh-leasure doing business with you.

Original: Mog:Consider it a deal, kupo!
Dialogue: Consider it a deal, kupo!

Original: Terra:Mog!? Kefka...what are you doing here!?
Dialogue: Mog!? Kefka...what are you doing here!?

Original: Kefka:Whoopsie-daisy. I'll leave it to you to relay the particulars. TTFN!
Dialogue: Whoopsie-daisy. I'll leave it to you to relay the particulars. TTFN!

Original: Edgar:...Mog! Did you just accept Kefka's dimensional coordinates!?
Dialogue: ...Mog! Did you just accept Kefka's dimensional coordinates!?

Original: Firion:You mean...to fight with us!?
Dialogue: You mean...to fight with us!?
trans: 你的意思是……和我们一起战斗！？

Original: Terra:No! How could you!? Mog, you know what Kefka has done!
Dialogue: No! How could you!? Mog, you know what Kefka has done!

Original: Mog:H-he was so very insistent about it! Whether you use them or not is up to you, kupo...
Dialogue: H-he was so very insistent about it! Whether you use them or not is up to you, kupo...

Original: Edgar:That's not what we're talking about! We're talking about your behavior!
Dialogue: That's not what we're talking about! We're talking about your behavior!

Original: Edgar:That man has slaughtered countless innocents in his lust for carnage! There's no excusing his sins!
Dialogue: That man has slaughtered countless innocents in his lust for carnage! There's no excusing his sins!
trans: 那人杀戮无辜，杀戮无数！

Original: Shadow:You worked with Kefka for a time.
Dialogue: You worked with Kefka for a time.
trans: 你曾与 Kefka 合作过一段时间。

Original: Shadow:What's his goal here? Would you be able to detect any ulterior motives?
Dialogue: What's his goal here? Would you be able to detect any ulterior motives?
trans: 他来这里的目的是什么？

Original: Terra:Shadow! Are you really...?
Dialogue: Shadow! Are you really...?

Original: Shadow:I'm eliminating emotion to assess reality.
Dialogue: I'm eliminating emotion to assess reality.
trans: 我正在消除情绪以评估现实。

Original: Edgar:Are you telling us we need...to get a grip?
Dialogue: Are you telling us we need...to get a grip?
trans: 你是在告诉我们我们需要……抓紧时间吗？

Original: Shadow:I don't expect it to come easily.
Dialogue: I don't expect it to come easily.

Original: Firion:There's no telling when Kefka might betray us...
Dialogue: There's no telling when Kefka might betray us...
trans: 不知道凯夫卡什么时候会背叛我们……

Original: Shadow:By moogle logic, that would make Mog a traitor, too.
Dialogue: By moogle logic, that would make Mog a traitor, too.
trans: 按照 moogle 的逻辑，这也会使 Mog 成为叛徒。

Original: Edgar:So the moment Kefka starts acting suspiciously...we should be prepared to eliminate him and Mog wholesale.
Dialogue: So the moment Kefka starts acting suspiciously...we should be prepared to eliminate him and Mog wholesale.
trans: 因此，一旦 Kefka 开始表现可疑……我们就应该做好彻底消灭他和 Mog 的准备。

Original: Terra:Mog... Why...?
Dialogue: Mog... Why...?

Original: Vincent:...We don't need to reach a conclusion immediately. Let's take our time thinking this over.
Dialogue: ...We don't need to reach a conclusion immediately. Let's take our time thinking this over.

Original: Vincent:...What do you want?
Dialogue: ...What do you want?

Original: Kefka:I just came to see you, ol' palsy-walsy!
Dialogue: I just came to see you, ol' palsy-walsy!
trans: 我只是来看你的，麻痹大蛇！

Original: Kefka:You wike pwaying fwiends, don't you? I mean, all this talk of trust and stuff makes me want to hurl, but I see the appeal!
Dialogue: You wike pwaying fwiends, don't you? I mean, all this talk of trust and stuff makes me want to hurl, but I see the appeal!

Original: Vincent:...Leave me alone.
Dialogue: ...Leave me alone.

Original: Seifer:Hey! You trying to start something?
Dialogue: Hey! You trying to start something?

Original: Serah:Are you bothering Vincent?
Dialogue: Are you bothering Vincent?

Original: Kefka:Heh heh heh. You caught me!
Dialogue: Heh heh heh. You caught me!

Original: Kefka:I was just trying to have a little fun with my buddy!
Dialogue: I was just trying to have a little fun with my buddy!
trans: 我只是想和我的伙伴找点乐子！

Original: Vincent:...I won't make the same mistake again. You and I are nothing alike.
Dialogue: ...I won't make the same mistake again. You and I are nothing alike.

Original: Seifer:There'll be no fighting on my watch! If you keep this up, you'll have to answer to me.
Dialogue: There'll be no fighting on my watch! If you keep this up, you'll have to answer to me.
trans: 在我的任期内不会发生战斗！

Original: Kefka:Alright, alright. See ya later, alligator!
Dialogue: Alright, alright. See ya later, alligator!

Original: Raijin:That was close! You sure told him, ya know!
Dialogue: That was close! You sure told him, ya know!

Original: Vincent:...I'm fine.
Dialogue: ...I'm fine.

Original: Seifer:I still can't believe Mog allowed that guy to join our ranks. That moogle can't be trusted after all.
Dialogue: I still can't believe Mog allowed that guy to join our ranks. That moogle can't be trusted after all.
trans: 我仍然无法相信 Mog 允许那个人加入我们的行列。

Original: Serah:But thanks to you, Seifer, nothing happened.
Dialogue: But thanks to you, Seifer, nothing happened.
trans: 但多亏了你，Seifer，什么都没发生。

Original: Raijin:That's right! He takes his role on thedisciplinary committeeseriously, ya know!
Dialogue: That's right! He takes his role on the disciplinary committee seriously, ya know!

Original: Serah:Hehe... How noble of him.
Dialogue: Hehe... How noble of him.

Original: Seifer:Hmph... Course there'll be trouble with mooks like him around.
Dialogue: Hmph... Course there'll be trouble with mooks like him around.
trans: 哼……当然有像他这样的人在附近会有麻烦。

Original: Serah:That's true... Terra and Edgar haven't yet accepted Kefka as part of the group...
Dialogue: That's true... Terra and Edgar haven't yet accepted Kefka as part of the group...
trans: 没错……泰拉和埃德加还没有接受凯夫卡成为他们的一员……

Original: Serah:But I understand. Even I wouldn't be able to accept an enemy from my home world so easily...
Dialogue: But I understand. Even I wouldn't be able to accept an enemy from my home world so easily...

Original: Raijin:Yeah. Let us handle those moments, ya know?
Dialogue: Yeah. Let us handle those moments, ya know?

Original: Vincent:Everyone has something that they can't do on their own...
Dialogue: Everyone has something that they can't do on their own...
trans: 每个人都有自己做不到的事情...

Original: Serah:You're right. It's important for us to be there for each other.
Dialogue: You're right. It's important for us to be there for each other.

Original: Kefka:I can't believe a force of destruction like yourself was really summoned by that blockhead Materia.
Dialogue: I can't believe a force of destruction like yourself was really summoned by that blockhead Materia.
trans: 真不敢相信像你这样的破坏力真的是被那个蠢货魔晶石召唤出来的。

Original: Shantotto:Unfortunately for you, I don't recall by whom I was brought.
Dialogue: Unfortunately for you, I don't recall by whom I was brought.
trans: 对你来说不幸的是，我不记得我是由谁带来的。

Original: Shantotto:But I pursue my own goals, so to me, it matters not.
Dialogue: But I pursue my own goals, so to me, it matters not.
trans: 但我追求自己的目标，所以对我来说，这不重要。

Original: Kefka:Then why don't you come with me? I'm certain it'll be easier to satisfy your destructive desires.
Dialogue: Then why don't you come with me? I'm certain it'll be easier to satisfy your destructive desires.

Original: Shantotto:That is for me alone to decide.
Dialogue: That is for me alone to decide.
trans: 那是我一个人可以决定的。

Original: Shantotto:But I do not think my noble ideals and your uncouth motives would ever coincide.
Dialogue: But I do not think my noble ideals and your uncouth motives would ever coincide.
trans: 但我不认为我崇高的理想和你粗野的动机会一致。

Original: Kefka:Heh heh heh... No matter what pretty logic you put behind it, destruction is still destruction!
Dialogue: Heh heh heh... No matter what pretty logic you put behind it, destruction is still destruction!
trans: 嘿嘿嘿……不管你用什么漂亮的逻辑，破坏就是破坏！

Original: Eiko:Oh no! What should I do!? If those two start a fight, it's gonna be big trouble!
Dialogue: Oh no! What should I do!? If those two start a fight, it's gonna be big trouble!

Original: Rem:What's the matter? Is something wrong?
Dialogue: What's the matter? Is something wrong?

Original: Eiko:Yes! It's Shantotto and Kefka! Come quick!
Dialogue: Yes! It's Shantotto and Kefka! Come quick!

Original: Papalymo:Good grief... That's a combination to make my head hurt.
Dialogue: Good grief... That's a combination to make my head hurt.
trans: 天哪……这是让我头疼的组合。

Original: King:Let's get a move on.
Dialogue: Let's get a move on.

Original: Rem:What happened here!?
Dialogue: What happened here!?

Original: Shantotto:Have you come to help me? You're a bit late, as you can see.
Dialogue: Have you come to help me? You're a bit late, as you can see.

Original: Eiko:Did you fight Kefka?
Dialogue: Did you fight Kefka?

Original: Shantotto:I was merely conducting an experiment, to my own merriment.
Dialogue: I was merely conducting an experiment, to my own merriment.
trans: 我只是在进行一个实验，以取悦自己。

Original: King:An experiment? It looks like someone used a massive amount of magic here.
Dialogue: An experiment? It looks like someone used a massive amount of magic here.

Original: Rem:Just what were you trying to test?
Dialogue: Just what were you trying to test?

Original: Papalymo:Well... Do you know what happens to the remnants of magic? Have you noticed it flowing in a certain direction?
Dialogue: Well... Do you know what happens to the remnants of magic? Have you noticed it flowing in a certain direction?
trans: 嗯……你知道魔法残余会发生什么吗？

Original: King:We were studying the use of magic back home, so I guess...
Dialogue: We were studying the use of magic back home, so I guess...
trans: 我们在家里学习魔法的使用，所以我猜……

Original: Rem:...Toward Mog?
Dialogue: ...Toward Mog?

Original: Shantotto:Oh, how cheery! It seems there was some truth to my theory!
Dialogue: Oh, how cheery! It seems there was some truth to my theory!

Original: Papalymo:Yes. It appears that Mog's been absorbing the energy we release during battle.
Dialogue: Yes. It appears that Mog's been absorbing the energy we release during battle.

Original: Eiko:But why would Mog do such a thing? Won't he explode?
Dialogue: But why would Mog do such a thing? Won't he explode?
trans: 但是为什么莫格会做出这样的事情呢？

Original: Shantotto:Explode... I see. That's what his intention may be.
Dialogue: Explode... I see. That's what his intention may be.

Original: Papalymo:A clash between warriors of different worlds produces magical power or an equivalent energy.
Dialogue: A clash between warriors of different worlds produces magical power or an equivalent energy.
trans: 不同世界的战士之间的冲突会产生魔力或等效能量。

Original: King:Which means he's trying to use that energy for something.
Dialogue: Which means he's trying to use that energy for something.
trans: 这意味着他正试图将这种能量用于某些事情。

Original: Rem:I can't imagine it's anything good. Let's tread carefully... We have no choice but to fight.
Dialogue: I can't imagine it's anything good. Let's tread carefully... We have no choice but to fight.
trans: 我无法想象这是什么好事。

Original: Faris:That mage, Kefka. He hasn't done anything to us so far.
Dialogue: That mage, Kefka. He hasn't done anything to us so far.

Original: Faris:I get that it's nothing good, but what did he do in your world?
Dialogue: I get that it's nothing good, but what did he do in your world?
trans: 我知道这没什么好，但他在你的世界里做了什么？

Original: Ramza:If it comes to a duel, I would know as well.
Dialogue: If it comes to a duel, I would know as well.

Original: Edgar:Originally he was amagitek knightof theGestahlian Empire.
Dialogue: Originally he was a magitek knight of the Gestahlian Empire.
trans: 最初他是 Gestahlian 帝国的 magitek 骑士。

Original: Warrior of Light:Stole the power of goddesses...?
Dialogue: Stole the power of goddesses...?

Original: Ramza:Had he no cognizance of his crimes? Some ideology or driving goal?
Dialogue: Had he no cognizance of his crimes? Some ideology or driving goal?
trans: 难道他不知道自己的罪行吗？

Original: Setzer:Kefka hasn't the heart for such luxuries as that.
Dialogue: Kefka hasn't the heart for such luxuries as that.
trans: 凯夫卡不喜欢这样的奢侈品。

Original: Edgar:His mind is completely shattered. All he seeks is ruin... Nothing more.
Dialogue: His mind is completely shattered. All he seeks is ruin... Nothing more.

Original: Faris:In order words...he can't listen to reason.
Dialogue: In order words...he can't listen to reason.
trans: 言下之意……他听不进去道理。

Original: Faris:Isn't this a right awful party member we've brought aboard. What is that Mog thinking?
Dialogue: Isn't this a right awful party member we've brought aboard. What is that Mog thinking?
trans: 这不是我们带上来的正派烂党员吗？

Original: Ramza:Mog's thoughts aside... What Kefka's deeds wrought are hard to forgive...
Dialogue: Mog's thoughts aside... What Kefka's deeds wrought are hard to forgive...
trans: 抛开莫格的想法……凯夫卡的所作所为令人难以原谅……

Original: Ramza:Sacrificing the innocent and the powerless...!
Dialogue: Sacrificing the innocent and the powerless...!

Original: Warrior of Light:We can no longer trust Mog's judgment... We must rely on our own.
Dialogue: We can no longer trust Mog's judgment... We must rely on our own.
trans: 我们不能再相信莫格的判断了……我们必须依靠自己。

Original: Terra:But how can we find our way in this world without any help...?
Dialogue: But how can we find our way in this world without any help...?
trans: 但是，我们如何在没有任何帮助的情况下在这个世界上找到自己的路……？

Original: Setzer:It's a gamble.
Dialogue: It's a gamble.

Original: Ramza:Mog professes he acts at the goddess's word, but we cannot take that at face value...
Dialogue: Mog professes he acts at the goddess's word, but we cannot take that at face value...
trans: Mog 声称他是按照女神的话行事，但我们不能只相信表面上的价值......

Original: Setzer:Right. But if we watch his actions, we should be able to read his hand.
Dialogue: Right. But if we watch his actions, we should be able to read his hand.

Original: Edgar:Mog acts toward some goal other than the gods' will...but what...?
Dialogue: Mog acts toward some goal other than the gods' will...but what...?
trans: 莫格为了神的意志以外的某个目标而行动……但是……什么……？

Original: Setzer:We're one step behind him.
Dialogue: We're one step behind him.

Original: Ramza:What can we do?
Dialogue: What can we do?

Original: Warrior of Light:We can only prepare to remain staunch in our convictions when the moment of truth comes.
Dialogue: We can only prepare to remain staunch in our convictions when the moment of truth comes.
trans: 我们只能准备在关键时刻到来时保持坚定的信念。

Original: King:...Something's off about the monsters around here.
Dialogue: ...Something's off about the monsters around here.

Original: Galuf:Hrm. There are signs here and there of beasts battling each other.
Dialogue: Hrm. There are signs here and there of beasts battling each other.

Original: Faris:That's not all. There's poison spread about over there.
Dialogue: That's not all. There's poison spread about over there.

Original: Faris:It's like some big...something was scattering poison as it thrashed about.
Dialogue: It's like some big...something was scattering poison as it thrashed about.
trans: 就像一个大的……有什么东西在四处乱窜，散播着毒药。

Original: Mog:Kupo!? Someone's collapsed up ahead, kupo!
Dialogue: Kupo!? Someone's collapsed up ahead, kupo!

Original: Faris:!? It can't be...!!
Dialogue: !? It can't be...!!

Original: Faris:It is you! Hey, snap out of it!
Dialogue: It is you! Hey, snap out of it!

Original: Galuf:...No good. She's out cold.
Dialogue: ...No good. She's out cold.

Original: Mog:Do you know her, kupo?
Dialogue: Do you know her, kupo?

Original: Galuf:Yes, we traveled with her back in our world. She's Faris's little sister.
Dialogue: Yes, we traveled with her back in our world. She's Faris's little sister.
trans: 是的，我们和她一起回到了我们的世界。

Original: Faris:Lenna! It's me! Answer me!
Dialogue: Lenna! It's me! Answer me!

Original: King:...She's badly wounded. We should tend to her quickly.
Dialogue: ...She's badly wounded. We should tend to her quickly.

Original: Faris:Blast it! Who could have done this...!?
Dialogue: Blast it! Who could have done this...!?

Original: Mog:Kupooo! It sounds like a ferocious monster is around here, kupo!
Dialogue: Kupooo! It sounds like a ferocious monster is around here, kupo!

Original: King:It's too dangerous to stay here. Let's get her someplace safe.
Dialogue: It's too dangerous to stay here. Let's get her someplace safe.

Original: Galuf:Right you are. Good grief, some reunion this is...
Dialogue: Right you are. Good grief, some reunion this is...

Original: Lenna:...Un...unhhh...
Dialogue: ...Un...unhhh...

Original: Faris:Lenna! You're awake!
Dialogue: Lenna! You're awake!

Original: Lenna:Faris...? And Bartz...
Dialogue: Faris...? And Bartz...

Original: Bartz:Thank goodness! She remembers us!
Dialogue: Thank goodness! She remembers us!

Original: Lenna:...What happened to that poor thing?
Dialogue: ...What happened to that poor thing?

Original: Faris:What poor thing?
Dialogue: What poor thing?

Original: Lenna:There was a dragon... She was so badly injured...
Dialogue: There was a dragon... She was so badly injured...
trans: 有一条龙……她受了这么重的伤……

Original: Lenna:She kept crying out, "It hurts. Help me."
Dialogue: She kept crying out, "It hurts. Help me."
trans: 她不停地叫喊：“好疼，救救我。”

Original: Cecil:What's this? She can understand the words of dragons?
Dialogue: What's this? She can understand the words of dragons?

Original: Bartz:Yeah. She has a special connection with all kinds of animals.
Dialogue: Yeah. She has a special connection with all kinds of animals.

Original: Lenna:I so desperately wanted to help her, but it didn't go so well...
Dialogue: I so desperately wanted to help her, but it didn't go so well...
trans: 我非常想帮助她，但没有那么顺利......

Original: Faris:...Is that who attacked you?
Dialogue: ...Is that who attacked you?

Original: Lenna:No! It's not her fault!
Dialogue: No! It's not her fault!

Original: Lenna:Her body wouldn't move how she wanted due to the pain. She didn't mean to hurt me.
Dialogue: Her body wouldn't move how she wanted due to the pain. She didn't mean to hurt me.
trans: 由于疼痛，她的身体不能随心所欲地移动。

Original: Lenna:She must be struggling by herself somewhere out there. I have to help her...
Dialogue: She must be struggling by herself somewhere out there. I have to help her...
trans: 她一定是在外面的某个地方独自挣扎。

Original: Cecil:Despite what you've gone through, you still put the dragon's concerns above your own. You are a kind soul.
Dialogue: Despite what you've gone through, you still put the dragon's concerns above your own. You are a kind soul.
trans: 不管你经历过什么，你仍然把龙的担忧置于你自己之上。

Original: Lenna:...Um, who are you?
Dialogue: ...Um, who are you?

Original: Mog:Kupo! We're back from scouting, kupo!
Dialogue: Kupo! We're back from scouting, kupo!

Original: Terra:Oh, you're awake? Thank goodness.
Dialogue: Oh, you're awake? Thank goodness.

Original: Lenna:I heard from my sister all that you've done for me. Thank you very much...
Dialogue: I heard from my sister all that you've done for me. Thank you very much...
trans: 我从姐姐那里听说了你为我所做的一切。

Original: Mog:Kupo kupo! It's nice to meet you again, kupo!
Dialogue: Kupo kupo! It's nice to meet you again, kupo!

Original: Bartz:So, how'd it look out there?
Dialogue: So, how'd it look out there?
trans: 那么，那里看起来怎么样？

Original: Terra:...Everywhere you look is corroded by poison. It all seems to have been spread by a dragon.
Dialogue: ...Everywhere you look is corroded by poison. It all seems to have been spread by a dragon.
trans: ......你看到的每个地方都被毒药腐蚀了。

Original: Faris:A dragon... That must be the one Lenna spoke of.
Dialogue: A dragon... That must be the one Lenna spoke of.
trans: 一条龙……那一定是莲娜说的那条。

Original: Mog:The dragon was also covered in poison, kupo. It must have fought with some venomous creature, kupo.
Dialogue: The dragon was also covered in poison, kupo. It must have fought with some venomous creature, kupo.
trans: 这条龙也浑身是毒，库波。

Original: Terra:It likely spread the poison around as it thrashed in pain...
Dialogue: It likely spread the poison around as it thrashed in pain...
trans: 它很可能在痛苦地挣扎时将毒药四处散布……

Original: Bartz:And is still thrashing.
Dialogue: And is still thrashing.

Original: Lenna:Can't we help her...?
Dialogue: Can't we help her...?

Original: Mog:From the looks of it, it's too late to do anything, kupo...
Dialogue: From the looks of it, it's too late to do anything, kupo...
trans: 看样子，现在做什么都来不及了，库波……

Original: Terra:It's already at death's door. All it can do is lash out until it breathes its last...
Dialogue: It's already at death's door. All it can do is lash out until it breathes its last...

Original: Lenna:I see...
Dialogue: I see...

Original: Cecil:We might become the target of its frustration at any time, too.
Dialogue: We might become the target of its frustration at any time, too.
trans: 我们也随时可能成为它挫败的目标。

Original: Faris:Lenna, I know how you must be feeling, but...
Dialogue: Lenna, I know how you must be feeling, but...
trans: 莱娜，我知道你的感受，但是……

Original: Lenna:...Thank you. I don't want anyone else to get hurt.
Dialogue: ...Thank you. I don't want anyone else to get hurt.

Original: Lenna:But I can't stand to see her suffer anymore...
Dialogue: But I can't stand to see her suffer anymore...
trans: 但我再也无法忍受看到她受苦了...

Original: Lenna:Let's go to her now. I want to do what I can.
Dialogue: Let's go to her now. I want to do what I can.

Original: Bartz:...Yeah, let's.
Dialogue: ...Yeah, let's.

Original: Cecil:Lenna... We shan't let your conviction go to waste.
Dialogue: Lenna... We shan't let your conviction go to waste.
trans: Lenna... 我们不会让你的信念付诸东流。

Original: Serah:You're so amazing, Lenna! I think it's wonderful that you want to save that poor dragon.
Dialogue: You're so amazing, Lenna! I think it's wonderful that you want to save that poor dragon.

Original: Lenna:Of course I do! I can't just leave her out there on her own...
Dialogue: Of course I do! I can't just leave her out there on her own...

Original: Bartz:Your kind heart hasn't changed a bit. But let's not forget how much trouble that's gotten you into before.
Dialogue: Your kind heart hasn't changed a bit. But let's not forget how much trouble that's gotten you into before.
trans: 你善良的心丝毫没有改变。

Original: Serah:Did something like this happen in your home world, too?
Dialogue: Did something like this happen in your home world, too?
trans: 你的家乡世界也发生过这样的事情吗？

Original: Faris:You got that right.
Dialogue: You got that right.

Original: Faris:She once crossed apoisonous fieldto getdragon grassfor her sickwind drake, Hiryu.
Dialogue: She once crossed a poisonous field to get dragon grass for her sick wind drake, Hiryu.
trans: 她曾经穿过一片有毒的田野，为她生病的风龙 Hiryu 采摘龙草。

Original: Bartz:You even ate the dragon weed in front of him, didn't you?
Dialogue: You even ate the dragon weed in front of him, didn't you?
trans: 你连他面前的龙草都吃了吧？

Original: Lenna:Yes. I had to show him it was okay, or else he wouldn't have eaten it.
Dialogue: Yes. I had to show him it was okay, or else he wouldn't have eaten it.

Original: Galuf:But it's poisonous to humans, despite being medicinal to dragons...
Dialogue: But it's poisonous to humans, despite being medicinal to dragons...
trans: 但它对人类来说是有毒的，尽管它对龙是有药效的……

Original: Serah:Poisonous? ...Well, it looks like you made it out just fine.
Dialogue: Poisonous? ...Well, it looks like you made it out just fine.

Original: Lightning:You're a lot braver than I thought.
Dialogue: You're a lot braver than I thought.
trans: 你比我想象的勇敢多了。

Original: Faris:But you need to be more careful. You're the only sister I have, you know.
Dialogue: But you need to be more careful. You're the only sister I have, you know.

Original: Lightning:I know how you feel. Having a reckless little sister isn't easy.
Dialogue: I know how you feel. Having a reckless little sister isn't easy.

Original: Serah:Me? Reckless? You're one to talk!
Dialogue: Me? Reckless? You're one to talk!

Original: Bartz:Is Serah really so rash?
Dialogue: Is Serah really so rash?

Original: Lightning:She has a bad habit of running off, and she's no stranger to getting caught up in trouble.
Dialogue: She has a bad habit of running off, and she's no stranger to getting caught up in trouble.
trans: 她有逃跑的坏习惯，而且她对陷入困境并不陌生。

Original: Serah:Hey, Pot! Kettle here!
Dialogue: Hey, Pot! Kettle here!

Original: Serah:Aren't you the one always rushing headfirst into things without even listening to others?
Dialogue: Aren't you the one always rushing headfirst into things without even listening to others?
trans: 你不就是那种连别人都不听就一头冲进去的人吗？

Original: Lightning:What!? Don't talk like you know!
Dialogue: What!? Don't talk like you know!

Original: Lenna:Please calm down, you two.
Dialogue: Please calm down, you two.

Original: Bartz:I guess Lenna and Serah have a lot in common. They both look calm, but when push comes to shove, they're ready to take action.
Dialogue: I guess Lenna and Serah have a lot in common. They both look calm, but when push comes to shove, they're ready to take action.
trans: 我想 Lenna 和 Serah 有很多共同点。

Original: Galuf:Ho ho ho! I suppose that toughness is a hand-me-down from their older sisters.
Dialogue: Ho ho ho! I suppose that toughness is a hand-me-down from their older sisters.

Original: Faris:...Is that supposed to be praise, Galuf?
Dialogue: ...Is that supposed to be praise, Galuf?

Original: Galuf:But of course. Blood will tell, after all. Hohoho!
Dialogue: But of course. Blood will tell, after all. Hohoho!

Original: Steiner:Hm... It's so strange...
Dialogue: Hm... It's so strange...

Original: Faris:What is, Steiner?
Dialogue: What is, Steiner?

Original: Steiner:You and Lady Lenna are sisters, are you not?
Dialogue: You and Lady Lenna are sisters, are you not?
trans: 你和莱娜夫人是姐妹，不是吗？

Original: Steiner:Yet one is a pirate, and the other a princess...
Dialogue: Yet one is a pirate, and the other a princess...
trans: 一个是海贼，一个是公主……

Original: Steiner:Never have I heard of sisters like that!
Dialogue: Never have I heard of sisters like that!
trans: 我从来没有听说过这样的姐妹！

Original: Balthier:It's a valid point. How does a princess become a pirate?
Dialogue: It's a valid point. How does a princess become a pirate?

Original: Steiner:What in the world happened?
Dialogue: What in the world happened?

Original: Lenna:...Faris and I were separated when we were children.
Dialogue: ...Faris and I were separated when we were children.
trans: ...法瑞斯和我小时候就分开了。

Original: Faris:I was lost at sea and found by pirates.
Dialogue: I was lost at sea and found by pirates.
trans: 我在海上迷路了，被海盗找到了。

Original: Ashe:I see... So you two didn't grow up together.
Dialogue: I see... So you two didn't grow up together.
trans: 我明白了……所以你们两个不是一起长大的。

Original: Garnet:How did you two ever find each other again?
Dialogue: How did you two ever find each other again?
trans: 你们两个怎么又找到对方了？

Original: Lenna:And on that journey, I needed a boat.
Dialogue: And on that journey, I needed a boat.
trans: 在那段旅程中，我需要一艘船。

Original: Faris:The boat she wanted was captained by none other than yours truly.
Dialogue: The boat she wanted was captained by none other than yours truly.
trans: 她想要的那艘船的船长不是别人，正是您的船长。

Original: Balthier:I can't imagine such a meeting was a mere coincidence. Sounds like fate to me.
Dialogue: I can't imagine such a meeting was a mere coincidence. Sounds like fate to me.
trans: 我无法想象这样的会面只是巧合。

Original: Steiner:Princess Lenna, I know you left your home for a noble reason, but you shouldn't have.
Dialogue: Princess Lenna, I know you left your home for a noble reason, but you shouldn't have.
trans: 莱娜公主，我知道你离开家是为了一个崇高的理由，但你不应该这样做。

Original: Steiner:You are royalty! You must consider your own safety!
Dialogue: You are royalty! You must consider your own safety!

Original: Steiner:I cannot condone running away and collaborating with brigands under any circumstances!
Dialogue: I cannot condone running away and collaborating with brigands under any circumstances!
trans: 任何情况下都不能容忍逃跑和强盗勾结！

Original: Garnet:...Are you trying to lecture me, Steiner?
Dialogue: ...Are you trying to lecture me, Steiner?

Original: Ashe:There comes a time where everyone needs some help, no matter the source.
Dialogue: There comes a time where everyone needs some help, no matter the source.
trans: 总有一天每个人都需要一些帮助，无论来源如何。

Original: Balthier:I much prefer a princess who takes action than one who stays locked up in her tower, crying her eyes out.
Dialogue: I much prefer a princess who takes action than one who stays locked up in her tower, crying her eyes out.
trans: 我更喜欢一位采取行动的公主，而不是一位一直被锁在塔楼里哭泣的公主。

Original: Steiner:But what about her people?
Dialogue: But what about her people?

Original: Steiner:The people want their monarchs to be safe and in good health! Please don't forget that!
Dialogue: The people want their monarchs to be safe and in good health! Please don't forget that!
trans: 人民希望他们的君主平安健康！

Original: Garnet:...He's right. I don't know what to say back...
Dialogue: ...He's right. I don't know what to say back...

Original: Ashe:I am chagrined...
Dialogue: I am chagrined...

Original: Steiner:P-please, don't lose such heart!
Dialogue: P-please, don't lose such heart!
trans: 拜、拜托，不要失去这样的心！

Original: Faris:Steiner has a point.
Dialogue: Steiner has a point.

Original: Faris:There are a lot of people waiting for you to return. That's why we need to go back alive, Lenna.
Dialogue: There are a lot of people waiting for you to return. That's why we need to go back alive, Lenna.

Original: Lenna:Of course. I have no intention otherwise.
Dialogue: Of course. I have no intention otherwise.

Original: Lenna:I will keep fighting for this world, and the people of Tycoon!
Dialogue: I will keep fighting for this world, and the people of Tycoon!
trans: 我会继续为这个世界而战，为大亨的人民而战！

Original: Balthier:Someone waiting for your return... How nice that must be.
Dialogue: Someone waiting for your return... How nice that must be.
trans: 有人在等你回来……那该有多好。

Original: Galuf:That's the last of the Torsions in the vicinity.
Dialogue: That's the last of the Torsions in the vicinity.
trans: 那是附近的最后一个扭曲。

Original: Mog:It's all thanks to your hard work, kupo!
Dialogue: It's all thanks to your hard work, kupo!

Original: Bartz:Kay, let's move on to our next destination.
Dialogue: Kay, let's move on to our next destination.
trans: 凯，让我们继续我们的下一个目的地。

Original: Yuna:...Hm? Just a moment. I don't see Lenna around.
Dialogue: ...Hm? Just a moment. I don't see Lenna around.

Original: Galuf:Now that you mention it...
Dialogue: Now that you mention it...

Original: Bartz:Vivi and Eiko are gone, too. Where'd everyone go?
Dialogue: Vivi and Eiko are gone, too. Where'd everyone go?
trans: Vivi 和 Eiko 也不见了。

Original: Eiko:Guys! Sorry to keep you waiting!
Dialogue: Guys! Sorry to keep you waiting!

Original: Galuf:You're all muddied up? What on earth happened?
Dialogue: You're all muddied up? What on earth happened?

Original: Vivi:The three of us dug a grave for the dragon.
Dialogue: The three of us dug a grave for the dragon.
trans: 我们三个人给龙挖了一个坟墓。

Original: Bartz:A grave for the dragon?
Dialogue: A grave for the dragon?

Original: Lenna:Yes... I want her to rest in peace.
Dialogue: Yes... I want her to rest in peace.

Original: Yuna:Is that so...?
Dialogue: Is that so...?

Original: Yuna:I am certain she's so terribly happy that you were there to send her on.
Dialogue: I am certain she's so terribly happy that you were there to send her on.
trans: 我敢肯定她非常高兴你在那里送她去。

Original: Eiko:We left lots and lots of flower seeds over the grave for her!
Dialogue: We left lots and lots of flower seeds over the grave for her!
trans: 我们在墓前为她留下了许许多多的花种！

Original: Galuf:Ho ho ho, wonderful! Lovely flowers are sure to bloom.
Dialogue: Ho ho ho, wonderful! Lovely flowers are sure to bloom.

Original: Bartz:Yeah. Let's come back after some time so we can all pay our respects.
Dialogue: Yeah. Let's come back after some time so we can all pay our respects.

Original: Lenna:Thank you, everyone...
Dialogue: Thank you, everyone...

Original: Mog:As long as the Torsions persist, incidents like this are bound to happen, kupo...
Dialogue: As long as the Torsions persist, incidents like this are bound to happen, kupo...
trans: 只要扭曲持续存在，这样的事件就一定会发生，库珀......

Original: Yuna:Monsters from different worlds will come into conflict after passing through the Torsions...
Dialogue: Monsters from different worlds will come into conflict after passing through the Torsions...
trans: 来自不同世界的怪物在穿越扭曲后会发生冲突......

Original: Galuf:Neither side was ever meant to encounter the other.
Dialogue: Neither side was ever meant to encounter the other.
trans: 双方都不打算遇到对方。

Original: Galuf:An unnatural struggle... It's no wonder that poor dragon met such a fate.
Dialogue: An unnatural struggle... It's no wonder that poor dragon met such a fate.
trans: 反常的挣扎……难怪可怜的龙会落得如此下场。

Original: Lenna:I...want to see all the Torsions closed. I can't bear to see this tragedy repeat itself...
Dialogue: I...want to see all the Torsions closed. I can't bear to see this tragedy repeat itself...
trans: 我……想看到所有的 Torsions 都关闭。

Original: Mog:Kupo! Those are the words I hoped to hear, kupo! I can feel the kindness flowing form the light of your will, kupo!
Dialogue: Kupo! Those are the words I hoped to hear, kupo! I can feel the kindness flowing form the light of your will, kupo!

Original: Vivi:Let's give it our all, Miss Lenna.
Dialogue: Let's give it our all, Miss Lenna.
trans: 让我们全力以赴，莱娜小姐。

Original: Eiko:We'll all help!
Dialogue: We'll all help!

Original: Bartz:Gosh... Don't take on more than you can handle, hear?
Dialogue: Gosh... Don't take on more than you can handle, hear?
trans: 天哪...不要承担超出你能力范围的事情，听到了吗？

Original: Galuf:Not to worry, Bartz. When they take on too much, we'll be there to lend them a hand.
Dialogue: Not to worry, Bartz. When they take on too much, we'll be there to lend them a hand.

Original: Cloud:...You're cornered.
Dialogue: ...You're cornered.

Original: Cloud:So what? Draw your weapon!
Dialogue: So what? Draw your weapon!

Original: Hope:I can't find Cloud anywhere.
Dialogue: I can't find Cloud anywhere.
trans: 我在任何地方都找不到 Cloud。

Original: Warrior of Light:Have we no hint as to his whereabouts?
Dialogue: Have we no hint as to his whereabouts?
trans: 我们没有关于他下落的线索吗？

Original: Mog:I sense something powerful over that way, kupo! Two somethings, kupo!
Dialogue: I sense something powerful over that way, kupo! Two somethings, kupo!
trans: 我从那边感觉到某种强大的东西，库波！

Original: Sephiroth:...World order?
Dialogue: ...World order?

Original: Sephiroth:Of course... You're the one...
Dialogue: Of course... You're the one...

Original: Mog:K-kupo!? He's gonna attack us, kupo!
Dialogue: K-kupo!? He's gonna attack us, kupo!

Original: Tifa:He's not an opponent to take lightly! Help me out, guys!
Dialogue: He's not an opponent to take lightly! Help me out, guys!
trans: 他不是可以掉以轻心的对手！

Original: Sephiroth:Heh heh... ...That's right. Let me see this.
Dialogue: Heh heh... ...That's right. Let me see this.

Original: Sephiroth:...Now I see.
Dialogue: ...Now I see.

Original: Mog:Kupo! S-stop looking at me, kupo!
Dialogue: Kupo! S-stop looking at me, kupo!

Original: Cloud:I'm over here!
Dialogue: I'm over here!

Original: Shadow:Wait! We're not alone... Manikins!
Dialogue: Wait! We're not alone... Manikins!

Original: Zidane:Aww, c'mon. The real ones are bad enough.
Dialogue: Aww, c'mon. The real ones are bad enough.

Original: Sephiroth:Heh... A copy that was never even a lab rat...
Dialogue: Heh... A copy that was never even a lab rat...
trans: 呵……连实验鼠都不是的副本……

Original: Sephiroth:...Don't make me laugh.
Dialogue: ...Don't make me laugh.

Original: Zidane:He's gonna fight the manikins!?
Dialogue: He's gonna fight the manikins!?

Original: Shadow:"The enemy of my enemy is my friend," eh? Cloud, what say you?
Dialogue: "The enemy of my enemy is my friend," eh? Cloud, what say you?
trans: “我敌人的敌人就是我的朋友，”嗯？

Original: Cloud:There's got to be a catch... There's no way we can trust him.
Dialogue: There's got to be a catch... There's no way we can trust him.
trans: 一定有陷阱……我们不可能相信他。

Original: Mog:Y-yeah, but...!
Dialogue: Y-yeah, but...!

Original: Mog:There's no way we can fight Sephiroth and his manikin at the same time, kupo...
Dialogue: There's no way we can fight Sephiroth and his manikin at the same time, kupo...
trans: 我们不可能同时对付 Sephiroth 和他的模型，库波……

Original: Shadow:Hm. Either one alone would leave us in sorry shape.
Dialogue: Hm. Either one alone would leave us in sorry shape.

Original: Mog:Desperate times call for desperate measures. We need to take the advantage we can, kupo.
Dialogue: Desperate times call for desperate measures. We need to take the advantage we can, kupo.
trans: 危急时刻需要采取危急措施。

Original: Sephiroth:Heh heh heh... So that's how you lead them.
Dialogue: Heh heh heh... So that's how you lead them.
trans: 嘿嘿嘿……原来你就是这么领导他们的。

Original: Mog:Kupo... What amazing energy, kupo. With that
Dialogue: Kupo... What amazing energy, kupo. With that—
trans: 库波……多么惊人的能量，库波。

Original: Sephiroth:Ha ha ha...
Dialogue: Ha ha ha...

Original: Cloud:Sephiroth! We aren't finished!
Dialogue: Sephiroth! We aren't finished!

Original: Sephiroth:So cold, Cloud.
Dialogue: So cold, Cloud.

Original: Sephiroth:This isn't the planet to return to. You lost your reason to fight me long ago.
Dialogue: This isn't the planet to return to. You lost your reason to fight me long ago.

Original: Vivi:Cloud... What's he talking about?
Dialogue: Cloud... What's he talking about?

Original: Sephiroth:It's entirely possible you wouldn't understand... How much do you remember?
Dialogue: It's entirely possible you wouldn't understand... How much do you remember?
trans: 你完全有可能不明白……你记得多少？

Original: Sephiroth:Have you never questioned those memories? Your abilities?
Dialogue: Have you never questioned those memories? Your abilities?
trans: 你从来没有质疑过那些记忆吗？

Original: Sephiroth:Things you've lost... And things you're given... Do you plan to repeat this pattern over and over?
Dialogue: Things you've lost... And things you're given... Do you plan to repeat this pattern over and over?
trans: 你失去的东西……你得到的东西……你打算一遍又一遍地重复这种模式吗？

Original: Sephiroth:And you're the one using that to gather power.
Dialogue: And you're the one using that to gather power.
trans: 而你就是那个用它来收集力量的人。

Original: Mog:I haven't the foggiest, kupo.
Dialogue: I haven't the foggiest, kupo.

Original: Sephiroth:All you've gathered... Let me see that power for myself...!
Dialogue: All you've gathered... Let me see that power for myself...!
trans: 你集齐的一切……让我亲眼看看那股力量……！

Original: Sephiroth:Ha ha ha... You're joking, right? Don't tell me you haven't been suspicious from the start.
Dialogue: Ha ha ha... You're joking, right? Don't tell me you haven't been suspicious from the start.

Original: Warrior of Light:Hn... That is...
Dialogue: Hn... That is...

Original: Vivi:I-I trust Mog! I know everyone else is unsure, but I decided to trust him!
Dialogue: I-I trust Mog! I know everyone else is unsure, but I decided to trust him!

Original: Warrior of Light:Vivi... Indeed, you have the right of it... Although my faith in Mog may have wavered
Dialogue: Vivi... Indeed, you have the right of it... Although my faith in Mog may have wavered—
trans: 薇薇……的确，你有权利这么做……虽然我对莫格的信心可能动摇了——

Original: Sephiroth:Save your theatrics.
Dialogue: Save your theatrics.

Original: Sephiroth:Cloud... How about you? What crosses your mind when you look at this unfinished world and its unfinished puppets?
Dialogue: Cloud... How about you? What crosses your mind when you look at this unfinished world and its unfinished puppets?

Original: Cloud:I...trust Mog...
Dialogue: I...trust Mog...

Original: Sephiroth:That's your answer?
Dialogue: That's your answer?

Original: Sephiroth:Heh heh. Very well... I shall usher you forward, so you can see your own reactions when confronted with the truth.
Dialogue: Heh heh. Very well... I shall usher you forward, so you can see your own reactions when confronted with the truth.

Original: Warrior of Light:Usher...? Explain yourself!
Dialogue: Usher...? Explain yourself!

Original: Sephiroth:Take it.
Dialogue: Take it.

Original: Sephiroth:That power inside of you... Don't disappoint me.
Dialogue: That power inside of you... Don't disappoint me.
trans: 你内在的力量……别让我失望。

Original: Cloud:You took his dimensional coordinates!?
Dialogue: You took his dimensional coordinates!?

Original: Mog:That's the will I was given, kupo...
Dialogue: That's the will I was given, kupo...

Original: Mog:I don't understand his intentions either, but I'm sure his strength will be of use to you, kupo.
Dialogue: I don't understand his intentions either, but I'm sure his strength will be of use to you, kupo.
trans: 我也不明白他的用意，但我相信他的力量对你有用，库波。

Original: Mog:I can't fight, kupo... So I have to help you find your way in this world...and trust...in you...
Dialogue: I can't fight, kupo... So I have to help you find your way in this world...and trust...in you...
trans: 我不会战斗，库波……所以我必须帮助你在这个世界上找到自己的出路……并且相信……你……

Original: Mog:All I can do...is support you, kupo...
Dialogue: All I can do...is support you, kupo...
trans: 我能做的就是……支持你，库波……

Original: Mog:I-I... I want to he...lp you, kupo... I... I...
Dialogue: I-I... I want to he...lp you, kupo... I... I...
trans: 我-我...我想他...帮助你，库波...我...我...

Original: Vivi:M-M-Mog, are you alright!?
Dialogue: M-M-Mog, are you alright!?

Original: Mog:What do you mean, kupo?
Dialogue: What do you mean, kupo?

Original: Mog:We've got a new ally! Let's keep fighting and go close those Torsions, kupo!
Dialogue: We've got a new ally! Let's keep fighting and go close those Torsions, kupo!

Original: Mog:Cheer up, everyone! Let's go, kupo!
Dialogue: Cheer up, everyone! Let's go, kupo!

Original: Cait Sith:I know what they say about cats and curiosity, but I can't help wondering what Sephiroth is thinking.
Dialogue: I know what they say about cats and curiosity, but I can't help wondering what Sephiroth is thinking.
trans: 我知道他们怎么说猫和好奇心，但我忍不住想知道 Sephiroth 在想什么。

Original: Cait Sith:I just can't put my paw on what his goal is. He seems different from Spiritus's other warriors.
Dialogue: I just can't put my paw on what his goal is. He seems different from Spiritus's other warriors.
trans: 我只是无法确定他的目标是什么。

Original: Zidane:Kuja wants to change his destiny
Dialogue: Kuja wants to change his destiny—

Original: Tidus:Seymour said he wanted to liberate us with death.
Dialogue: Seymour said he wanted to liberate us with death.
trans: 西摩说他想用死亡来解放我们。

Original: Celes:And Kefka just seems to be enjoying the carnage as always.
Dialogue: And Kefka just seems to be enjoying the carnage as always.
trans: 而凯夫卡似乎一如既往地享受着这场屠杀。

Original: Cait Sith:But Sephiroth's goal here doesn't match up with the kind of things he did back home.
Dialogue: But Sephiroth's goal here doesn't match up with the kind of things he did back home.
trans: 但是 Sephiroth 在这里的目标与他在家乡所做的事情不相符。

Original: Layle:Maybe we could help if we knew more about him.
Dialogue: Maybe we could help if we knew more about him.
trans: 如果我们对他有更多了解，也许我们可以提供帮助。

Original: Layle:Could you tell us what kind of person he was back in your world?
Dialogue: Could you tell us what kind of person he was back in your world?
trans: 你能告诉我们他在你的世界里是什么样的人吗？

Original: Cloud:But...after learning the truth about his birth, he went mad and started spiraling out of control.
Dialogue: But...after learning the truth about his birth, he went mad and started spiraling out of control.
trans: 但是……在得知自己出生的真相后，他发疯了，开始失控。

Original: Layle:What exactly did he find out?
Dialogue: What exactly did he find out?

Original: Celes:Artificially enhanced? Just like me and Kefka...
Dialogue: Artificially enhanced? Just like me and Kefka...

Original: Zidane:I see. So maybe Sephiroth's not so different from us after all...
Dialogue: I see. So maybe Sephiroth's not so different from us after all...

Original: Cait Sith:No... He's completely different.
Dialogue: No... He's completely different.

Original: Cloud:I'll never forget the heat of the flames from that day...
Dialogue: I'll never forget the heat of the flames from that day...
trans: 我永远不会忘记那天火焰的热度...

Original: Tidus:So Cloud went after Sephiroth for revenge?
Dialogue: So Cloud went after Sephiroth for revenge?
trans: 所以克劳德是为了报复萨菲罗斯而去的？

Original: Cait Sith:Cloud's hometown was just the beginning.
Dialogue: Cloud's hometown was just the beginning.
trans: 克劳德的家乡只是个开始。

Original: Cait Sith:After that, he tried to destroy the entire planet.
Dialogue: After that, he tried to destroy the entire planet.
trans: 在那之后，他试图摧毁整个星球。

Original: Celes:Then he's just like Kefka, isn't he?
Dialogue: Then he's just like Kefka, isn't he?
trans: 那么他就像凯夫卡，不是吗？

Original: Cloud:The planet tried to fix itself. And he gathered that energy...
Dialogue: The planet tried to fix itself. And he gathered that energy...
trans: 这个星球试图自我修复。

Original: Cloud:Wait. Could he be trying to gather this world's energy like that planesgorger that possessed Mog?
Dialogue: Wait. Could he be trying to gather this world's energy like that planesgorger that possessed Mog?

Original: Layle:Maybe he wants the energy to rewrite world order, like some kind of god.
Dialogue: Maybe he wants the energy to rewrite world order, like some kind of god.
trans: 也许他想要改写世界秩序的能量，就像某种神一样。

Original: Cait Sith:I don't get it. Even if he changed the world order here, what good would it do?
Dialogue: I don't get it. Even if he changed the world order here, what good would it do?

Original: Cait Sith:All I know is we're all in trouble if he's found a new purpose in this world...
Dialogue: All I know is we're all in trouble if he's found a new purpose in this world...
trans: 我所知道的是，如果他在这个世界上找到了新的目标，我们都会遇到麻烦……

Original: Tidus:This guy sounds like a real pain.
Dialogue: This guy sounds like a real pain.
trans: 这家伙听起来真的很痛苦。

Original: Zidane:Well, whatever his goal may be, it sounds like he's still as dangerous an enemy as he was in your world.
Dialogue: Well, whatever his goal may be, it sounds like he's still as dangerous an enemy as he was in your world.
trans: 好吧，不管他的目标是什么，听起来他仍然是一个危险的敌人，就像他在你的世界里一样。

Original: Cloud:Yeah. We should be on our guard.
Dialogue: Yeah. We should be on our guard.

Original: Kefka:Heh heh heh. Welcome back! Did you have fun playing with our new pals?
Dialogue: Heh heh heh. Welcome back! Did you have fun playing with our new pals?

Original: Kuja:Were you waiting here just to ask me that?
Dialogue: Were you waiting here just to ask me that?
trans: 你等在这里就是为了问我这个吗？

Original: Kefka:Why so cold? We're on the same team, aren't we?
Dialogue: Why so cold? We're on the same team, aren't we?

Original: Kuja:Please don't rope me in with your buffoonery.
Dialogue: Please don't rope me in with your buffoonery.
trans: 请不要用你的滑稽来拉拢我。

Original: Kefka:Oh! Back so soon?
Dialogue: Oh! Back so soon?

Original: Kefka:It seems like you just can't stay away from that porcupine head!
Dialogue: It seems like you just can't stay away from that porcupine head!
trans: 看来你就是离不开那个豪猪头啊！

Original: Sephiroth:Stay out of my business.
Dialogue: Stay out of my business.

Original: Kefka:Aww... Nobody wants to play with me! What's the matter? Am I really that annoying?
Dialogue: Aww... Nobody wants to play with me! What's the matter? Am I really that annoying?

Original: Seymour:That is correct.
Dialogue: That is correct.

Original: Kefka:Well, if it isn't Mister Maester! Did you have some business to attend to with our friends, too?
Dialogue: Well, if it isn't Mister Maester! Did you have some business to attend to with our friends, too?
trans: 好吧，如果不是学士先生的话！

Original: Seymour:...I've had enough of your idle chatter. You couldn't possibly understand what I'm doing.
Dialogue: ...I've had enough of your idle chatter. You couldn't possibly understand what I'm doing.

Original: Kefka:You know, you're absolutely right!
Dialogue: You know, you're absolutely right!
trans: 你知道，你是绝对正确的！

Original: Kefka:So why don't you enlighten me? If not for kicks, then why are you helping them?
Dialogue: So why don't you enlighten me? If not for kicks, then why are you helping them?
trans: 那你为什么不开导我呢？

Original: Kefka:Ack! Wait, wait! Come on. It's been so long since we've seen each other, so why don't you stay and chat?
Dialogue: Ack! Wait, wait! Come on. It's been so long since we've seen each other, so why don't you stay and chat?

Original: Kefka:...We could talk about that moogle, for example.
Dialogue: ...We could talk about that moogle, for example.
trans: ...例如，我们可以谈谈那个莫古利。

Original: Kuja:...Mog? He betrayed those fools.
Dialogue: ...Mog? He betrayed those fools.

Original: Kefka:Yeah! But while blabbing on about the big bad Blackened Will, he was oh so sneakily gathering energy!
Dialogue: Yeah! But while blabbing on about the big bad Blackened Will, he was oh so sneakily gathering energy!

Original: Kefka:And even after all that, those goody two-shoes still kept the scheming sack of fluff around! They're even chummier now!
Dialogue: And even after all that, those goody two-shoes still kept the scheming sack of fluff around! They're even chummier now!
trans: 即使在这之后，那些好东西的双鞋仍然保留着诡计多端的绒毛袋！

Original: Kefka:I can't believe it! How does crazy stuff like this even happen!?
Dialogue: I can't believe it! How does crazy stuff like this even happen!?

Original: Sephiroth:Sympathy. Forgiveness. But those are all lies... Lies that pitiful humans cling to for survival.
Dialogue: Sympathy. Forgiveness. But those are all lies... Lies that pitiful humans cling to for survival.

Original: Kefka:I see! It's all because they're weak, little worms.
Dialogue: I see! It's all because they're weak, little worms.

Original: Seymour:That's right... Real truth doesn't exist in any world.
Dialogue: That's right... Real truth doesn't exist in any world.
trans: 没错……任何世界都不存在真正的真理。

Original: Sephiroth:They'll soon feel the sting of betrayal and the coldness of despair...
Dialogue: They'll soon feel the sting of betrayal and the coldness of despair...
trans: 他们很快就会感受到背叛的刺痛和绝望的寒冷……

Original: Kefka:Oooh, I get it now! It seems we're on the same page after all!
Dialogue: Oooh, I get it now! It seems we're on the same page after all!

Original: Kuja:Silence, clown.
Dialogue: Silence, clown.

Original: Sephiroth:Learn to hold your tongue...else I'll cut you down where you stand.
Dialogue: Learn to hold your tongue...else I'll cut you down where you stand.
trans: 学会管住你的舌头……否则我会把你砍倒在地。

Original: Kefka:Hmph. Alright, alright already!
Dialogue: Hmph. Alright, alright already!

Original: Seymour:It seems like the moogle and his friends are calling.
Dialogue: It seems like the moogle and his friends are calling.
trans: 莫古利和他的朋友们似乎在呼唤。

Original: Kefka:Ta-ta! Have fun out there!
Dialogue: Ta-ta! Have fun out there!

Original: Vaan:You alright, Cloud? You don't look so good.
Dialogue: You alright, Cloud? You don't look so good.

Original: Cloud:It's nothing... Don't worry about it.
Dialogue: It's nothing... Don't worry about it.

Original: Vincent:He's just airsick.
Dialogue: He's just airsick.

Original: Sazh:Aw, man! Even you get sick?
Dialogue: Aw, man! Even you get sick?

Original: Sazh:...But I was at the helm. Sorry about that.
Dialogue: ...But I was at the helm. Sorry about that.

Original: Cloud:It's not your fault.
Dialogue: It's not your fault.

Original: Vaan:Leave the flying to me next time! I'll give you a smoother ride than Sazh's!
Dialogue: Leave the flying to me next time! I'll give you a smoother ride than Sazh's!

Original: Cloud:Please. Don't make things worse.
Dialogue: Please. Don't make things worse.

Original: Vaan:Tsk, figures... Huh?
Dialogue: Tsk, figures... Huh?

Original: Vaan:Is someone rummaging around over there?
Dialogue: Is someone rummaging around over there?

Original: Vincent:That's a familiar backside.
Dialogue: That's a familiar backside.

Original: Cloud:Yeah, it is. ...C'mon.
Dialogue: Yeah, it is. ...C'mon.

Original: ???:$#&%! Nothing but a pile of junk!
Dialogue: $#&%! Nothing but a pile of junk!

Original: Cid:Cloud! Vincent! Where the hell'd you two run off to?
Dialogue: Cloud! Vincent! Where the hell'd you two run off to?

Original: Vincent:What were you doing there?
Dialogue: What were you doing there?

Original: Cid:Huh? Trying to cobble together something to get me airborne, of course.
Dialogue: Huh? Trying to cobble together something to get me airborne, of course.

Original: Sazh:From scratch!?
Dialogue: From scratch!?

Original: Cid:Natch! Need some way to track down and reconnect with my group.
Dialogue: Natch! Need some way to track down and reconnect with my group.

Original: Cloud:In that case, you're all set. Here we are.
Dialogue: In that case, you're all set. Here we are.
trans: 在这种情况下，你已经准备好了。

Original: Cid:Huh? I guess so, but...
Dialogue: Huh? I guess so, but...

Original: Vaan:Look out! Behind you!
Dialogue: Look out! Behind you!

Original: Vincent:It appears a Torsion was buried under that rubble.
Dialogue: It appears a Torsion was buried under that rubble.
trans: 看来 Torsion 被埋在了那块瓦砾下。

Original: Cid:The hell's a "Torsion"?
Dialogue: The hell's a "Torsion"?

Original: Cloud:We'll explain after we take care of those things.
Dialogue: We'll explain after we take care of those things.
trans: 我们会在处理完这些事情后进行解释。

Original: Cid:...You don't say. A whole new world, huh?
Dialogue: ...You don't say. A whole new world, huh?

Original: Yuffie:Gee, you caught on faster than I'd expect you to.
Dialogue: Gee, you caught on faster than I'd expect you to.
trans: 哎呀，你比我预期的要快。

Original: Tifa:I don't think he's giving it all that much thought...
Dialogue: I don't think he's giving it all that much thought...
trans: 我认为他没有考虑那么多...

Original: Cid:Alright! Let's build a big ol' airship and fly on back home!
Dialogue: Alright! Let's build a big ol' airship and fly on back home!

Original: Sazh:Cid, listen. If it's a big airship you want we've got ya covered.
Dialogue: Cid, listen. If it's a big airship you want we've got ya covered.

Original: Cid:That so? Even if you do, I'm warning you, I can be a bit stubborn when it comes to these things.
Dialogue: That so? Even if you do, I'm warning you, I can be a bit stubborn when it comes to these things.

Original: Cid:We've got the world's best pilot here, I'll have you know! Even got an airship with my name on it!
Dialogue: We've got the world's best pilot here, I'll have you know! Even got an airship with my name on it!
trans: 我们这里有世界上最好的飞行员，我会让你知道的！

Original: Setzer:And a new competitor enters the race.
Dialogue: And a new competitor enters the race.
trans: 一个新的竞争者参加了比赛。

Original: Sazh:Now, now, let's keep our passengers' safety in mind 'fore we talk about racing...
Dialogue: Now, now, let's keep our passengers' safety in mind 'fore we talk about racing...
trans: 现在，现在，在我们谈论赛车之前，让我们牢记乘客的安全......

Original: Vaan:Hey, Cid! Teach me how to fly, too, will ya? These guys never let me take the wheel.
Dialogue: Hey, Cid! Teach me how to fly, too, will ya? These guys never let me take the wheel.

Original: Cid:Huh? That's 'cause they sized you up, kid.
Dialogue: Huh? That's 'cause they sized you up, kid.

Original: Cid:If they haven't let you steer, there's a reason. All the more so with passengers on board.
Dialogue: If they haven't let you steer, there's a reason. All the more so with passengers on board.
trans: 如果他们不让你掌舵，那是有原因的。

Original: Cid:I didn't get to where I am in a day either. Take it one step at a time and you'll reach your dreams.
Dialogue: I didn't get to where I am in a day either. Take it one step at a time and you'll reach your dreams.
trans: 我一天也没有到达我所在的地方。

Original: Cid:For now, just work on aping others' techniques. Think of it as training.
Dialogue: For now, just work on aping others' techniques. Think of it as training.
trans: 现在，只需努力模仿他人的技术。

Original: Vaan:I guess you're right. You all were young once, too, huh?
Dialogue: I guess you're right. You all were young once, too, huh?

Original: Setzer:I hope that remark wasn't directed at me.
Dialogue: I hope that remark wasn't directed at me.
trans: 我希望那句话不是针对我的。

Original: Cid:Alright, let's see this airship. Could be a tune up is in order.
Dialogue: Alright, let's see this airship. Could be a tune up is in order.
trans: 好吧，让我们看看这艘飞艇。

Original: Vaan:Sure thing! It's over here!
Dialogue: Sure thing! It's over here!

Original: Sazh:Man, now I want to take a look, too!
Dialogue: Man, now I want to take a look, too!

Original: Tifa:We didn't even have to ask him to join us.
Dialogue: We didn't even have to ask him to join us.
trans: 我们甚至不必请他加入我们。

Original: Yuffie:Good for Cid hitting it off with his new friends.
Dialogue: Good for Cid hitting it off with his new friends.
trans: Cid 和他的新朋友一见如故。

Original: Cid:Hey, Mog. You're the one who provided that airship?
Dialogue: Hey, Mog. You're the one who provided that airship?

Original: Mog:Kupo! Do you like it, kupo?
Dialogue: Kupo! Do you like it, kupo?

Original: Cid:Yeah, she ain't a bad boat! Got a comfortable clunk to her!
Dialogue: Yeah, she ain't a bad boat! Got a comfortable clunk to her!

Original: Cid:...So, uh, I don't suppose she's got any rockets on her, eh?
Dialogue: ...So, uh, I don't suppose she's got any rockets on her, eh?
trans: ......所以，呃，我不认为她身上有任何火箭，嗯？

Original: Mog:K-kupo? Rockets...kupo?
Dialogue: K-kupo? Rockets...kupo?

Original: Cloud:Not that again...
Dialogue: Not that again...

Original: Cid:Argh! $#&%, yes, that again!
Dialogue: Argh! $#&%, yes, that again!

Original: Irvine:"That" what?
Dialogue: "That" what?

Original: Yuffie:Cid wants to be an astronaut. The first man in space.
Dialogue: Cid wants to be an astronaut. The first man in space.
trans: Cid 想成为一名宇航员。

Original: Irvine:Ohhh, space...
Dialogue: Ohhh, space...

Original: Irvine:I guess we beat him to the punch, eh, Squall?
Dialogue: I guess we beat him to the punch, eh, Squall?

Original: Squall:(Don't remind me...)
Dialogue: (Don't remind me...)

Original: Cid:Beat me...? You kids've been to space?
Dialogue: Beat me...? You kids've been to space?

Original: Irvine:It just kinda happened that way.
Dialogue: It just kinda happened that way.

Original: Cid:Just kinda happened!? Holy $#&%, am I jealous!
Dialogue: Just kinda happened!? Holy $#&%, am I jealous!

Original: Cid:Hey, what'd the planet look like from space!? Was there anything out there!?
Dialogue: Hey, what'd the planet look like from space!? Was there anything out there!?
trans: 嘿，从太空看这个星球是什么样子的！？

Original: Cid:Do you really float around weightlessly!? D-don't tell me you went out on a spacewalk!
Dialogue: Do you really float around weightlessly!? D-don't tell me you went out on a spacewalk!

Original: Squall:(What a pain...)
Dialogue: (What a pain...)

Original: Mog:You're as giddy as a kid, kupo!
Dialogue: You're as giddy as a kid, kupo!

Original: Yuffie:I sure don't get it. Just thinking about going to space makes me queasy. ...Urp.
Dialogue: I sure don't get it. Just thinking about going to space makes me queasy. ...Urp.

Original: Cloud:Likewise. I want nothing to do with it.
Dialogue: Likewise. I want nothing to do with it.

Original: Cid:A s-space station...?
Dialogue: A s-space station...?

Original: Irvine:If you felt like it, you could probably go live there.
Dialogue: If you felt like it, you could probably go live there.
trans: 如果你愿意，你可能会住在那里。

Original: Cid:Cloud! Yuffie! I've made up my mind!
Dialogue: Cloud! Yuffie! I've made up my mind!

Original: Cid:When we're done here, I'm going back to these guys' world! Don't try to stop me!
Dialogue: When we're done here, I'm going back to these guys' world! Don't try to stop me!
trans: 当我们在这里完成后，我要回到这些家伙的世界！

Original: Cloud:No one's stopping you...
Dialogue: No one's stopping you...

Original: Cid:Alright, gotta get to closing those Torsions! For space!
Dialogue: Alright, gotta get to closing those Torsions! For space!
trans: 好吧，必须开始关闭那些 Torsions！

Original: Mog:Th-that's not supposed to be why we're closing them, kupo...
Dialogue: Th-that's not supposed to be why we're closing them, kupo...
trans: 这不应该是我们关闭它们的原因，kupo...

Original: Cid:Irvine! You tell me more about it!
Dialogue: Irvine! You tell me more about it!

Original: Irvine:What? Me!? Squall!
Dialogue: What? Me!? Squall!

Original: Squall:You reap what you sowed.
Dialogue: You reap what you sowed.

Original: Yuffie:He's all yours.
Dialogue: He's all yours.

Original: Cid:What's this all of a sudden?
Dialogue: What's this all of a sudden?

Original: Cecil:My apologies. I just realized something.
Dialogue: My apologies. I just realized something.

Original: Cecil:Inmy world, there's also someone by the name ofCid. He was both a pilot and engineer, not unlike you.
Dialogue: In my world, there's also someone by the name of Cid. He was both a pilot and engineer, not unlike you.
trans: 在我的世界里，还有一个叫 Cid 的人。

Original: Cid:Well, ain't that a coincidence!
Dialogue: Well, ain't that a coincidence!

Original: Onion Knight:He was an old man who knew his way around an airship, too. He used aperpetual engineto makeour shipfly.
Dialogue: He was an old man who knew his way around an airship, too. He used a perpetual engine to make our ship fly.
trans: 他是个老头，对飞艇也了如指掌。

Original: Bartz:TheCidfrommy worldwas an inventor and scholar.
Dialogue: The Cid from my world was an inventor and scholar.
trans: 来自我的世界的 Cid 是一位发明家和学者。

Original: Bartz:He could read ancient texts and remodel our airship. He was a big help on our journey.
Dialogue: He could read ancient texts and remodel our airship. He was a big help on our journey.
trans: 他可以阅读古代文献并改造我们的飞艇。

Original: Cid:Gahaha! Happy to hear they're doing their namesake proud.
Dialogue: Gahaha! Happy to hear they're doing their namesake proud.

Original: Tifa:You don't seem surprised at all.
Dialogue: You don't seem surprised at all.

Original: Cid:The world is a big place. It's only natural there'd be others with the same name.
Dialogue: The world is a big place. It's only natural there'd be others with the same name.

Original: Tifa:I guess you've got a point...
Dialogue: I guess you've got a point...

Original: Cid:How 'bout you, Zidane? Any great Cids in your world?
Dialogue: How 'bout you, Zidane? Any great Cids in your world?

Original: Zidane:He'sthe ruler of a hugecountry. He likes inventing and even developed airships.
