Original: Vanille:Yes. I thought it was no good for us to be the only ones keeping secrets... And I just never had a chance to talk about it.
Dialogue: Yes. I thought it was no good for us to be the only ones keeping secrets... And I just never had a chance to talk about it.

Original: Fang:I see...
Dialogue: I see...

Original: Yuri:So you've been alive for a long time, then.
Dialogue: So you've been alive for a long time, then.
trans: 那么你已经活了很长时间了。

Original: Yuri:Does that mean you two are also part of a special race?
Dialogue: Does that mean you two are also part of a special race?
trans: 这是否意味着你们两个也是特殊种族的一部分？

Original: Fang:Huh? No. We were asleep for a long time is all.
Dialogue: Huh? No. We were asleep for a long time is all.

Original: Chelinka:Yuri, you need to be more considerate! Some people are sensitive about their age!
Dialogue: Yuri, you need to be more considerate! Some people are sensitive about their age!

Original: Yuri:Oh... Sorry.
Dialogue: Oh... Sorry.

Original: Vincent:Solid advice...
Dialogue: Solid advice...

Original: Vaan:Why're you looking at me when you say that?
Dialogue: Why're you looking at me when you say that?
trans: 你说这话的时候为什么看着我？

Original: Vincent:You're hopeless...
Dialogue: You're hopeless...

Original: Fang:Don't worry about it. I'm about as young as I look.
Dialogue: Don't worry about it. I'm about as young as I look.

Original: Fang:We slept the whole time, so we didn't really age.
Dialogue: We slept the whole time, so we didn't really age.
trans: 我们一直在睡觉，所以我们并没有真正变老。

Original: Vincent:A similar thing happened to me. I slept for a long time.
Dialogue: A similar thing happened to me. I slept for a long time.
trans: 类似的事情发生在我身上。

Original: Vaan:You too, huh? I guess you can't judge a book by its cover.
Dialogue: You too, huh? I guess you can't judge a book by its cover.

Original: Yuri:I get a feeling you all have trouble getting out of bed in the morning.
Dialogue: I get a feeling you all have trouble getting out of bed in the morning.
trans: 我感觉你们早上都很难起床。

Original: Chelinka:You're one to talk, Yuri! And don't say such rude things to our friends!
Dialogue: You're one to talk, Yuri! And don't say such rude things to our friends!
trans: 你是一个会说话的人，尤里！

Original: Vanille:Hehe. You sure are close, aren't you? Fang and I were raised like siblings, too.
Dialogue: Hehe. You sure are close, aren't you? Fang and I were raised like siblings, too.

Original: Vanille:It really was, wasn't it? I miss that place.
Dialogue: It really was, wasn't it? I miss that place.

Original: Fang:You're bound to meet all sorts when traveling in such a big group. I'm glad to see there are others like us out there.
Dialogue: You're bound to meet all sorts when traveling in such a big group. I'm glad to see there are others like us out there.
trans: 在这么大的团队中旅行时，您一定会遇到各种各样的人。

Original: Fang:Huh? Time to move on?
Dialogue: Huh? Time to move on?

Original: Serah:Fang! Where've you been!? You're bleeding!
Dialogue: Fang! Where've you been!? You're bleeding!

Original: Fang:Don't worry. Blood's not mine.
Dialogue: Don't worry. Blood's not mine.

Original: Wakka:You were fighting all by yourself!? That's dangerous!
Dialogue: You were fighting all by yourself!? That's dangerous!

Original: Fang:What are you talking about? We all do our part, right?
Dialogue: What are you talking about? We all do our part, right?

Original: Vaan:Yeah, but we don't do it alone.
Dialogue: Yeah, but we don't do it alone.
trans: 是的，但我们不是一个人做的。

Original: Fang:I'm alright. I just needed to move around a bit.
Dialogue: I'm alright. I just needed to move around a bit.

Original: Serah:Let us know next time, okay? We worry when people go off on their own.
Dialogue: Let us know next time, okay? We worry when people go off on their own.

Original: Fang:You two really are nothing alike.
Dialogue: You two really are nothing alike.
trans: 你们两个真的一点都不像。

Original: Fang:You and Lightning. Are you sure you're related?
Dialogue: You and Lightning. Are you sure you're related?

Original: Fang:You worry about everything all the time.
Dialogue: You worry about everything all the time.

Original: Vaan:Isn't that a good thing? Can you imagine having another Lightning?
Dialogue: Isn't that a good thing? Can you imagine having another Lightning?

Original: Fang:Fortunately, there's only one.
Dialogue: Fortunately, there's only one.

Original: Serah:I'm serious, Fang. I was really worried.
Dialogue: I'm serious, Fang. I was really worried.

Original: Sabin:Serah was worried about your safety. You wanted to get some exercise.
Dialogue: Serah was worried about your safety. You wanted to get some exercise.

Original: Sabin:Next time let me come along. I could use some training practice.
Dialogue: Next time let me come along. I could use some training practice.

Original: Fang:Training practice?
Dialogue: Training practice?

Original: Vaan:Oh man, Sabin and Fang-style training? Count me in!
Dialogue: Oh man, Sabin and Fang-style training? Count me in!
trans: 哦，伙计，萨宾和方式训练？

Original: Fang:There's no training or practice of any kind! Haven't you heard a word I said?
Dialogue: There's no training or practice of any kind! Haven't you heard a word I said?
trans: 没有任何形式的培训或练习！

Original: Serah:Haha, maybe I'll join too!
Dialogue: Haha, maybe I'll join too!

Original: Fang:...I prefer being on my own, but I can't stop you from coming along.
Dialogue: ...I prefer being on my own, but I can't stop you from coming along.
trans: ......我更喜欢一个人，但我不能阻止你一起来。

Original: Serah:Fang, I know you want to protect Vanille.
Dialogue: Fang, I know you want to protect Vanille.
trans: 芳，我知道你想保护香草。

Original: Serah:I want to become stronger, so I can protect Lightning too.
Dialogue: I want to become stronger, so I can protect Lightning too.
trans: 我想变得更强，这样我也能保护闪电。

Original: Serah:We have the same goal, right?
Dialogue: We have the same goal, right?
trans: 我们的目标是一样的吧？

Original: Serah:And not just Lightning. I want to protect everyone, and that includes you.
Dialogue: And not just Lightning. I want to protect everyone, and that includes you.

Original: Fang:That's your business, not mine.
Dialogue: That's your business, not mine.

Original: Serah:Stop being so difficult! Don't go off alone! Always stick with the group!
Dialogue: Stop being so difficult! Don't go off alone! Always stick with the group!

Original: Serah:Got it!?
Dialogue: Got it!?

Original: Fang:Got it.
Dialogue: Got it.

Original: Fang:I take back what I said earlier. You're more like your sister than I thought.
Dialogue: I take back what I said earlier. You're more like your sister than I thought.

Original: Fang:I always knew you were stubborn, but I think it's gotten worse since you've been here.
Dialogue: I always knew you were stubborn, but I think it's gotten worse since you've been here.
trans: 我一直都知道你很固执，但我认为自从你来到这里后情况变得更糟了。

Original: Serah:Has it?
Dialogue: Has it?

Original: Serah:That means I've changed throughout my journey. This would never have happened back home.
Dialogue: That means I've changed throughout my journey. This would never have happened back home.
trans: 这意味着我在整个旅程中都发生了变化。

Original: Fang:Alright. You wore me down. I'll try not to wander off alone.
Dialogue: Alright. You wore me down. I'll try not to wander off alone.

Original: Sabin:Good! Whether it's training or the real deal, everything is better if we do it together!
Dialogue: Good! Whether it's training or the real deal, everything is better if we do it together!

Original: Vaan:Do you see that!?
Dialogue: Do you see that!?

Original: Rem:Someone must've slain this monster.
Dialogue: Someone must've slain this monster.
trans: 一定有人杀死了这个怪物。

Original: Ace:A battle was fought here.
Dialogue: A battle was fought here.

Original: Yuna:And it wasn't one of us... But maybe it's someone we know.
Dialogue: And it wasn't one of us... But maybe it's someone we know.
trans: 那不是我们中的一员……但也许是我们认识的人。

Original: Yuna:They must be alright seeing they defeated this monster.
Dialogue: They must be alright seeing they defeated this monster.
trans: 看到他们打败了这个怪物，他们一定很好。

Original: Ace:It may be a friend, but it could very well be an enemy too.
Dialogue: It may be a friend, but it could very well be an enemy too.
trans: 它可能是朋友，但也很可能是敌人。

Original: Vaan:Can't you be a little optimistic for once?
Dialogue: Can't you be a little optimistic for once?

Original: Ace:I'm just stating the possibilities.
Dialogue: I'm just stating the possibilities.

Original: Thancred:Did you hear that?
Dialogue: Did you hear that?

Original: Rem:What is it?
Dialogue: What is it?

Original: Thancred:I thought I heard a flute. Rather a ways off, though.
Dialogue: I thought I heard a flute. Rather a ways off, though.

Original: Vaan:Really? I didn't hear anything.
Dialogue: Really? I didn't hear anything.

Original: Thancred:Perhaps I'm starved for entertainment.
Dialogue: Perhaps I'm starved for entertainment.

Original: Ace:It's possible you heard something we didn't.
Dialogue: It's possible you heard something we didn't.
trans: 您可能听到了我们没有听到的东西。

Original: Rem:Yeah, and if you did hear a flute, it could be whoever killed this monster.
Dialogue: Yeah, and if you did hear a flute, it could be whoever killed this monster.
trans: 是的，如果你确实听到了笛声，那可能就是杀死这个怪物的人。

Original: Yuna:A musician who can battle? Or perhaps one who learned to in order to travel?
Dialogue: A musician who can battle? Or perhaps one who learned to in order to travel?

Original: Ace:I suppose it must seem odd to those from other worlds.
Dialogue: I suppose it must seem odd to those from other worlds.
trans: 我想这对来自其他世界的人来说一定很奇怪。

Original: Rem:Now that I think of it, it's not very common in our world either.
Dialogue: Now that I think of it, it's not very common in our world either.
trans: 现在想来，在我们这个世界也不是很常见。

Original: Thancred:A friend may be nearby then?
Dialogue: A friend may be nearby then?

Original: Thancred:What are we waiting for?
Dialogue: What are we waiting for?

Original: Ace:You're right. Let's go.
Dialogue: You're right. Let's go.

Original: Terra:Are you all okay?
Dialogue: Are you all okay?

Original: Onion Knight:Yeah, but they just keep coming and coming.
Dialogue: Yeah, but they just keep coming and coming.
trans: 是的，但他们只是不断地来来去去。

Original: Terra:We must've come across a large pack.
Dialogue: We must've come across a large pack.
trans: 我们一定遇到了一个大包。

Original: Yuffie:You guys would've been so dead without me!
Dialogue: You guys would've been so dead without me!

Original: King:I appreciate the help, but our situation hasn't changed much.
Dialogue: I appreciate the help, but our situation hasn't changed much.
trans: 我很感激你的帮助，但我们的情况并没有太大改变。

Original: King:I know we're all tired, but we need to keep fighting.
Dialogue: I know we're all tired, but we need to keep fighting.
trans: 我知道我们都很累，但我们需要继续战斗。

Original: Yuffie:Why are there so many of them!?
Dialogue: Why are there so many of them!?

Original: Onion Knight:It's not strange for monsters to travel in packs.
Dialogue: It's not strange for monsters to travel in packs.
trans: 怪物成群结队旅行并不奇怪。

Original: Onion Knight:You jumped in to help us because we were surrounded, right?
Dialogue: You jumped in to help us because we were surrounded, right?
trans: 你是因为我们被包围才跳进来帮助我们的，对吧？

Original: Yuffie:Yes, but I didn't know there'd be so many of them!
Dialogue: Yes, but I didn't know there'd be so many of them!
trans: 是的，但我不知道会有这么多人！

Original: King:For what it's worth, you can have all the credit.
Dialogue: For what it's worth, you can have all the credit.
trans: 对于它的价值，你可以拥有所有的荣誉。

Original: Yuffie:I don't want credit, I want rewards!
Dialogue: I don't want credit, I want rewards!

Original: Terra:More keep coming.
Dialogue: More keep coming.

Original: Onion Knight:We need to stand our ground till the others arrive!
Dialogue: We need to stand our ground till the others arrive!
trans: 我们需要坚守阵地，直到其他人到来！

Original: King:Got it.
Dialogue: Got it.

Original: ???:It looks like I made it just in time.
Dialogue: It looks like I made it just in time.

Original: Yuffie:Who're you?
Dialogue: Who're you?

Original: Deuce:I'm Deuce. It's nice to meet you.
Dialogue: I'm Deuce. It's nice to meet you.

Original: Yuffie:Why are you so calm!? Can't you see what's going on!?
Dialogue: Why are you so calm!? Can't you see what's going on!?

Original: King:Don't worry, she can handle herself.
Dialogue: Don't worry, she can handle herself.

Original: Deuce:I'm so glad I found you all. I'm ready to give you my full support.
Dialogue: I'm so glad I found you all. I'm ready to give you my full support.
trans: 我很高兴找到你们所有人。

Original: Terra:A flute?
Dialogue: A flute?

Original: King:We'll talk later. Right now, we need to take care of this situation.
Dialogue: We'll talk later. Right now, we need to take care of this situation.

Original: Deuce:Thank you for letting me come with you.
Dialogue: Thank you for letting me come with you.
trans: 谢谢你让我和你一起去。

Original: Thancred:Of course.
Dialogue: Of course.

Original: Thancred:I knew I heard music back there.
Dialogue: I knew I heard music back there.
trans: 我知道我在那里听到了音乐。

Original: Rem:I'm glad to see you again!
Dialogue: I'm glad to see you again!

Original: Deuce:Me too!
Dialogue: Me too!

Original: Thancred:Were you frightened all alone?
Dialogue: Were you frightened all alone?

Original: Deuce:No, not especially. Fighting isn't new to me, and I knew Rem and the others were okay.
Dialogue: No, not especially. Fighting isn't new to me, and I knew Rem and the others were okay.

Original: Deuce:And because they were, I knew that I had to do what I could.
Dialogue: And because they were, I knew that I had to do what I could.
trans: 因为他们是，我知道我必须尽我所能。

Original: Vanille:How did you know they were okay?
Dialogue: How did you know they were okay?

Original: Deuce:Because I could remember them all: Rem, Ace, King, and Cater.
Dialogue: Because I could remember them all Rem, Ace, King, and Cater.
trans: 因为我能记住他们所有的雷姆、艾斯、国王和卡特。

Original: Rem:In our world, when someone passes, they're forgotten.
Dialogue: In our world, when someone passes, they're forgotten.
trans: 在我们的世界里，当有人过世时，他们就会被遗忘。

Original: Vanille:Wow, and that kept you going.
Dialogue: Wow, and that kept you going.

Original: Rem:But I don't know for certain if that applies in this world too.
Dialogue: But I don't know for certain if that applies in this world too.
trans: 但我不确定这是否也适用于这个世界。

Original: Deuce:Why is that?
Dialogue: Why is that?

Original: Rem:There's no way to confirm it.
Dialogue: There's no way to confirm it.

Original: Vanille:Whatever the case, I'm glad you're alright and that you found your friends.
Dialogue: Whatever the case, I'm glad you're alright and that you found your friends.
trans: 不管怎样，我很高兴你没事，而且你找到了你的朋友。

Original: Deuce:Thank you.
Dialogue: Thank you.

Original: Vanille:I'm curious. How is it using a flute as a weapon?
Dialogue: I'm curious. How is it using a flute as a weapon?

Original: Deuce:I don't know. I've never been asked so I've never thought about it.
Dialogue: I don't know. I've never been asked so I've never thought about it.

Original: Deuce:This is what I'm used to.
Dialogue: This is what I'm used to.

Original: Vanille:So it's hard to explain...
Dialogue: So it's hard to explain...

Original: Vanille:Oh, maybe you like music?
Dialogue: Oh, maybe you like music?

Original: Deuce:I do. I love music.
Dialogue: I do. I love music.

Original: Eiko:Then you and I will become great friends!
Dialogue: Then you and I will become great friends!
trans: 那样你我就会成为好朋友！

Original: Thancred:How so?
Dialogue: How so?

Original: Eiko:I can play the flute too! And I'm really good.
Dialogue: I can play the flute too! And I'm really good.

Original: Thancred:I had no idea.
Dialogue: I had no idea.

Original: Eiko:Of course. I'm a lady.
Dialogue: Of course. I'm a lady.

Original: Eiko:I even played the flute in battle!
Dialogue: I even played the flute in battle!
trans: 我什至在战斗中吹过长笛！

Original: Deuce:Will you show me later? I've always wanted someone to play music with.
Dialogue: Will you show me later? I've always wanted someone to play music with.

Original: Eiko:Of course! See? We're great friends already!
Dialogue: Of course! See? We're great friends already!

Original: Deuce:...That's enough practice for now.
Dialogue: ...That's enough practice for now.

Original: Yuna:What a beautiful sound.
Dialogue: What a beautiful sound.

Original: Deuce:Thank you! Though I've never played outside of battle, to be honest.
Dialogue: Thank you! Though I've never played outside of battle, to be honest.

Original: Tidus:Really!? That seems like a waste.
Dialogue: Really!? That seems like a waste.

Original: Celes:I agree. It's unfortunate that such wonderful music is being used as a weapon...
Dialogue: I agree. It's unfortunate that such wonderful music is being used as a weapon...

Original: Deuce:Thank you for your kind words.
Dialogue: Thank you for your kind words.

Original: Yuna:What's the matter?
Dialogue: What's the matter?

Original: Celes:Do I have something on my face?
Dialogue: Do I have something on my face?

Original: Deuce:You both have such beautiful voices. Do you like singing?
Dialogue: You both have such beautiful voices. Do you like singing?

Original: Deuce:If you two ever feel like it, I would love to play along. I think we could make amazing music together!
Dialogue: If you two ever feel like it, I would love to play along. I think we could make amazing music together!
trans: 如果你们两个喜欢，我很乐意一起玩。

Original: Celes:Even if I enjoyed singing, I need to protect this world first...
Dialogue: Even if I enjoyed singing, I need to protect this world first...
trans: 就算喜欢唱歌，也要先保护这个世界……

Original: Yuna:She's right. You agree, don't you?
Dialogue: She's right. You agree, don't you?

Original: Tidus:Yuna, singing? I've got to hear this!
Dialogue: Yuna, singing? I've got to hear this!

Original: Yuna:You shouldn't say things like that at a time like this...
Dialogue: You shouldn't say things like that at a time like this...
trans: 你不应该在这种时候说那样的话...

Original: Garnet:There's no need to refrain from doing the things you like just because we're in a battle.
Dialogue: There's no need to refrain from doing the things you like just because we're in a battle.
trans: 没有必要因为我们在战斗中而不做你喜欢的事情。

Original: Garnet:Or...do you hate singing, Yuna?
Dialogue: Or...do you hate singing, Yuna?
trans: 或者……你讨厌唱歌吗，尤娜？

Original: Yuna:It's not that. I just don't feel confident that I could...
Dialogue: It's not that. I just don't feel confident that I could...

Original: Setzer:I think this is a fantastic idea. Let's strike while the iron is hot.
Dialogue: I think this is a fantastic idea. Let's strike while the iron is hot.
trans: 我认为这是一个绝妙的主意。

Original: Setzer:The audience will be just us for now, but I will prepare a grand stage and the best dress for you, Deuce.
Dialogue: The audience will be just us for now, but I will prepare a grand stage and the best dress for you, Deuce.
trans: 观众暂时只有我们两个，但我会为你准备一个宏伟的舞台和最好的礼服，Deuce。

Original: Zidane:Hold it! You can't just go making plans on your own like that...
Dialogue: Hold it! You can't just go making plans on your own like that...

Original: Celes:Thank you, Zidane. Tell him this is really not the time
Dialogue: Thank you, Zidane. Tell him this is really not the time—

Original: Zidane:Celes and Yuna aren't the only ones who can sing!
Dialogue: Celes and Yuna aren't the only ones who can sing!
trans: Celes 和 Yuna 不是唯一会唱歌的人！

Original: Garnet:Zidane, you don't mean
Dialogue: Zidane, you don't mean—

Original: Zidane:Garnet's got the voice of a goddess! Let her perform, too!
Dialogue: Garnet's got the voice of a goddess! Let her perform, too!

Original: Deuce:That's a great idea! You'll sing, too, won't you?
Dialogue: That's a great idea! You'll sing, too, won't you?

Original: Garnet:I suppose I don't have much of a choice...
Dialogue: I suppose I don't have much of a choice...

Original: Deuce:Don't worry about it. I know that it's not easy to concentrate now.
Dialogue: Don't worry about it. I know that it's not easy to concentrate now.

Original: Deuce:But, once things calm down, why don't we give it a try?
Dialogue: But, once things calm down, why don't we give it a try?
trans: 但是，一旦事情平静下来，我们为什么不试一试呢？

Original: Setzer:You are a gentle soul, and yet quite persuasive.
Dialogue: You are a gentle soul, and yet quite persuasive.
trans: 你是一个温柔的灵魂，但很有说服力。

Original: Tidus:Well, now we've got something to aim for!
Dialogue: Well, now we've got something to aim for!
trans: 好吧，现在我们有了目标！

Original: Zidane:Yeah! We gotta bring back peace so we can hear these lovely ladies sing!
Dialogue: Yeah! We gotta bring back peace so we can hear these lovely ladies sing!

Original: Prishe:Whoa! I can feel the power flowing through me!
Dialogue: Whoa! I can feel the power flowing through me!

Original: Prishe:There's no way I'd lose to the enemy now!
Dialogue: There's no way I'd lose to the enemy now!
trans: 我现在绝对不可能输给敌人！

Original: Firion:Deuce's support can help make quick work of the opposition.
Dialogue: Deuce's support can help make quick work of the opposition.
trans: Deuce 的支持可以帮助快速解决对手的问题。

Original: Prishe:I want her to play the flute all the time!
Dialogue: I want her to play the flute all the time!

Original: Cyan:Perhaps that is asking too much...
Dialogue: Perhaps that is asking too much...

Original: Bartz:I'm sure it would be hard on Deuce to keep going for so long.
Dialogue: I'm sure it would be hard on Deuce to keep going for so long.
trans: 我敢肯定 Deuce 很难坚持这么久。

Original: Prishe:What? I was just kidding!
Dialogue: What? I was just kidding!

Original: Cyan:Are you certain? It seemed you spoke at least somewhat in earnest.
Dialogue: Are you certain? It seemed you spoke at least somewhat in earnest.

Original: Deuce:I'm happy my music helps.
Dialogue: I'm happy my music helps.
trans: 我很高兴我的音乐有所帮助。

Original: Deuce:Doing it all the time would be tough, but I'll gladly do what I can!
Dialogue: Doing it all the time would be tough, but I'll gladly do what I can!
trans: 一直这样做会很困难，但我会很乐意尽我所能！

Original: Bartz:That's heartening to hear.
Dialogue: That's heartening to hear.

Original: Cyan:There is no doubt that thou possess great power, Lady Deuce.
Dialogue: There is no doubt that thou possess great power, Lady Deuce.
trans: 毫无疑问，你拥有强大的力量，Deuce 女士。

Original: Cyan:And your music can pacify or uplift all those who hear it.
Dialogue: And your music can pacify or uplift all those who hear it.
trans: 你的音乐可以安抚或振奋所有听到它的人。

Original: Bartz:Is it what's making Lilisette and Penelo move like that?
Dialogue: Is it what's making Lilisette and Penelo move like that?
trans: 这就是让 Lilisette 和 Penelo 如此行动的原因吗？

Original: Lilisette:Wh-when did this happen!?
Dialogue: Wh-when did this happen!?

Original: Penelo:My body moved on its own...
Dialogue: My body moved on its own...

Original: Prishe:I don't really understand, but...it just means that Deuce is a powerful ally, right? That's all that matters.
Dialogue: I don't really understand, but...it just means that Deuce is a powerful ally, right? That's all that matters.
trans: 不太明白，不过……就是说Deuce是一个强大的盟友吧？

Original: Prishe:...Did I say something weird?
Dialogue: ...Did I say something weird?
trans: ……我是不是说了什么奇怪的话？

Original: Deuce:No. Thank you, Prishe! I'll do my very best!
Dialogue: No. Thank you, Prishe! I'll do my very best!

Original: Bartz:Prishe is right, though it would be nice to hear you play outside a fight.
Dialogue: Prishe is right, though it would be nice to hear you play outside a fight.
trans: Prishe 是对的，但很高兴听到您在战斗之外玩耍。

Original: Deuce:What do you mean...?
Dialogue: What do you mean...?

Original: Bartz:I'd like to just listen to you play the flute. It's beautiful.
Dialogue: I'd like to just listen to you play the flute. It's beautiful.

Original: Deuce:...I'm happy you think so.
Dialogue: ...I'm happy you think so.

Original: Cyan:I concur. Music is something that should be enjoyed, too.
Dialogue: I concur. Music is something that should be enjoyed, too.

Original: Lilisette:Agreed! It's a waste of your talent, Deuce.
Dialogue: Agreed! It's a waste of your talent, Deuce.

Original: Lilisette:What do you think, Penelo?
Dialogue: What do you think, Penelo?

Original: Penelo:M-me!? Well, I think dancing to the music is quite fun...
Dialogue: M-me!? Well, I think dancing to the music is quite fun...

Original: Lilisette:Professional dancers like us can't just turn a blind eye to your talent!
Dialogue: Professional dancers like us can't just turn a blind eye to your talent!
trans: 像我们这样的专业舞者不能对你的才华视而不见！

Original: Penelo:I just dance for fun. I'm no professional...
Dialogue: I just dance for fun. I'm no professional...
trans: 我只是为了好玩而跳舞。

Original: Deuce:The thought of playing outside of battle never really crossed my mind.
Dialogue: The thought of playing outside of battle never really crossed my mind.
trans: 我从未真正想到过在战斗之外玩游戏。

Original: Deuce:But playing music for fun... I like that.
Dialogue: But playing music for fun... I like that.
trans: 但是为了乐趣而演奏音乐……我喜欢这样。

Original: Deuce:I'll practice the flute for everyone to enjoy!
Dialogue: I'll practice the flute for everyone to enjoy!
trans: 我会练习长笛给大家欣赏！

Original: Agrias:Was that...a knight? But under whose flag?
Dialogue: Was that...a knight? But under whose flag?

Original: Agrias:Stay; what is this? Is there to be a battle?
Dialogue: Stay; what is this? Is there to be a battle?

Original: Steiner:Wha? You!? No, my mistake! Forgive me, but I must find my comrades! They have been surrounded by monsters!
Dialogue: Wha—? You—!? No, my mistake! Forgive me, but I must find my comrades! They have been surrounded by monsters!

Original: Agrias:Monsters? Then I shall aid you! Lead the way!
Dialogue: Monsters? Then I shall aid you! Lead the way!

Original: Onion Knight:That takes care of that. Thanks for holding out, Shadow.
Dialogue: That takes care of that. Thanks for holding out, Shadow.

Original: Shadow:I wasn't about to leave a child behind... More importantly, here's a new face.
Dialogue: I wasn't about to leave a child behind... More importantly, here's a new face.
trans: 我不想丢下孩子……更重要的是，这是一张新面孔。

Original: Agrias:I am Agrias Oaks, a knight of the Lionsguard.
Dialogue: I am Agrias Oaks, a knight of the Lionsguard.
trans: 我是狮子卫队的骑士 Agrias Oaks。

Original: Shadow:Ah, a knight. That explains your composure in battle. ...Not your first.
Dialogue: Ah, a knight. That explains your composure in battle. ...Not your first.

Original: Steiner:This gentlewoman recognized our distress and came to our rescue!
Dialogue: This gentlewoman recognized our distress and came to our rescue!
trans: 这位女士看出了我们的苦恼，来救我们了！

Original: Onion Knight:That's mighty noble of you to assist complete strangers.
Dialogue: That's mighty noble of you to assist complete strangers.
trans: 帮助完全陌生的人真是太高尚了。

Original: Agrias:I could not let your plight go unheeded. Also, there is something I would ask you.
Dialogue: I could not let your plight go unheeded. Also, there is something I would ask you.
trans: 我不能让你的困境被忽视。

Original: Warrior of Light:Please. We will do what we can to help.
Dialogue: Please. We will do what we can to help.

Original: Agrias:Are there no villages in the vicinity? This land is unknown to me, and I am without supplies.
Dialogue: Are there no villages in the vicinity? This land is unknown to me, and I am without supplies.

Original: Warrior of Light:You seek a village...
Dialogue: You seek a village...

Original: Agrias:Also, your armor is of a motley sort. Am I correct to assume you do not belong to any knightly order?
Dialogue: Also, your armor is of a motley sort. Am I correct to assume you do not belong to any knightly order?
trans: 另外，你的盔甲是杂色的。

Original: Steiner:Our providence is varied, but the strength of our wills has gathered us to fight together.
Dialogue: Our providence is varied, but the strength of our wills has gathered us to fight together.
trans: 我们的天意各不相同，但我们意志的力量聚集了我们一起战斗。

Original: Agrias:I see. So you are a variegated unit formed for the purpose of suppressing fiends.
Dialogue: I see. So you are a variegated unit formed for the purpose of suppressing fiends.

Original: Warrior of Light:No, it is not only fiends with which we do battle. We fight under the goddess.
Dialogue: No, it is not only fiends with which we do battle. We fight under the goddess.
trans: 不，我们与之战斗的不仅仅是恶魔。

Original: Warrior of Light:Correct. We were all summoned here from different worlds, and are now comrades-in-arms.
Dialogue: Correct. We were all summoned here from different worlds, and are now comrades-in-arms.

Original: Agrias:Different worlds...? What is this nonsense you speak?
Dialogue: Different worlds...? What is this nonsense you speak?

Original: Shadow:Heh. You've confused her.
Dialogue: Heh. You've confused her.

Original: Onion Knight:Ahh, we better start at the top. I'm for having her join us. What do the rest of you say?
Dialogue: Ahh, we better start at the top. I'm for having her join us. What do the rest of you say?

Original: Onion Knight:Follow us back to camp. We'll explain on the way, and you can eat there, too.
Dialogue: Follow us back to camp. We'll explain on the way, and you can eat there, too.

Original: Agrias:...Very well.
Dialogue: ...Very well.

Original: Steiner:You can trust us, Lady Agrias! Let us walk together!
Dialogue: You can trust us, Lady Agrias! Let us walk together!
trans: 你可以相信我们，阿格里亚斯女士！

Original: Ramza:Lady Agrias!?
Dialogue: Lady Agrias!?

Original: Agrias:Ramza! You are here!
Dialogue: Ramza! You are here!

Original: Ramza:I am glad to see you well!
Dialogue: I am glad to see you well!

Original: Galuf:So you know each other? That's a relief.
Dialogue: So you know each other? That's a relief.

Original: Ramza:She is a capable and reliable ally! With her among our ranks
Dialogue: She is a capable and reliable ally! With her among our ranks—
trans: 她是一个得力可靠的盟友！

Original: Agrias:I have yet to say I would join you.
Dialogue: I have yet to say I would join you.
trans: 我还没有说我会加入你。

Original: Thancred:Worried about unfinished business back home? That's understandable.
Dialogue: Worried about unfinished business back home? That's understandable.
trans: 担心回家未完成的事情？

Original: Agrias:To think even now how their schemes may be running their course...!
Dialogue: To think even now how their schemes may be running their course...!
trans: 甚至现在想想他们的计划是如何按照他们的计划进行的……！

Original: Laguna:Now, now, Ramza just got carried away because he was happy to see you.
Dialogue: Now, now, Ramza just got carried away because he was happy to see you.
trans: 现在，现在，拉姆萨因为见到你很高兴而兴奋不已。

Original: Ramza:Carried away...?
Dialogue: Carried away...?

Original: Ramza:If you were to lend us your aid, though, certainly salvation would be within our reach.
Dialogue: If you were to lend us your aid, though, certainly salvation would be within our reach.
trans: 不过，如果你愿意帮助我们，救赎肯定就在我们的掌握之中。

Original: Agrias:I have...
Dialogue: I have...

Original: Agrias:A tale hard to believe, but from appearances, such may very well be the case.
Dialogue: A tale hard to believe, but from appearances, such may very well be the case.
trans: 一个难以置信的故事，但从表面上看，情况很可能是这样。

Original: Thancred:Everyone's world is in danger lest we do something to right this one...or so the story goes.
Dialogue: Everyone's world is in danger lest we do something to right this one...or so the story goes.
trans: 每个人的世界都处于危险之中，唯恐我们做点什么来纠正这个世界……或者故事是这样的。

Original: Ramza:We must unravel the mystery of these disturbances and return the world to order. This fight is ours as well.
Dialogue: We must unravel the mystery of these disturbances and return the world to order. This fight is ours as well.
trans: 我们必须揭开这些骚乱的谜团，让世界恢复秩序。

Original: Agrias:Ramza, tell me for what it is you are fighting.
Dialogue: Ramza, tell me for what it is you are fighting.
trans: 拉姆萨，告诉我你为什么而战。

Original: Agrias:From my understanding, here there are no peoples oppressed or victimized.
Dialogue: From my understanding, here there are no peoples oppressed or victimized.
trans: 据我了解，这里没有被压迫或受害的民族。

Original: Agrias:What reason have you to fight here? What is there to save that is worth putting our world aside?
Dialogue: What reason have you to fight here? What is there to save that is worth putting our world aside?
trans: 你有什么理由在这里战斗？

Original: Ramza:Just as I met you in our world, I have gained many comrades in this world as well.
Dialogue: Just as I met you in our world, I have gained many comrades in this world as well.
trans: 就像在我们的世界遇见你一样，我在这个世界也收获了很多伙伴。

Original: Ramza:Saving this world means saving theirs...
Dialogue: Saving this world means saving theirs...
trans: 拯救这个世界就是拯救他们的世界……

Original: Ramza:I cannot simply put mine own needs above that of my comrades!
Dialogue: I cannot simply put mine own needs above that of my comrades!
trans: 我不能简单地将自己的需求置于同志们的需求之上！

Original: Galuf:You're a stouthearted friend, but you'd do well to relax some!
Dialogue: You're a stouthearted friend, but you'd do well to relax some!
trans: 你是一个勇敢的朋友，但你最好放松一下！

Original: Ramza:Forgive me...but I have said my piece.
Dialogue: Forgive me...but I have said my piece.
trans: 原谅我......但我已经说了我的作品。

Original: Ramza:Our world is important, but I cannot leave the others' in danger...!
Dialogue: Our world is important, but I cannot leave the others' in danger...!
trans: 我们的世界很重要，但我不能让别人处于危险之中……！

Original: Laguna:Ramza! I never knew that's how you felt! Man, I am touched!
Dialogue: Ramza! I never knew that's how you felt! Man, I am touched!

Original: Agrias:...For your comrades' sake. No matter where, you still fight for others.
Dialogue: ...For your comrades' sake. No matter where, you still fight for others.

Original: Agrias:Ever unswerving, you...
Dialogue: Ever unswerving, you...

Original: Agrias:Very well. Allow me to join you.
Dialogue: Very well. Allow me to join you.

Original: Agrias:I previously placed my trust in you, and now I shall place it in your sense of justice.
Dialogue: I previously placed my trust in you, and now I shall place it in your sense of justice.
trans: 先前我对你的信任，现在要寄托在你的正义感上。

Original: Agrias:You prove again to be an irreplaceable ally to me.
Dialogue: You prove again to be an irreplaceable ally to me.
trans: 你再次证明是我不可替代的盟友。

Original: Cyan:...And so Lady Agrias has joined us. Thou said thou art a knight?
Dialogue: ...And so Lady Agrias has joined us. Thou said thou art a knight?
trans: ......所以阿格利亚斯女士加入了我们。

Original: Agrias:Yes, sworn to the crown back in my world.
Dialogue: Yes, sworn to the crown back in my world.
trans: 是的，回到我的世界宣誓就职。

Original: Balthier:You look the capable one. I suppose you've spent your fair share on the battlefield.
Dialogue: You look the capable one. I suppose you've spent your fair share on the battlefield.

Original: Cyan:Lord Cecil is a knight as well. Perhaps thou may have common stories to share.
Dialogue: Lord Cecil is a knight as well. Perhaps thou may have common stories to share.
trans: 塞西尔勋爵也是一名骑士。

Original: Cecil:Yes, we may both be knights...but to be honest, I am somewhat envious of Agrias.
Dialogue: Yes, we may both be knights...but to be honest, I am somewhat envious of Agrias.
trans: 是的，我们可能都是骑士……但说实话，我有点羡慕阿格利亚斯。

Original: Balthier:Don't tell me you wish you could protect a princess, too. I hadn't pegged you for japery.
Dialogue: Don't tell me you wish you could protect a princess, too. I hadn't pegged you for japery.
trans: 别告诉我你希望你也能保护公主。

Original: Cecil:Please do not tease me. ...No, it is not that.
Dialogue: Please do not tease me. ...No, it is not that.

Original: Cyan:But not without reason, no?
Dialogue: But not without reason, no?
trans: 但并非没有理由，不是吗？

Original: Cecil:Mine was a fine lord, but at some point, he strayed from the path of righteousness, which I could not abide.
Dialogue: Mine was a fine lord, but at some point, he strayed from the path of righteousness, which I could not abide.
trans: 我的君主是个好人，但在某个时候，他偏离了正义的道路，这是我无法忍受的。

Original: Squall:He breached his contract with you. What's there to regret?
Dialogue: He breached his contract with you. What's there to regret?

Original: Agrias:I understand, Ser Cecil. Surely you were conflicted.
Dialogue: I understand, Ser Cecil. Surely you were conflicted.

Original: Cecil:Thank you... He raised me as his own.
Dialogue: Thank you... He raised me as his own.
trans: 谢谢……他把我当成自己人养大了。

Original: Cyan:That...must be agonizing for thou...
Dialogue: That...must be agonizing for thou...

Original: Cecil:I still think, if I was that close to him, should not there have been something I could have done?
Dialogue: I still think, if I was that close to him, should not there have been something I could have done?
trans: 我仍然想，如果我离他那么近，我不应该做些什么吗？

Original: Balthier:That doesn't make it your responsibility. People change. You can't stop that, even if it's your own flesh and blood.
Dialogue: That doesn't make it your responsibility. People change. You can't stop that, even if it's your own flesh and blood.
trans: 这并不意味着你的责任。

Original: Agrias:I was also betrayed many times by those upon whom I depended...
Dialogue: I was also betrayed many times by those upon whom I depended...
trans: 我也曾多次被我所依赖的人背叛……

Original: Agrias:Man is soon to drown in desire, and sully his hands for its sake...
Dialogue: Man is soon to drown in desire, and sully his hands for its sake...
trans: 人很快就会被欲望淹没，并为此玷污自己的双手……

Original: Agrias:Those who can control themselves and adhere to justice are but a handful...
Dialogue: Those who can control themselves and adhere to justice are but a handful...
trans: 能自控坚守正义的，屈指可数……

Original: Agrias:For that reason, Ser Cecil, you served as a loyal retainer.
Dialogue: For that reason, Ser Cecil, you served as a loyal retainer.
trans: 因此，塞西尔爵士，您是一名忠实的侍从。

Original: Squall:...You mean to say, loyalty isn't just following orders.
Dialogue: ...You mean to say, loyalty isn't just following orders.
trans: ......你的意思是说，忠诚不仅仅是服从命令。

Original: Agrias:Should our masters fall to evil ways, it is our duty to chastise them a thousand times till they are right again...
Dialogue: Should our masters fall to evil ways, it is our duty to chastise them a thousand times till they are right again...
trans: 如果我们的主人堕入恶道，我们有责任惩罚他们一千次，直到他们重新正确......

Original: Agrias:...And if that loyalty falls on deaf ears?
Dialogue: ...And if that loyalty falls on deaf ears?

Original: Agrias:All the more for your familial bonds, your disaffection should carry far more weight than words.
Dialogue: All the more for your familial bonds, your disaffection should carry far more weight than words.
trans: 更何况你的家庭关系，你的不满应该比言语更有分量。

Original: Agrias:How heavy a blow it may be, your liege should come to understand it by degrees.
Dialogue: How heavy a blow it may be, your liege should come to understand it by degrees.
trans: 打击有多大，你的君主应该会慢慢明白的。

Original: Cyan:Hear, hear, Lady Agrias. Lord Cecil was ne'er in the wrong!
Dialogue: Hear, hear, Lady Agrias. Lord Cecil was ne'er in the wrong!
trans: 听着，听着，阿格里亚斯夫人。

Original: Squall:Yeah... Abandoning thought to just carry out your duty is the same as abandoning your humanity.
Dialogue: Yeah... Abandoning thought to just carry out your duty is the same as abandoning your humanity.
trans: 是啊……放弃思想去尽职，就等于放弃了人性。

Original: Squall:You're not a tool or a machine...
Dialogue: You're not a tool or a machine...

Original: Cecil:I thought I can never face him again...
Dialogue: I thought I can never face him again...
trans: 我以为我再也见不到他了……

Original: Agrias:You need not waver from your sense of justice. Carry it with pride.
Dialogue: You need not waver from your sense of justice. Carry it with pride.
trans: 你不必动摇你的正义感。

Original: Cecil:I will. ...When I return, I will venture to meet him again.
Dialogue: I will. ...When I return, I will venture to meet him again.

Original: Balthier:...There's no guarantee it will turn out well, though.
Dialogue: ...There's no guarantee it will turn out well, though.

Original: Cecil:Thank you for your concern.
Dialogue: Thank you for your concern.

Original: Cecil:...But do not worry. I have a little more faith in myself now.
Dialogue: ...But do not worry. I have a little more faith in myself now.

Original: Ashe:Prishe! We need to prepare for departure...
Dialogue: Prishe! We need to prepare for departure...

Original: Rem:Are you praying?
Dialogue: Are you praying?

Original: Prishe:Sorry! It's a habit of mine.
Dialogue: Sorry! It's a habit of mine.

Original: Yda:I had no idea you were so devout!
Dialogue: I had no idea you were so devout!

Original: Prishe:I may not look it, but I'm a theologian. I wasn't allowed to leave the cathedral for a long time, so I guess that's when it became a habit.
Dialogue: I may not look it, but I'm a theologian. I wasn't allowed to leave the cathedral for a long time, so I guess that's when it became a habit.
trans: 我可能看起来不像，但我是神学家。

Original: Agrias:You were kept prisoner!? How terrible...
Dialogue: You were kept prisoner!? How terrible...

Original: Prishe:Naw, not exactly.
Dialogue: Naw, not exactly.

Original: Yda:Oh, that's right! You serve as a knight to royalty.
Dialogue: Oh, that's right! You serve as a knight to royalty.

Original: Ashe:But your bond runs deeper than that, doesn't it? A mere knight would not speak with such compassion.
Dialogue: But your bond runs deeper than that, doesn't it? A mere knight would not speak with such compassion.
trans: 但你们的关系比那更深，不是吗？

Original: Ashe:It is clear you care deeply about your mistress.
Dialogue: It is clear you care deeply about your mistress.
trans: 很明显，你非常关心你的情妇。

Original: Agrias:That is due to how stricken I was by Princess Ovelia's fiber.
Dialogue: That is due to how stricken I was by Princess Ovelia's fiber.
trans: 那是因为我对奥维莉亚公主的纤维感到震惊。

Original: Agrias:Even toward the likes of me is she tender, and quietly she devotes herself to her monastic studies. I have naught but the utmost respect for her.
Dialogue: Even toward the likes of me is she tender, and quietly she devotes herself to her monastic studies. I have naught but the utmost respect for her.
trans: 即使对我这样的人，她也很温柔，她默默地致力于修行。

Original: Rem:She sounds absolutely wonderful. I can see why you're so concerned about her.
Dialogue: She sounds absolutely wonderful. I can see why you're so concerned about her.

Original: Prishe:I'll bet she also met someone amazing there, just like I did.
Dialogue: I'll bet she also met someone amazing there, just like I did.
trans: 我敢打赌她也在那里遇到了一个了不起的人，就像我一样。

Original: Agrias:She also studied at the monastery for a time. They were the closest of friends.
Dialogue: She also studied at the monastery for a time. They were the closest of friends.
trans: 她还曾在修道院学习过一段时间。

Original: Rem:Thinking of old friends makes you want to try your hardest, doesn't it?
Dialogue: Thinking of old friends makes you want to try your hardest, doesn't it?
trans: 想到老朋友，你就想尽自己最大的努力，不是吗？

Original: Ashe:Their kind words and the memories you made together become your strength.
Dialogue: Their kind words and the memories you made together become your strength.
trans: 他们的客气话和你们一起创造的回忆会成为你们的力量。

Original: Agrias:Hmm...
Dialogue: Hmm...

Original: Agrias:I wonder if I have ever given Princess Ovelia strength...
Dialogue: I wonder if I have ever given Princess Ovelia strength...
trans: 不知道自己有没有给过奥维莉亚公主力量……

Original: Prishe:Darn straight you have! You may not believe it, but I sure do!
Dialogue: Darn straight you have! You may not believe it, but I sure do!

Original: Yda:She's right. Some people don't realize how much they're helping others without being told.
Dialogue: She's right. Some people don't realize how much they're helping others without being told.

Original: Prishe:Just seeing your courageous form might make her feel brave.
Dialogue: Just seeing your courageous form might make her feel brave.
trans: 只要看到你勇敢的样子，她就会感到勇敢。

Original: Agrias:You mean in battle? I do not understand...
Dialogue: You mean in battle? I do not understand...

Original: Prishe:You might be like her precious charm. Just having you around makes her feel stronger.
Dialogue: You might be like her precious charm. Just having you around makes her feel stronger.
trans: 你可能喜欢她珍贵的魅力。

Original: Terra:Your clothes are a little different from everyone else's, aren't they?
Dialogue: Your clothes are a little different from everyone else's, aren't they?
trans: 你的衣服和其他人的有点不同，不是吗？

Original: Yuna:Yes, indeed. Do you like them?
Dialogue: Yes, indeed. Do you like them?

Original: Terra:I think they're beautiful! But it might be a nice change of pace to try on something else, don't you think? Like my clothes, for example.
Dialogue: I think they're beautiful! But it might be a nice change of pace to try on something else, don't you think? Like my clothes, for example.

Original: Yuna:Oh! I would love to give it a try!
Dialogue: Oh! I would love to give it a try!

Original: Faris:What's going on over here, lasses?
Dialogue: What's going on over here, lasses?

Original: Yuna:Hello, Faris! We were just talking about our clothes. I think you would look beautiful in a dress...!
Dialogue: Hello, Faris! We were just talking about our clothes. I think you would look beautiful in a dress...!

Original: Faris:A dress!? You wouldn't catch me dead in one of those!
Dialogue: A dress!? You wouldn't catch me dead in one of those!

Original: Terra:Hmm... I wonder what else would match...
Dialogue: Hmm... I wonder what else would match...
trans: 嗯...我想知道还有什么可以匹配...

Original: Agrias:Chatting about fashion like young ladies, I see.
Dialogue: Chatting about fashion like young ladies, I see.
trans: 我明白了，像年轻女士一样谈论时尚。

Original: Yuna:It's wonderful to see what people from other worlds wear. I think it would be fun to see everyone try on something different, too.
Dialogue: It's wonderful to see what people from other worlds wear. I think it would be fun to see everyone try on something different, too.
trans: 很高兴看到来自其他世界的人穿什么。

Original: Agrias:Everyone... Including us?
Dialogue: Everyone... Including us?

Original: Serah:Imagine the reactions we might get from everyone if we changed our usual looks.
Dialogue: Imagine the reactions we might get from everyone if we changed our usual looks.
trans: 想象一下，如果我们改变平时的外表，我们可能会从每个人那里得到什么反应。

Original: Y'shtola:We would certainly catch them off their guard.
Dialogue: We would certainly catch them off their guard.
trans: 我们肯定会让他们措手不及。

Original: Agrias:Forgive me for not knowing what to say... My armor was made for battle.
Dialogue: Forgive me for not knowing what to say... My armor was made for battle.
trans: 请原谅我不知道该说什么……我的盔甲是为战斗而生的。

Original: Agrias:Does it matter what you wear as long as it suits your purposes?
Dialogue: Does it matter what you wear as long as it suits your purposes?
trans: 只要适合您的目的，您穿什么是否重要？

Original: Faris:Agrias is right! I dress like this so fools don't underestimate me in a fight.
Dialogue: Agrias is right! I dress like this so fools don't underestimate me in a fight.

Original: Y'shtola:...But do you not also wear that outfit because of some attachment to it?
Dialogue: ...But do you not also wear that outfit because of some attachment to it?
trans: ……但是你不也是因为执着而穿那件衣服吗？

Original: Y'shtola:No matter how well it suited your purposes, anyone would feel remorse over an outfit they didn't like.
Dialogue: No matter how well it suited your purposes, anyone would feel remorse over an outfit they didn't like.
trans: 不管它多么适合你的目的，任何人都会对他们不喜欢的衣服感到懊悔。

Original: Y'shtola:It is because we fight that we choose an outfit that lifts our spirits, even if we are not always aware of such.
Dialogue: It is because we fight that we choose an outfit that lifts our spirits, even if we are not always aware of such.
trans: 正因为我们在战斗，所以我们选择了一件能让我们精神振奋的衣服，即使我们并不总是意识到这一点。

Original: Faris:And that's precisely why I can't agree to wearing a dress...
Dialogue: And that's precisely why I can't agree to wearing a dress...
trans: 这正是我不能同意穿裙子的原因……

Original: Serah:Well, our outfits aren't limited to just our clothes. How about an accessory?
Dialogue: Well, our outfits aren't limited to just our clothes. How about an accessory?
trans: 好吧，我们的服装不仅限于我们的衣服。

Original: Faris:I guess it couldn't hurt...
Dialogue: I guess it couldn't hurt...

Original: Terra:I think something like Yuna's pendant would look great on you.
Dialogue: I think something like Yuna's pendant would look great on you.
trans: 我觉得 Yuna 的吊坠之类的东西戴在你身上会很好看。

Original: Agrias:It seems like you just want to dress us up...
Dialogue: It seems like you just want to dress us up...
trans: 看来你只是想给我们打扮一下……

Original: Yuna:Do you wear any makeup, Agrias?
Dialogue: Do you wear any makeup, Agrias?

Original: Y'shtola:You never know what might happen from here on out.
Dialogue: You never know what might happen from here on out.
trans: 你永远不知道从现在开始会发生什么。

Original: Terra:She's right. If you ever feel like a change of attire, we'll be here.
Dialogue: She's right. If you ever feel like a change of attire, we'll be here.

Original: Yuffie:What's going on!? I don't get it!
Dialogue: What's going on!? I don't get it!

Original: Onion Knight:What's the matter?
Dialogue: What's the matter?

Original: Yuffie:You haven't noticed yet? There's no treasure here. Anywhere!
Dialogue: You haven't noticed yet? There's no treasure here. Anywhere!

Original: Sabin:That's right. You did say you were on a treasure-hunting mission.
Dialogue: That's right. You did say you were on a treasure-hunting mission.

Original: King:I didn't think you were serious about that.
Dialogue: I didn't think you were serious about that.

Original: Yuffie:Of course I was! Anything that has value winds up mysteriously appearing in my pocket!
Dialogue: Of course I was! Anything that has value winds up mysteriously appearing in my pocket!

Original: Yuffie:But this place has nothing! What a bust.
Dialogue: But this place has nothing! What a bust.
trans: 但是这个地方什么都没有！

Original: Yuffie:Unless...someone sneaked in here and stole everything before I could!
Dialogue: Unless...someone sneaked in here and stole everything before I could!
trans: 除非……有人偷偷溜进来，抢在我之前把所有东西都偷走了！

Original: Vivi:Oh, no! A thief!?
Dialogue: Oh, no! A thief!?

Original: Yuffie:That's the only explanation! Stupid thief got a jump on me! No fair!
Dialogue: That's the only explanation! Stupid thief got a jump on me! No fair!

Original: Shadow:A thief...?
Dialogue: A thief...?

Original: Sabin:Then he must be around here somewhere.
Dialogue: Then he must be around here somewhere.
trans: 那么他一定在这附近的某个地方。

Original: King:Do you know who this thief might be?
Dialogue: Do you know who this thief might be?
trans: 你知道这个小偷可能是谁吗？

Original: Sabin:A friend from my world. It has to be him.
Dialogue: A friend from my world. It has to be him.

Original: Yuffie:You're friends with a thief...? You should really choose your friends more carefully.
Dialogue: You're friends with a thief...? You should really choose your friends more carefully.

Original: Onion Knight:I can only imagine what Cloud would say if he were here.
Dialogue: I can only imagine what Cloud would say if he were here.
trans: 我只能想象如果克劳德在这里会说什么。

Original: Tidus:Finally! Some fresh air.
Dialogue: Finally! Some fresh air.

Original: Celes:Look! Someone needs help. ...Wait, that bandanna!
Dialogue: Look! Someone needs help. ...Wait, that bandanna!

Original: Edgar:Not to worry, he's not hurt, he's taking a... Well, she'll find out for herself.
Dialogue: Not to worry, he's not hurt, he's taking a... Well, she'll find out for herself.
trans: 别担心，他没有受伤，他正在……好吧，她会自己找到答案的。

Original: Cloud:A friend?
Dialogue: A friend?

Original: Edgar:You caught me. Let's go wake him up.
Dialogue: You caught me. Let's go wake him up.

Original: Celes:Locke! Please, wake up!
Dialogue: Locke! Please, wake up!

Original: Edgar:Calm down, he's just napping. Find anything interesting, Locke?
Dialogue: Calm down, he's just napping. Find anything interesting, Locke?
trans: 冷静点，他只是在打瞌睡。

Original: Locke:Nah, not really.
Dialogue: Nah, not really.

Original: Celes:Thank goodness. I thought you were injured.
Dialogue: Thank goodness. I thought you were injured.

Original: Cloud:You must be the thief Yuffie was talking about.
Dialogue: You must be the thief Yuffie was talking about.
trans: 你一定就是尤菲所说的盗贼吧。

Original: Locke:C'mon, Cloud. I prefer the term, "treasure hunter"!
Dialogue: C'mon, Cloud. I prefer the term, "treasure hunter"!

Original: Cloud:How do you know my name?
Dialogue: How do you know my name?

Original: Locke:I know everything. You're Tidus, right?
Dialogue: I know everything. You're Tidus, right?

Original: Locke:A cheerful and upbeat athlete type.
Dialogue: A cheerful and upbeat athlete type.
trans: 开朗乐观的运动员类型。

Original: Tidus:H-how do you know that!?
Dialogue: H-how do you know that!?

Original: Edgar:Even in a strange world, you're still as reliable as always.
Dialogue: Even in a strange world, you're still as reliable as always.
trans: 即使身处陌生的世界，你依然一如既往的可靠。

Original: Cloud:That explains it.
Dialogue: That explains it.

Original: Locke:By the way, Squall over there?
Dialogue: By the way, Squall over there?
trans: 顺便问一下，Squall 在那边吗？

Original: Locke:Despite his attitude, he's kind and has a great sense of humor.
Dialogue: Despite his attitude, he's kind and has a great sense of humor.
trans: 尽管他态度恶劣，但他很善良并且很有幽默感。

Original: Squall:(Please stop talking.)
Dialogue: (Please stop talking.)

Original: Celes:I'm so glad to see you here.
Dialogue: I'm so glad to see you here.

Original: Locke:It's been a while. How's everything with you?
Dialogue: It's been a while. How's everything with you?

Original: Celes:I don't need you to worry about me. What were you doing on the ground anyway?
Dialogue: I don't need you to worry about me. What were you doing on the ground anyway?

Original: Locke:Once Edgar joined you all, my part was done.
Dialogue: Once Edgar joined you all, my part was done.
trans: 一旦埃德加加入你们，我的部分就完成了。

Original: Locke:I've been hunting for treasure all around this world ever since.
Dialogue: I've been hunting for treasure all around this world ever since.
trans: 从那以后，我一直在这个世界上寻找宝藏。

Original: Celes:All alone?
Dialogue: All alone?

Original: Celes:Edgar! Why didn't you tell me about Locke?
Dialogue: Edgar! Why didn't you tell me about Locke?

Original: Edgar:If I had, you would've gone off on your own in search of him.
Dialogue: If I had, you would've gone off on your own in search of him.
trans: 如果我有，你会自己去找他。

Original: Edgar:Locke has a plan of his own. That's why I didn't tell anyone about him.
Dialogue: Locke has a plan of his own. That's why I didn't tell anyone about him.

Original: Locke:I apologize. It's not that I'd forgotten about you. I'm trying to track something down.
Dialogue: I apologize. It's not that I'd forgotten about you. I'm trying to track something down.

Original: Celes:Then we can help. Come with us.
Dialogue: Then we can help. Come with us.
trans: 那么我们可以提供帮助。

Original: Locke:That's the plan. I've gotten tired of wandering around on my own.
Dialogue: That's the plan. I've gotten tired of wandering around on my own.

Original: Locke:Besides, this way, I can find treasure and help my friends. Two birds!
Dialogue: Besides, this way, I can find treasure and help my friends. Two birds!
trans: 此外，这样，我可以找到宝藏并帮助我的朋友。

Original: Tidus:Treasure comes first, huh?
Dialogue: Treasure comes first, huh?

Original: Edgar:Despite what he said, he's one of the most reliable men I know.
Dialogue: Despite what he said, he's one of the most reliable men I know.
trans: 不管他怎么说，他是我认识的最可靠的人之一。

Original: Edgar:...Though you'll need to look past the thieving.
Dialogue: ...Though you'll need to look past the thieving.

Original: Snow:I hear you're looking for some treasure. Something you've been after for a while.
Dialogue: I hear you're looking for some treasure. Something you've been after for a while.

Original: Locke:A legendary relic that can call back the spirits of the dead.
Dialogue: A legendary relic that can call back the spirits of the dead.
trans: 传说中的遗物，可以唤回死者的灵魂。

Original: Yuna:Call back?
Dialogue: Call back?

Original: Balthier:A nifty toy.
Dialogue: A nifty toy.

Original: Cater:You can bring back the dead? What would you do with something like that?
Dialogue: You can bring back the dead? What would you do with something like that?

Original: Locke:She didn't have to die. She's dead because of me.
Dialogue: She didn't have to die. She's dead because of me.

Original: Locke:With that relic, everything will go back to the way things were. That's the only way I can make up for what I've done.
Dialogue: With that relic, everything will go back to the way things were. That's the only way I can make up for what I've done.
trans: 有了那件遗物，一切都会回到原来的样子。

Original: Locke:At least, that's what I thought.
Dialogue: At least, that's what I thought.

Original: Cater:Is that a good idea?
Dialogue: Is that a good idea?

Original: Locke:The memories of people who pass are wiped away in your world, right?
Dialogue: The memories of people who pass are wiped away in your world, right?
trans: 逝去的人的记忆在你的世界里被抹去吧？

Original: Locke:Life would be so much easier if that was how it worked in mine, too.
Dialogue: Life would be so much easier if that was how it worked in mine, too.
trans: 如果这也是我的工作方式，生活会容易得多。

Original: Snow:There's no use talking about "what if." Your world's ways are just that.
Dialogue: There's no use talking about "what if." Your world's ways are just that.

Original: Snow:I know what it means to care about somebody. But you're taking it a little far.
Dialogue: I know what it means to care about somebody. But you're taking it a little far.
trans: 我知道关心某人意味着什么。

Original: Yuna:If she knew how much her death has kept you from moving on...
Dialogue: If she knew how much her death has kept you from moving on...
trans: 如果她知道她的死让你无法继续前进……

Original: Yuna:I think she would be upset. Do you think she wants you to feel like you need to make up for the past?
Dialogue: I think she would be upset. Do you think she wants you to feel like you need to make up for the past?

Original: Locke:You too, huh?
Dialogue: You too, huh?

Original: Balthier:Bringing her back and apologizing will make YOU feel better, but what about her?
Dialogue: Bringing her back and apologizing will make YOU feel better, but what about her?
trans: 把她带回来道歉会让你感觉好些，但她呢？

Original: Balthier:What happens after she comes back? Applause and happily ever after?
Dialogue: What happens after she comes back? Applause and happily ever after?

Original: Locke:So you all think I'm being selfish.
Dialogue: So you all think I'm being selfish.
trans: 所以你们都认为我很自私。

Original: Snow:Come on, guys. We all have our own different ways.
Dialogue: Come on, guys. We all have our own different ways.

Original: Locke:It's fine, Snow. Balthier might be right.
Dialogue: It's fine, Snow. Balthier might be right.

Original: Locke:Back then, I didn't even think about who or what I was doing this for.
Dialogue: Back then, I didn't even think about who or what I was doing this for.
trans: 那时，我什至没有想过我这样做是为了谁或为了什么。

Original: Ace:We fight to protect the future.
Dialogue: We fight to protect the future.

Original: Ace:We were taught that in order to move forward, we need to cut our ties with the past.
Dialogue: We were taught that in order to move forward, we need to cut our ties with the past.
trans: 我们被告知，为了向前迈进，我们需要切断与过去的联系。

Original: Locke:Move forward, huh?
Dialogue: Move forward, huh?

Original: Locke:I would never want to forget about her, but maybe fighting for what's to come has some sort of meaning.
Dialogue: I would never want to forget about her, but maybe fighting for what's to come has some sort of meaning.
trans: 我永远不想忘记她，但也许为即将到来的事情而战有某种意义。

Original: Locke:Ace, you do what you think is best for the world to come.
Dialogue: Ace, you do what you think is best for the world to come.
trans: Ace，你做你认为对未来世界最好的事情。

Original: Locke:I was told those words once. And that's what I'm doing and will continue to do.
Dialogue: I was told those words once. And that's what I'm doing and will continue to do.

Original: Locke:Or at least that's what I'm trying to do. For some reason, what I think is best always seems to upset Celes... Heh.
Dialogue: Or at least that's what I'm trying to do. For some reason, what I think is best always seems to upset Celes... Heh.
trans: 或者至少这就是我想要做的。

Original: Vaan:I snuck into thepalacewhile it was underimperialoccupation and stole back the royal family'streasures.
Dialogue: I snuck into the palace while it was under imperial occupation and stole back the royal family's treasures.
trans: 我趁着皇宫被占领的时候潜入皇宫，偷回了皇室的宝物。

Original: Locke:Royal family treasures, you say? Those must've fetched quite the price.
Dialogue: Royal family treasures, you say? Those must've fetched quite the price.

Original: Locke:That's how you met Garnet, right?
Dialogue: That's how you met Garnet, right?
trans: 你就是这样认识Garnet的，对吧？

Original: Faris:I wouldn't say you "stole" so much as "kidnapped" a princess.
Dialogue: I wouldn't say you "stole" so much as "kidnapped" a princess.
trans: 我不会说你“偷”了“绑架”了一位公主。

Original: Locke:You're a pirate, right, Faris?
Dialogue: You're a pirate, right, Faris?

Original: Faris:I suppose so. I was picked up by pirates when I was a child and raised as one of their own.
Dialogue: I suppose so. I was picked up by pirates when I was a child and raised as one of their own.

Original: Locke:I see. And Yuffie...
Dialogue: I see. And Yuffie...

Original: Zidane:Even still, I wish you wouldn't steal from your friends...
Dialogue: Even still, I wish you wouldn't steal from your friends...
trans: 即便如此，我还是希望你不要偷你朋友的东西……

Original: Locke:Haha! It's great to see everyone getting along so well! I won't lose to you all in treasure hunting, though!
Dialogue: Haha! It's great to see everyone getting along so well! I won't lose to you all in treasure hunting, though!

Original: Vaan:But aren't you a thief?
Dialogue: But aren't you a thief?

Original: Locke:How many times do I have to say it? I'm a treasure hunter!
Dialogue: How many times do I have to say it? I'm a treasure hunter!

Original: Locke:My specialty is finding treasures hidden in ruins and graveyards. I can open any chest!
Dialogue: My specialty is finding treasures hidden in ruins and graveyards. I can open any chest!
trans: 我的专长是寻找隐藏在废墟和墓地中的宝藏。

Original: Yuffie:Oh, I just remembered! You stole my treasure in the palace earlier!
Dialogue: Oh, I just remembered! You stole my treasure in the palace earlier!

Original: Locke:Treasure? If you want it, you can have it.
Dialogue: Treasure? If you want it, you can have it.

Original: Locke:I've just been taking whatever I can get my hands on.
Dialogue: I've just been taking whatever I can get my hands on.

Original: Locke:But the treasure in this world just seems...empty. Maybe I just don't know its value...
Dialogue: But the treasure in this world just seems...empty. Maybe I just don't know its value...
trans: 但这世间的宝物，就好像……空无一物。

Original: Faris:...You might be right. This world was made based on many others, so things may have a different value than back home...
Dialogue: ...You might be right. This world was made based on many others, so things may have a different value than back home...

Original: Vaan:You mean what constitutes "treasure" here may not be the same as "treasure" in our home worlds?
Dialogue: You mean what constitutes "treasure" here may not be the same as "treasure" in our home worlds?
trans: 你是说这里的“宝物”和我们母星世界的“宝物”不一样？

Original: Yuffie:Aww... What a depressing thought...
Dialogue: Aww... What a depressing thought...

Original: Locke:That would make any treasure hunter give up his trade here...
Dialogue: That would make any treasure hunter give up his trade here...
trans: 那会让任何寻宝者放弃他在这里的交易……

Original: Zidane:Come on now, you two. Cheer up! It's not like you to sulk like this.
Dialogue: Come on now, you two. Cheer up! It's not like you to sulk like this.

Original: Faris:He's right. Those gloomy faces don't suit you at all. We need to take what we can.
Dialogue: He's right. Those gloomy faces don't suit you at all. We need to take what we can.

Original: Locke:You're right. It's too soon to be giving up.
Dialogue: You're right. It's too soon to be giving up.

Original: Locke:My fellow treasure hunters: we'll get our hands on that treasure, whatever world we may be in!
Dialogue: My fellow treasure hunters we'll get our hands on that treasure, whatever world we may be in!
trans: 我的宝藏猎人同胞们，无论我们在哪个世界，我们都会得到宝藏！

Original: Firion:Locke... You joined forces with Edgar in the rebel army, am I right?
Dialogue: Locke... You joined forces with Edgar in the rebel army, am I right?
trans: 洛克……你和埃德加一起加入了叛军，对吧？

Original: Firion:Was there a reason for that? Did you do so out of hatred?
Dialogue: Was there a reason for that? Did you do so out of hatred?

Original: Locke:Someone very precious was taken from me...and I didn't want to see more people suffer the way I did.
Dialogue: Someone very precious was taken from me...and I didn't want to see more people suffer the way I did.
trans: 一个非常宝贵的人被从我身边夺走了……我不想看到更多人像我一样受苦。

Original: Locke:But I wasn't aware of my own hatred, nor did I feel the responsibility the king did. I was just going with the flow.
Dialogue: But I wasn't aware of my own hatred, nor did I feel the responsibility the king did. I was just going with the flow.
trans: 但我并没有意识到自己的仇恨，也没有感受到国王的责任。

Original: Celes:As was your rescue of me.
Dialogue: As was your rescue of me.
trans: 就像你对我的拯救一样。

Original: Locke:Ah! N-no, that's not true...
Dialogue: Ah! N-no, that's not true...

Original: Locke:I joined the resistance after the person I wanted to protect passed away, and I lost sight of my objective...
Dialogue: I joined the resistance after the person I wanted to protect passed away, and I lost sight of my objective...
trans: 想要保护的人死后，我加入了反抗军，失去了目标……

Original: Locke:I decided to help the Returners because I was angry at how powerless I felt. I was...immature.
Dialogue: I decided to help the Returners because I was angry at how powerless I felt. I was...immature.
trans: 我决定帮助回归者，因为我对自己的无能为力感到愤怒。

Original: Laguna:Someone with a troubling youth, I see!
Dialogue: Someone with a troubling youth, I see!
trans: 一个有着令人不安的青春的人，我明白了！

Original: Squall:(You're one to talk...)
Dialogue: (You're one to talk...)

Original: Locke:That might be true. And I don't plan on getting old anytime soon.
Dialogue: That might be true. And I don't plan on getting old anytime soon.

Original: Serah:Hehe... I can tell. You still steal treasure wherever you go!
Dialogue: Hehe... I can tell. You still steal treasure wherever you go!

Original: Celes:You're right. He'll be this immature forever.
Dialogue: You're right. He'll be this immature forever.

Original: Laguna:He may be young at heart, but he still manages to get things done.
Dialogue: He may be young at heart, but he still manages to get things done.
trans: 他可能内心年轻，但他仍然设法把事情做好。

Original: Squall:(Just how much does he remember?)
Dialogue: (Just how much does he remember?)

Original: Laguna:Haha! I can tell you're that kind of guy, Locke!
Dialogue: Haha! I can tell you're that kind of guy, Locke!

Original: Locke:Hey! I've still got dreams to chase!
Dialogue: Hey! I've still got dreams to chase!

Original: Firion:It may have been different at first, but do you have someone you wish to protect now?
Dialogue: It may have been different at first, but do you have someone you wish to protect now?
trans: 一开始可能不一样，但现在有想要保护的人吗？

Original: Locke:Of course.
Dialogue: Of course.

Original: Squall:(What an insufferable guy.)
Dialogue: (What an insufferable guy.)

Original: Locke:It's different now than when I was just mindlessly chasing after treasure, not knowing what was really precious.
Dialogue: It's different now than when I was just mindlessly chasing after treasure, not knowing what was really precious.
trans: 现在和以前只是盲目追逐宝物，不知道什么才是真正珍贵的时候不同了。

Original: Locke:But that time came. And I understood what I really treasured...
Dialogue: But that time came. And I understood what I really treasured...

Original: Locke:It's not just a passing feeling. Even you must have a reason for fighting.
Dialogue: It's not just a passing feeling. Even you must have a reason for fighting.
trans: 这不仅仅是一种短暂的感觉。

Original: Firion:Yes... You're right. Even if the reason starts as hatred, it eventually changes...
Dialogue: Yes... You're right. Even if the reason starts as hatred, it eventually changes...

Original: Squall:...What now?
Dialogue: ...What now?

Original: Laguna:I understand... For some reason, Locke's story really hits home...
Dialogue: I understand... For some reason, Locke's story really hits home...
trans: 我明白了……不知为何，洛克的故事真切中要害……

Original: Serah:What happened?
Dialogue: What happened?

Original: Celes:It seems like you've got quite the past, too, Laguna.
Dialogue: It seems like you've got quite the past, too, Laguna.
trans: 看起来你也有很多过去，拉古纳。

Original: Locke:Didn't you say that your memories were foggy?
Dialogue: Didn't you say that your memories were foggy?
trans: 你不是说你的记忆很模糊吗？

Original: Laguna:That's why it's so strange! I wonder what happened in my past...
Dialogue: That's why it's so strange! I wonder what happened in my past...
trans: 这就是为什么它如此奇怪！

Original: Locke:Well, don't let my personal stories get to you. I like you the way you are.
Dialogue: Well, don't let my personal stories get to you. I like you the way you are.
trans: 好吧，不要让我的个人故事影响到你。

Original: Firion:Yes. Just continue to be yourself, Laguna.
Dialogue: Yes. Just continue to be yourself, Laguna.

Original: Laguna:You're right. I just can't help thinking about it, though!
Dialogue: You're right. I just can't help thinking about it, though!

Original: Squall:(You keep doing that...)
Dialogue: (You keep doing that...)

Original: Serah:Once you find someone to protect, you grow up...
Dialogue: Once you find someone to protect, you grow up...
trans: 一旦找到要保护的人，你就会长大……

Original: Serah:When you want to protect someone, that becomes your very reason for living...
Dialogue: When you want to protect someone, that becomes your very reason for living...
trans: 当你想保护一个人的时候，那就是你活下去的理由……

Original: Celes:Are you talking about Snow?
Dialogue: Are you talking about Snow?

Original: Serah:Not just Snow, but the others as well. Especially Noel... He's such a worrywart.
Dialogue: Not just Snow, but the others as well. Especially Noel... He's such a worrywart.

Original: Serah:But in this world, everything is fine. There are lots of people around to help.
Dialogue: But in this world, everything is fine. There are lots of people around to help.
trans: 但是在这个世界上，一切都很好。

Original: ???:Where the hell am I!?
Dialogue: Where the hell am I!?

Original: ???:Me? I could say the same for you!
Dialogue: Me? I could say the same for you!

Original: ???:Uh, I mean, you have any idea where we are?
Dialogue: Uh, I mean, you have any idea where we are?
trans: 呃，我的意思是，你知道我们在哪儿吗？

Original: Steiner:Even if we did, we would not divulge that information to an adversary such as yourself.
Dialogue: Even if we did, we would not divulge that information to an adversary such as yourself.
trans: 即使我们这样做了，我们也不会将该信息泄露给像您这样的对手。

Original: ???:Come on!
Dialogue: Come on!

Original: ???:I just need some directions! What makes you think I'm the enemy!?
Dialogue: I just need some directions! What makes you think I'm the enemy!?

Original: Cater:Is that a gun? Wow, that's dangerous, you know.
Dialogue: Is that a gun? Wow, that's dangerous, you know.

Original: Kain:Hey may be an ally of someone we know.
Dialogue: Hey may be an ally of someone we know.
trans: 嘿，可能是我们认识的某个人的盟友。

Original: Shadow:You may be right, but we don't know for sure.
Dialogue: You may be right, but we don't know for sure.
trans: 你可能是对的，但我们不确定。

Original: Fujin:ANALYSIS. ENEMY!?
Dialogue: ANALYSIS. ENEMY!?

Original: Steiner:That does it! We must deal with this miscreant immediately!
Dialogue: That does it! We must deal with this miscreant immediately!

Original: ???:Why won't any of you listen to me!?
Dialogue: Why won't any of you listen to me!?
trans: 为什么你们都不听我的！？

Original: ???:Don't assume I'm the bad guy!
Dialogue: Don't assume I'm the bad guy!

Original: ???:You bunch of arrogant clowns!
Dialogue: You bunch of arrogant clowns!
trans: 你们这群狂妄自大的小丑！

Original: Cater:If you want a fight, you got one!
Dialogue: If you want a fight, you got one!
trans: 如果你想打架，你有一个！

Original: ???:All right, Missy!
Dialogue: All right, Missy!

Original: Fujin:FOCUS! BATTLE!
Dialogue: FOCUS! BATTLE!

Original: Steiner:A noble knight should never partake in a fight, but I must protect these damsels!
Dialogue: A noble knight should never partake in a fight, but I must protect these damsels!
trans: 高贵的骑士不应该参与战斗，但我必须保护这些少女！

Original: Shadow:What a hot-headed bunch.
Dialogue: What a hot-headed bunch.
trans: 真是一群头脑发热的人。

Original: Kain:Should we stop them?
Dialogue: Should we stop them?

Original: Shadow:No. With any luck, someone will do that for us.
Dialogue: No. With any luck, someone will do that for us.
trans: 不，运气好的话，会有人为我们做这件事。

Original: Kain:You're quite composed.
Dialogue: You're quite composed.

Original: Shadow:As are you.
Dialogue: As are you.

Original: Cater:Stop chatting and come help us!
Dialogue: Stop chatting and come help us!
trans: 停止聊天，快来帮助我们吧！

Original: ???:You want some of this? You got it!
Dialogue: You want some of this? You got it!

Original: Cater:Phew! You're as tough as you look.
Dialogue: Phew! You're as tough as you look.

Original: Barret:I won't let you stand in my way!
Dialogue: I won't let you stand in my way!

Original: Sabin:I respect that.
Dialogue: I respect that.

Original: Barret:Shut up! Whoever you are, you're built like a damn bear!
Dialogue: Shut up! Whoever you are, you're built like a damn bear!

Original: Sabin:Thanks! I'll take that as a compliment.
Dialogue: Thanks! I'll take that as a compliment.

Original: Cater:You're both built like bears. But I'm here to back you up!
Dialogue: You're both built like bears. But I'm here to back you up!

Original: Maria:If he's willing to talk, we should hear him out.
Dialogue: If he's willing to talk, we should hear him out.
trans: 如果他愿意说话，我们应该听他说完。

Original: Maria:Besides, remember what Shadow said.
Dialogue: Besides, remember what Shadow said.
trans: 此外，记住影子说过的话。

Original: Sabin:He might be a friend of one of us.
Dialogue: He might be a friend of one of us.
trans: 他可能是我们其中一个人的朋友。

Original: Sabin:Change of plan! We may not be on opposite sides.
Dialogue: Change of plan! We may not be on opposite sides.

Original: ???:After all that!? I'm not falling for any of your tricks.
Dialogue: After all that!? I'm not falling for any of your tricks.

Original: Maria:If you can just wait a little longer, there are more of us on the way.
Dialogue: If you can just wait a little longer, there are more of us on the way.
trans: 如果你能再等一会儿，我们还有更多人在路上。

Original: Barret:Tifa? What are you doin' here!?
Dialogue: Tifa? What are you doin' here!?

Original: Sazh:You know this guy?
Dialogue: You know this guy?

Original: Tifa:Yeah, he's a close friend. He has a bit of a temper, though.
Dialogue: Yeah, he's a close friend. He has a bit of a temper, though.
trans: 是的，他是一个亲密的朋友。

Original: Barret:Hey! I'm standin' right here!
Dialogue: Hey! I'm standin' right here!

Original: Tifa:But he's a nice man who cares very much about his daughter. Isn't that right?
Dialogue: But he's a nice man who cares very much about his daughter. Isn't that right?
trans: 但他是一个非常关心他女儿的好人。

Original: Barret:W-well, yeah, of course.
Dialogue: W-well, yeah, of course.

Original: Sazh:So you're a father fightin' alone, too? Maybe we're not so different after all.
Dialogue: So you're a father fightin' alone, too? Maybe we're not so different after all.
trans: 所以你也是一个孤军奋战的父亲？

Original: Cater:Well, this is kind of embarrassing. I wish I'd known he was on our side sooner.
Dialogue: Well, this is kind of embarrassing. I wish I'd known he was on our side sooner.

Original: Cater:I feel awful fighting someone's friend.
Dialogue: I feel awful fighting someone's friend.
trans: 我觉得和别人的朋友打架很糟糕。

Original: Tifa:I'm sorry I didn't get here sooner. When I heard what Shadow said, I thought maybe...
Dialogue: I'm sorry I didn't get here sooner. When I heard what Shadow said, I thought maybe...
trans: 对不起，我没有早点到这里。

Original: Barret:Sorry from me too. I admit, I lost my cool.
Dialogue: Sorry from me too. I admit, I lost my cool.

Original: Maria:It's alright. I'm glad you found your friends.
Dialogue: It's alright. I'm glad you found your friends.

Original: Sazh:You really are a tough fellow. Probably what's kept you alive for this long.
Dialogue: You really are a tough fellow. Probably what's kept you alive for this long.

Original: Sabin:We can explain where we are later. Wanna go say hi to Cloud and the others?
Dialogue: We can explain where we are later. Wanna go say hi to Cloud and the others?
trans: 我们可以稍后解释我们在哪里。

Original: Barret:Cloud! He's here too?
Dialogue: Cloud! He's here too?

Original: Barret:Before we head out, the name's Barret. Lookin' forward to gettin' to know everyone.
Dialogue: Before we head out, the name's Barret. Lookin' forward to gettin' to know everyone.
trans: 在我们出发之前，名字叫 Barret。

Original: Cloud:They thought you were the enemy?
Dialogue: They thought you were the enemy?

Original: Barret:Yeah, I was about to get real rough.
Dialogue: Yeah, I was about to get real rough.
trans: 是的，我正要变得非常粗鲁。

Original: Tifa:I wish we knew...
Dialogue: I wish we knew...

Original: Tifa:We've been fighting to save this world and ours.
Dialogue: We've been fighting to save this world and ours.
trans: 我们一直在为拯救这个世界和我们的世界而战。

Original: Cait Sith:It's good to focus on the goals right in front of you!
Dialogue: It's good to focus on the goals right in front of you!
trans: 专注于眼前的目标是件好事！

Original: Barret:You're here too!
Dialogue: You're here too!

Original: Cait Sith:Yes, and I've made a lot of friends.
Dialogue: Yes, and I've made a lot of friends.

Original: Barret:Are you, uh, are you okay?
Dialogue: Are you, uh, are you okay?

Original: Tifa:Oh, right. Cait Sith is
Dialogue: Oh, right. Cait Sith is—

Original: Cait Sith:No, no, that's classified information! Just know there's nothing for you to worry about.
Dialogue: No, no, that's classified information! Just know there's nothing for you to worry about.

Original: Cait Sith:There's a lot we don't know, including Marlene's well-being.
Dialogue: There's a lot we don't know, including Marlene's well-being.
trans: 有很多我们不知道的，包括玛琳的幸福。

Original: Cait Sith:I believe this world is still safe, though.
Dialogue: I believe this world is still safe, though.
trans: 不过，我相信这个世界仍然是安全的。

Original: Barret:It's like that, huh?
Dialogue: It's like that, huh?

Original: Barret:Alright then!
Dialogue: Alright then!

Original: Barret:I'll do all I can to protect her and our home!
Dialogue: I'll do all I can to protect her and our home!
trans: 我会尽我所能保护她和我们的家！

Original: Barret:I'll do it all for Marlene!
Dialogue: I'll do it all for Marlene!

Original: Barret:Wh-who're you?
Dialogue: Wh-who're you?

Original: Palom:Your arm! It's so cool!
Dialogue: Your arm! It's so cool!

Original: Edgar:I apologize for him, but your weapon is fascinating.
Dialogue: I apologize for him, but your weapon is fascinating.
trans: 我为他道歉，但你的武器很迷人。

Original: Barret:Ah, this thing.
Dialogue: Ah, this thing.

Original: Edgar:I've never seen anything like it before.
Dialogue: I've never seen anything like it before.
trans: 我以前从未见过这样的事情。

Original: Edgar:Replacing your arm for a weapon must have been a tough decision to make.
Dialogue: Replacing your arm for a weapon must have been a tough decision to make.
trans: 用武器代替手臂一定是一个艰难的决定。

Original: Barret:Not really. Just how things turned out.
Dialogue: Not really. Just how things turned out.

Original: Barret:It's a reminder of what I couldn't protect and what I should.
Dialogue: It's a reminder of what I couldn't protect and what I should.
trans: 它提醒我什么是我不能保护的，什么是我应该保护的。
