Original: Edgar:Don't be so modest. I can sense your strength and determination in the way you treat it.
Dialogue: Don't be so modest. I can sense your strength and determination in the way you treat it.

Original: Edgar:It has a few nicks and scratches, but it's well taken care of. It says a lot about you.
Dialogue: It has a few nicks and scratches, but it's well taken care of. It says a lot about you.
trans: 它有一些划痕和划痕，但保养得很好。

Original: Snow:What he said. I don't know much about machinery, but I can tell there are people and things you want to protect.
Dialogue: What he said. I don't know much about machinery, but I can tell there are people and things you want to protect.

Original: Snow:And that in itself is an important part of who you are. It demonstrates strength.
Dialogue: And that in itself is an important part of who you are. It demonstrates strength.
trans: 而这本身就是你是谁的重要组成部分。

Original: Barret:I haven't done anythin' yet to deserve this kind of praise.
Dialogue: I haven't done anythin' yet to deserve this kind of praise.
trans: 我还没有做任何值得这种赞美的事。

Original: Snow:I can tell you have heart. I like you. Let's talk later. I'd like to hear your stories.
Dialogue: I can tell you have heart. I like you. Let's talk later. I'd like to hear your stories.

Original: Eiko:Hehe! He'll have to run faster to catch us!
Dialogue: Hehe! He'll have to run faster to catch us!

Original: Relm:There's no way he'll catch up!
Dialogue: There's no way he'll catch up!

Original: Krile:He's on his way. Let's go!
Dialogue: He's on his way. Let's go!

Original: Barret:Wait up! Huff... Huff... Guess I'll take a break here.
Dialogue: Wait up! Huff... Huff... Guess I'll take a break here.

Original: Barret:The kids here sure can run.
Dialogue: The kids here sure can run.

Original: Eiko:You're tired already? We just started playing tag, too!
Dialogue: You're tired already? We just started playing tag, too!

Original: Relm:Are you alright, old man?
Dialogue: Are you alright, old man?

Original: Krile:Should we take a break?
Dialogue: Should we take a break?

Original: Barret:What!? There's no way I'll lose to a bunch of kids!
Dialogue: What!? There's no way I'll lose to a bunch of kids!

Original: Galuf:You are quite skilled with children, Barret.
Dialogue: You are quite skilled with children, Barret.
trans: 巴雷特，你对孩子很在行。

Original: Barret:You think so? This is just me.
Dialogue: You think so? This is just me.

Original: Barret:Clashing with others as always.
Dialogue: Clashing with others as always.
trans: 一如既往地和别人发生冲突。

Original: Galuf:That's a part of being an adult.
Dialogue: That's a part of being an adult.

Original: Relm:Come on, old man! Break's over!
Dialogue: Come on, old man! Break's over!

Original: Eiko:Yeah! Don't keep us ladies waiting!
Dialogue: Yeah! Don't keep us ladies waiting!

Original: Galuf:Hoho. You certainly are popular.
Dialogue: Hoho. You certainly are popular.

Original: Barret:Join us, Galuf. We'll show 'em what adults can do!
Dialogue: Join us, Galuf. We'll show 'em what adults can do!

Original: Krile:Are you going to play, too, grandpa? Barret couldn't even catch us...
Dialogue: Are you going to play, too, grandpa? Barret couldn't even catch us...

Original: Galuf:What are you saying? There's still life in these bones of mine!
Dialogue: What are you saying? There's still life in these bones of mine!

Original: Jecht:Why don't you join 'em, kid?
Dialogue: Why don't you join 'em, kid?
trans: 你为什么不加入他们，孩子？

Original: Tidus:I'm not a kid anymore! Why don't you join? You act childish enough.
Dialogue: I'm not a kid anymore! Why don't you join? You act childish enough.

Original: Jecht:Fine. I will.
Dialogue: Fine. I will.

Original: Jecht:Hey! Let's play a new game. See that sulky boy over there who looks like he wants to play?
Dialogue: Hey! Let's play a new game. See that sulky boy over there who looks like he wants to play?

Original: Jecht:The first one to catch him wins!
Dialogue: The first one to catch him wins!
trans: 第一个抓住他的人赢了！

Original: Jecht:Ready? Start!
Dialogue: Ready? Start!

Original: Tidus:Wh-what's going on!?
Dialogue: Wh-what's going on!?

Original: Eiko:Wait up, Tidus!
Dialogue: Wait up, Tidus!

Original: Relm:If you keep moving, I'm gonna draw your portrait!
Dialogue: If you keep moving, I'm gonna draw your portrait!

Original: Krile:Run away, Tidus!
Dialogue: Run away, Tidus!

Original: Barret:Hahaha! I think I'll catch 'im first!
Dialogue: Hahaha! I think I'll catch 'im first!

Original: Tidus:W-wait, Barret! Not you, too!
Dialogue: W-wait, Barret! Not you, too!

Original: Tidus:Damn you, old man! I won't forget this!
Dialogue: Damn you, old man! I won't forget this!

Original: Barret:......
King:What's the matter? Are you okay?
Dialogue: What's the matter? Are you okay?

Original: Barret:Just doin' some maintenance so I'm ready when push comes to shove.
Dialogue: Just doin' some maintenance so I'm ready when push comes to shove.
trans: 只是做一些维护工作，这样我就可以在紧急情况下做好准备。

Original: Barret:I need to listen to what my partner says, else my life'll be in danger.
Dialogue: I need to listen to what my partner says, else my life'll be in danger.
trans: 我需要听我伴侣说的话，否则我会有生命危险。

Original: King:I understand. I make sure my revolvers are always in top shape.
Dialogue: I understand. I make sure my revolvers are always in top shape.

Original: Locke:But it looks to me like you just let loose in battle, Barret.
Dialogue: But it looks to me like you just let loose in battle, Barret.
trans: 但在我看来你只是在战斗中放松了，Barret。

Original: Barret:There's no time to think about consequences in a fight!
Dialogue: There's no time to think about consequences in a fight!
trans: 打架根本没时间考虑后果！

Original: Barret:You just have to go in with your guns blazing!
Dialogue: You just have to go in with your guns blazing!
trans: 你只需要带着你的枪进入！

Original: Edge:Your personality comes through even in your fighting style. I can admire your passion.
Dialogue: Your personality comes through even in your fighting style. I can admire your passion.
trans: 你的个性甚至体现在你的战斗风格中。

Original: Cecil:But if your gun breaks at a critical moment, then...
Dialogue: But if your gun breaks at a critical moment, then...
trans: 但如果你的枪在关键时刻坏掉了，那么……

Original: King:We have no choice but to run. A broken gun is useless.
Dialogue: We have no choice but to run. A broken gun is useless.
trans: 我们别无选择，只能逃跑。

Original: Locke:But you have us to rely on in that case.
Dialogue: But you have us to rely on in that case.
trans: 但在那种情况下，你有我们可以依靠。

Original: Barret:You've got nothin' to worry about!
Dialogue: You've got nothin' to worry about!

Original: Barret:My partner's been with me through all my battles.
Dialogue: My partner's been with me through all my battles.
trans: 在我所有的战斗中，我的搭档一直陪伴着我。

Original: Barret:We'll make it through somehow!
Dialogue: We'll make it through somehow!
trans: 我们会以某种方式度过难关的！

Original: King:"Partner," I see... It seems like a trustworthy ally indeed.
Dialogue: "Partner," I see... It seems like a trustworthy ally indeed.
trans: “伙伴，”我明白了……这看起来确实是一个值得信赖的盟友。

Original: King:But I've never seen anything like your gun. Can you replace the attachment...?
Dialogue: But I've never seen anything like your gun. Can you replace the attachment...?
trans: 但我从来没有见过像你的枪这样的东西。

Original: Barret:Well, it's connected here like this... With an arm, I use this bolt and...
Dialogue: Well, it's connected here like this... With an arm, I use this bolt and...
trans: 好吧，这里是这样连接的……用一只手臂，我用这个螺栓……

Original: Locke:What a rare pair they are!
Dialogue: What a rare pair they are!
trans: 他们是多么难得的一对啊！

Original: Rem:We've come pretty far. Don't you think we should head back?
Dialogue: We've come pretty far. Don't you think we should head back?

Original: Kain:You're right. Let's head back and...
Dialogue: You're right. Let's head back and...

Original: Kain:Is that...Rosa!?
Dialogue: Is that...Rosa!?

Original: Thancred:We must go.
Dialogue: We must go.

Original: Rosa:There are so many of them...but I mustn't give up.
Dialogue: There are so many of them...but I mustn't give up.
trans: 他们有很多……但我不能放弃。

Original: Kain:Are you alright, Rosa?
Dialogue: Are you alright, Rosa?

Original: Rosa:Kain! Yes. Yes, I'm all right.
Dialogue: Kain! Yes. Yes, I'm all right.

Original: Kain:Are you with me?
Dialogue: Are you with me?

Original: Rosa:There. That should do it.
Dialogue: There. That should do it.

Original: Yuri:Thanks! It doesn't hurt at all anymore.
Dialogue: Thanks! It doesn't hurt at all anymore.

Original: Chelinka:Yuri, why's your face all red?
Dialogue: Yuri, why's your face all red?
trans: 尤里，你的脸怎么全红了？

Original: Palom:Maybe it's because Rosa's a lot prettier than you, Chelinka!
Dialogue: Maybe it's because Rosa's a lot prettier than you, Chelinka!
trans: 也许是因为罗莎比你漂亮多了，切林卡！

Original: Yuri:You're right! She's pretty and nice and...
Dialogue: You're right! She's pretty and nice and...

Original: Chelinka:Wait a second! I'm all those things too!
Dialogue: Wait a second! I'm all those things too!

Original: Palom:Are you, though...?
Dialogue: Are you, though...?

Original: Rosa:I see you've made some new friends.
Dialogue: I see you've made some new friends.
trans: 我看到你交了一些新朋友。

Original: Kain:That's right. They're trusty comrades.
Dialogue: That's right. They're trusty comrades.

Original: Thancred:How about you introduce us to the lady?
Dialogue: How about you introduce us to the lady?
trans: 你把我们介绍给这位女士怎么样？

Original: Kain:She is a friend. Rosa, Cecil, and I grew up together.
Dialogue: She is a friend. Rosa, Cecil, and I grew up together.

Original: Rem:That explains why you rushed off without hesitation.
Dialogue: That explains why you rushed off without hesitation.
trans: 这就解释了为什么你毫不犹豫地冲了出去。

Original: Thancred:Just "friends"? What a shame.
Dialogue: Just "friends"? What a shame.

Original: Rem:Kain isn't like you, Thancred. It's natural to care about someone you've known for a long time.
Dialogue: Kain isn't like you, Thancred. It's natural to care about someone you've known for a long time.

Original: Rosa:I apologize if I caused you worry. Thank you all so much. I wouldn't be standing here if not for all of you.
Dialogue: I apologize if I caused you worry. Thank you all so much. I wouldn't be standing here if not for all of you.
trans: 如果让您担心了，我深表歉意。

Original: Yuri:Then let's go and find Cecil! He'll be happy to see you're doing okay.
Dialogue: Then let's go and find Cecil! He'll be happy to see you're doing okay.

Original: Kain:He's nearby. I'll explain everything on the way.
Dialogue: He's nearby. I'll explain everything on the way.

Original: Rosa:Thank you. But let me heal you first.
Dialogue: Thank you. But let me heal you first.

Original: Rem:You were hurt? I didn't notice at all!
Dialogue: You were hurt? I didn't notice at all!

Original: Kain:It's nothing. I thought I hid it well.
Dialogue: It's nothing. I thought I hid it well.

Original: Rosa:You did, but you can't fool me.
Dialogue: You did, but you can't fool me.
trans: 你做到了，但你骗不了我。

Original: Cecil:Rosa!
Dialogue: Rosa!

Original: Cecil:I'm not certain whether I should be happy seeing you here.
Dialogue: I'm not certain whether I should be happy seeing you here.
trans: 我不确定在这里见到你是否应该高兴。

Original: Rosa:I'm fine, Cecil. Kain came to my rescue.
Dialogue: I'm fine, Cecil. Kain came to my rescue.

Original: Cecil:What a relief! Thank you, friend.
Dialogue: What a relief! Thank you, friend.

Original: Kain:I told her about this world we're in, and she was determined to come and see you.
Dialogue: I told her about this world we're in, and she was determined to come and see you.
trans: 我告诉她我们所处的这个世界，她决定来看你。

Original: Rosa:Knowing I can be of help erases any fear I may have.
Dialogue: Knowing I can be of help erases any fear I may have.
trans: 知道我可以提供帮助消除了我可能有的任何恐惧。

Original: Cecil:Thank you, Rosa, for being strong.
Dialogue: Thank you, Rosa, for being strong.

Original: Cecil:Everyone, this is Rosa. She's very dear to me.
Dialogue: Everyone, this is Rosa. She's very dear to me.

Original: Celes:I knew it!
Dialogue: I knew it!

Original: Bartz:I'm glad you found each other.
Dialogue: I'm glad you found each other.
trans: 很高兴你们找到了彼此。

Original: Eiko:You must be a good person if you're Cecil's sweetie.
Dialogue: You must be a good person if you're Cecil's sweetie.
trans: 如果你是塞西尔的心上人，那你一定是个好人。

Original: Kain:She's a bit stubborn, but possesses a strong will.
Dialogue: She's a bit stubborn, but possesses a strong will.
trans: 她有点固执，但有着坚强的意志。

Original: Eiko:You must know her well, to be able to spot something like that.
Dialogue: You must know her well, to be able to spot something like that.
trans: 你必须很了解她，才能发现类似的东西。

Original: Kain:I must go back to patrolling the area.
Dialogue: I must go back to patrolling the area.
trans: 我必须回去巡逻该地区。

Original: Cecil:Already? But Rosa is here.
Dialogue: Already? But Rosa is here.

Original: Kain:What I'm doing helps her and everyone else.
Dialogue: What I'm doing helps her and everyone else.
trans: 我正在做的事对她和其他人都有帮助。

Original: Kain:You should rest and catch up.
Dialogue: You should rest and catch up.

Original: Eiko:Wait! I'm going with you.
Dialogue: Wait! I'm going with you.

Original: Eiko:I know how you feel. Chin up!
Dialogue: I know how you feel. Chin up!

Original: Cecil:I was hoping we could all talk together.
Dialogue: I was hoping we could all talk together.
trans: 我希望我们能一起谈谈。

Original: Bartz:He's letting you two have some time alone. After all, you must have a lot to talk about.
Dialogue: He's letting you two have some time alone. After all, you must have a lot to talk about.

Original: Bartz:I suppose it's time for us to patrol the area too.
Dialogue: I suppose it's time for us to patrol the area too.
trans: 我想我们也该在该地区巡逻了。

Original: Rosa:Oh! You don't have to...
Dialogue: Oh! You don't have to...

Original: Celes:Reuniting with someone you've been hoping to see again is nothing short of a miracle. Don't take this for granted.
Dialogue: Reuniting with someone you've been hoping to see again is nothing short of a miracle. Don't take this for granted.
trans: 与您一直希望再次见到的人重逢简直就是奇迹。

Original: Cecil:Did Kain tell you how I lost my memory? I would be lost if not for him.
Dialogue: Did Kain tell you how I lost my memory? I would be lost if not for him.
trans: 凯恩有没有告诉你我是怎么失忆的？

Original: Rosa:That's just like him. Though he saved me back there, I don't always want to be protected.
Dialogue: That's just like him. Though he saved me back there, I don't always want to be protected.

Original: Rosa:I want to do what I can for the both of you, too.
Dialogue: I want to do what I can for the both of you, too.
trans: 我也想为你们俩尽我所能。

Original: Cecil:I thought you might say something like that.
Dialogue: I thought you might say something like that.
trans: 我想你可能会说类似的话。

Original: Cecil:Come with us. Your help will be greatly appreciated.
Dialogue: Come with us. Your help will be greatly appreciated.

Original: Rosa:Thank you, Cecil. I'll always be by your side.
Dialogue: Thank you, Cecil. I'll always be by your side.

Original: Rosa:It's your turn, Lilisette.
Dialogue: It's your turn, Lilisette.

Original: Lilisette:Wow! I feel much better!
Dialogue: Wow! I feel much better!

Original: Aerith:That's amazing. This must've taken you a long time to learn.
Dialogue: That's amazing. This must've taken you a long time to learn.

Original: Rosa:It took a lot of hard work.
Dialogue: It took a lot of hard work.

Original: Terra:It wasn't so easy at first?
Dialogue: It wasn't so easy at first?
trans: 一开始不是那么容易吗？

Original: Aerith:Because you care for him.
Dialogue: Because you care for him.

Original: Rosa:As a mage, I could keep an eye on him in battle too.
Dialogue: As a mage, I could keep an eye on him in battle too.
trans: 作为魔术师，我也可以在战斗中注视他。

Original: Vincent:Instead of keeping him away from strife, you joined him.
Dialogue: Instead of keeping him away from strife, you joined him.
trans: 你没有让他远离纷争，而是加入了他。

Original: Vincent:You chose a path that allowed you to watch over him.
Dialogue: You chose a path that allowed you to watch over him.
trans: 你选择了一条可以让你监视他的道路。

Original: Lilisette:Didn't that worry the people around you?
Dialogue: Didn't that worry the people around you?

Original: Aerith:It's only natural for a mother to worry about her children.
Dialogue: It's only natural for a mother to worry about her children.
trans: 母亲为她的孩子担心是很自然的。

Original: Terra:But they don't always know what's best for you because of their concerns.
Dialogue: But they don't always know what's best for you because of their concerns.
trans: 但由于他们的顾虑，他们并不总是知道什么对你最好。

Original: Terra:It's impossible to hold back the feeling of wanting to protect someone you care about.
Dialogue: It's impossible to hold back the feeling of wanting to protect someone you care about.
trans: 想要保护您关心的人的感觉是无法抑制的。

Original: Snow:Exactly. It's that feeling that makes you stronger and helps you face whatever comes your way.
Dialogue: Exactly. It's that feeling that makes you stronger and helps you face whatever comes your way.

Original: Lilisette:I fight, too, in hopes of getting stronger to protect the things I care about.
Dialogue: I fight, too, in hopes of getting stronger to protect the things I care about.
trans: 我也在战斗，希望能变得更强大来保护我在乎的东西。

Original: Rosa:As long as you hold on to that determination, you can do anything.
Dialogue: As long as you hold on to that determination, you can do anything.
trans: 只要你坚持这个决心，你就可以做任何事情。

Original: Rosa:It will pave the path to the future you hope for.
Dialogue: It will pave the path to the future you hope for.
trans: 它将为您希望的未来铺平道路。

Original: Vincent:Sometimes the path has obstacles you may need to overcome.
Dialogue: Sometimes the path has obstacles you may need to overcome.
trans: 有时这条路有您可能需要克服的障碍。

Original: Rosa:Yes. There have been times I wasn't strong enough. I let everyone down.
Dialogue: Yes. There have been times I wasn't strong enough. I let everyone down.

Original: Rosa:But I vowed to stay by Cecil's side. And to do so, I need to become stronger.
Dialogue: But I vowed to stay by Cecil's side. And to do so, I need to become stronger.
trans: 但我发誓要留在塞西尔身边。

Original: Snow:Good luck! You're gonna have your hands full with that one. But I'm sure your conviction is a part of what keeps him going.
Dialogue: Good luck! You're gonna have your hands full with that one. But I'm sure your conviction is a part of what keeps him going.

Original: Rosa:Thank you. I'll try my best.
Dialogue: Thank you. I'll try my best.

Original: Galuf:Though you don't know what might emerge from them? You sure are a tough one.
Dialogue: Though you don't know what might emerge from them? You sure are a tough one.
trans: 尽管您不知道它们会产生什么？

Original: Rosa:He's right, Vaan. The desert is a dangerous place.
Dialogue: He's right, Vaan. The desert is a dangerous place.

Original: Vaan:Don't worry about me. If the enemy is too strong, I can just run away. I don't get too far from the city anyway.
Dialogue: Don't worry about me. If the enemy is too strong, I can just run away. I don't get too far from the city anyway.

Original: Garnet:Were you okay!? What happened?
Dialogue: Were you okay!? What happened?

Original: Rosa:I learned some terrible news and chased after Cecil in concern. It was my fault for rushing out alone.
Dialogue: I learned some terrible news and chased after Cecil in concern. It was my fault for rushing out alone.
trans: 我得知了一个可怕的消息，担心地追上了塞西尔。

Original: Cloud:Were you surprised you were so under-prepared?
Dialogue: Were you surprised you were so under-prepared?
trans: 你对自己准备不足感到惊讶吗？

Original: Tidus:If I were Cecil, I'd be happy you cared about me so much, but I'd worry about you, too, Rosa.
Dialogue: If I were Cecil, I'd be happy you cared about me so much, but I'd worry about you, too, Rosa.
trans: 如果我是塞西尔，我会很高兴你这么关心我，但我也会为你担心，罗莎。

Original: Rosa:I know... I've reflected on my rash actions that caused Cecil and the others to worry.
Dialogue: I know... I've reflected on my rash actions that caused Cecil and the others to worry.
trans: 我知道……我已经反省了让塞西尔他们担心的鲁莽行为。

Original: Garnet:I can understand how you feel. Being scared after getting separated from someone precious to you...
Dialogue: I can understand how you feel. Being scared after getting separated from someone precious to you...

Original: Rosa:But...I always regretted not going with him at that time.
Dialogue: But...I always regretted not going with him at that time.
trans: 但是……我一直后悔当时没有和他一起去。

Original: Vaan:It's better to regret something you did than something you didn't.
Dialogue: It's better to regret something you did than something you didn't.
trans: 后悔做过的事总比后悔没做过的事好。

Original: Galuf:It's easy to say now that it's over, but I'm glad neither of you encountered dangerous foes or got swallowed by quicksand.
Dialogue: It's easy to say now that it's over, but I'm glad neither of you encountered dangerous foes or got swallowed by quicksand.
trans: 现在说结束很容易，但我很高兴你们都没有遇到危险的敌人，也没有被流沙吞噬。

Original: Garnet:What!? A giant caterpillar!?
Dialogue: What!? A giant caterpillar!?

Original: Cloud:Are you sure it wasn't a snake?
Dialogue: Are you sure it wasn't a snake?

Original: Galuf:No! It was most definitely a caterpillar! I remember it brushing against my skin...
Dialogue: No! It was most definitely a caterpillar! I remember it brushing against my skin...

Original: Tidus:I had tosearchfor acactus! And those things can run fast!
Dialogue: I had to search for a cactus! And those things can run fast!

Original: Vaan:You guys were worried about me playing in the desert? Just listen to yourselves!
Dialogue: You guys were worried about me playing in the desert? Just listen to yourselves!
trans: 你们担心我在沙漠里玩耍吗？

Original: Rosa:Yes, you're right... I never thought it could be so fun.
Dialogue: Yes, you're right... I never thought it could be so fun.
trans: 是的，你是对的……我从没想过它会这么有趣。

Original: Rosa:No matter how tough our surroundings, we can overcome it with a smile together.
Dialogue: No matter how tough our surroundings, we can overcome it with a smile together.
trans: 无论周围环境多么艰难，我们都可以一起微笑克服它。

Original: Vaan:Exactly! Isn't it much better that way?
Dialogue: Exactly! Isn't it much better that way?

Original: Seifer:I'll go after the small fry! Their boss should be up ahead.
Dialogue: I'll go after the small fry! Their boss should be up ahead.

Original: Rosa:Wait, Seifer! There might be a strong enemy up ahead. We ought to prepare.
Dialogue: Wait, Seifer! There might be a strong enemy up ahead. We ought to prepare.

Original: Seifer:Do you want them to get away? What if we never find them again?
Dialogue: Do you want them to get away? What if we never find them again?

Original: Rosa:That is far better than one of us getting severely injured. It's important to rest, Seifer
Dialogue: That is far better than one of us getting severely injured. It's important to rest, Seifer—
trans: 这比我们中的一个人受重伤要好得多。

Original: Seifer:If you're afraid, you can wait here. I'm going to stop them!
Dialogue: If you're afraid, you can wait here. I'm going to stop them!
trans: 如果你害怕，你可以在这里等着。

Original: Rosa:Are you trying to act tough? Did you think I wouldn't notice?
Dialogue: Are you trying to act tough? Did you think I wouldn't notice?

Original: Seifer:I don't need any healing!
Dialogue: I don't need any healing!

Original: Sabin:Haha! You can't win this one, Seifer.
Dialogue: Haha! You can't win this one, Seifer.

Original: Auron:We'll heed Rosa's advice and take a break.
Dialogue: We'll heed Rosa's advice and take a break.
trans: 我们会听从罗莎的建议，休息一下。

Original: Lion:I'm surprised you can be so persistent, Rosa.
Dialogue: I'm surprised you can be so persistent, Rosa.
trans: 我很惊讶你能如此执着，罗莎。

Original: Rosa:I'm sorry, but...I couldn't just let him injure himself.
Dialogue: I'm sorry, but...I couldn't just let him injure himself.
trans: 对不起，但是……我不能让他伤害自己。

Original: Auron:You are in charge of looking after your comrades. It would be problematic if you weren't so persistent.
Dialogue: You are in charge of looking after your comrades. It would be problematic if you weren't so persistent.

Original: Rosa:Thank you, Auron. I think I got this stubbornness from my mother.
Dialogue: Thank you, Auron. I think I got this stubbornness from my mother.

Original: Lightning:Oh really? I've also got stubborn family.
Dialogue: Oh really? I've also got stubborn family.

Original: Lion:I'm going to let Serah know you called her stubborn.
Dialogue: I'm going to let Serah know you called her stubborn.
trans: 我要让塞拉知道你说她固执。

Original: Lightning:...I wish you wouldn't.
Dialogue: ...I wish you wouldn't.

Original: Lion:Haha. I'm kidding!
Dialogue: Haha. I'm kidding!

Original: Rosa:My mother became a white mage to protect my father. I chose the same path, so they worried and we fought a lot.
Dialogue: My mother became a white mage to protect my father. I chose the same path, so they worried and we fought a lot.
trans: 为了保护父亲，母亲变成了白魔法师。

Original: Lightning:You stuck to your goal...
Dialogue: You stuck to your goal...

Original: Rosa:If there's a chance you'll succeed, you don't want to give up, do you? I wanted to believe in myself and my mother. I wanted to be recognized someday.
Dialogue: If there's a chance you'll succeed, you don't want to give up, do you? I wanted to believe in myself and my mother. I wanted to be recognized someday.
trans: 如果你有机会成功，你不想放弃，是吗？

Original: Auron:...Indeed. Chance is an impartial arbiter for all.
Dialogue: ...Indeed. Chance is an impartial arbiter for all.

Original: Lightning:I didn't want to give up and kept fighting. I kept chasing that chance, however small, and will keep doing so.
Dialogue: I didn't want to give up and kept fighting. I kept chasing that chance, however small, and will keep doing so.

Original: Rosa:I don't want to give up halfway and regret it.
Dialogue: I don't want to give up halfway and regret it.

Original: Seifer:Yeah? Well me neither.
Dialogue: Yeah? Well me neither.

Original: Seifer:If we keep pressing forward, there's a chance we'll win. Or is that different?
Dialogue: If we keep pressing forward, there's a chance we'll win. Or is that different?
trans: 如果我们继续向前推进，我们就有机会获胜。

Original: Sabin:You're not wrong. No matter the case, there's always a chance. Even I like to battle with momentum.
Dialogue: You're not wrong. No matter the case, there's always a chance. Even I like to battle with momentum.

Original: Sabin:But you shouldn't neglect your own health. Next time, let us know when you're hurt.
Dialogue: But you shouldn't neglect your own health. Next time, let us know when you're hurt.
trans: 但是你不应该忽视你自己的健康。

Original: Seifer:...Tch. Haven't we rested enough? Any longer and I'll fall asleep.
Dialogue: ...Tch. Haven't we rested enough? Any longer and I'll fall asleep.

Original: Lion:What a brat... Can't you just say "thank you" like a normal person without being so embarrassed?
Dialogue: What a brat... Can't you just say "thank you" like a normal person without being so embarrassed?
trans: 真是个小鬼……你就不能像个正常人一样说声“谢谢”，不要那么尴尬吗？

Original: Seifer:Who's embarrassed!? Grr... I'm going on ahead!
Dialogue: Who's embarrassed!? Grr... I'm going on ahead!

Original: Seifer:...'Preciate it.'
Dialogue: ...'Preciate it.'

Original: Rosa:It makes me happy to hear that. Now we're all prepared!
Dialogue: It makes me happy to hear that. Now we're all prepared!

Original: Rosa:Let's go! The chances are better when we're together!
Dialogue: Let's go! The chances are better when we're together!

Original: Raijin:I don't get it. Golbez shoulda just come with us, ya know?
Dialogue: I don't get it. Golbez shoulda just come with us, ya know?

Original: Yuffie:Yeah! I thought he cared about Cecil...
Dialogue: Yeah! I thought he cared about Cecil...

Original: Jecht:Listen, you two...
Dialogue: Listen, you two...

Original: Jecht:Just 'cause you care about someone doesn't mean you always gotta be with 'em.
Dialogue: Just 'cause you care about someone doesn't mean you always gotta be with 'em.
trans: 仅仅因为你关心某人并不意味着你必须总是和他们在一起。

Original: Yuffie:I know... Well, at least it seems like his heart's in the right place.
Dialogue: I know... Well, at least it seems like his heart's in the right place.
trans: 我知道……好吧，至少看起来他的心是对的。

Original: Raijin:Yeah! Galuf sure talked some sense into him, ya know?
Dialogue: Yeah! Galuf sure talked some sense into him, ya know?

Original: Yuffie:Hmm... I guess there's not much else we can do, huh.
Dialogue: Hmm... I guess there's not much else we can do, huh.
trans: 嗯……我想我们也无能为力了，嗯。

Original: Raijin:Seems like it, ya know...
Dialogue: Seems like it, ya know...

Original: Galuf:What are your thoughts, Cecil?
Dialogue: What are your thoughts, Cecil?

Original: Galuf:Do you also wish to fight alongside your brother?
Dialogue: Do you also wish to fight alongside your brother?
trans: 你也想和你的兄弟并肩作战吗？

Original: Cecil:Not "fight," per se...
Dialogue: Not "fight," per se...

Original: Cecil:I didn't have much chance to speak with him properly in our world after he had come to his senses.
Dialogue: I didn't have much chance to speak with him properly in our world after he had come to his senses.
trans: 在他回过神来之后，我没有多少机会在我们的世界里和他好好说话。

Original: Cecil:If we were to journey together in this world, I would like to talk to him.
Dialogue: If we were to journey together in this world, I would like to talk to him.
trans: 如果我们在这个世界上一起旅行，我想和他谈谈。

Original: Jecht:Well, what're we doin' just standin' around here then?
Dialogue: Well, what're we doin' just standin' around here then?
trans: 那么，我们只是站在这里做什么呢？

Original: Jecht:...So, I got an idea.
Dialogue: ...So, I got an idea.

Original: Jecht:Why don't we let Cecil here take the helm for a bit?
Dialogue: Why don't we let Cecil here take the helm for a bit?
trans: 我们为什么不让塞西尔在这里掌舵呢？

Original: Cecil:You mean...pilot the airship?
Dialogue: You mean...pilot the airship?

Original: Jecht:You can do it, can't ya? We don't have a heading yet, so just take it wherever you want.
Dialogue: You can do it, can't ya? We don't have a heading yet, so just take it wherever you want.

Original: Cecil:...Understood. I'll give it a try.
Dialogue: ...Understood. I'll give it a try.

Original: Cait Sith:Well, well! Aren't you persuasive?
Dialogue: Well, well! Aren't you persuasive?

Original: Jecht:He needed to get his mind off his problems. I just gave him a suggestion.
Dialogue: He needed to get his mind off his problems. I just gave him a suggestion.
trans: 他需要把注意力从他的问题上移开。

Original: Jecht:Besides...I got a feelin' that something's about to change.
Dialogue: Besides...I got a feelin' that something's about to change.
trans: 此外……我有一种感觉，有些事情即将发生变化。

Original: Jecht:After all, some people are just drawn to each other by fate...
Dialogue: After all, some people are just drawn to each other by fate...
trans: 毕竟，有些人只是被命运所吸引……

Original: Galuf:A forest... Did you sense something here?
Dialogue: A forest... Did you sense something here?
trans: 一片森林……你有没有感觉到这里有什么？

Original: Cecil:Yes, something important... But what that is, I do not know.
Dialogue: Yes, something important... But what that is, I do not know.
trans: 是的，一些重要的东西……但那是什么，我不知道。

Original: Jecht:My kind of guy! Ain't nothin' wrong with followin' your gut. So let's get searchin' already
Dialogue: My kind of guy! Ain't nothin' wrong with followin' your gut. So let's get searchin' already—

Original: Cait Sith:A m-monster! And a right big one at that!
Dialogue: A m-monster! And a right big one at that!

Original: Cecil:Over there! Let's go!
Dialogue: Over there! Let's go!

Original: Jecht:Seriously!? Not this guy again!
Dialogue: Seriously!? Not this guy again!

Original: Cait Sith:So surprised to see him, are ya?
Dialogue: So surprised to see him, are ya?

Original: Cecil:I refuse! We will fight, too!
Dialogue: I refuse! We will fight, too!

Original: Galuf:And we do so not to help you, but of our own free will.
Dialogue: And we do so not to help you, but of our own free will.
trans: 我们这样做不是为了帮助您，而是出于我们自己的自由意志。

Original: Jecht:We'll be responsible for our own lives. I doubt you've got complaints with that.
Dialogue: We'll be responsible for our own lives. I doubt you've got complaints with that.
trans: 我们会对自己的生活负责。

Original: Golbez:...Do as you like.
Dialogue: ...Do as you like.

Original: Cecil:Wait! Brother!
Dialogue: Wait! Brother!

Original: Cecil:Why won't you talk to me? Please, tell me what you're thinking!
Dialogue: Why won't you talk to me? Please, tell me what you're thinking!

Original: Golbez:...Through my mistakes, I brought misfortune upon this world.
Dialogue: ...Through my mistakes, I brought misfortune upon this world.
trans: ……因为我的错误，给这个世界带来了不幸。

Original: Golbez:It is now my responsibility to fix it.
Dialogue: It is now my responsibility to fix it.

Original: Aerith:So you're trying to close the Torsions all on your own?
Dialogue: So you're trying to close the Torsions all on your own?
trans: 所以你想靠自己来关闭 Torsions？

Original: Galuf:Then our goals are one in the same. Isn't that right, Edge?
Dialogue: Then our goals are one in the same. Isn't that right, Edge?
trans: 那么我们的目标是一致的。

Original: Edge:No doubt about it.
Dialogue: No doubt about it.

Original: Edge:But I was prepared for this. Like I said before, that's life for you.
Dialogue: But I was prepared for this. Like I said before, that's life for you.

Original: Galuf:Indeed. If Cecil wishes for us to travel together, then so be it.
Dialogue: Indeed. If Cecil wishes for us to travel together, then so be it.

Original: Cecil:There's no need for us to fight anymore.
Dialogue: There's no need for us to fight anymore.
trans: 我们已经没有战斗的必要了。

Original: Cecil:Even with Spiritus's patronage, it's too dangerous for you to do this alone.
Dialogue: Even with Spiritus's patronage, it's too dangerous for you to do this alone.
trans: 即使有 Spiritus 的赞助，你一个人做这件事也太危险了。

Original: Cecil:So please, come with us
Dialogue: So please, come with us—

Original: Golbez:No. I must atone for this alone.
Dialogue: No. I must atone for this alone.
trans: 不，我必须单单为此赎罪。

Original: Cecil:But why?
Dialogue: But why?

Original: Golbez:There is a chance that the darkness that once possessed me can cross the Torsions to this world.
Dialogue: There is a chance that the darkness that once possessed me can cross the Torsions to this world.
trans: 曾经笼罩着我的黑暗有机会穿越扭曲来到这个世界。

Original: Golbez:I may yet again be manipulated by that evil and consumed with wicked thoughts...
Dialogue: I may yet again be manipulated by that evil and consumed with wicked thoughts...
trans: 我可能会再次被那个邪恶所操纵，被邪恶的思想所吞噬……

Original: Golbez:So I must do this alone, lest I betray you all.
Dialogue: So I must do this alone, lest I betray you all.
trans: 所以我必须一个人做这件事，以免背叛你们所有人。

Original: Cecil:No. If that happens...
Dialogue: No. If that happens...

Original: Cecil:If that happens, then I'll help you regain your memories. Just like you did for me.
Dialogue: If that happens, then I'll help you regain your memories. Just like you did for me.
trans: 那样的话，我就帮你找回记忆。

Original: Aerith:Yes! And we'll be there to help!
Dialogue: Yes! And we'll be there to help!

Original: Edge:I'll knock you back to your senses!
Dialogue: I'll knock you back to your senses!

Original: Galuf:You can rely on us. And your brother.
Dialogue: You can rely on us. And your brother.

Original: Golbez:For you, spirit moogle.
Dialogue: For you, spirit moogle.

Original: Mog:Kupo!? Th-these are dimensional coordinates!
Dialogue: Kupo!? Th-these are dimensional coordinates!

Original: Cecil:That means...!
Dialogue: That means...!

Original: Golbez:Summon me if you must. I will aid you as long as I am still myself.
Dialogue: Summon me if you must. I will aid you as long as I am still myself.

Original: Cecil:...Thank you, Brother.
Dialogue: ...Thank you, Brother.

Original: Aerith:Is this really okay with you, Cecil? Wasn't there more you wanted to talk about?
Dialogue: Is this really okay with you, Cecil? Wasn't there more you wanted to talk about?
trans: 你真的没问题吗，塞西尔？

Original: Cecil:...Yes, but there's still time for us to talk. Perhaps not now, but...
Dialogue: ...Yes, but there's still time for us to talk. Perhaps not now, but...

Original: Cecil:For now, this is enough.
Dialogue: For now, this is enough.

Original: Cecil:Thank you, Brother.
Dialogue: Thank you, Brother.

Original: Golbez:I do not need thanks... Farewell.
Dialogue: I do not need thanks... Farewell.

Original: Zidane:Seems like he hasn't warmed up to us one bit.
Dialogue: Seems like he hasn't warmed up to us one bit.
trans: 好像他对我们一点也不热心。

Original: Firion:For siblings, you two are nothing alike...
Dialogue: For siblings, you two are nothing alike...
trans: 对于兄弟姐妹，你们两个一点都不像……

Original: Sabin:I guess it's because they walked different paths in life.
Dialogue: I guess it's because they walked different paths in life.
trans: 我想这是因为他们走的是不同的人生道路。

Original: Firion:Were you two more alike as kids?
Dialogue: Were you two more alike as kids?
trans: 你们两个小时候更像吗？

Original: Cecil:I don't recall. I grew up thinking I didn't have any blood relatives.
Dialogue: I don't recall. I grew up thinking I didn't have any blood relatives.

Original: Sabin:Oh yeah, you mentioned that.
Dialogue: Oh yeah, you mentioned that.
trans: 哦，是的，你提到了这一点。

Original: Kain:As a child, he knew few others besides the king and myself.
Dialogue: As a child, he knew few others besides the king and myself.
trans: 小时候，除了国王和我，他几乎不认识其他人。

Original: Cecil:It seems like all siblings and childhood friends here have such great bonds.
Dialogue: It seems like all siblings and childhood friends here have such great bonds.
trans: 看来这里的兄弟姐妹和青梅竹马的情谊都这么深啊。

Original: Cecil:Perhaps it's not possible to form such a connection with someone you haven't grown up with...
Dialogue: Perhaps it's not possible to form such a connection with someone you haven't grown up with...
trans: 也许无法与您没有长大的人建立这样的联系......

Original: Zidane:That's not true! Upbringing's got nothing to do with it.
Dialogue: That's not true! Upbringing's got nothing to do with it.

Original: Zidane:I don't know anything about where I'm from. I didn't even know I had siblings...
Dialogue: I don't know anything about where I'm from. I didn't even know I had siblings...
trans: 我对自己来自哪里一无所知。

Original: Firion:And sometimes you'll fight even with those you grew up with.
Dialogue: And sometimes you'll fight even with those you grew up with.
trans: 有时你甚至会和那些和你一起长大的人打架。

Original: Sabin:But a connection can still be strong, even if you aren't together. Like me and my brother!
Dialogue: But a connection can still be strong, even if you aren't together. Like me and my brother!
trans: 但是即使你们不在一起，联系仍然很牢固。

Original: Cecil:Thank you. Your words give me strength.
Dialogue: Thank you. Your words give me strength.

Original: Cecil:There may yet come a day where he and I work together.
Dialogue: There may yet come a day where he and I work together.
trans: 也许有一天他和我一起工作。

Original: Zidane:I have no doubt about it.
Dialogue: I have no doubt about it.

Original: Firion:Agreed. We all believe so.
Dialogue: Agreed. We all believe so.

Original: Kuja:Getting sentimental, are we?
Dialogue: Getting sentimental, are we?

Original: Kuja:If you like him so much, you should just join him.
Dialogue: If you like him so much, you should just join him.
trans: 如果你那么喜欢他，你就应该加入他。

Original: Kuja:What's holding you back?
Dialogue: What's holding you back?

Original: Golbez:...A fine question coming from someone also assisting them.
Dialogue: ...A fine question coming from someone also assisting them.
trans: ......来自帮助他们的人的一个很好的问题。

Original: Golbez:Does that kindness not stem from a connection to one of them?
Dialogue: Does that kindness not stem from a connection to one of them?
trans: 那种善意难道不是源于与其中之一的联系吗？

Original: Kuja:...Just a whim. Please don't confuse my motives with your own.
Dialogue: ...Just a whim. Please don't confuse my motives with your own.

Original: Golbez:Hmph... Very well then.
Dialogue: Hmph... Very well then.

Original: Sazh:Hey, Golbez!
Dialogue: Hey, Golbez!

Original: Sazh:Thanks for the new airship. It's been a big help.
Dialogue: Thanks for the new airship. It's been a big help.

Original: Setzer:Yes. It's got a great engine and is far faster and more comfortable than the last.
Dialogue: Yes. It's got a great engine and is far faster and more comfortable than the last.

Original: Golbez:You need not thank me. It was a hasty construction made with the power of my will.
Dialogue: You need not thank me. It was a hasty construction made with the power of my will.

Original: Noct:Can you really do something like that?
Dialogue: Can you really do something like that?
trans: 你真的可以做那样的事吗？

Original: Golbez:There are several among Spiritus's chosen warriors who have superior strength of will and the ability to manipulate Torsions.
Dialogue: There are several among Spiritus's chosen warriors who have superior strength of will and the ability to manipulate Torsions.
trans: Spiritus 选中的战士中有几位拥有超强的意志力和操纵扭力的能力。

Original: Bartz:Now that you mention it...
Dialogue: Now that you mention it...

Original: Squall:(So was the flower field Seifer was in Ultimecia's doing?)
Dialogue: (So was the flower field Seifer was in Ultimecia's doing?)
trans: （Seifer 的花田是 Ultimecia 做的吗？）

Original: Golbez:Spiritus doesn't ask his warriors to work together, so I cannot say what the others have done.
Dialogue: Spiritus doesn't ask his warriors to work together, so I cannot say what the others have done.
trans: Spiritus 不要求他的战士一起工作，所以我不能说其他人做了什么。

Original: Setzer:So it's no more than speculation at this point.
Dialogue: So it's no more than speculation at this point.
trans: 所以在这一点上，这只不过是猜测。

Original: Bartz:The Regalia?
Dialogue: The Regalia?

Original: Noct:My car back home.
Dialogue: My car back home.

Original: Sazh:Same here! I'd love to give everyone a ride in the latest airship.
Dialogue: Same here! I'd love to give everyone a ride in the latest airship.

Original: Golbez:Your strength of will is by no means inferior to those of Spiritus's warriors.
Dialogue: Your strength of will is by no means inferior to those of Spiritus's warriors.
trans: 你的意志力丝毫不逊色于斯皮里图斯的战士们。

Original: Golbez:Spiritus, who uses any means necessary, and Materia, who desires resolution without destruction...
Dialogue: Spiritus, who uses any means necessary, and Materia, who desires resolution without destruction...
trans: 不择手段的Spiritus，和希望不被破坏的解决方案的Materia……

Original: Golbez:The only difference between us may be that way of thinking.
Dialogue: The only difference between us may be that way of thinking.
trans: 我们之间唯一的区别可能就是思维方式。

Original: Bartz:For someone who hasn't summoned anyone dangerous, Materia sure is a worrywart...
Dialogue: For someone who hasn't summoned anyone dangerous, Materia sure is a worrywart...
trans: 对于没有召唤过任何危险人物的人来说，Materia 肯定是一个令人担忧的东西......

Original: Golbez:What is good and bad depends on the circumstances.
Dialogue: What is good and bad depends on the circumstances.
trans: 什么是好是坏要看情况。

Original: Golbez:I have not used my power for anything after that airship, and have no intention of doing so in the future.
Dialogue: I have not used my power for anything after that airship, and have no intention of doing so in the future.
trans: 在那艘飞艇之后，我没有用过我的力量，以后也没有任何打算。

Original: Sazh:Good and bad depends on the circumstances, huh... I guess it's natural to err on the side of caution.
Dialogue: Good and bad depends on the circumstances, huh... I guess it's natural to err on the side of caution.
trans: 好坏要视情况而定，嗯……我想谨慎行事是很自然的。

Original: Setzer:He may be our ally now, but those Red Wings certainly made for a tough battle before.
Dialogue: He may be our ally now, but those Red Wings certainly made for a tough battle before.
trans: 他现在可能是我们的盟友，但那些 Red Wings 以前肯定是为了一场艰苦的战斗。

Original: Squall:So things from other worlds mixing together is a danger in itself...
Dialogue: So things from other worlds mixing together is a danger in itself...
trans: 所以来自其他世界的东西混在一起本身就是一种危险......

Original: Bartz:I guess it's best if we try not to do it as much as possible.
Dialogue: I guess it's best if we try not to do it as much as possible.
trans: 我想我们最好尽量不这样做。

Original: Setzer:I suppose I'll have to put the Blackjack on hold then.
Dialogue: I suppose I'll have to put the Blackjack on hold then.
trans: 我想我得暂停 Blackjack 了。

Original: Golbez:It looks like the monsters are gone for now.
Dialogue: It looks like the monsters are gone for now.

Original: Chelinka:Thank you, Mr. Golbez!
Dialogue: Thank you, Mr. Golbez!

Original: Selphie:We'll give you a holler if we're ever in a pinch!
Dialogue: We'll give you a holler if we're ever in a pinch!
trans: 如果我们紧要关头，我们会给你打电话！

Original: Cid:Hey, Golbez! Wait up!
Dialogue: Hey, Golbez! Wait up!

Original: Golbez:...Did you need something?
Dialogue: ...Did you need something?

Original: Cid:What was it like? Tell me all about it!
Dialogue: What was it like? Tell me all about it!

Original: Selphie:You're bursting with enthusiasm as usual.
Dialogue: You're bursting with enthusiasm as usual.
trans: 你像往常一样充满热情。

Original: Irvine:At this rate, I doubt he'll let you leave until you give him an answer.
Dialogue: At this rate, I doubt he'll let you leave until you give him an answer.
trans: 按照这个速度，我怀疑在你给他答复之前他不会让你离开。

Original: Golbez:And a race known as theLunariansresides on theother.
Dialogue: And a race known as the Lunarians resides on the other.
trans: 另一边居住着一个名为 Lunarians 的种族。

Original: Chelinka:Other worlds also have people connected to the moon...
Dialogue: Other worlds also have people connected to the moon...
trans: 其他世界也有人与月球有关……

Original: Cid:People live on the moon!? I wish I could get close enough to meet 'em!
Dialogue: People live on the moon!? I wish I could get close enough to meet 'em!

Original: Golbez:Most Lunarians hope for friendship with those on Earth, but there are those who planned to invade it.
Dialogue: Most Lunarians hope for friendship with those on Earth, but there are those who planned to invade it.
trans: 大多数月球人希望与地球上的人建立友谊，但也有一些人计划入侵地球。

Original: Golbez:Theonewho oncecontrolled mewas also a wicked Lunarian.
Dialogue: The one who once controlled me was also a wicked Lunarian.
trans: 曾经控制我的那个人也是一个邪恶的月球人。

Original: Cid:What!? That's terrible!
Dialogue: What!? That's terrible!

Original: Yuri:In our world, the moon is a symbol of evil.
Dialogue: In our world, the moon is a symbol of evil.
trans: 在我们的世界里，月亮是邪恶的象征。

Original: Chelinka:The people who are corrupted by its power are called Lunites.
Dialogue: The people who are corrupted by its power are called Lunites.
trans: 被它的力量腐蚀的人被称为 Lunites。

Original: Cid:You're all makin' the moon seem like a miserable place...
Dialogue: You're all makin' the moon seem like a miserable place...
trans: 你们都让月亮看起来像一个悲惨的地方......

Original: Cid:Damn... There go my dreams...
Dialogue: Damn... There go my dreams...
trans: 该死的……我的梦想破灭了……

Original: Irvine:There's no need to get so down about it. These are stories of our own worlds.
Dialogue: There's no need to get so down about it. These are stories of our own worlds.
trans: 没有必要为此如此沮丧。

Original: Yuri:He's right. The moon in your world might be totally different.
Dialogue: He's right. The moon in your world might be totally different.

Original: Selphie:It might be a land of flowers and fluffy animals!
Dialogue: It might be a land of flowers and fluffy animals!
trans: 这可能是一片鲜花和毛茸茸的动物之地！

Original: Chelinka:Yeah! Maybe it's a super fun place!
Dialogue: Yeah! Maybe it's a super fun place!

Original: Cid:...I guess you're right. I won't know for sure until I see it with my own eyes, though.
Dialogue: ...I guess you're right. I won't know for sure until I see it with my own eyes, though.

Original: Cid:Alright! I'm definitely going to the moon someday, you'll see!
Dialogue: Alright! I'm definitely going to the moon someday, you'll see!

Original: Yuri:I think it's a lot more fun that way. It'll definitely be different from our moons.
Dialogue: I think it's a lot more fun that way. It'll definitely be different from our moons.

Original: Golbez:I pray your journey is a safe one.
Dialogue: I pray your journey is a safe one.
trans: 我祈祷你的旅程是安全的。

Original: Cid:Thanks, Golbez!
Dialogue: Thanks, Golbez!

Original: Vivi:I wonder where Mr. Laguna went... I thought we told him not to wander off.
Dialogue: I wonder where Mr. Laguna went... I thought we told him not to wander off.
trans: 我想知道拉古纳先生去哪儿了……我想我们告诉过他不要乱跑。

Original: Rinoa:Hey there! Looking for someone?
Dialogue: Hey there! Looking for someone?

Original: Onion Knight:...Yeah. We got separated from one of our friends. He's got a lousy sense of direction, so we gotta keep an eye on him...
Dialogue: ...Yeah. We got separated from one of our friends. He's got a lousy sense of direction, so we gotta keep an eye on him...

Original: Rinoa:Hmm... It sounds like he might be lost... Alright then. I'll help you look for him!
Dialogue: Hmm... It sounds like he might be lost... Alright then. I'll help you look for him!
trans: 嗯……听起来他可能迷路了……那好吧。

Original: Ace:Don't worry about it. This is our problem.
Dialogue: Don't worry about it. This is our problem.

Original: Rinoa:I knew it! You're no ordinary student!
Dialogue: I knew it! You're no ordinary student!

Original: Rinoa:Some of my friends are students, too, so I'd feel terrible if I didn't help you out.
Dialogue: Some of my friends are students, too, so I'd feel terrible if I didn't help you out.
trans: 我的一些朋友也是学生，所以如果我不帮助你，我会感觉很糟糕。

Original: Onion Knight:But there are a lot of monsters in this area...
Dialogue: But there are a lot of monsters in this area...
trans: 但是这片区域有很多怪物……

Original: Vivi:Oh no! There they are! Get behind us, miss!
Dialogue: Oh no! There they are! Get behind us, miss!

Original: Rinoa:Don't worry about me. I'll protect you!
Dialogue: Don't worry about me. I'll protect you!

Original: Vivi:M-miss!? Don't just run off like that! It's dangerous!
Dialogue: M-miss!? Don't just run off like that! It's dangerous!

Original: Ace:Come on. Let's go!
Dialogue: Come on. Let's go!

Original: Rinoa:Yay! We did it!
Dialogue: Yay! We did it!

Original: Onion Knight:What were you thinking, running off like that!? Be more careful!
Dialogue: What were you thinking, running off like that!? Be more careful!

Original: Rinoa:But we won, didn't we?
Dialogue: But we won, didn't we?

Original: Rinoa:You're all so strong, there was nothing to worry about. Thanks for having my back!
Dialogue: You're all so strong, there was nothing to worry about. Thanks for having my back!
trans: 你们都很坚强，没有什么好担心的。

Original: Onion Knight:I-I guess... Well, I'm glad nothing happened. But next time, be more careful...
Dialogue: I-I guess... Well, I'm glad nothing happened. But next time, be more careful...
trans: 我-我想...好吧，我很高兴什么都没发生。

Original: Ace:It's rare to see you being so agreeable.
Dialogue: It's rare to see you being so agreeable.

Original: Onion Knight:There's not much I can do about it, not with her looking so darn happy...
Dialogue: There's not much I can do about it, not with her looking so darn happy...
trans: 我对此无能为力，尤其是她看起来那么开心……

Original: Vivi:You worried about our safety and fought those monsters, even though we just met...
Dialogue: You worried about our safety and fought those monsters, even though we just met...
trans: 你担心我们的安危，和那些怪物战斗，虽然我们才刚刚认识……

Original: Vivi:You're so kind.
Dialogue: You're so kind.

Original: Rinoa:Not at all. I was just keeping a promise. I said I would help, and I'm no quitter!
Dialogue: Not at all. I was just keeping a promise. I said I would help, and I'm no quitter!

Original: Vivi:Even so, I really appreciate the help.
Dialogue: Even so, I really appreciate the help.
trans: 尽管如此，我还是非常感谢您的帮助。

Original: Vivi:I'm glad to have you with us.
Dialogue: I'm glad to have you with us.
trans: 我很高兴有你和我们在一起。

Original: Rinoa:I know it's hard to help everyone in the world, but I still want to do as much as I can for the people I meet.
Dialogue: I know it's hard to help everyone in the world, but I still want to do as much as I can for the people I meet.
trans: 我知道很难帮助世界上的每一个人，但我仍然想为我遇到的人尽我所能。

Original: ???:I thought I heard noises coming from this way... Hmm...
Dialogue: I thought I heard noises coming from this way... Hmm...
trans: 我以为我听到从这边传来的声音……嗯……

Original: Quistis:I'm sorry, but if you don't know where we're going, just say so...
Dialogue: I'm sorry, but if you don't know where we're going, just say so...
trans: 对不起，如果你不知道我们要去哪里，就直说...

Original: Onion Knight:Laguna! Where were you!?
Dialogue: Laguna! Where were you!?

Original: Rinoa:Quistis! What're you doing here!?
Dialogue: Quistis! What're you doing here!?

Original: Quistis:Rinoa! You're here, too?
Dialogue: Rinoa! You're here, too?

Original: Rinoa:What do you mean? Should I not be here?
Dialogue: What do you mean? Should I not be here?

Original: Laguna:A friend of yours, Quistis?
Dialogue: A friend of yours, Quistis?

Original: Rinoa:Huh? You're so...young...
Dialogue: Huh? You're so...young...

Original: Laguna:Another strange response... Have we met before?
Dialogue: Another strange response... Have we met before?
trans: 另一个奇怪的反应......我们以前见过吗？

Original: Ace:She helped us fight some monsters earlier. Looks like she's one of Quistis's friends, though.
Dialogue: She helped us fight some monsters earlier. Looks like she's one of Quistis's friends, though.
trans: 她早些时候帮助我们打了一些怪物。

Original: Quistis:That's correct. Rinoa is from our world. I can't say I'm surprised she was called here, though.
Dialogue: That's correct. Rinoa is from our world. I can't say I'm surprised she was called here, though.

Original: Rinoa:Called? By who? ...What are you guys talking about?
Dialogue: Called? By who? ...What are you guys talking about?

Original: Irvine:Hey, Rinoa! We've been waiting for you!
Dialogue: Hey, Rinoa! We've been waiting for you!

Original: Rinoa:Even Irvine is here! I almost can't believe this is a different world...
Dialogue: Even Irvine is here! I almost can't believe this is a different world...

Original: Cater:Hm? Could it be the realization hasn't hit yet? Or have you already calmed down?
Dialogue: Hm? Could it be the realization hasn't hit yet? Or have you already calmed down?

Original: Rinoa:Yeah. But it was scary at first, hearing I was in a different world... Is everyone okay?
Dialogue: Yeah. But it was scary at first, hearing I was in a different world... Is everyone okay?

Original: Irvine:Don't worry about us. We're already used to it here.
Dialogue: Don't worry about us. We're already used to it here.

Original: Rinoa:I see. So everyone's already helping out the goddess?
Dialogue: I see. So everyone's already helping out the goddess?

Original: Rinoa:Is there something I can do? I want to help, too!
Dialogue: Is there something I can do? I want to help, too!

Original: Balthier:Plucky lass, here. So trusting and unafraid...
Dialogue: Plucky lass, here. So trusting and unafraid...

Original: Irvine:No. But she fought alongside us regardless.
Dialogue: No. But she fought alongside us regardless.
trans: 不，但她无论如何都与我们并肩作战。

Original: Rinoa:When I heard what was going on here, I was so surprised.
Dialogue: When I heard what was going on here, I was so surprised.
trans: 当我听到这里发生的事情时，我非常惊讶。

Original: Rinoa:Being in a different world, summoned by a goddess...
Dialogue: Being in a different world, summoned by a goddess...

Original: Rinoa:I wasn't sure if I could do it, to be honest. But I knew that if everyone here was doing their best, so would I.
Dialogue: I wasn't sure if I could do it, to be honest. But I knew that if everyone here was doing their best, so would I.
trans: 老实说，我不确定我是否能做到。

Original: Rinoa:I'm going to fight, too.
Dialogue: I'm going to fight, too.

Original: Serah:I'm happy to hear it! So if you're friends with Irvine, that means...
Dialogue: I'm happy to hear it! So if you're friends with Irvine, that means...

Original: Rinoa:Squall! You're here, too! I'm so happy to see you!
Dialogue: Squall! You're here, too! I'm so happy to see you!

Original: Squall:Are you okay? You're not hurt or...
Dialogue: Are you okay? You're not hurt or...

Original: Rinoa:Haha! Are you worried about me, Squall?
Dialogue: Haha! Are you worried about me, Squall?

Original: Squall:...What's so funny about it?
Dialogue: ...What's so funny about it?

Original: Serah:I wouldn't have guessed they'd be such good friends!
Dialogue: I wouldn't have guessed they'd be such good friends!
trans: 没想到他们竟然是这么要好的朋友！

Original: Rinoa:It's nothing! I'm fine. The others helped me out. And Quistis told me all about this place.
Dialogue: It's nothing! I'm fine. The others helped me out. And Quistis told me all about this place.

Original: Rinoa:Thanks for worrying about me. I'm glad I'm here.
Dialogue: Thanks for worrying about me. I'm glad I'm here.

Original: Squall:...It would've been better if you hadn't come.
Dialogue: ...It would've been better if you hadn't come.

Original: Rinoa:What!? Why!?
Dialogue: What!? Why!?

Original: Squall:I'm relieved to see you, but I didn't want you to get involved in this...
Dialogue: I'm relieved to see you, but I didn't want you to get involved in this...
trans: 见到你我就放心了，但我不想让你卷入这件事……

Original: Rinoa:Hehe. You're such a worrywart, Squall! No matter where I go, I'll be fine as long as you're there.
Dialogue: Hehe. You're such a worrywart, Squall! No matter where I go, I'll be fine as long as you're there.

Original: Rinoa:Even in a different world, I can be of some help, can't I?
Dialogue: Even in a different world, I can be of some help, can't I?
trans: 就算在异世界，我也能帮上忙不是吗？

Original: Squall:...You're right.
Dialogue: ...You're right.

Original: Balthier:So the silent-type can't stop talking in front of someone close to his heart. How droll.
Dialogue: So the silent-type can't stop talking in front of someone close to his heart. How droll.
trans: 所以沉默型的人在他心爱的人面前不停地说话。

Original: Serah:I don't mind at all. In fact, I think it's wonderful!
Dialogue: I don't mind at all. In fact, I think it's wonderful!

Original: Vaan:Aww, it's stuck!
Dialogue: Aww, it's stuck!

Original: Rinoa:Hmm? What's stuck?
Dialogue: Hmm? What's stuck?

Original: Prishe:Hehe, sorry! Guess I got carried away!
Dialogue: Hehe, sorry! Guess I got carried away!

Original: Terra:Our ball got stuck in that tree. I'll go and grab it.
Dialogue: Our ball got stuck in that tree. I'll go and grab it.
trans: 我们的球卡在那棵树上了。

Original: Layle:Don't worry, I'll get it.
Dialogue: Don't worry, I'll get it.

Original: Vaan:Thanks, Layle!
Dialogue: Thanks, Layle!

Original: Rinoa:Whoa! That's handy!
Dialogue: Whoa! That's handy!

Original: Layle:Handy? You know it's not normal for people to do that, right?
Dialogue: Handy? You know it's not normal for people to do that, right?

Original: Layle:Back in my world, people would be running away in fear.
Dialogue: Back in my world, people would be running away in fear.
trans: 回到我的世界，人们会害怕地逃跑。

Original: Rinoa:Fear? You mean they're scared of you? ...But why?
Dialogue: Fear? You mean they're scared of you? ...But why?

Original: Layle:Because ordinary people don't have special powers like this.
Dialogue: Because ordinary people don't have special powers like this.
trans: 因为普通人没有这样的特殊能力。

Original: Prishe:Most people are afraid of things they don't understand. There's not much you can do about it.
Dialogue: Most people are afraid of things they don't understand. There's not much you can do about it.
trans: 大多数人都害怕他们不理解的事情。

Original: Vaan:But why? Everyone's different, aren't they?
Dialogue: But why? Everyone's different, aren't they?

Original: Terra:People crave the powers they don't have, but when it's too strong, they get scared.
Dialogue: People crave the powers they don't have, but when it's too strong, they get scared.
trans: 人们渴望他们没有的力量，但当它太强大时，他们就会害怕。

Original: Vaan:...I see. They think it's dangerous.
Dialogue: ...I see. They think it's dangerous.

Original: Vanille:Even if you don't mean to use that power for evil, they're still scared...
Dialogue: Even if you don't mean to use that power for evil, they're still scared...
trans: 即使你不想用那种力量作恶，他们仍然害怕......

Original: Rinoa:I guess it's the same everywhere. I don't think there's any reason to be afraid of you, Layle. You're a good person.
Dialogue: I guess it's the same everywhere. I don't think there's any reason to be afraid of you, Layle. You're a good person.

Original: Rinoa:I know people who will care about you, even with those powers.
Dialogue: I know people who will care about you, even with those powers.
trans: 我知道有人会关心你，即使有这些权力。

Original: Prishe:I'm happy to hear that.
Dialogue: I'm happy to hear that.
trans: 我很高兴听到这个消息。

Original: Prishe:People hated me because of my powers...
Dialogue: People hated me because of my powers...
trans: 人们因为我的力量而憎恨我...

Original: Prishe:But I think even having just one person who believes in you is enough.
Dialogue: But I think even having just one person who believes in you is enough.
trans: 但我认为即使只有一个相信你的人就足够了。

Original: Terra:That's right. There was a time where I lost control of my powers and got separated from my friends.
Dialogue: That's right. There was a time where I lost control of my powers and got separated from my friends.

Original: Terra:But they found me.
Dialogue: But they found me.

Original: Terra:At that time, I was afraid of myself...
Dialogue: At that time, I was afraid of myself...

Original: Terra:But my friends didn't fear me. Because of them, I was able to face myself.
Dialogue: But my friends didn't fear me. Because of them, I was able to face myself.
trans: 但是我的朋友们并不害怕我。

Original: Vanille:...That power isn't something you can just throw away. You have to learn to accept it.
Dialogue: ...That power isn't something you can just throw away. You have to learn to accept it.
trans: ……那种力量不是随便就能扔掉的。

Original: Layle:That's right. It's a part of you.
Dialogue: That's right. It's a part of you.

Original: Layle:So it's best to use it the way you wantwithout fear or hesitation.
Dialogue: So it's best to use it the way you want—without fear or hesitation.
trans: 所以最好按照您想要的方式使用它——不要害怕或犹豫。

Original: Rinoa:A part of me... Hehe. I'll take your advice to heart!
Dialogue: A part of me... Hehe. I'll take your advice to heart!

Original: Rinoa:So even though you all knew you were summoned by the gods, it didn't worry you at all?
Dialogue: So even though you all knew you were summoned by the gods, it didn't worry you at all?
trans: 所以明明知道自己是被神灵召唤的，却一点都不担心？

Original: Tidus:It sounds like you were worried, Rinoa.
Dialogue: It sounds like you were worried, Rinoa.

Original: Rinoa:The Returners? Is that some kind of secret organization?
Dialogue: The Returners? Is that some kind of secret organization?

Original: Tifa:You were a part of the Returners here, right, Firion?
Dialogue: You were a part of the Returners here, right, Firion?
trans: 你是 Returner 的一员，对吧，Firion？

Original: Ashe:Joining a similar organization in a different world must be such an odd feeling...
Dialogue: Joining a similar organization in a different world must be such an odd feeling...
trans: 在不同的世界加入一个类似的组织一定是一种奇怪的感觉......

Original: Firion:But the Emperor is in this world, too. And I wouldn't mind settling the score here.
Dialogue: But the Emperor is in this world, too. And I wouldn't mind settling the score here.
trans: 但皇帝也在这个世界上。

Original: Firion:I don't know what will happen if he returns to my world. Stopping him here could prevent more harm from befalling my home.
Dialogue: I don't know what will happen if he returns to my world. Stopping him here could prevent more harm from befalling my home.
trans: 如果他回到我的世界，我不知道会发生什么。

Original: Rinoa:You look so young, but you're really giving it your all.
Dialogue: You look so young, but you're really giving it your all.
trans: 你看起来很年轻，但你真的全力以赴。

Original: Firion:My all...? Well, I just didn't have any other choices.
Dialogue: My all...? Well, I just didn't have any other choices.

Original: Tidus:That's impressive. You both fought for the sake of other people.
Dialogue: That's impressive. You both fought for the sake of other people.

Original: Rinoa:No, not really. I just felt like taking action. But after meeting Squall and the others, I realized how naive I was...
Dialogue: No, not really. I just felt like taking action. But after meeting Squall and the others, I realized how naive I was...

Original: Ashe:I'm fighting to take back things that were stolen.
Dialogue: I'm fighting to take back things that were stolen.
trans: 我正在努力夺回被盗的东西。

Original: Ashe:No. It's because of pride that I can continue fighting without yielding. What are you fighting for, Rinoa?
Dialogue: No. It's because of pride that I can continue fighting without yielding. What are you fighting for, Rinoa?
trans: 不，是因为骄傲，我才能不屈服地继续战斗。

Original: Rinoa:I... I'm fighting so I can be with everyone.
Dialogue: I... I'm fighting so I can be with everyone.
trans: 我……我在战斗，所以我可以和大家在一起。

Original: Rinoa:Squall and the others chose to fight, so I had to take up arms if I wanted to be beside them...
Dialogue: Squall and the others chose to fight, so I had to take up arms if I wanted to be beside them...
trans: Squall他们选择了战斗，所以我想要在他们身边就必须拿起武器……

Original: Rinoa:Fighting wasn't a means, but an end.
Dialogue: Fighting wasn't a means, but an end.
trans: 战斗不是手段，而是目的。

Original: Rinoa:But I learned that I had to fight to keep the future from disappearing. So I decided to do just that.
Dialogue: But I learned that I had to fight to keep the future from disappearing. So I decided to do just that.
trans: 但我了解到，我必须为防止未来消失而奋斗。

Original: Tifa:I know how you feel, and I'm sure the others do, too.
Dialogue: I know how you feel, and I'm sure the others do, too.
trans: 我知道你的感受，我相信其他人也一样。

Original: Tifa:We want to be with those important to us and protect those close to our hearts. Those feelings allow us to be strong and fight.
Dialogue: We want to be with those important to us and protect those close to our hearts. Those feelings allow us to be strong and fight.
trans: 我们想和对我们重要的人在一起，保护我们心中的人。

Original: Tidus:I know that looking at ourselves in the past can be...embarrassing.
Dialogue: I know that looking at ourselves in the past can be...embarrassing.
trans: 我知道回顾过去的自己可能会……令人尴尬。

Original: Tidus:But if I'm trying hard, I want someone to acknowledge it.
Dialogue: But if I'm trying hard, I want someone to acknowledge it.
trans: 但如果我很努力，我希望有人承认这一点。

Original: Tidus:I realized that I was naive, too. I regretted a lot of things.
Dialogue: I realized that I was naive, too. I regretted a lot of things.

Original: Edgar:Those who can accept their past failures can grow. I believe both of you will.
Dialogue: Those who can accept their past failures can grow. I believe both of you will.
trans: 那些能够接受过去失败的人才能成长。

Original: Ashe:Yes. You are serious about it now, right?
Dialogue: Yes. You are serious about it now, right?

Original: Rinoa:Of course. I won't let anyone take away our future. I'll protect it with my own two hands!
Dialogue: Of course. I won't let anyone take away our future. I'll protect it with my own two hands!

Original: Rinoa:Or am I still being too naive...?
Dialogue: Or am I still being too naive...?

Original: Ashe:No. Nobody could call you "naive" after hearing you say that.
Dialogue: No. Nobody could call you "naive" after hearing you say that.
trans: 不，没有人会在听到你这样说后说你“天真”。

Original: Rinoa:Welcome back! How was the patrol?
Dialogue: Welcome back! How was the patrol?

Original: Cecil:Nothing to report. But it looks like we may be in for some bad weather soon.
Dialogue: Nothing to report. But it looks like we may be in for some bad weather soon.

Original: Maria:Oh really? It looks fine to me...
Dialogue: Oh really? It looks fine to me...

Original: Krile:The animals said so, so we should get ready.
Dialogue: The animals said so, so we should get ready.
trans: 动物们这么说，所以我们应该做好准备。

Original: Rinoa:You can talk to animals, Krile!? That's amazing!
Dialogue: You can talk to animals, Krile!? That's amazing!

Original: Maria:Were you raised with animals?
Dialogue: Were you raised with animals?
trans: 你是和动物一起长大的吗？

Original: Krile:No, but I can understand what they say.
Dialogue: No, but I can understand what they say.
trans: 不，但我能理解他们说的话。

Original: Rinoa:I can tell when animals are happy or sad, but nothing more than that.
Dialogue: I can tell when animals are happy or sad, but nothing more than that.
trans: 我能分辨出动物什么时候快乐或悲伤，但仅此而已。

Original: Shadow:Though I get the feeling they can read our emotions pretty well.
Dialogue: Though I get the feeling they can read our emotions pretty well.
trans: 虽然我觉得他们可以很好地读懂我们的情绪。

Original: Rinoa:I know! I guess it only goes one way, though...
Dialogue: I know! I guess it only goes one way, though...

Original: Eiko:Is there an animal you want to talk to, Rinoa?
Dialogue: Is there an animal you want to talk to, Rinoa?
trans: 有没有你想和动物交谈的动物，Rinoa？

Original: Rinoa:She's super clever and cuddly, too! I feel like we could be even better friends if I could talk to her.
Dialogue: She's super clever and cuddly, too! I feel like we could be even better friends if I could talk to her.

Original: Krile:Just because you can talk doesn't mean you'll be better friends. There are more important things than words.
Dialogue: Just because you can talk doesn't mean you'll be better friends. There are more important things than words.
trans: 仅仅因为你们会说话并不意味着你们会成为更好的朋友。

Original: Rinoa:Oh really?
Dialogue: Oh really?

Original: Krile:Isn't talking what causes a lot of fights?
Dialogue: Isn't talking what causes a lot of fights?
trans: 说话不是会引起很多争吵吗？

Original: Rinoa:Won't being together every day help?
Dialogue: Won't being together every day help?

Original: Eiko:I don't think so...
Dialogue: I don't think so...

Original: Eiko:Even though I spent every day with the moogles, we still fought all the time.
Dialogue: Even though I spent every day with the moogles, we still fought all the time.
trans: 虽然我每天都和莫古力们在一起，但我们还是一直在战斗。

Original: Cecil:Then I guess it's not much different from talking with humans.
Dialogue: Then I guess it's not much different from talking with humans.
trans: 那么我想这与与人类交谈并没有太大区别。

Original: Cecil:I suppose connecting to others with kindness is what's most important.
Dialogue: I suppose connecting to others with kindness is what's most important.
trans: 我认为以善意与他人建立联系是最重要的。

Original: Maria:You're right. Feelings can be conveyed even with just your eyes.
Dialogue: You're right. Feelings can be conveyed even with just your eyes.

Original: Eiko:I feel like I can understand Shadow's feelings just by looking at his eyes!
Dialogue: I feel like I can understand Shadow's feelings just by looking at his eyes!
trans: 感觉光是看影子的眼神，我都能看懂他的心情！

Original: Krile:Hehe. Even if you don't speak, there are other ways to convey your feelings!
Dialogue: Hehe. Even if you don't speak, there are other ways to convey your feelings!

Original: Krile:You can tell an animal "thank you" or "I'm sorry" just by cuddling or petting them!
Dialogue: You can tell an animal "thank you" or "I'm sorry" just by cuddling or petting them!
trans: 您可以通过拥抱或抚摸动物来对它们说“谢谢”或“对不起”！

Original: Krile:You understand Angelo's feelings, right?
Dialogue: You understand Angelo's feelings, right?
trans: 安杰洛的心情你明白吧？

Original: Rinoa:Yeah! I think Angelo also likes being with me.
Dialogue: Yeah! I think Angelo also likes being with me.

Original: Rinoa:I'll be sure to show her how much I love her from now on!
Dialogue: I'll be sure to show her how much I love her from now on!
trans: 从现在开始，我一定要让她知道我有多爱她！

Original: Lenna:Look! There's someone over there.
Dialogue: Look! There's someone over there.

Original: Celes:They seem lost... Maybe they're someone's friend.
Dialogue: They seem lost... Maybe they're someone's friend.
trans: 他们似乎迷路了……也许他们是某人的朋友。

Original: Celes:Is everything alright? Perhaps we can help.
Dialogue: Is everything alright? Perhaps we can help.

Original: Lulu:Are you from this area?
Dialogue: Are you from this area?

Original: Celes:No. We aren't too familiar with it, either...
Dialogue: No. We aren't too familiar with it, either...

Original: Lulu:I see... Hm...
Dialogue: I see... Hm...

Original: Lenna:Maybe we should tell her what we know about this world.
Dialogue: Maybe we should tell her what we know about this world.
trans: 也许我们应该告诉她我们对这个世界的了解。

Original: Lilisette:Good idea! She's probably a friend of someone from another world.
Dialogue: Good idea! She's probably a friend of someone from another world.

Original: Celes:Could it be that you're also lost in this world?
Dialogue: Could it be that you're also lost in this world?
trans: 难道你也迷失在这个世界上？

Original: Lenna:Yes. There are others like you, us included. Could you tell us what happened to you?
Dialogue: Yes. There are others like you, us included. Could you tell us what happened to you?

Original: Lulu:I was told by a goddess that this is a different world... I'm searching for my comrades now.
Dialogue: I was told by a goddess that this is a different world... I'm searching for my comrades now.
trans: 被女神告知这里是异世界……现在正在寻找伙伴们呢。

Original: Lilisette:Then we can definitely help! What kind of person are you looking for?
Dialogue: Then we can definitely help! What kind of person are you looking for?
trans: 那么我们绝对可以提供帮助！

Original: Lulu:A young woman. She's a summoner.
Dialogue: A young woman. She's a summoner.

Original: Celes:I know some likely candidates. You wait right here. I'll go and fetch who I can.
Dialogue: I know some likely candidates. You wait right here. I'll go and fetch who I can.
trans: 我认识一些可能的候选人。

Original: Rydia:Um, well... Nice to meet you?
Dialogue: Um, well... Nice to meet you?

Original: Eiko:I don't know this lady, either! But we can still be friends.
Dialogue: I don't know this lady, either! But we can still be friends.

Original: Celes:I'm sorry. You said "summoner," so I thought...
Dialogue: I'm sorry. You said "summoner," so I thought...

Original: Lilisette:I guess we got it wrong.
Dialogue: I guess we got it wrong.

Original: Lulu:I see... You two are also summoners?
Dialogue: I see... You two are also summoners?
trans: 原来如此……你们也是召唤师？

Original: Lulu:What fascinating dress... This truly is a different world.
Dialogue: What fascinating dress... This truly is a different world.
trans: 好迷人的打扮……这真是异世界。

Original: Lulu:I hope she's all right, wherever she is...
Dialogue: I hope she's all right, wherever she is...
trans: 我希望她一切都好，无论她在哪里...

Original: Lulu:Thank you for your help. I'll continue my search.
Dialogue: Thank you for your help. I'll continue my search.

Original: Celes:Wait. I can't let you go off on your own.
Dialogue: Wait. I can't let you go off on your own.

Original: Rydia:You must be exhausted. Please don't push yourself.
Dialogue: You must be exhausted. Please don't push yourself.

Original: Eiko:Why don't you take a break first? Then we'll all help you find your friends!
Dialogue: Why don't you take a break first? Then we'll all help you find your friends!
trans: 你为什么不先休息一下？

Original: Lenna:Indeed. We have other summoners in our group. There's a chance the one you're looking for is among them.
Dialogue: Indeed. We have other summoners in our group. There's a chance the one you're looking for is among them.

Original: Lilisette:Yeah! You can meet all of our comrades if you come with us to the airship.
Dialogue: Yeah! You can meet all of our comrades if you come with us to the airship.

Original: Lulu:...I suppose you're right.
Dialogue: ...I suppose you're right.

Original: Lulu:Thank you for your kindness. Let us do just that, then.
Dialogue: Thank you for your kindness. Let us do just that, then.

Original: Penelo:How are you holding up, Lulu? We should be out of the forest soon.
Dialogue: How are you holding up, Lulu? We should be out of the forest soon.

Original: Lulu:I'm fine, thank you for asking.
Dialogue: I'm fine, thank you for asking.

Original: Penelo:Not at all! By the way, that's a cute doll you have there.
Dialogue: Not at all! By the way, that's a cute doll you have there.

Original: Lulu:Thank you. You must find it weird for me to be carrying this around.
Dialogue: Thank you. You must find it weird for me to be carrying this around.

Original: Penelo:What? Of course not! I think it's adorable!
Dialogue: What? Of course not! I think it's adorable!

Original: Lulu:Hehe. My apologies for teasing you.
Dialogue: Hehe. My apologies for teasing you.

Original: Lulu:This doll is capable of more than just looking cute.
Dialogue: This doll is capable of more than just looking cute.
trans: 这个娃娃不仅仅是看起来很可爱。

Original: Seven:It moved!
Dialogue: It moved!

Original: Seven:You two are from different worlds, right? How is it possible you know that?
Dialogue: You two are from different worlds, right? How is it possible you know that?
trans: 你们两个来自不同的世界吧？

Original: Shantotto:Though the theory behind it is not the same, I believe something akin to magic is to blame.
Dialogue: Though the theory behind it is not the same, I believe something akin to magic is to blame.
trans: 尽管其背后的理论不尽相同，但我相信应该归咎于类似于魔法的东西。

Original: Lulu:...So the idea of magic is the same then. Well, she's right. This moves by magic.
Dialogue: ...So the idea of magic is the same then. Well, she's right. This moves by magic.

Original: Penelo:Then you're a mage, Lulu? We've got lots of allies who can also use magic!
Dialogue: Then you're a mage, Lulu? We've got lots of allies who can also use magic!

Original: Penelo:I hope we can find your friend soon!
Dialogue: I hope we can find your friend soon!
trans: 希望我们能尽快找到你的朋友！

Original: Seven:We're nearly there. Just a little more.
Dialogue: We're nearly there. Just a little more.

Original: Lulu:I can't thank you enough for helping me. I feel much better now.
Dialogue: I can't thank you enough for helping me. I feel much better now.

Original: Seven:Don't mention it. We all know what it's like to be lost in this world.
Dialogue: Don't mention it. We all know what it's like to be lost in this world.

Original: Wakka:Man, this thing just won't quit!
Dialogue: Man, this thing just won't quit!
trans: 伙计，这东西就是不会放弃！

Original: Seven:Wakka? What's the matter?
Dialogue: Wakka? What's the matter?

Original: Wakka:Nice timing! There's a monster over there. Come on, help me out!
Dialogue: Nice timing! There's a monster over there. Come on, help me out!

Original: Lulu:Wakka! There you are!
Dialogue: Wakka! There you are!

Original: Wakka:It's a good thing you're here. My ball just doesn't seem to do the trick.
Dialogue: It's a good thing you're here. My ball just doesn't seem to do the trick.

Original: Wakka:I need your help, Lu!
Dialogue: I need your help, Lu!

Original: Penelo:Wow! So your magic could do more than just make that doll move!
Dialogue: Wow! So your magic could do more than just make that doll move!

Original: Lulu:Where is Yuna? Is she safe?
Dialogue: Where is Yuna? Is she safe?

Original: Wakka:Take it easy. She's with us.
Dialogue: Take it easy. She's with us.

Original: Lulu:Thank goodness.
Dialogue: Thank goodness.

Original: Shantotto:So that's the summoner you were looking for. Finding her among so many would've been a chore.
Dialogue: So that's the summoner you were looking for. Finding her among so many would've been a chore.
trans: 这就是你要找的召唤师。

Original: Seven:We should've brought Yuna with us. When we get back to the airship, you'll be able to see her.
Dialogue: We should've brought Yuna with us. When we get back to the airship, you'll be able to see her.

Original: Lulu:Please don't apologize. Thank you for bringing me with you.
Dialogue: Please don't apologize. Thank you for bringing me with you.

Original: Lulu:If Yuna is here, I will gladly fight alongside you.
Dialogue: If Yuna is here, I will gladly fight alongside you.
trans: 如果尤娜在，我很乐意与你并肩作战。

Original: Lulu:Yuna! I'm so glad you're okay.
Dialogue: Yuna! I'm so glad you're okay.

Original: Yuna:Lulu! I'm so happy to see you! When I heard that you were all alone, I was so worried.
Dialogue: Lulu! I'm so happy to see you! When I heard that you were all alone, I was so worried.
