Original: Noel:I understand. We're just "using" her...
Dialogue: I understand. We're just "using" her...

Original: Rydia:I have to admit...her magic is incredible.
Dialogue: I have to admit...her magic is incredible.
trans: 我不得不承认……她的魔力令人难以置信。

Original: Zell:Don't be fooled, Rydia! That's just what she wants you to think!
Dialogue: Don't be fooled, Rydia! That's just what she wants you to think!

Original: Rydia:Is it?
Dialogue: Is it?

Original: Ultimecia:What seems to be the matter over here?
Dialogue: What seems to be the matter over here?
trans: 这里好像出了什么问题？

Original: Seifer:Don't play dumb. I know what you're up to.
Dialogue: Don't play dumb. I know what you're up to.

Original: Seifer:Ever since you arrived, monsters have been appearing like crazy.
Dialogue: Ever since you arrived, monsters have been appearing like crazy.
trans: 自从你来了之后，怪物就疯狂的出现了。

Original: Zell:That's right! You're just putting on an act, aren't you!?
Dialogue: That's right! You're just putting on an act, aren't you!?

Original: Squall:(Wow, sharp...)
Dialogue: (Wow, sharp...)

Original: Ultimecia:...Your accusations are disheartening. I see you do not trust me yet.
Dialogue: ...Your accusations are disheartening. I see you do not trust me yet.

Original: Noel:You've saved us. That much I know for sure.
Dialogue: You've saved us. That much I know for sure.

Original: Noel:But I also know that you're an enemy to Squall and his friends...
Dialogue: But I also know that you're an enemy to Squall and his friends...
trans: 但我也知道你是 Squall 和他的朋友们的敌人......

Original: Zell:Yeah! I might not remember you at all, but...
Dialogue: Yeah! I might not remember you at all, but...

Original: Zell:I know you're up to something!
Dialogue: I know you're up to something!

Original: Seifer:I dedicated myself to being your knight and you betrayed me. There's no way I could ever trust you.
Dialogue: I dedicated myself to being your knight and you betrayed me. There's no way I could ever trust you.
trans: 我献身成为你的骑士，而你却背叛了我。

Original: Squall:(...He's right.)
Dialogue: (...He's right.)

Original: Ultimecia:...I understand.
Dialogue: ...I understand.

Original: Ultimecia:But remember this: my heart is always on your side.
Dialogue: But remember this my heart is always on your side.
trans: 但请记住这一点，我的心永远站在你这边。

Original: Noel:The lonely sorceress... Squall's enemy...
Dialogue: The lonely sorceress... Squall's enemy...
trans: 孤独的女术士……斯考尔的敌人……

Original: Noel:But she saved me from my own solitude. I don't understand her goal...
Dialogue: But she saved me from my own solitude. I don't understand her goal...
trans: 但她把我从孤独中拯救出来。

Original: Seifer:Hmph. She's trying to trick us.
Dialogue: Hmph. She's trying to trick us.

Original: Zell:Even though I can't remember her, I feel so annoyed! Just how bad will it be when I actually remember!?
Dialogue: Even though I can't remember her, I feel so annoyed! Just how bad will it be when I actually remember!?
trans: 虽然我不记得她了，但我觉得很烦！

Original: Rydia:Calm down, you two.
Dialogue: Calm down, you two.

Original: Squall:(Just what is Ultimecia planning...?)
Dialogue: (Just what is Ultimecia planning...?)

Original: Kefka:Welcome back, Madam Sorceress!
Dialogue: Welcome back, Madam Sorceress!

Original: Kefka:I saw it all! From beginning to end!
Dialogue: I saw it all! From beginning to end!

Original: Kefka:Getting their sympathy, taking advantage of their kind hearts! You are, indeed, a cunning sorceress!
Dialogue: Getting their sympathy, taking advantage of their kind hearts! You are, indeed, a cunning sorceress!
trans: 博取他们的同情，利用他们的善良之心！

Original: Ultimecia:I have no need to be understood by you.
Dialogue: I have no need to be understood by you.

Original: Kefka:Yes, yes! I get it!
Dialogue: Yes, yes! I get it!

Original: Kefka:You'll get them to lower their guard, then hit them where it hurts most!
Dialogue: You'll get them to lower their guard, then hit them where it hurts most!
trans: 你会让他们降低警惕，然后打击他们最痛的地方！

Original: Ultimecia:I would have accomplished my goal had they not been there...
Dialogue: I would have accomplished my goal had they not been there...
trans: 如果他们不在那儿，我会实现我的目标......

Original: Ultimecia:You and I are different, clown. I did not destroy everything.
Dialogue: You and I are different, clown. I did not destroy everything.

Original: Ultimecia:Nevertheless, the world sees me as evil because of those children...
Dialogue: Nevertheless, the world sees me as evil because of those children...
trans: 然而，因为那些孩子，世界认为我是邪恶的......

Original: Kefka:Wow, how outrageous! Isn't being despised just the greatest?
Dialogue: Wow, how outrageous! Isn't being despised just the greatest?

Original: Kefka:You're so full of hate and sadness! You really are scary!
Dialogue: You're so full of hate and sadness! You really are scary!

Original: Ultimecia:...But the eyes of that boy who said he believes me...
Dialogue: ...But the eyes of that boy who said he believes me...
trans: ……可是那个说相信我的少年的眼神……

Original: Ultimecia:Hmph... It's just my imagination.
Dialogue: Hmph... It's just my imagination.

Original: Lilisette:Hmm... I just don't get it.
Dialogue: Hmm... I just don't get it.

Original: Cinque:Thinking about it makes Cinquey's noodle hurt...
Dialogue: Thinking about it makes Cinquey's noodle hurt...

Original: Vaan:Hey. What's with the long faces?
Dialogue: Hey. What's with the long faces?

Original: Papalymo:We were just mulling over Ultimecia's behavior.
Dialogue: We were just mulling over Ultimecia's behavior.
trans: 我们只是在考虑 Ultimecia 的行为。

Original: Fran:We thought she may have some ulterior motive, but nothing has happened yet.
Dialogue: We thought she may have some ulterior motive, but nothing has happened yet.
trans: 我们认为她可能有什么不可告人的动机，但目前还没有任何事情发生。

Original: Eiko:I wonder if she really is just lonely.
Dialogue: I wonder if she really is just lonely.
trans: 我想知道她是否真的只是寂寞。

Original: Lilisette:Didn't Squall say that she was trying to compress past, present, and future...
Dialogue: Didn't Squall say that she was trying to compress past, present, and future...
trans: Squall不是说她要压缩过去、现在和未来吗……

Original: Lilisette:And create a world where only she can exist?
Dialogue: And create a world where only she can exist?
trans: 创造一个只有她才能存在的世界？

Original: Lilisette:Not simply traveling through time to change the future, but eliminating all time that should be...
Dialogue: Not simply traveling through time to change the future, but eliminating all time that should be...
trans: 不是简单的穿越时空去改变未来，而是消除所有本该...

Original: Lilisette:Any way you look at it, it's terrible!
Dialogue: Any way you look at it, it's terrible!
trans: 不管怎么看，都太可怕了！

Original: Cinque:Sounds like a big bad meanie to me! Can she really do that, though?
Dialogue: Sounds like a big bad meanie to me! Can she really do that, though?
trans: 对我来说听起来像个坏蛋！

Original: Fran:Changing the world changes its principles... Anything is possible.
Dialogue: Changing the world changes its principles... Anything is possible.
trans: 改变世界会改变它的原则……一切皆有可能。

Original: Vaan:But that's only in Squall's world, right?
Dialogue: But that's only in Squall's world, right?
trans: 但这只是在 Squall 的世界里，对吧？

Original: Vaan:Would it even work if she tried to do that here?
Dialogue: Would it even work if she tried to do that here?
trans: 如果她在这里尝试这样做，它会起作用吗？

Original: Papalymo:That is precisely what we are discussing.
Dialogue: That is precisely what we are discussing.
trans: 这正是我们正在讨论的。

Original: Papalymo:Heretofore, her reasons for shadowing us were clear...
Dialogue: Heretofore, her reasons for shadowing us were clear...
trans: 迄今为止，她跟踪我们的原因很明确……

Original: Papalymo:She planned to use Mog,possessed by the Blackened Will, as a foundation for her time compression.
Dialogue: She planned to use Mog, possessed by the Blackened Will, as a foundation for her time compression.
trans: 她打算使用被黑化意志附身的莫格作为压缩时间的基础。

Original: Cinque:But that evil will's gone bye-bye and Moglin's A-okay now!
Dialogue: But that evil will's gone bye-bye and Moglin's A-okay now!
trans: 但是那个邪恶的意志已经消失了，再见，Moglin 的 A-okay 现在好了！

Original: Fran:So she no longer has reason to pursue us.
Dialogue: So she no longer has reason to pursue us.
trans: 所以她没有理由再追求我们了。

Original: Papalymo:And even less to help us in battle.
Dialogue: And even less to help us in battle.
trans: 更不用说在战斗中帮助我们了。

Original: Eiko:But I still don't get why she would say she's lonely, then try to erase everyone else!
Dialogue: But I still don't get why she would say she's lonely, then try to erase everyone else!
trans: 但我还是不明白为什么她会说她很孤独，然后试图抹去其他人！

Original: Eiko:Isn't this what they call a...contra...contradiction?
Dialogue: Isn't this what they call a...contra...contradiction?
trans: 这不就是他们所说的……矛盾……矛盾吗？

Original: Fran:...One feels loneliness only because of the presence of others.
Dialogue: ...One feels loneliness only because of the presence of others.
trans: ...一个人感到孤独只是因为有人在场。

Original: Eiko:What? Really?
Dialogue: What? Really?

Original: Lilisette:Ahaha! I guess it's hard for a kid like Eiko to understand.
Dialogue: Ahaha! I guess it's hard for a kid like Eiko to understand.

Original: Eiko:Hey! I'm not a kid!
Dialogue: Hey! I'm not a kid!

Original: Vaan:...I was an orphan, too, so I can understand.
Dialogue: ...I was an orphan, too, so I can understand.

Original: Vaan:When you realize you really are all alone, nothing matters anymore...
Dialogue: When you realize you really are all alone, nothing matters anymore...
trans: 当你意识到你真的很孤独时，什么都不重要了......

Original: Lilisette:So you mean Ultimecia is getting desperate?
Dialogue: So you mean Ultimecia is getting desperate?
trans: 所以你是说 Ultimecia 越来越绝望了？

Original: Cinque:That's scary! There's no telling what she'll do next!
Dialogue: That's scary! There's no telling what she'll do next!

Original: Cinque:So? Any idea what might she be up to?
Dialogue: So? Any idea what might she be up to?

Original: Fran:...We are back to where we started.
Dialogue: ...We are back to where we started.

Original: Papalymo:At the very least, we must keep our wits about us.
Dialogue: At the very least, we must keep our wits about us.
trans: 至少，我们必须保持警惕。

Original: Papalymo:I will not say to not sympathize, though...
Dialogue: I will not say to not sympathize, though...

Original: Yuna:Here I go!
Dialogue: Here I go!

Original: Garnet:Me too!
Dialogue: Me too!

Original: Ultimecia:...You both have great skill in magic.
Dialogue: ...You both have great skill in magic.

Original: Ultimecia:Continue to devote yourself to magic. I will support you from the shadows...
Dialogue: Continue to devote yourself to magic. I will support you from the shadows...

Original: Wakka:Yuna!
Dialogue: Yuna!

Original: Steiner:My apologies for being so late! Please tell me Ultimecia has not laid a finger on you!
Dialogue: My apologies for being so late! Please tell me Ultimecia has not laid a finger on you!

Original: Garnet:I'm fine, Steiner.
Dialogue: I'm fine, Steiner.

Original: Lulu:And you, Yuna? Nothing, I hope.
Dialogue: And you, Yuna? Nothing, I hope.

Original: Yuna:No need to worry. But thank you, Lulu.
Dialogue: No need to worry. But thank you, Lulu.

Original: Wakka:I can't tell what she's thinking... But there's no need for you to worry.
Dialogue: I can't tell what she's thinking... But there's no need for you to worry.
trans: 我不知道她在想什么……不过你不用担心。

Original: Steiner:Exactly! Whatever happens, we will be here to protect you!
Dialogue: Exactly! Whatever happens, we will be here to protect you!

Original: Seifer:...How pathetic. Making a show out of it...
Dialogue: ...How pathetic. Making a show out of it...

Original: Wakka:What are you talking about?
Dialogue: What are you talking about?

Original: Seifer:You! Fawning over your masters like a bunch of lapdogs.
Dialogue: You! Fawning over your masters like a bunch of lapdogs.

Original: Seifer:Like you don't have any will of your own! It's annoying just looking at you!
Dialogue: Like you don't have any will of your own! It's annoying just looking at you!
trans: 就像你没有任何自己的意志一样！

Original: Wakka:You're just trying to pick a fight now!
Dialogue: You're just trying to pick a fight now!
trans: 你现在只是想挑起争端！

Original: Lulu:I think he's jealous, no longer the sorceress's knight.
Dialogue: I think he's jealous, no longer the sorceress's knight.
trans: 我觉得他嫉妒了，不再是女术士的骑士了。

Original: Seifer:Shut it! Unless you want me to shut it for you!
Dialogue: Shut it! Unless you want me to shut it for you!

Original: Yuna:Please, stop this.
Dialogue: Please, stop this.

Original: Steiner:I protect the princess because of her graciousness!
Dialogue: I protect the princess because of her graciousness!
trans: 我保护公主，是因为她有恩情！

Original: Steiner:Make no mistake: it is not only out of duty as a knight!
Dialogue: Make no mistake it is not only out of duty as a knight!
trans: 别搞错了，这不仅仅是出于骑士的职责！

Original: Wakka:Lu and I are the same. Before we were guardians, we were her family.
Dialogue: Lu and I are the same. Before we were guardians, we were her family.

Original: Lulu:We are just protecting our family... I hope you understand that.
Dialogue: We are just protecting our family... I hope you understand that.
trans: 我们只是在保护我们的家人……我希望你明白这一点。

Original: Seifer:Tch... Did I ask you for excuses?
Dialogue: Tch... Did I ask you for excuses?

Original: Garnet:Listen to what you're saying...
Dialogue: Listen to what you're saying...

Original: Wakka:Then let me ask you, Seifer: why did you become Ultimecia's knight?
Dialogue: Then let me ask you, Seifer why did you become Ultimecia's knight?
trans: 那我问你，Seifer你为什么会成为Ultimecia的骑士？

Original: Steiner:Isn't it because you sympathized with her and her feelings?
Dialogue: Isn't it because you sympathized with her and her feelings?
trans: 不就是因为你同情她，同情她的感受吗？

Original: Seifer:...I don't care about those things.
Dialogue: ...I don't care about those things.

Original: Seifer:My dream was to be knight, ever since I was a kid.
Dialogue: My dream was to be knight, ever since I was a kid.
trans: 我的梦想是成为骑士，从我还是个孩子的时候。

Original: Seifer:That's all...
Dialogue: That's all...

Original: Wakka:Y'know, since Seifer joined us...
Dialogue: Y'know, since Seifer joined us...
trans: 你知道，自从 Seifer 加入我们...

Original: Wakka:Wasn't he boasting about being the god's knight, too?
Dialogue: Wasn't he boasting about being the god's knight, too?
trans: 他不是也吹嘘自己是神的骑士吗？

Original: Lulu:He is young yet, and full of dreams.
Dialogue: He is young yet, and full of dreams.

Original: Yuna:There's no chance he'll become her knight again...is there?
Dialogue: There's no chance he'll become her knight again...is there?
trans: 他不可能再次成为她的骑士……是吗？

Original: Garnet:For now, let's hope not...
Dialogue: For now, let's hope not...

Original: Spiritus:This is a place of respite.
Dialogue: This is a place of respite.

Original: Spiritus:The goddess Materia and I created this world to give battle-weary warriors rest.
Dialogue: The goddess Materia and I created this world to give battle-weary warriors rest.
trans: 我和玛泰利亚女神创造了这个世界，让厌战的战士们得以安息。

Original: Spiritus:However, all worlds connected to this one now hang in the balance...
Dialogue: However, all worlds connected to this one now hang in the balance...
trans: 然而，所有与这个世界相连的世界现在都悬而未决……

Original: Spiritus:Because of the planesgorgers.
Dialogue: Because of the planesgorgers.

Original: Spiritus:Of course. It is no exception to the danger that faces all.
Dialogue: Of course. It is no exception to the danger that faces all.

Original: Spiritus:Many warriors from other worlds have already been summoned here as a new battle unfolds before us.
Dialogue: Many warriors from other worlds have already been summoned here as a new battle unfolds before us.
trans: 许多来自异世界的战士已经被召唤到这里，一场新的战斗在我们面前展开。

Original: Spiritus:You are free to collude with whomever you wish to accomplish your goals.
Dialogue: You are free to collude with whomever you wish to accomplish your goals.
trans: 您可以自由地与任何您希望实现您的目标的人勾结。

Original: Spiritus:...Even if they may be Materia's warriors.
Dialogue: ...Even if they may be Materia's warriors.

Original: ???:You don't care about anything but yourself, do you?
Dialogue: You don't care about anything but yourself, do you?
trans: 除了你自己，你什么都不关心，是吗？

Original: ???:I guess I don't have much of a choice...
Dialogue: I guess I don't have much of a choice...

Original: ???:I have a lot of things to do back home, so I'll do whatever it takes to get back.
Dialogue: I have a lot of things to do back home, so I'll do whatever it takes to get back.
trans: 我有很多事情要做，所以我会尽一切努力回家。

Original: ???:...Even so, I don't know where to begin.
Dialogue: ...Even so, I don't know where to begin.
trans: ……即便如此，我也不知道从何说起。

Original: ???:Summoned by a god and not given any concrete orders...
Dialogue: Summoned by a god and not given any concrete orders...
trans: 被神召唤而没有下达任何具体命令...

Original: Golbez:What are you doing here?
Dialogue: What are you doing here?

Original: Golbez:...My apologies. It seems I have mistaken you for someone else.
Dialogue: ...My apologies. It seems I have mistaken you for someone else.

Original: ???:Someone else?
Dialogue: Someone else?

Original: Golbez:One of those who don a similar uniform.
Dialogue: One of those who don a similar uniform.
trans: 穿着类似制服的人之一。

Original: ???:...That can't be.
Dialogue: ...That can't be.

Original: Golbez:So you are one of them. In that case
Dialogue: So you are one of them. In that case—
trans: 所以你是他们中的一员。

Original: Golbez:You seem troubled...
Dialogue: You seem troubled...

Original: ???:...I don't know if I could face them now, after what I've done...
Dialogue: ...I don't know if I could face them now, after what I've done...
trans: ......我不知道我现在是否可以面对他们，在我做了这些之后......

Original: Golbez:It sounds like a complicated situation.
Dialogue: It sounds like a complicated situation.
trans: 这听起来像是一个复杂的情况。

Original: Golbez:It is up to you whether to see them or not. I have no intention of forcing you either way.
Dialogue: It is up to you whether to see them or not. I have no intention of forcing you either way.
trans: 是否看到它们取决于您。

Original: ???:But if they're really alive...
Dialogue: But if they're really alive...
trans: 但如果他们真的还活着……

Original: ???:I want to see them with my own eyes, even if only for just a glance, and apologize...!
Dialogue: I want to see them with my own eyes, even if only for just a glance, and apologize...!
trans: 哪怕只是一眼，我也想亲眼看看，向他们道歉……！

Original: Golbez:Just a glance...
Dialogue: Just a glance...

Original: Golbez:...I understand the feeling well.
Dialogue: ...I understand the feeling well.

Original: Shadow:...Someone is following us.
Dialogue: ...Someone is following us.

Original: Zell:What!? Seriously!? Where are they!?
Dialogue: What!? Seriously!? Where are they!?

Original: Shadow:Come out. I know you're there.
Dialogue: Come out. I know you're there.

Original: Machina:Ace. Deuce... Is it really you?
Dialogue: Ace. Deuce... Is it really you?

Original: Machina:I can't...believe it...
Dialogue: I can't...believe it...

Original: Deuce:We're so glad you're here, Machina!
Dialogue: We're so glad you're here, Machina!

Original: Ace:We were worried about you. But you look unharmed.
Dialogue: We were worried about you. But you look unharmed.

Original: Machina:Y-yeah. I'm fine...
Dialogue: Y-yeah. I'm fine...

Original: Ace:What's the matter? Is something wrong?
Dialogue: What's the matter? Is something wrong?

Original: Deuce:It's been so long since we've seen each other! The least you could do is smile!
Dialogue: It's been so long since we've seen each other! The least you could do is smile!

Original: Shadow:So you're a friend of Ace and the others.
Dialogue: So you're a friend of Ace and the others.
trans: 所以你是艾斯和其他人的朋友。

Original: Zell:What were you doing sneaking around like that!? There's no need to hide!
Dialogue: What were you doing sneaking around like that!? There's no need to hide!

Original: Machina:(Could it be...they don't remember?)
Dialogue: (Could it be...they don't remember?)

Original: Rem:It is you, isn't it!?
Dialogue: It is you, isn't it!?

Original: Rem:I'm so happy to see you, Machina!
Dialogue: I'm so happy to see you, Machina!

Original: Machina:Me, too. Are you okay?
Dialogue: Me, too. Are you okay?

Original: Rem:I'm fine! Hehe.
Dialogue: I'm fine! Hehe.

Original: Ace:She sure got a completely different reaction than we did...
Dialogue: She sure got a completely different reaction than we did...
trans: 她肯定得到了与我们完全不同的反应......

Original: Deuce:I guess that's to be expected. Those two are special to each other, after all.
Dialogue: I guess that's to be expected. Those two are special to each other, after all.

Original: Machina:...I heard all about the situation from the god.
Dialogue: ...I heard all about the situation from the god.
trans: ……我从神那里听说了所有的情况。

Original: Deuce:That's a relief. Now we can fight together again!
Dialogue: That's a relief. Now we can fight together again!

Original: Ace:Come on, Machina. We'll introduce you to the others.
Dialogue: Come on, Machina. We'll introduce you to the others.

Original: Machina:I don't...deserve to go with you.
Dialogue: I don't...deserve to go with you.
trans: 我不……配得上和你一起去。

Original: Rem:What are you saying?
Dialogue: What are you saying?

Original: Zell:What do you mean "deserve"? You're friends, and that's all that matters!
Dialogue: What do you mean "deserve"? You're friends, and that's all that matters!

Original: Deuce:Zell's right. I don't understand why you're so hesitant...
Dialogue: Zell's right. I don't understand why you're so hesitant...

Original: Rem:Please come with us, Machina. I want you to be by my side.
Dialogue: Please come with us, Machina. I want you to be by my side.

Original: Machina:Rem... You're right. I promised.
Dialogue: Rem... You're right. I promised.

Original: Machina:I'll go with you. I want to help.
Dialogue: I'll go with you. I want to help.

Original: Zell:Was that so hard now? Man, you're weird!
Dialogue: Was that so hard now? Man, you're weird!

Original: Shadow:Let's get moving.
Dialogue: Let's get moving.

Original: Deuce:Yes! Let's go!
Dialogue: Yes! Let's go!

Original: Rem:We can take our time catching up later, Machina.
Dialogue: We can take our time catching up later, Machina.

Original: Machina:They're all...the same as back then...
Dialogue: They're all...the same as back then...

Original: Machina:I'll protect you this time. I'll atone for everything.
Dialogue: I'll protect you this time. I'll atone for everything.

Original: Tidus:...And then the crowd goes wild! It's a blast!
Dialogue: ...And then the crowd goes wild! It's a blast!

Original: Tidus:You can't beatblitzballwhen it comes to fun inSpira.
Dialogue: You can't beat blitzball when it comes to fun in Spira.
trans: 说到 Spira 的乐趣，您无法击败闪电球。

Original: King:A giant sphere filled with water...
Dialogue: A giant sphere filled with water...
trans: 一个装满水的巨大球体……

Original: Cinque:Wouldn't it be great if we had that in Orience, too?
Dialogue: Wouldn't it be great if we had that in Orience, too?
trans: 如果我们在 Orience 也有那个不是很好吗？

Original: Cater:You have something amazing inyour world, too, right? An...amusement park, was it?
Dialogue: You have something amazing in your world, too, right? An...amusement park, was it?
trans: 你的世界也有一些令人惊奇的东西，对吧？

Original: Aerith:That's right. They have all sorts of games and rides, and you can take part in a stage show there, too.
Dialogue: That's right. They have all sorts of games and rides, and you can take part in a stage show there, too.

Original: Aerith:You can even watch the fireworks from a gondola. It's such a beautiful sight to see.
Dialogue: You can even watch the fireworks from a gondola. It's such a beautiful sight to see.
trans: 您甚至可以在缆车上观看烟花。

Original: Cinque:Ooh, we need an amusement park, too! I never get tired of hearing about it!
Dialogue: Ooh, we need an amusement park, too! I never get tired of hearing about it!
trans: 哦，我们也需要一个游乐园！

Original: Cater:I'd love to hang out in all the other worlds! Once the war is over, let's go!
Dialogue: I'd love to hang out in all the other worlds! Once the war is over, let's go!
trans: 我很想在所有其他世界闲逛！

Original: King:That's not a bad idea...
Dialogue: That's not a bad idea...

Original: Cinque:I'm looking forward to it already! We've got to make tons of plans for the future!
Dialogue: I'm looking forward to it already! We've got to make tons of plans for the future!

Original: Machina:The future, huh...
Dialogue: The future, huh...

Original: Machina:(But they don't have a... No. I can't say things like that...)
Dialogue: (But they don't have a... No. I can't say things like that...)
trans: （但他们没有……不，我不能说那样的话……）

Original: Cinque:Lookie, lookie, I found a Machy!
Dialogue: Lookie, lookie, I found a Machy!
trans: 看，看，我找到了一个马奇！

Original: Cater:You must've heard us just now! Is there anywhere you want to go?
Dialogue: You must've heard us just now! Is there anywhere you want to go?
trans: 你刚才一定听到了我们的声音！

Original: Machina:Hmm... Well...
Dialogue: Hmm... Well...

Original: King:You don't need to think so hard about it.
Dialogue: You don't need to think so hard about it.

Original: Machina:Well, I... As long as I'm with you guys, anywhere's fine with me.
Dialogue: Well, I... As long as I'm with you guys, anywhere's fine with me.
trans: 嗯，我……只要和你们在一起，哪里都好。

Original: Tidus:What? Don't be so indecisive!
Dialogue: What? Don't be so indecisive!

Original: Aerith:Of course you'll all go together! But we want to know what you want to do once the fighting's over.
Dialogue: Of course you'll all go together! But we want to know what you want to do once the fighting's over.

Original: Machina:Uhh... I guess if I had to choose...
Dialogue: Uhh... I guess if I had to choose...
trans: 呃……我想如果我不得不选择……

Original: Machina:I'd like to go to school with Class Zero again.
Dialogue: I'd like to go to school with Class Zero again.
trans: 我想再次和零班一起上学。

Original: Cater:What!? That can't possibly be your dream!
Dialogue: What!? That can't possibly be your dream!

Original: Cinque:You're so serious, Machy!
Dialogue: You're so serious, Machy!

Original: Machina:I'm not serious...
Dialogue: I'm not serious...

Original: Machina:I'm just being honest.
Dialogue: I'm just being honest.

Original: Cinque:Are you okay, Machy?
Dialogue: Are you okay, Machy?

Original: Cater:A-are you crying? At a time like this!?
Dialogue: A-are you crying? At a time like this!?

Original: Machina:I-I'm not crying! Don't be ridiculous!
Dialogue: I-I'm not crying! Don't be ridiculous!

Original: Machina:It started raining! I'm going to take shelter over there!
Dialogue: It started raining! I'm going to take shelter over there!

Original: Aerith:But it's not...raining...
Dialogue: But it's not...raining...

Original: King:He's a terrible liar...
Dialogue: He's a terrible liar...

Original: Tidus:He's a little...strange, isn't he?
Dialogue: He's a little...strange, isn't he?

Original: Cinque:He's at a sensitive age, you know! Don't be too hard on him.
Dialogue: He's at a sensitive age, you know! Don't be too hard on him.
trans: 他正处于敏感的年龄，你知道的！

Original: Machina:They don't know...about Class Zero's future...
Dialogue: They don't know...about Class Zero's future...
trans: 他们不知道……零级的未来……

Original: Machina:But in this world, I can save them...
Dialogue: But in this world, I can save them...
trans: 但在这个世界上，我可以拯救他们……

Original: Vaan:So, you two have known each other for a while, huh?
Dialogue: So, you two have known each other for a while, huh?
trans: 那么，你们两个认识有一段时间了，是吧？

Original: Rem:That's right. We were separated when we were young, but we were reunited at Akademeia.
Dialogue: That's right. We were separated when we were young, but we were reunited at Akademeia.

Original: Penelo:Really? What are the chances!?
Dialogue: Really? What are the chances!?

Original: Machina:I was as surprised as you are.
Dialogue: I was as surprised as you are.

Original: Machina:Our village was attacked when we were just children. Burned to the ground to contain a disease.
Dialogue: Our village was attacked when we were just children. Burned to the ground to contain a disease.
trans: 当我们还是孩子的时候，我们的村庄遭到袭击。

Original: Machina:We fled together, but got separated along the way. I thought I'd never see her again.
Dialogue: We fled together, but got separated along the way. I thought I'd never see her again.
trans: 我们一起逃亡，却在途中走散了。

Original: Tifa:That's terrible...to have your home taken like that.
Dialogue: That's terrible...to have your home taken like that.
trans: 太可怕了……你的家就这样被拿走了。

Original: Rem:When we ran away, he made a promise. Do you remember?
Dialogue: When we ran away, he made a promise. Do you remember?
trans: 我们逃跑时，他许下了诺言。

Original: Rem:He said he was gonna become a great warrior and protect me from all the bad grown-ups.
Dialogue: He said he was gonna become a great warrior and protect me from all the bad grown-ups.
trans: 他说他要成为一名伟大的战士，保护我免受所有坏大人的伤害。

Original: Vaan:Ah, so that's why he came here.
Dialogue: Ah, so that's why he came here.

Original: Penelo:How heroic! I wish someone would do that for me.
Dialogue: How heroic! I wish someone would do that for me.

Original: Cloud:What's so funny?
Dialogue: What's so funny?

Original: Tifa:Oh, nothing...
Dialogue: Oh, nothing...

Original: Penelo:Weren't you two also...?
Dialogue: Weren't you two also...?

Original: Tifa:Yeah. We went through a lot as kids.
Dialogue: Yeah. We went through a lot as kids.

Original: Cloud:That's in the past. Let's keep it there.
Dialogue: That's in the past. Let's keep it there.

Original: Penelo:Aw, I'm so jealous! To have a friend you can depend ona friend you've known since forever.
Dialogue: Aw, I'm so jealous! To have a friend you can depend on—a friend you've known since forever.

Original: Penelo:Maybe you should learn a thing or two from Machina and Cloud, Vaan.
Dialogue: Maybe you should learn a thing or two from Machina and Cloud, Vaan.
trans: 也许你应该向 Machina 和 Cloud 学习一两件事，Vaan。

Original: Vaan:You don't have to worry about any of that, Penelo.
Dialogue: You don't have to worry about any of that, Penelo.
trans: 你不必担心这些，佩内洛。

Original: Vaan:Once I'm the world's most famous sky pirate, you'll be the first one I share the wealth with.
Dialogue: Once I'm the world's most famous sky pirate, you'll be the first one I share the wealth with.
trans: 一旦我成为世界上最著名的空贼，你将是第一个与我分享财富的人。

Original: Penelo:Uh, were you even listening...?
Dialogue: Uh, were you even listening...?

Original: Machina:Vaan, if you're going to protect someone, you have to be ready to do whatever it takes.
Dialogue: Vaan, if you're going to protect someone, you have to be ready to do whatever it takes.
trans: 凡，如果你要保护一个人，你必须做好不惜一切代价的准备。

Original: Machina:If you only focus on being strong, you'll lose sight of what's really important.
Dialogue: If you only focus on being strong, you'll lose sight of what's really important.
trans: 如果你只专注于坚强，你就会忽视真正重要的事情。

Original: Vaan:Uh... Right... Got it.
Dialogue: Uh... Right... Got it.

Original: Rem:You know... You seem different, Machina.
Dialogue: You know... You seem different, Machina.
trans: 你知道……你看起来不一样了，Machina。

Original: Rem:I can't really put my finger on it, but you seem...a little bit more grown up.
Dialogue: I can't really put my finger on it, but you seem...a little bit more grown up.
trans: 我真的说不准，但你似乎……长大了一点。

Original: Cloud:Something wrong with that?
Dialogue: Something wrong with that?

Original: Rem:No, not necessarily...
Dialogue: No, not necessarily...

Original: Tifa:It's not always easy to talk about the past. Sometimes it makes us...heated. Right, Machina?
Dialogue: It's not always easy to talk about the past. Sometimes it makes us...heated. Right, Machina?
trans: 谈论过去并不总是那么容易。

Original: Machina:Yeah...that's it. There's nothing to worry about.
Dialogue: Yeah...that's it. There's nothing to worry about.

Original: Machina:(I need to be more careful...)
Dialogue: (I need to be more careful...)

Original: Machina:Nobody knows anything, do they? Not about my mistakes...not even about their own fates.
Dialogue: Nobody knows anything, do they? Not about my mistakes...not even about their own fates.

Original: Jecht:Hey kid, come on! What's eating you?
Dialogue: Hey kid, come on! What's eating you?

Original: Machina:Nothing, don't worry about it. Even if I told you, you wouldn't
Dialogue: Nothing, don't worry about it. Even if I told you, you wouldn't—

Original: Kain:You remember events that your allies do not. Am I wrong?
Dialogue: You remember events that your allies do not. Am I wrong?
trans: 你记得你的盟友不记得的事件。

Original: Machina:What!? How did you know?
Dialogue: What!? How did you know?

Original: Kain:It was the same for me.
Dialogue: It was the same for me.

Original: Machina:And Jecht? You too?
Dialogue: And Jecht? You too?

Original: Jecht:Yeah, suppose it was.
Dialogue: Yeah, suppose it was.

Original: Jecht:Looks like Spiritus summoned you here, just like he did us. I'd wager on it.
Dialogue: Looks like Spiritus summoned you here, just like he did us. I'd wager on it.
trans: 看起来 Spiritus 把你召唤到了这里，就像他召唤我们一样。

Original: Mog:Many of the warriors summoned by Spiritus still have memories of their old world, kupo! Not so with the warriors summoned by Materia.
Dialogue: Many of the warriors summoned by Spiritus still have memories of their old world, kupo! Not so with the warriors summoned by Materia.
trans: 许多被 Spiritus 召唤出来的战士还保留着对他们旧世界 kupo 的记忆！

Original: Machina:I see...
Dialogue: I see...

Original: Machina:Well, it's reassuring to know I'm not alone.
Dialogue: Well, it's reassuring to know I'm not alone.
trans: 好吧，知道我并不孤单让人放心。

Original: Kain:Doubtless there are things you remember that you'd prefer to hide from Ace and the others.
Dialogue: Doubtless there are things you remember that you'd prefer to hide from Ace and the others.
trans: 毫无疑问，您会记住一些您希望对 Ace 和其他人隐瞒的事情。

Original: Jecht:You know, I think you're right.
Dialogue: You know, I think you're right.
trans: 你知道，我认为你是对的。

Original: Jecht:Better not keep it all festering inside. If you need someone to talk to, we're all ears.
Dialogue: Better not keep it all festering inside. If you need someone to talk to, we're all ears.
trans: 最好不要让它在里面溃烂。

Original: Jecht:You can't remember your own brother? Ah, wait, I heard about your world. That explains it...
Dialogue: You can't remember your own brother? Ah, wait, I heard about your world. That explains it...
trans: 你不记得你自己的兄弟？

Original: Machina:I was consumed with hatred at Class Zero. I blamed them for his death. I couldn't let it go.
Dialogue: I was consumed with hatred at Class Zero. I blamed them for his death. I couldn't let it go.
trans: 我在零级班被仇恨吞噬了。

Original: Machina:I lost sight of everything else... And in the end, because of me, she...she...
Dialogue: I lost sight of everything else... And in the end, because of me, she...she...
trans: 我什么都看不见了……最后，因为我，她……她……

Original: Kain:I see. You have my sympathy.
Dialogue: I see. You have my sympathy.

Original: Mog:Painful memories create powerful will. That's why Spiritus called you here, kupo...
Dialogue: Painful memories create powerful will. That's why Spiritus called you here, kupo...
trans: 痛苦的回忆造就了坚强的意志。

Original: Machina:It's better that the others don't have their memories. At least they can smile and laugh like they're back at Akademeia.
Dialogue: It's better that the others don't have their memories. At least they can smile and laugh like they're back at Akademeia.
trans: 其他人最好没有他们的记忆。

Original: Kain:Perhaps that is so.
Dialogue: Perhaps that is so.

Original: Mog:Don't worry, my lips are sealed, kupo. I won't say a single word.
Dialogue: Don't worry, my lips are sealed, kupo. I won't say a single word.
trans: 别担心，我的嘴唇是密封的，kupo。

Original: Machina:Thanks. And...sorry to put this on you.
Dialogue: Thanks. And...sorry to put this on you.

Original: Jecht:Is that really all you have to say, kid?
Dialogue: Is that really all you have to say, kid?
trans: 这真的是你要说的全部吗，孩子？

Original: Jecht:Sitting there moping won't fix anything. You have a chancedon't waste it!
Dialogue: Sitting there moping won't fix anything. You have a chance—don't waste it!
trans: 坐在那里闷闷不乐解决不了任何问题。

Original: Jecht:Are you deaf? I said don't waste it!
Dialogue: Are you deaf? I said don't waste it!

Original: Jecht:You're guilty because you let your friends down, right? Well, now's your chance to do something about it!
Dialogue: You're guilty because you let your friends down, right? Well, now's your chance to do something about it!
trans: 你有罪是因为你让你的朋友失望了，对吧？

Original: Jecht:Not everyone gets an opportunity like this. Today's your lucky day!
Dialogue: Not everyone gets an opportunity like this. Today's your lucky day!
trans: 不是每个人都能得到这样的机会。

Original: Kain:For all his bluster, he has a point. We cannot change the past. The future, however...
Dialogue: For all his bluster, he has a point. We cannot change the past. The future, however...
trans: 对于他所有的咆哮，他有一点。

Original: Mog:That's right, kupo! You know what's to come, but that doesn't mean it has to come.
Dialogue: That's right, kupo! You know what's to come, but that doesn't mean it has to come.

Original: Machina:The past is set, but the future can still be changed...is that it?
Dialogue: The past is set, but the future can still be changed...is that it?
trans: 过去已定，但未来仍可改变……是吗？

Original: Jecht:Ah, you're a clever one!
Dialogue: Ah, you're a clever one!

Original: Jecht:If you ever need an ear to bend, just give us a shout! Spiritus's warriors need to have each others' backs!
Dialogue: If you ever need an ear to bend, just give us a shout! Spiritus's warriors need to have each others' backs!
trans: 如果您需要弯曲耳朵，请告诉我们！

Original: Machina:Thanks, I will.
Dialogue: Thanks, I will.

Original: ???:I was told to lend them my aid, but I have yet to find them...
Dialogue: I was told to lend them my aid, but I have yet to find them...
trans: 我被告知要帮助他们，但我还没有找到他们......

Original: ???:"Princess"? Could that be...
Dialogue: "Princess"? Could that be...

Original: Steiner:Are you alright!?
Dialogue: Are you alright!?

Original: Garnet:Yes. I'm fine, Steiner.
Dialogue: Yes. I'm fine, Steiner.

Original: Galuf:You are quite the tough princess. You do not easily fall in battle.
Dialogue: You are quite the tough princess. You do not easily fall in battle.

Original: Rem:Leave it to me. I'll heal you right up.
Dialogue: Leave it to me. I'll heal you right up.

Original: Garnet:Thank you, Rem.
Dialogue: Thank you, Rem.

Original: Steiner:You! Identify yourself!
Dialogue: You! Identify yourself!

Original: ???:You are not Her Highness... Though she should be with you.
Dialogue: You are not Her Highness... Though she should be with you.
trans: 你不是殿下……虽然她应该和你在一起。

Original: Galuf:It seems you mean no harm. Are you looking for one of our allies?
Dialogue: It seems you mean no harm. Are you looking for one of our allies?

Original: ???:Forgive me for asking, but are you Materia's warriors?
Dialogue: Forgive me for asking, but are you Materia's warriors?
trans: 请原谅我问，但你们是魔石的战士吗？

Original: Rem:Yes, we are. And you are...?
Dialogue: Yes, we are. And you are...?

Original: ???:You may not believe me, but I am not your enemy.
Dialogue: You may not believe me, but I am not your enemy.
trans: 你可能不相信我，但我不是你的敌人。

Original: Garnet:I can see you're on your guard. But if you really are one of Materia's warriors, we want to believe you.
Dialogue: I can see you're on your guard. But if you really are one of Materia's warriors, we want to believe you.

Original: ???:My apologies. I cannot risk mistaking the ones I must protect.
Dialogue: My apologies. I cannot risk mistaking the ones I must protect.

Original: ???:Protectors of the princess, I leave them to you. I will also join the fight.
Dialogue: Protectors of the princess, I leave them to you. I will also join the fight.
trans: 公主的守护者，交给你们了。

Original: Galuf:Oh my... It seems we were surrounded whilst in conversation.
Dialogue: Oh my... It seems we were surrounded whilst in conversation.
trans: 哦，我的......我们似乎在谈话时被包围了。

Original: ???:I will draw this one's attention away. I hope then you will believe me.
Dialogue: I will draw this one's attention away. I hope then you will believe me.
trans: 我会把这个人的注意力引开。

Original: Steiner:You mean to fight it alone!?
Dialogue: You mean to fight it alone!?

Original: ???:If I can win your trust this way, then yes. Afterward, please tell me about your other comrades.
Dialogue: If I can win your trust this way, then yes. Afterward, please tell me about your other comrades.
trans: 如果我可以通过这种方式赢得您的信任，那么可以。

Original: ???:Lady Ashe. I am relieved to see you unharmed.
Dialogue: Lady Ashe. I am relieved to see you unharmed.

Original: Ashe:As am I to see you, Basch.
Dialogue: As am I to see you, Basch.

Original: Steiner:So you are a knight of Lady Ashe.
Dialogue: So you are a knight of Lady Ashe.
trans: 所以你是艾希夫人的骑士。

Original: Faris:Something terrible must've happened to you. Your equipment is completely tattered, Mr. Knight.
Dialogue: Something terrible must've happened to you. Your equipment is completely tattered, Mr. Knight.
trans: 你一定发生了什么可怕的事情。

Original: Basch:Because of what happened back home, I had to don myself with whatever was available.
Dialogue: Because of what happened back home, I had to don myself with whatever was available.
trans: 因为家里发生的事情，我不得不穿上能穿的衣服。

Original: Basch:Besides, a general in shining armor is hardly credible.
Dialogue: Besides, a general in shining armor is hardly credible.
trans: 况且，一个身穿金甲的将军也很难让人信服。

Original: Basch:More importantly...it seems Her Highness has been blessed with great allies.
Dialogue: More importantly...it seems Her Highness has been blessed with great allies.
trans: 更重要的是……殿下似乎得天独厚的盟友。

Original: Basch:My apologies for what I said earlier.
Dialogue: My apologies for what I said earlier.
trans: 我为我之前所说的话道歉。

Original: Basch:Materia told me about this place...
Dialogue: Materia told me about this place...

Original: Basch:She said there are many warriors hailing from different worlds here, and among them are villains masquerading as allies.
Dialogue: She said there are many warriors hailing from different worlds here, and among them are villains masquerading as allies.
trans: 她说这里有很多来自不同世界的战士，其中也有伪装成盟友的恶棍。

Original: Basch:I had to be sure that you were truly traveling with Lady Ashe.
Dialogue: I had to be sure that you were truly traveling with Lady Ashe.
trans: 我必须确定你是真的和艾什夫人一起旅行。

Original: Steiner:It is natural for a knight to worry over his princess. I would have done the same were I you.
Dialogue: It is natural for a knight to worry over his princess. I would have done the same were I you.
trans: 骑士为他的公主​​担心是很自然的。

Original: Basch:Thank you. I think we will get along well.
Dialogue: Thank you. I think we will get along well.

Original: Setzer:I suppose it isn't easy being a knight.
Dialogue: I suppose it isn't easy being a knight.

Original: Setzer:Yet another caught up in troublesome politics and conspiracies added to our ranks.
Dialogue: Yet another caught up in troublesome politics and conspiracies added to our ranks.
trans: 又一个卷入麻烦的政治和阴谋的人加入了我们的行列。

Original: Basch:My apologies...
Dialogue: My apologies...

Original: Setzer:Don't be so serious. We're used to it.
Dialogue: Don't be so serious. We're used to it.

Original: Basch:Haha... So even you can tell how humorless I am.
Dialogue: Haha... So even you can tell how humorless I am.
trans: 哈哈……所以你也看得出我是多么没有幽默感。

Original: Steiner:But is it not for the sake of the one you protect?
Dialogue: But is it not for the sake of the one you protect?
trans: 但这不是为了你所保护的人吗？

Original: Steiner:I could tell you were such a knight from the moment I met you, Sir Basch.
Dialogue: I could tell you were such a knight from the moment I met you, Sir Basch.
trans: 从我遇见你的那一刻起，我就知道你是这样一个骑士，巴施爵士。

Original: Basch:I am grateful.
Dialogue: I am grateful.

Original: Basch:Allow me to introduce myself properly. Basch fon Ronsenburg, at your service.
Dialogue: Allow me to introduce myself properly. Basch fon Ronsenburg, at your service.
trans: 请允许我适当地介绍一下自己。

Original: Vaan:Hey, looks like you're alright.
Dialogue: Hey, looks like you're alright.

Original: Basch:In a manner of speaking.
Dialogue: In a manner of speaking.

Original: Basch:My apologies on taking so long to find you.
Dialogue: My apologies on taking so long to find you.
trans: 很抱歉花了这么长时间才找到你。

Original: Vaan:You don't need to apologize. We were doing fine.
Dialogue: You don't need to apologize. We were doing fine.

Original: Basch:I'm relieved to see you haven't changed at all.
Dialogue: I'm relieved to see you haven't changed at all.
trans: 看到你完全没有改变，我感到很欣慰。

Original: Cait Sith:That must mean you're happy to see him, huh, Vaan?
Dialogue: That must mean you're happy to see him, huh, Vaan?
trans: 那一定意味着你很高兴见到他，是吧，Vaan？

Original: Vaan:No! I just wasn't sure if he'd show up or not...
Dialogue: No! I just wasn't sure if he'd show up or not...

Original: Basch:Vaan isn't the sort of man to get lonely.
Dialogue: Vaan isn't the sort of man to get lonely.
trans: Vaan 不是那种会感到孤独的人。

Original: Basch:When I first heard about warriors from another world, I wondered what type of people they could be. You're a fearsome bunch.
Dialogue: When I first heard about warriors from another world, I wondered what type of people they could be. You're a fearsome bunch.
trans: 当我第一次听说来自另一个世界的战士时，我想知道他们会是什么样的人。

Original: Basch:I can see why Lady Ashe and Balthier trust you so.
Dialogue: I can see why Lady Ashe and Balthier trust you so.
trans: 我明白艾什夫人和巴尔蒂尔为何如此信任你了。

Original: Bartz:We feel the same. They've helped us out a lot.
Dialogue: We feel the same. They've helped us out a lot.

Original: Bartz:Everyone has things they need to do back in their world.
Dialogue: Everyone has things they need to do back in their world.
trans: 每个人在他们的世界里都有他们需要做的事情。

Original: Bartz:It's only natural we'd help each other out.
Dialogue: It's only natural we'd help each other out.
trans: 我们互相帮助是很自然的。

Original: Vanille:Those things aside, though, traveling with everyone is just plain fun!
Dialogue: Those things aside, though, traveling with everyone is just plain fun!
trans: 不过，撇开这些不谈，和大家一起旅行真是太有趣了！

Original: Vanille:What's considered "common sense" for one is different for the others. I've learned so much!
Dialogue: What's considered "common sense" for one is different for the others. I've learned so much!
trans: 对一个人来说被认为是“常识”的东西对其他人来说是不同的。

Original: Vaan:I wonder if those things would shock Basch.
Dialogue: I wonder if those things would shock Basch.
trans: 我想知道那些事情是否会让巴什感到震惊。

Original: Basch:I'm not sure, so perhaps we should take it slowly.
Dialogue: I'm not sure, so perhaps we should take it slowly.
trans: 我不确定，所以也许我们应该慢慢来。

Original: Basch:But it's like Bartz said... I can't help thinking about the things I must do back home.
Dialogue: But it's like Bartz said... I can't help thinking about the things I must do back home.
trans: 但就像巴茨说的那样……我忍不住想回到家里必须做的事情。

Original: Cait Sith:Vayne is here, too. He also doesn't know how his home world is doing, so why not focus on that instead?
Dialogue: Vayne is here, too. He also doesn't know how his home world is doing, so why not focus on that instead?

Original: Basch:I see... He must be scheming something. We need to stop him.
Dialogue: I see... He must be scheming something. We need to stop him.
trans: 原来如此……他一定是在打什么主意。

Original: Basch:Since Her Highness is here as well, it is my duty to protect her.
Dialogue: Since Her Highness is here as well, it is my duty to protect her.
trans: 既然殿下也在，保护她也是我的职责。

Original: Vanille:Sounds complicated. But I'll do my best to make sure you get back home safely.
Dialogue: Sounds complicated. But I'll do my best to make sure you get back home safely.

Original: Basch:Thank you. Having such comrades is heartening.
Dialogue: Thank you. Having such comrades is heartening.

Original: Basch:I know I cannot lose sight of my objective...but I would also like to enjoy this adventure with my new allies.
Dialogue: I know I cannot lose sight of my objective...but I would also like to enjoy this adventure with my new allies.
trans: 我知道我不能忘记我的目标……但我也想和我的新盟友一起享受这次冒险。

Original: Vanille:I'm certain you will!
Dialogue: I'm certain you will!

Original: Basch:Good. This will do nicely.
Dialogue: Good. This will do nicely.

Original: Serah:Cleaning your weapons, huh? Looks like a lot of work.
Dialogue: Cleaning your weapons, huh? Looks like a lot of work.

Original: Basch:In battle, life rests on a sword's edge, and only those with a keen blade will fall on the right side of it.
Dialogue: In battle, life rests on a sword's edge, and only those with a keen blade will fall on the right side of it.
trans: 在战场上，生命在于剑锋，只有利刃之人，才会倒在剑刃的右边。

Original: Basch:Victory goes to the prepared more often than not.
Dialogue: Victory goes to the prepared more often than not.
trans: 胜利往往属于有准备的人。

Original: Basch:At least, judging from my own experience.
Dialogue: At least, judging from my own experience.
trans: 至少，从我自己的经验来看。

Original: Firion:I agree. You have to be ready for anything, or it'll come back to bite you.
Dialogue: I agree. You have to be ready for anything, or it'll come back to bite you.

Original: Firion:That being said, it's not easy to keep all of my weapons as sharp as I'd like.
Dialogue: That being said, it's not easy to keep all of my weapons as sharp as I'd like.
trans: 话虽如此，要让我所有的武器都如我所愿地保持锋利并不容易。

Original: Basch:If you ever require aid, you only need ask. Your arsenal is impressive, but I know my way around an armory.
Dialogue: If you ever require aid, you only need ask. Your arsenal is impressive, but I know my way around an armory.
trans: 如果你需要帮助，你只需要问。

Original: Firion:I might have to take you up on that. I usually try to do it all myself, but sometimes it becomes a bit much...
Dialogue: I might have to take you up on that. I usually try to do it all myself, but sometimes it becomes a bit much...
trans: 我可能不得不接受你的意见。

Original: Basch:When it does, consider me at your complete disposal.
Dialogue: When it does, consider me at your complete disposal.
trans: 当它发生时，考虑一下我，任你支配。

Original: Firion:Thanks. You know, it's good having you around. I can tell you're dependable.
Dialogue: Thanks. You know, it's good having you around. I can tell you're dependable.

Original: Basch:Is that so? I've never thought that to be among my qualities.
Dialogue: Is that so? I've never thought that to be among my qualities.

Original: Serah:It's nice to see you two getting along!
Dialogue: It's nice to see you two getting along!
trans: 很高兴看到你们两个相处融洽！

Original: Basch:My offer of aid is open to you as well, Serah.
Dialogue: My offer of aid is open to you as well, Serah.

Original: Serah:But I do make sure to check up on him, ask how he's doing... I guess that's sort of like maintenance?
Dialogue: But I do make sure to check up on him, ask how he's doing... I guess that's sort of like maintenance?
trans: 但我一定要检查他，问问他过得怎么样……我想这有点像维护？

Original: Basch:Your moogle? I'm familiar with the word, but it seems themooglesin my world are...unlike yours, to say the least.
Dialogue: Your moogle? I'm familiar with the word, but it seems the moogles in my world are...unlike yours, to say the least.

Original: Basch:You said it "transforms." How exactly does that work?
Dialogue: You said it "transforms." How exactly does that work?

Original: Serah:You know, I'm not sure. You seem pretty good with your handswhy don't you take it apart and see what makes it tick?
Dialogue: You know, I'm not sure. You seem pretty good with your hands—why don't you take it apart and see what makes it tick?

Original: Basch:You will...uh...have to forgive me if I pass on that opportunity.
Dialogue: You will...uh...have to forgive me if I pass on that opportunity.
trans: 如果我放弃那个机会，你会……呃……必须原谅我。

Original: Serah:Hehe, gotcha!
Dialogue: Hehe, gotcha!

Original: Serah:But jokes aside, you do know a lot about weapons, right? Does that mean you can use a bow?
Dialogue: But jokes aside, you do know a lot about weapons, right? Does that mean you can use a bow?
trans: 不过不开玩笑，你确实对武器很了解，对吧？

Original: Basch:To a degree, yes. Mastery is but a matter of practice, after all.
Dialogue: To a degree, yes. Mastery is but a matter of practice, after all.

Original: Maria:Practice and time. There's not much you can't do with those two things.
Dialogue: Practice and time. There's not much you can't do with those two things.

Original: Firion:Maria would know. She might use a bow here, but that's not all she's good at.
Dialogue: Maria would know. She might use a bow here, but that's not all she's good at.

Original: Maria:If I could get by without wielding a weapon, I'd gladly do so. Alas, we do what we must.
Dialogue: If I could get by without wielding a weapon, I'd gladly do so. Alas, we do what we must.
trans: 如果我能在不使用武器的情况下度过难关，我会很乐意这样做。

Original: Cait Sith:You guys really are warriors, huh? Maybe I could stand to learn a thing or two from you all.
Dialogue: You guys really are warriors, huh? Maybe I could stand to learn a thing or two from you all.

Original: Cait Sith:I'd love to fix up my trusty megaphone, but that's not really an option in this world.
Dialogue: I'd love to fix up my trusty megaphone, but that's not really an option in this world.
trans: 我很想修理我可信赖的扩音器，但在这个世界上这不是一个真正的选择。

Original: Cait Sith:You see, it's a bit more complicated than it seems. You need nimble fingers and quick hands to make the most of it.
Dialogue: You see, it's a bit more complicated than it seems. You need nimble fingers and quick hands to make the most of it.
trans: 你看，它比看起来要复杂一点。

Original: Basch:At a glance it seems simple enough. May I?
Dialogue: At a glance it seems simple enough. May I?

Original: Cait Sith:Be my guest.
Dialogue: Be my guest.

Original: Basch:What!? A machine?
Dialogue: What!? A machine?

Original: Basch:I am afraid this is beyond my ken. Balthier could make more sense of it, perhaps...
Dialogue: I am afraid this is beyond my ken. Balthier could make more sense of it, perhaps...
trans: 这恐怕超出了我的知识范围。

Original: Cait Sith:Ah, so you have mechanics in your world too, huh?
Dialogue: Ah, so you have mechanics in your world too, huh?
trans: 啊，所以你的世界里也有机械师，是吧？

Original: Cait Sith:I'd ask Cid to take a look, but I'm sure he'd think the task was beneath him. A broken megaphone sounds better than his endless grumbling!
Dialogue: I'd ask Cid to take a look, but I'm sure he'd think the task was beneath him. A broken megaphone sounds better than his endless grumbling!
trans: 我会请 Cid 看一看，但我敢肯定他会认为他无法胜任这项任务。

Original: Basch:I would hate for you to suffer through that on my account.
Dialogue: I would hate for you to suffer through that on my account.
trans: 我不希望你为了我而受苦。

Original: Serah:Hehe. I just love learning about other worlds!
Dialogue: Hehe. I just love learning about other worlds!

Original: Basch:......
Ace:Alright, we're heading out soon.
Dialogue: Alright, we're heading out soon.
trans: 好的，我们很快就要出发了。

Original: Celes:Basch? Is something the matter?
Dialogue: Basch? Is something the matter?

Original: Basch:Ah, no, it is nothing.
Dialogue: Ah, no, it is nothing.

Original: Lulu:You seem surprised by your surroundings.
Dialogue: You seem surprised by your surroundings.
trans: 你似乎对周围的环境感到惊讶。

Original: Basch:Surprised? I suppose. I hail from a country surrounded by endless desert. Seeing this...makes me keenly realize how far from home I really am.
Dialogue: Surprised? I suppose. I hail from a country surrounded by endless desert. Seeing this...makes me keenly realize how far from home I really am.

Original: Ace:Do you think everyone's doing alright? It can't be easy living under another empire's thumb.
Dialogue: Do you think everyone's doing alright? It can't be easy living under another empire's thumb.
trans: 你觉得大家都过得好吗？

Original: Basch:I can do little at present but hope that my countrymen are safe.
Dialogue: I can do little at present but hope that my countrymen are safe.
trans: 我目前无能为力，但希望我的同胞们平安。

Original: Cecil:The empire's caused you much suffering, some of it at Vayne's behest. It must be difficult for you to see him again.
Dialogue: The empire's caused you much suffering, some of it at Vayne's behest. It must be difficult for you to see him again.
trans: 帝国给你带来了很多苦难，其中一些是薇恩所为。

Original: Basch:That it is. However, while the empire is the enemy of Dalmasca, Vayne himself is well-loved by its populace, even trusted.
Dialogue: That it is. However, while the empire is the enemy of Dalmasca, Vayne himself is well-loved by its populace, even trusted.

Original: Basch:I can't deny his skill with wordsa skill which has won men's hearts and set entire armies in motion.
Dialogue: I can't deny his skill with words—a skill which has won men's hearts and set entire armies in motion.
trans: 我不能否认他的言辞技巧——一种赢得人心并动员全军的技巧。

Original: Celes:Given your circumstances, I'm surprised how calm you sound. He's your enemy, isn't he?
Dialogue: Given your circumstances, I'm surprised how calm you sound. He's your enemy, isn't he?
trans: 鉴于你的情况，我很惊讶你听起来如此平静。

Original: Basch:The people of a country may be united under the same flag, but they are still people.
Dialogue: The people of a country may be united under the same flag, but they are still people.
trans: 一个国家的人民可以团结在同一面旗帜下，但他们仍然是人。

Original: Basch:My aim is to restore Dalmasca to her rightful place. That does not mean I must hate the citizenry of a whole nation.
Dialogue: My aim is to restore Dalmasca to her rightful place. That does not mean I must hate the citizenry of a whole nation.
trans: 我的目标是将达尔马斯卡恢复到她应有的地位。

Original: Basch:That being said, Vayne had his part to play, and for that he deserves no forgiveness.
Dialogue: That being said, Vayne had his part to play, and for that he deserves no forgiveness.
trans: 话虽这么说，薇恩还是有他的责任，为此他不值得被原谅。

Original: Celes:Your brother fights against you?
Dialogue: Your brother fights against you?

Original: Basch:Aye, he does. Although I can hardly say we're on good terms, I don't believe either of us wishes to be enemies.
Dialogue: Aye, he does. Although I can hardly say we're on good terms, I don't believe either of us wishes to be enemies.

Original: Basch:I wonder if perhaps we'll be reunited here.
Dialogue: I wonder if perhaps we'll be reunited here.
trans: 我想知道也许我们会在这里重聚。

Original: Lulu:It's possible, but I've heard of no one who might fit his description.
Dialogue: It's possible, but I've heard of no one who might fit his description.
trans: 有可能，但我听说没有人符合他的描述。

Original: Basch:I see. Well, I sense our reunion is inevitable, be it here or elsewhere.
Dialogue: I see. Well, I sense our reunion is inevitable, be it here or elsewhere.

Original: Basch:We have been on opposing sides ever since we parted ways. He is still of the empire, even if we are kin.
Dialogue: We have been on opposing sides ever since we parted ways. He is still of the empire, even if we are kin.
trans: 自从我们分道扬镳后，我们就一直站在对立的一边。

Original: Ace:Isn't there any way to compromise?
Dialogue: Isn't there any way to compromise?

Original: Basch:We are both alike in that we refuse to make concessions in our beliefs. That will make things difficult.
Dialogue: We are both alike in that we refuse to make concessions in our beliefs. That will make things difficult.
trans: 我们都拒绝在我们的信仰上让步。

Original: Basch:And although we are siblings, there are still those words which do not come easily.
Dialogue: And although we are siblings, there are still those words which do not come easily.
trans: 虽然我们是兄妹，但还是有些话来之不易。

Original: Cecil:I know what you mean. It is a difficult situation to be in.
Dialogue: I know what you mean. It is a difficult situation to be in.

Original: Cecil:I'm struggling to find the answers myself.
Dialogue: I'm struggling to find the answers myself.
trans: 我正在努力寻找自己的答案。

Original: Basch:Blood ties can be a cumbersome thing. More often than not they can feel restricting rather than liberating.
Dialogue: Blood ties can be a cumbersome thing. More often than not they can feel restricting rather than liberating.
trans: 血缘关系可能是一件麻烦事。

Original: Basch:Sometimes severing those ties seems like the only way to break free. But in the end, one is always left with a burden. How heavy was the burden I left him?
Dialogue: Sometimes severing those ties seems like the only way to break free. But in the end, one is always left with a burden. How heavy was the burden I left him?
trans: 有时切断这些联系似乎是摆脱束缚的唯一途径。

Original: Cecil:Even brothers can't always know what the other is thinking. And even if they do, some gulfs are too wide for even the bonds of family to traverse.
Dialogue: Even brothers can't always know what the other is thinking. And even if they do, some gulfs are too wide for even the bonds of family to traverse.
trans: 就算是兄弟，也不能时刻知道对方在想什么。

Original: Basch:I understand that now. There are yet truths I must seek out, truths that I must confront. No matter how much I'd rather look away.
Dialogue: I understand that now. There are yet truths I must seek out, truths that I must confront. No matter how much I'd rather look away.

Original: Onion Knight:Is someone there?
Dialogue: Is someone there?

Original: Cid:Can't tell if this guy's on our side or not.
Dialogue: Can't tell if this guy's on our side or not.
trans: 分不清这家伙到底是不是我们这边的。

Original: Cid:Hey, say something!
Dialogue: Hey, say something!

Original: Deuce:Maybe he doesn't speak our language?
Dialogue: Maybe he doesn't speak our language?
trans: 也许他不会说我们的语言？

Original: Ashe:Wait. We cannot judge by appearances.
Dialogue: Wait. We cannot judge by appearances.

Original: Ashe:And among any of the races, there were those who were hesitant to speak.
Dialogue: And among any of the races, there were those who were hesitant to speak.
trans: 而在任何一个种族之中，都有一些欲言又止的人。

Original: Ashe:Maybe he is lost.
Dialogue: Maybe he is lost.

Original: Ashe:If our words can get through to him, then we should explain the situation.
Dialogue: If our words can get through to him, then we should explain the situation.
trans: 如果我们的话能打动他，那我们就应该说明情况。

Original: Onion Knight:...Are you listening?
Dialogue: ...Are you listening?

Original: Freya:Wait. Are you looking for something?
Dialogue: Wait. Are you looking for something?

Original: Cid:What!? Did he just ignore us!? Some nerve!
Dialogue: What!? Did he just ignore us!? Some nerve!

Original: Deuce:But I didn't sense any hostility in him.
Dialogue: But I didn't sense any hostility in him.
trans: 但我没有感觉到他有任何敌意。

Original: Freya:Those were unmistakably the eyes of a knight. I could sense his resolve to protect.
Dialogue: Those were unmistakably the eyes of a knight. I could sense his resolve to protect.
trans: 毫无疑问，那是骑士的眼睛。

Original: Freya:He will prove a formidable addition should he be our ally. Perhaps someone will know who he is.
Dialogue: He will prove a formidable addition should he be our ally. Perhaps someone will know who he is.
trans: 如果他成为我们的盟友，他将证明是一个强大的补充。

Original: Kimahri:......
Cait Sith:Isn't that over there that silent fellow whom we can't tell if he's friend or foe?
Dialogue: Isn't that over there that silent fellow whom we can't tell if he's friend or foe?
trans: 那不是那边那个不知敌我、沉默寡言的家伙吗？

Original: Cait Sith:What should we do? Tell the others?
Dialogue: What should we do? Tell the others?

Original: Sazh:Let's try to talk to him first. He might be friendly.
Dialogue: Let's try to talk to him first. He might be friendly.

Original: Cait Sith:He doesn't...look friendly...
Dialogue: He doesn't...look friendly...

Original: Jecht:What are you guys gossiping about?
Dialogue: What are you guys gossiping about?

Original: Cait Sith:Jecht! I feel like this is going to get complicated with you here... Or maybe easier?
Dialogue: Jecht! I feel like this is going to get complicated with you here... Or maybe easier?

Original: Jecht:It's you!
Dialogue: It's you!

Original: Sazh:You know him?
Dialogue: You know him?

Original: Kimahri:......!?
Cait Sith:He looks surprised. Are you sure you know him?
Dialogue: He looks surprised. Are you sure you know him?

Original: Jecht:Looking for Yuna? She's with us.
Dialogue: Looking for Yuna? She's with us.

Original: Sazh:See? Everything's okay. And it seems like he can talk, too.
Dialogue: See? Everything's okay. And it seems like he can talk, too.

Original: Kimahri:Kimahri is happy if Yuna is safe.
Dialogue: Kimahri is happy if Yuna is safe.
trans: 如果 Yuna 安全，Kimahri 会很高兴。

Original: Sazh:"Happy"? What're you gonna do then?
Dialogue: "Happy"? What're you gonna do then?

Original: Cait Sith:He's standing on two legs...
Dialogue: He's standing on two legs...

Original: Cait Sith:Gee... There are so many different types of folk across the worlds.
Dialogue: Gee... There are so many different types of folk across the worlds.
trans: 哎呀……世界上有这么多不同类型的人。

Original: Cait Sith:Now that I think about it, though, I guess Freya and Y'shtola do, too...
Dialogue: Now that I think about it, though, I guess Freya and Y'shtola do, too...
trans: 不过，现在我想起来了，我猜 Freya 和 Y'shtola 也是……

Original: Jecht:Says the fortune-telling machine I ain't never seen the likes of.
Dialogue: Says the fortune-telling machine I ain't never seen the likes of.
trans: 我从来没有见过这样的算命机器。

Original: Cait Sith:Ahaha! Good point. But I'm custom-made!
Dialogue: Ahaha! Good point. But I'm custom-made!

Original: Cait Sith:What? Yipes! We've got company!
Dialogue: What? Yipes! We've got company!

Original: Kimahri:Kimahri tracking. Protect Yuna.
Dialogue: Kimahri tracking. Protect Yuna.

Original: Auron:Yuna wouldn't let someone fight alone while she escapes.
Dialogue: Yuna wouldn't let someone fight alone while she escapes.
trans: 尤娜不会让别人在逃跑的时候单打独斗。

Original: Kimahri:New world with new enemies. Kimahri not know what will happen.
Dialogue: New world with new enemies. Kimahri not know what will happen.

Original: Auron:You've done well. But now we're here to help.
Dialogue: You've done well. But now we're here to help.

Original: Jecht:Let's not make this complicated. We just need to bring 'em down!
Dialogue: Let's not make this complicated. We just need to bring 'em down!
trans: 让我们不要让这变得复杂。

Original: Sazh:Let's do this!
Dialogue: Let's do this!

Original: Cait Sith:A friend of a friend is still a friend! Let's go!
Dialogue: A friend of a friend is still a friend! Let's go!

Original: Kimahri:Separated from Yuna. Kimahri at fault.
Dialogue: Separated from Yuna. Kimahri at fault.

Original: Yuna:Don't worry, Kimahri. I'm happy to see you safe.
Dialogue: Don't worry, Kimahri. I'm happy to see you safe.

Original: Cid:If you're on our side, why didn't you say something when we met!?
Dialogue: If you're on our side, why didn't you say something when we met!?
trans: 如果你站在我们这边，为什么我们见面时你不说些什么！？

Original: Cid:We wasted a lot of time trying to get a word out of you!
Dialogue: We wasted a lot of time trying to get a word out of you!
trans: 我们浪费了很多时间试图从你那里得到一句话！

Original: Kimahri:Kimahri know not if friend.
Dialogue: Kimahri know not if friend.
trans: Kimahri 不知道是不是朋友。

Original: Kimahri:Kimahri is Yuna's guardian.
Dialogue: Kimahri is Yuna's guardian.
trans: Kimahri 是 Yuna 的监护人。

Original: Cid:Gah! You're too hard-headed for me!
Dialogue: Gah! You're too hard-headed for me!

Original: Fang:It makes sense to me. I don't see a problem.
Dialogue: It makes sense to me. I don't see a problem.

Original: Yuna:Kimahri is just like this...
Dialogue: Kimahri is just like this...

Original: Yuna:He often gets hurt or worried because of me.
Dialogue: He often gets hurt or worried because of me.
trans: 他经常因为我而受伤或担心。

Original: Fang:Sounds like a trustworthy ally.
Dialogue: Sounds like a trustworthy ally.
trans: 听起来像是一个值得信赖的盟友。

Original: Firion:Being able to protect what you want until the end isn't an easy thing...
Dialogue: Being able to protect what you want until the end isn't an easy thing...
trans: 能够将自己想要的东西守护到最后，并不是一件容易的事情……

Original: Warrior of Light:Indeed. It takes courage and a strong will.
Dialogue: Indeed. It takes courage and a strong will.

Original: Cid:Yeah, well, would it kill him to be a bit more sociable? Bah, but that's all in the past now.
Dialogue: Yeah, well, would it kill him to be a bit more sociable? Bah, but that's all in the past now.
trans: 是啊，好吧，变得更善于交际会要了他的命吗？

Original: Kimahri:Kimahri protect Yuna.
Dialogue: Kimahri protect Yuna.

Original: Kimahri:Kimahri practice sociable if sociable protect Yuna.
Dialogue: Kimahri practice sociable if sociable protect Yuna.
trans: Kimahri 练习善于交际，如果善于交际保护尤娜。

Original: Cid:I didn't say that!
Dialogue: I didn't say that!

Original: Yuna:Hehe. No matter where Kimahri goes, he never changes.
Dialogue: Hehe. No matter where Kimahri goes, he never changes.

Original: Firion:You seem like good friends.
Dialogue: You seem like good friends.

Original: Yuna:We've been together since I was little. He's always protected me.
Dialogue: We've been together since I was little. He's always protected me.

Original: Fang:Then you're like family. If you're together for so long, I can imagine him getting overprotective.
Dialogue: Then you're like family. If you're together for so long, I can imagine him getting overprotective.

Original: Kimahri:Yuna try to do all alone, so Kimahri protect.
Dialogue: Yuna try to do all alone, so Kimahri protect.
trans: Yuna 尝试独自一人，让 Kimahri 保护。

Original: Warrior of Light:He has a will to protect his friends, and he's not the only one.
Dialogue: He has a will to protect his friends, and he's not the only one.
trans: 他有保护朋友的意愿，而且他不是唯一一个。

Original: Warrior of Light:We also wish to do the same. Shall we fight together?
Dialogue: We also wish to do the same. Shall we fight together?

Original: Kimahri:...Kimahri glad Yuna travel with good friends.
Dialogue: ...Kimahri glad Yuna travel with good friends.
trans: ...Kimahri 很高兴 Yuna 和好朋友一起旅行。

Original: Fang:I sure feel at ease having you around.
Dialogue: I sure feel at ease having you around.
trans: 有你在身边，我真的很安心。

Original: Kimahri:Protect Yuna. World matters not.
Dialogue: Protect Yuna. World matters not.

Original: Tidus:Hey, Kimahri. I see you made it here, too.
Dialogue: Hey, Kimahri. I see you made it here, too.

Original: Kimahri:...Kimahri does not understand many things.
Dialogue: ...Kimahri does not understand many things.

Original: Kimahri:This world. What gods want. Why Kimahri and others called.
Dialogue: This world. What gods want. Why Kimahri and others called.

Original: Tidus:Don't worry about it, Kimahri. We all feel the same, so lighten up.
Dialogue: Don't worry about it, Kimahri. We all feel the same, so lighten up.

Original: Tidus:If you keep thinking so hard, your face will get stuck like that.
Dialogue: If you keep thinking so hard, your face will get stuck like that.
trans: 如果你一直这么苦思冥想，你的脸就会卡成那样。

Original: Tidus:Come on. You'll make Yuna worry. Did you practice smiling?
Dialogue: Come on. You'll make Yuna worry. Did you practice smiling?

Original: Kimahri:Kimahri practice.
Dialogue: Kimahri practice.

Original: Tidus:Then show me what you got.
Dialogue: Then show me what you got.
trans: 然后告诉我你得到了什么。

Original: Tidus:It's still a little stiff. You're going to have to do better than that.
Dialogue: It's still a little stiff. You're going to have to do better than that.

Original: Palom:Hey, Kimahri! Are you practicing smiling? Sounds weird! Let me see!
Dialogue: Hey, Kimahri! Are you practicing smiling? Sounds weird! Let me see!

Original: Edge:...Does this mean Tidus and the others come from a world where people don't smile from the heart?
Dialogue: ...Does this mean Tidus and the others come from a world where people don't smile from the heart?
trans: ……也就是说提达斯他们来自一个不会发自内心微笑的世界吗？

Original: Fujin:PRACTICE. DIFFICULT.
Dialogue: PRACTICE. DIFFICULT.

Original: Edge:...Sure looks like it.
Dialogue: ...Sure looks like it.

Original: Palom:Err... Aren't you all thinking about it too hard?
Dialogue: Err... Aren't you all thinking about it too hard?
trans: 呃……你们是不是都想多了？

Original: Shantotto:The little one is right! A smile won't come when thinking with all your might!
Dialogue: The little one is right! A smile won't come when thinking with all your might!

Original: Kimahri:Shantotto always think when smile.
Dialogue: Shantotto always think when smile.
trans: Shantotto 总是在微笑时思考。

Original: Kimahri:But Shantotto's smile is real smile.
Dialogue: But Shantotto's smile is real smile.
trans: 但Shantotto的笑容是真正的笑容。

Original: Kimahri:Kimahri practice. Learn from Shantotto.
Dialogue: Kimahri practice. Learn from Shantotto.

Original: Shantotto:Hmm... A commendable resolve! Under my tutelage, your smile's sure to evolve!
Dialogue: Hmm... A commendable resolve! Under my tutelage, your smile's sure to evolve!

Original: Palom:I'll try, too! Ohohohoho!
Dialogue: I'll try, too! Ohohohoho!

Original: Tidus:Kimahri... Do me a favor and don't laugh like Shantotto.
Dialogue: Kimahri... Do me a favor and don't laugh like Shantotto.
trans: Kimahri... 帮我一个忙，别像 Shantotto 那样笑。

Original: Kimahri:Kimahri not learn laugh...
Dialogue: Kimahri not learn laugh...

Original: Kimahri:Kimahri learn feeling of laugh. Then Kimahri make true smile someday.
Dialogue: Kimahri learn feeling of laugh. Then Kimahri make true smile someday.

Original: Edge:Good. Because I'd hate to hear anyone else laughing like that...
Dialogue: Good. Because I'd hate to hear anyone else laughing like that...

Original: Eiko:Oh no! Your horn is broken!
Dialogue: Oh no! Your horn is broken!

Original: Kimahri:Kimahri horn broken long time ago.
Dialogue: Kimahri horn broken long time ago.
trans: Kimahri 号角很久以前就坏了。

Original: Kimahri:Broken horn symbol of strong Kimahri.
Dialogue: Broken horn symbol of strong Kimahri.
trans: 强壮的 Kimahri 的破角象征。

Original: Eiko:So it doesn't hurt? That's good.
Dialogue: So it doesn't hurt? That's good.

Original: Eiko:My horn is great, too!
Dialogue: My horn is great, too!

Original: Krile:So summoners have horns in other worlds, too?
Dialogue: So summoners have horns in other worlds, too?

Original: Eiko:But Kimahri's not a summoner. I can tell when we fight!
Dialogue: But Kimahri's not a summoner. I can tell when we fight!
trans: 但 Kimahri 不是召唤师。

Original: Krile:You're not a summoner, Kimahri?
Dialogue: You're not a summoner, Kimahri?

Original: Eiko:Isn't it tough having a broken horn?
Dialogue: Isn't it tough having a broken horn?
trans: 喇叭坏了是不是很难受？

Original: Kimahri:Broken or not broken, Kimahri proud of horn.
Dialogue: Broken or not broken, Kimahri proud of horn.

Original: Eiko:I see... Yeah, I get it!
Dialogue: I see... Yeah, I get it!
trans: 我明白了……是的，我明白了！

Original: Eiko:I'm proud of my horn, too!
Dialogue: I'm proud of my horn, too!
trans: 我也为我的喇叭感到骄傲！

Original: Kimahri:But horn is not Kimahri. Kimahri still proud with no horn.
Dialogue: But horn is not Kimahri. Kimahri still proud with no horn.

Original: Kimahri:Kimahri have pride as Ronso.
Dialogue: Kimahri have pride as Ronso.

Original: Eiko:Yeah. Even though Zidane doesn't have a horn, he's super strong and reliable!
Dialogue: Yeah. Even though Zidane doesn't have a horn, he's super strong and reliable!

Original: Kimahri:Friends with horns or no horns...
Dialogue: Friends with horns or no horns...

Original: Kimahri:All have pride and determination. Kimahri think everyone reliable.
Dialogue: All have pride and determination. Kimahri think everyone reliable.

Original: Leon:What is the matter, Locke?
Dialogue: What is the matter, Locke?

Original: Locke:I was just thinking about how incredible Kimahri is.
Dialogue: I was just thinking about how incredible Kimahri is.
trans: 我只是在想 Kimahri 是多么不可思议。

Original: Leon:Has he inspired you to grow a horn, too?
Dialogue: Has he inspired you to grow a horn, too?
trans: 他有没有启发你也长出号角？

Original: Locke:Not quite...
Dialogue: Not quite...

Original: Locke:He said he's proud of his horn...
Dialogue: He said he's proud of his horn...
trans: 他说他为自己的号角感到骄傲...

Original: Krile:But still proud even without it?
Dialogue: But still proud even without it?
trans: 但即使没有它仍然感到自豪？

Original: Locke:Having pride isn't easy.
Dialogue: Having pride isn't easy.

Original: Locke:If that pride is broken, you can lose yourself...
Dialogue: If that pride is broken, you can lose yourself...
trans: 如果自尊心被打破，你就会迷失自我……

Original: Leon:...That might be true. You can no longer believe in what you used to believe in...
Dialogue: ...That might be true. You can no longer believe in what you used to believe in...

Original: Locke:That's why I think he's incredible. He had pride in his horn.
Dialogue: That's why I think he's incredible. He had pride in his horn.
trans: 这就是为什么我认为他不可思议。

Original: Locke:But even though that's been broken...
Dialogue: But even though that's been broken...

Original: Krile:He hasn't lost his pride. He keeps believing and fighting...
Dialogue: He hasn't lost his pride. He keeps believing and fighting...

Original: Locke:Yeah. He didn't lose himself.
Dialogue: Yeah. He didn't lose himself.

Original: Kimahri:Kimahri happy. Friends from other worlds accept Kimahri.
Dialogue: Kimahri happy. Friends from other worlds accept Kimahri.

Original: Kimahri:Thank you.
Dialogue: Thank you.

Original: Chocobo:Kweh! Kweh, kweh!
Dialogue: Kweh! Kweh, kweh!

Original: Terra:That's a good chocobo.
Dialogue: That's a good chocobo.
trans: 那是一只很好的陆行鸟。

Original: Firion:Looking at this almost makes me forget we're in the midst of a battle.
Dialogue: Looking at this almost makes me forget we're in the midst of a battle.
trans: 看着这个几乎让我忘记我们正处于战斗之中。

Original: Layle:Playing around is fine, but try not to ruffle their feathers!
Dialogue: Playing around is fine, but try not to ruffle their feathers!
trans: 到处玩耍很好，但尽量不要激怒他们！

Original: Firion:Wh-what is this trembling!?
Dialogue: Wh-what is this trembling!?

Original: Mog:I've detected powerful magic coming from over there, kupo!
Dialogue: I've detected powerful magic coming from over there, kupo!
trans: 库波，我侦测到来自那边的强大魔法！

Original: Mog:I've got a bad feeling about this! We should go check it out, kupo!
Dialogue: I've got a bad feeling about this! We should go check it out, kupo!

Original: The Emperor:Insufficient... This simply won't do...
Dialogue: Insufficient... This simply won't do...

Original: The Emperor:I need more power to see my ambitions through...
Dialogue: I need more power to see my ambitions through...
trans: 我需要更多的力量来实现我的抱负……

Original: Firion:The Emperor!
Dialogue: The Emperor!

Original: The Emperor:Ah, the worms have come crawling.
Dialogue: Ah, the worms have come crawling.

Original: Layle:Did you just take out some monsters? Weren't they your subordinates?
Dialogue: Did you just take out some monsters? Weren't they your subordinates?
trans: 你刚刚消灭了一些怪物吗？

Original: Terra:Don't tell me you also mean to destroy all life...!?
Dialogue: Don't tell me you also mean to destroy all life...!?
trans: 难道你也有毁灭所有生命的意思……！？

Original: The Emperor:They have offered their magic energies up to me. A far more significant purpose than meaningless destruction.
Dialogue: They have offered their magic energies up to me. A far more significant purpose than meaningless destruction.
trans: 他们向我提供了他们的魔法能量。

Original: The Emperor:It will become a part of my new castle...
Dialogue: It will become a part of my new castle...
trans: 它将成为我新城堡的一部分……

Original: Layle:That didn't turn out so wellbefore. And now you're trying to make a new one?
Dialogue: That didn't turn out so well before. And now you're trying to make a new one?

Original: Layle:I'd almost think you're being vindictive...but really you've just got a lot of time on your hands, huh?
Dialogue: I'd almost think you're being vindictive...but really you've just got a lot of time on your hands, huh?
trans: 我差点以为你是在报复...但实际上你手头上有很多时间，是吧？

Original: Firion:Emperor! We won't let you do as you please!
Dialogue: Emperor! We won't let you do as you please!

Original: Firion:We'll stop you here! Let's go!
Dialogue: We'll stop you here! Let's go!

Original: Layle:Leave it to me!
Dialogue: Leave it to me!

Original: The Emperor:The girl born with magic powers and the man imbued with the power of the crystal...
