trans: 尽管如此，我们仍然可以保持谨慎。

Original: Edge:You have a ninja of unequaled skill by your side, after all. Spying is what I do best.
Dialogue: You have a ninja of unequaled skill by your side, after all. Spying is what I do best.
trans: 毕竟，你身边有一位技能无与伦比的忍者。

Original: Thancred:Many thanks.
Dialogue: Many thanks.

Original: Alphinaud:If I may, could I ask your opinions on a certain matter?
Dialogue: If I may, could I ask your opinions on a certain matter?
trans: 如果可以，我可以就某件事征求你的意见吗？

Original: Hope:Of course. What's up?
Dialogue: Of course. What's up?

Original: Alphinaud:I am curious to know everyone's thoughts on Kam'lanaut's motivations.
Dialogue: I am curious to know everyone's thoughts on Kam'lanaut's motivations.
trans: 我很想知道每个人对 Kam'lanaut 动机的看法。

Original: Cait Sith:It's hard to have any thoughts at the moment. We've only known him for a bit. I think we should wait and see.
Dialogue: It's hard to have any thoughts at the moment. We've only known him for a bit. I think we should wait and see.

Original: Paine:He can do what he wants. But if he gets in our way, then I'll take him down.
Dialogue: He can do what he wants. But if he gets in our way, then I'll take him down.

Original: Hope:No way I'd be able to trust him completely. I wouldn't be surprised if he attacked us sooner rather than later.
Dialogue: No way I'd be able to trust him completely. I wouldn't be surprised if he attacked us sooner rather than later.

Original: Ashe:It's useless to try and understand what drives him. We are simply too different.
Dialogue: It's useless to try and understand what drives him. We are simply too different.
trans: 试图理解是什么驱使他是没有用的。

Original: Alphinaud:It is as I thought... It appears we all view the issue differently.
Dialogue: It is as I thought... It appears we all view the issue differently.
trans: 和我想的一样……看来我们对这个问题的看法都不一样。

Original: Alphinaud:Too differently to say there is any general consensus among us, in fact.
Dialogue: Too differently to say there is any general consensus among us, in fact.
trans: 事实上，我们之间很难说有任何普遍共识。

Original: Alphinaud:Regardless, I believe we can all agree that Kam'lanaut's goals in this world are elusive at best.
Dialogue: Regardless, I believe we can all agree that Kam'lanaut's goals in this world are elusive at best.
trans: 无论如何，我相信我们都同意 Kam'lanaut 在这个世界上的目标充其量是难以捉摸的。

Original: Cait Sith:Well, he's one of Spiritus's warriors. Even if we told him to get lost, we'd only be putting out a fire with gasoline.
Dialogue: Well, he's one of Spiritus's warriors. Even if we told him to get lost, we'd only be putting out a fire with gasoline.
trans: 好吧，他是 Spiritus 的战士之一。

Original: Alphinaud:Indeed. 'Twould afford neither us nor him any benefit.
Dialogue: Indeed. 'Twould afford neither us nor him any benefit.

Original: Hope:He's at least putting in an effort to seem like an ally. It's only understandable that he can't cut ties to his old world completely.
Dialogue: He's at least putting in an effort to seem like an ally. It's only understandable that he can't cut ties to his old world completely.
trans: 他至少在努力让自己看起来像个盟友。

Original: Alphinaud:Of course. However, I cannot shake the feeling that there is something we have overlooked. We must needs take a different perspective on the matter.
Dialogue: Of course. However, I cannot shake the feeling that there is something we have overlooked. We must needs take a different perspective on the matter.

Original: Alphinaud:Dimensional coordinates permit Spiritus's warriors to grasp our strength, but we have no means to gauge theirs. This puts us at a distinct disadvantage.
Dialogue: Dimensional coordinates permit Spiritus's warriors to grasp our strength, but we have no means to gauge theirs. This puts us at a distinct disadvantage.
trans: 次元坐标允许 Spiritus 的战士掌握我们的力量，但我们无法衡量他们的力量。

Original: Alphinaud:I have pondered how exactly to make up for this shortcoming, but I am afraid our options are somewhat limited.
Dialogue: I have pondered how exactly to make up for this shortcoming, but I am afraid our options are somewhat limited.
trans: 我一直在琢磨到底要怎么弥补这个缺点，但恐怕我们的选择有些局限。

Original: Alphinaud:That being said, I have not exactly been treating the matter as urgent.
Dialogue: That being said, I have not exactly been treating the matter as urgent.
trans: 话虽这么说，我并没有完全将此事视为紧急情况。

Original: Paine:And...? So what are you planning?
Dialogue: And...? So what are you planning?

Original: Alphinaud:I am of a mind to agree with Lyse, Sabin, and the others who would show a willingness to reconcile our differences.
Dialogue: I am of a mind to agree with Lyse, Sabin, and the others who would show a willingness to reconcile our differences.
trans: 我同意 Lyse、Sabin 和其他愿意调和我们分歧的人的观点。

Original: Alphinaud:However, we must proceed with caution.
Dialogue: However, we must proceed with caution.
trans: 但是，我们必须谨慎行事。

Original: Alphinaud:There is a wealth of experience among usexperience which we can use to our advantage.
Dialogue: There is a wealth of experience among us—experience which we can use to our advantage.
trans: 我们中间有丰富的经验——我们可以利用的经验。

Original: Alphinaud:Should Kam'lanaut and the others act in rashness or violence, we must be prepared to react in kind.
Dialogue: Should Kam'lanaut and the others act in rashness or violence, we must be prepared to react in kind.
trans: 如果 Kam'lanaut 和其他人行事鲁莽或暴力，我们必须准备好以牙还牙。

Original: Alphinaud:And we should prepare now, ere our reservations are justified.
Dialogue: And we should prepare now, ere our reservations are justified.
trans: 我们现在就应该做好准备，否则我们的保留是合理的。

Original: Cait Sith:It's hard to disagree with that. Leave the prep to me. Working in the shadows is what I do best.
Dialogue: It's hard to disagree with that. Leave the prep to me. Working in the shadows is what I do best.

Original: Hope:That's not a bad approach. We can be friendly without leaving ourselves open to trickery.
Dialogue: That's not a bad approach. We can be friendly without leaving ourselves open to trickery.

Original: Ashe:A delicate task, but one I shall help with in any way I can.
Dialogue: A delicate task, but one I shall help with in any way I can.
trans: 这是一项棘手的任务，但我会尽我所能帮助完成。

Original: Paine:I know a summoner who might just fit the buddy-buddy bill, too.
Dialogue: I know a summoner who might just fit the buddy-buddy bill, too.
trans: 我认识一个召唤师，他可能也正好符合好友的要求。

Original: Alphinaud:Thank you, everyone.
Dialogue: Thank you, everyone.

Original: Materia:That is correct.
Dialogue: That is correct.

Original: Materia:And I wish for you to fight as one of my warriors.
Dialogue: And I wish for you to fight as one of my warriors.
trans: 我希望你能作为我的战士之一而战。

Original: Ciaran:Fight? But I already have work to do...
Dialogue: Fight? But I already have work to do...

Original: Materia:You possess a strong will.
Dialogue: You possess a strong will.

Original: Materia:You held fast to your memories on your long journey. We need that will.
Dialogue: You held fast to your memories on your long journey. We need that will.
trans: 在漫长的旅途中，你紧紧抓住自己的记忆。

Original: Ciaran:There are lots of strong people out there. Does it have to be me?
Dialogue: There are lots of strong people out there. Does it have to be me?

Original: Materia:...The crystal guided you to me.
Dialogue: ...The crystal guided you to me.

Original: Ciaran:The crystal...?
Dialogue: The crystal...?

Original: Materia:A different one from that in your world. It is one that wishes for the warriors' respite.
Dialogue: A different one from that in your world. It is one that wishes for the warriors' respite.
trans: 一个与你的世界不同的人。

Original: Materia:We, the gods, created this world as a land of respite...
Dialogue: We, the gods, created this world as a land of respite...
trans: 我们，众神，创造了这个世界作为一个喘息之地……

Original: Materia:It was once a place where battle-weary warriors from other worlds could rest.
Dialogue: It was once a place where battle-weary warriors from other worlds could rest.
trans: 这里曾经是异界厌战战士休息的地方。

Original: Materia:I took away their tragic memories to give them peace of mind.
Dialogue: I took away their tragic memories to give them peace of mind.
trans: 我带走了他们悲惨的记忆，让他们安心。

Original: Ciaran:You took away...their memories?
Dialogue: You took away...their memories?

Original: Materia:I once thought depriving them of such painful memories would bring them tranquility.
Dialogue: I once thought depriving them of such painful memories would bring them tranquility.
trans: 我曾以为，剥夺他们痛苦的记忆，会给他们带来平静。

Original: Materia:But reality was different. They now seek those lost memories.
Dialogue: But reality was different. They now seek those lost memories.

Original: Materia:They claim that, no matter how painful those memories are, they are what strengthen their wills.
Dialogue: They claim that, no matter how painful those memories are, they are what strengthen their wills.
trans: 他们声称，无论那些记忆多么痛苦，它们都会增强他们的意志。

Original: Ciaran:...I feel the same way. You were mistaken, Materia.
Dialogue: ...I feel the same way. You were mistaken, Materia.

Original: Materia:I couldn't understand... But I regret what I did.
Dialogue: I couldn't understand... But I regret what I did.
trans: 我无法理解……但我对我的所作所为感到后悔。

Original: Ciaran:You can't hold on to all of your memories. Some spill out here and there.
Dialogue: You can't hold on to all of your memories. Some spill out here and there.
trans: 你无法保留所有的记忆。

Original: Ciaran:But having them stolen is...sad.
Dialogue: But having them stolen is...sad.
trans: 但是让它们被盗是……可悲的。

Original: Materia:This world is no longer one of respite. It is being threatened by monsters and those harboring ill will.
Dialogue: This world is no longer one of respite. It is being threatened by monsters and those harboring ill will.
trans: 这个世界不再是一个喘息的地方。

Original: Materia:Please, lend us your strength.
Dialogue: Please, lend us your strength.
trans: 请把你的力量借给我们。

Original: Materia:Your journey has been unlike the others.
Dialogue: Your journey has been unlike the others.
trans: 你的旅程与其他人不同。

Original: Materia:Those experiences will be a new guiding light to my warriors.
Dialogue: Those experiences will be a new guiding light to my warriors.
trans: 这些经历将成为我的战士们的新指路明灯。

Original: Ciaran:Alright. I'll give it my best shot.
Dialogue: Alright. I'll give it my best shot.

Original: Ciaran:I'm nothing like those heroes that appear in tales, so there might not be much that I can do...
Dialogue: I'm nothing like those heroes that appear in tales, so there might not be much that I can do...
trans: 我和传说中出现的那些英雄完全不同，所以我能做的可能不多……

Original: Ciaran:But this is a journey of hope for the future?
Dialogue: But this is a journey of hope for the future?
trans: 但这是对未来充满希望的旅程吗？

Original: Ciaran:If that's what they're traveling for, then I hope I can help them.
Dialogue: If that's what they're traveling for, then I hope I can help them.
trans: 如果这就是他们旅行的目的，那么我希望我能帮助他们。

Original: Mog:Kupo! I sense a new friend over that way!
Dialogue: Kupo! I sense a new friend over that way!

Original: Ciaran:Hey there!
Dialogue: Hey there!

Original: Ciaran:Thanks for finding me. I thought I was lost.
Dialogue: Thanks for finding me. I thought I was lost.

Original: Warrior of Light:Are you one of Materia's warriors, too?
Dialogue: Are you one of Materia's warriors, too?

Original: Ciaran:Seems that way.
Dialogue: Seems that way.

Original: Ciaran:My name's Ciaran. Materia told me to come here.
Dialogue: My name's Ciaran. Materia told me to come here.

Original: Chelinka:I think you're right, Yuri.
Dialogue: I think you're right, Yuri.

Original: Layle:So we're the same tribe. He doesn't look like a bad guy to me.
Dialogue: So we're the same tribe. He doesn't look like a bad guy to me.
trans: 所以我们是同一个部落。

Original: Rem:A friend of yours?
Dialogue: A friend of yours?

Original: Yuri:No. But he might come from a similar world to ours.
Dialogue: No. But he might come from a similar world to ours.
trans: 不，但他可能来自与我们相似的世界。

Original: Layle:Just like me and these twins here. Our worlds have some tribes in common.
Dialogue: Just like me and these twins here. Our worlds have some tribes in common.
trans: 就像我和这里的这对双胞胎一样。

Original: Ciaran:So you're also Clavats. What a relief... I thought I'd be the only one.
Dialogue: So you're also Clavats. What a relief... I thought I'd be the only one.

Original: Yuri:Maybe from our past or our future...somewhere in the infinite possibilities, no doubt you're out there somewhere.
Dialogue: Maybe from our past or our future...somewhere in the infinite possibilities, no doubt you're out there somewhere.
trans: 也许来自我们的过去或我们的未来......在无限可能性的某个地方，毫无疑问你就在那里。

Original: Rem:Just hearing "Clavats" is enough to put your mind at ease?
Dialogue: Just hearing "Clavats" is enough to put your mind at ease?
trans: 仅仅听到“Clavats”就足以让您心安理得了吗？

Original: Chelinka:As the tribes go, Clavats are said to have very peaceful temperaments.
Dialogue: As the tribes go, Clavats are said to have very peaceful temperaments.
trans: 随着部落的发展，据说 Clavats 的性情非常平和。

Original: Yuri:We're often called the tribe of unity and friendship.
Dialogue: We're often called the tribe of unity and friendship.
trans: 我们经常被称为团结和友谊的部落。

Original: Sazh:No kidding. That apply to you, too?
Dialogue: No kidding. That apply to you, too?

Original: Layle:Can't say. I'm just one Clavat.
Dialogue: Can't say. I'm just one Clavat.

Original: Layle:There are plenty of argumentative ones, short-tempered ones...
Dialogue: There are plenty of argumentative ones, short-tempered ones...
trans: 有很多好争论的，脾气暴躁的...

Original: Yuri:Right. Rather than focusing on tribes, it's more important to look at the way we each live our lives.
Dialogue: Right. Rather than focusing on tribes, it's more important to look at the way we each live our lives.

Original: Chelinka:There are bad Clavats out there, and lots of kind and warmhearted people from other tribes.
Dialogue: There are bad Clavats out there, and lots of kind and warmhearted people from other tribes.
trans: 那里有坏 Clavats，还有许多来自其他部落的善良热心的人。

Original: Layle:Exactly. And you can usually tell just by looking if a Clavat is up to no good. And he doesn't look it at all.
Dialogue: Exactly. And you can usually tell just by looking if a Clavat is up to no good. And he doesn't look it at all.

Original: Yuri:If anything, he's got good-guy vibes just gushing outta everywhere!
Dialogue: If anything, he's got good-guy vibes just gushing outta everywhere!
trans: 如果说有什么不同的话，那就是他处处散发着好人的气息！

Original: Chelinka:I know what you want to say, Yuri, but pick your words better...
Dialogue: I know what you want to say, Yuri, but pick your words better...
trans: 我知道你想说什么，尤里，但你要更好地选择你的话......

Original: Warrior of Light:Very well. We believe you. Let us fight together to save the future.
Dialogue: Very well. We believe you. Let us fight together to save the future.

Original: Ciaran:Oh, um... Gotcha, so it is that kind of journey.
Dialogue: Oh, um... Gotcha, so it is that kind of journey.
trans: 哦，嗯...明白了，这就是那种旅程。

Original: Ciaran:It might be some time until I get the hang of things. I'll take it slow for now.
Dialogue: It might be some time until I get the hang of things. I'll take it slow for now.
trans: 我可能需要一段时间才能掌握一切。

Original: Sazh:Easy-going fella.
Dialogue: Easy-going fella.

Original: Rem:Hehe. But it's good to have someone like that around.
Dialogue: Hehe. But it's good to have someone like that around.

Original: Warrior of Light:Indeed. I can tell that there is a comforting warmth about you.
Dialogue: Indeed. I can tell that there is a comforting warmth about you.

Original: Layle:You seem pretty skilled. You must have plenty of experience under your belt.
Dialogue: You seem pretty skilled. You must have plenty of experience under your belt.

Original: Ciaran:I don't know... I've spent some time on the road, but I don't know if that makes me "skilled."
Dialogue: I don't know... I've spent some time on the road, but I don't know if that makes me "skilled."
trans: 我不知道......我在路上花了一些时间，但我不知道那是否让我“熟练”。

Original: Ciaran:Still, I'll do what I can. It's a pleasure to meet you all.
Dialogue: Still, I'll do what I can. It's a pleasure to meet you all.

Original: Yuri:Great! Welcome to the team!
Dialogue: Great! Welcome to the team!

Original: Sazh:I can't believe Materia's dragging more kids into this fight.
Dialogue: I can't believe Materia's dragging more kids into this fight.
trans: 我无法相信 Materia 会把更多的孩子拖入这场战斗。

Original: Layle:Kid? He's older than me.
Dialogue: Kid? He's older than me.

Original: Sazh:Geez, my bad. I thought I could tell, but I guess it's different in other worlds.
Dialogue: Geez, my bad. I thought I could tell, but I guess it's different in other worlds.

Original: Ciaran:Don't worry about it. There are lots of things I don't understand, either.
Dialogue: Don't worry about it. There are lots of things I don't understand, either.

Original: Ciaran:I hope you'll all take your time telling me about yourselves, too.
Dialogue: I hope you'll all take your time telling me about yourselves, too.
trans: 我希望你们也都花时间告诉我关于你们自己的事。

Original: Cecil:What did you hear from Materia, Ciaran?
Dialogue: What did you hear from Materia, Ciaran?
trans: 你从 Materia 那里听到了什么，Ciaran？

Original: Ciaran:Why do you ask?
Dialogue: Why do you ask?

Original: Cecil:We are warriors that were summoned by Materia, but we no longer move according to her orders.
Dialogue: We are warriors that were summoned by Materia, but we no longer move according to her orders.
trans: 我们是被魔石召唤出来的战士，却不再按照她的命令行动。

Original: Cecil:Her way of thinking and ours are somewhat different, so we want to know what's on her mind.
Dialogue: Her way of thinking and ours are somewhat different, so we want to know what's on her mind.
trans: 她的思维方式和我们有些不同，所以我们想知道她在想什么。

Original: Ciaran:I heard that you're confronting the memories that you lost.
Dialogue: I heard that you're confronting the memories that you lost.
trans: 我听说你正在面对你失去的记忆。

Original: Tidus:We forgot a lot of important things, so we're trying to get them back.
Dialogue: We forgot a lot of important things, so we're trying to get them back.
trans: 我们忘记了很多重要的事情，所以我们正在努力找回它们。

Original: Ace:...Those who've forgotten can't even discern what they've lost.
Dialogue: ...Those who've forgotten can't even discern what they've lost.
trans: ……忘记的人甚至无法辨别自己失去了什么。

Original: Ashe:...Yes. I...may not have all my memories either.
Dialogue: ...Yes. I...may not have all my memories either.

Original: Vivi:It's sad to think of forgetting something, so we're taking our memories back little by little.
Dialogue: It's sad to think of forgetting something, so we're taking our memories back little by little.
trans: 想到忘记一些东西是很难过的，所以我们正在一点一点地找回我们的记忆。

Original: Ciaran:I see... Hmm...
Dialogue: I see... Hmm...

Original: Ciaran:It seemed like a part of Materia was afraid of you facing your memories.
Dialogue: It seemed like a part of Materia was afraid of you facing your memories.
trans: 似乎 Materia 的一部分害怕你面对你的记忆。

Original: Ciaran:She seemed unsure if losing them was a bad thing, or if those painful memories would weigh you down too much.
Dialogue: She seemed unsure if losing them was a bad thing, or if those painful memories would weigh you down too much.
trans: 她似乎不确定失去他们是不是一件坏事，或者那些痛苦的回忆是否会让你承受太多。

Original: Ciaran:I think I was chosen because of that.
Dialogue: I think I was chosen because of that.
trans: 我想我是因为那个而被选中的。

Original: Vivi:Really? Why?
Dialogue: Really? Why?

Original: Ciaran:There were beings in my world who ate memories.
Dialogue: There were beings in my world who ate memories.
trans: 我的世界里有吞噬记忆的生物。

Original: Tidus:Ate memories!? That's terrible...
Dialogue: Ate memories!? That's terrible...

Original: Ciaran:...But people eventually forget things, don't they?
Dialogue: ...But people eventually forget things, don't they?
trans: ...但是人们最终会忘记事情，不是吗？

Original: Ciaran:They would feed off of people's fading memories as part of the world's natural cycle.
Dialogue: They would feed off of people's fading memories as part of the world's natural cycle.
trans: 作为世界自然循环的一部分，它们会以人们逐渐消失的记忆为食。

Original: Ciaran:You can't hold onto every single memory. It's natural to forget things.
Dialogue: You can't hold onto every single memory. It's natural to forget things.
trans: 你无法抓住每一个记忆。

Original: Ace:You mean that memories can sometimes be a burden...
Dialogue: You mean that memories can sometimes be a burden...
trans: 你是说回忆有时会成为一种负担...

Original: Ciaran:One of those beings taught me that memories are like a pack we carry into the future.
Dialogue: One of those beings taught me that memories are like a pack we carry into the future.
trans: 其中一个人告诉我，记忆就像我们带往未来的背包。

Original: Ciaran:If it becomes too heavy, it can weigh you down.
Dialogue: If it becomes too heavy, it can weigh you down.
trans: 如果它变得太重，它会让你不堪重负。

Original: Ciaran:If it's too light, your journey will end before you've gained anything.
Dialogue: If it's too light, your journey will end before you've gained anything.
trans: 如果它太轻，您的旅程将在您获得任何东西之前结束。

Original: Ciaran:A traveler's journey into the future nurtures his or her heart, and becomes a source of new life.
Dialogue: A traveler's journey into the future nurtures his or her heart, and becomes a source of new life.
trans: 旅者的未来之旅滋润着心灵，成为新生命的源泉。

Original: Ashe:Memories can be a burden... I wonder if that is the case for me...
Dialogue: Memories can be a burden... I wonder if that is the case for me...
trans: 回忆可能是一种负担……我想知道我是否也是如此……

Original: Cecil:There may come a day when I can also think that way, that it's natural to forget some things...
Dialogue: There may come a day when I can also think that way, that it's natural to forget some things...
trans: 也许有一天我也会那样想，忘记一些事情是很自然的……

Original: Ace:...We believe that forgetting is a divine blessing. That for everyone else, memories are something they dwell on trying not to forget.
Dialogue: ...We believe that forgetting is a divine blessing. That for everyone else, memories are something they dwell on trying not to forget.
trans: ...我们相信遗忘是一种神圣的祝福。

Original: Ciaran:I heard a bit aboutyour worldandyour crystal...
Dialogue: I heard a bit about your world and your crystal...
trans: 我听说过一些关于你的世界和你的水晶的事……

Original: Ciaran:But I can't give you answers. What's right probably depends on the world you're in.
Dialogue: But I can't give you answers. What's right probably depends on the world you're in.

Original: Ciaran:But if you feel warmth from your memories, I think you should cherish them.
Dialogue: But if you feel warmth from your memories, I think you should cherish them.
trans: 但如果你从回忆中感受到温暖，我想你应该珍惜它们。

Original: Ciaran:Even if you forget a lot of things, having warm memories close to your heart is what makes a journey wonderful.
Dialogue: Even if you forget a lot of things, having warm memories close to your heart is what makes a journey wonderful.
trans: 即使您忘记了很多事情，但让温暖的回忆贴近您的心会让旅程变得美好。

Original: Ace:Warm memories...close to my heart...
Dialogue: Warm memories...close to my heart...
trans: 温暖的回忆……靠近我的心……

Original: Ace:I see... Even if the future is uncertain, they'll light the way.
Dialogue: I see... Even if the future is uncertain, they'll light the way.
trans: 我明白了……即使未来不确定，他们也会照亮道路。

Original: Ciaran:No matter what memories you have, you're on a journey with hope for the future, right?
Dialogue: No matter what memories you have, you're on a journey with hope for the future, right?
trans: 不管你有什么回忆，你都在对未来充满希望的旅程，对吧？

Original: Cecil:Right. Without getting caught up in the past...we believe that there is light in the future.
Dialogue: Right. Without getting caught up in the past...we believe that there is light in the future.

Original: Ciaran:Then what's say we get a move on?
Dialogue: Then what's say we get a move on?
trans: 那怎么说我们继续前进？

Original: Ciaran:Even if the light is faint, you'll reach your destination as long as you keep going forward.
Dialogue: Even if the light is faint, you'll reach your destination as long as you keep going forward.
trans: 即使光线微弱，只要一直往前走，就会到达目的地。

Original: Ciaran:Yeah, but it fell a long time ago. All that's left now are ruins.
Dialogue: Yeah, but it fell a long time ago. All that's left now are ruins.
trans: 是的，但很久以前就倒下了。

Original: Ciaran:What I wouldn't give to see it bustling with people of all different tribes.
Dialogue: What I wouldn't give to see it bustling with people of all different tribes.
trans: 我不愿意看到这里挤满了来自不同部落的人们。

Original: Sherlotta:Ohhh, are you guys talking about your homes? Mind if I butt in?
Dialogue: Ohhh, are you guys talking about your homes? Mind if I butt in?
trans: 哦，你们在谈论你们的家吗？

Original: Layle:Me too. Sounds like an interesting conversation.
Dialogue: Me too. Sounds like an interesting conversation.

Original: Ciaran:Of course, the more the merrier. Well...have you guys ever had a striped apple?
Dialogue: Of course, the more the merrier. Well...have you guys ever had a striped apple?

Original: Sherlotta:One of my Lilty friends just loved her tales of glory.
Dialogue: One of my Lilty friends just loved her tales of glory.
trans: 我的一位 Lilty 朋友非常喜欢她讲述的荣耀故事。

Original: Layle:And theSelkieare fleet of foot, while theYukehave heads too large for their bodies. I imagine we all have similar stories.
Dialogue: And the Selkie are fleet of foot, while the Yuke have heads too large for their bodies. I imagine we all have similar stories.
trans: Selkie 的脚很快，而 Yuke 的头对于他们的身体来说太大了。

Original: Ciaran:Haha, you're right. Our worlds really are mirror images of each other, aren't they?
Dialogue: Haha, you're right. Our worlds really are mirror images of each other, aren't they?

Original: Ramza:My apologies, but I cannot help but ask...
Dialogue: My apologies, but I cannot help but ask...
trans: 我很抱歉，但我忍不住要问...

Original: Ramza:Does it not bother you that different worlds share such fundamental similarities?
Dialogue: Does it not bother you that different worlds share such fundamental similarities?
trans: 不同的世界有如此基本的相似之处，你不觉得困扰吗？

Original: Ciaran:Huh? What do you mean?
Dialogue: Huh? What do you mean?

Original: Ciaran:I suppose...a little?
Dialogue: I suppose...a little?

Original: Layle:Yeah...well, if a Yuke or Lilty were here, they'd be making a fuss about it.
Dialogue: Yeah...well, if a Yuke or Lilty were here, they'd be making a fuss about it.
trans: 嗯……好吧，要是有由克或者莉莉蒂在，他们肯定会大吵大闹的。

Original: Sherlotta:"Fuss" is an understatement. A Yuke would set up a whole institution to study and pore over ancient documents to get to the bottom of it.
Dialogue: "Fuss" is an understatement. A Yuke would set up a whole institution to study and pore over ancient documents to get to the bottom of it.
trans: “大惊小怪”是轻描淡写的说法。

Original: Ramza:You seem to be taking it in stride, all things considered.
Dialogue: You seem to be taking it in stride, all things considered.
trans: 考虑到所有因素，你似乎泰然处之。

Original: Yuri:There is more to the world than what we can see in the present. It's filled with limitless possibilities.
Dialogue: There is more to the world than what we can see in the present. It's filled with limitless possibilities.
trans: 世界上有比我们现在能看到的更多的东西。

Original: Ciaran:I mean, if this really were important, then I guess I could come up with a reason to let it bother me...
Dialogue: I mean, if this really were important, then I guess I could come up with a reason to let it bother me...
trans: 我的意思是，如果这真的很重要，那么我想我可以想出一个理由让它困扰我......

Original: Ciaran:But the differences between the worlds that were born by our journeys don't really matter, do they?
Dialogue: But the differences between the worlds that were born by our journeys don't really matter, do they?
trans: 但是我们的旅程所产生的世界之间的差异并不重要，不是吗？

Original: Ramza:Perhaps...personally, the sole fact that the worlds share the same name would bother me.
Dialogue: Perhaps...personally, the sole fact that the worlds share the same name would bother me.
trans: 也许……就个人而言，世界共享同一个名字这一唯一事实会让我感到困扰。

Original: Vaan:Ciaran is right, though. If you think too hard about something you can't understand, then you'll just end up with a headache.
Dialogue: Ciaran is right, though. If you think too hard about something you can't understand, then you'll just end up with a headache.

Original: Ramza:Of course you would say that, Vaan.
Dialogue: Of course you would say that, Vaan.

Original: Mog:It's so hot, kupo!
Dialogue: It's so hot, kupo!

Original: Mog:Kupo? What is it?
Dialogue: Kupo? What is it?

Original: Bartz:Did you spot something?
Dialogue: Did you spot something?

Original: Ciaran:Ah...sorry, it's nothing. That just reminded me of someone from a long time ago.
Dialogue: Ah...sorry, it's nothing. That just reminded me of someone from a long time ago.

Original: Ciaran:He was...sensitive, to say the least.
Dialogue: He was...sensitive, to say the least.
trans: 他很……敏感，至少可以这么说。

Original: Ciaran:When it was hot, he'd say, "It's so hot, kupo!" and, "I'm tired, kupo!" when we're in a hurry. We might've spent more time resting than moving.
Dialogue: When it was hot, he'd say, "It's so hot, kupo!" and, "I'm tired, kupo!" when we're in a hurry. We might've spent more time resting than moving.
trans: 天气热的时候，他会说：“好热啊，库波！”

Original: Serah:I guess Mog isn't the only one who likes to complain about the heat.
Dialogue: I guess Mog isn't the only one who likes to complain about the heat.
trans: 我想 Mog 不是唯一一个喜欢抱怨热的人。

Original: Mog:I wasn't complaining, kupo! Just...making an observation!
Dialogue: I wasn't complaining, kupo! Just...making an observation!

Original: Ciaran:Hah, of course. Anyways, sorry to worry you guys. Sometimes I forget this place is completely different from my home.
Dialogue: Hah, of course. Anyways, sorry to worry you guys. Sometimes I forget this place is completely different from my home.

Original: Zidane:It seems plenty of worlds are filled with moogles, huh? What'd you and yours get up to?
Dialogue: It seems plenty of worlds are filled with moogles, huh? What'd you and yours get up to?
trans: 似乎很多世界都充满了莫古利，是吧？

Original: Ciaran:Right, I guess I forgot to mention the details.
Dialogue: Right, I guess I forgot to mention the details.
trans: 对了，我想我忘了提细节。

Original: Serah:So, you needed thesecrystal chalices, was it?for people to go outside? And you carried them with you?
Dialogue: So, you needed these—crystal chalices, was it?—for people to go outside? And you carried them with you?
trans: 所以，你需要这些——水晶酒杯，是吗？——让人们出门？

Original: Ciaran:Yes. When my friends were up to the task, we would take turns holding the chalice while we traveled.
Dialogue: Yes. When my friends were up to the task, we would take turns holding the chalice while we traveled.

Original: Ciaran:But as I said, sometimes I was forced to travel alone. That was when my moogle friend would help carry the chalice.
Dialogue: But as I said, sometimes I was forced to travel alone. That was when my moogle friend would help carry the chalice.
trans: 但正如我所说，有时我被迫独自旅行。

Original: Ciaran:Every year we would venture forth, then come back with a chalice full of myrrh. Looking back on it, I really enjoyed those trips.
Dialogue: Every year we would venture forth, then come back with a chalice full of myrrh. Looking back on it, I really enjoyed those trips.
trans: 每年我们都会冒险出去，然后带着装满没药的圣杯回来。

Original: Squall:You had to go every year?
Dialogue: You had to go every year?

Original: Ciaran:Yeah, and I think I've been doing it for, oh, more than ten years now.
Dialogue: Yeah, and I think I've been doing it for, oh, more than ten years now.
trans: 是的，我想我已经这样做了，哦，现在已经十多年了。

Original: Bartz:Ten years! Now that's what I call a quest!
Dialogue: Ten years! Now that's what I call a quest!

Original: Serah:Even though you had to carry that chalice with you all the time!?
Dialogue: Even though you had to carry that chalice with you all the time!?
trans: 即使你必须一直随身携带那个圣杯！？

Original: Ciaran:Well, you get used to it after a while. It stopped being a "quest" or a "journey"it was just something I did.
Dialogue: Well, you get used to it after a while. It stopped being a "quest" or a "journey"—it was just something I did.
trans: 好吧，过一段时间你就会习惯了。

Original: Ciaran:Every city had a caravan, and anyone could joinso long as they were young and energetic, that is.
Dialogue: Every city had a caravan, and anyone could join—so long as they were young and energetic, that is.
trans: 每个城市都有商队，任何人都可以加入——只要他们年轻有活力。

Original: Ciaran:Every year we delved further and further into the miasma...
Dialogue: Every year we delved further and further into the miasma...
trans: 每年我们都越来越深入地研究瘴气……

Original: Zidane:And all that took more than ten years, huh? You're barely the same person you were when you started.
Dialogue: And all that took more than ten years, huh? You're barely the same person you were when you started.
trans: 而这一切花了十多年，是吧？

Original: Ciaran:Maybe. Things don't surprise me as much anymore. Comparing my early diary entries to recent ones makes that clear enough.
Dialogue: Maybe. Things don't surprise me as much anymore. Comparing my early diary entries to recent ones makes that clear enough.

Original: Ciaran:And every time I went out into the world, I'd return with some of my memories gone.
Dialogue: And every time I went out into the world, I'd return with some of my memories gone.
trans: 每次我出去到外面的世界，我都会带着一些记忆消失。

Original: Ciaran:Still, I grew from the experience. And I picked up a few interesting stories along the way, too.
Dialogue: Still, I grew from the experience. And I picked up a few interesting stories along the way, too.
trans: 尽管如此，我还是从这次经历中成长起来。

Original: Squall:(I wonder if I'd be that calm after all that time...)
Dialogue: (I wonder if I'd be that calm after all that time...)
trans: （我想知道经过那段时间我是否会那么冷静......）

Original: Zidane:Slow and steady wins the race, eh? There are as many travelers as there are roads.
Dialogue: Slow and steady wins the race, eh? There are as many travelers as there are roads.
trans: 缓慢而稳定地赢得比赛，是吗？

Original: Serah:That's right, and we're all shaped by the roads we take. Ciaran took a long and winding path, and that made him calm and collected.
Dialogue: That's right, and we're all shaped by the roads we take. Ciaran took a long and winding path, and that made him calm and collected.
trans: 没错，我们都被我们所走的道路所塑造。

Original: Ciaran:I don't know about that, but I do like the sound of it. I'd be glad if I could live up to it.
Dialogue: I don't know about that, but I do like the sound of it. I'd be glad if I could live up to it.
trans: 我不知道，但我确实喜欢它的声音。

Original: Edgar:Heh... Even more beautiful today...
Dialogue: Heh... Even more beautiful today...

Original: Setzer:Quite right...beautiful enough to fly away with.
Dialogue: Quite right...beautiful enough to fly away with.

Original: Steiner:Graaagh! Do not harass Her Highness with your sleazy solicitations!
Dialogue: Graaagh! Do not harass Her Highness with your sleazy solicitations!

Original: Steiner:Wheeze... Blast it! A stubborn bunch you are!
Dialogue: Wheeze... Blast it! A stubborn bunch you are!

Original: Edgar:You're far too riled up, Steiner. We were merely exchanging pleasantries.
Dialogue: You're far too riled up, Steiner. We were merely exchanging pleasantries.

Original: Garnet:Yes, you worry too much.
Dialogue: Yes, you worry too much.

Original: Steiner:No, I think I do not!
Dialogue: No, I think I do not!

Original: Steiner:It is one of a knight's finest responsibilities to protect the princess from indecent temptations!
Dialogue: It is one of a knight's finest responsibilities to protect the princess from indecent temptations!
trans: 保护公主免受不雅诱惑，是骑士最大的职责之一！

Original: Setzer:"Indecent"? Tell us how you really feel...
Dialogue: "Indecent"? Tell us how you really feel...

Original: Steiner:Hrmmm, this world has more philanderers than I can bear!
Dialogue: Hrmmm, this world has more philanderers than I can bear!
trans: 哼哼，这世上花花公子多得我受不了！

Original: Steiner:...What would Beatrix do in a time like this...?
Dialogue: ...What would Beatrix do in a time like this...?
trans: ……贝娅特丽克丝在这种时候会做什么……？

Original: Edgar:Beatrix? Who might this be?
Dialogue: Beatrix? Who might this be?

Original: Steiner:If she were here, too, how my anxieties would be lessened...
Dialogue: If she were here, too, how my anxieties would be lessened...
trans: 如果她也在这里，我的焦虑会如何减轻……

Original: Garnet:But...if she did come to this world, I wonder...if she would defend us...
Dialogue: But...if she did come to this world, I wonder...if she would defend us...
trans: 但是……如果她真的来到这个世界，不知道……她会不会保护我们……

Original: Edgar:Isn't this person a knight in your service? Why should that be in question?
Dialogue: Isn't this person a knight in your service? Why should that be in question?
trans: 这个人不是你手下的骑士吗？

Original: Garnet:We were for a time enemies with her...
Dialogue: We were for a time enemies with her...

Original: Setzer:...I see. Depending on her memories, there's a chance she'd be turning her sword on us...
Dialogue: ...I see. Depending on her memories, there's a chance she'd be turning her sword on us...

Original: Edgar:A fault of fealty, eh? Things are never simple for royalty.
Dialogue: A fault of fealty, eh? Things are never simple for royalty.

Original: Steiner:If in this world she were being used by villains, why...
Dialogue: If in this world she were being used by villains, why...
trans: 如果在这个世界上，她被小人利用，为什么……

Original: Garnet:I know well the strength of her loyalty.
Dialogue: I know well the strength of her loyalty.
trans: 我很清楚她忠诚的力量。

Original: Garnet:I have faith she wouldn't allow herself to be used that way...
Dialogue: I have faith she wouldn't allow herself to be used that way...
trans: 我相信她不会让自己被这样利用……

Original: ???:I once killed a hundred knights single-handedly. You're hardly a threat!
Dialogue: I once killed a hundred knights single-handedly. You're hardly a threat!
trans: 我曾经单枪匹马杀过一百个骑士。

Original: ???:Isn't there anyone who is worthy of facing me in this world?
Dialogue: Isn't there anyone who is worthy of facing me in this world?
trans: 这世上就没有值得和我面对面的人吗？

Original: Onion Knight:Are you alright!?
Dialogue: Are you alright!?

Original: Bartz:...Huh? Where're the monsters?
Dialogue: ...Huh? Where're the monsters?

Original: Steiner:Wha-wha? Could it be!?
Dialogue: Wha-wha—? Could it be!?

Original: Beatrix:Your Highness! And Steiner!
Dialogue: Your Highness! And Steiner!

Original: Beatrix:Your Highness, it is good to see you safe. I beg your pardon for having left your side.
Dialogue: Your Highness, it is good to see you safe. I beg your pardon for having left your side.
trans: 殿下，很高兴看到你平安无事。

Original: Garnet:I am glad to see you well, too.
Dialogue: I am glad to see you well, too.

Original: Steiner:You need not fear, for the princess has been in my care!
Dialogue: You need not fear, for the princess has been in my care!
trans: 你不用害怕，公主一直在我的呵护下！

Original: Beatrix:Haha... As stalwart as ever, Steiner.
Dialogue: Haha... As stalwart as ever, Steiner.
trans: 哈哈……一如既往的伟岸，史泰纳。

Original: Onion Knight:It doesn't look like you need to worry about her attacking us.
Dialogue: It doesn't look like you need to worry about her attacking us.
trans: 看来你不需要担心她会攻击我们。

Original: Beatrix:Attack Her Highness? Why would I do such a thing?
Dialogue: Attack Her Highness? Why would I do such a thing?

Original: Bartz:We heard you were enemies before, so we were a little unsure.
Dialogue: We heard you were enemies before, so we were a little unsure.
trans: 之前听说你们是仇人，所以有点拿不准。

Original: Beatrix:Is that so...? I suppose that could be.
Dialogue: Is that so...? I suppose that could be.

Original: Beatrix:Forgive me for not introducing myself. I am Beatrix, a servant of the Kingdom of Alexandria.
Dialogue: Forgive me for not introducing myself. I am Beatrix, a servant of the Kingdom of Alexandria.
trans: 请原谅我没有自我介绍。

Original: Beatrix:I was summoned here by a god, but upon learning Princess Garnet was here as well
Dialogue: I was summoned here by a god, but upon learning Princess Garnet was here as well—
trans: 我是被神明召唤到这里来的，得知嘉妮特公主也在这里——

Original: Beatrix:I made all haste to reunite with her. I am so relieved to have found you...
Dialogue: —I made all haste to reunite with her. I am so relieved to have found you...

Original: Bartz:...So, uh, what happened to those monsters?
Dialogue: ...So, uh, what happened to those monsters?

Original: Steiner:Erm, I do not think it bears asking.
Dialogue: Erm, I do not think it bears asking.

Original: Onion Knight:Did you beat all of them by yourself!?
Dialogue: Did you beat all of them by yourself!?
trans: 都是你一个人打败的吗！？

Original: Beatrix:Heh, exterminating such beasts couldn't have been simpler.
Dialogue: Heh, exterminating such beasts couldn't have been simpler.
trans: 呵，消灭这种野兽简直再简单不过了。

Original: Steiner:What did I tell you? The continent's finest!
Dialogue: What did I tell you? The continent's finest!

Original: Beatrix:Even should this be some other world, it is my duty to defend the princess.
Dialogue: Even should this be some other world, it is my duty to defend the princess.
trans: 就算是异世界，守护公主也是我的职责。

Original: Beatrix:My allegiance to you is as everno, greater than ever before.
Dialogue: My allegiance to you is as ever—no, greater than ever before.
trans: 我对你的忠诚一如既往——不，比以往任何时候都更加坚定。

Original: Steiner:Well said! Here is a true and honorable knight of Alexandria!
Dialogue: Well said! Here is a true and honorable knight of Alexandria!

Original: Steiner:Let us do all in our power to keep Her Highness from harm!
Dialogue: Let us do all in our power to keep Her Highness from harm!
trans: 让我们竭尽所能，不让公主殿下受到伤害！

Original: Garnet:Thank you, both of you... I am ever in your care.
Dialogue: Thank you, both of you... I am ever in your care.
trans: 谢谢你们，你们俩……我一直在你们的照顾下。

Original: Beatrix:Yes, Your Highness!
Dialogue: Yes, Your Highness!

Original: Beatrix:Out of my way...
Dialogue: Out of my way...

Original: Sabin:Talk about skill! Man, am I impressed.
Dialogue: Talk about skill! Man, am I impressed.

Original: Edgar:Indeed. She is as lovely as a rose itself...
Dialogue: Indeed. She is as lovely as a rose itself...

Original: Edgar:But her swordsmanship is second to none in this world.
Dialogue: But her swordsmanship is second to none in this world.
trans: 但她的剑术，在这个世界上，却是首屈一指的。

Original: Steiner:Hear, hear! Go on!
Dialogue: Hear, hear! Go on!

Original: Zidane:...What're you so pleased about?
Dialogue: ...What're you so pleased about?

Original: Zidane:Beatrix beat us black and blue before, too.
Dialogue: Beatrix beat us black and blue before, too.
trans: 比阿特丽克斯以前也把我们打得遍体鳞伤。

Original: Vivi:Y-yeah... She was really strong.
Dialogue: Y-yeah... She was really strong.

Original: Vanille:Oh, yeah. You guys were enemies before.
Dialogue: Oh, yeah. You guys were enemies before.

Original: Beatrix:About that...
Dialogue: About that...

Original: Vanille:Ah! I'm sorry! I stepped in it, huh?
Dialogue: Ah! I'm sorry! I stepped in it, huh?

Original: Zidane:All water under the bridge. She had her own business to deal with.
Dialogue: All water under the bridge. She had her own business to deal with.

Original: Beatrix:I wonder if it's fair to sum that up as simply business.
Dialogue: I wonder if it's fair to sum that up as simply business.
trans: 我想知道将其概括为简单的业务是否公平。

Original: Beatrix:Even to say it was under orders, my deeds cannot be undone...
Dialogue: Even to say it was under orders, my deeds cannot be undone...
trans: 就算是奉命行事，我的所作所为也无法挽回……

Original: Sabin:I don't know what happened, but it sounds like you regret it.
Dialogue: I don't know what happened, but it sounds like you regret it.
trans: 我不知道发生了什么，但听起来你很后悔。

Original: Edgar:Your actions were out of loyalty to your country, no?
Dialogue: Your actions were out of loyalty to your country, no?
trans: 你的行为是出于对国家的忠诚，不是吗？

Original: Sabin:And you've since repented and are helping out Zidane and the others, right?
Dialogue: And you've since repented and are helping out Zidane and the others, right?
trans: 而且你已经悔改了，正在帮助齐达内和其他人，对吧？

Original: Beatrix:I took the lives of many, many people...
Dialogue: I took the lives of many, many people...
trans: 我夺走了很多很多人的生命...

Original: Beatrix:No matter how I repent, it won't bring them back.
Dialogue: No matter how I repent, it won't bring them back.
trans: 无论我如何忏悔，都不会把他们带回来。

Original: Steiner:...It is as she says.
Dialogue: ...It is as she says.

Original: Steiner:Her past sins will not disappear...
Dialogue: Her past sins will not disappear...
trans: 她过去的罪孽不会消失……

Original: Steiner:But she can atone for them.
Dialogue: But she can atone for them.

Original: Steiner:I've made many comrades in this world... They've all had their own troubles, and they've conquered them.
Dialogue: I've made many comrades in this world... They've all had their own troubles, and they've conquered them.
trans: 我在这个世界上结交了很多同志……他们都有自己的烦恼，他们都克服了。

Original: Steiner:There is nothing they can do that Beatrix cannot!
Dialogue: There is nothing they can do that Beatrix cannot!
trans: 他们能做的，没有比阿特丽克斯做不到的！

Original: Beatrix:Th-thank you.
Dialogue: Th-thank you.

Original: Vanille:Right. And yesterday's enemy is today's friend and all that.
Dialogue: Right. And yesterday's enemy is today's friend and all that.

Original: Vanille:You've already been a big help to us! Thanks, Beatrix!
Dialogue: You've already been a big help to us! Thanks, Beatrix!
trans: 你已经给了我们很大的帮助！

Original: Beatrix:I should be the one to thank you, for here I can lend you my strength without being ordered to.
Dialogue: I should be the one to thank you, for here I can lend you my strength without being ordered to.
trans: 该向你道谢的应该是我，在这里，我可以不被命令地借给你力量。

Original: Sabin:Feel free to keep doing so!
Dialogue: Feel free to keep doing so!

Original: Beatrix:You can trust in me. I shall defend Her Highness and my comrades unto death.
Dialogue: You can trust in me. I shall defend Her Highness and my comrades unto death.

Original: Beatrix:Princess Garnet.
Dialogue: Princess Garnet.

Original: Beatrix:I've finished patrolling the western front. Nothing to report.
Dialogue: I've finished patrolling the western front. Nothing to report.
trans: 我已经完成了西线的巡逻。

Original: Garnet:...Thank you, Beatrix.
Dialogue: ...Thank you, Beatrix.

Original: Beatrix:You needn't thank me, Your Highness.
Dialogue: You needn't thank me, Your Highness.

Original: Beatrix:I'll continue with the eastern front.
Dialogue: I'll continue with the eastern front.

Original: Yuri:Poor Garnet. She looks troubled.
Dialogue: Poor Garnet. She looks troubled.

Original: Bartz:You think so too, huh?
Dialogue: You think so too, huh?

Original: Garnet:Wait, Beatrix!
Dialogue: Wait, Beatrix!

Original: Beatrix:Yes, Your Highness?
Dialogue: Yes, Your Highness?

Original: Garnet:I'll go with you. I want to help.
Dialogue: I'll go with you. I want to help.

Original: Beatrix:Nonsense. It's too dangerous!
Dialogue: Nonsense. It's too dangerous!

Original: Beatrix:We don't know what sort of monsters are lurking out there. Please wait here where it is safe.
Dialogue: We don't know what sort of monsters are lurking out there. Please wait here where it is safe.
trans: 我们不知道那里潜伏着什么样的怪物。

Original: Garnet:No. I insist on going with you!
Dialogue: No. I insist on going with you!

Original: Beatrix:I am sorry, Your Highness, but...
Dialogue: I am sorry, Your Highness, but...

Original: Noct:Why can't she go? It shouldn't be a problem if they're together.
Dialogue: Why can't she go? It shouldn't be a problem if they're together.

Original: Yuri:I think Beatrix can't see Garnet as anything but a princess.
Dialogue: I think Beatrix can't see Garnet as anything but a princess.
trans: 我认为比阿特丽克斯只能将石榴石视为公主。

Original: Bartz:Alright, then it's us to the rescue!
Dialogue: Alright, then it's us to the rescue!
trans: 好吧，那就是我们来救援了！

Original: Beatrix:I cannot in all good conscience let you venture into enemy territory
Dialogue: I cannot in all good conscience let you venture into enemy territory—
trans: 凭良心我不能让你冒险进入敌人的领土——

Original: Bartz:You worry too much.
Dialogue: You worry too much.

Original: Warrior of Light:Indeed. Your blade strikes true, and with it, you can protect her no matter what dangers await.
Dialogue: Indeed. Your blade strikes true, and with it, you can protect her no matter what dangers await.

Original: Yuri:We've been saved by Garnet's magic plenty of times, too. You can count on her!
Dialogue: We've been saved by Garnet's magic plenty of times, too. You can count on her!
trans: 我们也多次被石榴石的魔法所救。

Original: Garnet:Exactly. You can't treat me like a child forever.
Dialogue: Exactly. You can't treat me like a child forever.

Original: Garnet:I refuse to forever be on the receiving end of help. I wish to give it, too.
Dialogue: I refuse to forever be on the receiving end of help. I wish to give it, too.

Original: Beatrix:You've grown into a splendid woman, Your Highness. I admire your resolve.
Dialogue: You've grown into a splendid woman, Your Highness. I admire your resolve.
trans: 殿下，你已经成长为一个出色的女人了。

Original: Beatrix:Very well. Let us go together, then. I am counting on you to watch my back.
Dialogue: Very well. Let us go together, then. I am counting on you to watch my back.

Original: Garnet:As I will count on you to watch mine. Thank you, Beatrix.
Dialogue: As I will count on you to watch mine. Thank you, Beatrix.
trans: 因为我会指望你看我的。

Original: Bartz:Do all royals really have to be so fussy?
Dialogue: Do all royals really have to be so fussy?
trans: 所有的皇室成员真的都必须如此挑剔吗？

Original: Yuri:With certain people, they do. But it's different with us. We're friends.
Dialogue: With certain people, they do. But it's different with us. We're friends.
trans: 对于某些人，他们会这样做。

Original: Bartz:You got a point there. It's help and be helped on the path we walk.
Dialogue: You got a point there. It's help and be helped on the path we walk.

Original: Warrior of Light:Precisely. And we shall not let them walk alone.
Dialogue: Precisely. And we shall not let them walk alone.

Original: Vaan:Huff, huff... Can't...breathe...!
Dialogue: Huff, huff... Can't...breathe...!

Original: Beatrix:Throwing in the towel so soon? You're out of practice.
Dialogue: Throwing in the towel so soon? You're out of practice.

Original: Firion:You don't leave a single opening one-on-one...
Dialogue: You don't leave a single opening one-on-one...
trans: 你不会留下一个一对一的开口......

Original: Tidus:I totally believe you killed a hundred knights...
Dialogue: I totally believe you killed a hundred knights...
trans: 我完全相信你杀了一百个骑士...

Original: Seifer:You're embarrassing yourselves.
Dialogue: You're embarrassing yourselves.

Original: Vaan:Like you're one to talk. You lost, too.
Dialogue: Like you're one to talk. You lost, too.
trans: 就像你是一个会说话的人。

Original: Firion:You're certainly a force to be reckoned with. I suppose you've never lost a battle, have you?
Dialogue: You're certainly a force to be reckoned with. I suppose you've never lost a battle, have you?
trans: 你当然是一股不可忽视的力量。

Original: Beatrix:I have, but just once. To Steiner.
Dialogue: I have, but just once. To Steiner.

Original: Beatrix:Is it really so shocking? Steiner is stronger than he looks.
Dialogue: Is it really so shocking? Steiner is stronger than he looks.

Original: Vaan:I know that, but...I never imagined you losing to him.
Dialogue: I know that, but...I never imagined you losing to him.
trans: 我知道，但是……我从没想过你会输给他。

Original: Beatrix:We had a contest before the lord, and he was the victor.
Dialogue: We had a contest before the lord, and he was the victor.
trans: 我们在领主面前进行了一场较量，他是胜利者。

Original: Beatrix:He claimed it as merely a fluke, but there is no such thing in battle.
Dialogue: He claimed it as merely a fluke, but there is no such thing in battle.
trans: 他声称这只是侥幸，但在战斗中没有这样的事情。

Original: Beatrix:That crushing defeat fueled me to become better.
Dialogue: That crushing defeat fueled me to become better.
trans: 那场惨败让我变得更好。

Original: Firion:So you dedicated yourself to your training.
Dialogue: So you dedicated yourself to your training.
trans: 所以你全身心地投入到训练中。

Original: Beatrix:If you wish to grow strong, find a good rival and hone your skills against each other.
Dialogue: If you wish to grow strong, find a good rival and hone your skills against each other.
trans: 如果你想变强，找一个好的对手，互相磨练你的技能。

Original: Seifer:Hmph. Big words for such a little lady.
Dialogue: Hmph. Big words for such a little lady.

Original: Tidus:By the way, Seifer, have you fought Squall before?
Dialogue: By the way, Seifer, have you fought Squall before?
trans: 对了，Seifer，你以前打过 Squall 吗？

Original: Firion:Good question. I'd like to know what someone with a real rival thinks.
Dialogue: Good question. I'd like to know what someone with a real rival thinks.

Original: Seifer:You think he's worthy of being my rival? Don't make me laugh.
Dialogue: You think he's worthy of being my rival? Don't make me laugh.
trans: 你觉得他配得上我的对手？

Original: Seifer:We aren't even on the same level. I'm just toying with him.
Dialogue: We aren't even on the same level. I'm just toying with him.
trans: 我们甚至不在一个水平上。

Original: Vaan:He never changes, does he?
Dialogue: He never changes, does he?

Original: Tidus:Are you hoping for another duel with Steiner someday?
Dialogue: Are you hoping for another duel with Steiner someday?
trans: 你希望有一天能与施泰纳进行另一场决斗吗？

Original: Beatrix:To be frank, I do indeed.
Dialogue: To be frank, I do indeed.

Original: Beatrix:But we're working together to protect Princess Garnet, so there's no point in settling the score now. And...
Dialogue: But we're working together to protect Princess Garnet, so there's no point in settling the score now. And...
trans: 但我们是一起保护加奈特公主的，所以现在算账没有意义。

Original: Vaan:And what?
Dialogue: And what?

Original: Beatrix:We never show the other mercy, and Princess Garnet would be the one to suffer should anything happen to either of us.
Dialogue: We never show the other mercy, and Princess Garnet would be the one to suffer should anything happen to either of us.
trans: 我们从来不会对对方手下留情，万一我们中的任何一个出了什么事，受苦的都是加内特公主。

Original: Tidus:No mercy? Even against us?
Dialogue: No mercy? Even against us?

Original: Firion:That means she sees us on equal footing. Alright, I'm ready for another round!
Dialogue: That means she sees us on equal footing. Alright, I'm ready for another round!
trans: 这意味着她认为我们是平等的。

Original: Cecil:So the Crystal Core of Darkness went out of control and Spiritus's warriors tried to take advantage of that power...
Dialogue: So the Crystal Core of Darkness went out of control and Spiritus's warriors tried to take advantage of that power...
trans: 所以黑暗水晶核心失去了控制，而 Spiritus 的战士们试图利用这种力量……

Original: Rinoa:It's all so confusing. How do we stop it?
Dialogue: It's all so confusing. How do we stop it?

Original: Bartz:I think even the gods are at a loss here, so I don't know what we can do...
Dialogue: I think even the gods are at a loss here, so I don't know what we can do...
trans: 我想连神明都在这里不知所措，所以我不知道我们能做什么......

Original: Sazh:Hey, Vaan! What're you doing? The ship's gonna capsize at this rate!
Dialogue: Hey, Vaan! What're you doing? The ship's gonna capsize at this rate!

Original: Vaan:The rudder's not working! Maybe the ship's broken?
Dialogue: The rudder's not working! Maybe the ship's broken?

Original: Rinoa:Whoa! Isn't this...bad?
Dialogue: Whoa! Isn't this...bad?

Original: Bartz:Hold on tight, everyone!
Dialogue: Hold on tight, everyone!

Original: Cecil:...It's no good! We can't hold on like this!
Dialogue: ...It's no good! We can't hold on like this!

Original: Rinoa:Owiee...! Is everyone okay?
Dialogue: Owiee...! Is everyone okay?

Original: Bartz:I think so...
Dialogue: I think so...

Original: Sazh:Damn... Look at this mess. I guess it's still too early to let Vaan drive.
Dialogue: Damn... Look at this mess. I guess it's still too early to let Vaan drive.
trans: 该死的……看看这个烂摊子。

Original: Vaan:I told you it wasn't me! It was the rudder!
Dialogue: I told you it wasn't me! It was the rudder!

Original: Bartz:Yeah?
Dialogue: Yeah?

Original: Cecil:Does this forest...look familiar to you?
Dialogue: Does this forest...look familiar to you?
trans: 这座森林……你是不是很眼熟？

Original: Bartz:Familiar? Any way you look at it, it's just your average
Dialogue: Familiar? Any way you look at it, it's just your average—

Original: Bartz:No, wait a second...
Dialogue: No, wait a second...

Original: Exdeath:This is a space distorted by the Torsions.
Dialogue: This is a space distorted by the Torsions.
trans: 这是一个被扭转扭曲的空间。

Original: Exdeath:It was all too easy to trap you worthless fools here!
Dialogue: It was all too easy to trap you worthless fools here!
trans: 把你们这些没出息的蠢货困在这里，太容易了！

Original: Vaan:See! It wasn't my fault!
Dialogue: See! It wasn't my fault!

Original: Sazh:We get it. We're sorry. But could you save the celebration for later, Vaan?
Dialogue: We get it. We're sorry. But could you save the celebration for later, Vaan?

Original: Rinoa:So why did you lure us in here?
Dialogue: So why did you lure us in here?
trans: 那你为什么把我们引诱到这里来？

Original: Exdeath:...What a foolish question.
Dialogue: ...What a foolish question.

Original: Exdeath:Isn't it obvious? I will banish you peons together with this space!
Dialogue: Isn't it obvious? I will banish you peons together with this space!

Original: Cecil:Like you did with my brother!?
Dialogue: Like you did with my brother!?
trans: 就像你对我兄弟所做的那样！？

Original: Bartz:And you really think we're just gonna sit back and let you do whatever you want!?
Dialogue: And you really think we're just gonna sit back and let you do whatever you want!?
trans: 你真的认为我们会坐视不管，让你为所欲为！？

Original: Exdeath:It is time you felt the power of the Void once more.
Dialogue: It is time you felt the power of the Void once more.
trans: 是时候再次感受虚空的力量了。

Original: Exdeath:Consider it a reward for hindering my ingenious plan!
Dialogue: Consider it a reward for hindering my ingenious plan!
trans: 就当是阻碍我巧妙计划的奖励吧！

Original: Exdeath:Urg... The power of your wills is so great...
Dialogue: Urg... The power of your wills is so great...
trans: 呜呜……你的意志力好强大啊……

Original: Yuffie:What the!? How creepy! He just started laughing for no reason!
Dialogue: What the!? How creepy! He just started laughing for no reason!

Original: Faris:Don't let your guard down, Yuffie! I'd wager he's got somethin' up his sleeve!
Dialogue: Don't let your guard down, Yuffie! I'd wager he's got somethin' up his sleeve!

Original: Exdeath:My plan ended in failure, thanks to you. However...
Dialogue: My plan ended in failure, thanks to you. However...
trans: 多亏了你，我的计划才以失败告终。

Original: Exdeath:The power of wills and the Void may just be enough to see my ambition to fruition!
Dialogue: The power of wills and the Void may just be enough to see my ambition to fruition!
trans: 意志之力和虚空之力，或许刚好足以见识我的野心！

Original: Lenna:What are you saying...?
Dialogue: What are you saying...?

Original: Exdeath:Must I spell it out for you, fool? I am saying it may be worth my while to join your ranks.
Dialogue: Must I spell it out for you, fool? I am saying it may be worth my while to join your ranks.
trans: 我必须为你拼出来吗，笨蛋？

Original: Exdeath:...If you can escape from this place, that is.
Dialogue: ...If you can escape from this place, that is.

Original: Vincent:This space is no longer stable... We need to get out before we're imprisoned in here.
Dialogue: This space is no longer stable... We need to get out before we're imprisoned in here.
trans: 这个空间不再稳定……我们需要在被囚禁在这里之前离开。

Original: Yuffie:Wha-wha-what!? Hold on! Where's the exit!?
Dialogue: Wha-wha-what!? Hold on! Where's the exit!?

Original: Vincent:Calm down, Yuffie. Can you do it, Mog?
Dialogue: Calm down, Yuffie. Can you do it, Mog?

Original: Mog:Leave it to me, kupo!
Dialogue: Leave it to me, kupo!

Original: Mog:Uh oh, kupo... Something is interfering with my power, so I can't get us out of here.
Dialogue: Uh oh, kupo... Something is interfering with my power, so I can't get us out of here.
trans: 呃哦，库波……有东西干扰了我的力量，所以我不能让我们离开这里。

Original: Vincent:Interference...? This can't be a coincidence.
Dialogue: Interference...? This can't be a coincidence.

Original: Lenna:Oh no... Is this the end for us?
Dialogue: Oh no... Is this the end for us?
trans: 哦不……这是我们的结局吗？

Original: Faris:There's no way we're kicking the bucket here! We'll just have to find an exit ourselves!
Dialogue: There's no way we're kicking the bucket here! We'll just have to find an exit ourselves!
trans: 我们不可能在这里踢水桶！

Original: Gilgamesh:Ha ha! Guess who it is, just in time to save the day!
Dialogue: Ha ha! Guess who it is, just in time to save the day!

Original: Gilgamesh:We'll get out of here, even if I pry open an exit myself! Come on! RAAAAAAH!
Dialogue: We'll get out of here, even if I pry open an exit myself! Come on! RAAAAAAH!
trans: 我们会离开这里，即使我自己撬开出口！

Original: Mog:This is crazy, kupo. It's ignoring all the laws and rules of the world!
Dialogue: This is crazy, kupo. It's ignoring all the laws and rules of the world!

Original: Gilgamesh:Rules were made to be broken!
Dialogue: Rules were made to be broken!

Original: Yuffie:Whoa! You're so cool, Gilgamesh!
Dialogue: Whoa! You're so cool, Gilgamesh!

Original: Gilgamesh:Thank me later! For now, we need to make like lightning and bolt!
Dialogue: Thank me later! For now, we need to make like lightning and bolt!

Original: Bartz:Whew. That was a close call...
Dialogue: Whew. That was a close call...

Original: Faris:We owe you one, Gilgamesh!
Dialogue: We owe you one, Gilgamesh!
trans: 我们欠你一个，吉尔伽美什！

Original: Gilgamesh:Ha ha! Think nothing of it or my dramatically impeccable timing. The hero is always the last on the scene!
Dialogue: Ha ha! Think nothing of it or my dramatically impeccable timing. The hero is always the last on the scene!

Original: Vincent:But just what was Exdeath's aim, I wonder.
Dialogue: But just what was Exdeath's aim, I wonder.
trans: 但我想知道 Exdeath 的目的到底是什么。

Original: Yuffie:I wish he would at least have a reason for attacking us! ...Oh?
Dialogue: I wish he would at least have a reason for attacking us! ...Oh?
trans: 我希望他至少有攻击我们的理由！

Original: Yuffie:Lookie, lookie, Vincent! A treasure chest!
Dialogue: Lookie, lookie, Vincent! A treasure chest!

Original: Vincent:...That is most definitely a trap.
Dialogue: ...That is most definitely a trap.

Original: Faris:He's right. Treasure's got no right being here so conveniently!
Dialogue: He's right. Treasure's got no right being here so conveniently!

Original: Vincent:Don't waste your breath on her.
Dialogue: Don't waste your breath on her.
trans: 不要在她身上浪费你的呼吸。

Original: Yuffie:Huh!? This is...!
Dialogue: Huh!? This is...!

Original: Bartz:...Dimensional coordinates.
Dialogue: ...Dimensional coordinates.

Original: Faris:But who...? You know, forget I asked.
Dialogue: But who...? You know, forget I asked.

Original: Yuffie:No way! This treasure was a total bust!
Dialogue: No way! This treasure was a total bust!

Original: Vincent:I wonder how far he plans on following us.
Dialogue: I wonder how far he plans on following us.
trans: 我想知道他打算跟着我们走多远。

Original: Lenna:But isn't it strange? He tried to banish us to the Void not long ago.
Dialogue: But isn't it strange? He tried to banish us to the Void not long ago.

Original: Bartz:Perhaps either would've worked fine for that lunatic.
Dialogue: Perhaps either would've worked fine for that lunatic.
trans: 也许对那个疯子来说，两者都行得通。

Original: Gilgamesh:I'll just pick this up then!
Dialogue: I'll just pick this up then!

Original: Yuffie:Are you serious, Gilgamesh!?
Dialogue: Are you serious, Gilgamesh!?
trans: 你是认真的吗，吉尔伽美什！？

Original: Gilgamesh:Aren't I always? Think about it carefully!
Dialogue: Aren't I always? Think about it carefully!

Original: Gilgamesh:Exdeath is a spooky phantom. You never know when he's going to appear!
Dialogue: Exdeath is a spooky phantom. You never know when he's going to appear!
trans: Exdeath 是一个幽灵般的幻影。

Original: Gilgamesh:But if you have these coordinates, he won't be able to catch you unaware anymore.
Dialogue: But if you have these coordinates, he won't be able to catch you unaware anymore.
trans: 但是如果你有这些坐标，他就不会再抓你不着了。

Original: Faris:I suppose it does have some merit...
Dialogue: I suppose it does have some merit...
trans: 我想它确实有一些优点......

Original: Gilgamesh:But even I, the great Gilgamesh, won't be able to stop him alone.
Dialogue: But even I, the great Gilgamesh, won't be able to stop him alone.
trans: 但即使是我，伟大的吉尔伽美什，也无法单独阻止他。

Original: Gilgamesh:If we're all together, though, I'm sure it will work out. We can use this against him.
Dialogue: If we're all together, though, I'm sure it will work out. We can use this against him.
trans: 不过，如果我们都在一起，我相信一切都会成功。

Original: Vincent:Balthier always says the same...
Dialogue: Balthier always says the same...

Original: Yuffie:Though I prefer the direct approach! It's a lot easier!
Dialogue: Though I prefer the direct approach! It's a lot easier!
trans: 虽然我更喜欢直接的方法！

Original: Gilgamesh:Ha ha, how unexpected of a ninja! Well, it sounds like we're all in agreement, so I'll take a look into his movements.
Dialogue: Ha ha, how unexpected of a ninja! Well, it sounds like we're all in agreement, so I'll take a look into his movements.
trans: 呵呵，忍者真是意想不到！

Original: Gilgamesh:And don't forget: I'm your friend forever! You can always trust in me! Hasta la bye bye!
Dialogue: And don't forget I'm your friend forever! You can always trust in me! Hasta la bye bye!
trans: 别忘了我永远是你的朋友！

Original: Yuffie:Is that guy a double agent...?
Dialogue: Is that guy a double agent...?

Original: Lenna:Let's put our faith in him for now...
Dialogue: Let's put our faith in him for now...

Original: Bartz:Right... He did save us, after all.
Dialogue: Right... He did save us, after all.

Original: Vivi:Err...
Dialogue: Err...

Original: Eiko:Hey. What's the matter?
Dialogue: Hey. What's the matter?

Original: Vivi:Well...my back is stinging...
Dialogue: Well...my back is stinging...

Original: Eiko:That's all? Come on, Vivi. You've handled worse!
Dialogue: That's all? Come on, Vivi. You've handled worse!

Original: Irvine:So he's the incarnation of the evil souls sealed inside a tree? What a pain in the butt that Exdeath is...
Dialogue: So he's the incarnation of the evil souls sealed inside a tree? What a pain in the butt that Exdeath is...
trans: 难道他就是被封印在树上的邪灵化身？

Original: Krile:Back inour world, he had the power of theVoidand tried to erase all existence with it.
Dialogue: Back in our world, he had the power of the Void and tried to erase all existence with it.
trans: 回到我们的世界，他拥有虚空的力量，并试图用它抹去所有存在。

Original: Krile:His goal must be the same here. He's not someone you can reason with...
Dialogue: His goal must be the same here. He's not someone you can reason with...
trans: 他的目标一定和这里一样。

Original: Irvine:So that's why he's looking for some great power in place of the Void?
Dialogue: So that's why he's looking for some great power in place of the Void?
trans: 所以这就是为什么他要寻找一些强大的力量来代替虚空？

Original: Tidus:Can't he just keep his crazy ideals to himself?
Dialogue: Can't he just keep his crazy ideals to himself?
trans: 他就不能把自己疯狂的理想留给自己吗？

Original: Irvine:Agreed! Trying to erase everything is just nonsense.
Dialogue: Agreed! Trying to erase everything is just nonsense.

Original: ???:You simple-minded fools. You could never understand the meaning of power.
Dialogue: You simple-minded fools. You could never understand the meaning of power.
trans: 你们这些头脑简单的傻瓜。

Original: Vivi:H-huh!? That wasn't me!
Dialogue: H-huh!? That wasn't me!

Original: Vivi:AHHH!
Dialogue: AHHH!

Original: Exdeath:I changed myself into a thorn and heard you talking.
Dialogue: I changed myself into a thorn and heard you talking.
trans: 我化身为荆棘，听见你说话。

Original: Eiko:So that's why Vivi's back was hurting!
Dialogue: So that's why Vivi's back was hurting!

Original: Krile:He did the same to me before. I totally let my guard down...
Dialogue: He did the same to me before. I totally let my guard down...
trans: 之前他也是这​​样对我的。

Original: Exdeath:It seems you fools understand nothing.
Dialogue: It seems you fools understand nothing.
trans: 看来你们这些傻瓜什么都不懂。

Original: Exdeath:So I will teach you. The Void is truly magnificent.
Dialogue: So I will teach you. The Void is truly magnificent.

Original: Tidus:Nobody asked you!
Dialogue: Nobody asked you!

Original: Exdeath:There are two sides to every coin
Dialogue: There are two sides to every coin—

Original: Exdeath:Bonds and loneliness. Hope and despair. Happiness and sorrow. Everything exists within that reason.
Dialogue: Bonds and loneliness. Hope and despair. Happiness and sorrow. Everything exists within that reason.

Original: Irvine:What are you trying to say?
Dialogue: What are you trying to say?

Original: Exdeath:That life infers death. Things that exist will return to nothingness.
Dialogue: That life infers death. Things that exist will return to nothingness.

Original: Exdeath:In sum, existing in this world is meaningless.
Dialogue: In sum, existing in this world is meaningless.
trans: 总而言之，存在于这个世界上是没有意义的。

Original: Exdeath:Which makes the Void the single greatest of all entities. And its divine providence will be known to all worlds!
Dialogue: Which makes the Void the single greatest of all entities. And its divine providence will be known to all worlds!
trans: 这使得 Void 成为所有实体中最伟大的一个。

Original: Eiko:Hold it! That's just plain crazy talk and it's making me mad!
Dialogue: Hold it! That's just plain crazy talk and it's making me mad!

Original: Vivi:Don't deny the meaning of life! Everyone's doing their best to go on living.
Dialogue: Don't deny the meaning of life! Everyone's doing their best to go on living.

Original: Irvine:You said it, Vivi!
Dialogue: You said it, Vivi!

Original: Exdeath:Humans are such a pitiful existence...
Dialogue: Humans are such a pitiful existence...
trans: 人类真是一种可怜的存在……

Original: Exdeath:Understand this: your actions are meaningless. Someday you will all return to the Void.
Dialogue: Understand this your actions are meaningless. Someday you will all return to the Void.
trans: 了解这一点，您的行为毫无意义。

Original: Tidus:I guess we should have expected that much from an incarnation of evil souls.
Dialogue: I guess we should have expected that much from an incarnation of evil souls.
trans: 我想我们应该对邪恶灵魂的化身抱有如此大的期望。

Original: Krile:I told you so. It's pointless trying to reason with him...
Dialogue: I told you so. It's pointless trying to reason with him...

Original: Eiko:And what are you so happy about?
Dialogue: And what are you so happy about?

Original: Vivi:My back doesn't hurt anymore!
Dialogue: My back doesn't hurt anymore!

Original: Eiko:Ah... Good for you, Vivi.
Dialogue: Ah... Good for you, Vivi.

Original: Freya:Huh!? Who is that!?
Dialogue: Huh!? Who is that!?

Original: Lulu:Kefka! Kuja!
Dialogue: Kefka! Kuja!

Original: Zidane:I don't remember calling you here. What do you want?
Dialogue: I don't remember calling you here. What do you want?

Original: Freya:Zidane!
Dialogue: Zidane!

Original: Cyan:Are you hurt!?
Dialogue: Are you hurt!?

Original: Zidane:Just what's the big deal! Not even gonna greet us before attacking!?
Dialogue: Just what's the big deal! Not even gonna greet us before attacking!?

Original: Lulu:Wait... Something isn't right here.
Dialogue: Wait... Something isn't right here.

Original: Freya:You have a point. The clown has never been able to resist opening his mouth.
Dialogue: You have a point. The clown has never been able to resist opening his mouth.

Original: Cyan:Zidane, wait! I remember nowthey're the same as the ones we encountered in the labyrinth!
Dialogue: Zidane, wait! I remember now—they're the same as the ones we encountered in the labyrinth!

Original: Zidane:You're right! They're just like the manikins.
Dialogue: You're right! They're just like the manikins.

Original: Lulu:They may appear similar to you or I, but look closely. Does the light of life burn within them?
Dialogue: They may appear similar to you or I, but look closely. Does the light of life burn within them?
trans: 他们可能看起来与您或我相似，但请仔细观察。

Original: Cyan:No! They exist only to kill!
Dialogue: No! They exist only to kill!

Original: Zidane:Yeah, they're just dolls, and I think we can guess who made them. Exdeath!
Dialogue: Yeah, they're just dolls, and I think we can guess who made them. Exdeath!
trans: 是的，它们只是洋娃娃，我想我们可以猜出它们是谁制作的。

Original: Exdeath:Mwahaha! You're more perceptive than I give you credit for!
Dialogue: Mwahaha! You're more perceptive than I give you credit for!

Original: Zidane:How am I not surprised?
Dialogue: How am I not surprised?

Original: Exdeath:I have turned crisis into opportunity! The crystal core of darkness proved most useful in making even more powerful servants!
Dialogue: I have turned crisis into opportunity! The crystal core of darkness proved most useful in making even more powerful servants!

Original: Exdeath:And in greater numbers than before! None other than I could have raised an army so magnificent! Mwahahahahaha! HAHA!
Dialogue: And in greater numbers than before! None other than I could have raised an army so magnificent! Mwahahahahaha! HAHA!

Original: Lulu:That means more worries for us...hardly a laughing matter.
Dialogue: That means more worries for us...hardly a laughing matter.
trans: 这对我们来说意味着更多的担忧……这可不是闹着玩的。

Original: Freya:Exdeath! We will not let this stand!
Dialogue: Exdeath! We will not let this stand!

Original: Exdeath:Hahaha... Won't you? Show me the conviction of your words.
Dialogue: Hahaha... Won't you? Show me the conviction of your words.

Original: Exdeath:Test the limits of your newfound strength on my minions! For what other purpose does strength serve than to crush your enemies!?
Dialogue: Test the limits of your newfound strength on my minions! For what other purpose does strength serve than to crush your enemies!?
trans: 在我的爪牙身上测试你新发现的力量极限！

Original: Sabin:Hyah!
Dialogue: Hyah!

Original: Sabin:Ugh... There's too many! They just keep coming!
Dialogue: Ugh... There's too many! They just keep coming!

Original: Exdeath:Mwahahaha! Beaten already? Disappointing!
Dialogue: Mwahahaha! Beaten already? Disappointing!

Original: Exdeath:Then let the strong conquer the weak, so they may begin their rightful reign! Vanquish your foes, my servants!
Dialogue: Then let the strong conquer the weak, so they may begin their rightful reign! Vanquish your foes, my servants!
trans: 那就让强者战胜弱者，让他们开始他们应有的统治吧！

Original: Exdeath:What!? Who was that?
Dialogue: What!? Who was that?

Original: Kuja:Your ambitions are as prosaic as ever, Exdeath.
Dialogue: Your ambitions are as prosaic as ever, Exdeath.
trans: 你的野心一如既往地平淡无奇，Exdeath。

Original: Kefka:What a bore! I'd vomit in disgust if I had any left in me!
Dialogue: What a bore! I'd vomit in disgust if I had any left in me!

Original: Galuf:You two!
Dialogue: You two!

Original: Sabin:Are they for real this time? I've had enough of fakes.
Dialogue: Are they for real this time? I've had enough of fakes.

Original: Kuja:None other. We're here to put a stop to these abominations. I won't suffer such ugly things to exist.
Dialogue: None other. We're here to put a stop to these abominations. I won't suffer such ugly things to exist.

Original: Kefka:Talk about copyright infringement! If you're gonna use my face, I better be getting a fat purse of coins in return!
Dialogue: Talk about copyright infringement! If you're gonna use my face, I better be getting a fat purse of coins in return!

Original: Kuja:No one asked your opinion.
Dialogue: No one asked your opinion.

Original: Steiner:Well...as much as I hate to agree with them... I don't know what a "copyright" is, but my likeness is not one to be used lightly.
Dialogue: Well...as much as I hate to agree with them... I don't know what a "copyright" is, but my likeness is not one to be used lightly.
trans: 好吧……尽管我不想同意他们的看法……我不知道“版权”是什么，但我的肖像不能随便使用。

Original: Galuf:Indeed. They speak some sense for once.
Dialogue: Indeed. They speak some sense for once.

Original: Kuja:It seems you've ruffled some feathers, Exdeath. We will show you mercy today. Tomorrow, however...
Dialogue: It seems you've ruffled some feathers, Exdeath. We will show you mercy today. Tomorrow, however...

Original: Kefka:Tomorrow we'll bring our lawyers! Or failing that, we'll simply kill you!
Dialogue: Tomorrow we'll bring our lawyers! Or failing that, we'll simply kill you!
trans: 明天我们会带上我们的律师！

Original: Exdeath:Hmph. The weak are ever envious of the strong.
Dialogue: Hmph. The weak are ever envious of the strong.

Original: Exdeath:No matterI was becoming bored anyways. It was clear who was outmatched.
Dialogue: No matter—I was becoming bored anyways. It was clear who was outmatched.
trans: 不管怎样——反正我越来越无聊了。

Original: Sabin:Uh...I guess we should thank you.
Dialogue: Uh...I guess we should thank you.
trans: 呃……我想我们应该感谢你。

Original: Kuja:Do not misunderstand me.
Dialogue: Do not misunderstand me.

Original: Kuja:I simply cannot abide ugliness in any form.
Dialogue: I simply cannot abide ugliness in any form.
trans: 我根本无法忍受任何形式的丑陋。

Original: Kefka:And I can't have anyone killing you guys but me! Could you imagine if a fake pulled it off before I did! Boy, would I have egg on my face!
Dialogue: And I can't have anyone killing you guys but me! Could you imagine if a fake pulled it off before I did! Boy, would I have egg on my face!
trans: 除了我，我不能让任何人杀死你们！

Original: Galuf:Heh. If you insist, we will withhold our gratitude.
Dialogue: Heh. If you insist, we will withhold our gratitude.

Original: Kuja:We do. Until next we meet.
Dialogue: We do. Until next we meet.

Original: Kefka:Smell ya later!
Dialogue: Smell ya later!

Original: Steiner:It appears Exdeath has no friends even among his own kind.
Dialogue: It appears Exdeath has no friends even among his own kind.
trans: 似乎 Exdeath 甚至在他自己的同类中也没有朋友。

Original: Galuf:Don't start feeling sorry for him.
Dialogue: Don't start feeling sorry for him.
trans: 不要开始为他感到难过。

Original: Galuf:He is a villain through and through. I don't believe he could relate to the likes of us even if he tried.
Dialogue: He is a villain through and through. I don't believe he could relate to the likes of us even if he tried.

Original: Serah:I think we've cleaned up this area. It looks like the monsters are all gone.
Dialogue: I think we've cleaned up this area. It looks like the monsters are all gone.
trans: 我想我们已经清理了这个区域。

Original: Noel:Got it. Then let's... Who's that?
Dialogue: Got it. Then let's... Who's that?

Original: Firion:Noel! Don't run off alone! Come on, let's go!
Dialogue: Noel! Don't run off alone! Come on, let's go!

Original: Seven:...What an odd place. It feels...stagnant.
Dialogue: ...What an odd place. It feels...stagnant.

Original: Serah:Wh-what's that!?
Dialogue: Wh-what's that!?

Original: Quistis:The monsters are fighting each other! What in the world...
Dialogue: The monsters are fighting each other! What in the world...

Original: Caius:Here, one can efficiently absorb power. It is a space to guide a visitor into the world...
Dialogue: Here, one can efficiently absorb power. It is a space to guide a visitor into the world...
trans: 在这里，可以有效地吸收能量。

Original: Caius:A distorted mechanism made to sate the desires of one from your world.
Dialogue: A distorted mechanism made to sate the desires of one from your world.
trans: 一种扭曲的机制，用来满足来自你们世界的人的欲望。

Original: Firion:Our world... You mean the Emperor!?
Dialogue: Our world... You mean the Emperor!?
trans: 我们的世界……你是说皇帝！？

Original: Seven:...Then why are you here? I'm sure you didn't come here just to tell us that.
Dialogue: ...Then why are you here? I'm sure you didn't come here just to tell us that.

Original: Caius:I will take advantage of his plans...
Dialogue: I will take advantage of his plans...

Original: Caius:And use that power for myself!
Dialogue: And use that power for myself!
trans: 并为我自己使用这种力量！

Original: Firion:Shinryu!? I see... The Emperor wanted to lure it in!
Dialogue: Shinryu!? I see... The Emperor wanted to lure it in!

Original: Caius:Unfortunately it is still a larva... But it can still open holes in dimensions and connect worlds.
Dialogue: Unfortunately it is still a larva... But it can still open holes in dimensions and connect worlds.
