Original: Penelo:Themanwho looked after me was from adifferent tribe, but he was very popular and good at his job. So I was surprised.
Dialogue: The man who looked after me was from a different tribe, but he was very popular and good at his job. So I was surprised.
trans: 照顾我的人来自不同的部落，但他很受欢迎并且擅长他的工作。

Original: Ramza:...But even people of the same tribe can experience inequality.
Dialogue: ...But even people of the same tribe can experience inequality.
trans: ......但即使是同一部落的人也会经历不平等。

Original: Barret:If there weren't, the slums wouldn't exist.
Dialogue: If there weren't, the slums wouldn't exist.
trans: 如果没有，贫民窟就不会存在。

Original: Penelo:You're right... There's disparity even among us here.
Dialogue: You're right... There's disparity even among us here.
trans: 你是对的...甚至我们之间也存在差异。

Original: Keiss:Right? In that case, you can't keep quiet. You need to take power back with your own hands.
Dialogue: Right? In that case, you can't keep quiet. You need to take power back with your own hands.

Original: Keiss:That's why I joined the army. To pull down those on top.
Dialogue: That's why I joined the army. To pull down those on top.

Original: Keiss:I was able to climb the ranks that way, but the stubborn Guild Master told me never to show my face around there again.
Dialogue: I was able to climb the ranks that way, but the stubborn Guild Master told me never to show my face around there again.
trans: 我可以通过这种方式晋升，但顽固的会长告诉我永远不要再在那里露面。

Original: Barret:Hahaha! You've got guts, kid!
Dialogue: Hahaha! You've got guts, kid!

Original: Ramza:But don't you feel uneasy without that support? It's like having no one at your back.
Dialogue: But don't you feel uneasy without that support? It's like having no one at your back.
trans: 但是没有那个支持你不觉得不安吗？

Original: Keiss:Selkies tend to value our independence, so I wasn't too torn up about it.
Dialogue: Selkies tend to value our independence, so I wasn't too torn up about it.
trans: Selkies 倾向于重视我们的独立性，所以我并没有为此感到太难过。

Original: Terra:...Even still, you worked hard for your tribe?
Dialogue: ...Even still, you worked hard for your tribe?
trans: ……即便如此，你还是为族人努力了？

Original: Penelo:You're very thoughtful of your friends, Keiss!
Dialogue: You're very thoughtful of your friends, Keiss!
trans: 你很为你的朋友着想，凯斯！

Original: Keiss:Hah, that's a new one.
Dialogue: Hah, that's a new one.

Original: Freya:Perhaps you are fit to become a guildmaster yourself.
Dialogue: Perhaps you are fit to become a guildmaster yourself.
trans: 或许你自己适合成为一名公会长。

Original: Barret:She's right! That's right up your alley!
Dialogue: She's right! That's right up your alley!

Original: Keiss:You guys don't miss a thing. Actually, I'm doing something pretty similar now.
Dialogue: You guys don't miss a thing. Actually, I'm doing something pretty similar now.
trans: 你们不要错过任何事情。

Original: Penelo:Then your world will definitely change! As long as there's one person who wants it to change.
Dialogue: Then your world will definitely change! As long as there's one person who wants it to change.
trans: 那你的世界一定会改变！

Original: Terra:Right. Even if they're from a different tribe, you can join hands and work together.
Dialogue: Right. Even if they're from a different tribe, you can join hands and work together.

Original: Keiss:And she wanted me as High Commander. I don't think she has any intention of monopolizing power.
Dialogue: And she wanted me as High Commander. I don't think she has any intention of monopolizing power.
trans: 她希望我担任高级指挥官。

Original: Ramza:How nice... The beginning of a new age for your world.
Dialogue: How nice... The beginning of a new age for your world.
trans: 多好……你们世界新时代的开始。

Original: Keiss:That's why I want to show it to Layle. He helped make it all possible and still doesn't know.
Dialogue: That's why I want to show it to Layle. He helped make it all possible and still doesn't know.
trans: 这就是为什么我想把它展示给莱尔。

Original: Keiss:Yeah. He's the hero who saved our world.
Dialogue: Yeah. He's the hero who saved our world.

Original: Keiss:And after he saved the world...
Dialogue: And after he saved the world...

Original: Keiss:He disappeared without a word.
Dialogue: He disappeared without a word.

Original: Keiss:Almost like he was blown away by the wind. Like some kind of nomad.
Dialogue: Almost like he was blown away by the wind. Like some kind of nomad.
trans: 几乎就像被风吹走了一样。

Original: Terra:Haha. He sounds like Bartz! Exploring the world, going wherever the wind takes him.
Dialogue: Haha. He sounds like Bartz! Exploring the world, going wherever the wind takes him.

Original: Penelo:That's right. I wonder why they stay here with us... They don't act like that at all around us.
Dialogue: That's right. I wonder why they stay here with us... They don't act like that at all around us.

Original: Keiss:Yeah. To be honest, I was quite surprised to see Layle staying in one place here.
Dialogue: Yeah. To be honest, I was quite surprised to see Layle staying in one place here.

Original: Keiss:...Oh, and he hates talk like this, so don't tell him I told you.
Dialogue: ...Oh, and he hates talk like this, so don't tell him I told you.
trans: ......哦，他讨厌这样说话，所以不要告诉他我告诉你了。

Original: Keiss:Hehe, thanks. Well, I guess it's off to our next destination!
Dialogue: Hehe, thanks. Well, I guess it's off to our next destination!

Original: Keiss:How weird...
Dialogue: How weird...

Original: Keiss:Maybe it was more comfortable for him being treated like a normal human here.
Dialogue: Maybe it was more comfortable for him being treated like a normal human here.
trans: 或许在这里被当成普通人对待对他来说更舒服。

Original: Keiss:Tch. I probably gave him too much credit to think it didn't bother him.
Dialogue: Tch. I probably gave him too much credit to think it didn't bother him.

Original: Keiss:Well, he was treated like a heretic back home.
Dialogue: Well, he was treated like a heretic back home.
trans: 好吧，他在家乡被当作异教徒对待。

Original: Keiss:I wonder if he thinks the world still rejects him...
Dialogue: I wonder if he thinks the world still rejects him...
trans: 我想知道他是否认为世界仍然拒绝他......

Original: Keiss:What an idiot. I have to drag him back home on the double and have everyone give him a piece of their mind.
Dialogue: What an idiot. I have to drag him back home on the double and have everyone give him a piece of their mind.

Original: Auron:You're a friend of Layle's, I hear.
Dialogue: You're a friend of Layle's, I hear.
trans: 你是莱尔的朋友，我听说了。

Original: Keiss:Yeah, but he and i are nothing alike. I'm not a crystal bearer like he is.
Dialogue: Yeah, but he and i are nothing alike. I'm not a crystal bearer like he is.
trans: 是的，但他和我一点也不像。

Original: Porom:So are you two friends?
Dialogue: So are you two friends?

Original: Keiss:Friends? Not quite...
Dialogue: Friends? Not quite...

Original: Keiss:We're from different tribes and don't see each other much outside of jobs, but we're partners without a doubt.
Dialogue: We're from different tribes and don't see each other much outside of jobs, but we're partners without a doubt.
trans: 我们来自不同的部落，除了工作之外很少见面，但毫无疑问我们是合作伙伴。

Original: Papalymo:Partners are truly a splendid thing. It seems Layle and I have more in common than I thought.
Dialogue: Partners are truly a splendid thing. It seems Layle and I have more in common than I thought.
trans: 伙伴真是一件了不起的事情。

Original: Keiss:It's far from splendid. That guy's nothing but trouble.
Dialogue: It's far from splendid. That guy's nothing but trouble.

Original: Tifa:Trouble? That sounds...unfortunate.
Dialogue: Trouble? That sounds...unfortunate.

Original: Keiss:You don't know the half of it.
Dialogue: You don't know the half of it.

Original: Keiss:He gets stuck fighting huge monsters that come out of nowhere and loses his way chasing Goldenrod.
Dialogue: He gets stuck fighting huge monsters that come out of nowhere and loses his way chasing Goldenrod.
trans: 他被困在与不知从哪里冒出来的巨大怪物的战斗中，迷失了追逐一枝黄花的道路。

Original: Keiss:And don't even get me started on vehicles. What goes up must come down!
Dialogue: And don't even get me started on vehicles. What goes up must come down!
trans: 甚至不要让我开始使用车辆。

Original: Keiss:You see? Being partners with that guy means putting up with all that!
Dialogue: You see? Being partners with that guy means putting up with all that!

Original: Tifa:I hate falling...
Dialogue: I hate falling...

Original: Quistis:How can someone without any responsibilities get into so much trouble?
Dialogue: How can someone without any responsibilities get into so much trouble?
trans: 没有任何责任的人怎么会惹上这么多麻烦呢？

Original: Porom:A fair question. doesn't it ever worry you?
Dialogue: A fair question. doesn't it ever worry you?

Original: Keiss:Not really. He's lived to tell the tale every time.
Dialogue: Not really. He's lived to tell the tale every time.

Original: Porom:It must be nice to trust your partner like that! I can't take my eyes off Palom for one second...
Dialogue: It must be nice to trust your partner like that! I can't take my eyes off Palom for one second...
trans: 这样信任你的伴侣一定很好！

Original: Porom:But I guess I can't compare the two. Palom's trouble is of his own making...
Dialogue: But I guess I can't compare the two. Palom's trouble is of his own making...
trans: 但我想我无法比较两者。

Original: Papalymo:...But I'm sure any trouble is more manageable with you at his side.
Dialogue: ...But I'm sure any trouble is more manageable with you at his side.
trans: ......但我敢肯定，有你在他身边，任何麻烦都更容易解决。

Original: Quistis:And even if you do cause trouble, I suppose it's fine as long as it doesn't affect others...
Dialogue: And even if you do cause trouble, I suppose it's fine as long as it doesn't affect others...
trans: 而且，就算你惹麻烦，只要不影响到别人，我想也无妨……

Original: Tifa:But even among friends...
Dialogue: But even among friends...

Original: Tifa:There's trouble that you will and won't tolerate being dragged into, right?
Dialogue: There's trouble that you will and won't tolerate being dragged into, right?
trans: 有麻烦，你会容忍也不会容忍被拖进去，对吧？

Original: Tifa:Sometimes trouble is inevitable, but if it's caused by your own greed I don't want any part of it!
Dialogue: Sometimes trouble is inevitable, but if it's caused by your own greed I don't want any part of it!
trans: 有时候麻烦是不可避免的，但如果是你自己的贪心造成的，我什么都不要！

Original: Auron:And I don't want to pay for anyone's drunken mistakes.
Dialogue: And I don't want to pay for anyone's drunken mistakes.
trans: 而且我不想为任何人的醉酒错误付出代价。

Original: Keiss:All fine examples. But you can't just abandon them, right?
Dialogue: All fine examples. But you can't just abandon them, right?

Original: Tifa:Like they could make it without us! They're our friends because we go through these troublesome things together.
Dialogue: Like they could make it without us! They're our friends because we go through these troublesome things together.
trans: 就像他们没有我们也能成功一样！

Original: Keiss:He may be nothing but trouble, but Layle's reliable and tries to do the right thing. I could do worse than him for a partner.
Dialogue: He may be nothing but trouble, but Layle's reliable and tries to do the right thing. I could do worse than him for a partner.
trans: 他可能只会惹是生非，但莱尔很可靠，而且会努力做正确的事。

Original: Layle:There you are, Keiss. We could use another set of eyes for the next patrol.
Dialogue: There you are, Keiss. We could use another set of eyes for the next patrol.

Original: Keiss:Alright, alright. I'm coming.
Dialogue: Alright, alright. I'm coming.

Original: Quistis:I thought he just said Layle was nothing but trouble.
Dialogue: I thought he just said Layle was nothing but trouble.
trans: 我以为他只是说莱尔就是个麻烦。

Original: Porom:Then it's up to Keiss to watch his back, right? Haha!
Dialogue: Then it's up to Keiss to watch his back, right? Haha!
trans: 然后由 Keiss 看护他，对吧？

Original: Keiss:Hey, quite the group you've got here.
Dialogue: Hey, quite the group you've got here.

Original: Keiss:I'm going to have a look around the area. Does anyone want to join me?
Dialogue: I'm going to have a look around the area. Does anyone want to join me?

Original: Sabin:I'd be happy to. Overflowing with curiosity for the new world, are you?
Dialogue: I'd be happy to. Overflowing with curiosity for the new world, are you?

Original: Keiss:Not really. I just want to know more about it.
Dialogue: Not really. I just want to know more about it.

Original: Keiss:I've got to see the outside with my own eyes, y'know?
Dialogue: I've got to see the outside with my own eyes, y'know?
trans: 我必须亲眼看看外面，你知道吗？

Original: Fang:Quite the earnest adventurer, aren't ya?
Dialogue: Quite the earnest adventurer, aren't ya?
trans: 相当认真的冒险家，不是吗？

Original: Keiss:Is it really that strange to go exploring? The people back home thought it was too, but...
Dialogue: Is it really that strange to go exploring? The people back home thought it was too, but...
trans: 去探险真的有那么奇怪吗？

Original: Keiss:You'll never learn about the outside world by staying in one place.
Dialogue: You'll never learn about the outside world by staying in one place.
trans: 呆在一个地方永远无法了解外面的世界。

Original: Fran:Some things you learn only by leaving homethings you cannot learn through rumors alone.
Dialogue: Some things you learn only by leaving home—things you cannot learn through rumors alone.
trans: 有些事情只有离开家才能知道——光靠谣言是无法知道的。

Original: Keiss:Glad it turned out to be a false alarm! There are plenty of things you just have to see with your own eyes.
Dialogue: Glad it turned out to be a false alarm! There are plenty of things you just have to see with your own eyes.
trans: 很高兴事实证明这是虚惊一场！

Original: Eiko:You didn't think the outside world was scary, Keiss? I know I did...
Dialogue: You didn't think the outside world was scary, Keiss? I know I did...
trans: 你不觉得外面的世界很可怕吗，凯斯？

Original: Keiss:I definitely felt more at ease at home with other Selkies, but you'll get left behind if you never leave the nest.
Dialogue: I definitely felt more at ease at home with other Selkies, but you'll get left behind if you never leave the nest.
trans: 与其他 Selkies 在一起时，我确实觉得在家里更自在，但如果你从不离开巢穴，你就会被抛在后面。

Original: Eiko:Left behind? By who?
Dialogue: Left behind? By who?

Original: Keiss:The rest of the world.
Dialogue: The rest of the world.

Original: Keiss:I hated the Lilty for what they did to the Selkie. We got left behind and struggled just to survive.
Dialogue: I hated the Lilty for what they did to the Selkie. We got left behind and struggled just to survive.
trans: 我讨厌 Lilty，因为他们对 Selkie 做了什么。

Original: Fran:You wished to reclaim your pride.
Dialogue: You wished to reclaim your pride.

Original: Noct:Then you've got no choice but to fight.
Dialogue: Then you've got no choice but to fight.
trans: 那你别无选择，只能战斗。

Original: Eiko:So that's why you left home!
Dialogue: So that's why you left home!
trans: 所以这就是你离开家的原因！

Original: Sabin:You faced any fears you may have had to claim what you desired.
Dialogue: You faced any fears you may have had to claim what you desired.
trans: 你面对任何你可能不得不要求你想要的东西的恐惧。

Original: Fran:Even you left home for something you wanted, no?
Dialogue: Even you left home for something you wanted, no?
trans: 即使你为了你想要的东西而离开家，不是吗？

Original: Eiko:...Right. I wasn't sure what to do at first, but I really wanted to go with Zidane and the others.
Dialogue: ...Right. I wasn't sure what to do at first, but I really wanted to go with Zidane and the others.

Original: Keiss:Then you and I are the same. We both wanted to know more about the outside world.
Dialogue: Then you and I are the same. We both wanted to know more about the outside world.

Original: Keiss:The world is always changing, so it's important to know what's going on.
Dialogue: The world is always changing, so it's important to know what's going on.
trans: 世界总是在变化，所以了解正在发生的事情很重要。

Original: Keiss:So I'll ask one more time: I'm going to have a look around. Does anyone want to join
Dialogue: So I'll ask one more time I'm going to have a look around. Does anyone want to join—
trans: 所以我会再问一次 我要四处看看。

Original: Eiko:Come on, Keiss! Let's go!
Dialogue: Come on, Keiss! Let's go!

Original: Fang:Hurry up now. Wouldn't want you getting lost on my watch.
Dialogue: Hurry up now. Wouldn't want you getting lost on my watch.

Original: Keiss:This is way more people than I expected, but I'm not complaining.
Dialogue: This is way more people than I expected, but I'm not complaining.
trans: 这比我预期的要多得多，但我没有抱怨。

Original: Kam'lanaut:...Have you been waiting here for me?
Dialogue: ...Have you been waiting here for me?

Original: Eald'narche:You needn't be so wary of me. I merely want you to pass my dimensional coordinates onto Materia's warriors.
Dialogue: You needn't be so wary of me. I merely want you to pass my dimensional coordinates onto Materia's warriors.

Original: Eald'narche:Since you're traveling with them, it should be no problem. Right?
Dialogue: Since you're traveling with them, it should be no problem. Right?
trans: 既然你和他们一起旅行，那应该没问题。

Original: Kam'lanaut:I wonder. It's not as if we trust each other.
Dialogue: I wonder. It's not as if we trust each other.

Original: Eald'narche:That matters not. I'm sure they'll take it.
Dialogue: That matters not. I'm sure they'll take it.

Original: Eald'narche:...You think I want to see things for myself, don't you?
Dialogue: ...You think I want to see things for myself, don't you?

Original: Eald'narche:You're right, but make no mistake. That is but a means to an end.
Dialogue: You're right, but make no mistake. That is but a means to an end.

Original: Eald'narche:To undo the failures of the past and make the right choices to obtain the future.
Dialogue: To undo the failures of the past and make the right choices to obtain the future.
trans: 挽回过去的失败，做出正确的选择，才能获得未来。

Original: Kam'lanaut:What are you talking about?
Dialogue: What are you talking about?

Original: Eald'narche:By using the principles of this world, I may be able to settle that time I cast you aside.
Dialogue: By using the principles of this world, I may be able to settle that time I cast you aside.
trans: 我用这个世界的理，或许就能安定我抛弃你的那段时间。

Original: Kam'lanaut:...What nonsense. The past cannot be changed.
Dialogue: ...What nonsense. The past cannot be changed.

Original: Eald'narche:Think what you want. I suppose arguing here was inevitable.
Dialogue: Think what you want. I suppose arguing here was inevitable.

Original: Eald'narche:Give them my coordinates. Understood?
Dialogue: Give them my coordinates. Understood?

Original: Kam'lanaut:Just what is he scheming...?
Dialogue: Just what is he scheming...?

Original: Kam'lanaut:Hmph... I suppose I'll do what he asks for now.
Dialogue: Hmph... I suppose I'll do what he asks for now.
trans: 哼……我想我现在就照他说的做吧。

Original: Kam'lanaut:I need only discern what to do once handing them these coordinates...
Dialogue: I need only discern what to do once handing them these coordinates...
trans: 一旦将这些坐标交给他们，我只需要知道该怎么做......

Original: Kam'lanaut:You worms need only listen.
Dialogue: You worms need only listen.
trans: 你们这些虫子只需要听。

Original: Sabin:Listen to what?
Dialogue: Listen to what?

Original: Kam'lanaut:Take these.
Dialogue: Take these.

Original: Mog:Dimensional coordinates, kupo!?
Dialogue: Dimensional coordinates, kupo!?

Original: Firion:But we've already got yours, Kam'lanaut.
Dialogue: But we've already got yours, Kam'lanaut.
trans: 但我们已经得到了你的，Kam'lanaut。

Original: Mog:...These aren't Kam'lanaut's. They're Eald'narche's!
Dialogue: ...These aren't Kam'lanaut's. They're Eald'narche's!

Original: Sabin:Eald'narche!? You mean the one you betrayed...?
Dialogue: Eald'narche!? You mean the one you betrayed...?

Original: Kam'lanaut:He betrayed me first. And he asked me to give you those.
Dialogue: He betrayed me first. And he asked me to give you those.

Original: Kam'lanaut:Use them as you see fit. It is no concern of mine.
Dialogue: Use them as you see fit. It is no concern of mine.
trans: 按您认为合适的方式使用它们。

Original: Firion:What is Eald'narche thinking...?
Dialogue: What is Eald'narche thinking...?

Original: Kam'lanaut:He saw me lending you a hand...and decided to cooperate.
Dialogue: He saw me lending you a hand...and decided to cooperate.
trans: 他看到我向你伸出援手...决定合作

Original: Sabin:Does he want to help for the same reason as you? To understand our motivations?
Dialogue: Does he want to help for the same reason as you? To understand our motivations?
trans: 他是否出于与您相同的原因而想提供帮助？

Original: Kam'lanaut:You have a praiseworthy memory for a primate. Now you two can use each other.
Dialogue: You have a praiseworthy memory for a primate. Now you two can use each other.
trans: 作为灵长类动物，你的记忆力值得称赞。

Original: Kam'lanaut:His strength is absolute. He will no doubt be a worthy comrade in battle.
Dialogue: His strength is absolute. He will no doubt be a worthy comrade in battle.

Original: Firion:But we can't trust him!
Dialogue: But we can't trust him!

Original: Kam'lanaut:Trust... Hmph. There is a chance he'll throw you away as easily as he did me.
Dialogue: Trust... Hmph. There is a chance he'll throw you away as easily as he did me.

Original: Kam'lanaut:But for a moment, see how the scales balance.
Dialogue: But for a moment, see how the scales balance.
trans: 但请稍等片刻，看看天平是如何平衡的。

Original: Kam'lanaut:A great power like Eald'narche's against fragile sentiments like trust...
Dialogue: A great power like Eald'narche's against fragile sentiments like trust...
trans: 像 Eald'narche 这样的强大力量对抗像信任这样脆弱的情绪......

Original: Kam'lanaut:Which will be more beneficial to you in the end?
Dialogue: Which will be more beneficial to you in the end?

Original: Firion:...Could it be he can't trust him, either?
Dialogue: ...Could it be he can't trust him, either?

Original: Sabin:Let's talk with the others, Mog.
Dialogue: Let's talk with the others, Mog.
trans: 让我们和其他人谈谈吧，Mog。

Original: Mog:Right... We can't decide this on our own, kupo.
Dialogue: Right... We can't decide this on our own, kupo.
trans: 对……我们不能自己决定，库波。

Original: Eald'narche:So you didn't throw my coordinates away. Perhaps you fools are worthy of being saved after all.
Dialogue: So you didn't throw my coordinates away. Perhaps you fools are worthy of being saved after all.
trans: 所以你没有丢掉我的坐标。

Original: Lion:We don't need your saving, thanks.
Dialogue: We don't need your saving, thanks.
trans: 我们不需要你的积蓄，谢谢。

Original: Eald'narche:No matter. I did not come here to discuss something so pedantic.
Dialogue: No matter. I did not come here to discuss something so pedantic.

Original: Eald'narche:I will be your ally. It will be to our mutual benefit.
Dialogue: I will be your ally. It will be to our mutual benefit.

Original: Quistis:What made you change your mind? I thought we were enemies.
Dialogue: What made you change your mind? I thought we were enemies.
trans: 是什么让你改变了主意？

Original: Eald'narche:Enemies...? I was merely cleaning up my brother's mess.
Dialogue: Enemies...? I was merely cleaning up my brother's mess.

Original: Eald'narche:One cannot create a fake Paradise. There was no need to make things worse than they were.
Dialogue: One cannot create a fake Paradise. There was no need to make things worse than they were.
trans: 一个人无法创造一个虚假的天堂。

Original: Eald'narche:As a result, we became enemies. That's all there is to it.
Dialogue: As a result, we became enemies. That's all there is to it.

Original: Edge:You want us to believe you, even though you tried to destroy Lion's world!?
Dialogue: You want us to believe you, even though you tried to destroy Lion's world!?
trans: 你想要我们相信你，即使你试图摧毁狮子的世界！？

Original: Eald'narche:Destroy? I was trying to make a paradise for the chosen. It's the same as the gods of this world.
Dialogue: Destroy? I was trying to make a paradise for the chosen. It's the same as the gods of this world.

Original: Lion:The same? How...?
Dialogue: The same? How...?

Original: Eald'narche:Then tell me: what's different? Not that I expect us to understand each other, but...
Dialogue: Then tell me what's different? Not that I expect us to understand each other, but...
trans: 然后告诉我有什么不同？

Original: Eald'narche:Our goal is the same, isn't it?
Dialogue: Our goal is the same, isn't it?
trans: 我们的目标是一样的，不是吗？

Original: Quistis:Goal? What do you mean?
Dialogue: Goal? What do you mean?

Original: Eald'narche:By using the principles of this world, we may be able to return to our respective homes without the help of the gods.
Dialogue: By using the principles of this world, we may be able to return to our respective homes without the help of the gods.
trans: 通过运用这个世界的法则，我们或许可以在没有神灵帮助的情况下回到各自的家园。

Original: Kam'lanaut:(To fix the past, we must return to our world. I should have known Eald'narche would think that far ahead.)
Dialogue: (To fix the past, we must return to our world. I should have known Eald'narche would think that far ahead.)
trans: （要修复过去，我们必须回到我们的世界。我早该知道 Eald'narche 会这么想。）

Original: Eald'narche:To that end, it became necessary for me to see things through your eyes.
Dialogue: To that end, it became necessary for me to see things through your eyes.
trans: 为此，我有必要通过你的眼睛看事情。

Original: Eald'narche:Returning home is your goal, is it not?
Dialogue: Returning home is your goal, is it not?
trans: 回家是你的目标，不是吗？

Original: Eald'narche:So adding me to your ranks helps us both. Don't you agree?
Dialogue: So adding me to your ranks helps us both. Don't you agree?
trans: 所以把我加入你的行列对我们都有帮助。

Original: Lion:...Just because we have the same goal doesn't mean I'll work with you.
Dialogue: ...Just because we have the same goal doesn't mean I'll work with you.
trans: ...只是因为我们有相同的目标并不意味着我会和你一起工作。

Original: Eald'narche:How annoying... All I did was rid the world of its scum, and yet you say that!?
Dialogue: How annoying... All I did was rid the world of its scum, and yet you say that!?
trans: 真烦人……我只是把人间渣渣给扫光了，你还这么说！？

Original: Eald'narche:As long as you have value to me, I won't harm you. You can share in the profits of others.
Dialogue: As long as you have value to me, I won't harm you. You can share in the profits of others.
trans: 只要你对我有价值，我就不会伤害你。

Original: Eald'narche:To simplify for you fools: I will let you know once I figure out a way to return to our home worlds.
Dialogue: To simplify for you fools I will let you know once I figure out a way to return to our home worlds.
trans: 为了简化你们这些傻瓜，一旦我找到返回我们家乡世界的方法，我会通知你们。

Original: Eald'narche:...You won't be won over, you say? How about you? Your heart seems to be wavering.
Dialogue: ...You won't be won over, you say? How about you? Your heart seems to be wavering.

Original: Edge:That's true, but...I won't be so easily drawn in by you!
Dialogue: That's true, but...I won't be so easily drawn in by you!
trans: 是啊，不过……我不会那么容易被你拉上去的！

Original: Quistis:Exactly. There's too great a risk in making you our ally.
Dialogue: Exactly. There's too great a risk in making you our ally.

Original: Eald'narche:...Hmph. Very well then.
Dialogue: ...Hmph. Very well then.

Original: Eald'narche:Let me tell you something interesting. Something Kam'lanaut hasn't even heard...
Dialogue: Let me tell you something interesting. Something Kam'lanaut hasn't even heard...
trans: 让我告诉你一件有趣的事。

Original: Eald'narche:There are some perculiar things occurring in this world.
Dialogue: There are some perculiar things occurring in this world.
trans: 这个世界上发生了一些奇特的事情。

Original: Eald'narche:Those who have died in our home worlds can be brought back here.
Dialogue: Those who have died in our home worlds can be brought back here.
trans: 那些在我们家乡世界死去的人可以被带回这里。

Original: Eald'narche:The time you'd wish to return to varies before and after reclaiming your brilliance.
Dialogue: The time you'd wish to return to varies before and after reclaiming your brilliance.
trans: 恢复光彩前后，您希望返回的时间各不相同。

Original: Eald'narche:Do you not think it strange? If we return to our original worlds, when do you think we will go back to?
Dialogue: Do you not think it strange? If we return to our original worlds, when do you think we will go back to?

Original: Chelinka:You don't mean...
Dialogue: You don't mean...

Original: Yuri:We might be able to return to whatever time we want?
Dialogue: We might be able to return to whatever time we want?
trans: 我们也许可以回到我们想要的任何时间？

Original: Galuf:Is that possible!?
Dialogue: Is that possible!?

Original: Eald'narche:How perceptive of you. In this hypothesis, we can fix the mistakes of our past.
Dialogue: How perceptive of you. In this hypothesis, we can fix the mistakes of our past.

Original: Kam'lanaut:(I see... So one could both return home and start over.)
Dialogue: (I see... So one could both return home and start over.)
trans: （我明白了......所以一个人可以回家并重新开始。）

Original: Lion:I understand what you're thinking, but...we'll still stop you no matter how many times you try!
Dialogue: I understand what you're thinking, but...we'll still stop you no matter how many times you try!
trans: 我明白你在想什么，但是……无论你尝试多少次，我们都会阻止你！

Original: Yuri:Wait, Lion. I don't think that's it...
Dialogue: Wait, Lion. I don't think that's it...

Original: Yuri:If you go back home, you two might not have to fight. You'll return to different worlds.
Dialogue: If you go back home, you two might not have to fight. You'll return to different worlds.
trans: 如果你回家，你们两个可能就不用打架了。

Original: Eald'narche:...I see. I thought you knew something, but you speak from experience.
Dialogue: ...I see. I thought you knew something, but you speak from experience.

Original: Eald'narche:Thanks to which, I have confirmed my hypothesis.
Dialogue: Thanks to which, I have confirmed my hypothesis.
trans: 多亏了它，我证实了我的假设。

Original: Eald'narche:It is as he says. To put it in simpleton's terms: there will be parallel worlds.
Dialogue: It is as he says. To put it in simpleton's terms there will be parallel worlds.

Original: Eald'narche:You will each be given a fair chance to fix your past mistakes.
Dialogue: You will each be given a fair chance to fix your past mistakes.
trans: 你们每个人都有公平的机会改正过去的错误。

Original: Eald'narche:What do you think?
Dialogue: What do you think?

Original: Chelinka:But if you go back to that world, will you still hurt lots of people?
Dialogue: But if you go back to that world, will you still hurt lots of people?
trans: 可如果回到那个世界，你还会伤害很多人吗？

Original: Eald'narche:And if I do?
Dialogue: And if I do?

Original: Eald'narche:...I see. We could not be allies, then. Despite how much I've explained...
Dialogue: ...I see. We could not be allies, then. Despite how much I've explained...

Original: Lion:If you can read our minds, you understand. We don't need your power.
Dialogue: If you can read our minds, you understand. We don't need your power.
trans: 如果你能读懂我们的想法，你就会明白。

Original: Eald'narche:I know. But your understanding is pitifully shallow.
Dialogue: I know. But your understanding is pitifully shallow.

Original: Eald'narche:You've been so focused on me that you haven't noticed the benefits for yourselves.
Dialogue: You've been so focused on me that you haven't noticed the benefits for yourselves.
trans: 你一直如此专注于我，以至于你没有注意到对你自己的好处。

Original: Lion:There's nothing I want to fix in my past. No matter what it is, it's made me who I am today.
Dialogue: There's nothing I want to fix in my past. No matter what it is, it's made me who I am today.
trans: 我的过去没有什么我想修复的。

Original: Eald'narche:I wasn't talking about you. Or have you forgotten since coming here?
Dialogue: I wasn't talking about you. Or have you forgotten since coming here?

Original: Eald'narche:If you do as I say, those who should have perished can still live.
Dialogue: If you do as I say, those who should have perished can still live.
trans: 如果你照我说的做，那些该死的人还能活下来。

Original: Ignis:...Do not underestimate us.
Dialogue: ...Do not underestimate us.

Original: Eald'narche:Ahaha! Those eyes!
Dialogue: Ahaha! Those eyes!

Original: Eald'narche:But what about the others? If they knew of the possibility...
Dialogue: But what about the others? If they knew of the possibility...

Original: Eald'narche:I welcome you at any time. We can work together for a better future.
Dialogue: I welcome you at any time. We can work together for a better future.

Original: Lion:If we can prevent some from dying, I want to save them, but...
Dialogue: If we can prevent some from dying, I want to save them, but...
trans: 如果我们可以防止一些人死亡，我想拯救他们，但是......

Original: Ignis:No. It's as you said. Everything in our pasts has made us who we are.
Dialogue: No. It's as you said. Everything in our pasts has made us who we are.

Original: Lion:I thought about throwing away his coordinates, but...it wouldn't change anything.
Dialogue: I thought about throwing away his coordinates, but...it wouldn't change anything.
trans: 我想过丢掉他的坐标，但是……这不会改变任何东西。

Original: Lion:And I can't just leave them here. Maybe I'll give them to Mog until my heart is ready...
Dialogue: And I can't just leave them here. Maybe I'll give them to Mog until my heart is ready...
trans: 我不能就这样把他们留在这里。

Original: Yuri:I think you should do what you want. Don't think you have to shoulder this alone.
Dialogue: I think you should do what you want. Don't think you have to shoulder this alone.
trans: 我认为你应该做你想做的。

Original: Chelinka:I understand a little of how Eald'narche feels... But if lots of sacrifices need to be made, I'll do whatever it takes to stop him.
Dialogue: I understand a little of how Eald'narche feels... But if lots of sacrifices need to be made, I'll do whatever it takes to stop him.
trans: 我有点理解 Eald'narche 的感受……但如果需要做出很多牺牲，我会不惜一切代价阻止他。

Original: Lion:Yeah... Thank you, everyone.
Dialogue: Yeah... Thank you, everyone.

Original: Kam'lanaut:Do you really intend to do things over?
Dialogue: Do you really intend to do things over?
trans: 你真的打算重新来过吗？

Original: Eald'narche:Of course. And this time, everything will go according to plan.
Dialogue: Of course. And this time, everything will go according to plan.

Original: Eald'narche:You understand what you must do, don't you? Do not betray my expectations.
Dialogue: You understand what you must do, don't you? Do not betray my expectations.
trans: 你明白你必须做什么，不是吗？

Original: Kam'lanaut:So that we do not fail this time...?
Dialogue: So that we do not fail this time...?

Original: Eald'narche:What boring opponents.
Dialogue: What boring opponents.

Original: Yuna:Thank you...for helping us.
Dialogue: Thank you...for helping us.

Original: Eald'narche:Don't thank me if you don't mean it. Empty gestures disgust me.
Dialogue: Don't thank me if you don't mean it. Empty gestures disgust me.
trans: 如果你不是那个意思，请不要感谢我。

Original: Eald'narche:Why thank me if you don't believe you can trust me? Or if you only think I helped you out of self-interest?
Dialogue: Why thank me if you don't believe you can trust me? Or if you only think I helped you out of self-interest?
trans: 如果你不相信你可以信任我，为什么要感谢我？

Original: Yuna:I... Uh...
Edgar:Don't you think it's a little rude to be reading people's thoughts without telling them?
Dialogue: Don't you think it's a little rude to be reading people's thoughts without telling them?
trans: 你不觉得在不告诉别人的情况下读懂别人的想法有点不礼貌吗？

Original: Eald'narche:And it's considered polite not to say what you mean? I have no interest in false friends.
Dialogue: And it's considered polite not to say what you mean? I have no interest in false friends.
trans: 不说出你的意思被认为是礼貌的？

Original: Edgar:Don't take it personally, Yuna. Some people are just...rough around the edges.
Dialogue: Don't take it personally, Yuna. Some people are just...rough around the edges.

Original: Lion:I know you like to try your best to put everyone at ease, but there's nothing to be done with Eald'narche.
Dialogue: I know you like to try your best to put everyone at ease, but there's nothing to be done with Eald'narche.
trans: 我知道你喜欢尽最大努力让每个人都放心，但 Eald'narche 没有什么可做的。

Original: Basch:He might've been the one to come to us, but that doesn't mean we have to trust each other.
Dialogue: He might've been the one to come to us, but that doesn't mean we have to trust each other.
trans: 他可能是来找我们的人，但这并不意味着我们必须相互信任。

Original: Yuna:I just wanted to make him feel welcomed.
Dialogue: I just wanted to make him feel welcomed.
trans: 我只是想让他感到受欢迎。

Original: Yuna:But I could feel the way he looked down on us and just couldn't do it...
Dialogue: But I could feel the way he looked down on us and just couldn't do it...
trans: 但我能感觉到他看不起我们，就是做不到……

Original: Yuna:I'm sure he was able to sense that feeling too.
Dialogue: I'm sure he was able to sense that feeling too.
trans: 我相信他也能感受到那种感觉。

Original: Lion:We'll have to be satisfied with the fact that he cooperated with us at all. It's not like Spiritus's warriors are clamoring to help us out.
Dialogue: We'll have to be satisfied with the fact that he cooperated with us at all. It's not like Spiritus's warriors are clamoring to help us out.
trans: 我们必须对他与我们合作这一事实感到满意。

Original: Lion:Just imagine if it were Seymour instead. Would you still want to make him feel welcome?
Dialogue: Just imagine if it were Seymour instead. Would you still want to make him feel welcome?

Original: Yuna:Hmm... I see your point.
Dialogue: Hmm... I see your point.

Original: Edgar:He joined up with us because he's looking for a way back to his world. We don't need to expect anything else from him.
Dialogue: He joined up with us because he's looking for a way back to his world. We don't need to expect anything else from him.
trans: 他加入我们是因为他正在寻找回到他的世界的方法。

Original: Edgar:He might have information we can use, and we might have information he can use. It's better than being enemies.
Dialogue: He might have information we can use, and we might have information he can use. It's better than being enemies.
trans: 他可能有我们可以使用的信息，我们也可能有他可以使用的信息。

Original: Basch:It certainly is... However, it doesn't seem he has much in common with Kam'lanaut.
Dialogue: It certainly is... However, it doesn't seem he has much in common with Kam'lanaut.
trans: 确实是……但是，他似乎与 Kam'lanaut 没有太多共同之处。

Original: Yuna:Even though they're brothers, or so they say. Judging by how they treat each other, you'd never guess.
Dialogue: Even though they're brothers, or so they say. Judging by how they treat each other, you'd never guess.
trans: 尽管他们是兄弟，至少他们是这么说的。

Original: Edgar:Take it from me: siblingseven twins have their differences as much as anyone else.
Dialogue: Take it from me siblings—even twins— have their differences as much as anyone else.
trans: 相信我，兄弟姐妹——即使是双胞胎——也和其他人一样存在差异。

Original: Edgar:But even so, those two are different. There's not an ounce of brotherhood between them.
Dialogue: But even so, those two are different. There's not an ounce of brotherhood between them.
trans: 但即便如此，这两者还是不同的。

Original: Lion:Indeed. I have no doubt Eald'narche would do anything to achieve his goals. Even in this world.
Dialogue: Indeed. I have no doubt Eald'narche would do anything to achieve his goals. Even in this world.

Original: Basch:Kam'lanaut claimed to have trusted him, but I wonder what he believes now. Once broken, trust cannot easily be mended.
Dialogue: Kam'lanaut claimed to have trusted him, but I wonder what he believes now. Once broken, trust cannot easily be mended.
trans: Kam'lanaut 声称信任他，但我想知道他现在相信什么。

Original: Yuna:It must be frightening to even consider trusting someone who has betrayed you before.
Dialogue: It must be frightening to even consider trusting someone who has betrayed you before.
trans: 甚至考虑信任一个曾经背叛过你的人，这一定是可怕的。

Original: Basch:And doubly so with someone who possesses such an uncanny ability. Even your slightest vulnerability can be laid bare.
Dialogue: And doubly so with someone who possesses such an uncanny ability. Even your slightest vulnerability can be laid bare.
trans: 对于拥有如此不可思议的能力的人来说更是如此。

Original: Lion:That's right. I can understand why Kam'lanaut would be worried.
Dialogue: That's right. I can understand why Kam'lanaut would be worried.

Original: Edgar:I can't imagine what it'd be like to have a sibling you couldn't trust...
Dialogue: I can't imagine what it'd be like to have a sibling you couldn't trust...
trans: 我无法想象有一个你无法信任的兄弟姐妹是什么感觉......

Original: Edgar:But then again, I'm not inclined toward evil acts. To them, trying to see eye to eye is probably more trouble than it's worth.
Dialogue: But then again, I'm not inclined toward evil acts. To them, trying to see eye to eye is probably more trouble than it's worth.
trans: 但话又说回来，我不倾向于邪恶的行为。

Original: Yuna:I suppose they're a special case... I guess I shouldn't let it get to me. I have you guys to worry about, after all!
Dialogue: I suppose they're a special case... I guess I shouldn't let it get to me. I have you guys to worry about, after all!
trans: 我想他们是特例……我想我不应该让它影响到我。

Original: Basch:Indeed. The stronger our bonds, the harder it will be for Eald'narche to find and exploit a weak link between us.
Dialogue: Indeed. The stronger our bonds, the harder it will be for Eald'narche to find and exploit a weak link between us.

Original: Lion:I agree, but I don't think we have much to worry about. If he tries something funny, he won't stand a chance against us!
Dialogue: I agree, but I don't think we have much to worry about. If he tries something funny, he won't stand a chance against us!
trans: 我同意，但我认为我们不必担心太多。

Original: Lion:As long as we trust each other, there's nothing we can't stand against.
Dialogue: As long as we trust each other, there's nothing we can't stand against.
trans: 只要我们彼此信任，就没有什么是我们不能抵挡的。

Original: Warrior of Light:We've made contact with one of Spiritus's warriors. They've asked to join forces for the fights ahead.
Dialogue: We've made contact with one of Spiritus's warriors. They've asked to join forces for the fights ahead.
trans: 我们已经与 Spiritus 的一名战士取得了联系。

Original: Materia:You speak of Eald'narche.
Dialogue: You speak of Eald'narche.

Original: Onion Knight:So you know about him already. Good. We don't have to waste time explaining.
Dialogue: So you know about him already. Good. We don't have to waste time explaining.

Original: Onion Knight:Something was off. I think he's up to something.
Dialogue: Something was off. I think he's up to something.

Original: Onion Knight:He wants to know more about how this world works, and it seemed like he had it in mind to come visit you.
Dialogue: He wants to know more about how this world works, and it seemed like he had it in mind to come visit you.
trans: 他想更多地了解这个世界是如何运作的，看来他是有意来看你的。

Original: Warrior of Light:If his intention is nefarious, we will protect you.
Dialogue: If his intention is nefarious, we will protect you.
trans: 如果他的意图是邪恶的，我们会保护你。

Original: Materia:Thank you, my warriors. Having you by my side sets my heart at ease. However...
Dialogue: Thank you, my warriors. Having you by my side sets my heart at ease. However...

Original: Materia:Lest you forget, I am a god. You needn't worry about me so much.
Dialogue: Lest you forget, I am a god. You needn't worry about me so much.

Original: Onion Knight:Don't forget what happenedlast time! I don't ever want to feel so powerless again.
Dialogue: Don't forget what happened last time! I don't ever want to feel so powerless again.
trans: 不要忘记上次发生的事情！

Original: Materia:You are too kind.
Dialogue: You are too kind.

Original: Materia:With guardians such as you, I have nothing to fear. Can I depend on you to come to my aid, if Mog summons you?
Dialogue: With guardians such as you, I have nothing to fear. Can I depend on you to come to my aid, if Mog summons you?
trans: 有你这样的守护者，我无所畏惧。

Original: Warrior of Light:Of course. There is no task too great.
Dialogue: Of course. There is no task too great.

Original: Materia:Thank you. I feel safer just hearing it.
Dialogue: Thank you. I feel safer just hearing it.

Original: Cecil:There's no way for me to know. I doubt Eald'narche knows for certain either, for all his confidence.
Dialogue: There's no way for me to know. I doubt Eald'narche knows for certain either, for all his confidence.

Original: Cecil:Even if there were a way, it requires power beyond even his. I suspect that's why he came to us.
Dialogue: Even if there were a way, it requires power beyond even his. I suspect that's why he came to us.
trans: 就算有办法，也需要超越他的力量。

Original: Firion:Wonder if he's taking advantage of us...
Dialogue: Wonder if he's taking advantage of us...
trans: 不知道他是不是在利用我们...

Original: Cecil:I doubt he has any interest in us personally. He wants to get close to someone elsesomeone who knows much of the way of the world.
Dialogue: I doubt he has any interest in us personally. He wants to get close to someone else—someone who knows much of the way of the world.
trans: 我怀疑他对我们个人有任何兴趣。

Original: Firion:You mean...Materia!?
Dialogue: You mean...Materia!?

Original: Onion Knight:We had that same thought. So we checked up on her.
Dialogue: We had that same thought. So we checked up on her.

Original: Firion:Why am I not surprised? Should've known you'd have a hunch.
Dialogue: Why am I not surprised? Should've known you'd have a hunch.

Original: Onion Knight:Heh. Well, I guess I'm just that good.
Dialogue: Heh. Well, I guess I'm just that good.

Original: Cecil:How was she? Did anything seem odd with her?
Dialogue: How was she? Did anything seem odd with her?

Original: Warrior of Light:Not as of yet. She said she would summon us the moment something seemed amiss.
Dialogue: Not as of yet. She said she would summon us the moment something seemed amiss.

Original: Cecil:Thank you. She is our guiding light, and we must keep her safe.
Dialogue: Thank you. She is our guiding light, and we must keep her safe.

Original: Onion Knight:We need to be careful. We don't know where or when our enemies will strike, but we'll be ready with both eyes open.
Dialogue: We need to be careful. We don't know where or when our enemies will strike, but we'll be ready with both eyes open.

Original: Onion Knight:I'll do whatever needs to be done.
Dialogue: I'll do whatever needs to be done.
trans: 我会做任何需要做的事。

Original: Warrior of Light:The dimensional coordinates give them many avenues to approach from. We must be vigilant.
Dialogue: The dimensional coordinates give them many avenues to approach from. We must be vigilant.
trans: 次元坐标为他们提供了许多接近的途径。

Original: Warrior of Light:I won't let the past repeat itselfnot ever. Materia must be protected, at all costs.
Dialogue: I won't let the past repeat itself—not ever. Materia must be protected, at all costs.
trans: 我不会让过去重演——永远不会。

Original: Eald'narche:Hmph. That one's quite full of himself, isn't he? Regardless, he's told me what I need to know.
Dialogue: Hmph. That one's quite full of himself, isn't he? Regardless, he's told me what I need to know.

Original: Eald'narche:The two gods are the pillars of this world. If they disappear, it will begin to crumble.
Dialogue: The two gods are the pillars of this world. If they disappear, it will begin to crumble.
trans: 这两个神是这个世界的支柱。

Original: Eald'narche:Such an easy target, if not for their meddling. How troublesome.
Dialogue: Such an easy target, if not for their meddling. How troublesome.
trans: 如此简单的目标，如果不是因为他们的干涉。

Original: Eald'narche:It doesn't matter, I suppose. Another chance will present itself before long.
Dialogue: It doesn't matter, I suppose. Another chance will present itself before long.

Original: ???:Or could it be...that I was spared? Me alone?
Dialogue: Or could it be...that I was spared? Me alone?

Original: ???:Ace, Cater, Cinque, King... Could it be that, while I remain, they
Dialogue: Ace, Cater, Cinque, King... Could it be that, while I remain, they—
trans: Ace、Cater、Cinque、King……难不成，只要我还在，他们——

Original: ???:No. That simply can't be.
Dialogue: No. That simply can't be.

Original: ???:I have retained my memories of them. It then stands to reason that they are still alive and well.
Dialogue: I have retained my memories of them. It then stands to reason that they are still alive and well.
trans: 我保留了对他们的记忆。

Original: ???:...No, I mustn't jump to conlcusions. I need to remain calm and consider all possible situations.
Dialogue: ...No, I mustn't jump to conlcusions. I need to remain calm and consider all possible situations.

Original: ???:Perhaps this means that the crystal itself is gone. But is such a thing even possible?
Dialogue: Perhaps this means that the crystal itself is gone. But is such a thing even possible?
trans: 也许这意味着水晶本身已经消失了。

Original: ???:...Not that anyone is here to answer me. How terribly lonesome this place is...
Dialogue: ...Not that anyone is here to answer me. How terribly lonesome this place is...
trans: ......并不是说有人在这里回答我。

Original: ???:At any rate, I will suppose that I am alive and shall set out to find the others.
Dialogue: At any rate, I will suppose that I am alive and shall set out to find the others.
trans: 无论如何，我会假设我还活着，并且会出发去寻找其他人。

Original: Materia:It seems you've awoken, Trey.
Dialogue: It seems you've awoken, Trey.

Original: Trey:Excuse me?
Dialogue: Excuse me?

Original: Trey:My apologies, but...who are you?
Dialogue: My apologies, but...who are you?

Original: Materia:I am Materia, one of two gods governing this world.
Dialogue: I am Materia, one of two gods governing this world.
trans: 我是 Materia，统治这个世界的两个神之一。

Original: Trey:A god named Materia?
Dialogue: A god named Materia?
trans: 一个名叫马泰里亚的神？

Original: Trey:I regret to inform you that I've never once come upon such a name in the countless books I've read.
Dialogue: I regret to inform you that I've never once come upon such a name in the countless books I've read.
trans: 很遗憾地通知您，在我读过的无数书籍中，我从未遇到过这样的名字。

Original: Materia:This is a world different from the one you are from.
Dialogue: This is a world different from the one you are from.
trans: 这是一个与你来自的世界不同的世界。

Original: Materia:Allow me to tell you about this place and the reason you're here now...
Dialogue: Allow me to tell you about this place and the reason you're here now...
trans: 请允许我向您介绍这个地方以及您现在在这里的原因...

Original: Vivi:I... I'm really sorry, Mog...
Dialogue: I... I'm really sorry, Mog...

Original: Tifa:Did something happen?
Dialogue: Did something happen?

Original: Zidane:They're Mog's favorite, aren't they?
Dialogue: They're Mog's favorite, aren't they?
trans: 它们是 Mog 的最爱，不是吗？

Original: Tifa:It must be quite a shock to have him looking so sad...
Dialogue: It must be quite a shock to have him looking so sad...
trans: 他看起来如此悲伤，一定很震惊……

Original: Zidane:Then let's turn back! We can ask the others to be on the lookout, too!
Dialogue: Then let's turn back! We can ask the others to be on the lookout, too!

Original: Vivi:Really, Zidane!?
Dialogue: Really, Zidane!?

Original: Mog:Thank you, thank you, thank you, kupo! You're my hero, Zidane!
Dialogue: Thank you, thank you, thank you, kupo! You're my hero, Zidane!

Original: Tifa:I really hope we can find those kupo nuts...
Dialogue: I really hope we can find those kupo nuts...
trans: 我真的希望我们能找到那些 kupo 坚果...

Original: Trey:How utterly shocking. To know that every world's very existence now hangs in the balance...
Dialogue: How utterly shocking. To know that every world's very existence now hangs in the balance...

Original: Trey:And that not just myself, but warriors from other worlds were summoned for this purpose...
Dialogue: And that not just myself, but warriors from other worlds were summoned for this purpose...
trans: 为了这个目的，不仅是我，还有来自其他世界的战士被召唤……

Original: Trey:What could that be...
Dialogue: What could that be...

Original: Trey:Nuts? I wonder why they would be amongst all this rubble...
Dialogue: Nuts? I wonder why they would be amongst all this rubble...

Original: Mog:Found 'em, kupooo!
Dialogue: Found 'em, kupooo!

Original: Mog:Those are my prized kupo nuts! Thank you for finding them, kupo!
Dialogue: Those are my prized kupo nuts! Thank you for finding them, kupo!
trans: 这些是我珍贵的 kupo 坚果！

Original: Trey:...You are most welcome.
Dialogue: ...You are most welcome.

Original: Vivi:I'm so happy we found them!
Dialogue: I'm so happy we found them!
trans: 我很高兴我们找到了他们！

Original: Cait Sith:Well, we can check that off the list now!
Dialogue: Well, we can check that off the list now!
trans: 好吧，我们现在可以将其从列表中剔除！

Original: Trey:Hmm... From your appearance, I gather you are warriors from other worlds.
Dialogue: Hmm... From your appearance, I gather you are warriors from other worlds.
trans: 嗯……看你的样子，我猜你是来自异界的战士。

Original: Vivi:Huh? Your clothes...
Dialogue: Huh? Your clothes...

Original: Vivi:Could you be a friend of Mister Ace and the others?
Dialogue: Could you be a friend of Mister Ace and the others?
trans: 你能成为艾斯先生他们的朋友吗？

Original: Trey:So you know my classmates?
Dialogue: So you know my classmates?

Original: Mog:Of course, kupo! We've been traveling together for a while now!
Dialogue: Of course, kupo! We've been traveling together for a while now!

Original: Trey:So they're alive after all. What a relief...
Dialogue: So they're alive after all. What a relief...

Original: Trey:How rude of me. Please call me Trey. I am a member ofClass ZerofromAkademeiain theDominion of Rubrum.
Dialogue: How rude of me. Please call me Trey. I am a member of Class Zero from Akademeia in the Dominion of Rubrum.

Original: Trey:But I suppose I am getting ahead of myself. According to legend,Agitoare meant to be the saviors of our world,Orience...
Dialogue: But I suppose I am getting ahead of myself. According to legend, Agito are meant to be the saviors of our world, Orience...

Original: Mog:K-kupo? What's he going on about?
Dialogue: K-kupo? What's he going on about?

Original: Cait Sith:Not sure, but he seems pretty enthusiastic about it. Let's hear him out.
Dialogue: Not sure, but he seems pretty enthusiastic about it. Let's hear him out.
trans: 不确定，但他似乎对此很感兴趣。

Original: Trey:...And that is the abridged history of our dear Akademeia and Class Zero.
Dialogue: ...And that is the abridged history of our dear Akademeia and Class Zero.
trans: ......这就是我们亲爱的 Akademeia 和零级的简史。

Original: Cait Sith:I get it now...
Dialogue: I get it now...

Original: Vivi:Thank you for teaching us that, Mister Trey!
Dialogue: Thank you for teaching us that, Mister Trey!
trans: 谢谢你教我们这些，特雷先生！

Original: Trey:It was my pleasure. Thank you for listening!
Dialogue: It was my pleasure. Thank you for listening!

Original: Cater:Wow, someone actually listened until the end... I guess there's a first time for everything.
Dialogue: Wow, someone actually listened until the end... I guess there's a first time for everything.
trans: 哇，居然有人听到最后……我想凡事都有第一次。

Original: Trey:Cater! Deuce!
Dialogue: Cater! Deuce!

Original: Deuce:It's nice to see you, Trey.
Dialogue: It's nice to see you, Trey.

Original: Cater:We came to check on Vivi and the others. We didn't expect to see you here!
Dialogue: We came to check on Vivi and the others. We didn't expect to see you here!
trans: 我们是来看薇薇她们的。

Original: Trey:I am relieved to see you both in good health. Where are the others?
Dialogue: I am relieved to see you both in good health. Where are the others?
trans: 看到你们都身体健康，我感到很欣慰。

Original: Cater:Waiting over there. You had better go say hi!
Dialogue: Waiting over there. You had better go say hi!

Original: Trey:I will.
Dialogue: I will.

Original: Vivi:I'm so glad you can see your classmates again!
Dialogue: I'm so glad you can see your classmates again!
trans: 很高兴你又能见到你的同学了！

Original: Mog:And we found my kupo nuts and a new friend! Today was a great day, kupo!
Dialogue: And we found my kupo nuts and a new friend! Today was a great day, kupo!
trans: 我们找到了我的 kupo 坚果和一个新朋友！

Original: Trey:Take that!
Dialogue: Take that!

Original: Barret:Haha! Not bad at all!
Dialogue: Haha! Not bad at all!

Original: Trey:Why, thank you.
Dialogue: Why, thank you.

Original: Ace:It looks like your shots are as dead-on as ever, Trey.
Dialogue: It looks like your shots are as dead-on as ever, Trey.
trans: 看起来你的投篮一如既往地精准，Trey。

Original: Cater:And his stories as long as ever.
Dialogue: And his stories as long as ever.

Original: Machina:...It's been a while, Trey.
Dialogue: ...It's been a while, Trey.

Original: Trey:What a surprise it is to see you in your human form...
Dialogue: What a surprise it is to see you in your human form...
trans: 看到你的人类形态真是太惊喜了……

Original: Wakka:What's that mean?
Dialogue: What's that mean?

Original: Machina:...I see. So you have all your memories, then.
Dialogue: ...I see. So you have all your memories, then.

Original: Machina:Trey, I owe you an apology.
Dialogue: Trey, I owe you an apology.

Original: Trey:Whatever for...?
Dialogue: Whatever for...?

Original: Trey:...I see. So that's what transpired...
Dialogue: ...I see. So that's what transpired...

Original: Machina:I won't ask for your forgiveness. I just...had to tell you the truth.
Dialogue: I won't ask for your forgiveness. I just...had to tell you the truth.

Original: Trey:Thank you for telling me, Machina. From now on, let us fight side-by-side.
Dialogue: Thank you for telling me, Machina. From now on, let us fight side-by-side.

Original: Trey:Looking back at the past changes nothing. What matters is how we choose to live our lives from here on out.
Dialogue: Looking back at the past changes nothing. What matters is how we choose to live our lives from here on out.
trans: 回顾过去并没有改变什么。

Original: Trey:It seems like we cannot escape our fate of having to fight, but...
Dialogue: It seems like we cannot escape our fate of having to fight, but...
trans: 看来我们是逃不过战斗的宿命了，但是……

Original: Trey:I am happy that I can do so with everyone by my side.
Dialogue: I am happy that I can do so with everyone by my side.
trans: 我很高兴我能做到这一点，每个人都在我身边。

Original: Machina:...Thank you.
Dialogue: ...Thank you.

Original: Cater:Hehe. That went well!
Dialogue: Hehe. That went well!

Original: Ace:I knew Trey would understand right away.
Dialogue: I knew Trey would understand right away.
trans: 我知道特雷会马上明白的。

Original: Barret:Lucky for us, he's got both brains and a heart!
Dialogue: Lucky for us, he's got both brains and a heart!
trans: 我们很幸运，他既有头脑又有心！

Original: Wakka:And brawn, yeah! That last battle was somethin' else.
Dialogue: And brawn, yeah! That last battle was somethin' else.

Original: Trey:By the way, Machina, I have something to ask you.
Dialogue: By the way, Machina, I have something to ask you.
trans: 对了，机械姬娜，我有件事想问你。

Original: Machina:What's that?
Dialogue: What's that?

Original: Trey:What happened to Orience after we died?
Dialogue: What happened to Orience after we died?
trans: 我们死后，东方发生了什么？

Original: Machina:...We started rebuilding. It wasn't easy, but everyone's doing the best they can.
Dialogue: ...We started rebuilding. It wasn't easy, but everyone's doing the best they can.

Original: Trey:You were always a responsible one, Machina.
Dialogue: You were always a responsible one, Machina.
trans: 你一直是一个负责任的人，Machina。

Original: Trey:How would you even begin to rebuild such a broken Orience, though?
Dialogue: How would you even begin to rebuild such a broken Orience, though?
trans: 但是，您甚至如何开始重建这样一个破碎的东方呢？

Original: Trey:Please, I'd like to hear more about your endeavors.
Dialogue: Please, I'd like to hear more about your endeavors.
trans: 拜托，我想多听听你的努力。

Original: Machina:...Heh, it's like old times.
Dialogue: ...Heh, it's like old times.

Original: Machina:I want to hear your opinion, too, Trey. I can tell you all about it on the airship.
Dialogue: I want to hear your opinion, too, Trey. I can tell you all about it on the airship.
trans: 我也想听听你的意见，特雷。

Original: Trey:I insist!
Dialogue: I insist!

Original: Cater:I'm going to be old before this conversation is over...
Dialogue: I'm going to be old before this conversation is over...
trans: 这场谈话结束之前我就要老了……

Original: Ace:What's the harm? Machina seems happy.
Dialogue: What's the harm? Machina seems happy.

Original: Cater:Yeah, I guess so... Hehe.
Dialogue: Yeah, I guess so... Hehe.

Original: Cinque:Something on your noodle, Trey? You don't look so okey dokey.
Dialogue: Something on your noodle, Trey? You don't look so okey dokey.
trans: 你的面条上有东西吗，特雷？

Original: Eight:You looked totally out of it.
Dialogue: You looked totally out of it.
trans: 你看起来完全不在状态。

Original: Trey:Allow me to explain...
Dialogue: Allow me to explain...

Original: Trey:...I see. So you have a grandfather?
Dialogue: ...I see. So you have a grandfather?

Original: Relm:Yeah! He's grumpy, smelly, and slow, but I've never seen anyone better at magic!
Dialogue: Yeah! He's grumpy, smelly, and slow, but I've never seen anyone better at magic!

Original: Trey:Huh? A man of his age can use magic?
Dialogue: Huh? A man of his age can use magic?

Original: Trey:Well, I suppose I've heard of stranger things.
Dialogue: Well, I suppose I've heard of stranger things.
trans: 好吧，我想我听说过一些奇怪的事情。

Original: Relm:What does age have to do with it?
Dialogue: What does age have to do with it?

Original: Trey:Quite a bit! In my world, only the young could wield magic.
Dialogue: Quite a bit! In my world, only the young could wield magic.

Original: Trey:Please, when you have the time, tell me more about the machinations of magic in your world.
Dialogue: Please, when you have the time, tell me more about the machinations of magic in your world.
trans: 拜托，当你有时间的时候，告诉我更多关于你的世界中魔法的阴谋。

Original: Trey:And she wasn't the only one I spoke with...
Dialogue: And she wasn't the only one I spoke with...
trans: 她不是我唯一与之交谈的人......

Original: Eiko:...I used to live with moogles!
Dialogue: ...I used to live with moogles!

Original: Eiko:With Mocha and Chimomo. And Momatose and Morrison! No one could ask for a better family!
Dialogue: With Mocha and Chimomo. And Momatose and Morrison! No one could ask for a better family!

Original: Trey:All of those moogles, just for you?
Dialogue: All of those moogles, just for you?

Original: Trey:I see... You must be from a war-torn world. You have my sympathies.
Dialogue: I see... You must be from a war-torn world. You have my sympathies.
trans: 原来如此……你一定是来自战火纷飞的世界。

Original: Eiko:"War-torn"? What's that?
Dialogue: "War-torn"? What's that?

Original: Trey:Well, if you have that many moogles to report on the battlefield for you, there must be fighting around every corner...
Dialogue: Well, if you have that many moogles to report on the battlefield for you, there must be fighting around every corner...
trans: 好吧，如果你有那么多莫古利为你报到战场，那肯定每个角落都有战斗......

Original: Eiko:You aren't making any sense!
Dialogue: You aren't making any sense!

Original: Eiko:We never fight! Mostly we nap, go fishing, or cook. Ah, I miss those relaxing days with my moogles.
Dialogue: We never fight! Mostly we nap, go fishing, or cook. Ah, I miss those relaxing days with my moogles.

Original: Trey:I've never heard "moogles" and "relaxing" in the same sentence before...
Dialogue: I've never heard "moogles" and "relaxing" in the same sentence before...
trans: 我以前从未在同一句话中听到过“moogles”和“relaxing”...

Original: Trey:And furthermore...
Dialogue: And furthermore...

Original: Trey:How does your weapon work, Squall? I've never seen anything like it before.
Dialogue: How does your weapon work, Squall? I've never seen anything like it before.
trans: 你的武器是怎么工作的，Squall？

Original: Squall:(Do I really have to talk to this guy?)
Dialogue: (Do I really have to talk to this guy?)
trans: （我真的必须和这个人说话吗？）

Original: Zell:He pulls the trigger right as he brings down the sword and BAM! A bullet shoots out and the blade starts vibrating like crazy.
Dialogue: He pulls the trigger right as he brings down the sword and BAM! A bullet shoots out and the blade starts vibrating like crazy.
trans: 当他放下剑和 BAM 时，他扣动了扳机！

Original: Zell:It cuts through steel like butter! There's not much that can stand against a gunblade at full strength.
Dialogue: It cuts through steel like butter! There's not much that can stand against a gunblade at full strength.
trans: 它像黄油一样切开钢铁！

Original: Squall:Thanks for explaining, Zell.
Dialogue: Thanks for explaining, Zell.

Original: Trey:That's...the most moving thing I've heard today...
Dialogue: That's...the most moving thing I've heard today...
trans: 那是我今天听到的最感人的话……

Original: Trey:Your explanation. It was so succinct. So powerful.
Dialogue: Your explanation. It was so succinct. So powerful.

Original: Trey:It made me feel the fury of the gunblade. I heard its might in your expression!
Dialogue: It made me feel the fury of the gunblade. I heard its might in your expression!
trans: 这让我感受到了枪刃的狂暴。

Original: Trey:I must ask you to teach me how to be so exuberant in my own speech!
Dialogue: I must ask you to teach me how to be so exuberant in my own speech!
trans: 我必须请你教我如何在我自己的演讲中如此充满活力！

Original: Zell:Uh, sure! Yeah, no problem!
Dialogue: Uh, sure! Yeah, no problem!

Original: Cinque:Cinquey sees now! Your big brain got fried like an egg learning about the other worlds!
Dialogue: Cinquey sees now! Your big brain got fried like an egg learning about the other worlds!

Original: Eight:It makes sense, I guess. You must've been even more shocked to be here than us.
Dialogue: It makes sense, I guess. You must've been even more shocked to be here than us.

Original: Trey:I want to know more. So much more. My hunger for knowledge has been piqued, and must be satiated!
Dialogue: I want to know more. So much more. My hunger for knowledge has been piqued, and must be satiated!

Original: Cinque:Now that's the Trey I know! Full of passion!
Dialogue: Now that's the Trey I know! Full of passion!

Original: Eight:Yeah, maybe too full...
Dialogue: Yeah, maybe too full...

Original: Trey:Hey guys, you having a strategy meeting?
Dialogue: Hey guys, you having a strategy meeting?
trans: 嘿伙计们，你们在开战略会议吗？

Original: Laguna:Huh? A strategy meeting?
Dialogue: Huh? A strategy meeting?

Original: Trey:Since you've all taught me so much, let me return the favor. I'll tell you all I know about warfare.
Dialogue: Since you've all taught me so much, let me return the favor. I'll tell you all I know about warfare.
trans: 既然你们教了我这么多，那我就报答一下吧。

Original: Trey:First, you must find a high vantage point, so you can survey the entire battlefield.
Dialogue: First, you must find a high vantage point, so you can survey the entire battlefield.
trans: 首先，你必须找到一个高点，这样你就可以俯瞰整个战场。

Original: Trey:A famous commander used to say a hundred troops could beat even ten thousand if they had the advantage of terrain.
Dialogue: A famous commander used to say a hundred troops could beat even ten thousand if they had the advantage of terrain.
trans: 有位名将曾说过，百军可打万军，如果有地势优势。

Original: Cid:Read the room, buddy! We aren't talking about that!
Dialogue: Read the room, buddy! We aren't talking about that!

Original: Selphie:Yeah, we're talking about what we'll do when we get back home. Hmm... What should I do first?
Dialogue: Yeah, we're talking about what we'll do when we get back home. Hmm... What should I do first?
trans: 是的，我们正在谈论我们回家后要做什么。

Original: Trey:Get back home?
Dialogue: Get back home?

Original: Bartz:I'm hopping on my chocobo and setting off on an adventure.
Dialogue: I'm hopping on my chocobo and setting off on an adventure.
trans: 我跳上我的陆行鸟，开始冒险。

Original: Arciela:I plan to eat cake until I burst!
Dialogue: I plan to eat cake until I burst!

Original: Selphie:I'll plan another Garden Festival!
Dialogue: I'll plan another Garden Festival!
trans: 我会计划另一个花园节！

Original: Trey:Ah, it's just idle chitchat...
Dialogue: Ah, it's just idle chitchat...

Original: Laguna:What should I do? Hmm... Travel the world I guess. Take on the challenges as they come.
Dialogue: What should I do? Hmm... Travel the world I guess. Take on the challenges as they come.

Original: Laguna:Yeah... I can think of a few places I wanna visit first!
Dialogue: Yeah... I can think of a few places I wanna visit first!
trans: 是的...我能想到几个我想先去的地方！

Original: Cid:I'm goin' to space. Nothin's gonna get in my way this time!
Dialogue: I'm goin' to space. Nothin's gonna get in my way this time!

Original: Trey:Space? That's a lofty goal.
Dialogue: Space? That's a lofty goal.

Original: Laguna:Let me tell you, youngin'you gotta dream big!
Dialogue: Let me tell you, youngin'—you gotta dream big!
trans: 让我告诉你，年轻人——你要有远大的梦想！

Original: Bartz:What about you, Trey? What'll you do when you get back home?
Dialogue: What about you, Trey? What'll you do when you get back home?

Original: Arciela:I'd love to hear. Tell us!
Dialogue: I'd love to hear. Tell us!

Original: Trey:Well, if you insist... I want to learn everything I can. I have the same appetite for knowledge that Arciela has for sweets.
Dialogue: Well, if you insist... I want to learn everything I can. I have the same appetite for knowledge that Arciela has for sweets.
trans: 好吧，如果你坚持的话……我想尽我所能去学习。

Original: Trey:And it's not just weapons or magic I want to study. It's everything. Everything and anything.
Dialogue: And it's not just weapons or magic I want to study. It's everything. Everything and anything.
trans: 而且我想研究的不仅仅是武器或魔法。

Original: Selphie:Wow, you're quite the student. Even when you're not in school!
Dialogue: Wow, you're quite the student. Even when you're not in school!

Original: Bartz:That doesn't surprise me. Trey seems like the smart type. Well, if you want to learn anything from me, just ask!
Dialogue: That doesn't surprise me. Trey seems like the smart type. Well, if you want to learn anything from me, just ask!

Original: Cid:Same with me! You don't have to wait till you get back home to start chasin' your dream!
Dialogue: Same with me! You don't have to wait till you get back home to start chasin' your dream!

Original: Cid:You wanna know anything about rockets or space, I'm your man! Just give me a shout!
Dialogue: You wanna know anything about rockets or space, I'm your man! Just give me a shout!
trans: 你想了解有关火箭或太空的任何知识，我就是你的男人！

Original: Arciela:I've studied the forests, fields, and flowers quite extensively. I would love to give you a lesson.
Dialogue: I've studied the forests, fields, and flowers quite extensively. I would love to give you a lesson.
trans: 我对森林、田野和花朵进行了相当广泛的研究。

Original: Trey:I... Thank you, everyone. I'll definitely be taking you up on your offers!
Dialogue: I... Thank you, everyone. I'll definitely be taking you up on your offers!

Original: Trey:Maybe this place isn't so bad after all. It's been a while since I've been able to relax and chat like this... Hmm...
Dialogue: Maybe this place isn't so bad after all. It's been a while since I've been able to relax and chat like this... Hmm...
trans: 也许这个地方毕竟不是那么糟糕。

Original: Materia:One of the pillars supporting this world, the crystal core of light, has already been shattered.
Dialogue: One of the pillars supporting this world, the crystal core of light, has already been shattered.
trans: 支撑这个世界的支柱之一，光之晶核，已经破碎。

Original: ???:A shattered crystal... So this world is in peril.
Dialogue: A shattered crystal... So this world is in peril.
trans: 破碎的水晶……所以这个世界处于危险之中。

Original: Materia:Indeed it is. The crystal's fragments become brilliance, which scatter across the world.
Dialogue: Indeed it is. The crystal's fragments become brilliance, which scatter across the world.

Original: Materia:But if gathered, the crystal core of light can be revived.
Dialogue: But if gathered, the crystal core of light can be revived.
trans: 但如果聚集起来，光之晶核是可以复活的。

Original: ???:Like the resurrection. I see. Please continue.
Dialogue: Like the resurrection. I see. Please continue.

Original: ???:...Is something the matter?
Dialogue: ...Is something the matter?

Original: Materia:...Will you truly listen to my story?
Dialogue: ...Will you truly listen to my story?

Original: ???:I find it quite fascinating, to be honest. Why do you ask?
Dialogue: I find it quite fascinating, to be honest. Why do you ask?
trans: 老实说，我觉得它很迷人。

Original: Materia:There are few here like you. Most warriors are first and foremost concerned with how to get home.
Dialogue: There are few here like you. Most warriors are first and foremost concerned with how to get home.
trans: 这里很少有人像你一样。

Original: ???:Understandably so. I am merely interested in what this world is like.
Dialogue: Understandably so. I am merely interested in what this world is like.

Original: ???:It is also the first time I have met a god. Perhaps you could say I am...enchanted by the situation.
Dialogue: It is also the first time I have met a god. Perhaps you could say I am...enchanted by the situation.
trans: 这也是我第一次见到神。

Original: Materia:I see. What I have told you is the essence of what has happened here.
Dialogue: I see. What I have told you is the essence of what has happened here.

Original: ???:I understand the situation, and even the reason you have summoned warriors here.
Dialogue: I understand the situation, and even the reason you have summoned warriors here.
trans: 我了解情况，甚至了解你在这里召唤战士的原因。

Original: Materia:Truly? Then will you lend them your strength?
Dialogue: Truly? Then will you lend them your strength?

Original: ???:I regret to say that that is a different matter.
Dialogue: I regret to say that that is a different matter.
trans: 我很遗憾地说那是另一回事。

Original: Materia:...How so?
Dialogue: ...How so?

Original: ???:There is something I must discern for myself. Before that, I cannot promise anything.
Dialogue: There is something I must discern for myself. Before that, I cannot promise anything.
trans: 有件事我必须亲自辨别。

Original: Materia:And what might that be? You can ask me anything.
Dialogue: And what might that be? You can ask me anything.

Original: ???:It is not something you can tell me. I must ask Layle himself.
Dialogue: It is not something you can tell me. I must ask Layle himself.

Original: ???:What happened since then, if the world was saved or not... Until I know for sure, my heart cannot be at peace.
Dialogue: What happened since then, if the world was saved or not... Until I know for sure, my heart cannot be at peace.
trans: 从那以后发生了什么，世界是否得救了……在我确定之前，我的心无法平静。

Original: Materia:I see. Then allow me to help.
Dialogue: I see. Then allow me to help.

Original: Materia:I have opened the path to Layle. Please take it.
Dialogue: I have opened the path to Layle. Please take it.
trans: 我已经打开通往莱尔的道路。

Original: ???:I feel like I have seen this before...
Dialogue: I feel like I have seen this before...
trans: 我觉得我以前见过这个......

Original: ???:But I cannot travel with this. Layle must pull me from the other side...
Dialogue: But I cannot travel with this. Layle must pull me from the other side...
trans: 但我不能带着这个去旅行。

Original: Onion Knight:Layle! Quick! Over here!
Dialogue: Layle! Quick! Over here!

Original: Onion Knight:A Torsion opened up and all these monsters came pouring out!
Dialogue: A Torsion opened up and all these monsters came pouring out!
trans: 扭转打开，所有这些怪物涌出！

Original: Onion Knight:Everyone's doing their best to stop them. We have to help!
Dialogue: Everyone's doing their best to stop them. We have to help!
trans: 每个人都在竭尽全力阻止他们。

Original: Layle:You can leave that one to me...
Dialogue: You can leave that one to me...

Original: Layle:But it seems like you and I won't be enough to take them all.
Dialogue: But it seems like you and I won't be enough to take them all.
trans: 但看来你我都不足以承担全部。

Original: Garnet:This looks bad... There are still so many of them.
Dialogue: This looks bad... There are still so many of them.
trans: 这看起来很糟糕......他们仍然有很多。

Original: Cecil:Could it be a coincidence this many appeared near our base? Or is this someone's scheme?
Dialogue: Could it be a coincidence this many appeared near our base? Or is this someone's scheme?
trans: 基地附近出现这么多，难道是巧合？

Original: Layle:But there's no mastermind in sight. So it might be a coincidence after all!
Dialogue: But there's no mastermind in sight. So it might be a coincidence after all!

Original: Layle:Torsions are the result of dimensional warping... So this might just be what happens if Torsions open up one after another.
Dialogue: Torsions are the result of dimensional warping... So this might just be what happens if Torsions open up one after another.
trans: 扭转是维度扭曲的结果……所以这可能就是扭转一个接一个打开时会发生的情况。

Original: Warrior of Light:Then we must rout the enemy. Perhaps we can put an end to this if we can stabilize the area.
Dialogue: Then we must rout the enemy. Perhaps we can put an end to this if we can stabilize the area.
trans: 然后我们必须击溃敌人。

Original: Garnet:Alright. But...!
Dialogue: Alright. But...!

Original: Cecil:This doesn't look good. I don't think we can take down this many.
Dialogue: This doesn't look good. I don't think we can take down this many.

Original: Layle:And another Torsion just opened up. Who could it be this time
Dialogue: And another Torsion just opened up. Who could it be this time—
trans: 另一个 Torsion 刚刚打开。

Original: Layle:(No, it can't be... Is it someone with the same armor?)
Dialogue: (No, it can't be... Is it someone with the same armor?)
trans: （不对，不会是……是同款铠甲的人吧？）

Original: ???:...Well, here we are again.
Dialogue: ...Well, here we are again.

Original: ???:Have I come at a good time?
Dialogue: Have I come at a good time?

Original: Layle:It really is you. Perfect timing, Amidatelion.
Dialogue: It really is you. Perfect timing, Amidatelion.

Original: Amidatelion:I am glad we could meet. There is something I must ask you.
Dialogue: I am glad we could meet. There is something I must ask you.

Original: Layle:That's my line. But first, we've got to take care of this!
Dialogue: That's my line. But first, we've got to take care of this!

Original: Amidatelion:Very well. Allow me to take this side then!
Dialogue: Very well. Allow me to take this side then!

Original: Amidatelion:It is good to see you, Layle.
Dialogue: It is good to see you, Layle.

Original: Layle:...Yeah. I never thought we'd meet again. This world really is something else.
Dialogue: ...Yeah. I never thought we'd meet again. This world really is something else.

Original: Layle:But you seem the same as ever, powers and attitude included.
Dialogue: But you seem the same as ever, powers and attitude included.
trans: 但你看起来和以前一样，包括力量和态度。

Original: Warrior of Light:Thank you for your help.
Dialogue: Thank you for your help.

Original: Garnet:So you're a summoner, too. I was surprised you defeated those monsters so quickly.
Dialogue: So you're a summoner, too. I was surprised you defeated those monsters so quickly.

Original: Amidatelion:I had something to ask Layle. Their interference was unwelcome.
Dialogue: I had something to ask Layle. Their interference was unwelcome.

Original: Layle:Something to ask me? ...So some of your memories are missing.
Dialogue: Something to ask me? ...So some of your memories are missing.

Original: Amidatelion:Do not worry. I remember everything.
Dialogue: Do not worry. I remember everything.

Original: Layle:And yet you're still in such high spirits... You're incredible.
Dialogue: And yet you're still in such high spirits... You're incredible.
trans: 可你还这么兴致勃勃……你真了不起。

Original: Amidatelion:More importantly, Layle, answer me this: does your presence in this world mean the resurrection was not completed?
Dialogue: More importantly, Layle, answer me this does your presence in this world mean the resurrection was not completed?
trans: 更重要的是，莱尔，回答我，你在这个世界上的存在是否意味着复活还没有完成？

Original: Layle:...You can rest easy. It was.
Dialogue: ...You can rest easy. It was.

Original: Amidatelion:I see...
Dialogue: I see...

Original: Amidatelion:Thank you, Layle. You have repaid your debt to me.
Dialogue: Thank you, Layle. You have repaid your debt to me.

Original: Layle:It's no big deal. I still owe you...
Dialogue: It's no big deal. I still owe you...

Original: Amidatelion:No, you do not. Even if it were only to hear those words from your mouth, coming here was worth it.
Dialogue: No, you do not. Even if it were only to hear those words from your mouth, coming here was worth it.

Original: Amidatelion:By the way, why have you stayed in this place?
Dialogue: By the way, why have you stayed in this place?
trans: 对了，你为什么留在这个地方？

Original: Layle:Uh... Well...
Dialogue: Uh... Well...

Original: Cecil:We were summoned here to save this world.
Dialogue: We were summoned here to save this world.
trans: 我们被召唤到这里来拯救这个世界。

Original: Amidatelion:Ah, yes, because this world is in peril. I have heard as much from Materia.
Dialogue: Ah, yes, because this world is in peril. I have heard as much from Materia.
trans: 啊，是的，因为这个世界处于危险之中。
