Original: Layle:That makes things easier. In sum, we can't leave until we save this place.
Dialogue: That makes things easier. In sum, we can't leave until we save this place.

Original: Layle:Would you help us get home?
Dialogue: Would you help us get home?

Original: Amidatelion:When you ask me like that, I suppose I cannot deny you. But Layle...
Dialogue: When you ask me like that, I suppose I cannot deny you. But Layle...
trans: 当你这样问我时，我想我不能拒绝你。

Original: Amidatelion:You owe me one. Again.
Dialogue: You owe me one. Again.

Original: Edge:Well, if it isn't the newcomer!
Dialogue: Well, if it isn't the newcomer!
trans: 好吧，如果不是新人的话！

Original: Amidatelion:Are you referring to me?
Dialogue: Are you referring to me?

Original: Zidane:We haven't met anyone like you before, so we were asking Keiss about you.
Dialogue: We haven't met anyone like you before, so we were asking Keiss about you.
trans: 我们以前从未见过像您这样的人，所以我们向 Keiss 询问了您的情况。

Original: Keiss:In our world, Amidatelion is also a raritythe lone survivor of the Yuke tribe.
Dialogue: In our world, Amidatelion is also a rarity—the lone survivor of the Yuke tribe.
trans: 在我们的世界中，Amidatelion 也是一种稀有物——Yuke 部落的唯一幸存者。

Original: Keiss:I'm aSelkieand Layle is aClavat, so you're better off asking Amidatelion directly if you're curious.
Dialogue: I'm a Selkie and Layle is a Clavat, so you're better off asking Amidatelion directly if you're curious.
trans: 我是 Selkie，Layle 是 Clavat，所以如果您好奇，最好直接问 Amidatelion。

Original: Noel:Thanks, Keiss. That explains almost nothing.
Dialogue: Thanks, Keiss. That explains almost nothing.

Original: Edge:Which is why we want to hear it from you.
Dialogue: Which is why we want to hear it from you.
trans: 这就是为什么我们想听听您的意见。

Original: Amidatelion:The reason we Yukes vanished was because our Tribal Crystal was shattered during the war.
Dialogue: The reason we Yukes vanished was because our Tribal Crystal was shattered during the war.
trans: 我们尤克斯之所以消失，是因为我们的部落水晶在战争中被打碎了。

Original: Amidatelion:Without it, we fell into the void between existence and oblivion...and were erased from the world.
Dialogue: Without it, we fell into the void between existence and oblivion...and were erased from the world.
trans: 没有它，我们就会陷入存在与遗忘之间的虚空……并被从世界上抹去。

Original: Zidane:So even though your tribe lives on in that void, you're no longer part of the world?
Dialogue: So even though your tribe lives on in that void, you're no longer part of the world?
trans: 所以即使你的部落生活在那个虚空中，你也不再是世界的一部分了？

Original: Keiss:Layle said he met other Yukes, so they weren't annihilated.
Dialogue: Layle said he met other Yukes, so they weren't annihilated.
trans: Layle 说他遇到了其他 Yukes，所以他们没有被歼灭。

Original: Edge:But living in hiding against your will...
Dialogue: But living in hiding against your will...
trans: 但违背你的意愿生活在躲藏中......

Original: Edge:That must be miserable.
Dialogue: That must be miserable.

Original: Keiss:We Selkies were the same. We needed to reclaim our tribe's dignity.
Dialogue: We Selkies were the same. We needed to reclaim our tribe's dignity.
trans: 我们 Selkies 是一样的。

Original: Amidatelion:Yes. It is a mission that must be accomplished, even if one must do so alone.
Dialogue: Yes. It is a mission that must be accomplished, even if one must do so alone.

Original: Ashe:Reviving your race all on your own? Your will is truly remarkable.
Dialogue: Reviving your race all on your own? Your will is truly remarkable.
trans: 靠你自己来复兴你的种族？

Original: Noel:Isn't it...difficult sometimes?
Dialogue: Isn't it...difficult sometimes?

Original: Amidatelion:It was a mission given to me by the crystal. It is only natural I obey the Crystal Principle.
Dialogue: It was a mission given to me by the crystal. It is only natural I obey the Crystal Principle.
trans: 这是水晶交给我的使命。

Original: Zidane:I'm starting to see the way your mind works.
Dialogue: I'm starting to see the way your mind works.
trans: 我开始明白你的思维方式了。

Original: Keiss:As a result, we were made to help. But everything worked out in the end.
Dialogue: As a result, we were made to help. But everything worked out in the end.
trans: 结果，我们被迫提供帮助。

Original: Amidatelion:It seems that way, yes.
Dialogue: It seems that way, yes.

Original: Edge:What do you mean? You make it sound like you weren't there.
Dialogue: What do you mean? You make it sound like you weren't there.

Original: Amidatelion:I was not. I had to entrust my mission to Layle...
Dialogue: I was not. I had to entrust my mission to Layle...

Original: Amidatelion:I wish I could have witnessed it with my own eyes.
Dialogue: I wish I could have witnessed it with my own eyes.
trans: 我希望我能亲眼目睹它。

Original: Ashe:Was this not your ardent desire? I would think it best you see for yourself.
Dialogue: Was this not your ardent desire? I would think it best you see for yourself.
trans: 这不是你的殷切愿望吗？

Original: Amidatelion:Well, by that time, I had already
Dialogue: Well, by that time, I had already—

Original: Edge:Even if you return, you have no future...
Dialogue: Even if you return, you have no future...

Original: Edge:I wonder what will happen to people like you after this world is gone...
Dialogue: I wonder what will happen to people like you after this world is gone...
trans: 我想知道在这个世界消失之后，像你这样的人会发生什么……

Original: Edge:But since you're still alive here, you need to fight for your home world.
Dialogue: But since you're still alive here, you need to fight for your home world.
trans: 但既然你还活着，你就需要为你的家园世界而战。

Original: Ashe:Is the future of your world one worth protecting?
Dialogue: Is the future of your world one worth protecting?
trans: 你们世界的未来值得保护吗？

Original: Keiss:...It is.
Dialogue: ...It is.

Original: Amidatelion:...Indeed. It is as you say.
Dialogue: ...Indeed. It is as you say.

Original: Amidatelion:Let us save this world...for the future of my people.
Dialogue: Let us save this world...for the future of my people.
trans: 让我们拯救这个世界……为了我人民的未来。

Original: Eiko:Ohhh nooo!!
Dialogue: Ohhh nooo!!

Original: Rydia:Eiko, what is it!?
Dialogue: Eiko, what is it!?

Original: Eiko:I totally forgot about Mog! I promised I'd bring him along to the flower fields up ahead!
Dialogue: I totally forgot about Mog! I promised I'd bring him along to the flower fields up ahead!

Original: Eiko:Oh no... I feel so bad for breaking my promise...
Dialogue: Oh no... I feel so bad for breaking my promise...
trans: 哦，不……我为违背诺言而感到难过……

Original: Yuna:Don't get too down on yourself. I didn't see him when we got out either.
Dialogue: Don't get too down on yourself. I didn't see him when we got out either.

Original: Prompto:Yeah, there'll be a next time, I'm sure. The flower fields aren't going anywhere.
Dialogue: Yeah, there'll be a next time, I'm sure. The flower fields aren't going anywhere.
trans: 是的，会有下一次，我敢肯定。

Original: Eiko:Maybe... Hey Prompto... Are you sure we can't go back?
Dialogue: Maybe... Hey Prompto... Are you sure we can't go back?
trans: 也许……嘿 Prompto……你确定我们不能回去吗？

Original: Prompto:Ah, well... I dunno about that...
Dialogue: Ah, well... I dunno about that...

Original: Rydia:What do you think? Should we go back for Mog?
Dialogue: What do you think? Should we go back for Mog?

Original: Mog:Wha-!? Where am I, kupo!?
Dialogue: Wha-!? Where am I, kupo!?

Original: Eiko:Mog! I'm sooo sorry!
Dialogue: Mog! I'm sooo sorry!

Original: Amidatelion:I take it this is satisfactory?
Dialogue: I take it this is satisfactory?

Original: Eiko:It is! Thank you, Amidatelion!
Dialogue: It is! Thank you, Amidatelion!

Original: Yuna:Did...did you just summon Mog?
Dialogue: Did...did you just summon Mog?
trans: 难道……你刚刚召唤了莫格？

Original: Amidatelion:Yes. So long as I know what to summon and where it is located, I can do the same for anything.
Dialogue: Yes. So long as I know what to summon and where it is located, I can do the same for anything.

Original: Yuna:Amazing... So it's not justaeonsoreidolonsthat can be summoned.
Dialogue: Amazing... So it's not just aeons or eidolons that can be summoned.
trans: 太棒了...所以可以召唤的不只是万世或幻灵。

Original: Prompto:Hey, you knew that already! What do you think Noct does with his weapons?
Dialogue: Hey, you knew that already! What do you think Noct does with his weapons?

Original: Mog:And the gods, kupo! They summoned you all here!
Dialogue: And the gods, kupo! They summoned you all here!

Original: Rydia:That's right. It seems summoning takes on many different forms.
Dialogue: That's right. It seems summoning takes on many different forms.

Original: Yuna:What type of training did you undergo to learn this skill?
Dialogue: What type of training did you undergo to learn this skill?
trans: 你接受了什么样的培训来学习这项技能？

Original: Amidatelion:There was no training, Yuna.
Dialogue: There was no training, Yuna.

Original: Amidatelion:I was chosen by the crystal, and given this gift.
Dialogue: I was chosen by the crystal, and given this gift.
trans: 我被水晶选中，并得到了这份礼物。

Original: Prompto:Chosen by the crystal?
Dialogue: Chosen by the crystal?

Original: Amidatelion:That is correct. I was chosen to revive the Yuke, so that the four tribes could work together to restore the world.
Dialogue: That is correct. I was chosen to revive the Yuke, so that the four tribes could work together to restore the world.

Original: Yuna:You would restore the world with the power of summoning? I didn't think it could be used for such noble goals.
Dialogue: You would restore the world with the power of summoning? I didn't think it could be used for such noble goals.
trans: 你会用召唤的力量恢复世界？

Original: Rydia:Yeah! Like, if we ever forget something, you could just summon it!
Dialogue: Yeah! Like, if we ever forget something, you could just summon it!

Original: Yuna:Huh? That...wasn't what I had in mind.
Dialogue: Huh? That...wasn't what I had in mind.

Original: Eiko:If I could summon whatever I wanted, I'd have so much fun...
Dialogue: If I could summon whatever I wanted, I'd have so much fun...
trans: 如果我能召唤任何我想要的东西，我会很开心......

Original: Prompto:I dunno... If you could just warp everywhere willy nilly, that'd take the fun out of the journey.
Dialogue: I dunno... If you could just warp everywhere willy nilly, that'd take the fun out of the journey.
trans: 我不知道……如果你可以随心所欲地到处扭曲，那将失去旅途的乐趣。

Original: Amidatelion:He is correct. I do not use my abilities to serve others lightly.
Dialogue: He is correct. I do not use my abilities to serve others lightly.

Original: Amidatelion:Consider this summoning a favor. I expect to be repaid in time.
Dialogue: Consider this summoning a favor. I expect to be repaid in time.

Original: Eiko:What!? I... Uh... If you want me to...
Dialogue: What!? I... Uh... If you want me to...

Original: Eiko:I'll make sure to give you all the support you need during our next battle!
Dialogue: I'll make sure to give you all the support you need during our next battle!
trans: 在我们的下一场战斗中，我一定会为你提供所有你需要的支持！

Original: Amidatelion:You will? Something tells me to expect the same amount of support as usual. You do seem earnest, however...
Dialogue: You will? Something tells me to expect the same amount of support as usual. You do seem earnest, however...

Original: Amidatelion:Very well. I accept your proposal. I look forward to seeing you fulfill it.
Dialogue: Very well. I accept your proposal. I look forward to seeing you fulfill it.

Original: Relm:That's some pretty neat armor. Could I paint you, pretty please?
Dialogue: That's some pretty neat armor. Could I paint you, pretty please?
trans: 那是一些非常整洁的盔甲。

Original: Relm:Don't worry, it'll just be a regular portrait. Sounds fun, right? Right?
Dialogue: Don't worry, it'll just be a regular portrait. Sounds fun, right? Right?
trans: 别担心，这只是一张普通的肖像。

Original: Amidatelion:Very well. If you wish to paint me, so be it. Allow me to strike a position that will make your work easy.
Dialogue: Very well. If you wish to paint me, so be it. Allow me to strike a position that will make your work easy.

Original: Lulu:What are you doing, Relm? Painting? Quite the model you have there.
Dialogue: What are you doing, Relm? Painting? Quite the model you have there.

Original: Relm:That's right. I've never seen anything like Amidatelion's armor, so naturally I just had to paint it.
Dialogue: That's right. I've never seen anything like Amidatelion's armor, so naturally I just had to paint it.

Original: Sherlotta:Wow, you captured everything down to the smallest detail. You've really pinned down the essence of the Yuke.
Dialogue: Wow, you captured everything down to the smallest detail. You've really pinned down the essence of the Yuke.
trans: 哇，你把一切都捕捉到了最小的细节。

Original: Cait Sith:Why don't you two take a break? It's about time to eat, after all.
Dialogue: Why don't you two take a break? It's about time to eat, after all.
trans: 你们两个为什么不休息一下？

Original: Relm:Sure thing. Be there in a bit.
Dialogue: Sure thing. Be there in a bit.

Original: Amidatelion:I will stay here. But know that I appreciate the invitation.
Dialogue: I will stay here. But know that I appreciate the invitation.

Original: Yang:Hmm? You won't eat? Or you don't need to?
Dialogue: Hmm? You won't eat? Or you don't need to?

Original: Amidatelion:I have no need. This body is but a hollow suit of armor. And armor, as you know, does not require food.
Dialogue: I have no need. This body is but a hollow suit of armor. And armor, as you know, does not require food.

Original: Amidatelion:A Yuke's armor is less a garment than it is a house for their soul.
Dialogue: A Yuke's armor is less a garment than it is a house for their soul.
trans: Yuke 的盔甲与其说是一件衣服，不如说是他们灵魂的房子。

Original: Relm:Whoa! Now I get it! That's why I can see right through your stomach!
Dialogue: Whoa! Now I get it! That's why I can see right through your stomach!

Original: Sherlotta:So if your being is imbued into the armor, you can't just change bodies whenever you want.
Dialogue: So if your being is imbued into the armor, you can't just change bodies whenever you want.
trans: 所以如果你的存在被灌输到盔甲中，你就不能随心所欲地改变身体。

Original: Cait Sith:It's sort of like me, but different. I suppose there's all types.
Dialogue: It's sort of like me, but different. I suppose there's all types.
trans: 这有点像我，但又不一样。

Original: Yang:A body of pure armor must be nearly indestructible!
Dialogue: A body of pure armor must be nearly indestructible!
trans: 一身纯甲，必定是近乎坚不可摧的！

Original: Amidatelion:Yes, if my body falls to pieces, it is a relatively simple matter to reform.
Dialogue: Yes, if my body falls to pieces, it is a relatively simple matter to reform.
trans: 是的，如果我的身体崩溃了，改造起来是一件比较简单的事情。

Original: Amidatelion:However, if I lose a piece of myself, matters will soon turn grave.
Dialogue: However, if I lose a piece of myself, matters will soon turn grave.
trans: 但是，如果我失去了自己的一部分，事情很快就会变得严重。

Original: Lulu:Ah, so you do have your weaknesses.
Dialogue: Ah, so you do have your weaknesses.
trans: 啊，所以你确实有你的弱点。

Original: Sherlotta:I see. You have to take care that your armor doesn't become too damaged.
Dialogue: I see. You have to take care that your armor doesn't become too damaged.

Original: Yang:Is that...not similar to our flesh and blood bodies?
Dialogue: Is that...not similar to our flesh and blood bodies?
trans: 那岂不是……和我们的血肉之躯不相似？

Original: Yang:The only difference being that Amidatelion's body is made of steel instead of bones!
Dialogue: The only difference being that Amidatelion's body is made of steel instead of bones!
trans: 唯一不同的是，Amidatelion 的身体是钢铁制成的，而不是骨头！

Original: Amidatelion:I suppose that is not an incorrect observation. Indeed, while we may be different in many ways, in that matter we are not.
Dialogue: I suppose that is not an incorrect observation. Indeed, while we may be different in many ways, in that matter we are not.
trans: 我想这不是一个错误的观察。

Original: Cait Sith:Hey, we might not all have bodies of steel, but we're all in this together. That means you too!
Dialogue: Hey, we might not all have bodies of steel, but we're all in this together. That means you too!
trans: 嘿，我们可能不都拥有钢铁般的身体，但我们都在一起。

Original: Amidatelion:You are very welcoming. It feels...strange.
Dialogue: You are very welcoming. It feels...strange.

Original: Lulu:We may appear different to the eye, but that is all.
Dialogue: We may appear different to the eye, but that is all.
trans: 我们可能看起来有所不同，但仅此而已。

Original: Lulu:You speak frankly and logically, but not in a manner that I ever found odd.
Dialogue: You speak frankly and logically, but not in a manner that I ever found odd.
trans: 你说话坦率而合乎逻辑，但不是我觉得奇怪的方式。

Original: Amidatelion:I see...you have put quite a bit of thought into this.
Dialogue: I see...you have put quite a bit of thought into this.
trans: 我明白了……你已经对此深思熟虑了。

Original: Relm:All done! Check it out!
Dialogue: All done! Check it out!

Original: Yang:Oh my! She painted us too! Thank you, Relm!
Dialogue: Oh my! She painted us too! Thank you, Relm!

Original: Cait Sith:So fast! I didn't even see you paint it! You really brought out my eyes.
Dialogue: So fast! I didn't even see you paint it! You really brought out my eyes.

Original: Relm:Amidatelion is in the middle!
Dialogue: Amidatelion is in the middle!

Original: Amidatelion:It is an honor to be allowed a place among you all.
Dialogue: It is an honor to be allowed a place among you all.
trans: 很荣幸能在你们中间占有一席之地。

Original: Cait Sith:Hey, there's no need to be so formal! Now you've got friends from all different worlds.
Dialogue: Hey, there's no need to be so formal! Now you've got friends from all different worlds.

Original: Lulu:Yes, quite a few of them, in fact.
Dialogue: Yes, quite a few of them, in fact.

Original: Sherlotta:You don't have to be alone if you don't want to. It's all a matter of perspective!
Dialogue: You don't have to be alone if you don't want to. It's all a matter of perspective!
trans: 如果你不想，你不必一个人呆着。

Original: Amidatelion:I see. While I admit, being by myself has never been a cause for loneliness...
Dialogue: I see. While I admit, being by myself has never been a cause for loneliness...

Original: Amidatelion:...Your words are reassuring nonetheless. For now, I believe, I am happy.
Dialogue: ...Your words are reassuring nonetheless. For now, I believe, I am happy.

Original: Maria:Tidus! ...Where did he go?
Dialogue: Tidus! ...Where did he go?

Original: Cater:I know he said he saw someone, but why did he run off by himself?
Dialogue: I know he said he saw someone, but why did he run off by himself?
trans: 我知道他说他看见了人，可他怎么自己跑了？

Original: Onion Knight:I guess there's no point in asking. We had better get to searching.
Dialogue: I guess there's no point in asking. We had better get to searching.

Original: Onion Knight:Hm? Someone's coming...
Dialogue: Hm? Someone's coming...

Original: ???:Hey. Looking for someone?
Dialogue: Hey. Looking for someone?

Original: Cater:...Who's this? Do you know him?
Dialogue: ...Who's this? Do you know him?

Original: Maria:No, I do not. Which means...
Dialogue: No, I do not. Which means...

Original: ???:You lost one of your friends? You're the same loser as always, I see!
Dialogue: You lost one of your friends? You're the same loser as always, I see!

Original: ???:Oh? Are you the one with amnesia this time? It seems like you can't even remember my name.
Dialogue: Oh? Are you the one with amnesia this time? It seems like you can't even remember my name.

Original: Onion Knight:I don't have amnesia.
Dialogue: I don't have amnesia.

Original: Onion Knight:I was just surprised. I never thought I'd see you here, Desch.
Dialogue: I was just surprised. I never thought I'd see you here, Desch.

Original: Maria:Desch...is it?
Dialogue: Desch...is it?

Original: Desch:A pleasure. Look at you, traveling alongside these beauties!
Dialogue: A pleasure. Look at you, traveling alongside these beauties!

Original: Cater:And here I thought you were the only one from your world.
Dialogue: And here I thought you were the only one from your world.
trans: 在这里，我认为你是你世界上唯一的人。

Original: Onion Knight:Is it so weird that I have friends?
Dialogue: Is it so weird that I have friends?
trans: 我有朋友就这么奇怪吗？

Original: Cater:A little. I mean, you haven't talked about them at all.
Dialogue: A little. I mean, you haven't talked about them at all.

Original: Maria:But at least you weren't fighting alone. Without friends, it would have been such a trying journey...
Dialogue: But at least you weren't fighting alone. Without friends, it would have been such a trying journey...
trans: 但至少你不是一个人在战斗。

Original: Maria:I know you are a fine knight, but I had my concerns since you're still so young.
Dialogue: I know you are a fine knight, but I had my concerns since you're still so young.
trans: 我知道你是个优秀的骑士，但我担心你还那么年轻。

Original: Tidus:Found you!
Dialogue: Found you!

Original: Maria:We should be saying that. Please don't run off alone again.
Dialogue: We should be saying that. Please don't run off alone again.

Original: Cater:Seriously... Then we'd have to look for two people.
Dialogue: Seriously... Then we'd have to look for two people.
trans: 说真的……那我们得找两个人。

Original: Tidus:Never mind that. That's the guy I saw earlier! He's definitely one of us
Dialogue: Never mind that. That's the guy I saw earlier! He's definitely one of us—

Original: Cater:Hey! It's rude to point... Huh?
Dialogue: Hey! It's rude to point... Huh?

Original: Cater:A dragon!?
Dialogue: A dragon!?

Original: Tidus:And he's taking that guy with him!
Dialogue: And he's taking that guy with him!
trans: 而且他还带着那个家伙！

Original: Desch:Put me down right now! ...No, I take that back! Put me down slowly! And gently!
Dialogue: Put me down right now! ...No, I take that back! Put me down slowly! And gently!

Original: Onion Knight:You've got to be kidding me! Desch!
Dialogue: You've got to be kidding me! Desch!

Original: Maria:Shooting it down would be too dangerous...
Dialogue: Shooting it down would be too dangerous...

Original: Onion Knight:Tch. I guess we have to go save him. Come on, everyone!
Dialogue: Tch. I guess we have to go save him. Come on, everyone!

Original: Desch:Heeey! Over here!
Dialogue: Heeey! Over here!

Original: Onion Knight:Kidnapped again? Just which of us is the loser now?
Dialogue: Kidnapped again? Just which of us is the loser now?

Original: Desch:Hah hah! You got me there!
Dialogue: Hah hah! You got me there!

Original: Sherlotta:What a carefree guy... There's no point in worrying about someone like this.
Dialogue: What a carefree guy... There's no point in worrying about someone like this.
trans: 真是个大大咧咧的家伙……这种人根本不用担心。

Original: Desch:Did you young ladies worry about me?
Dialogue: Did you young ladies worry about me?

Original: Sherlotta:Young ladies? Listen, kid
Dialogue: Young ladies? Listen, kid—

Original: Onion Knight:Alright, alright. That's enough, Sherlotta. He didn't mean it like that.
Dialogue: Alright, alright. That's enough, Sherlotta. He didn't mean it like that.

Original: Onion Knight:And Desch isn't worried because he isn't the type to die so easily.
Dialogue: And Desch isn't worried because he isn't the type to die so easily.
trans: 德施并不担心，因为他不是那种容易死的人。

Original: Steiner:Even so, you looked quite concerned earlier.
Dialogue: Even so, you looked quite concerned earlier.
trans: 即便如此，你之前看起来还是很担心的。

Original: Onion Knight:Me? No way.
Dialogue: Me? No way.

Original: Porom:Say what you like, but you couldn't hide your worries.
Dialogue: Say what you like, but you couldn't hide your worries.
trans: 说你喜欢的，但你无法掩饰你的担忧。

Original: Desch:Oho! What a heartening thing to hear.
Dialogue: Oho! What a heartening thing to hear.

Original: Onion Knight:Enough about me. I had better introduce you to the others.
Dialogue: Enough about me. I had better introduce you to the others.

Original: Onion Knight:This is Desch. We journeyed together back home.
Dialogue: This is Desch. We journeyed together back home.

Original: Onion Knight:He's got a soft spot for women, but a trustworthy ally all the same.
Dialogue: He's got a soft spot for women, but a trustworthy ally all the same.
trans: 他对女人情有独钟，但仍然是一个值得信赖的盟友。

Original: Desch:You certainly don't forget a thing...
Dialogue: You certainly don't forget a thing...
trans: 你当然不会忘记一件事......

Original: Desch:In any case, I look forward to traveling with you all.
Dialogue: In any case, I look forward to traveling with you all.
trans: 无论如何，我期待与大家一起旅行。

Original: Sherlotta:Welcome to the team.
Dialogue: Welcome to the team.

Original: Desch:By the way...
Dialogue: By the way...

Original: Onion Knight:What is it?
Dialogue: What is it?

Original: Desch:You seem to have comrades from all over. Any from the same hometown?
Dialogue: You seem to have comrades from all over. Any from the same hometown?
trans: 你好像有来自四面八方的战友。

Original: Onion Knight:Ah, well...
Dialogue: Ah, well...

Original: Desch:It must have been lonesome for you. You should've summoned me sooner.
Dialogue: It must have been lonesome for you. You should've summoned me sooner.

Original: Onion Knight:That sort of stuff isn't up to me. The gods decide.
Dialogue: That sort of stuff isn't up to me. The gods decide.
trans: 那种东西不由我来决定。

Original: Porom:...Uh-oh. It looks like that dragon's back.
Dialogue: ...Uh-oh. It looks like that dragon's back.

Original: Desch:Let's save the catching up for later then.
Dialogue: Let's save the catching up for later then.
trans: 让我们把追赶留到以后再说。

Original: Onion Knight:...Should we run?
Dialogue: ...Should we run?

Original: Desch:You're asking me? Well, considering there's a flock of them this time...
Dialogue: You're asking me? Well, considering there's a flock of them this time...

Original: Onion Knight:Alright. Everyone, let's make a run for it!
Dialogue: Alright. Everyone, let's make a run for it!

Original: Desch:Run! Run for your lives!
Dialogue: Run! Run for your lives!

Original: Desch:Hahaha! Just like old times!
Dialogue: Hahaha! Just like old times!

Original: Onion Knight:Geez! I never thought I'd be running from dragons with you again!
Dialogue: Geez! I never thought I'd be running from dragons with you again!

Original: Desch:Oh my! Look at these two lovely ladies!
Dialogue: Oh my! Look at these two lovely ladies!

Original: Onion Knight:Good grief...
Dialogue: Good grief...

Original: Lightning:As if we needed more guys like this...
Dialogue: As if we needed more guys like this...
trans: 好像我们需要更多这样的人...

Original: Celes:Maybe he's like Edgar and thinks making a pass at someone is a form of courtesy.
Dialogue: Maybe he's like Edgar and thinks making a pass at someone is a form of courtesy.
trans: 也许他像埃德加一样，认为对某人传球是一种礼貌。

Original: Desch:They're both very wary of me, I see... What ever shall I do?
Dialogue: They're both very wary of me, I see... What ever shall I do?
trans: 他们都对我很警惕，我明白了……我该怎么办？

Original: Desch:Haha! I was just kidding. I wasn't planning on making a move.
Dialogue: Haha! I was just kidding. I wasn't planning on making a move.

Original: Zell:Who's Salina? Your girlfriend?
Dialogue: Who's Salina? Your girlfriend?

Original: Onion Knight:Well, you see
Dialogue: Well, you see—

Original: Desch:Okay, okay! You win!
Dialogue: Okay, okay! You win!

Original: Zell:Hehe. Tell me more about it later!
Dialogue: Hehe. Tell me more about it later!

Original: Celes:It's interesting... Your expression changes when you talk to Desch.
Dialogue: It's interesting... Your expression changes when you talk to Desch.
trans: 很有趣……当你和德施说话时，你的表情会发生变化。

Original: Onion Knight:My expression?
Dialogue: My expression?

Original: Zell:Yeah! You look like you're enjoying yourself more than usual!
Dialogue: Yeah! You look like you're enjoying yourself more than usual!

Original: Lightning:I guess meeting an old friend's put him at ease.
Dialogue: I guess meeting an old friend's put him at ease.
trans: 我想见到一个老朋友会让他放松下来。

Original: Desch:Is it that different? That's nice to hear.
Dialogue: Is it that different? That's nice to hear.

Original: Desch:I felt relieved when I saw you here and surrounded by all these people.
Dialogue: I felt relieved when I saw you here and surrounded by all these people.
trans: 当我看到你在这里，被这么多人包围时，我感到如释重负。

Original: Desch:Saving this world, too...
Dialogue: Saving this world, too...

Original: Desch:Didn't I tell you to call me when you go on another adventure?
Dialogue: Didn't I tell you to call me when you go on another adventure?
trans: 我不是告诉过你在进行另一次冒险时给我打电话吗？

Original: Onion Knight:Saying things like that will make Salina worry.
Dialogue: Saying things like that will make Salina worry.
trans: 说出那样的话会让莎琳娜担心。

Original: Desch:That's a different matter. You were here by yourself for a long time, weren't you?
Dialogue: That's a different matter. You were here by yourself for a long time, weren't you?

Original: Desch:I guess you weren't alone, but...you carried it on your own, didn't you?
Dialogue: I guess you weren't alone, but...you carried it on your own, didn't you?
trans: 我想你不是一个人，但是……你自己扛着它，不是吗？

Original: Desch:Didn't you ever feel homesick?
Dialogue: Didn't you ever feel homesick?

Original: Desch:Or a little lonely, wanting to reminisce about home...?
Dialogue: Or a little lonely, wanting to reminisce about home...?
trans: 还是有点寂寞，想怀念故乡……？

Original: Desch:You're always so responsible. If others ask you for help, you can't say no, can you?
Dialogue: You're always so responsible. If others ask you for help, you can't say no, can you?

Original: Onion Knight:...I am a knight, after all.
Dialogue: ...I am a knight, after all.

Original: Lightning:And a fine knight, too, regardless of age.
Dialogue: And a fine knight, too, regardless of age.
trans: 还有一个优秀的骑士，无论年龄大小。

Original: Desch:Those with a great destiny truly have a different resolve.
Dialogue: Those with a great destiny truly have a different resolve.
trans: 有大命者，真有不一样的决心。

Original: Desch:...But you're not the only ones.
Dialogue: ...But you're not the only ones.

Original: Desch:You won't have to fight alone for our world.
Dialogue: You won't have to fight alone for our world.
trans: 你不必为我们的世界而孤军奋战。

Original: Desch:I'm here to help now.
Dialogue: I'm here to help now.

Original: Celes:A reassuring thing to hear.
Dialogue: A reassuring thing to hear.

Original: Desch:Oh? Have you had a change of heart?
Dialogue: Oh? Have you had a change of heart?

Original: Onion Knight:But this journey is a dangerous one, too. Maybe even more so than before.
Dialogue: But this journey is a dangerous one, too. Maybe even more so than before.
trans: 但这段旅程也是危险的。

Original: Desch:All the more reason for me to be here and share that burden with you.
Dialogue: All the more reason for me to be here and share that burden with you.
trans: 我更有理由来到这里与您分担这个负担。

Original: Desch:I'm a reliable partner. And you'll regret it if you don't ask me for help.
Dialogue: I'm a reliable partner. And you'll regret it if you don't ask me for help.
trans: 我是一个可靠的合作伙伴。

Original: Onion Knight:Haha, I guess you're right. Thanks, Desch.
Dialogue: Haha, I guess you're right. Thanks, Desch.

Original: Rem:What!?
Dialogue: What!?

Original: Setzer:I said we're having engine trouble!
Dialogue: I said we're having engine trouble!
trans: 我说我们遇到引擎故障了！

Original: Vaan:Engine trouble!?
Dialogue: Engine trouble!?

Original: Setzer:Our speed is petering out... I won't be able to maintain altitude!
Dialogue: Our speed is petering out... I won't be able to maintain altitude!
trans: 我们的速度越来越慢了……我将无法保持高度！

Original: Setzer:Is Mog over there? Ask him to fix this for us.
Dialogue: Is Mog over there? Ask him to fix this for us.

Original: Mog:I'm here, kupo... But, I don't think this is an easy fix.
Dialogue: I'm here, kupo... But, I don't think this is an easy fix.
trans: 我在这里，kupo...但是，我认为这不是一个容易解决的问题。

Original: Vaan:There's gotta be a way!
Dialogue: There's gotta be a way!

Original: Cid:You lot are useless! I'll do it myself!
Dialogue: You lot are useless! I'll do it myself!

Original: Cid:You're coming too, Vaan. Don't know if that'll be enough, though...
Dialogue: You're coming too, Vaan. Don't know if that'll be enough, though...

Original: Rem:Is there anything I can do to help?
Dialogue: Is there anything I can do to help?
trans: 有什么我可以帮忙的吗？

Original: Desch:You can count on me. Just lead the way to the engine room.
Dialogue: You can count on me. Just lead the way to the engine room.

Original: Cid:Huh? What do you know about ships?
Dialogue: Huh? What do you know about ships?

Original: Desch:You're short on hands, right? Let me come, and I'll figure out a way to help.
Dialogue: You're short on hands, right? Let me come, and I'll figure out a way to help.

Original: Desch:I may not know much about the machinery in this world, but at the very least I can offer words of encouragement!
Dialogue: I may not know much about the machinery in this world, but at the very least I can offer words of encouragement!
trans: 我可能对这个世界的机械了解不多，但至少可以说一句鼓励的话！

Original: Vaan:I think we can make this work, Cid.
Dialogue: I think we can make this work, Cid.
trans: 我认为我们可以完成这项工作，Cid。

Original: Cid:Words of encouragement!? Whatever, there's no time to argue! C'mon!
Dialogue: Words of encouragement!? Whatever, there's no time to argue! C'mon!

Original: Cid:I thought you were gonna be dead weight, but you got grit, and more know-how than you let on. Impressive work back there.
Dialogue: I thought you were gonna be dead weight, but you got grit, and more know-how than you let on. Impressive work back there.
trans: 我以为你会很沉重，但你有勇气，而且比你表现出来的要多。

Original: Desch:When there's a task at hand, you either set yourself to it or suffer the consequences.
Dialogue: When there's a task at hand, you either set yourself to it or suffer the consequences.
trans: 当手头有任务时，你要么让自己去做，要么承担后果。

Original: Desch:Besides, I've repaired engines bigger than this ship's.
Dialogue: Besides, I've repaired engines bigger than this ship's.
trans: 此外，我修理过比这艘船更大的引擎。

Original: Rem:Bigger? How big?
Dialogue: Bigger? How big?

Original: Vaan:Huh? Did you say "continent"?
Dialogue: Huh? Did you say "continent"?

Original: Rem:That's what I heard...
Dialogue: That's what I heard...

Original: Mog:Really, kupo!? A whole continent!?
Dialogue: Really, kupo!? A whole continent!?

Original: Desch:Hah hah! You should see the looks on your faces! I have to mess around with you guys more often!
Dialogue: Hah hah! You should see the looks on your faces! I have to mess around with you guys more often!

Original: Cid:Don't get my hops up like that, boy... All for a lousy joke.
Dialogue: Don't get my hops up like that, boy... All for a lousy joke.
trans: 别让我像那样跳起来，男孩……这只是一个糟糕的笑话。

Original: Desch:There you are! I was looking for you!
Dialogue: There you are! I was looking for you!

Original: Lightning:Why? What happened?
Dialogue: Why? What happened?

Original: Desch:There's something I wanted to tell you and Celes!
Dialogue: There's something I wanted to tell you and Celes!
trans: 我有件事想告诉你和 Celes！

Original: Celes:So urgently?
Dialogue: So urgently?

Original: Desch:Yeah. I wanted to apologize for uh...being a creep before.
Dialogue: Yeah. I wanted to apologize for uh...being a creep before.

Original: Rem:Huh? What'd you say to them?
Dialogue: Huh? What'd you say to them?

Original: Lightning:There's nothing to apologize for. Besides, your partner stopped you.
Dialogue: There's nothing to apologize for. Besides, your partner stopped you.

Original: Lightning:So don't worry about it.
Dialogue: So don't worry about it.

Original: Desch:You're letting me off too easy, Lightning.
Dialogue: You're letting me off too easy, Lightning.
trans: 你太容易放过我了，闪电。

Original: Desch:It was just...it had been such a long time since me and him had traveled together. I was in such a good mood.
Dialogue: It was just...it had been such a long time since me and him had traveled together. I was in such a good mood.
trans: 只是……好久没有和他一起旅行了。

Original: Desch:I think I was just trying to act cool. That's why I said those things.
Dialogue: I think I was just trying to act cool. That's why I said those things.

Original: Celes:Well, I appreciate your honesty.
Dialogue: Well, I appreciate your honesty.
trans: 好吧，我很欣赏你的诚实。

Original: Rem:Does this have anything to do with Salina?
Dialogue: Does this have anything to do with Salina?

Original: Desch:So you heard about her, huh?
Dialogue: So you heard about her, huh?

Original: Rem:Hehe. Thanks to Zell.
Dialogue: Hehe. Thanks to Zell.

Original: Desch:Well, like I said, I'm happy to be adventuring with my partner again in this strange new world.
Dialogue: Well, like I said, I'm happy to be adventuring with my partner again in this strange new world.
trans: 好吧，就像我说的，我很高兴能和我的伙伴再次在这个陌生的新世界冒险。

Original: Desch:But I can't help worrying about Salina all the same.
Dialogue: But I can't help worrying about Salina all the same.
trans: 但我还是忍不住担心萨琳娜。

Original: Desch:I didn't even get to leave a letter behind. She's probably worried sick about me.
Dialogue: I didn't even get to leave a letter behind. She's probably worried sick about me.
trans: 我什至没来得及留下一封信。

Original: Bartz:And she can't even look for you. Sounds rough...
Dialogue: And she can't even look for you. Sounds rough...

Original: Desch:Her mother already thinks I'm a good-for-nothing.
Dialogue: Her mother already thinks I'm a good-for-nothing.
trans: 她妈妈已经觉得我一无是处了。

Original: Desch:And I guess this isn't going to do me any favors in that regard.
Dialogue: And I guess this isn't going to do me any favors in that regard.
trans: 我想这不会给我带来任何好处。

Original: Desch:Adventuring's not as carefree after you've set down roots, huh?
Dialogue: Adventuring's not as carefree after you've set down roots, huh?
trans: 扎根之后冒险就没那么无忧无虑了，是吧？

Original: Lightning:Of course. Once you have something to protect, that's all you care about.
Dialogue: Of course. Once you have something to protect, that's all you care about.

Original: Rem:Do you want to go back home?
Dialogue: Do you want to go back home?

Original: Desch:Yeah, I suppose I do.
Dialogue: Yeah, I suppose I do.

Original: Bartz:Then the adventure must go on. And at the end of it, hopefully we'll find a way for you to get home.
Dialogue: Then the adventure must go on. And at the end of it, hopefully we'll find a way for you to get home.

Original: Celes:That's right. Let your will to return home drive you on your journey, and you'll be guided back.
Dialogue: That's right. Let your will to return home drive you on your journey, and you'll be guided back.

Original: Desch:My will?
Dialogue: My will?

Original: Lightning:That's what's important in this world.
Dialogue: That's what's important in this world.
trans: 这就是这个世界上最重要的事情。

Original: Desch:Right, of course. And I just want you to know: I really do want to help you guys. And my partner.
Dialogue: Right, of course. And I just want you to know I really do want to help you guys. And my partner.

Original: Desch:But I also don't want to make Salina cry. It's probably too late for that, though...
Dialogue: But I also don't want to make Salina cry. It's probably too late for that, though...
trans: 但我也不想让萨琳娜哭泣。

Original: Rem:I'm sure she hasn't given up hope. She's probably waiting for you even now, and when you return, you two can celebrate together.
Dialogue: I'm sure she hasn't given up hope. She's probably waiting for you even now, and when you return, you two can celebrate together.
trans: 我相信她还没有放弃希望。

Original: Desch:Yeah! I hope so!
Dialogue: Yeah! I hope so!

Original: Desch:Then I guess I know what I'm fighting for! To find a way home! For Salina!
Dialogue: Then I guess I know what I'm fighting for! To find a way home! For Salina!
trans: 然后我想我知道我为什么而战了！

Original: Cid:Hey! Anyone up top!?
Dialogue: Hey! Anyone up top!?

Original: Ignis:Yes. What seems to be the matter?
Dialogue: Yes. What seems to be the matter?

Original: Cid:This ain't no time to be spacin' out, boy! Knock that thing outta the sky right now!
Dialogue: This ain't no time to be spacin' out, boy! Knock that thing outta the sky right now!
trans: 现在不是闲逛的时候，孩子！

Original: Ace:It's over there! In front of us!
Dialogue: It's over there! In front of us!

Original: Maria:I can hit it from here.
Dialogue: I can hit it from here.

Original: Ignis:Allow me to help.
Dialogue: Allow me to help.

Original: [Monster]:Guaaah... Guh...
Dialogue: Guaaah... Guh...

Original: Ace:The monster's...gone?
Dialogue: The monster's...gone?

Original: Cid:You really made quick work of that thing! Great job!
Dialogue: You really made quick work of that thing! Great job!
trans: 你真的很快就完成了那件事！

Original: Maria:But it isn't our victory to celebrate.
Dialogue: But it isn't our victory to celebrate.
trans: 但这不是我们要庆祝的胜利。

Original: Cid:What? Then whose is it?
Dialogue: What? Then whose is it?

Original: Ignis:A spear came out of nowhere and knocked that thing out of the sky.
Dialogue: A spear came out of nowhere and knocked that thing out of the sky.
trans: 一道长枪凭空冒出，将那东西从天而降。

Original: Ace:That's right. I didn't see where it came from, though.
Dialogue: That's right. I didn't see where it came from, though.

Original: Cid:Then Kain's the hero of the day, is he?
Dialogue: Then Kain's the hero of the day, is he?
trans: 那么凯恩就是今天的英雄，对吗？

Original: Kain:Unfortunately, I'm not. It came from below.
Dialogue: Unfortunately, I'm not. It came from below.

Original: Maria:From below? That means...
Dialogue: From below? That means...

Original: Ignis:Someone managed to hit their mark from all the way down there.
Dialogue: Someone managed to hit their mark from all the way down there.
trans: 有人成功地从那里一直击中了他们的目标。

Original: Ignis:It appears Kain may have some competition.
Dialogue: It appears Kain may have some competition.
trans: 看来凯恩可能有一些竞争。

Original: Ace:I only know one other person who's that good at using a spear...
Dialogue: I only know one other person who's that good at using a spear...
trans: 我只认识一个擅长使用长矛的人......

Original: Maria:Everyone, look! There's someone on the ground!
Dialogue: Everyone, look! There's someone on the ground!

Original: Ignis:You can see all that way? Impressive.
Dialogue: You can see all that way? Impressive.
trans: 你能看到所有的方式吗？

Original: Maria:A keen eye is as important to an archer as bow or arrows.
Dialogue: A keen eye is as important to an archer as bow or arrows.
trans: 对于弓箭手来说，敏锐的眼睛与弓或箭一样重要。

Original: Ignis:Right, of course...
Dialogue: Right, of course...

Original: Ignis:Cid, lower the airship.
Dialogue: Cid, lower the airship.

Original: Cid:Roger that! Descending now!
Dialogue: Roger that! Descending now!

Original: ???:Oh, look. That got their attention.
Dialogue: Oh, look. That got their attention.

Original: ???:About time. Let's get this reunion started, yo.
Dialogue: About time. Let's get this reunion started, yo.

Original: Yang:Was it you who threw the spear? Hmm?
Dialogue: Was it you who threw the spear? Hmm?

Original: Yang:(That uniform... It resembles those worn by Ace and the others.)
Dialogue: (That uniform... It resembles those worn by Ace and the others.)
trans: （那个制服……和艾斯他们穿的很像。）

Original: ???:Hmm, don't recognize you. Is this flying hunk of junk yours, yo?
Dialogue: Hmm, don't recognize you. Is this flying hunk of junk yours, yo?

Original: ???:Were you brought here bywhat's her name?Materia or whatever she's called?
Dialogue: Were you brought here by—what's her name?—Materia or whatever she's called?
trans: 你是被——她叫什么名字？——Materia 或她叫什么的什么东西带到这里来的？

Original: Yang:You have the right of it. Are you
Dialogue: You have the right of it. Are you—

Original: Cid:Hunk of junk!? Didn't your parents teach you any manners, boy!?
Dialogue: Hunk of junk!? Didn't your parents teach you any manners, boy!?

Original: ???:What do you know about manners, old man!? You should be thanking me for saving you, yo!
Dialogue: What do you know about manners, old man!? You should be thanking me for saving you, yo!

Original: Cid:Oh, so you do have a mother!? I guess she never told you to respect your
Dialogue: Oh, so you do have a mother!? I guess she never told you to respect your—

Original: Yang:Calm down, you two. Arguing will get us nowhere.
Dialogue: Calm down, you two. Arguing will get us nowhere.

Original: Cater:Sounds like you both need to work on your manners.
Dialogue: Sounds like you both need to work on your manners.
trans: 听起来你们俩都需要在举止上下功夫。

Original: Seven:Glad to see you're as chatty as ever, Nine.
Dialogue: Glad to see you're as chatty as ever, Nine.
trans: 很高兴看到你像以前一样健谈，九号。

Original: Nine:There you are! I had a feeling you guys were on that ship, yo!
Dialogue: There you are! I had a feeling you guys were on that ship, yo!

Original: Nine:How's everyone else? Hiding under the decks?
Dialogue: How's everyone else? Hiding under the decks?

Original: Yang:Nine, was it? If you are a friend of my allies, then you are a friend of mine. It is apparent you meant us no harm.
Dialogue: Nine, was it? If you are a friend of my allies, then you are a friend of mine. It is apparent you meant us no harm.

Original: Cid:If he did, he wouldn't be standin' right now! And he's lucky that spear of his didn't miss!
Dialogue: If he did, he wouldn't be standin' right now! And he's lucky that spear of his didn't miss!
trans: 如果他这样做，他现在就不会站着了！

Original: Cid:If it had punched a hole in my precious hull, there'd be hell to pay!
Dialogue: If it had punched a hole in my precious hull, there'd be hell to pay!
trans: 如果它在我宝贵的船体上打了一个洞，那将是天方夜谭！

Original: Nine:That's some thanks! I should've let that monster wreck your "precious" ship, yo!
Dialogue: That's some thanks! I should've let that monster wreck your "precious" ship, yo!

Original: Seven:You can rest easy, Cid. Nine may look like a loose cannon, but his skill with a spear is unmatched.
Dialogue: You can rest easy, Cid. Nine may look like a loose cannon, but his skill with a spear is unmatched.

Original: Cater:Still, everybody makes mistakes. Good thing he hit the right target this time.
Dialogue: Still, everybody makes mistakes. Good thing he hit the right target this time.
trans: 尽管如此，每个人都会犯错。

Original: Nine:Have a little faith, okay? Besides, what was I supposed to do when I thought my friends were in trouble?
Dialogue: Have a little faith, okay? Besides, what was I supposed to do when I thought my friends were in trouble?

Original: Nine:Anyways, as rickety as that thing looks, it's not like a single spear would smash it to pieces. Right, old man?
Dialogue: Anyways, as rickety as that thing looks, it's not like a single spear would smash it to pieces. Right, old man?
trans: 反正那东西看起来摇摇欲坠，也不是一枪就能把它砸成碎片的。

Original: Cid:Damn right it wouldn't! Especially not one thrown by those noodle arms!
Dialogue: Damn right it wouldn't! Especially not one thrown by those noodle arms!

Original: Nine:Materia told me you were out here, and when I saw the ship I had a good feeling.
Dialogue: Materia told me you were out here, and when I saw the ship I had a good feeling.
trans: Materia 告诉我你在外面，当我看到这艘船时我感觉很好。

Original: Nine:When that monster attacked you, I did the first thing that came to mind
Dialogue: When that monster attacked you, I did the first thing that came to mind—
trans: 当那个怪物袭击你时，我想到的第一件事就是——

Original: Cater:And threw your spear. Well, your impulsiveness is as dependable as ever.
Dialogue: And threw your spear. Well, your impulsiveness is as dependable as ever.

Original: Yang:Nevertheless, his aim was true and we were spared the beast's wrath. None can deny thatnot even you, Cid.
Dialogue: Nevertheless, his aim was true and we were spared the beast's wrath. None can deny that—not even you, Cid.
trans: 尽管如此，他的目标是正确的，我们没有受到野兽的愤怒。

Original: Cid:Yeah... Guess you're right on that count. Better that he acted than sat there twiddling his thumbs.
Dialogue: Yeah... Guess you're right on that count. Better that he acted than sat there twiddling his thumbs.

Original: Nine:Glad we can agree on something. Anyways, I've been looking for you guys all over. I need to take a load off, yo.
Dialogue: Glad we can agree on something. Anyways, I've been looking for you guys all over. I need to take a load off, yo.
trans: 很高兴我们能就某事达成一致。

Original: Seven:Just how long have you been here?
Dialogue: Just how long have you been here?

Original: Nine:How long? Well...I haven't really been keeping track! All I know is that I'm beat, yo.
Dialogue: How long? Well...I haven't really been keeping track! All I know is that I'm beat, yo.

Original: Yang:You may rest inside the ship. I am sure your friends will be delighted to see you.
Dialogue: You may rest inside the ship. I am sure your friends will be delighted to see you.

Original: Lann:Alright, Palom, how're we gonna prank everyone next, yo?
Dialogue: Alright, Palom, how're we gonna prank everyone next, yo?
trans: 好吧，Palom，接下来我们要如何恶作剧大家呢？

Original: Palom:We need to be patient, yo. Let's wait until everyone is asleep, then we can scheme, yo!
Dialogue: We need to be patient, yo. Let's wait until everyone is asleep, then we can scheme, yo!

Original: Reynn:Hey, use your regular voices when you're being creepy!
Dialogue: Hey, use your regular voices when you're being creepy!
trans: 嘿，当你令人毛骨悚然时，请使用你的常规声音！

Original: Nine:What's up with those two, yo? They know they sound like idiots when they talk like that, right?
Dialogue: What's up with those two, yo? They know they sound like idiots when they talk like that, right?

Original: Reynn:Oh, Lann would sound like an idiot no matter how he talked.
Dialogue: Oh, Lann would sound like an idiot no matter how he talked.
trans: 哦，无论他怎么说话，兰恩听起来都像个白痴。

Original: Lann:Ouch, that one hurt, yo!
Dialogue: Ouch, that one hurt, yo!

Original: Reynn:But now he's imitating people, too!
Dialogue: But now he's imitating people, too!
trans: 但是现在他也在模仿人！

Original: Nine:Huh? Who are they imitating?
Dialogue: Huh? Who are they imitating?

Original: Deuce:I see you're already fast friends. I didn't know that was Lann at all!
Dialogue: I see you're already fast friends. I didn't know that was Lann at all!
trans: 我看你们已经是好朋友了。

Original: Reynn:Don't encourage him!
Dialogue: Don't encourage him!

Original: King:I had a feeling you would get along.
Dialogue: I had a feeling you would get along.
trans: 我有一种感觉，你们会相处得很好。

Original: King:Lann always did remind me of you, Nine.
Dialogue: Lann always did remind me of you, Nine.
trans: 兰总是让我想起你，九号。

Original: Reynn:I can see why. No offense.
Dialogue: I can see why. No offense.

Original: Lann:That's right! We're bestest buds!
Dialogue: That's right! We're bestest buds!

Original: Deuce:Speaking of Orience...
Dialogue: Speaking of Orience...

Original: Nine:Everything, yo! Why wouldn't I remember it all?
Dialogue: Everything, yo! Why wouldn't I remember it all?

Original: Nine:Wait... I guess I don't remember the people who died...
Dialogue: Wait... I guess I don't remember the people who died...
trans: 等等……我想我不记得死去的人了……

Original: King:I see... We need to talk, then. We
Dialogue: I see... We need to talk, then. We—
trans: 我明白了...那么我们需要谈谈。

Original: Nine:I know. You made a choice.
Dialogue: I know. You made a choice.

Original: Nine:Everything from back then... It all feels like a dream. I don't even know what the hell's going on now, yo!
Dialogue: Everything from back then... It all feels like a dream. I don't even know what the hell's going on now, yo!
trans: 当年的一切……一切都像是在做梦。

Original: Nine:I just have to keep moving forward, and it'll come back to me eventually, right?
Dialogue: I just have to keep moving forward, and it'll come back to me eventually, right?
trans: 我只需要继续前进，它最终会回到我身边，对吧？

Original: Nine:I'm glad we're finally back together, of course. But under that gladness...I dunno, something feels off...
Dialogue: I'm glad we're finally back together, of course. But under that gladness...I dunno, something feels off...
trans: 当然，我很高兴我们终于重归于好。

Original: Deuce:I know what you mean.
Dialogue: I know what you mean.

Original: Palom:Come on, guys, smile! That's what friends do when they reunite, right? Everyone's safe and sound.
Dialogue: Come on, guys, smile! That's what friends do when they reunite, right? Everyone's safe and sound.

Original: Lann:Yeah! Be happy you met each other again... Oh, and be happy you met us, too!
Dialogue: Yeah! Be happy you met each other again... Oh, and be happy you met us, too!

Original: Reynn:Hey, it only took thirty seconds for you to interject yourself into the conversation this time!
Dialogue: Hey, it only took thirty seconds for you to interject yourself into the conversation this time!
trans: 嘿嘿，你这次插话只用了三十秒！

Original: Nine:Yeah, you're right, yo! You guys aren't half bad!
Dialogue: Yeah, you're right, yo! You guys aren't half bad!

Original: Lann:See! He likes us!
Dialogue: See! He likes us!

Original: Palom:I'm surrounded by children! I suppose that means I must be the responsible one. Everyone, follow me!
Dialogue: I'm surrounded by children! I suppose that means I must be the responsible one. Everyone, follow me!

Original: Nine:Are you coming too, Reynn? I mean, if Lann is...
Dialogue: Are you coming too, Reynn? I mean, if Lann is...

Original: Reynn:What? Are you serious? I am so not like him! But I guess I will come along to keep him in line.
Dialogue: What? Are you serious? I am so not like him! But I guess I will come along to keep him in line.

Original: King:He hasn't changed. Still not a thought in his head but how to move forward.
Dialogue: He hasn't changed. Still not a thought in his head but how to move forward.

Original: Deuce:Still the same old Nine. I'm glad some things can be relied on here.
Dialogue: Still the same old Nine. I'm glad some things can be relied on here.

Original: King:We all made our choiceswe all chose how to live. This must be the path he wanted to walk down.
Dialogue: We all made our choices—we all chose how to live. This must be the path he wanted to walk down.
trans: 我们都做出了选择——我们都选择了如何生活。

Original: Serah:What's going on over there? I don't like the looks of it...
Dialogue: What's going on over there? I don't like the looks of it...

Original: Wakka:They're...talking? I dunno, seems a bit heated. Fighting, maybe?
Dialogue: They're...talking? I dunno, seems a bit heated. Fighting, maybe?

Original: Sherlotta:Does it matter? They look like they're having fun.
Dialogue: Does it matter? They look like they're having fun.

Original: Wakka:Well, we should keep an eye on them either way.
Dialogue: Well, we should keep an eye on them either way.
trans: 好吧，无论哪种方式，我们都应该密切关注它们。

Original: Machina:I'm sorry, Nine. I don't expect you to be able to forgive me for what I've done.
Dialogue: I'm sorry, Nine. I don't expect you to be able to forgive me for what I've done.

Original: Nine:Is this why you called me here, yo?
Dialogue: Is this why you called me here, yo?
trans: 这就是你叫我来这里的原因吗？

Original: Machina:I'm talking about what happened in Orience. I don't know what came over me...
Dialogue: I'm talking about what happened in Orience. I don't know what came over me...
trans: 我说的是在 Orience 发生的事情。

Original: Machina:I caused trouble for everyone in Class Zero. Caused trouble for you. I understand if you guys hate me.
Dialogue: I caused trouble for everyone in Class Zero. Caused trouble for you. I understand if you guys hate me.
trans: 给零班的大家添麻烦了。

Original: Nine:I don't know what you're talking about, yo. I don't remember any of that.
Dialogue: I don't know what you're talking about, yo. I don't remember any of that.
trans: 我不知道你在说什么，哟。

Original: Nine:Look, I just do what I wanna do. Not everyone has to be a comic hero.
Dialogue: Look, I just do what I wanna do. Not everyone has to be a comic hero.
trans: 看，我只是做我想做的事。

Original: Machina:Huh? You mean a tragic heroine?
Dialogue: Huh? You mean a tragic heroine?

Original: Nine:You wanna be a heroine? I mean, that's cool, you do you, yo! Machina the heroine!
Dialogue: You wanna be a heroine? I mean, that's cool, you do you, yo! Machina the heroine!

Original: Machina:I'm not talking about myself! That's what it's called! Haven't you ever read a book!?
Dialogue: I'm not talking about myself! That's what it's called! Haven't you ever read a book!?

Original: Nine:Hey! Don't get mad at me! I was just trying to be supportive, yo!
Dialogue: Hey! Don't get mad at me! I was just trying to be supportive, yo!

Original: Sherlotta:You. Are. So. Annoying! I can't stand watching you two bicker!
Dialogue: You. Are. So. Annoying! I can't stand watching you two bicker!

Original: Wakka:If you wanna fight like kids, maybe you should go to bed without supper.
Dialogue: If you wanna fight like kids, maybe you should go to bed without supper.
trans: 如果你想像孩子一样打架，也许你应该不吃晚饭就去睡觉。

Original: Nine:A fight? Well, call it what you want. That's what family does, yo.
Dialogue: A fight? Well, call it what you want. That's what family does, yo.

Original: Machina:You thought we were fighting just now?
Dialogue: You thought we were fighting just now?
trans: 你以为我们刚刚在打架？

Original: Sherlotta:Whatever it was, I bet you guys would be at it for days if we didn't interrupt you!
Dialogue: Whatever it was, I bet you guys would be at it for days if we didn't interrupt you!
trans: 不管是什么，我敢打赌，如果我们不打扰你们，你们会坚持好几天的！

Original: Machina:Seems strange to call it fighting. That's the same way I act with Ace, too.
Dialogue: Seems strange to call it fighting. That's the same way I act with Ace, too.
trans: 称其为战斗似乎很奇怪。

Original: Sherlotta:Yeah, just because you were family, doesn't mean you'll never fight.
Dialogue: Yeah, just because you were family, doesn't mean you'll never fight.
trans: 是的，仅仅因为你们是一家人，并不意味着你们永远不会吵架。

Original: Serah:I know how that is. My sister gets mad when I stay quiet, but whenever I say something it turns into an argument.
Dialogue: I know how that is. My sister gets mad when I stay quiet, but whenever I say something it turns into an argument.

Original: Wakka:That's because you respect each other, or you wouldn't bother arguing. It's the same with you two, right?
Dialogue: That's because you respect each other, or you wouldn't bother arguing. It's the same with you two, right?
trans: 那是因为你们互相尊重，不然你们也懒得争论。

Original: Machina:Respect? To be honest, I thought he might not ever talk to me again...
Dialogue: Respect? To be honest, I thought he might not ever talk to me again...

Original: Nine:You think too much, yo! You shouldn't spend so much time worrying about things by yourself!
Dialogue: You think too much, yo! You shouldn't spend so much time worrying about things by yourself!

Original: Machina:I know, but...that's just how I am. I'll try not to keep things bottled up, just give me a little more time.
Dialogue: I know, but...that's just how I am. I'll try not to keep things bottled up, just give me a little more time.
trans: 我知道，但是……我就是这样。

Original: Nine:A little more? Come on, Machina, don't be so glum!
Dialogue: A little more? Come on, Machina, don't be so glum!

Original: Nine:I've said it before: if you're Class Zero, you're as good as family!
Dialogue: I've said it before if you're Class Zero, you're as good as family!
trans: 我说过了，零级就和家人一样好！

Original: Machina:You mean that?
Dialogue: You mean that?

Original: Machina:Maybe...maybe that's all it takes.
Dialogue: Maybe...maybe that's all it takes.

Original: Machina:Thanks, Nine.
Dialogue: Thanks, Nine.

Original: Nine:My head hurts, yo! I gotta take a break.
Dialogue: My head hurts, yo! I gotta take a break.

Original: Jack:Yeaaah, you can say that again. I'm all studied out!
Dialogue: Yeaaah, you can say that again. I'm all studied out!

Original: Quistis:My apologies, I was having too much fun. Yes, let's take a quick break.
Dialogue: My apologies, I was having too much fun. Yes, let's take a quick break.

Original: Ignis:Time passes quickly in good company. I was absorbed in your lesson.
Dialogue: Time passes quickly in good company. I was absorbed in your lesson.
trans: 时间在好公司中过得很快。

Original: Quistis:Good. I was worried that since our worlds are different, my lessons wouldn't stick. But if you enjoyed them, then they're worth continuing.
Dialogue: Good. I was worried that since our worlds are different, my lessons wouldn't stick. But if you enjoyed them, then they're worth continuing.

Original: Ignis:They were more than enjoyable. I forgot how much I missed sitting in a classroom.
Dialogue: They were more than enjoyable. I forgot how much I missed sitting in a classroom.

Original: Porom:I had fun, too! We might be from different worlds, but your lessons can apply to so much!
Dialogue: I had fun, too! We might be from different worlds, but your lessons can apply to so much!

Original: Porom:Promise to teach us more?
Dialogue: Promise to teach us more?

Original: Nine:Glad someone's having fun.
Dialogue: Glad someone's having fun.

Original: Jack:You guys are weird. We didn't come here to study!
Dialogue: You guys are weird. We didn't come here to study!

Original: Quistis:King and Seven asked me to watch over your studies.
Dialogue: King and Seven asked me to watch over your studies.
trans: 国王和七让我监督你的学业。

Original: Nine:I don't mean to brag, but I never studied and no one ever got on my case, yo!
Dialogue: I don't mean to brag, but I never studied and no one ever got on my case, yo!
trans: 我并不是要吹牛，但我从未学习过，也没有人接过我的案子，哟！

Original: Jack:How am I not surprised.
Dialogue: How am I not surprised.

Original: Nine:It's all about how you perform in battle, yo! What do I need books for!?
Dialogue: It's all about how you perform in battle, yo! What do I need books for!?
trans: 关键在于你在战斗中的表现，哟！

Original: Porom:But how often do you have the chance to learn from such a skilled teacher? You should relish the opportunity!
Dialogue: But how often do you have the chance to learn from such a skilled teacher? You should relish the opportunity!
trans: 但是你有多少次有机会向这样一位技术娴熟的老师学习呢？

Original: Jack:...Weeell, if you put it that way.
Dialogue: ...Weeell, if you put it that way.

Original: Nine:I can't say no to that, yo.
Dialogue: I can't say no to that, yo.

Original: Ignis:I appreciate your honesty. Then perhaps you wouldn't mind learning with us a while longer?
Dialogue: I appreciate your honesty. Then perhaps you wouldn't mind learning with us a while longer?

Original: Nine:Sure, why not.
Dialogue: Sure, why not.

Original: Nine:I'm not gonna last much longer, yo.
Dialogue: I'm not gonna last much longer, yo.

Original: Jack:Ugh. I don't think my head can fit any more stuff in it.
Dialogue: Ugh. I don't think my head can fit any more stuff in it.

Original: Quistis:Hmm. Maybe we were going too fast.
Dialogue: Hmm. Maybe we were going too fast.

Original: Ignis:Then allow me to explain it to them and review the material at the same time. Teaching others often increases your own understanding.
Dialogue: Then allow me to explain it to them and review the material at the same time. Teaching others often increases your own understanding.
trans: 然后让我给他们解释，同时复习资料。

Original: Porom:That's a good idea! Hearing it from someone else might shed new light on the material.
Dialogue: That's a good idea! Hearing it from someone else might shed new light on the material.

Original: Nine:Well, I dunno about
Dialogue: Well, I dunno about—

Original: Nine:Dang, we gotta get rid of this thing first, yo!
Dialogue: Dang, we gotta get rid of this thing first, yo!
trans: 该死，我们得先解决这个问题，哟！

Original: Quistis:Of all the times! Can't it wait until the lesson is over!?
Dialogue: Of all the times! Can't it wait until the lesson is over!?

Original: Porom:What do we do!? The wind is messing everything up!
Dialogue: What do we do!? The wind is messing everything up!

Original: Ignis:We must calculate the wind resistance before striking. A slight misstep would be grave.
Dialogue: We must calculate the wind resistance before striking. A slight misstep would be grave.
trans: 我们必须在打击之前计算风阻。

Original: Jack:Nice one, Nine! Leave the rest to me!
Dialogue: Nice one, Nine! Leave the rest to me!

Original: Quistis:Great job, you two! That was impressive.
Dialogue: Great job, you two! That was impressive.

Original: Nine:Easy peasy. I never miss, yo!
Dialogue: Easy peasy. I never miss, yo!

Original: Porom:Now what does this mean?
Dialogue: Now what does this mean?

Original: Ignis:I think I know. These two learn through practical experience. Analysis is not their forte, action is.
Dialogue: I think I know. These two learn through practical experience. Analysis is not their forte, action is.

Original: Nine:Duh! In the heat of battle the one to act first wins, yo! You gotta think with your body, not your head!
Dialogue: Duh! In the heat of battle the one to act first wins, yo! You gotta think with your body, not your head!

Original: Quistis:I'd never thought of it that way before, but it certainly is an interesting perspective! I might just have to consider more experimental lesson plans...
Dialogue: I'd never thought of it that way before, but it certainly is an interesting perspective! I might just have to consider more experimental lesson plans...
trans: 我以前从来没有这样想过，但这确实是一个有趣的观点！

Original: Nine:Hey now. Don't get any funny ideas, yo!
Dialogue: Hey now. Don't get any funny ideas, yo!

Original: Nine:I'm not gonna be your guinea pig!
Dialogue: I'm not gonna be your guinea pig!
trans: 我不会成为你的小白鼠！

Original: Rydia:Take that!
Dialogue: Take that!

Original: Celes:Tch...! There's no end to them...
Dialogue: Tch...! There's no end to them...

Original: Cid:And I'm runnin' outta gas. We need to do somethin' or else
Dialogue: And I'm runnin' outta gas. We need to do somethin' or else—

Original: Cid:...What's that noise?
Dialogue: ...What's that noise?

Original: Rydia:It sounds like a harp.
Dialogue: It sounds like a harp.

Original: Rydia:It couldn't be...!
Dialogue: It couldn't be...!

Original: Celes:Look! The monsters collapsed!
Dialogue: Look! The monsters collapsed!

Original: Cid:What the heck's going on here!? Those monsters fell down the second they heard that music!
Dialogue: What the heck's going on here!? Those monsters fell down the second they heard that music!

Original: ???:Thank goodness. It looks like I made it just in time.
Dialogue: Thank goodness. It looks like I made it just in time.

Original: Rydia:Edward! It really was you!
Dialogue: Edward! It really was you!

Original: Edward:Good to see you again, Rydia. Are those the warriors from other worlds?
Dialogue: Good to see you again, Rydia. Are those the warriors from other worlds?
trans: 很高兴再次见到你，瑞迪亚。

Original: Celes:Is he a friend of yours, Rydia?
Dialogue: Is he a friend of yours, Rydia?
trans: 他是你的朋友吗，瑞迪亚？

Original: Rydia:Yeah! That music sounded familiar, so I had a feeling it was him!
Dialogue: Yeah! That music sounded familiar, so I had a feeling it was him!

Original: Edward:A pleasure to make your acquaintance. I am Edward Chris von Muir.
Dialogue: A pleasure to make your acquaintance. I am Edward Chris von Muir.

Original: Edward:I heard about your plight from the goddess. She said that the dimensions are
Dialogue: I heard about your plight from the goddess. She said that the dimensions are—
trans: 我从女神那里听说了你的困境。

Original: Cid:Hey, watch out!
Dialogue: Hey, watch out!

Original: Edward:What? Waaah!
Dialogue: What? Waaah!

Original: Rydia:Edward! Ohhh, you're as oblivious as ever!
Dialogue: Edward! Ohhh, you're as oblivious as ever!

Original: Edward:Here it comes!
Dialogue: Here it comes!

Original: Celes:We can talk later. Everyone, get ready!
Dialogue: We can talk later. Everyone, get ready!

Original: Cecil:Are you alright, Edward?
Dialogue: Are you alright, Edward?

Original: Edward:Haha. That was a close one. Thank you, Cecil.
Dialogue: Haha. That was a close one. Thank you, Cecil.

Original: Cecil:Allow me to introduce you to our friend Edward.
Dialogue: Allow me to introduce you to our friend Edward.
trans: 请允许我向您介绍我们的朋友爱德华。

Original: Yang:Precisely, Lord Irvine. Though he is more than your average bard.
Dialogue: Precisely, Lord Irvine. Though he is more than your average bard.

Original: Faris:Royalty masquerading as a bard? You've got some weird hobbies.
Dialogue: Royalty masquerading as a bard? You've got some weird hobbies.
trans: 伪装成吟游诗人的皇室成员？

Original: Edward:For generations, the Damcyan royal family has been both merchants and minstrels.
Dialogue: For generations, the Damcyan royal family has been both merchants and minstrels.
trans: 几代人以来，达姆西恩王室既是商人又是吟游诗人。

Original: Edward:It seems the skills of the latter flow more strongly in my blood, however...
Dialogue: It seems the skills of the latter flow more strongly in my blood, however...
trans: 似乎后者的技能在我的血液中流淌得更强烈，然而……

Original: Mog:I'm glad they do, kupo! Your song saved us!
Dialogue: I'm glad they do, kupo! Your song saved us!

Original: Yang:I expected no less of Lord Mog. It seems he has already noticed.
Dialogue: I expected no less of Lord Mog. It seems he has already noticed.
trans: 我对莫格勋爵的期望不亚于此。

Original: Irvine:Noticed what?
Dialogue: Noticed what?

Original: Cecil:The timbre of Edward's harp can seal the powers of monsters.
Dialogue: The timbre of Edward's harp can seal the powers of monsters.
trans: 爱德华竖琴的音色可以封印怪物的力量。

Original: Irvine:No way! I've never met anyone like that before. That's incredible!
Dialogue: No way! I've never met anyone like that before. That's incredible!

Original: Faris:You don't look it, but you're a fighter! I had you all wrong, Edward.
Dialogue: You don't look it, but you're a fighter! I had you all wrong, Edward.
trans: 你看起来不像，但你是个战士！

Original: Irvine:When you fell over earlier, I thought you were a complete coward, but...
Dialogue: When you fell over earlier, I thought you were a complete coward, but...
trans: 刚才你摔倒的时候，我还以为你是个彻头彻尾的胆小鬼，但是……

Original: Edward:I guess...I am a coward...
Dialogue: I guess...I am a coward...

Original: Cecil:No, Edward.
Dialogue: No, Edward.

Original: Cecil:You are a kindhearted and brave man.
Dialogue: You are a kindhearted and brave man.
trans: 你是一个善良勇敢的人。

Original: Yang:Indeed. Even when you were bedridden, you aided us with the song from your harp.
Dialogue: Indeed. Even when you were bedridden, you aided us with the song from your harp.

Original: Yang:You are a trustworthy ally.
Dialogue: You are a trustworthy ally.
trans: 你是一个值得信赖的盟友。

Original: Irvine:Whoops! I guess I should've been clearer. That was just my first impression!
Dialogue: Whoops! I guess I should've been clearer. That was just my first impression!

Original: Faris:You seem about as delicate as you look, though.
Dialogue: You seem about as delicate as you look, though.
trans: 不过，你看起来和你看起来一样娇弱。

Original: Mog:But his courage is true, kupo! Without a doubt!
Dialogue: But his courage is true, kupo! Without a doubt!
trans: 但他的勇气是真的，库波！

Original: Mog:I want you to use that courage to help us save our worlds! Will you come with us, kupo?
Dialogue: I want you to use that courage to help us save our worlds! Will you come with us, kupo?
trans: 我希望你用这种勇气来帮助我们拯救我们的世界！

Original: Cecil:I hope you will, Edward.
Dialogue: I hope you will, Edward.

Original: Yang:Lend us your strength once again. Everyone here wishes it so!
Dialogue: Lend us your strength once again. Everyone here wishes it so!
trans: 再次借给我们你的力量。

Original: Edward:Thank you...
Dialogue: Thank you...

Original: Edward:If you insist, I will gladly join you on your journey.
Dialogue: If you insist, I will gladly join you on your journey.
trans: 如果你坚持，我很乐意加入你的旅程。

Original: Edward:...That should do it. We can keep going now.
Dialogue: ...That should do it. We can keep going now.

Original: Cecil:Thank you, Edward. You're as reliable as ever.
Dialogue: Thank you, Edward. You're as reliable as ever.

Original: Rydia:I know! You're so different than the Edward back then.
Dialogue: I know! You're so different than the Edward back then.

Original: Vivi:What do you mean?
Dialogue: What do you mean?

Original: Rydia:He was always crying.
Dialogue: He was always crying.

Original: Edward:I would prefer you didn't speak of that...
Dialogue: I would prefer you didn't speak of that...

Original: Hope:I remember being just like that a long time ago.
Dialogue: I remember being just like that a long time ago.
trans: 我记得很久以前就是这样。

Original: Edward:I would like to hear about it...if you don't mind, that is.
Dialogue: I would like to hear about it...if you don't mind, that is.
trans: 我想听听……如果你不介意的话。

Original: Hope:I always pushed the responsibility onto someone else in a fight and only ever thought of running away...
Dialogue: I always pushed the responsibility onto someone else in a fight and only ever thought of running away...
trans: 打架总是把责任推给别人，只想着逃跑……

Original: Hope:But Lightning made me realize that nothing would change if I kept running.
Dialogue: But Lightning made me realize that nothing would change if I kept running.
trans: 但是闪电让我意识到，如果我继续奔跑，什么都不会改变。

Original: Vivi:I was also afraid of fighting. Even now, I get scared sometimes...
Dialogue: I was also afraid of fighting. Even now, I get scared sometimes...

Original: Vivi:But when I'm with everyone, I understand... Not doing anything is even scarier.
Dialogue: But when I'm with everyone, I understand... Not doing anything is even scarier.
trans: 但是当我和大家在一起的时候，我明白了……什么都不做更可怕。

Original: Edward:I see... So I wasn't the only one who was weak at the start.
Dialogue: I see... So I wasn't the only one who was weak at the start.
trans: 原来如此……所以一开始弱的不只我一个。

Original: Firion:No one is born strong.
Dialogue: No one is born strong.

Original: Firion:We become strong when we find a reason to fight or something to protect.
Dialogue: We become strong when we find a reason to fight or something to protect.
trans: 当我们找到战斗的理由或需要保护的东西时，我们就会变得强大。

Original: Cecil:Love for one's companions turns into extraordinary courage...
Dialogue: Love for one's companions turns into extraordinary courage...
trans: 对同伴的爱化作非凡的勇气……

Original: Cecil:You are proof of that. So you can hold your heads up high.
Dialogue: You are proof of that. So you can hold your heads up high.

Original: Edward:...You're right. I became strong because of my friends.
Dialogue: ...You're right. I became strong because of my friends.

Original: Rydia:So no more hiding?
Dialogue: So no more hiding?

Original: Edward:...I think not. I want to protect everyone.
Dialogue: ...I think not. I want to protect everyone.

Original: Vivi:...I think you and I can get even stronger, Mr. Edward.
Dialogue: ...I think you and I can get even stronger, Mr. Edward.
trans: ......我认为你我可以变得更强大，爱德华先生。

Original: Vivi:Because I want to protect all of our friends, too.
Dialogue: Because I want to protect all of our friends, too.
trans: 因为我也想保护我们所有的朋友。

Original: Edward:I won't let you down. I will hold the courage you gave me in my heart!
Dialogue: I won't let you down. I will hold the courage you gave me in my heart!

Original: Raijin:Hey, Edward. Mind if I ask ya somethin'?
Dialogue: Hey, Edward. Mind if I ask ya somethin'?

Original: Edward:Oh, you look distraught. What's wrong?
Dialogue: Oh, you look distraught. What's wrong?

Original: Raijin:Well, it was on the airship, ya know? I was bringin' Seifer a drink.
Dialogue: Well, it was on the airship, ya know? I was bringin' Seifer a drink.
trans: 嗯，是在飞艇上，你知道吗？

Original: Raijin:But then the ship started shakin', ya know? And I spilled it all over him!
Dialogue: But then the ship started shakin', ya know? And I spilled it all over him!
trans: 但随后船开始摇晃，你知道吗？

Original: Raijin:And he's mad as all get out! He won't listen to a word I say, ya know? I dunno what to do.
Dialogue: And he's mad as all get out! He won't listen to a word I say, ya know? I dunno what to do.
trans: 当所有人都滚出去时，他很生气！

Original: Locke:Why's he getting so mad over a little spill?
Dialogue: Why's he getting so mad over a little spill?
trans: 为什么他会因为一点点泄漏而如此生气？

Original: Raijin:But it drenched his coat, ya know? Seifer loves that coat more than anythin'!
Dialogue: But it drenched his coat, ya know? Seifer loves that coat more than anythin'!
trans: 但是它弄湿了他的外套，你知道吗？

Original: Freya:We all have our peculiarities. Perhaps there's something we could do to calm him.
Dialogue: We all have our peculiarities. Perhaps there's something we could do to calm him.

Original: Freya:Seifer isn't one to show his true feelings in front of others. He enjoys bluster.
Dialogue: Seifer isn't one to show his true feelings in front of others. He enjoys bluster.
trans: Seifer 不是那种会在别人面前表露自己真实感受的人。

Original: Edward:True. Perhaps we could use this to find out how he feels.
Dialogue: True. Perhaps we could use this to find out how he feels.

Original: Raijin:Eh? How do you mean? That's just a piece of grass, ya know?
Dialogue: Eh? How do you mean? That's just a piece of grass, ya know?

Original: Locke:Really? Now that's what I call a treasure! Mind if I have one?
Dialogue: Really? Now that's what I call a treasure! Mind if I have one?

Original: Edward:...Perhaps when this fight is over.
Dialogue: ...Perhaps when this fight is over.

Original: Seifer:Ugh. Finally the stain is gone. What a pain.
Dialogue: Ugh. Finally the stain is gone. What a pain.

Original: Seifer:What do you think!? That clumsy good-for-nothing!
Dialogue: What do you think!? That clumsy good-for-nothing!

Original: Edward:Now, now. There's no need for name calling.
Dialogue: Now, now. There's no need for name calling.

Original: Edward:Raijin was only looking out for you. In fact, he was getting you something to drink. You did know that, right?
Dialogue: Raijin was only looking out for you. In fact, he was getting you something to drink. You did know that, right?

Original: Seifer:Huh? A drink? Really?
Dialogue: Huh? A drink? Really?

Original: Seifer:So let's say he is. It doesn't change what he did...
Dialogue: So let's say he is. It doesn't change what he did...

Original: Seifer:Gah! I don't wanna talk about it anymore! Just get outta here!
Dialogue: Gah! I don't wanna talk about it anymore! Just get outta here!

Original: Edward:Whatever you say, Seifer. Farewell.
Dialogue: Whatever you say, Seifer. Farewell.

Original: Seifer:He thinks like a kid. Like a drink would make me feel better...
Dialogue: He thinks like a kid. Like a drink would make me feel better...

Original: Seifer:...Maybe I was a little hard on him.
Dialogue: ...Maybe I was a little hard on him.

Original: Seifer:Fine. I'll forgive that blockhead.
Dialogue: Fine. I'll forgive that blockhead.

Original: Seifer:"Fine. I'll forgive that blockhead."
Dialogue: "Fine. I'll forgive that blockhead."

Original: Raijin:Did ya hear that? He's not mad at me anymore!
Dialogue: Did ya hear that? He's not mad at me anymore!

Original: Edward:It appears your friendship is safe after all.
Dialogue: It appears your friendship is safe after all.
trans: 看来你们的友谊毕竟是安全的。

Original: Raijin:Thanks, Edward! If it weren't for you, who knows how long Seifer would've been sulkin' for, ya know?
Dialogue: Thanks, Edward! If it weren't for you, who knows how long Seifer would've been sulkin' for, ya know?

Original: Raijin:I'm gonna go talk to him. C'mon, Fujin.
Dialogue: I'm gonna go talk to him. C'mon, Fujin.

Original: Locke:You sure went to a lot of trouble to fix their drama. Not everyone would have the patience.
Dialogue: You sure went to a lot of trouble to fix their drama. Not everyone would have the patience.
trans: 你肯定费了很大的劲来修复他们的戏剧。

Original: Edward:It's because of my own friends that I've become what I am. And friends can't help each other when they're fighting.
Dialogue: It's because of my own friends that I've become what I am. And friends can't help each other when they're fighting.
trans: 正是因为我自己的朋友，我才成为现在的我。

Original: Freya:You are wise beyond your years. That was a clever strategy.
Dialogue: You are wise beyond your years. That was a clever strategy.
trans: 你的智慧超越了你的年龄。

Original: Edward:I'm just glad I was able to help my allies.
Dialogue: I'm just glad I was able to help my allies.
trans: 我很高兴我能够帮助我的盟友。

Original: Serah:You know, something has always interested me.
Dialogue: You know, something has always interested me.
trans: 你知道，有些事情一直让我感兴趣。

Original: Serah:Edward and Thancred are both bards, but I couldn't imagine two more different people.
Dialogue: Edward and Thancred are both bards, but I couldn't imagine two more different people.
trans: Edward 和 Thancred 都是吟游诗人，但我无法想象还有两个不同的人。
