Original: Thancred:Is that so?
Dialogue: Is that so?

Original: Tifa:Yeah. As soon as you see a girl that catches your fancy, your head is filled with sonnets and romantic rhymes.
Dialogue: Yeah. As soon as you see a girl that catches your fancy, your head is filled with sonnets and romantic rhymes.

Original: Tifa:Edward isn't so easy with his words.
Dialogue: Edward isn't so easy with his words.
trans: 爱德华说话不那么随和。

Original: Thancred:Now, now. I take great care with every word I speak.
Dialogue: Now, now. I take great care with every word I speak.

Original: Edward:No two bards are the same in their role. I assume it's the same in all worlds.
Dialogue: No two bards are the same in their role. I assume it's the same in all worlds.
trans: 没有两个吟游诗人的角色是相同的。

Original: Lion:Where I'm from, mostbardsserve to boost morale and support soldiers in battle.
Dialogue: Where I'm from, most bards serve to boost morale and support soldiers in battle.
trans: 在我所在的地方，大多数吟游诗人都在战斗中鼓舞士气和支持士兵。

Original: Lion:Their melodious voices bolster others beyond their limits. Every troop needs one.
Dialogue: Their melodious voices bolster others beyond their limits. Every troop needs one.
trans: 他们悦耳的声音鼓舞着其他人超越他们的极限。

Original: Agrias:A song sung with conviction has power on the battlefield. Inmy worldas well,bardsare often sought after as mercenaries.
Dialogue: A song sung with conviction has power on the battlefield. In my world as well, bards are often sought after as mercenaries.
trans: 一首充满信念的歌曲在战场上具有力量。

Original: Thancred:Mercenaries? I suppose that isn't so odd, considering how common it is to hear their songs on the battlefield.
Dialogue: Mercenaries? I suppose that isn't so odd, considering how common it is to hear their songs on the battlefield.

Original: Thancred:That being said, my songs aren't fit for fighting. I simply aim to express my love for beauty when I see it.
Dialogue: That being said, my songs aren't fit for fighting. I simply aim to express my love for beauty when I see it.
trans: 话虽这么说，我的歌不适合打架。

Original: Serah:And you see beauty everywhere you look, no doubt.
Dialogue: And you see beauty everywhere you look, no doubt.
trans: 毫无疑问，随处可见美丽。

Original: Edward:Expressing love proper is no simple matter. You can't hope to find inspiration from just anyone.
Dialogue: Expressing love proper is no simple matter. You can't hope to find inspiration from just anyone.
trans: 正确表达爱不是一件简单的事情。

Original: Edward:It's a decision that's made by your heart. A rare decision. A beautiful decision.
Dialogue: It's a decision that's made by your heart. A rare decision. A beautiful decision.
trans: 这是你内心做出的决定。

Original: Serah:Now that's the kind of love song I want to hear.
Dialogue: Now that's the kind of love song I want to hear.

Original: Tifa:Me too. A love song just for me.
Dialogue: Me too. A love song just for me.

Original: Lion:Hmm, it sounds like Edward is the true romantic here.
Dialogue: Hmm, it sounds like Edward is the true romantic here.
trans: 嗯，听起来爱德华才是真正的浪漫主义者。

Original: Thancred:Hah. Perhaps.
Dialogue: Hah. Perhaps.

Original: Agrias:No arguments?
Dialogue: No arguments?

Original: Thancred:Our heart's desires do not take on the same form for everyone. Who's to say what's proper and what isn't?
Dialogue: Our heart's desires do not take on the same form for everyone. Who's to say what's proper and what isn't?
trans: 我们内心的渴望对每个人来说都不会呈现出相同的形式。

Original: Thancred:That being said, I would very much like to hear an ode to love composed by our dear Edward.
Dialogue: That being said, I would very much like to hear an ode to love composed by our dear Edward.
trans: 话虽这么说，我还是很想听一首我们亲爱的爱德华谱写的爱的颂歌。

Original: Tifa:Me too!
Dialogue: Me too!

Original: Edward:Apologies, but a song of that nature may be quite difficult for me at present.
Dialogue: Apologies, but a song of that nature may be quite difficult for me at present.
trans: 抱歉，这种性质的歌曲目前对我来说可能相当困难。

Original: Serah:Really? That's too bad.
Dialogue: Really? That's too bad.

Original: Edward:(I must first confront my past self.)
Dialogue: (I must first confront my past self.)
trans: （我必须首先面对过去的自己。）

Original: Edward:(I hope you're looking down on me, Anna. I hope my actions in this world bring a smile to your face.)
Dialogue: (I hope you're looking down on me, Anna. I hope my actions in this world bring a smile to your face.)
trans: （我希望你看不起我，安娜。我希望我在这个世界上的行为能给你带来微笑。）

Original: ???:Not a soul to be found no matter where I go... Where could Relm be...?
Dialogue: Not a soul to be found no matter where I go... Where could Relm be...?
trans: 无论我走到哪里都找不到灵魂...... Relm 会在哪里......？

Original: ???:Hm!? Who's there?
Dialogue: Hm!? Who's there?

Original: ???:Just some monsters, and at a time like this...
Dialogue: Just some monsters, and at a time like this...
trans: 只是一些怪物，而在这种时候...

Original: ???:Ho ho ho! You couldn't beat me, not in a hundred years!
Dialogue: Ho ho ho! You couldn't beat me, not in a hundred years!

Original: Zell:What was that noise?
Dialogue: What was that noise?

Original: ???:Oho, human voices! It's about time.
Dialogue: Oho, human voices! It's about time.

Original: Selphie:Owwie! My head is throbbing!
Dialogue: Owwie! My head is throbbing!

Original: Barret:What's an old man doing out here? Are you the one who made that noise!?
Dialogue: What's an old man doing out here? Are you the one who made that noise!?
trans: 一个老人在外面干什么？

Original: ???:Indeed, that was me.
Dialogue: Indeed, that was me.

Original: ???:Would you happen to know a little girl named Relm? She's my granddaughter
Dialogue: Would you happen to know a little girl named Relm? She's my granddaughter—
trans: 你会碰巧认识一个叫 Relm 的小女孩吗？

Original: Cinque:Hey, didn't that noise earlier sound like one of those icky monsters?
Dialogue: Hey, didn't that noise earlier sound like one of those icky monsters?
trans: 嘿，刚才的声音听起来不像是那些恶心的怪物吗？

Original: Zell:You have a point...
Dialogue: You have a point...

Original: Selphie:I got it! He's a monster in disguise!
Dialogue: I got it! He's a monster in disguise!

Original: ???:Wh-what!? N-no, I'm
Dialogue: Wh-what!? N-no, I'm—

Original: Barret:Hold on a sec. Didn't he just say "Relm"...?
Dialogue: Hold on a sec. Didn't he just say "Relm"...?

Original: Zell:You may look like a harmless old man, but we know what you are! Prepare yourself
Dialogue: You may look like a harmless old man, but we know what you are! Prepare yourself—
trans: 你可能看起来像一个无害的老人，但我们知道你是什么！

Original: ???:Gah! I can't believe this!
Dialogue: Gah! I can't believe this!

Original: Cinque:He's getting away! After him!
Dialogue: He's getting away! After him!

Original: ???:Huff... What a mess I've gotten into. What is wrong with those people?
Dialogue: Huff... What a mess I've gotten into. What is wrong with those people?
trans: 哈……我陷入了多么混乱的境地。

Original: Tifa:Are you okay, sir?
Dialogue: Are you okay, sir?

Original: Cecil:Were you attacked by monsters?
Dialogue: Were you attacked by monsters?

Original: ???:...They look more likely to listen than those brutes from earlier...
Dialogue: ...They look more likely to listen than those brutes from earlier...
trans: ......他们看起来比之前的那些畜生更愿意倾听......

Original: Strago:My name is Strago, and I was attacked not by monsters, but four humans...
Dialogue: My name is Strago, and I was attacked not by monsters, but four humans...
trans: 我的名字叫斯特拉戈，袭击我的不是怪物，而是四个人类……

Original: Strago:But more importantly, do you know a young girl named Relm?
Dialogue: But more importantly, do you know a young girl named Relm?
trans: 但更重要的是，你认识一个名叫雷尔姆的年轻女孩吗？

Original: Tifa:We do! Are you, perhaps, her grandfather?
Dialogue: We do! Are you, perhaps, her grandfather?

Original: Strago:That voice...! Relm!
Dialogue: That voice...! Relm!

Original: Relm:It is you, Grandpa! I missed you!
Dialogue: It is you, Grandpa! I missed you!

Original: Strago:I missed you, too! Unh... My vision's blurry... I can't see anything...!
Dialogue: I missed you, too! Unh... My vision's blurry... I can't see anything...!

Original: Cecil:We heard about this man before. He's Relm's grandfather, right?
Dialogue: We heard about this man before. He's Relm's grandfather, right?
trans: 我们以前听说过这个人。

Original: Tifa:Looks like it. Haha... I'm so happy they could see each other like this.
Dialogue: Looks like it. Haha... I'm so happy they could see each other like this.

Original: Selphie:Whaaat! So he wasn't a monster after all?
Dialogue: Whaaat! So he wasn't a monster after all?

Original: Selphie:We really got ahead of ourselves there... Sorry.
Dialogue: We really got ahead of ourselves there... Sorry.

Original: Tifa:Good grief... You act as if we don't have other blue magic users in our group.
Dialogue: Good grief... You act as if we don't have other blue magic users in our group.
trans: 天哪……你表现得好像我们组里没有其他蓝色魔法使用者一样。

Original: Barret:I tried to tell 'em. He said he was looking for Relm...
Dialogue: I tried to tell 'em. He said he was looking for Relm...

Original: Strago:Your apologies could use some work, but...I found Relm, so it matters not.
Dialogue: Your apologies could use some work, but...I found Relm, so it matters not.
trans: 你的道歉可能需要一些工作，但是......我找到了 Relm，所以这不重要。

Original: Strago:I was so focused on looking for her I wandered into a place I've never seen...
Dialogue: I was so focused on looking for her I wandered into a place I've never seen...
trans: 我是如此专注于寻找她，以至于我徘徊在一个我从未见过的地方......

Original: Strago:But I never expected it to be a completely different world.
Dialogue: But I never expected it to be a completely different world.
trans: 却万万没想到，那是一个完全不同的世界。

Original: Cecil:Strange occurrences in this world are posing a threat to the existence of all others.
Dialogue: Strange occurrences in this world are posing a threat to the existence of all others.
trans: 这个世界上发生的奇怪事件对所有其他人的存在构成威胁。

Original: Tifa:We're trying to stop that.
Dialogue: We're trying to stop that.
trans: 我们正在努力阻止这种情况。

Original: Strago:What a grave and depressing tale...
Dialogue: What a grave and depressing tale...
trans: 多么沉重和令人沮丧的故事……

Original: Strago:And now my back hurts. I think I threw it out while running away...
Dialogue: And now my back hurts. I think I threw it out while running away...

Original: Barret:You okay, old man? Maybe you should sit down over there.
Dialogue: You okay, old man? Maybe you should sit down over there.

Original: Selphie:I guess that's just the joy of getting older!
Dialogue: I guess that's just the joy of getting older!
trans: 我想这就是变老的快乐吧！

Original: Relm:Oh, don't baby him! My grandpa looks old and frail, but he's super strong!
Dialogue: Oh, don't baby him! My grandpa looks old and frail, but he's super strong!

Original: Relm:I'll prove it to you! Just give me a sec to draw a picture!
Dialogue: I'll prove it to you! Just give me a sec to draw a picture!

Original: Tifa:Hey...Relm. What're you drawing? I hope it's not what I think it is...
Dialogue: Hey...Relm. What're you drawing? I hope it's not what I think it is...

Original: Relm:If you think it's a monster, then good job! Ta da!
Dialogue: If you think it's a monster, then good job! Ta da!
trans: 如果你认为它是怪物，那就干得好！

Original: Strago:Relm... Did you really have to draw this?
Dialogue: Relm... Did you really have to draw this?
trans: 雷尔姆……真的非要画这个吗？

Original: Relm:Hey, old man! Don't let them hear that pitiful voice! Whining won't win you any points now!
Dialogue: Hey, old man! Don't let them hear that pitiful voice! Whining won't win you any points now!

Original: Relm:Show them what you're made of! Or are you okay with us treating you like an old fuddy duddy!?
Dialogue: Show them what you're made of! Or are you okay with us treating you like an old fuddy duddy!?
trans: 让他们看看你是什么做的！

Original: Strago:Hmph... Alright already! If you insist...
Dialogue: Hmph... Alright already! If you insist...

Original: Strago:There's still life in these bones! Take that, you monster!
Dialogue: There's still life in these bones! Take that, you monster!

Original: Barret:Whoa! He beat it with a single spell!
Dialogue: Whoa! He beat it with a single spell!

Original: Selphie:Incredible! Relm was right! He only looks super-duper-duper ancient!
Dialogue: Incredible! Relm was right! He only looks super-duper-duper ancient!

Original: Strago:Heh. That was nothing. I'm just getting warmed up!
Dialogue: Heh. That was nothing. I'm just getting warmed up!

Original: Strago:You kids have nothing to worry about now! You'll be safe as long as I'm around.
Dialogue: You kids have nothing to worry about now! You'll be safe as long as I'm around.
trans: 孩子们现在不用担心了！

Original: Tifa:...He sure got on board fast.
Dialogue: ...He sure got on board fast.

Original: Cecil:Haha. He's just trying to make his granddaughter proud.
Dialogue: Haha. He's just trying to make his granddaughter proud.

Original: Cecil:And besides, we'll always welcome another reliable ally to our ranks.
Dialogue: And besides, we'll always welcome another reliable ally to our ranks.
trans: 此外，我们永远欢迎另一个可靠的盟友加入我们的行列。

Original: Relm:Yay! Welcome to the team, Grandpa!
Dialogue: Yay! Welcome to the team, Grandpa!

Original: Mog:This area is all clear thanks to everyone's hard work, kupo!
Dialogue: This area is all clear thanks to everyone's hard work, kupo!
trans: 经过大家的努力，这片区域已经全部清空了，kupo！

Original: Strago:Over so soon...
Dialogue: Over so soon...

Original: Zack:Something wrong, Strago? You seem disappointed.
Dialogue: Something wrong, Strago? You seem disappointed.
trans: 有什么不对吗，斯特拉戈？

Original: Strago:I was looking forward to seeing all sorts of monsters since I came to this world.
Dialogue: I was looking forward to seeing all sorts of monsters since I came to this world.
trans: 自从我来到这个世界以来，我就很期待见到各种各样的怪物。

Original: Lenna:Monsters? But why?
Dialogue: Monsters? But why?

Original: Locke:Strago is more than just a mage. He's a monster researcher, too.
Dialogue: Strago is more than just a mage. He's a monster researcher, too.
trans: Strago 不仅仅是一个法师。

Original: Zack:What!? Really!?
Dialogue: What!? Really!?

Original: Lenna:I see. That explains why you're so good at blue magic.
Dialogue: I see. That explains why you're so good at blue magic.

Original: Strago:When I was young, I traveled the world to study monsters.
Dialogue: When I was young, I traveled the world to study monsters.
trans: 年少时为了研究魔物而周游世界。

Original: Strago:I was in my prime! I wish you kids could've seen me then! Ho ho!
Dialogue: I was in my prime! I wish you kids could've seen me then! Ho ho!
trans: 我正处于我的巅峰时期！

Original: Zack:That's amazing! I can't imagine you ever being young!
Dialogue: That's amazing! I can't imagine you ever being young!

Original: Strago:You know, sometimes just a compliment is enough...
Dialogue: You know, sometimes just a compliment is enough...
trans: 你知道吗，有时候一句赞美就够了……

Original: Lenna:I imagine you've seen every monster there is out there by now.
Dialogue: I imagine you've seen every monster there is out there by now.
trans: 我想你现在已经看到了那里的每一个怪物。

Original: Strago:...Not quite.
Dialogue: ...Not quite.

Original: Mog:It must be super rare if you've never seen it, kupo!
Dialogue: It must be super rare if you've never seen it, kupo!
trans: 没见过的一定超级稀有啊，kupo！

Original: Zack:I hope you find it, gramps! I'm rootin' for you!
Dialogue: I hope you find it, gramps! I'm rootin' for you!
trans: 我希望你能找到它，爷爷！

Original: Strago:It was a dream of my youth. But I don't care anymore...
Dialogue: It was a dream of my youth. But I don't care anymore...

Original: Relm:Stop being such a bore, Grandpa!
Dialogue: Stop being such a bore, Grandpa!

Original: Relm:You hate being treated like a dusty old man, don't you? So stop acting like one!
Dialogue: You hate being treated like a dusty old man, don't you? So stop acting like one!
trans: 你讨厌被当作一个尘土飞扬的老人对待，是吗？

Original: Strago:Ouch! I never need to find another monster when I have you, my dear!
Dialogue: Ouch! I never need to find another monster when I have you, my dear!

Original: Locke:I've found all kinds of treasure I've never even dreamed of since coming here.
Dialogue: I've found all kinds of treasure I've never even dreamed of since coming here.
trans: 自从来到这里以来，我发现了各种我做梦也想不到的宝藏。

Original: Locke:So there's a chance you'll run into that monster of yours here, too.
Dialogue: So there's a chance you'll run into that monster of yours here, too.
trans: 所以你也有可能在这里遇到你的那个怪物。

Original: Zack:He's right! You should never give up on your dreams! It's never too late to accomplish anything!
Dialogue: He's right! You should never give up on your dreams! It's never too late to accomplish anything!

Original: Strago:You can make your dreams come true no matter how old you are...
Dialogue: You can make your dreams come true no matter how old you are...
trans: 无论你多大年纪，你都可以实现你的梦想......

Original: Strago:You're right. I feel twenty years younger already! I'll keep on looking, then!
Dialogue: You're right. I feel twenty years younger already! I'll keep on looking, then!

Original: Relm:That's the spirit! Now you're really acting like the grandpa I know!
Dialogue: That's the spirit! Now you're really acting like the grandpa I know!

Original: Strago:Let's go! We have monsters to discover!
Dialogue: Let's go! We have monsters to discover!

Original: Strago:I see I'm not the only one with grandkids around here. We'll teach these young whipper snappers a thing or two between us, Galuf.
Dialogue: I see I'm not the only one with grandkids around here. We'll teach these young whipper snappers a thing or two between us, Galuf.
trans: 我知道我不是这里唯一有孙子孙女的人。

Original: Galuf:That we will. It's a shame it took us so long to meet.
Dialogue: That we will. It's a shame it took us so long to meet.

Original: Galuf:Well then, Krile, go on and introduce yourself.
Dialogue: Well then, Krile, go on and introduce yourself.

Original: Krile:Krile, at your service. Nice to meet you, Strago.
Dialogue: Krile, at your service. Nice to meet you, Strago.

Original: Strago:Ah, such manners. Would that the young ones I know were all so polite.
Dialogue: Ah, such manners. Would that the young ones I know were all so polite.

Original: Palom:Hey, gramps! Heads up!
Dialogue: Hey, gramps! Heads up!

Original: Strago:Huh? Uwaaah!
Dialogue: Huh? Uwaaah!

Original: Strago:Ugh, my head...
Dialogue: Ugh, my head...

Original: Krile:Strago! Are you hurt?
Dialogue: Strago! Are you hurt?

Original: Galuf:That looked painful.
Dialogue: That looked painful.

Original: Strago:I'm tougher than I look.
Dialogue: I'm tougher than I look.

Original: Palom:Sorry about that, gramps!
Dialogue: Sorry about that, gramps!

Original: Yuri:Come on, Palom, we have to apologize properly.
Dialogue: Come on, Palom, we have to apologize properly.
trans: 拜托，帕洛姆，我们必须好好道歉。

Original: Yuri:I'm sorry, Strago. We were playing with Wakka's ball, and things got a little out of control.
Dialogue: I'm sorry, Strago. We were playing with Wakka's ball, and things got a little out of control.

Original: Strago:Well, I just thank the heavens you weren't playing with a weapon.
Dialogue: Well, I just thank the heavens you weren't playing with a weapon.
trans: 好吧，我只是感谢老天你没有用武器玩。

Original: Galuf:I've seen that ball be used to deadly effect...
Dialogue: I've seen that ball be used to deadly effect...
trans: 我见过那个球被用来产生致命的效果......

Original: Porom:Hey, you two!
Dialogue: Hey, you two!

Original: Chelinka:We need to talk! Get over here!
Dialogue: We need to talk! Get over here!

Original: Palom:Oh no! They saw us!
Dialogue: Oh no! They saw us!

Original: Yuri:We're going to catch an earful now...
Dialogue: We're going to catch an earful now...
trans: 我们现在要赶上一大群......

Original: Porom:I'm so sorry, Mr. Strago. It won't happen again.
Dialogue: I'm so sorry, Mr. Strago. It won't happen again.
trans: 我很抱歉，斯特拉戈先生。

Original: Chelinka:Please forgive our brothers. They're always like this.
Dialogue: Please forgive our brothers. They're always like this.

Original: Strago:Not to worry, not to worry. Relm has taught me to expect much worse.
Dialogue: Not to worry, not to worry. Relm has taught me to expect much worse.

Original: Krile:She's lucky to have such a kind grandfather.
Dialogue: She's lucky to have such a kind grandfather.
trans: 她很幸运有这样一位慈祥的爷爷。

Original: Galuf:I suspect he's kind in spite of her, and not thanks to her.
Dialogue: I suspect he's kind in spite of her, and not thanks to her.
trans: 我怀疑他对她很友善，而不是感谢她。

Original: Galuf:I'd take a dozen Paloms over a monster like this, however!
Dialogue: I'd take a dozen Paloms over a monster like this, however!
trans: 然而，我愿意用一打 Paloms 来击败这样的怪物！

Original: Strago:It's our time to shine, Galuf! Protect the children!
Dialogue: It's our time to shine, Galuf! Protect the children!

Original: Krile:Grandfather! Strago!
Dialogue: Grandfather! Strago!

Original: Porom:Leave this one to us! We can handle it!
Dialogue: Leave this one to us! We can handle it!

Original: Strago:That's some impressive magic! Perhaps you should be protecting me!
Dialogue: That's some impressive magic! Perhaps you should be protecting me!
trans: 这是一些令人印象深刻的魔法！

Original: Palom:Over already!? But we just got here!
Dialogue: Over already!? But we just got here!

Original: Yuri:We didn't even have a chance to help.
Dialogue: We didn't even have a chance to help.
trans: 我们甚至没有机会提供帮助。

Original: Krile:You'll have to be quicker next time.
Dialogue: You'll have to be quicker next time.

Original: Palom:Over there! Another monster!
Dialogue: Over there! Another monster!

Original: Yuri:Come on! Last one there's a rotten egg!
Dialogue: Come on! Last one there's a rotten egg!

Original: Chelinka:Krile, Porom! We have to go after them!
Dialogue: Krile, Porom! We have to go after them!

Original: Galuf:They hardly need the likes of us, do they? Such brave souls.
Dialogue: They hardly need the likes of us, do they? Such brave souls.
trans: 他们几乎不需要我们这样的人，是吗？

Original: Strago:And I thought Relm had spunk...
Dialogue: And I thought Relm had spunk...
trans: 而且我认为 Relm 有勇气......

Original: Strago:Well, we shouldn't let all our new grandchildren out of our sight.
Dialogue: Well, we shouldn't let all our new grandchildren out of our sight.
trans: 好吧，我们不应该让我们所有的新孙子离开我们的视线。

Original: Strago:Wait for me!
Dialogue: Wait for me!

Original: Strago:Phew... So...tired. Can't walk another step...
Dialogue: Phew... So...tired. Can't walk another step...

Original: Relm:Grandpa! What're you doing? Pick up the pace!
Dialogue: Grandpa! What're you doing? Pick up the pace!

Original: Freya:We've been walking for some time. Perhaps he needs a rest.
Dialogue: We've been walking for some time. Perhaps he needs a rest.
trans: 我们已经走了一段时间。

Original: Eight:Ah, right, gotta respect our elders and all that. Let's take a break, yeah?
Dialogue: Ah, right, gotta respect our elders and all that. Let's take a break, yeah?
trans: 啊，对，要尊重我们的长辈等等。

Original: Relm:Hey, don't give him special treatment! You're just spoiling him!
Dialogue: Hey, don't give him special treatment! You're just spoiling him!

Original: Relm:I'm going ahead. You guys better not keep me waiting for long!
Dialogue: I'm going ahead. You guys better not keep me waiting for long!

Original: Strago:Hehe... She never lets up, does she?
Dialogue: Hehe... She never lets up, does she?

Original: Snow:Hey old timer, need me to carry you?
Dialogue: Hey old timer, need me to carry you?

Original: Strago:I can walk, I can walk. I'm not that old yet.
Dialogue: I can walk, I can walk. I'm not that old yet.

Original: Snow:Hey, there's no need to act proud in front of us.
Dialogue: Hey, there's no need to act proud in front of us.
trans: 哎，没必要在我们面前装模作样。

Original: Freya:That voice. It's...
Dialogue: That voice. It's...

Original: Strago:Relm! She's in trouble!
Dialogue: Relm! She's in trouble!

Original: Strago:Don't worry, Relm! Grandpa's coming to save you!
Dialogue: Don't worry, Relm! Grandpa's coming to save you!

Original: Snow:H-hey! Strago! He doesn't look very tired now, does he?
Dialogue: H-hey! Strago! He doesn't look very tired now, does he?

Original: Eight:We better follow!
Dialogue: We better follow!

Original: Relm:Get away, you monster!
Dialogue: Get away, you monster!

Original: Strago:I made it just in time. Are you okay, Relm?
Dialogue: I made it just in time. Are you okay, Relm?

Original: Relm:Wh-what're you so out of breath for!?
Dialogue: Wh-what're you so out of breath for!?

Original: Relm:I could've taken that monster down all by myself!
Dialogue: I could've taken that monster down all by myself!
trans: 我一个人就能干掉那个怪物！

Original: Strago:Hahaha, is that so? Then I apologize for interrupting your fun.
Dialogue: Hahaha, is that so? Then I apologize for interrupting your fun.

Original: Strago:And by the way, Relm...
Dialogue: And by the way, Relm...

Original: Relm:What is it? I hate when you get that serious expression on your face.
Dialogue: What is it? I hate when you get that serious expression on your face.

Original: Strago:...Promise me you'll stay safe, Relm. Don't run off like that.
Dialogue: ...Promise me you'll stay safe, Relm. Don't run off like that.
trans: ...向我保证你会保持安全，雷尔姆。

Original: Strago:If anything were to happen to you, I don't know if these old bones could bear it.
Dialogue: If anything were to happen to you, I don't know if these old bones could bear it.
trans: 要是你出了什么事，不知道这些老骨头能不能受得了。

Original: Relm:I... Ah. I understand. Sorry for worrying you, Grandpa.
Dialogue: I... Ah. I understand. Sorry for worrying you, Grandpa.

Original: Strago:You don't need to apologize, Relm. Just keep my request in mind, okay?
Dialogue: You don't need to apologize, Relm. Just keep my request in mind, okay?

Original: Snow:Did you see that? I thought he was just a grumpy old man, but he smoked that monster!
Dialogue: Did you see that? I thought he was just a grumpy old man, but he smoked that monster!

Original: Eight:Yeah. Relm is the source of his power.
Dialogue: Yeah. Relm is the source of his power.

Original: Freya:The love between family members is a sight to behold. There is little that can stand against it.
Dialogue: The love between family members is a sight to behold. There is little that can stand against it.
trans: 家庭成员之间的爱是一种看得见的景象。

Original: Mog:Kupo! Mateeeria! I'm baaack!
Dialogue: Kupo! Mateeeria! I'm baaack!

Original: Materia:Welcome, Mog. It is good to see you, as always.
Dialogue: Welcome, Mog. It is good to see you, as always.

Original: Materia:How fare Ace and the others?
Dialogue: How fare Ace and the others?
trans: 艾斯和其他人的表现如何？

Original: Mog:Better than ever, kupo!
Dialogue: Better than ever, kupo!

Original: Mog:It hasn't always been easy, but they're keeping their heads up high!
Dialogue: It hasn't always been easy, but they're keeping their heads up high!
trans: 这并不总是那么容易，但他们一直昂首挺胸！

Original: Materia:I see. That is heartening to hear...
Dialogue: I see. That is heartening to hear...

Original: Mog:Kupo? What's wrong?
Dialogue: Kupo? What's wrong?

Original: Materia:I'm troubled by the negative will they seem to bear...
Dialogue: I'm troubled by the negative will they seem to bear...
trans: 我对他们似乎承受的消极情绪感到困扰......

Original: Materia:Those of evil intent can sense it, and will stop at nothing to use it to their advantage.
Dialogue: Those of evil intent can sense it, and will stop at nothing to use it to their advantage.
trans: 心怀不轨者能察觉，不惜一切利用之。

Original: Mog:Hmm...now that you mention it, kupo, Machina did tell me about a strange person that he encountered.
Dialogue: Hmm...now that you mention it, kupo, Machina did tell me about a strange person that he encountered.
trans: 嗯……说起来库珀，机械姬娜确实跟我说过他遇到的奇怪的人。

Original: Mog:They all seem in high spirits now, but they're still on their guard, kupo. I'm not sure what else I can do...
Dialogue: They all seem in high spirits now, but they're still on their guard, kupo. I'm not sure what else I can do...
trans: 他们现在看起来都兴致勃勃，但他们仍然保持警惕，库波。

Original: Materia:I see... Well, then it is obvious that they may need a guiding presence to look toa beacon, if you will.
Dialogue: I see... Well, then it is obvious that they may need a guiding presence to look to—a beacon, if you will.
trans: 我明白了……好吧，很明显他们可能需要一个指引的存在来寻找——一个灯塔，如果你愿意的话。

Original: Materia:And I have found just such a warrior. May he see you through these troubled mists.
Dialogue: And I have found just such a warrior. May he see you through these troubled mists.
trans: 我找到了这样一个战士。

Original: Mog:Oh, you're always looking out for us, kupo! We're so lucky to have you on our side!
Dialogue: Oh, you're always looking out for us, kupo! We're so lucky to have you on our side!

Original: Deuce:Alright guys, we're almost done here!
Dialogue: Alright guys, we're almost done here!
trans: 好的伙计们，我们快完成了！

Original: Cater:The sooner we finish up, the sooner we can rest, so let's get going!
Dialogue: The sooner we finish up, the sooner we can rest, so let's get going!
trans: 越早结束，我们就越早可以休息，所以我们继续吧！

Original: Steiner:Ah, it truly is refreshing to be among such enthusiastic faces.
Dialogue: Ah, it truly is refreshing to be among such enthusiastic faces.
trans: 啊，和这些热情的面孔在一起真是令人耳目一新。

Original: Zell:I was worried about youwhen your memories came back, but it looks like I didn't need to!
Dialogue: I was worried about you when your memories came back, but it looks like I didn't need to!
trans: 当你的记忆恢复时，我很担心你，但看起来我不需要担心！

Original: Zell:Even Machina is looking...almost normal. I better not see that frown come back!
Dialogue: Even Machina is looking...almost normal. I better not see that frown come back!
trans: 甚至 Machina 看起来……几乎正常。

Original: Machina:Yeah, sure.
Dialogue: Yeah, sure.

Original: ???:I see you have not forgotten your pride.
Dialogue: I see you have not forgotten your pride.
trans: 我看你还没有忘记你的骄傲。

Original: Steiner:Who is this? One of your classmates? His uniform resembles yours.
Dialogue: Who is this? One of your classmates? His uniform resembles yours.

Original: Cater:I've never seen him before.
Dialogue: I've never seen him before.

Original: Deuce:Do you know us?
Dialogue: Do you know us?

Original: ???:Ah, theCrystal'sblessing at work, I see.
Dialogue: Ah, the Crystal's blessing at work, I see.
trans: 啊，水晶的祝福在起作用，我明白了。

Original: Machina:What!? You wanna fight!?
Dialogue: What!? You wanna fight!?

Original: ???:Of course. I was sent here to usher you to your final resting places.
Dialogue: Of course. I was sent here to usher you to your final resting places.

Original: ???:And now, allow me to fulfill that duty.
Dialogue: And now, allow me to fulfill that duty.
trans: 现在，请允许我履行这个职责。

Original: Zell:Hooold up! That didn't sound very friendly to me!
Dialogue: Hooold up! That didn't sound very friendly to me!

Original: Steiner:Indeed. Zell, let us not leave our allies to their fates. If he means to harm them, then he must fight through us.
Dialogue: Indeed. Zell, let us not leave our allies to their fates. If he means to harm them, then he must fight through us.

Original: Machina:Thanks, guys. All right, everyone, let's put this guy in the dirt!
Dialogue: Thanks, guys. All right, everyone, let's put this guy in the dirt!

Original: ???:...I had thought perhaps this new world had made you soft. I am glad to see you have not neglected your training.
Dialogue: ...I had thought perhaps this new world had made you soft. I am glad to see you have not neglected your training.
trans: ......我曾想也许这个新世界让你变得柔软。

Original: Ace:Don't talk to us like you know us! We don't have any idea who you are!
Dialogue: Don't talk to us like you know us! We don't have any idea who you are!
trans: 不要像你了解我们一样和我们说话！

Original: Kurasame:I am Kurasame Susaya.
Dialogue: I am Kurasame Susaya.

Original: Rem:Wait, are you...?
Dialogue: Wait, are you...?

Original: Kurasame:Your teacher? Yes. Or perhaps "Commander" is more appropriate.
Dialogue: Your teacher? Yes. Or perhaps "Commander" is more appropriate.

Original: Ace:What!? You!?
Dialogue: What!? You!?

Original: Zack:I'm confused. How could you forget your own commander?
Dialogue: I'm confused. How could you forget your own commander?

Original: Auron:It's not unheard of in their world.
Dialogue: It's not unheard of in their world.
trans: 这在他们的世界里并非闻所未闻。

Original: Rem:Yeah, thanks to the Crystal's blessing...
Dialogue: Yeah, thanks to the Crystal's blessing...
trans: 是啊，多亏了水晶的加持……

Original: Rem:That's why we don't remember you. I suppose someone must have taught us what we know, though...
Dialogue: That's why we don't remember you. I suppose someone must have taught us what we know, though...
trans: 这就是我们不记得你的原因。

Original: Kurasame:The graveyard? Hmph.
Dialogue: The graveyard? Hmph.

Original: Auron:When someone returns from the dead, it's usually for a reason.
Dialogue: When someone returns from the dead, it's usually for a reason.
trans: 当有人死而复生时，通常是有原因的。

Original: Mog:Hello everyone! Let me introduce the newest warrior of light, kupo!
Dialogue: Hello everyone! Let me introduce the newest warrior of light, kupo!

Original: Zack:Now here's a familiar face. Care to fill us in?
Dialogue: Now here's a familiar face. Care to fill us in?
trans: 现在，这是一张熟悉的面孔。

Original: Ace:I see. So Materia sent him.
Dialogue: I see. So Materia sent him.

Original: Kurasame:Sorry for the little deception before. I had to make sure of your skills.
Dialogue: Sorry for the little deception before. I had to make sure of your skills.

Original: Zack:You didn't look so sorry when you were fighting.
Dialogue: You didn't look so sorry when you were fighting.
trans: 你打架的时候看起来并不那么抱歉。

Original: Rem:Now it makes sense. You seemed to know all our moves.
Dialogue: Now it makes sense. You seemed to know all our moves.

Original: Rem:Almost like...you taught us them yourself.
Dialogue: Almost like...you taught us them yourself.
trans: 几乎就像……你自己教我们的。

Original: Kurasame:If your memories have not been knocked loose by now, then there is no point in standing here. Let us go.
Dialogue: If your memories have not been knocked loose by now, then there is no point in standing here. Let us go.
trans: 如果你的记忆现在还没有被打散，那么站在这里也没有意义。

Original: Ace:Wait, hold on!
Dialogue: Wait, hold on!

Original: Ace:You've come to help us, and I appreciate that. But we can't just let you join us.
Dialogue: You've come to help us, and I appreciate that. But we can't just let you join us.
trans: 你来帮助我们，我很感激。

Original: Mog:Kupo!? Why not?
Dialogue: Kupo!? Why not?

Original: Ace:In this world, we fight by choice. Our own choice.
Dialogue: In this world, we fight by choice. Our own choice.
trans: 在这个世界上，我们选择战斗。

Original: Ace:I don't want to go back to following orders. That would mean going back on everything that's happened.
Dialogue: I don't want to go back to following orders. That would mean going back on everything that's happened.

Original: Kurasame:Very well. I will not force my company upon you.
Dialogue: Very well. I will not force my company upon you.

Original: Kurasame:But I have no intention on passing down orders.
Dialogue: But I have no intention on passing down orders.

Original: Kurasame:If it helps, simply think of me as a classmate. I may be older, but we will be equal.
Dialogue: If it helps, simply think of me as a classmate. I may be older, but we will be equal.
trans: 如果有帮助，就把我当成同学吧。

Original: Kurasame:In fact, I welcome the change.
Dialogue: In fact, I welcome the change.
trans: 事实上，我欢迎这种变化。

Original: Ace:Uh... Okay...
Dialogue: Uh... Okay...

Original: Rem:I uh...don't really get it either.
Dialogue: I uh...don't really get it either.

Original: Zack:That's 'cause you aren't older yet! You'll get there!
Dialogue: That's 'cause you aren't older yet! You'll get there!
trans: 那是因为你还没有成年！

Original: Auron:Hmph. That they may.
Dialogue: Hmph. That they may.

Original: Cinque:Ooh, that's it!
Dialogue: Ooh, that's it!

Original: Cinque:Cinquey saw his name before! And not just in the spooky-wooky cemetery, either...
Dialogue: Cinquey saw his name before! And not just in the spooky-wooky cemetery, either...

Original: Jecht:"Knowing Tag"? What's that?
Dialogue: "Knowing Tag"? What's that?

Original: Eight:It's a form of identificationit has all our personal information written on it. Everyone in Akademeia is given one from the time they're born.
Dialogue: It's a form of identification—it has all our personal information written on it. Everyone in Akademeia is given one from the time they're born.
trans: 这是一种身份证明——上面写有我们所有的个人信息。

Original: Prompto:So it's like an ID?
Dialogue: So it's like an ID?
trans: 所以它就像一个身份证？

Original: Cinque:Something like that... When someone dies in Orience, everyone forgets they ever existed.
Dialogue: Something like that... When someone dies in Orience, everyone forgets they ever existed.
trans: 诸如此类……当有人在 Orience 死去时，每个人都会忘记他们曾经存在过。

Original: Eight:Right. By collecting the Knowing Tags of the deceased, we can confirm that they once lived.
Dialogue: Right. By collecting the Knowing Tags of the deceased, we can confirm that they once lived.

Original: Eight:It's the only thing that's left behind, the only evidence of their life.
Dialogue: It's the only thing that's left behind, the only evidence of their life.
trans: 这是唯一留下的东西，是他们生活的唯一证据。

Original: Tidus:So, if all of you remember seeing this guy's tag, that means...
Dialogue: So, if all of you remember seeing this guy's tag, that means...
trans: 所以，如果你们都记得看到过这个人的标签，那就意味着……

Original: Kurasame:Hah. That means they collected it. I suppose that I really have died.
Dialogue: Hah. That means they collected it. I suppose that I really have died.

Original: Jecht:Hmph. Usually that's not a laughing matter.
Dialogue: Hmph. Usually that's not a laughing matter.

Original: Eight:Aren't you scared? After this ends, we'll...
Dialogue: Aren't you scared? After this ends, we'll...

Original: Kurasame:Scared? Why would I be? I am overjoyed.
Dialogue: Scared? Why would I be? I am overjoyed.

Original: Kurasame:To be given life anew, and step forth into this land of respite... Heh, or so some like to call it.
Dialogue: To be given life anew, and step forth into this land of respite... Heh, or so some like to call it.
trans: 重获新生，踏入这片休憩之地……嘿，或者有些人喜欢这样称呼它。

Original: Cinque:Doesn't that make you sad? That would make Cinquey cry...
Dialogue: Doesn't that make you sad? That would make Cinquey cry...

Original: Kurasame:Memories of my life may have been washed clean in Orience, but here, in a different world, memories of my deeds will remain.
Dialogue: Memories of my life may have been washed clean in Orience, but here, in a different world, memories of my deeds will remain.
trans: 我一生的记忆在东方可能已经被洗得一干二净，但在这里，在另一个世界，我的事迹的记忆将永远存在。

Original: Kurasame:I will leave behind proof of my existence. That is all I wish for.
Dialogue: I will leave behind proof of my existence. That is all I wish for.
trans: 我会留下我存在的证据。

Original: Prompto:Makes sense. Even if you're gone, we'll still remember you.
Dialogue: Makes sense. Even if you're gone, we'll still remember you.

Original: Prompto:The time we spent together won't be gone. Neither will the things you teach us.
Dialogue: The time we spent together won't be gone. Neither will the things you teach us.
trans: 我们一起度过的时光不会消失。

Original: Tidus:Yeah, just because you can't see something doesn't mean it was never there. Some things live inside us forever.
Dialogue: Yeah, just because you can't see something doesn't mean it was never there. Some things live inside us forever.
trans: 是的，仅仅因为你看不到某物并不意味着它从未存在过。

Original: Eight:Like our fighting styles. The commander taught us everything we know.
Dialogue: Like our fighting styles. The commander taught us everything we know.

Original: Cinque:That's right! Even if we can't remember him, that proves he was here!
Dialogue: That's right! Even if we can't remember him, that proves he was here!

Original: Cinque:And everyone will remember me in that way, too!
Dialogue: And everyone will remember me in that way, too!
trans: 每个人也会以这种方式记住我！

Original: Kurasame:You were all exceptional students, and did not shirk from even the most dangerous missions.
Dialogue: You were all exceptional students, and did not shirk from even the most dangerous missions.
trans: 你们都是优秀的学生，即使是最危险的任务也不逃避。

Original: Kurasame:I expect the same from you in this world as well. Do not disappoint me.
Dialogue: I expect the same from you in this world as well. Do not disappoint me.
trans: 我希望你在这个世界上也一样。

Original: Cinque:We won't! We're no scaredy-cats!
Dialogue: We won't! We're no scaredy-cats!

Original: Tidus:Did you hear that!? A monster, from over there!
Dialogue: Did you hear that!? A monster, from over there!

Original: Eight:All right. Time to hustle!
Dialogue: All right. Time to hustle!

Original: Jecht:Heh, I think it'll be good to have you around, Commander.
Dialogue: Heh, I think it'll be good to have you around, Commander.
trans: 呵呵，我觉得有你在身边就好了，指挥官。

Original: Jecht:This world is just a continuing dream for both of us, eh?
Dialogue: This world is just a continuing dream for both of us, eh?
trans: 这个世界对我们俩来说只是一个持续的梦想，嗯？

Original: Jecht:A gift from the gods. Best not waste it, eh?
Dialogue: A gift from the gods. Best not waste it, eh?

Original: Kurasame:Heh, a dream, indeed...
Dialogue: Heh, a dream, indeed...

Original: Kurasame:A more fantastic one than I've ever seen.
Dialogue: A more fantastic one than I've ever seen.

Original: Kurasame:So, Nine. Can you recite the four major countries of Orience?
Dialogue: So, Nine. Can you recite the four major countries of Orience?

Original: Nine:You making fun of me, yo!? What kind of question is that!? Even a kid knows the answer!
Dialogue: You making fun of me, yo!? What kind of question is that!? Even a kid knows the answer!

Original: Nine:There'sRubrum...andMilites. Oh, andLorica, of course. And then... Uh...
Dialogue: There's Rubrum...and Milites. Oh, and Lorica, of course. And then... Uh...

Original: Kurasame:So, you've been keeping up with your studies? Impressive. There was a time when you wouldn't have been able to answer that question.
Dialogue: So, you've been keeping up with your studies? Impressive. There was a time when you wouldn't have been able to answer that question.
trans: 那么，你一直在跟上你的学业吗？

Original: Nine:Hey, you don't get to make fun of me! I'm not Wait...how'd you know that?
Dialogue: Hey, you don't get to make fun of me! I'm not— Wait...how'd you know that?

Original: Jack:Om nom nom...
Dialogue: Om nom nom...

Original: Kurasame:Jack. What's Akademeia's policy on food in class?
Dialogue: Jack. What's Akademeia's policy on food in class?

Original: Jack:I Ack! Something's...stuck...
Dialogue: I— Ack! Something's...stuck...

Original: Serah:Hah. He knows those two so well.
Dialogue: Hah. He knows those two so well.

Original: Shantotto:A teacher must know his students' propensities, or else his lessons will be met with naught but enmity.
Dialogue: A teacher must know his students' propensities, or else his lessons will be met with naught but enmity.
trans: 老师必须知道他学生的倾向，否则他的课只会招来仇恨。

Original: Quistis:Quite true. Many lessons have been ground to a halt because a teacher couldn't stop their students from acting up.
Dialogue: Quite true. Many lessons have been ground to a halt because a teacher couldn't stop their students from acting up.

Original: Shantotto:So you have known the tribulation, doubtless suffering much frustration!
Dialogue: So you have known the tribulation, doubtless suffering much frustration!
trans: 所以你知道苦难，无疑是受了多大的挫折！

Original: Serah:I can't wait to see my students. I wonder if they're studying while I'm gone. Not all of them are, I'm sure.
Dialogue: I can't wait to see my students. I wonder if they're studying while I'm gone. Not all of them are, I'm sure.
trans: 我等不及要见我的学生了。

Original: Kurasame:Every class has its problem students. It's enough to make you want to quit teaching.
Dialogue: Every class has its problem students. It's enough to make you want to quit teaching.
trans: 每个班级都有问题学生。

Original: Shantotto:If the importance of study you seek to impress, then the depth of your skill you should try to stress.
Dialogue: If the importance of study you seek to impress, then the depth of your skill you should try to stress.
trans: 如果你想强调学习的重要性，那么你应该强调你的技能深度。

Original: Kurasame:An instructor's role is to tell them how to act on the battlefield. Why should I have to prove anything to them?
Dialogue: An instructor's role is to tell them how to act on the battlefield. Why should I have to prove anything to them?
trans: 教官的作用是告诉他们如何在战场上行动。

Original: Serah:Don't you think the difficult students are just a little more interesting than the obedient ones?
Dialogue: Don't you think the difficult students are just a little more interesting than the obedient ones?
trans: 你不觉得难学的学生只是比听话的学生有趣一点吗？

Original: Quistis:Hmm... Sometimes, I suppose.
Dialogue: Hmm... Sometimes, I suppose.

Original: Kurasame:Ah, so you are all teachers as well? I suspected as much.
Dialogue: Ah, so you are all teachers as well? I suspected as much.

Original: Kurasame:My students may need your help again in the future, so I apologize ahead of time for the imposition.
Dialogue: My students may need your help again in the future, so I apologize ahead of time for the imposition.
trans: 我的学生以后可能会再次需要您的帮助，所以我提前道歉。

Original: Shantotto:A willing teacher learns as well, and I'd be happy to help you excel.
Dialogue: A willing teacher learns as well, and I'd be happy to help you excel.
trans: 乐于助人的老师也会学习，我很乐意帮助您取得优异成绩。

Original: Serah:It won't be an imposition at all. Your students are honest, and I can tell they're kind at heart.
Dialogue: It won't be an imposition at all. Your students are honest, and I can tell they're kind at heart.

Original: Quistis:Indeed. They've been taught well.
Dialogue: Indeed. They've been taught well.

Original: Kurasame:Hmph. Sometimes I wonder.
Dialogue: Hmph. Sometimes I wonder.

Original: Nine:Hey, teach! Ask me more questions, yo!
Dialogue: Hey, teach! Ask me more questions, yo!

Original: Shantotto:Your students call for their educationmake this next lesson a revelation.
Dialogue: Your students call for their education—make this next lesson a revelation.
trans: 你的学生呼吁接受教育——让下一课成为一个启示。

Original: Kurasame:I'll do what I can, but kids can be so cruel.
Dialogue: I'll do what I can, but kids can be so cruel.
trans: 我会尽我所能，但孩子们可能会如此残忍。

Original: Quistis:Hmm... He's quite shy when receiving praise, isn't he?
Dialogue: Hmm... He's quite shy when receiving praise, isn't he?
trans: 嗯……被表扬的时候还挺害羞的吧？

Original: Trey:Is something the matter, Commander? You've been staring at Interceptor for some time now.
Dialogue: Is something the matter, Commander? You've been staring at Interceptor for some time now.

Original: Eiko:Ah hah! Kurasame used to live with a dog!
Dialogue: Ah hah! Kurasame used to live with a dog!

Original: Rinoa:A tonberry...
Dialogue: A tonberry...

Original: Rinoa:Wait, what!? A tonberry!?
Dialogue: Wait, what!? A tonberry!?

Original: Eiko:How? Why? Wheeere! That's weeeird!
Dialogue: How? Why? Wheeere! That's weeeird!

Original: Kurasame:When I was a child, I nursed a wounded tonberry back to health. Ever since then it followed me everywhere I went.
Dialogue: When I was a child, I nursed a wounded tonberry back to health. Ever since then it followed me everywhere I went.
trans: 小时候，我把一只受伤的通莓调理好了。

Original: Rinoa:Then you got attached to it, and couldn't bear the thought of returning it to where it came from.
Dialogue: Then you got attached to it, and couldn't bear the thought of returning it to where it came from.
trans: 然后你执着它，不忍心把它放回原来的地方。

Original: Kurasame:Well, not exactly...
Dialogue: Well, not exactly...

Original: Trey:I never thought the infamous Ice Reaper would be so compassionate. You truly can't judge a book by its cover.
Dialogue: I never thought the infamous Ice Reaper would be so compassionate. You truly can't judge a book by its cover.
trans: 没想到臭名昭著的寒冰死神竟然如此慈悲。

Original: Kurasame:The Ice Reaper? I have not heard that name in a long time.
Dialogue: The Ice Reaper? I have not heard that name in a long time.

Original: Rinoa:What's that? Who's the Ice Reaper?
Dialogue: What's that? Who's the Ice Reaper?

Original: Trey:One of theFour Champions of Rubrum, a group of the strongestAgito cadets. Our Commander was the Ice Reaper.
Dialogue: One of the Four Champions of Rubrum, a group of the strongest Agito cadets. Our Commander was the Ice Reaper.
trans: Rubrum 的四位冠军之一，一群最强的 Agito 学员。

Original: Trey:His skill with ice magic was fearsome to behold and would chill the hearts of his foes on the battlefield.
Dialogue: His skill with ice magic was fearsome to behold and would chill the hearts of his foes on the battlefield.
trans: 他的冰魔法技能令人生畏，在战场上会让敌人心寒。

Original: Trey:At least, according to the books I read.
Dialogue: At least, according to the books I read.

Original: Eiko:Hmm. I didn't know he was such a scary guy. He seems nice enough to mea little quiet, though.
Dialogue: Hmm. I didn't know he was such a scary guy. He seems nice enough to me—a little quiet, though.

Original: Trey:Him and Shadow have more in common than their taciturn demeanorthey're naturally attracted to animals.
Dialogue: Him and Shadow have more in common than their taciturn demeanor—they're naturally attracted to animals.
trans: 除了他们沉默寡言的举止外，他和影子还有更多共同点——他们天生就被动物所吸引。

Original: Eiko:I don't know if I agree with calling a tonberry an "animal"...
Dialogue: I don't know if I agree with calling a tonberry an "animal"...
trans: 我不知道我是否同意将 tonberry 称为“动物”...

Original: Trey:I see! It must be their loneliness that attracts animals.
Dialogue: I see! It must be their loneliness that attracts animals.

Original: Rinoa:Yeah, they need someone by their sides!
Dialogue: Yeah, they need someone by their sides!
trans: 是的，他们需要有人在身边！

Original: Eiko:Makes sense to me! I get it!
Dialogue: Makes sense to me! I get it!

Original: Shadow:We can hear you.
Dialogue: We can hear you.

Original: Kurasame:If you insist on blathering on about matters you do not understand, please do so over there.
Dialogue: If you insist on blathering on about matters you do not understand, please do so over there.
trans: 如果你不明白的事情你非要喋喋不休，请在那边说。

Original: Trey:Ah! Sorry, Commander!
Dialogue: Ah! Sorry, Commander!

Original: ???:Looks like that "goddess" might not've been full of it after all...
Dialogue: Looks like that "goddess" might not've been full of it after all...
trans: 看来那个“女神”终究是没吃饱啊……

Original: ???:Damn you, Ardyn.
Dialogue: Damn you, Ardyn.

Original: ???:Showing up like that and sending us off to gods know where.
Dialogue: Showing up like that and sending us off to gods know where.
trans: 就这样出现，然后把我们送到天晓得去哪里。

Original: ???:Either way, I better find the others... Huh?
Dialogue: Either way, I better find the others... Huh?
trans: 无论哪种方式，我最好找到其他人......嗯？

Original: ???:Brand new world, same old pains in the butt.
Dialogue: Brand new world, same old pains in the butt.
trans: 全新的世界，同样的旧痛。

Original: ???:Whew, still got it.
Dialogue: Whew, still got it.

Original: Seifer:You're pretty good.
Dialogue: You're pretty good.

Original: ???:Happy to entertain. Would've been happier if you helped, though.
Dialogue: Happy to entertain. Would've been happier if you helped, though.

Original: Seifer:And why would I do that?
Dialogue: And why would I do that?

Original: Seifer:Goddess, huh? Well, now we know which side you're on.
Dialogue: Goddess, huh? Well, now we know which side you're on.

Original: ???:Side? What're you
Dialogue: Side? What're you—

Original: Seifer:Sorry, question time is over.
Dialogue: Sorry, question time is over.

Original: Raijin:Seifer came here to help you out, ya know. But, eh...
Dialogue: Seifer came here to help you out, ya know. But, eh...
trans: 你知道，Seifer 来这里是为了帮助你。

Original: Seifer:What?
Dialogue: What?

Original: Raijin:Looks like we were too late, ya know. You made quick work of that monster.
Dialogue: Looks like we were too late, ya know. You made quick work of that monster.
trans: 看来我们来不及了，你知道的。

Original: Seifer:Yeah, yeah.
Dialogue: Yeah, yeah.

Original: ???:Well, if you meant me harm I think I would've known by now. Anyways, I'm
Dialogue: Well, if you meant me harm I think I would've known by now. Anyways, I'm—
trans: 好吧，如果你是想伤害我，我想我现在早就知道了。

Original: Seifer:Who cares. Let's go.
Dialogue: Who cares. Let's go.

Original: Edgar:Don't take it personally. That's just how they treat all of Materia's warriors.
Dialogue: Don't take it personally. That's just how they treat all of Materia's warriors.

Original: Edgar:Not all of them are so bereft of manners, but regardless of what he said, we're all on the same side here.
Dialogue: Not all of them are so bereft of manners, but regardless of what he said, we're all on the same side here.
trans: 不是所有人都这么没礼貌，但不管他说什么，我们都是站在同一边的。

Original: Locke:A fact that some of us have a hard time accepting.
Dialogue: A fact that some of us have a hard time accepting.
trans: 我们中的一些人很难接受的事实。

Original: Edgar:Anyways, judging by your looks, I'd guess you're a confidant of Prince Noctis.
Dialogue: Anyways, judging by your looks, I'd guess you're a confidant of Prince Noctis.
trans: 不管怎样，看你的长相，我猜你是诺克提斯王子的亲信。

Original: Gladiolus:So he's with you!? That's good newsI'm Gladiolus Amicitia.
Dialogue: So he's with you!? That's good news—I'm Gladiolus Amicitia.

Original: Gladiolus:Noctis's protectorhis shield.
Dialogue: Noctis's protector—his shield.
trans: Noctis 的保护者——他的盾牌。

Original: Locke:Ah, so you're Gladio? We've heard a lot about you.
Dialogue: Ah, so you're Gladio? We've heard a lot about you.

Original: Gladio:Well then, I'm following you guys. If that's all right, of course.
Dialogue: Well then, I'm following you guys. If that's all right, of course.

Original: Edgar:We'll gladly have you. We have a lot to fill you in on along the way.
Dialogue: We'll gladly have you. We have a lot to fill you in on along the way.

Original: Gladio:Is that so? Guess I'm late to the party, then. Sorry about that, guys.
Dialogue: Is that so? Guess I'm late to the party, then. Sorry about that, guys.

Original: Gladio:Hope Noct and Prompto aren't drivin' ya crazy, Ignis.
Dialogue: Hope Noct and Prompto aren't drivin' ya crazy, Ignis.
trans: 希望 Noct 和 Prompto 不会把你逼疯，Ignis。

Original: Gladio:Good thing I'm here to shoulder some of the burden.
Dialogue: Good thing I'm here to shoulder some of the burden.
trans: 幸好我来这里是为了分担一些负担。

Original: Noct:Well, well, look who finally decided to show.
Dialogue: Well, well, look who finally decided to show.
trans: 好吧，好吧，看看谁最终决定展示。

Original: Prompto:Gladio! The gang's all here, finally!
Dialogue: Gladio! The gang's all here, finally!

Original: Gladio:I see you haven't lost your spunk.
Dialogue: I see you haven't lost your spunk.
trans: 我看你还没有失去勇气。

Original: Noct:Don't think he ever will. Man, I never thought I'd see the day we were back together againin another world, no less!
Dialogue: Don't think he ever will. Man, I never thought I'd see the day we were back together again—in another world, no less!

Original: Prompto:We've been through a lotgood times and bad.
Dialogue: We've been through a lot—good times and bad.
trans: 我们经历了很多——好时光和坏时光。

Original: Prompto:And our entourage has grown beyond just us four.
Dialogue: And our entourage has grown beyond just us four.
trans: 我们的随行人员已经超过了我们四个人。

Original: Noct:Yeah, well...
Dialogue: Yeah, well...

Original: Noct:That hasn't always been for the better. We've seen our share of trouble.
Dialogue: That hasn't always been for the better. We've seen our share of trouble.

Original: Ignis:Trouble which I'm sure you had no part in causing.
Dialogue: Trouble which I'm sure you had no part in causing.
trans: 我敢肯定你没有参与造成的麻烦。

Original: Prompto:Noct, a troublemaker? No way!
Dialogue: Noct, a troublemaker? No way!

Original: Noct:Can it!
Dialogue: Can it!

Original: Gladio:Hah! Just like old times. I'm glad that hasn't changed.
Dialogue: Hah! Just like old times. I'm glad that hasn't changed.

Original: Noct:Yeah, me too.
Dialogue: Yeah, me too.

Original: Gladio:Sorry to have kept you waiting.
Dialogue: Sorry to have kept you waiting.

Original: Noct:No worries. It's not like you had a choice.
Dialogue: No worries. It's not like you had a choice.

Original: Prompto:So what're we gonna do to celebrate?
Dialogue: So what're we gonna do to celebrate?
trans: 那么我们要做什么来庆祝呢？

Original: Ignis:Don't be so hasty. As happy as this reunion is, we should introduce Gladio to our new allies first and foremost.
Dialogue: Don't be so hasty. As happy as this reunion is, we should introduce Gladio to our new allies first and foremost.

Original: Noct:Ignis is right. And since he volunteered, he can do the honors.
Dialogue: Ignis is right. And since he volunteered, he can do the honors.

Original: Prompto:Ah, delegating responsibility, the princely thing to do!
Dialogue: Ah, delegating responsibility, the princely thing to do!

Original: Noct:Shut up.
Dialogue: Shut up.

Original: Gladio:Alright, then, shall we?
Dialogue: Alright, then, shall we?

Original: Ignis:Gladio, do you...?
Dialogue: Gladio, do you...?

Original: Gladio:Have my memories? Yeah, and so do you, from what Materia told me.
Dialogue: Have my memories? Yeah, and so do you, from what Materia told me.

Original: Ignis:I see. And you look like us, too.
Dialogue: I see. And you look like us, too.

Original: Gladio:Yup. Could you imagine if I was the only one of us who was older?
Dialogue: Yup. Could you imagine if I was the only one of us who was older?

Original: Gladio:Anyways, Ignis... You know it's only a matter of time before Noct remembers too, right?
Dialogue: Anyways, Ignis... You know it's only a matter of time before Noct remembers too, right?
trans: 无论如何，Ignis……你知道 Noct 也记得只是时间问题，对吧？

Original: Gladio:But I'm sure you don't need me to tell you that. I'm just saying we'd better be ready when he does.
Dialogue: But I'm sure you don't need me to tell you that. I'm just saying we'd better be ready when he does.
trans: 但我相信你不需要我告诉你。

Original: Gladio:And we'd better be ready to protect him.
Dialogue: And we'd better be ready to protect him.
trans: 我们最好做好保护他的准备。

Original: Gladio:Because that's what we do, right?
Dialogue: Because that's what we do, right?
trans: 因为这就是我们所做的，对吧？

Original: Ignis:Indeed. "At all costs."
Dialogue: Indeed. "At all costs."

Original: Ignis:I meant those words when I said them, and I mean them now.
Dialogue: I meant those words when I said them, and I mean them now.
trans: 我说这些话的时候是认真的，现在我也是认真的。

Original: Gladio:When you forget about all the monsters, this place definitely has its charms.
Dialogue: When you forget about all the monsters, this place definitely has its charms.
trans: 当你忘记所有的怪物时，这个地方绝对有它的魅力。

Original: Gladio:Really. Nothing beats eatin' with the boys. Right, Ignis?
Dialogue: Really. Nothing beats eatin' with the boys. Right, Ignis?

Original: Ignis:Noct might not see it, but I agree. There's something special about sharing a meal outdoors.
Dialogue: Noct might not see it, but I agree. There's something special about sharing a meal outdoors.
trans: Noct 可能看不到，但我同意。

Original: Prompto:Special? Well, we've been eating outside plenty since we've gotten here, and I haven't felt anything special.
Dialogue: Special? Well, we've been eating outside plenty since we've gotten here, and I haven't felt anything special.

Original: Gladio:That's cause we don't have our camping equipment. If we did, then you'd see.
Dialogue: That's cause we don't have our camping equipment. If we did, then you'd see.
trans: 那是因为我们没有露营装备。

Original: Palom:How much camping equipment did you need in your world?
Dialogue: How much camping equipment did you need in your world?
trans: 在你的世界里，你需要多少露营装备？

Original: Gladio:Well, we had chairs, tables, tents, tools for cooking... And that's just for starters.
Dialogue: Well, we had chairs, tables, tents, tools for cooking... And that's just for starters.
trans: 好吧，我们有椅子、桌子、帐篷、做饭的工具……这只是开始。

Original: Palom:But who needs all that stuff?
Dialogue: But who needs all that stuff?
trans: 但是谁需要所有这些东西呢？

Original: Gladio:All that stuff is what makes it special. Sets it apart from the day to dayturns it into an adventure.
Dialogue: All that stuff is what makes it special. Sets it apart from the day to day—turns it into an adventure.
trans: 所有这些都是让它与众不同的原因。

Original: Gladio:You go out and search for ingredients, then you cook those up with your gear.
Dialogue: You go out and search for ingredients, then you cook those up with your gear.
trans: 你出去寻找食材，然后用你的装备把它们煮熟。

Original: Tidus:So you guys have tools that are made just for camping?
Dialogue: So you guys have tools that are made just for camping?
trans: 所以你们有专为露营而制作的工具吗？

Original: Gladio:Yup, and I try to never leave home without 'em. Most are small enough to be folded up, but they do their jobs better than anything else.
Dialogue: Yup, and I try to never leave home without 'em. Most are small enough to be folded up, but they do their jobs better than anything else.
trans: 是的，我尽量不带他们离开家。

Original: Tidus:No way! I'd like to see some of those!
Dialogue: No way! I'd like to see some of those!

Original: Gladio:Now you're gettin' into it. Settin' everything up is the most exciting part.
Dialogue: Now you're gettin' into it. Settin' everything up is the most exciting part.

Original: Gladio:Doin' regular things in special waysthat's the spirit of camping. At least from my perspective.
Dialogue: Doin' regular things in special ways—that's the spirit of camping. At least from my perspective.
trans: 以特殊的方式做常规的事情——这就是露营的精神。

Original: Prompto:Gladio's always been the outdoorsy type.
Dialogue: Gladio's always been the outdoorsy type.
trans: Gladio 一直是户外活动类型。

Original: Selphie:Oh, I know what you mean! It's like the excitement I feel when trying on new clothes or a new piece of equipment!
Dialogue: Oh, I know what you mean! It's like the excitement I feel when trying on new clothes or a new piece of equipment!

Original: Palom:So it's excitement you want? Leave that to me!
Dialogue: So it's excitement you want? Leave that to me!
trans: 所以这是你想要的兴奋？

Original: Tidus:Excitement? Not sure I'd call your "tricks" exciting.
Dialogue: Excitement? Not sure I'd call your "tricks" exciting.

Original: Gladio:You never know. Sometimes a trick can spice things up a little.
Dialogue: You never know. Sometimes a trick can spice things up a little.

Original: Palom:Hehe, they sure can!
Dialogue: Hehe, they sure can!

Original: Gladio:But let me give you some advice: if you wanna spice things up with the ladies, then tricks won't cut it.
Dialogue: But let me give you some advice if you wanna spice things up with the ladies, then tricks won't cut it.
trans: 但是如果你想给女士们增添情趣，让我给你一些建议，那么技巧是行不通的。

Original: Gladio:Bring 'em flowers when they least expect it. Show up suddenly with a present they've been wanting. That's how you should catch them off guard.
Dialogue: Bring 'em flowers when they least expect it. Show up suddenly with a present they've been wanting. That's how you should catch them off guard.
trans: 在他们最意想不到的时候给他们送花。

Original: Selphie:Oooh! I like the sound of that!
Dialogue: Oooh! I like the sound of that!

Original: Gladio:Don't overdo it, though.
Dialogue: Don't overdo it, though.

Original: Palom:That doesn't seem very fun... I don't get it.
Dialogue: That doesn't seem very fun... I don't get it.
trans: 这似乎不是很有趣……我不明白。

Original: Tidus:Oh man, I better write this down!
Dialogue: Oh man, I better write this down!
trans: 哦，伙计，我最好把它写下来！

Original: Yuna:Ah, we're back at last.
Dialogue: Ah, we're back at last.

Original: Balthier:That was a harder fight than expected. The sun will soon be upon us.
Dialogue: That was a harder fight than expected. The sun will soon be upon us.
trans: 那是一场比预期更艰苦的战斗。

Original: Gladio:Hyah! Yeah!
Dialogue: Hyah! Yeah!

Original: Gladio:Oh, you guys are back. Good job finishing up the night patrol.
Dialogue: Oh, you guys are back. Good job finishing up the night patrol.

Original: Firion:Do you always train this early?
Dialogue: Do you always train this early?

Original: Gladio:Of course. What else would the King's shield do?
Dialogue: Of course. What else would the King's shield do?

Original: Squall:(Right, this guy's a bodyguard. Still...)
Dialogue: (Right, this guy's a bodyguard. Still...)

Original: Gladio:Can't argue with that. I bet it's pretty strange in this line of work.
Dialogue: Can't argue with that. I bet it's pretty strange in this line of work.

Original: Gladio:But I'm just the youngest in along lineof royal guards.My dadandNoctis's dadwere childhood friends.
Dialogue: But I'm just the youngest in a long line of royal guards. My dad and Noctis's dad were childhood friends.
trans: 但我只是一长串皇家卫队中最年轻的一个。

Original: Gladio:Noctis and I grew up as close as brothers.
Dialogue: Noctis and I grew up as close as brothers.
trans: Noctis 和我从小就亲如兄弟。

Original: Yuna:I see. So you were put upon the same path as your father.
Dialogue: I see. So you were put upon the same path as your father.

Original: Kain:You take your responsibilities more seriously than you appear to.
Dialogue: You take your responsibilities more seriously than you appear to.
trans: 你比看起来更认真地对待你的责任。

Original: Kain:Do you wish to become as your father did?
Dialogue: Do you wish to become as your father did?
trans: 你想成为你父亲那样的人吗？

Original: Gladio:Not really. I'll do things my own way.
Dialogue: Not really. I'll do things my own way.

Original: Balthier:As you should. A child should always be encouraged to walk a path of his own making.
Dialogue: As you should. A child should always be encouraged to walk a path of his own making.

Original: Balthier:A father's footsteps are not always suited to his offspring.
Dialogue: A father's footsteps are not always suited to his offspring.
trans: 父亲的足迹并不总是适合他的后代。

Original: Gladio:Haha, good point! I could never be part of the council like him.
Dialogue: Haha, good point! I could never be part of the council like him.

Original: Squall:Maybe not, but I'm sure Ignis could.
Dialogue: Maybe not, but I'm sure Ignis could.
trans: 也许不是，但我相信 Ignis 可以。

Original: Gladio:You're right on that count.
Dialogue: You're right on that count.

Original: Gladio:My father died without fulfilling his duty. In that respect, too, I don't want to be like him.
Dialogue: My father died without fulfilling his duty. In that respect, too, I don't want to be like him.
trans: 我父亲没有尽到他的职责就死了。

Original: Gladio:If I'm gonna protect Noct until he becomes king, I need to be stronger than anyone else out there.
Dialogue: If I'm gonna protect Noct until he becomes king, I need to be stronger than anyone else out there.
trans: 如果我要保护诺克特直到他成为国王，我需要比任何人都强大。

Original: Firion:That's why you train earlier and harder than anyone else.
Dialogue: That's why you train earlier and harder than anyone else.
trans: 这就是为什么你比任何人都更早、更努力地训练。

Original: Gladio:You got it.
Dialogue: You got it.

Original: Firion:Then let me help you.
Dialogue: Then let me help you.

Original: Firion:I'll spar with you any day.
Dialogue: I'll spar with you any day.
trans: 总有一天我会和你切磋。

Original: Gladio:Alright, you're on!
Dialogue: Alright, you're on!

Original: Galuf:Hmm. We must tread carefully here.
Dialogue: Hmm. We must tread carefully here.

Original: Selphie:At least there aren't any monsters around. Let's check over there!
Dialogue: At least there aren't any monsters around. Let's check over there!

Original: Gladio:Selphie, slow down. What if there's a trap ahead?
Dialogue: Selphie, slow down. What if there's a trap ahead?

Original: Selphie:It'll be fine!
Dialogue: It'll be fine!

Original: Gladio:Saying it doesn't make it so.
Dialogue: Saying it doesn't make it so.

Original: Selphie:Doesn't it? You worry too much, Gladio.
Dialogue: Doesn't it? You worry too much, Gladio.

Original: Gladio:That's not the point. You're being reckless.
Dialogue: That's not the point. You're being reckless.

Original: Selphie:Reckless? What're you, my big brother?
Dialogue: Reckless? What're you, my big brother?

Original: Lulu:You bicker like siblings, anyways.
Dialogue: You bicker like siblings, anyways.
trans: 无论如何，你们像兄弟姐妹一样争吵。

Original: Edge:I get it. You can't help but worry. It's a trait you've acquired.
Dialogue: I get it. You can't help but worry. It's a trait you've acquired.

Original: Selphie:But I'm not your little sister, Gladio. You don't need to worry so much.
Dialogue: But I'm not your little sister, Gladio. You don't need to worry so much.

Original: Lightning:Don't be too hard on him. He can't help it.
Dialogue: Don't be too hard on him. He can't help it.

Original: Edge:You would know, Lightning. You worry a lot, too.
Dialogue: You would know, Lightning. You worry a lot, too.

Original: Lightning:Yeah, but it's different. I just don't want to see you guys get hurt or feel sad.
Dialogue: Yeah, but it's different. I just don't want to see you guys get hurt or feel sad.

Original: Lulu:Oh, the burdens of old age.
Dialogue: Oh, the burdens of old age.

Original: Galuf:I can't help but feel responsible for you younglings.
Dialogue: I can't help but feel responsible for you younglings.
trans: 我情不自禁地对你们这些年轻人负有责任。

Original: Gladio:Anyways, sorry about lumping you in with Noct and my sister.
Dialogue: Anyways, sorry about lumping you in with Noct and my sister.
trans: 无论如何，很抱歉把你和 Noct 以及我妹妹混为一谈。

Original: Selphie:No problem, all is forgiven.
Dialogue: No problem, all is forgiven.
trans: 没问题，一切都被原谅了。

Original: Galuf:You might use this chance to put yourself in each other's shoes.
Dialogue: You might use this chance to put yourself in each other's shoes.
trans: 您可能会利用这个机会设身处地为对方着想。

Original: Galuf:You obviously care about her, or else you wouldn't worry. If Selphie gets that, maybe she'll be more careful.
Dialogue: You obviously care about her, or else you wouldn't worry. If Selphie gets that, maybe she'll be more careful.
trans: 你明明很关心她，不然你也不会担心。

Original: Galuf:But you also have to trust her to be able to hold her own.
Dialogue: But you also have to trust her to be able to hold her own.
trans: 但你也必须相信她能够坚持自己的立场。

Original: Galuf:No matter how fragile she looks, you do not know the struggles she's faced to get here. She is stronger than you know.
Dialogue: No matter how fragile she looks, you do not know the struggles she's faced to get here. She is stronger than you know.
trans: 不管她看起来多么脆弱，你都不知道她为了来到这里所面临的挣扎。

Original: Lightning:Right. Just like Serah.
Dialogue: Right. Just like Serah.

Original: Lulu:It doesn't matter how close you are, you can't read your sibling's mind.
Dialogue: It doesn't matter how close you are, you can't read your sibling's mind.
trans: 不管你们有多亲密，你都无法读懂你兄弟姐妹的心思。

Original: Lulu:But you can speak with each other. It would be a shame if you went your separate ways due to a mere misunderstanding.
Dialogue: But you can speak with each other. It would be a shame if you went your separate ways due to a mere misunderstanding.
trans: 但是你们可以互相交谈。

Original: Gladio:I just don't want to see my friends in danger. Seeing Selphie in front makes me nervous.
Dialogue: I just don't want to see my friends in danger. Seeing Selphie in front makes me nervous.
trans: 我只是不想看到我的朋友处于危险之中。

Original: Selphie:There's a simple solution to that! You go in front, Gladio!
Dialogue: There's a simple solution to that! You go in front, Gladio!
trans: 有一个简单的解决方案！

Original: Selphie:But if we see any cool vehicles then I get to go first.
Dialogue: But if we see any cool vehicles then I get to go first.
trans: 但如果我们看到任何很酷的车辆，那么我就会先走。

Original: Gladio:Hmph. I really should stop trying.
Dialogue: Hmph. I really should stop trying.

Original: ???:She said it was "another world." But I still don't believe it.
Dialogue: She said it was "another world." But I still don't believe it.

Original: ???:That goddess was fishy, too... Even if I did believe her, this is nothing more than a fantasy.
Dialogue: That goddess was fishy, too... Even if I did believe her, this is nothing more than a fantasy.
trans: 那个女神也有猫腻……就算我信了，也不过是天方夜谭。

Original: ???:I don't even wanna think about it.
Dialogue: I don't even wanna think about it.

Original: ???:We need to find a way back.
Dialogue: We need to find a way back.
trans: 我们需要找到回去的路。

Original: ???:And by any means necessary. But first, we need to find out where we've been taken to.
Dialogue: And by any means necessary. But first, we need to find out where we've been taken to.
trans: 并通过任何必要的方式。

Original: ???:What's that?
Dialogue: What's that?

Original: ???:Let's split up.
Dialogue: Let's split up.

Original: ???:I'll leave that one to you, then.
Dialogue: I'll leave that one to you, then.
trans: 那我就把那个留给你吧。

Original: ???:Now where could this lead... I hope it's a way outta here.
Dialogue: Now where could this lead... I hope it's a way outta here.
trans: 现在这会通向哪里……我希望这是一条离开这里的路。

Original: ???:Just as I thought. I have no idea where this is, but at least I got out of that weird place.
Dialogue: Just as I thought. I have no idea where this is, but at least I got out of that weird place.

Original: ???:Huh? A fight?
Dialogue: Huh? A fight?

Original: Lion:Careful! It's wounded and desperate!
Dialogue: Careful! It's wounded and desperate!

Original: Onion Knight:Let's keep a safe distance! There's no telling what it'll do!
Dialogue: Let's keep a safe distance! There's no telling what it'll do!

Original: ???:Are those the warriors summoned by the goddess?
Dialogue: Are those the warriors summoned by the goddess?
trans: 难道是女神召唤来的战士吗？

Original: Lion:Oh no! There's someone over there!
Dialogue: Oh no! There's someone over there!

Original: Cecil:Run! It's dangerous!
Dialogue: Run! It's dangerous!

Original: ???:What a drag. This wasn't in the job description.
Dialogue: What a drag. This wasn't in the job description.

Original: Onion Knight:That speed... He's no ordinary guy.
Dialogue: That speed... He's no ordinary guy.

Original: Lion:Who are you...?
Dialogue: Who are you...?

Original: ???:Just passing through. In any case...
Dialogue: Just passing through. In any case...

Original: ???:I'm the least of your worries right now.
Dialogue: I'm the least of your worries right now.
trans: 我现在是你最不担心的。

Original: Cecil:...It appears you're right. We haven't the leisure of talking now.
Dialogue: ...It appears you're right. We haven't the leisure of talking now.

Original: Onion Knight:Just wait right there! We have something we want to ask you!
Dialogue: Just wait right there! We have something we want to ask you!

Original: ???:Sure thing.
Dialogue: Sure thing.

Original: Onion Knight:Don't go anywhere!
Dialogue: Don't go anywhere!

Original: ???:Sorry, but...this is above my pay grade.
Dialogue: Sorry, but...this is above my pay grade.
trans: 抱歉，但是...这超出了我的薪资等级。

Original: Cater:Hey, you! Wait right there!
Dialogue: Hey, you! Wait right there!

Original: Reno:Already finished with that monster, huh... That was fast.
Dialogue: Already finished with that monster, huh... That was fast.
trans: 已经和那个怪物搞定了啊……真快。

Original: Vanille:We asked you to wait. Why did you leave?
Dialogue: We asked you to wait. Why did you leave?

Original: Wakka:This area is dangerous. You could get ambushed walking around all alone.
Dialogue: This area is dangerous. You could get ambushed walking around all alone.

Original: Reno:I don't work with others unless it's a joint op.
Dialogue: I don't work with others unless it's a joint op.
trans: 除非是联合行动，否则我不会与他人合作。

Original: Cater:Work? A joint op? What are you talking about?
Dialogue: Work? A joint op? What are you talking about?

Original: Reno:It's top secret until I know I can trust you guys.
Dialogue: It's top secret until I know I can trust you guys.
trans: 在我知道我可以信任你们之前，这是最高机密。

Original: Wakka:That doesn't answer our question...does it?
Dialogue: That doesn't answer our question...does it?
trans: 那没有回答我们的问题……是吗？

Original: Vanille:We understand if you can't trust us yet.
Dialogue: We understand if you can't trust us yet.
trans: 如果您还不能信任我们，我们也能理解。

Original: Vanille:But some of your friends might be with us. Why don't you come along?
Dialogue: But some of your friends might be with us. Why don't you come along?
trans: 但是你的一些朋友可能和我们在一起。

Original: Reno:I'll pass. I know my partner is here already. And I can handle myself no matter what happens.
Dialogue: I'll pass. I know my partner is here already. And I can handle myself no matter what happens.

Original: Wakka:Would it kill you to be a little more friendly...?
Dialogue: Would it kill you to be a little more friendly...?
trans: 友好一点会要了你的命吗……？

Original: Cloud:What's going on here?
Dialogue: What's going on here?

Original: Cloud:Reno!
Dialogue: Reno!

Original: Vanille:Is he your friend, Cloud? He wouldn't answer any of our questions.
Dialogue: Is he your friend, Cloud? He wouldn't answer any of our questions.
trans: 他是你的朋友吗，克劳德？

Original: Wakka:Enemy!? You mean he...!
Dialogue: Enemy!? You mean he...!

Original: Cloud:It depends on his mission.
Dialogue: It depends on his mission.

Original: Reno:You can rest easy. I don't have any business with you...for now.
Dialogue: You can rest easy. I don't have any business with you...for now.

Original: Reno:(So he's one of the goddess's warriors. The chance of getting dragged into trouble with him around is too high.)
Dialogue: (So he's one of the goddess's warriors. The chance of getting dragged into trouble with him around is too high.)
trans: （原来是女神的战士之一，有他在身边被卷入麻烦的机率太高了。）

Original: Reno:(I need to regroup with Rude...)
Dialogue: (I need to regroup with Rude...)

Original: Reno:It's nice to see a familiar face, but I still have my doubts.
Dialogue: It's nice to see a familiar face, but I still have my doubts.
trans: 很高兴看到一张熟悉的面孔，但我仍然有疑虑。

Original: Reno:And I'd rather not get into a fight in some other world. See you around.
Dialogue: And I'd rather not get into a fight in some other world. See you around.
trans: 而且我宁愿不在其他世界打架。

Original: Cater:Hold up!
Dialogue: Hold up!

Original: Cater:He's so suspicious. Maybe we should keep an eye on him if he's an enemy agent.
Dialogue: He's so suspicious. Maybe we should keep an eye on him if he's an enemy agent.

Original: Wakka:He mentioned a partner, so I guess it means he's not alone.
Dialogue: He mentioned a partner, so I guess it means he's not alone.
trans: 他提到了一个伙伴，所以我想这意味着他并不孤单。

Original: Cloud:...Right. And I can't imagine those two acting blindly.
Dialogue: ...Right. And I can't imagine those two acting blindly.

Original: Cloud:Sorry, Reno, but you're coming with us. It's for your own good.
Dialogue: Sorry, Reno, but you're coming with us. It's for your own good.
trans: 抱歉，里诺，但你要和我们一起去。

Original: Reno:That's fine with me.
Dialogue: That's fine with me.

Original: Vanille:What should we do, then?
Dialogue: What should we do, then?

Original: Cloud:Those agents are a violent lot. But since he was summoned by Materia, he could help us fight.
Dialogue: Those agents are a violent lot. But since he was summoned by Materia, he could help us fight.

Original: Reno:(Well, this'll make a fine stepping stone. Don't mind if I poke around.)
Dialogue: (Well, this'll make a fine stepping stone. Don't mind if I poke around.)
trans: （好吧，这将成为一个很好的垫脚石。如果我四处闲逛，请不要介意。）

Original: Reno:A goddess and her warriors, with Cloud among them...
Dialogue: A goddess and her warriors, with Cloud among them...
trans: 一位女神和她的战士，其中包括克劳德……

Original: Reno:Huh? What was that sound?
Dialogue: Huh? What was that sound?

Original: Lulu:Did no one tell him that it's dangerous to go out alone?
Dialogue: Did no one tell him that it's dangerous to go out alone?
trans: 没有人告诉他一个人出去很危险吗？

Original: Layle:He probably just stepped out for some air.
Dialogue: He probably just stepped out for some air.
trans: 他可能只是出去透透气。

Original: Edge:He seems pretty confident in his abilities. He should be fine as long as he hasn't strayed too far.
Dialogue: He seems pretty confident in his abilities. He should be fine as long as he hasn't strayed too far.
trans: 他似乎对自己的能力很有信心。

Original: Zack:Still, I can't help but worry. I'll help you find him. What did he look like again?
Dialogue: Still, I can't help but worry. I'll help you find him. What did he look like again?
